original: Permanent Casus Belli versus other government types.
translation: 对其它政体拥有永久性宣战理由

original: Can Fabricate Claim Overseas in Colonial Regions.
translation: 可以在海外殖民地区域内伪造宣称。

original: Can Fabricate Claim Overseas in Trade Company Regions.
translation: 可以在海外贸易公司地区内伪造宣称。

original: Permanent Casus Belli against neighboring heathens and heretics.
translation: 对相邻的异端异教国家拥有永久性宣战理由。
允许招募探险家和征服者
可以建立西伯利亚拓荒区

original: Ships can repair when in coastal sea zones.
translation: 当船只航行在沿岸海域时可以自动进行修复。

original: Negative religious Tolerance no longer gives any penalties. Heretic and Heathen provinces do not give us any penalty to religious unity.
translation: 负宗教容忍不会带来任何惩罚。异端或异教省份不会影响宗教统一。

original: Automatically Discover Adjacent When a Colony is Built.
translation: 当殖民地建成时，会自动探索邻近的土地

original: Native attacks are severely reduced and development cost reduction from natives is increased by §G100%§!.
translation: 原住民攻击度大幅降低，而原住民区域发展度所需花费的削减则提高了 §G100%§!.

original: Development cost reduction is increased by $VAL$ due to our national ideas.
translation: 因为我们的国家理念发展度提升花费减少了 $VAL$.

original: May Reduce Inflation with direct action.
translation: 可以通过直接行动来减少通货膨胀。

original: Lowered impact on stability from diplomatic actions.
translation: 降低外交行动对稳定度的影响

original: Triple manpower increase in religious wars.
translation: 在宗教战争中人力成长速度增加三倍

original: Can Fabricate Claims in any colonial region belonging to another nation who are also overseas from the province, or to their colonial nations.
translation: 可以伪造其他国家任意海外省或殖民国的宣称。

original: Allows armies §YForced March§! orders, allowing them to march faster for military power.
translation: -可对部队下达§Y强行军§!命令,允许利用军事点数加快他们的行军速度

original:
Monthly Increase: $TOTAL|+=$
(due to the following)
Base Value: $BASE|Y$
translation:
月度增长：$TOTAL|+=$
（因以下因素）
基础值：$BASE|Y$

original: You can only keep $MAX$ power saved.
translation: 你最多只能保有 $MAX$ 点数。

original: Our Monarchs gain the following bonuses to their skill in this category when generated:\n$DESC$
translation: 当我们的君主降生时，君主会得到以下该类别中的技能加成:\n$DESC$

original: Inland caravans provide a total of $VALUE|Y$ trade power, due to a development base of $BASE|Y$ and $MODIFIER$ from policies and ideas.
translation: 内陆商旅提供总计 $VALUE|Y$ 贸易竞争力，来自发展度基础的$BASE|Y$和来自政策与理念的 $MODIFIER$。

original: §YIncreased Coring Cost§!\nThe national traditions of §Y$COUNTRY$§! will make this province more expensive to turn into a core if conquered.
translation: §Y增加核心成本§!\n因为§Y$COUNTRY$§!的民族传统的缘故，如果你要将此省份变为核心领土，就需要在征服此地后付出更加高昂的代价.
§Y招募一个探险家§!\n这将花费你§Y$COST$§!£dip \n
§Y招募一个征服者§!\n这将花费你§Y$COST$§!£mil \n
§Y招募一个陆军将领§!\n这将花费你§Y$COST$§!£mil \n
§Y招募一个海军提督§!\n这将花费你§Y$COST$§!£dip \n

original: This leader will get between $MIN|Y$ and $MAX|Y$ pips as base.\n
translation: 该将领将得到$MIN|Y$到$MAX|Y$的基础点数。\n

original: Fire Skill increased by $VAL$ due to:\n
translation: 火力技能提升了$VAL$，原因如下：\n

original: Shock Skill increased by $VAL$ due to:\n
translation: 冲击技能提升了$VAL$，原因如下：\n

original: Manuever Skill increased by $VAL$ due to:\n
translation: 机动技能提升了$VAL$，原因如下：\n

original: Siege Skill increased by $VAL$ due to:\n
translation: 围城技能提升了$VAL$，原因如下：\n

original: Blockade Skill increased by $VAL$ due to:\n
translation: 封锁技能提升了$VAL$，原因如下：\n

original: There is already an assault in progress in this siege.
translation: 现在我们已经开始强攻此城了。

original: There is not enough infantry to start an assault.
translation: 步兵不足,无法开始强攻

original: You cannot order your enemies to assault you.
translation: 你不能命令你的敌人去攻击你。

original: You need higher morale to order an assault.
translation: 你需要更高的士气来发动强攻

original: You need §Y$COST$§W£mil to order an assault, and you only have §Y$VAL$§W.
translation: 发动强攻需要§Y$COST$§W£mil£，而你只有§Y$VAL$§W点。

original: Ordering an assault will be costly in lives, and also costs §Y$COST$§W£mil .
translation: 发动强攻会耗费大量的有生力量，以及§Y$COST$§W£mil£。

original: You have no diplomats to send.
translation: 你没有外交官可供派遣

original: Do you wish to make §Y$PROV$§W into a Core province?
translation: 你希望将§Y$PROV$§W变为核心省份吗？

original: Do you wish to make §Y$PROV$§W into a Territorial Core?
translation: 你希望将§Y$PROV$§W变为领地核心吗？

original: Do you wish to cancel making §Y$PROV$§W into a core province?
translation: 你希望取消将§Y$PROV$§W变为核心省份吗？

original: Making §Y$PROVINCE$§W into a core province would cost §Y$COST$§W $TYPE$ power.
translation: 将§Y$PROVINCE$§W变为核心省份将花费§Y$COST$§W$TYPE$点数

original: Do you wish to fabricate claim on $PROV|Y$?
Do you wish to change the culture of §Y$PROV$§W into a §Y$CULTURE$§!?
translation: 你希望将§Y$PROV$§W的文化转变为§Y$CULTURE$§!吗？

original: Do you wish to stop changing the culture in §Y$PROV$§W?
translation: 你希望停止转变§Y$PROV$§W的文化吗？

original: Spend $MIL|Y0$ £mil£ on harsh treatment to reduce the uprising progress by $REDUCE|Y0$§Y%§!.
translation: 花费$MIL|Y0$ £mil£ 用于残酷镇压以减缓$REDUCE|Y0$§Y%§!的叛乱进程。

original: Do you wish to spend $MIL|Y0$ £mil£ on harsh treatment to reduce the uprising progress of $NAME$ by $REDUCE|Y0$%?
translation: 你希望花费$MIL|Y0$ £mil£用于残酷镇压以在$NAME$减缓$REDUCE|Y0$%的叛乱进程吗？

original: You need to have the administrative technology level 15 to be able to issue a Forced March order.
translation: 你需要行政科技15级才能强行军。

original: Movement Speed: §G$SPEED$%§!\nCosts Military Power per province traveled.
translation: 移动速度：§G$SPEED$%§!\n经过每个省份时都消耗军事点数。

original: You need §Y$COST$§W£mil to order a Forced March, and you only have §Y$VAL$§W£mil .
translation: 采用强行军命令需要§Y$COST$§W£mil£，而你只有§Y$VAL$§W£mil£。

original: Only armies can be given the order to Forced March.
translation: 只有军队才可以进行强行军

original: This army is already performing a Forced March.
translation: 这支军队已经在强行军了

original: You can only order stationary units to Forced March.
translation: 你只能命令常备军强行军。

original: Ordering a Forced March will increase movement speed to §Y$SPEED$%§W when moving, while costing §Y$COST$§W£mil per province moved.
translation: 命令部队进行强行军会提升他们§Y$SPEED$%§W的移动速度，但每经过一个省份会消耗§Y$COST$§W£mil£。

original: Armies cannot recover any morale while force marching.
translation: 在强行军时部队无法恢复士气。

original: Forced March increases movement speed to §Y$SPEED$%§W when moving, while costing §Y$COST$§W£mil per province moved.\n§Y(click to disable)§!
translation: 强行军会使部队移动的速度提升至§Y$SPEED$%§W,但在经过每个省份时会消耗§Y$COST$§W£mil£。\n§Y（点击此处取消）§!

original: You need §Y$COST$§W £dip£ to reduce War Exhaustion, and you only have §Y$VAL$§W.
You have less than §Y$VAL$§! War Exhaustion, so it's not possible to reduce it further.
translation: 你的厌战度低于§Y$VAL$§!，无法进一步降低。

original: Reduce War Exhaustion by §Y$EFFECT$§! by spending $COST|Y$£dip .
You need §Y$COST$§W £dip£ to Promote Mercantilism, and you only have §Y$VAL$§W.
translation: 你需要§Y$COST$§W£dip£来提高重商主义，而你仅有§Y$VAL$§W。
通过消耗§Y$COST$§W£dip£提高$VAL$重商主义倾向
我们已经拥有了最高的重商主义倾向
秘密行动对关系的影响

original: This idea group requires '§Y$POW$§!' power to purchase ideas.
translation: 此理念组需要§Y$POW$§!点数来购买理念。

original: You cannot change the culture of a province you do not own.
translation: 你不能改变一个尚未拥有的省份的文化。

original: You cannot change the culture of a province you do not control.
translation: 你不能改变一个不是尚未控制的省份的文化。

original: A province has to be a core before you can change its culture.
translation: 在改变省份文化前，请确认此省份是你的核心省份。

original: $NAME$ is not a §Y$RELIGION$§! province, so it is not possible to change culture. Send some missionaries first.
translation: $NAME$并不是§Y$RELIGION$§!省份，所以无法改变文化。请先派几个传教士过去。

original: You cannot perform harsh treatment of rebels in provinces you do not own.
translation: 你不能在尚未拥有的省份中进行清剿叛军。

original: You cannot perform harsh treatment of rebels in provinces you do not control.
translation: 你不能在尚未控制的省份中进行清剿叛军。

original: There are no possible rebels to treat harshly here.
translation: 这里没有可供清剿的叛军。

original: You need §Y$COST$§W£mil to perform harsh treatment, and you only have §Y$VAL$§W.
translation: 你需要§Y$COST$§W点军事点数来进行清剿，但你现在只有§Y$VAL$§W点。

original: You cannot sortie in provinces you do not own.
translation: 你不能在不属于你的省份中突围。

original: You cannot sortie in provinces you do not control.
translation: 你不能在不由你控制的省份中突围。

original: You cannot sortie if the garrison has less than $GARRISON$ men.
translation: 如果驻军少于 $GARRISON$ 人则无法突围。

original: The garrison army refuses to leave the garrison if the enemy forces are overwhelming.
translation: 如果敌方驻军数量远多于围城者，将会拒绝离开要塞。

original: You cannot sortie unless the province is under siege.
translation: 除非该省份被围攻，否则你不能突围。

original: Do you wish to sortie to protect §Y$PROV$§W?
translation: 你希望靠突围来保护§Y$PROV$§W吗？

original: You need §Y$COST$§W£mil to sortie, and you only have §Y$VAL$§W.
translation: 你需要§Y$COST$§W£mil£来突围，而你只有§Y$VAL$§W。

original: This province has recently been harshly treated and cannot be done right now.
translation: 这个省份最近已经被严酷镇压过了，你不能立即再这么做。

original: Supporting cavalry requires an economic system that produces a large number of surplus horses. If we were to guarantee the privileges of our noble class not only would they be much happier they would do much of the work to produce the needed horses. Our court fool described it as service guarantees serfs.
translation: 维持一支骑兵部队需要整个经济系统提供大量的多余马匹。如果我们能够确保贵族阶级的特权，那么他们不仅会感到更加快乐，还会替我们承担生产所需马匹的工作。我们的宫廷小丑们认为，这就是所谓的服务保障服从。

original: A foot soldier in the army is not quite the career that anyone wanted, what with the poor food, low pay, and virtually non existent medical services. If we were to tie our peasants to the land we would know exactly where to look for recruits.
translation: 没什么人愿意当步兵。这些马前小卒缺食少衣，医疗也毫无保障。通过把农民牢牢拴在土地上，我们就会有稳定的新兵来源。

original: Who leads our troops is an important choice. Our nobility is seeking to ensure that preference is given to them. It will give them a chance to show their valor by giving the enemy cold steel and we will allow them to do this.
translation: 为部队挑选指挥官是一件头等大事，而贵族们总是跃跃欲试，希望能够得到你的偏爱。再没有什么能比挥起兵刃砍向敌人更能证明他们的勇武了，记得把这种机会交给他们吧。

original: The nobility know they are simply better than normal people and will give their loyalty to those that are worthy. If we confirm their privileges they will of course remember our largess and be more resistant to the inducements of foreign powers.
translation: 贵族们天生认为他们高人一等，并且愿意将自己的忠诚托付给那些值得托付的主君。如果我们能够确保他们的特权，他们便会铭记我们的宽宏大度，并在外国势力的引诱面前坚若磐石。

original: International relations are a tricky business. Some say that the merchant class who are used to dealing with foreigners are best for this. Those who say this ignore the kindred ties that our noble families have established through the years, these ties should be taken advantage of to help our cause diplomatically.
translation: 国际关系错综复杂，需要小心应对。有人认为，惯于与外国人打交道的商人阶级往往精于此道。但他们忽视了一点，那就是贵族们经年累月地建立起来的亲戚关系。在外交活动中，这些宗族关系往往会为我们带来很大的帮助。

original: The various mercenary groups of this continent are often headed by lesser nobles. By befriending the nobility we can make use of their network of contacts to seek out more and larger groups of mercenary soldiers.
translation: 在这片大陆上，各种雇佣兵组织往往由小贵族领导。通过善待贵族，我们可以利用他们的人脉，获得更多更大规模的雇佣兵。

original: Military thought is constantly evolving and we ensure that our military thought evolves with it. By encouraging a tradition of service amongst our nobility, to be a man of status is to be a man who has won glory on the battlefield. Although bravery and stuff like that is always useful, there is nothing quite like outclassing your enemy to make it easy.
translation: 军事思想的变革日新月异，而我们需要做的就是紧跟时代的发展。贵族尽忠于主君的传统应当得到强化，优越的社会地位需要以战场上的奋勇行为作为保证。尽管勇敢精神之类的美德是很重要的，但当你发现自己的军队高出对方一等时，事情往往会简单得多。

original: There is always the temptation to be just a few days late with payments to mercenaries, after all you never know what sudden expenses might come along. We will not do that, we will pay our mercenaries exactly on time and mercenary captains will know this and remember this.
translation: 一般来说，人们倾向于将雇佣兵们的发薪日一推再推，毕竟谁都不知道这帮大爷会不会心血来潮，提出一些让人措手不及的要求。但我们不会这么做，我们会按时为雇佣兵们发放薪水，而佣兵队长们将会对我们的美德铭记在心。

original: We know from reading the accounts of Roman times that a citizen army of free men is far more willing to fight than those who are forced. We must make our peasantry fairly free and they will fight to defend their freedom.
translation: 罗马的历史告诉我们，由自由公民组成的军队在战斗意志上会远远胜过被强制拉上战场的乌合之众。因此，我们有必要赐予农民们以自由，这样他们将在战场上誓死保卫自己的自由。

original: By granting the citizens certain fundamental rights, we reduce the likelihood of a peasant uprising.
translation: 使我们的国民享有各项基本权利，显著降低发生内乱的几率。

original: In more reactionary and hidebound societies men of trade are looked down upon as somehow being lesser men than those who own land. Well not for us, we know that wealth is power regardless of where it comes from.
translation: 在一个相对顽固守旧的社会中，商人的社会地位要低于那些拥有土地的人。但很幸运我们并不是这样，财富就是力量，无论这财富是怎么来的。

original: Although giving a servant a damn good thrashing might be satisfying, it is not the best way to actually get them to work harder. Some natural philosopher has hit on the idea of making profit the prime motivation for people, if we replace monetary rents with payment in kind, our peasants will be incentivized to produce more.
translation: 尽管对于奴仆们来说一顿暴打往往会非常合适，但这并不能有效地令他们勤奋工作。一些自然哲学家们偶然发现，提高人们的工作积极性会带来非常丰厚的回报。如果我们能够用征收实物来取代货币地租的话，我们的农民们便会更加积极地生产出更多的作物了。

original: By striving towards a more tolerant society and making attempts at solving our social and religious problems in more rational ways, the risk of civil disorder will diminish.
translation: 建立一个更宽容的社会，开明地对待不同社会思潮与宗教信仰，大幅度地提升国家稳定程度。

original: For a long time we have restricted ownership of land to only those we felt were trustworthy enough. If we were to lift these restrictions then land holding would be consolidated. This in turn would create a pool of seasonal labor for whom the army life might be worth pursuing.
translation: 长期以来，只有那些我们认为值得信赖的人才有权拥有土地。如果我们废除这些限制，那么土地所有关系便会得到巩固。由此，那些选择从军打仗的人们便可以周期性地投入到生产活动中去了。

original: A truly innovative court is one where any person may rise to shine. We must strive to make sure that old traditions, birth or wealth aren't a hindrance to the development of our court or a barrier to talented people wishing to seek their fortune in the service of our state.
translation: 一个真正的有创造性的宫廷是一个人可以让任何人发挥作用的地方。我们必须努力确保这些旧的传统，出身或财富不是对我们宫廷发展的阻碍，而且其也不应该阻碍那些在我们国家渴求财富的人才们的愿望。

original: Our quest towards a culturally cultivated society begins here. Our artistic wonders will go down in history as the most marvelous of this era.
translation: 我们从此将开始追求建立文化昌盛的社会，我们的艺术巨作将万古流传，成为这一世代的人间奇迹。

original: Too many countries let the perception of the country shape their policies. That is foolish, if mercenaries are more suitable for our needs we will use them instead of investing in an expensive standing army.
translation: 大多数国家会依照土地收成来制定政策。这很愚蠢，如果雇佣兵更能适应我们的需要，那我们就应该去使用他们，而不是花费财力去维持一支昂贵的常备军。

original: We should strive towards a social and economic revolution marked by technological inventions and a transfer from an agricultural society into an industrial one.
translation: 我们应该使科技水平获得长足进步，促进社会与经济的变革，全面进入工业化时代。

original: Preserving of experience is the most important thing a country can do. We need to ensure that those who serve in combat pass on this knowledge to the younger recruits, through a system of mentoring.
translation: 经验的传承是每个国家的头等大事。我们需要建立严格的教导制度，以保证老兵们能够将他们的战斗知识完备地交到新兵手中。

original: In days of yore when a captain sought to recruit men to fill his regiment, the process was time-consuming as not many people wished to embrace certain death in our armies. However, by applying the principles of reason to this problem we will be able to come up with a system that will get men into uniform much quicker.
translation: 在古代，如果一名军官想为他的部队补充兵员，那么他会花上相当长的时间，因为并不是谁都愿意参军入伍舍命拼杀的。但是，如果我们从根本上来解决这一问题，我们就可以建立征兵体系，以更快的速度将新兵们征召入伍。

original: Victory is not just won off the battlefield but also in the drawing rooms. Our advancement of reason makes our people able to shrug off the effects of temporary setbacks and prepare instead for our inevitable victory.
translation: 胜利并不仅是在战场上打败敌人，而且还在于向手下灌输必胜的意志。如果战士们坚信他们是占据优势的一方，他们便会克服暂时的艰难险阻，将胜利由可能变为必然。

original: Traditionally officers come from the nobility, but we don't have that many nobles leading to a shortage of officers. However, there are actually plenty of persons of lower class in our armies. We should consider promoting some of them as professional officers.
translation: 传统上军官都是由贵族来担当的,但贵族们的数量往往不足以满足庞大的军官需求.然而,我们的军队里也有相当多的来自于下层阶级的军士,我们应当尝试着将他们晋升为职业军官.

original: Join the battle cry of the crusades, 'God wills it' and crush the infidels.
translation: 遵循十字军的号召，「循上帝之意」击溃异教徒。

original: Although there is no shortage of people ready to go out and spread the true faith, most of these people simply do more harm than good. However, specialist schools to train the missionaries will ensure we have more people who cannot only spread the faith, but succeed as well.
translation: 尽管我们从不缺乏有志于出外传播真理的人，但这些人的绝大多数人的行为都是弊大于利的。然而，专门培养传教士的学校会确保我们能够培养出这样的人才：他们不仅愿意去传播信仰，而且有能力取得成功。

original: By adopting a mandatory church attendance policy, the emphasis on religious values and beliefs will unquestionably minimize the costs of maintaining law and order.
translation: 通过制定强制性参与宗教活动的政策，我们官方信仰的权威得到维护，对宗教活动的管理得到加强，维护了社会秩序的稳定。

original: It is of the utmost importance that we rid our nation and its surrounding borders from the infidels pestering our lands.
translation: 最重要的是能这使我们能够专注于维护信仰的纯洁性，有效抵制异端信仰的侵袭。

original: Religion is one of the most important bulwarks of our rulership. By public displays of piety by the rulers, the ruled will follow suit. The growing of piety amongst our people will strengthen our rule.
translation: 宗教是我们统治地位的最坚实保证。如果统治者们公开表示对神明的虔诚信仰，那么臣民们便会跟着这样做。这样，便会巩固我们的统治地位。

original: The strength of our faith and public displays of piety and worship are admired by other lands both near and far. This is reflected in the prestige and glory to our realm.
translation: 对信仰的坚定执著，对神明的顶礼膜拜，这些都会得到远近友邻们的艳羡，而这种艳羡便是对我们威望与荣耀的有力体现。

original: The problem with how to deal with heretics in the realm is always difficult. Although the good old-fashioned fire and sword approach will solve most problems eventually, diplomacy can also succeed. By encouraging dialogue between the various sects we can reduce misunderstanding and promote peace in the realm.
translation: 异教徒的问题总是如此棘手。尽管古老的火与剑法则能彻底解决大部分问题，但外交手腕也不失为一种解决之道。如果我们能够促进各教派之间的对话与协商，我们就能有效减少误解，促进国家内部的和平。

original: Waging war on enemy commerce rests on the apex of the first triad of victory. We will encourage crusty sea captains to strike at the enemy's trade.
translation: 狠狠打击敌方的商业运转会帮助我们奏响胜利的号角。我们应当鼓励船长们去主动袭击敌方的贸易航路。

original: With so many offices for profit, we sometimes find that those who run our administration are susceptible to bribes from foreign powers. A few simple background checks will weed out the most prone to corruption.
translation: 所谓无官不贪,我们通常会发现,很多维持政府机构运转的官员们会倒在外国势力的银弹攻势之下.所以,一些简单的背景调查将有助于我们遏制住大多数的腐败苗头.

original: Enemies are vulnerable on all fronts. Poison in the right ear can be just as deadly as ten thousand soldiers. We must be ready to practice all the dark arts we need to win.
translation: 有很多方式可以轻而易举地击败敌人.恰到好处的恶毒流言有时比一万名士兵还要致命.我们一定要努力掌握这些暗处的手段,以便于赢得战争.

original: Most peasants will sell their own mother for cash but find those who can do something truly useful is more difficult. Through experience we are learning to separate the wheat from the chaff.
translation: 大多数的农民都会为了一点金钱而不惜出卖自己的母亲,但是,找到那些真正有用的内奸反而是很困难的.尽管代价高昂,但是学会这种披沙拣金术将很有帮助.

original: Our ability to identify and recruit from the very lowest classes leaves many disbelieving that it is indeed us that are doing these things. Which is nice.
translation: 我们可以从最底层的民众中挑选新兵,以至于坊间居然不相信进行新兵招募的正是我们.这感觉还真不错.

original: Our abilities at espionage allow us to target the very stability of the enemies. We can make their greatest friends be their enemies.
translation: 优秀的间谍活动可以使得我们对敌人最坚定的盟友上下其手,就连敌人最亲密的朋友也会对他们倒戈相向.

original: Allows us to train more spies and thereby increase our chances of obtaining political and military information about our enemies.
translation: 使我们能够训练更多的情报员, 充分搜集别国的政治与军事情报。

original: Diplomacy is a delicate art of trying to balance several sides at the same time. If we maintain embassies in other countries reporting to us on a regular basis then we will have the information needed in order to ponder our options.
translation: 外交是一项非常精妙的活动，它需要同时在数个方面上取得平衡。如果我们能够让那些外派的大使馆定期传达一些基本信息，就能在进行决策时参考到更多的情报了。

original: Claiming something as yours is easy, persuading everyone else that you have a valid claim is much harder. By spreading our diplomatic net wide we can ensure that the people who matter know that this claim is ours.
translation: 宣布某物属于自己非常容易，但要让每个人都信服你的这种占有权就非常难了。通过广泛地铺设外交网络，我们可以清楚地知道，谁会对你的这种占有权表示出浓厚的兴趣。

original: By establishing an executive council, we are able to assemble our most skilled diplomats.
translation: 我们完善行政机构，训练更多熟练的外交官。

original: There is what is ours and what is part of our ancestral domain that will never be surrendered. A bit of flexibility here will see much more land being considered never surrenderable and should the worst happen the whole world will know our crusade to recover it will be just.
translation: 一切属于我们与我们祖先的土地都是神圣不可侵犯的。我们不可能在任何事关领土的问题上进行妥协，如果事态不可收拾，那么全世界都将见识到我们为了收复故土而付出的决心。

original: With the politics of the time becoming more polarized and more radical, we may have no choice but to wage war on governments that are not the same as our own. By embracing this idea we can at no cost.
translation: 随着越来越激进的政策，我们别无选择，只能同与我们的政体不同的国家作战。采用这个政策我们可以毫无代价的发起战争。

original: By focusing on Diplomacy we can increase the power we wield on the diplomatic stage. This power can gain us many friends.
translation: 通过努力发展外交事业，我们可以在外交舞台上长袖善舞，左右逢源。

original: You can never quite know what can be gained at the peace table so we should enter the with all options open.
translation: 你永远都不知道在谈判桌上会获得些什么，所以，请记得把你所有的选项带上谈判桌。

original: We have many covert operations planned but lack the men for the tasks. Establishing a training method for our spies will help bolster the available agents for dangerous missions.
translation: 我们已经有很多可以瞒天过海并精心策划的计划，但是困于没有合适的人选来执行。为我们的间谍建立培训方案将有助于提升他们执行危险的任务的能力。

original: Naturally, there are those who reside in our subjects' lands who understand the divine right of our rule. By recruiting and aiding these enlightened individuals we can strengthen our grasp on subject nations.
translation: 一些在我们的附庸国的土地上居住的人，他们拥戴我们统治的神圣权利，通过招募和协助这些明理事的人，可以加强我们对附庸国的控制。

original: While we look to infiltrate other nations, we must be vigilant of poisonous ideas spreading around our own courts. Assembling an audit team to ensure our ministers are acting in the state's interest will help root out some rotten elements.
translation: 当我们寻求渗透其他国家时，也必须警惕一些有毒的思想在我们自家转播。建立一个监察组以确保我们的官员按照国家的最高利益行事，这将有利于我们铲除一些腐败因素。

original: Allows us to create one of the largest and most powerful armies the world has ever seen.
translation: 使我们能够组建空前庞大有力的陆军。

original: The sight of our glorious and prestigious army will make all adversaries tremble in fear.
translation: 使我们的陆军获得无可匹敌的荣耀与威名，令所有敌人心怀恐惧。

original: Men who are well led will follow, so we will ensure that our officers will lead from the front.
translation: 治兵有方的将领，士兵会愿意为他效死。因此，我们要确保军官们会在最前线上做出榜样。

original: Allows us to focus heavily on military advancements and thereby increase our Army Tradition.
translation: 使我们能够专注于陆军科技进步，提升陆军传统。

original: Traditionally we were unable to fight effectively in lands which did not supply a lot of food. However our troops have become better at acquiring food allowing larger armies to fight.
translation: 在缺乏食物供应的情况下我们无法有效率的进行作战。一支擅长于收集食物的军队可以维持更大的规模投入战斗。

original: Using troops on the battlefield is a vital skill for a good commander. The ability to know where to move troops will give us an edge.
translation: 对于指挥官来说，学会如何在前线带兵打仗是必修课，而懂得该怎样调遣军队则会为我们带来额外的收益。

original: Traditional armies relied on furious discipline to maintain order in the ranks, however, by appealing to unit pride we can reach even higher levels of discipline.
translation: 传统军队依靠严格的训练维持等级秩序，但是我们通过培养团队自豪感可以起到比训练更好的效果。

original: Allows us to gather the greatest minds our nation has to offer in the area of military technology and make use of their unrivalled services.
translation: 使我们能够集中全国的军事技术人才，迅速加强陆军科技水平。

original: Allows us to invest in military training and thereby improve battle formations, weapon handling and boost the morale of our army.
translation: 使我们能够通过加强军事训练，提升陆军战斗力和士气。

original: By organizing our armies into regiments tied to distinct geographical areas we can allow the army to put down roots into the community. Thus when we come to raise more battalions for our regiments they will be able to be recruited faster.
translation: 如果将士兵们按照籍贯来进行编组，我们就能将部队与他们的故乡紧密联系在一起。因此，当我们需要为各军团招募新兵时，这种招募便会非常迅速。

original: There are those who think that attack is the best form of defense, but that is foolish let them come to us and then hit them on the counter. Our troops will defend tenaciously and our fortresses will hold out for longer.
translation: 有人说进攻是最好的防御，但当他们在反击中碰得头破血流时，你将毫不怀疑这句话的荒谬。我们的军队将如磐石般进行守备，我们的要塞也会坚持更长时间。

original: The use of massed firepower to disrupt the enemy before delivering the coup de grace is one of our army's strength and we will ensure that our leaders know this.
translation: 在总攻之前先采取密集火力对敌方进行杀伤，这种战术是一支部队的威力所在。所以，一定要确保我们的军官们能够明白这一点。

original: While on campaign attrition is our biggest enemy, the key thing then is to get men to replace these losses as quickly as possible.
translation: 在战争中，我们最凶恶的敌人便是持续的消耗。所以，当务之急是确保我们的部队可以尽快得到补充。

original: Increases our military numbers by making it compulsory for men to enroll for military service.
translation: 强制征兵的举措可以使我们的部队规模得到迅速的扩充。

original: Allows us to make use of more refined trading practices giving our merchants the upper hand over our competitors.
translation: 使我们的商人具有更强的业务素质，压倒竞争对手。

original: The current merchant families are seeking to ensure that trade privileges remain their exclusive preserve, but we are unwilling to do so and will allow the growth of the merchant class.
translation: 现在的商业家族们迫切希望能够确保他们对于商业专营权的垄断，但我们并不希望如此，而是希望整个商人阶层能够全面发展。

original: Allows us to make use of the numerous traders lusting for fame and fortune, eager to offer their services for a chance to search and explore new trade routes.
translation: 使我们能够充分引导本国商人追逐利益最大化，开拓新商路，开发新市场。

original: By adopting a national trade policy, we can strengthen our commercial presence and increase the effectiveness of our trade.
translation: 使我们加强对贸易活动的规范，扩大市场空间，提升商业效率。

original: To grow trade we need to extend the rights of citizenship to people who live abroad, support our trade and are of the right social class.
translation: 为了繁荣贸易，我们需要将公民权扩大至那些居住在国外的本国公民，全力支持贸易发展。以及相对应的社会阶层。

original: At those key choke points where trade could go one way or another, the ability to gain an edge there is key to the growth of our trade income.
translation: 在那些事关贸易发展的关键枢纽上,我们要有能力制定政策,引导商业产生出更多的利润.

original: Sometimes the key to closing a trade deal is to be quickest. We need to ensure that our merchants are able to have the deal done.
translation: 有时候达成一项协议是非常迅速的，而我们要做的就是确保商人们能够切实完成我们的谈判。

original: Allows us to increase our tax revenues by adopting a more bureaucratic administrative system governed by state officials.
translation: 使我们能够完善行政管理体系，扩展财源，增加税收。

original: The need to upgrade the infrastructure of our government is a costly business, if we structure the process correctly we can do this cheaper.
translation: 市政建设的升级是一项耗费庞大的工程，如果我们能够合理地对工程进行规划，就能节省一大笔资金。
亚当·斯密的经济自由主义

original: By opposing mercantilism and restricting the state's influence in economic matters, we shall support a free market that will increase our overall production efficiency.
translation: 使我们的国策由重商主义转向自由贸易，减少国家对市场的干预，提高经济效益。

original: By establishing a central authority for financial matters, we will have better control over our nation's economy.
translation: 使我们建立对财政金融的监管体系，更好地引导经济发展。

original: Debt is sometimes simply unavoidable, however, an organized debt market will allow us to float loans at a lower interest rate.
translation: 负债有时是不可避免的，然而，一个有序的信托市场会允许我们进行贷款，并享受较低的利率。

original: If we centralize the state then we will find it easier to advance the ideas and agenda of the center over the regions.
translation: 如果对整个国家采取中央集权统治，我们将会很容易地将中央的理念与计划贯彻至全国各地。

original: The supporting of our troops is vital to national defense. With our excellent administration we are able to secure generous discounts for our supplies.
translation: 对军队的支持度将直接决定国防能力的强大与否.在我们的英明领导之下,我们可以为军队提供难以想象的巨大支持.

original: Enables us to send more Colonists to uncharted lands.
translation: 使我们能够派遣更多的移民队，开拓未知世界。

original: Allows us to join the number of nations set to explore the world outside of their borders or strive to be the first nation to circumnavigate the world by commencing a quest for the new world.
translation: 使我们能够专注于对远方世界的探索，发现新大陆，建立日不落帝国。

original: Setting up colonies in distant lands is pretty much a one way trip. If strange new diseases don't get you, the amount of time it takes to sail back means you won't be coming home. If we remind people of the potential riches, we can encourage them to seek lands further afield.
translation: 开拓远方殖民地的旅程往往都是单程的。即使没有被未知的传染病所吞噬，归乡所需的漫漫长日也会使你望而却步。如果能够宣示出此行所能带来的巨大财富，那么我们就能够激励人们去探索更加遥远的殖民地。

original: By portraying colonial lands and new virgin land where any man can make his fortune, possibly some women too, people will emigrate quicker to the colonies. Meaning the nation will have spent less money encouraging people to go there.
translation: 我们应当大肆宣扬这样的理念，任何乐于开垦殖民地与处女地的男女都可以发家致富，这样人们就会更快地前往殖民地了。由此，我们可以在鼓励人们开垦殖民地上花费更少的金钱。

original: Makes it possible for us to establish Viceroys and thereby improve the administration of our Colonies and increase the amount of money they generate.
translation: 使我们能够强化殖民地管理，增加来自殖民地的收益。

original: Only so many people are willing to move abroad to expand our great colonial empire. However the promise of a plot of land to farm, in free hold, will encourage many more people to seek their fortune abroad. The nice thing about it is that there is plenty of land for everyone.
translation: 那些愿意移居海外,开拓伟大殖民帝国的人总是寥寥无几.然而,如果我们能够确保殖民者们可以免费占有大片的耕地,那么人们将争先恐后地前往海外创造财富,享受属于每个人的免费家园.

original: Our commitment to our colonial empire has changed the attitude of people to jobs in the colonial administration. No longer a place for freebooters who seek to maximize their fortune, instead it is seen as a career for the brightest and the best. This is reflected in our taxes.
translation: 我们对于整个殖民帝国的责任改变了政府官员们的工作态度.这里不再是海盗们横行无忌的天堂,聪明善良的公民们在这里安居乐业.而这些都将充实我们的税收.

original: Enables us to transform our fleet into a supreme naval force with high-class vessels and highly skilled captains and sailors.
translation: 使我们能够拥有高等级舰船,以及高水平的船长和水手.

original: The sight of our glorious and prestigious navy will make all adversaries tremble in fear.
translation: 我们的舰队无可匹敌的荣耀与威名将令所有敌人心怀恐惧。

original: Allows us to create one of the largest and most powerful fleets the world has ever seen.
translation: 使我们能够组建空前庞大有力的海军.

original: Allows us to focus heavily on military advancements and thereby increase our naval tradition.
translation: 使我们能够迅速推进海军科技,加强海军传统.

original: By gathering the best shipbuilders our nation has to offer, we are able to build us a fleet of modern vessels unmatched in craftsmanship and maneuverability.
translation: 通过征召我国最好的造船工匠,我们有能力建成一支现代舰队,它在技术与机动力上将无人能敌.

original: Allows our naval veterans to devise new methods to improve our fleet's efficiency in blockades.
translation: 使我们能够进一步提升舰队战斗力,强化对敌方海域的封锁.

original: Life at sea is hard and unforgiving and not everyone is keen on a career in the Navy. By legalizing the impressment of men of seafaring habits, it will be easier to crew our ships speeding up the process of commissioning ships.
translation: 海上的生活非常艰苦,容不得一点差错.但是,并不是所有的海员都在技术上无懈可击.通过将强行征召水手们的行为合法化,我们将能够更有效地征召船员,由此提高舰船的服役速度.

original: The most vital moment of any army's existence is straight after a battle. Win or lose, exhausted troops are most vulnerable. We must ensure that our troops are ready for combat before the opposition is.
translation: 在战场上，一场大战之后的时刻往往最为危险。无论获胜还是战败，此时筋疲力尽的军队都会非常脆弱。在敌人来袭之前，我们必须要确保部队随时能够投入战斗。

original: How steadily those troops take the ground! How beautifully those cavalry form! Look at those grey horses! Who are those fine horsemen? These are fine troops.
translation: 多么坚不可摧的部队！多么威武雄壮的骑兵！看那些灰色的壮马，那优秀的骑士又是何人？这是一支多么强大的部队。

original: The more punishment our ships can take the more they can dish out. Let us ensure that we have a ready supply of the finest seasoned oak for our warships.
translation: 船只能够承受的伤害越多，它们在战斗中幸存的几率便会越高。所以，我们应当确保将一切能够收集到的优质橡木都使用在战舰的建造上。

original: Every private has a marshal's baton in his back. Well, perhaps not exactly, but for those who distinguish themselves in battle, promotion and rewards will follow. The troops know this and are inspired by it.
translation: 每名士兵的表现都逃不出元帅的法眼。虽然这种表述有所夸张，但对那些在战场上表现出众的士兵来说，晋升与重赏将是他们理所应得之物。这种奖赏措施为军人们所周知，并激励着他们奋勇杀敌。

original: The confusion of combat can leave a warship unfit for action for a long time. A well drilled crew will recover much faster than an ordinary one.
translation: 战场上的混乱会使得一艘舰船在相当长的时间内失去战斗力,而相较于普通船员来说,训练有素的船员们会更快地从混乱中恢复过来.

original: Let every merchant ship fly our merchant ensign with pride and know that our navy will always be there to protect them if needs must.
translation: 我们应当令所有的商船上都飘扬起我们的旗帜,并使它们相信,一俟出现危险,我们的海军永远会是它们最为坚强的后盾.

original: Let us mass our artillery in a single grand battery, its destructive power will blast a hole in the enemy lines.
translation: 我们应当最大限度地集中使用我们的炮兵.这样,毁灭性的火力将在敌军的阵列中轻松撕开一个大洞.

original: Life is cheap, but horses are expensive. If we set up a system of benefits for those who do own horse we will have more to choose from.
translation: 人命很廉价,但马匹却很昂贵.如果我们设立机制来奖励那些拥有马匹的人,就能有更多的马匹可供挑选.

original: The veteran sergeants are some of the most despicable and corrupt men imaginable, but these men are still useful. Rather than leave them to be beggars on our streets, men like this should be used when their service ends. Let's make them into drill sergeants and quartermasters so their unique skills can be put to use.
translation: 虽然某些老兵行事卑鄙、生活堕落，但这些人仍然很有用处。比起任凭老兵沿街乞讨，将他们任用到人生的最后一息无疑更为有利。我们应当授予老兵们教官与军需官的职位，这样他们那些宝贵的技能就会得以发挥出来了。

original: How old does a boy have to be before he is a man? How old must he be before he can die for his country? Some rulers are squeamish, we on the other hand are an equal opportunity butcher.
translation: 多长的岁月可以使男孩子变成男子汉？多大的年纪才能让这些男人为国捐躯？有些统治者确实过分拘谨，而我们有时候又与刽子手别无二致。

original: The principle of volunteering underpins our whole army structure. Sometimes there aren't enough volunteers. We should force people to volunteer.
translation: 志愿兵役制有效地稳固了我们军队的构成，但志愿兵的数量有时会显得不足，我们应当强征一些“志愿者”了。

original: Ships are expensive, what we need to do is to get other people to help pay for them. The Ship's penny is a perfect example of this.
translation: 舰船很是昂贵，所以我们应当尽量找人来分担这笔军费。征收船税便是一种有效的解决之路。

original: Each iron founder jealously guards his secrets and techniques and makes each cannon as bespoke piece of art. While this may be good for their egos it is not the best way to order cannon. From now on we will insist that each cannon is made to our own exact specifications, and it will also be a lot cheaper as well.
translation: 每个铁匠都会近乎偏执地固守他们的工艺秘密,这使得每一门大炮都犹如一件工艺品.虽然工匠们的虚荣心得到了满足,但这样明显不是制造大炮的最好方法.如今我们将严格规定,每门大炮都必须符合精确的规格.由此,铸炮的成本将会大大降低.

original: We have, up to now, been very choosy over who should serve as a ranker in our military. We only took the poorest and most desperate, basically the people no one else would miss. Now though we are going to open up the ranks to everyone, who isn't rich.
translation: 迄今为止，我们一直在以严格的标准为军队招募士兵。我们只挑选那些最为贫困、最为绝望的人，因为他们已经无甚留恋。现在，军队将为所有并不富裕的人敞开大门。

original: By drawing up standing contracts with certain mercenary captains we can ensure that we will always have access to a large pool of mercenaries to draw on, should they be needed.
translation: 与一些雇佣军首领签订长期合约，我们就能保障大量雇佣军以备不时之需，

original: The new world is many things, most important of all, empty. Well no one important lives there at any rate. By letting people know of the boundless opportunities we have in the new world we will encourage more people to go forth and settle there.
translation: 新大陆意味着一切，而最重要的是，它尚未被占有。换句话来说，根本没什么大人物在那里占有哪怕一丁点的土地，如果我们能让人们了解这种近乎无限的良机，就能鼓励更多的人投身到新大陆的开发中去。

original: Colonies are no good unless we get the produce home to the mother country. We must expand our merchant class to ensure that this happens.
translation: 如果不能将殖民地的物产运回祖国，那么殖民地将毫无意义。为此，我们必须充分地发展商人阶级。

original: You cannot simply send colonists out and expect them to build a colony. There is a time consuming process of preparing the expedition with all the items they will need to survive in their new home. Using past experience we can speed this process up.
translation: 你不能简单的送出殖民者们就期望他们给你建立一个殖民地。为了新家园生存所需的远征物品的准备工作是一个费时的过程。利用过去的经验我们可以加速这一进程。

original: The drive to expand our country means we must also expand our diplomatic reach. We must ensure that our diplomatic service is properly staffed.
translation: 要推动我们国家的发展，就得推动我们外交的发展。我们必须为所有外交工作指派人手。

original: To defend our interests around the globe we will require a strong fleet. We must ensure our shipyards can produce ships as quickly as possible to replace any losses we may suffer.
translation: 要保证我们在全球的利益，我们需要一支强大的舰队。我们必须确保我们的造船厂尽可能以最大效率生产船舰，以便随时补充战场上的损失。

original: Sometimes it is simply enough for people to believe that we are powerful. We have worked hard on our diplomatic service to ensure that our word carries extra weight.
translation: 有时，要让人们相信我们的强大是很简单的。我们已经通过外交上的努力而让我们的发言在世界上更有分量。

original: To bring trade home we must be able to beat the competition from other countries. We need to ensure that our legal system gives them every possible edge.
translation: 我们必须击败其他国家的竞争对手才能对我国招商引资。我们一定要确保我们的法律系统给予他们最多有利条件。

original: Mercenary captains are a canny lot. They will try to get two commanders in the same army into a bidding war for their services. We will streamline our mercenary recruitment process to prevent abuses by commanders and ensure we are always in the best negotiating position.
translation: 佣兵组织首领非常谨慎。当他们付钱上战场时，他们会尝试在一支军队中使用两个指挥官。我们能把我们的佣兵招募流程合理化来阻止指挥官的滥用，并确保我们在谈判中总能处于优势地位。

original: Mercenaries will always look for the best deal, so we need to ensure that mercenaries remain with us. By ensuring we look after our mercenary companies, they will stay loyal for longer and require less direct monetary compensation.
translation: 佣兵总是会去寻找最划算的交易，因此我们得保证佣兵一直站在我们这边。只要我们照顾好我们的佣兵伙伴，他们的忠诚度会更高，呆的时间更长，而且所需的薪资也更低。

original: Money is not the only limit when it comes to recruiting mercenaries. The other bottleneck is having mercenary companies who actually wish to serve with us. Thus we must ensure our system allows every company to join us.
translation: 招募佣兵时，金钱不是唯一的瓶颈。另一个瓶颈是是否有真正希望为我们服务的佣兵组织。因此，我们的系统必须确保所有的组织都能加入进来。

original: Sometimes money is short and we need to borrow. Lenders always worry that they will not be paid back. By maintaining meticulous records we will be able to ensure that everyone gets paid and that will allow us to negotiate lower rates of interest.
translation: 当资金短缺时，我们不得不借钱。债主通常都会担心别人会不会还钱。为了留下清白的记录，我们最好确保每一笔债务都清偿了，这样可以让我们通过谈判来降低一些利息。

original: The most important part of any government is getting the right advice. We must ensure that we are as inclusive as possible when it comes to advisors so we can maximize the number of different viewpoints we are presented with.
translation: 任何政府最重要的部分是得到正确的建议。我们对于顾问必须尽可能的包容以便于我们可以得到最大限度的不同观点。

original: Every state faces down times. This is when the discontented or the excluded feel it is time to rebel. If we build up an administration that is resilient in the face of these upsets we will be able to recover much quicker from this sad state of affairs.
translation: 每个国家都会遇到麻烦。不满意和被驱逐的人会谋反，如果我们建立一个行政机构来镇压这些颠覆活动，我们将能从这些麻烦中尽快脱身并恢复过来。

original: Warfare is when the country is at its most vulnerable, the stresses of wars can seriously undermine the ability to rule. By ensuring that key players are involved during time of warfare we can avoid these stresses.
translation: 羸弱就要挨打，战争的压力能严重破坏一个国家的统治力。在战争期间，只要确保战争的主要玩家都在忙着打仗，我们就能独善其身。

original: Beginning around 1495, the Tudor monarchy invested heavily in not just ships but the infrastructure to support them. This for many was the official founding of the royal navy.
translation: 从1495年左右开始，都铎王朝不仅在船只上投入大笔资金，还大力资助了基础设施的建设。许多人认为，这就是皇家海军建立的开始。

original: Although not passed in the year 1526 they represented the first attempted to streamline the Royal Bureaucracy of England, to make more responsive and cost effective.
translation: 尽管1526年没有通过，他们第一次试图让英国皇家官僚变得有组织，以提高反应速度和成本效益。

original: The King had always had a royal servant responsible for the King's correspondence. By the mid 17th century, the number started to rise and they became important parts of the government machine, not just passing on Royal decrees but allowed administrative autonomy.
translation: 总有一个忠仆来对国王的言行负责。从17世纪中期开始，这些人的数量开始增多，而且他们在政府机器中的地位也越来越重要。除了传递皇家法令，他们还允许拥有行政上的自治地位。

original: These acts represented the high water mark of mercantilism. Our trade will be carried on our ships and will come to our ports first where we will get to tax it.
translation: 这些行动表示重商主义的高潮到来了，我们会用船只进行贸易，并通过港口收税。

original: Life in the English army is grueling and strictly regimented, but it instills in a man a certain character. Their stiff upper lip, and expertise with firearms, puts fear into the hearts of our enemies.
translation: 在英国军队中的生活是艰苦的，管理极为严格，但它能把一定的气质灌输给每个士兵。 他们有僵硬的面容，以及专业的枪械知识，能让我们的敌人心中充满恐惧。

original: A sweeping series of reforms focused on the limits of royal power, in particular focused on the judiciary. The monarch may not unilaterally raise armies, prescribe cruel and unusual punishment, or interfere with the free election of members of Parliament.
translation: 一系列的改革集中在对皇家权力的限制上，特别是侧重于司法权。 君主不得单方面培养军队，规定残忍和不寻常的惩罚，或干涉议会议员的自由选举。

original: The Acts of Union constitutionally combine the nations of England and Scotland into one. From a single national Parliament, the entire nation shall be ruled under the same set of laws and ordinances, with a common military and economy.
translation: 《联合法案》将英格兰与苏格兰合并为一个牢不可破的整体，拥有共同的议会，施行同样的法规，制定共同的军事经济政策。

original: Rapid advances in technology are creating possibilities never before dreamt of. People flock to the cities to work in new, highly efficient factories outfitted with astonishing modern machinery. Britain must be at the heart of this industrial revolution, as any nation that fails to modernize will be swept away by those that do.
translation: 技术的飞速发展带来了前所未有的机遇。人们涌向城市，在高效的，拥有大量现代化机械设备的新工厂中工作。英国必须处于这场工业革命的核心，因为任何未能实现现代化的国家都将被历史无情的淘汰。

original: The Royal Society brings together the greatest scientific minds in the nation and drives them to even greater heights of understanding in the many fields of natural philosophy. As a world-class institution, it will lead Great Britain into a new era of thought and experimentation.
translation: 英国皇家学会将全国最优秀的科学人才聚集在一起，使他们在自然哲学领域的研究中，取得了卓越的进步。 作为世界级的科学机构，它将引领英国进入思想和实验的新时代。

original: The Grand old Duke of York, appointed head of the army in 1795, instituted a far reaching set of reforms on the British army. He improved the lot of the common soldiers and more importantly laid down strict conditions on the buying of promotions. Officers from now on would have to serve a minimum amount of time at the previous rank before they could buy the next one. This lead to officers who actually had a rough idea about what they were doing.
translation: 大老约克公爵在1795年被任命为军队司令.他设立了一系列对英国军队的改革.除了提升了普通士兵的数量,更重要的是,他为晋升军衔设立了严格的条款.从现在起,一个人要在军队中服役一定的时间后才能升级到下个军衔.这让军官们真正意识到他们正在做什么

original: Founded in 1707, its role was to ensure the welfare of ordinary enlisted seamen in the Navy. It brought a series of reforms that improved the health of sailors on duty.
translation: 皇家海军救伤团建立于1707年。它主要目的是为入伍的海员提供救助。它为海军带来了一系列的改革，并提高了海员的生存率。

original: Being an island nation we are always going to be dependent on the sea for trade. So we must promote the merchant marine to ensure our trade prospers.
translation: 作为一个岛国，我们必须依赖海洋进行贸易。 因此，我们必须建设商业舰队以确保我们的海上贸易繁荣。

original: Rule Britannia!\nBritannia rule the waves.\nBritons never, never, never shall be slaves.
translation: 统治不列颠尼亚！\n不列颠尼亚统治海洋。\n不列颠人永远，永远，永远不会被奴役。

original: The Swedish Kings often depended on cooperation with the Estates, especially with the large peasant class to balance out the nobility. During Gustavus Adolphus reign, however, a historic compromise was made with the nobility, who pledged to loyally put their resources to the nation's disposal in return for new privileges.
translation: 瑞典国王总是依赖于与不同阶级的合作，尤其是与大农民阶级的合作，以保证与贵族阶级相抵。然而，在古斯塔夫·阿道夫统治时期，贵族做出了一项历史性的妥协，他们把资源交给国家以换取一些新的特权。

original: While other armies fire inaccurate volleys at their enemies, we will march at them in disciplined ranks, deliver a single volley at close range and then give them cold steel.
translation: 当其他军队向他们的敌人进行乱射时，我们将会向他们齐步前进，并在近距离向他们齐射死亡之弹，之后跟他们短兵相接。

original: Finland is a rather poor and backward place, and service in the Swedish army gives people excellent opportunities to financial advancement via looting. Good horsemanship and high quality horses allow us to raise excellent and feared cavalry who, our enemies maintain, are invulnerable due to witchcraft.
translation: 芬兰是一个贫穷而落后的地方。芬兰人通过在瑞典军队中的服役得到了一个通过掠夺而赚钱的机会。精湛的骑术和优秀的战马让我们能训练出优秀的骑兵，他们通过魔法的力量变得坚不可摧，令敌人胆战心惊。

original: The Swedish allotment system was the division of the peasantry into groups of 10 for recruitment purposes. This system made it easier to find people to serve in the army and organize them into units.
translation: 瑞典的分派制以征兵为目的将农民阶级分为每10人一组，这个系统使得寻找从军之人更加容易并使各个单位更方便对其进行组织。

original: Absolutism is the theory that one man should be in charge, that man is the King and he should have the ability to run the government unfettered by the privy council.
translation: 专制主义理论认为应该由一个人来负责全局，那个人就是国王，他应该拥有通过枢密院来运转整个政府的能力。

original: The decree forbid foreign ships arriving in Sweden to bring goods from countries other than their own or colonies.
translation: 法案禁止外国商船在到达瑞典的时候带来其他国家或殖民地的货物。

original: The Act gave the King the sole power to declare war and peace, abolished most noble privilege, and gave the King the right to determine the number of Privy Councillors - enabling him to abolish it altogether as he determined the number of them needed to zero.
translation: 这项法案给予国王独有的权力来发动战争或谋求和平，它废除了大多数贵族的特权，并给予了国王决定枢密院成员人数的权利。这表示国王能彻底废除枢密院——如果他一个顾问也不想要的话。

original: The Tatar Yoke was for a long time a harsh hindrance to Russian society but Muscovy still thrived as our state had the right to collect the tribute to the Khan. Even now we enjoy the benefits of the organization we built to perform this function.
translation: 鞑靼枷锁是长期以来严重阻遏俄罗斯社会发展的绊脚石，但是莫斯科始终有为可汗征收贡品的权利而长盛不衰。即使是现在我们也能享受到我们为了完成这一职能而建立的组织带给我们的好处。
德米特里·顿斯科伊的遗产

original: After centuries of suffering the Tatar yoke Dmitry of Don was able to soundly defeat the forces of the Golden Horde. We must cherish his memory and never again accept suffering in silence.
translation: 在经历了数世纪的鞑靼囚锢的痛苦之后，德米特里·顿斯科伊已经可以完全击败金帐汗国的军队了，我们必须要珍视他的记忆，并且再也不接受沉默的痛苦。

original: By redistributing plots of confiscated lands to noble cavalrymen we can build a new class of soldiers to support our principality.
translation: 通过重新分配被没收土地给与那些贵族骑兵，我们可以组建一种新的兵种来帮助我们的公国。

original: In order to withstand the Tatar raids our ancestors have always kept a line of tightly positioned and well defended forts. As our state expands we should keep expanding this 'Abatis Line' to ensure that we can always protect our people against far flung attacks.
translation: 为阻挡鞑靼人的袭击，我们的祖先一直保持着一条位置良好的防线与一些易守难攻的堡垒。当我们的国家扩张时，我们也应当继续扩大这条“鹿砦防线”以保护我们的人民不受暴力的侵袭。

original: We are united with the Byzantine Emperors of old through marriages and alliances. This makes us the descendants of an ancient imperial line of both great influence and ability and will further our political ambitions.
translation: 我们曾经通过古老的联姻和联盟与拜占庭的帝王结合在了一起，这使我们成为了这一兼具巨大影响力与能力的古老帝国的继承者，而且这将让我们的政治野心走的更远。

original: The Russian people need firm religious guidance. We have historically had good cooperation with the church and this is a friendship we could both gain from expanding. If we can get the seat of the Metropolitan Bishop to move to Moscow we will be able to further strengthen the bonds between the Russian Orthodox faith and our state.
translation: 俄罗斯的子民需要坚定的宗教指引。我们素来与东正教会有很好的合作，并且这种友好关系可以与扩张兼得。如果我们可以让都主教的座位移驾到莫斯科，那我们将可以进一步加强俄罗斯的东正教信仰与我们国家之间的联系。

original: The Boyar class is in many ways the foundation of the Russian Imperial enterprise but just as we need to strengthen the Boyars we need to control them. We must both protect seats for the Boyars in the Duma and make sure that they need to rely on us to further their influence.
translation: 波雅尔（贵族）在许多方面是俄罗斯帝国得以建立的基业，但是正如我们需要他们的力量一样，我们同样也需要控制他们。我们必须保住波雅尔阶层在杜马（议会）的席位，并且确保他们需要依赖于我们，这样一来我们就能对其施加更大的影响。

original: After all, all land belongs to the Motherland.
translation: 万言归一，天下之地皆属祖国。

original: In order to feed our ever-growing armies we should expand the terms of military service so that it becomes a lifelong commitment. This will offer social mobility to those that would otherwise lead lives in lesser occupations and it will give us a reliable source of soldiers for our imperial endeavors.
translation: 为了养活永远在扩大的军队，我们应该延长服役年限，使其成为终身制。这样会为那些除了打仗就再无一技之长来谋生的人提供社会流动性，这将会为我们的帝国伟业提供可靠的士兵来源。

original: Superior firepower is what determines the seiges of today as well as the pitched battles of tomorrow. We must build a state of the art artillery yard in the heart of our country, to ensure our armies are never without cannons nor ammunition.
translation: 优秀的火力是决定着今日之围攻与未来之激战胜负的关键所在，我们必须在我们国家的心脏地带建立一座国营火炮厂，以确保我们的军队永远不会缺乏大炮与弹药。

original: In the late 15th century the decision was taken to regularize the ruling code which had originally been common law that had large region variation. By streamlining the code and increasing the number of offenses that we can fine people for we improve administration and income.
translation: 在15世纪晚期,该决定被下达以作规划统治权之用.在不同的地区,统治权的定义也不同.一旦统治权的定义被统一,我们就能对犯罪者进行处罚,以增加收入并提高行政管理等级

original: In order to ensure that we have an army that is capable of defending our realm we should create a standing army of musket armed troops to supplement our levies.
translation: 为了确保我们拥有一支能保卫王国的军队,我们应该建立一支用装备毛瑟枪的常规部队以补充进我们的军队

original: The hereditary nobility is the biggest threat to our control of the state. We need to break their power by reducing the size of their estates and giving this land to people who are loyal to us first.
translation: 对管理国家而言,世袭贵族是最大的一项威胁.我们得通过削减他们的封地来切断他们的权力,并把这些土地分给那些一开始就向我们效忠的人

original: The Mestnichestvo was an ancient system that states that state jobs should be offered to persons based upon how ancient their lineage was. This was problematic because this did not take into account the suitability of the candidate. The abolishment of this system will improve state bureaucracy by allowing appointment by merit.
translation: 论资排辈法是一项古老的制度，它规定公职人员的任用取决于家族的资历。有些候选人并不适合某项工作，这就是制度的问题所在。废除这项制度将使得政府官僚机构任人唯贤，并提高工作效率。

original: The distant wastes of Siberia call to us. We must clear a way there and let our cossacks go forth and bring land for the Russian people.
translation: 西伯利亚荒原正在召唤我们。我们必须开辟一条道路，并让我们的哥萨克骑兵向前推进，为俄国人民拿下那块土地。

original: The abolishment of the Mestnichestvo was the first move to make the state bureaucracy more meritocratic. The table of ranks codified this and made service and promotion in the army conditional on service in lower ranks.
translation: 论资排辈法的废除是让国家政府机构以任人唯贤的方法来工作的第一次尝试。级别排行表把它编成法典，并在军队中推行，以实行按能力划分工作。

original: Broaden the curriculum of the Cadet Corps
We have more cadets than there are officer places in our army, we should use the cadet corps to create not just potential officers, but scientists and engineers as well.
translation: 我们的候补军官数量比军队中军官的数量要多。这些人中不仅仅应该有未来的军官，还应该有未来的科学家和工程师。

original: For long years we have waged war against the Moor. This has given us a sturdy discipline that not many can boast. Arise men of Castile and show the world your determination.
translation: 我们和摩尔人的战争已经持续很长一段时间了。这让我们发展出一个引以为荣的严格纪律。卡斯蒂利亚的战士们，向世界展示你们的决心。

original: Our faith is our sword and shield. It was only the grace of God that granted us our triumphs in the reconquista. We must always show our devotion to the holy mother church.
translation: 信仰是我们的剑和盾，是上帝恩赐了我们收复失地的胜利。我们必须时刻保持我们对神圣教会的虔诚。

original: On the 4th of May 1493 His Holiness granted us a papal bull granting us all lands west and south of a line 100 leagues west of the islands of the Azores. We will naturally enforce His Holiness's will.
translation: 在1493年5月4日，教宗大人亲赐我们亚速尔群岛以西和以南100里格的土地。而我们当然会确切实行教宗大人的圣谕。

original: The wealth of our empire attracts all the pirates and jackals in existence. We will set up a system of convoys to bring the wealth home and protect it.
translation: 我们帝国的财富吸引了许许多多海盗和豺狼。我们将建立一个护送系统来把财富安全护送回国。

original: The power of Spain is as much in her fleet as in her feared tercios. We will ensure our navy wants for nothing so that should we ever need to do so we can send a mighty armada forth.
translation: 西班牙的力量展现在她的海军和令人畏惧的西班牙方阵中。我们将会确保无论我们的海军要求什么，我们都能派出无敌舰队来把它取回来。

original: A golden age is upon Spain, in painting, architecture, music and literature. Spain is the envy of the world. This will leave a legacy that will echo through time. Although I don't like the book about the man fighting the windmills, I just can't see that one being read by future generations.
translation: 西班牙正处于黄金时代。绘画、建筑、音乐、文化，所有的一切让全世界感到嫉妒。西班牙的声名将流芳百世。即便我不喜欢那本说什么一个人和一个风车打架的书，但我确信那本书会一直流传下去。
阿姆斯特丹交换银行的建立

original: The problem with metal coinage was that it was virtually impossible to make coins of equal weight at all mints. This makes moving wealth around, the life blood of trade, difficult. The Wisselbank traded metal money for Amsterdam paper money that had to be used in the city for bills over 600 guilders. This created a medium of exchange that everyone could be confident in the value of, facilitating exchange.
translation: 金属货币的问题在于，你几乎不可能让所有的铸币厂生产的货币质量相同。这样财富的流通作为贸易的生命线，变得非常困难。交换银行将金属货币转换成阿姆斯特丹纸币，而这种纸币曾经完成过超过600荷兰盾的交易。这就建立了一种兑换的媒介，每个人信任这种便利的兑换方式。

original: Seeking your fortune over the sea is as natural to a Dutchman as burning a witch is to a Spaniard. We have no shortage of hardy souls ready to seek their fortune in trade.
translation: 就像西班牙人动不动就烧女巫一样，在海上寻找财富对于荷兰人来说是再自然不过的事情。从贸易中获取利润对我们来讲是一点困难也没有。

original: The low countries are highly susceptible to flooding and in the unsettled weather of the 11th - 14th centuries there were multiple floods leading to the creation of the Zuiderzee and also salting the soil of coastal areas. We now have the technology to reclaim land allowing more productive agriculture.
translation: 低地国家极易受到洪水和其他灾害的影响，如11世纪 - 14世纪那段时间须德海引发的洪水，以及对海岸区域的盐化。现在我们有了填海的技术，可以拥有更多肥沃的耕地。

original: 'This day begins a long list of naval victories, which will make our fatherland for ever illustrious'
translation: 在这天开始的一连串的海军胜利，将使我们的祖国辉煌永存。

original: Indirect taxation is the most effective way to raise taxes in this period. Revenue stamps were stamps attached to legal documents (for example a contract of sale) to verify that the tax had been paid. Such documents would not be legally binding without said stamps.
translation: 间接课税是这段时间内最有效的税收方式。印花税票是跟法律文件（如售卖合同）相关的，它能核证一项税款是否已经支付。

original: Ever since the great philosopher Erasmus, the Low Countries have been the cradle of humanistic philosophy. It is time to embrace this as an integral part of the state.
translation: 自从伟大的哲学家伊拉斯谟以来，低地国家就成为了人文主义哲学的摇篮，现在。人文主义哲学应该成为国家机器的一部分了。

original: Back in the good old days siege works were dug by locals impressed into service, these people were not always keen to do this work. By making digging such trenches the job of the army we get better trenches, quicker.
translation: 在美好的过去，围城工事不过是让希望做工的当地人来挖土罢了，而且这些人并不那么喜欢这项工作。把挖战壕变为军队职能之后，我们就能用更快的速度得到更好的战壕。

original: Standard volley fire involved each rank delivering its volley in one go, with the goal of maximizing the firepower. The Dutch developed a different system of firing by platoon, the goal being that one part of the regiment will always be firing at the enemy. This prevented the enemy from recovering from the volleys.
translation: 标准齐射火力的意思是每一排士兵向正前方进行射击，目的是保持最大火力。荷兰人发明了一种新方法，他们把单位编成团开火，目的是保持对敌军的持续火力，这让敌人无法从射击的间歇中得到休整。

original: After the black death we were forced to take desperate measures to keep the Danish nobility, and by extension Denmark, in good shape. These laws, that prevent peasants from moving estates, have the handy consequence of making it easier to find recruits for our army.
translation: 黑死病之后，我们不顾一切地试图保持丹麦人的贵族血统，进而保全国家。这些法规阻止了农民迁徙土地，也让征兵工作变得更容易。

original: Since even before the days of such heroes as Ivar the Boneless and Sven Forkbeard, Danes have always taken to the sea. This natural affinity is a strength that can be harnessed.
translation: 在无骨者伊瓦尔和八字胡斯文这些英雄出现之前，丹麦人总是生活在海上。丹麦人和海之间天然的亲近性是一种可利用的优势。

original: The Rentekammer, or Treasury, was a specialist department of state set up to maintain records of government transactions. It also took on the task of seeking to estimate future government revenues and expenditure. This allowed better control of the government revenue.
translation: 国库是国家的一个特殊部门，它用来记录政府的各项交易事务以及评估政府的收支预算。这让政府更便于管理收益。

original: Originally just the cloth chamber in Copenhagen castle, it became the part of the administrative machine responsible for the payment of salaries, in particular for the fleet.
translation: 它原本只是哥本哈根城堡的储布室，后来成为了行政机构负责薪资的单位，主要负责的是海军。

original: Shipbuilding had long been going on in the area for time immemorial, but these efforts were seasonal and ad hoc, based on the demand for ships and local timber sources. Now we are going to set aside specific land for a specialist naval dockyard and administration.
translation: 在这里，造船业的历史源远流长，但这些工作都是季节性的、临时的，它们由对船只的需求量以及当地木材资源的多寡而决定。现在，我们准备划出一块专门的土地用来建立海军码头和行政管理。

original: It has taken several decades to do but we have managed to compile a formal law code. Our biggest problem was that previously we had various local and national laws which not only overlapped but could be quite contradictory. Now we have a unified system of justice.
translation: 我们编撰了一部正式的法典，虽然用了几十年的时间。我们最大的问题在于，我们以前有很多地区法案，它们之间不仅有重复，而且还有相互矛盾的地方。现在，我们有了一个统一的法律体系。

original: The foolish people who claim to the mantle of enlightenment fail to realize that true enlightenment can only come from the Bible. We will keep them from power and ensure that Denmark remains free.
translation: 那些声称受到天启的傻瓜们并未意识到，真正的天启只可能来自圣经。我们会尽力保持住它的地位，并确保丹麦的自由。

original: The estates general can claim to have existed since 1303, but gradually over time they have switched from being a council summoned by the King to being elected. This has given the estates general, and taxes levied by them, greater legitimacy.
translation: 自从1303年，三级会议便一直存在。但这个议会随着时间慢慢从由国王召集变为由选举产生。这让多级议会和他们收缴的税费更带有合法性。

original: Cultivating the doctrine of attack is the centerpiece of army. Our men show such élan than we have clear edge on the battlefield.
translation: 教导进攻主义是军队的重心。我们的战士展示出如此狂热的士气，我们便在战场上占据了优势地位。

original: For a long time Latin has been the lingua franca of Europe, but to be honest it is a dead language. We need to find a new lingua franca, and nothing says lingua franca like French.
translation: 拉丁语作为欧洲的通用语已经很长一段时间了。但实际上拉丁语已经一个死语言了。我们需要一个新的通用语，没有比法语更合适的了。

original: Most nations see natives as poor unfortunates who are failing to use God's creation properly and should be moved away. We see them as poor unfortunates who are failing to use God's creation properly but may someday dream of being French. This distinction is important.
translation: 大多数民族都将原住民视为上帝不幸的失败创造物，应该被消灭。我们把他们视为上帝不幸的失败创造物，但有朝一日也许会梦想成为法国人。这个区别非常大。

original: This does not represent a radical departure in the design of fortification, the genius is in the placement of the fortresses. By taking maximum advantage of local terrain features the same fort can be much harder to take.
translation: 这并不是背离传统要塞设计的模式，这项设计的真正奥妙在于堡垒的布局。只要善用地形的优势，同样的一座堡垒会比没有使用地形优势的堡垒更难被攻下。

original: These enlightened times we boast some of the greatest philosophers of our age. These thinkers are producing a constant stream of new ideas and thought. These ideas are stimulating advances in all fields, from the most mundane to the most important.
translation: 在这启蒙时代，我们吹捧着最伟大的几个哲学家。这些思想家们源源不断地产生着新观念和新思想，刺激了从最平凡到最重要的各领域的发展。

original: With all men being equal under the law of your new state, people of other religions are allowed full participation in the state machinery, giving these provinces a boost.
translation: 新国家的法律规定人人平等，信仰其他宗教的人也可以在国家机关中工作以发展相应的省份。

original: Our sultans emphasize their role as gazis, leaders in war against the non-believers. Warriors thus flock to our banner, seeking to win wealth, glory, and salvation in the fight to expand the Abode of Islam
translation: 我们伟大的苏丹如此看重加齐，他们是领导着对异教徒圣战的信徒。战士们由此纷纷响应，在伊斯兰扩张的征途中谋求获得财富，荣耀和救赎。

original: The Ottoman Empire developed a system of feudal land holding to build up and maintain a cavalry force. Each Timariot was responsible for supplying cavalry for the imperial army based upon the amount of land he held.
translation: 奥斯曼帝国发明了一种封建采邑制度来建立并维护骑兵军队，每一个提玛尔都依据他所拥有的土地来对皇家骑兵的补给负责。

original: Balancing local needs versus national interests is the hardest part of government. Especially with the pace of communications, it can take a long time for the most basic directives to reach even relatively close provinces. We must encourage the local governors towards more autonomy to ensure that local interests are served.
translation: 平衡本地需求与国家利益是政府工作中最困难的一环。尤其是在如此的交通环境下，即便是在临近的地区进行最基本的政令传达都要消耗很长时间。我们必须给予当地行政官更多的自治权，确保当地利益被满足。

original: By establishing unique codes of law in each of our empire's provinces we can ensure that our rule will be viewed as equitable and just. These law books, known as Kanunname, will take into consideration the local circumstances and traditions of each of our diverse and far-flung provinces.
translation: 通过颁布特定法律，在我们的帝国中，各宗教的信徒都能被公正合理地管辖。进一步健全这个体系，能确保各地多样化的文化传统能高效融入这些帝国机构。

original: The far reaching legal reforms of Suleiman the Magnificent lead him to be remembered as Suleiman the Lawgiver in Turkish history. In his legal code he covered all aspects of law including taxation, education and society.
translation: 在土耳其历史上，苏莱曼大帝由于他的法律改革而被称为立法者苏莱曼。他的法典囊括了法律中的各个方面，包括税收、教育和社会。

original: Suleiman is remembered as one of the great rulers of history – a soldier, a lawmaker and a reformer. In fact, while the West knows him as Suleiman the Magnificent, in his homeland he is called "The Lawgiver". Central to his reforms was the re-examination of Ottoman dynastic law, 'Kanun', in order to bring it in line with the Islamic Sharia.
translation: 苏莱曼是历史上最伟大的统治者之一——他是战士、立法者和改革家，事实上，西方世界称他为伟大的苏莱曼，而在他的家乡土耳其，人们叫他立法者苏莱曼。他改革的核心就是重新编纂了奥斯曼王朝法典，使其符合伊斯兰教法。

original: Symbolized by the Tulip, the period (1718-1730) represented a period of reform that saw the first Turkish language printing press and a series of reforms to boost industry and commerce.
translation: 1718-1730年是一段革新时代。它的象征是对郁金香的狂热，其间诞生了最早的土耳其文出版物以及一系列工业和商业方面的改革。

original: Found the Imperial School of Naval Engineering
translation: 建立帝国海军工程学校

original: Founded in 1773 its goal was to provide the Ottoman Empire a more advanced fleet to defend the coast.
translation: 帝国海军工程学校建立于1773年。它旨在为奥斯曼帝国提供更先进的舰队来防御海岸线。

original: Dating from the 12th century the Arsenal of Venice is the foundation that our power rests upon. To ensure we remain powerful we must expand the arsenal so that more ships can be produced.
translation: 从12世纪起，威尼斯兵工厂便是我们的权力基地。为了保证我们的权力，我们必须扩建兵工厂以确保我们能生产更多的船只。

original: Since the invention of the printing press the people of Venice have shown an aptitude towards its use. We should encourage this industry as the benefits to Venice are manifest.
translation: 自从印刷术发明之后，威尼斯人便开始大量使用它。正因为它带给威尼斯如此多的好处，我们应该鼓励这项产业。

original: Trade is the life blood of Venice and the management of our overseas trade stations is vital to our trading interests. By centralizing the administration of these lands into a single unit we will enhance our trade.
translation: 贸易是威尼斯的生命线，而管理我们的国外交易站对于我们的贸易利润来说是非常重要的。只要把这些领土的行政中心集中成一个单位，我们就能加强我们的贸易。

original: The State Inquisition is a panel of three judges set up to deal with threats to internal security. The panel's small size means they can deal quickly with threats and it won't take them long to establish a network of agents both at home and abroad to root out the traitors.
translation: 国家裁判所是由三个法官来处理危机并保证国内安宁的机构。陪审员能快速应对各种危机，而且他们能迅速建立起一个全世界的间谍网络来搜寻那些卖国贼。

original: For as long as Venice has stood our galley oarsmen have been free men who worked for a wage, but an acute manpower shortage is making it harder to find qualified men to do the work. We have but no choice but to resort to conscription for our Galleys.
translation: 只要威尼斯还在，我们的船员都是拿工资的自由工作者，人手的紧缺将会让我们难以找到合格的工作人员。我们没有其他的选择，只能通过征召来填补船上的空缺。

original: It has come to our attention that some members of the Clergy have been guilty of petty crimes. We are going to defy the Church authorities and ensure that all citizens are equal before the law.
translation: 我们注意到一些神职人员犯过小罪。我们准备开始公然对抗教会的权威，以确保法律面前人人平等。

original: Found the provveditori ai beni inculti
translation: 建立陆地开荒管理部门

original: The department for uncultivated natural resources was set up to assist in the draining of marshland the irrigation of dry lands. The goal is improve the food supply to Venice.
translation: 该部门旨在管理未开垦的自然资源，帮助沼泽地带排水以及灌溉旱地，以改善威尼斯的食物供给。

original: In order to regularize control of the Mark of Brandenburg the early Hohenzollerns would replace local common law with Roman law. They would further regulate justice by moving the Supreme Court from the court of the Elector (who was prone to moving around) to fixed and central location. This simultaneously improved justice and curbed the power of local magnates.
translation: 为了使对勃兰登堡侯爵领的控制合法化，早期霍亨索伦王室成员用罗马法替换了习惯法。之后，他们把最高法院从选帝侯宫廷（常常迁移）移动到稳固的集中的位置。这同时改善了司法体制，并抑制了当地大贵族的权力。

original: United the three estates form an effective block on royal power. We need to systematically play the nobility off against the other estates to consolidate our control.
translation: 联合的三个阶级有效地对皇家权力构成了限制。我们要有组织地对抗其他阶级来巩固我们的控制力。

original: Going back all the way back to the Persian invasion of Greece, a smaller disciplined army could defeat a larger one if it was better disciplined and trained. We must raise our army up to the same standards if we want to prosper.
translation: 遥想波斯进攻希腊时，一小支纪律严明的精良部队能击败一大批杂乱军队。我们应该把我们的军队也提升到这种层次来使我国繁荣昌盛。

original: Although the nobility resists this, we seek to turn the army into the career of choice of second sons of nobility. We start training them from a young age, which means we not only bind the nobility to us but we also create a corps of trained noble born officers for the future.
translation: 我们应该把我们的军队的征兵对象放到贵族的次子身上，即使贵族阶级反对。我们从小就训练他们，这样我们不仅能让贵族和我们站在了一边，还能建立一支训练有素的贵族军队，而其中许多人最后都能成为军官。

original: Although looking rather odd, the goose step was specifically developed to ensure that our men help hold their line as they advanced towards the enemy. This gives our armies a real advantage on the battlefield.
translation: 即使看起来很奇怪，鹅步是专门用于确保我们的军队在向敌人推进时保持队形的。这让我们的军队在战场上占尽优势。

original: Peasants are naturally not keen on a lifetime of service in the Army, so they tend to run away when recruiters come along. Now we give each regiment a recruiting district to draw manpower from. Each youth is expected to train for 3 months of the year so he is ready for service. This should ensure a steadier supply of manpower for armies.
translation: 农民一般不愿在军队中度过余生，因此当新兵被招募时，往往会试图逃跑。现在，我们为每个团招募士兵划定来源地。每个新兵应该都有三个月的训练期间，这样才能真正加入战斗。这应该能确保军队后备得到持续补充。

original: Stability at home is the key thing if we wish to expand by encouraging tolerance of different religions not only do we improve stability at home our realm will become a haven for those who flee persecution elsewhere.
translation: 稳定是扩张的前提。如果我们鼓励容忍不同宗教，不仅能让我们国家安定，也能让我们国家成为受迫害的其他国民的避难所。

original: The growth in aristocratic privilege is a threat to the authority of the crown. We are going to prevent that growth by making the administration of justice being done via crown appointees rather than the nobility. This will ensure that the crown's interests are put first
translation: 贵族特权的发展对王权来说是个威胁.我们要通过王权来任命司法长官,而不是通过贵族,这样就可以遏制贵族权力的发展.这可以保证王室的利益不受侵害

original: Henry the Navigator was the third son of John I of Portugal. Knowing he would never be King he spent his life promoting exploration and sea craft. This legacy is still with us today
translation: 航海家亨利是葡萄牙约翰一世的第三个儿子.他知道自己不可能成为一个国王,因此他花了毕生时间来探索大洋.他的精神至今与我们同在

original: Let us send forth our feitors to all corners of the eastern continents and establish our country as the dominant trading force in the Indian Ocean. By creating a network of strong fortified trading posts along the coasts of Africa and India we can dominate the local trade without spending great resources.
translation: 让我们在东部大陆的每个角落建立贸易据点,为我们的国家在印度洋贸易中称霸. 通过在非洲和印度沿岸建立贸易据点的网络,我们可以保障当地贸易的霸权而不用投入过多资源.

original: Some members of expeditions into the interior for slave raiding would stumble across finds of gold and other precious metals and stones. These rumors would encourage hardy souls to journey to our colonies.
translation: 深入内陆寻找奴隶的远征队中的某些成员会在财富和珠宝金币面前踌躇不前.这些传闻鼓励了那些坚强的灵魂远征到我们的殖民地去

original: For too long Royal Power has been limited by the foolish interventions by the nobility, whose narrow local interests are threatening the greater good of the realm. We will dissolve the Cortes and rule without their interference.
translation: 王室权力已经被愚蠢的贵族调停限制很久了.那些贵族狭隘的本地利益正在威胁这王国更大的利益.我们应该分解议会,并不受他们干扰地进行统治

original: The Society of Jesus, amongst others, have been seeking to prevent the expansion of our colonial holdings by claiming that it interferes with their missionary work. Darker rumors have also reached us that they have been inciting natives and may even be seeking to carve out their own colonial empire. This is going to stop, the holy orders will no longer be an obstacle to our expansion.
translation: 耶稣会一直试图阻止我们扩张殖民地,他们宣称我们妨碍了他们的传教工作.我们也听到了不好的传闻说,他们正在煽动原住民,试图分割他们自己的殖民帝国.这必须被制止,圣谕将不再成为我们扩张的绊脚石

original: The Cleanliness of blood laws (Limpleza de sangre) reserved the best jobs for those who could prove that they had no non-Christian ancestors. The problem is that some of the most ambitious and capable of our country are denied opportunities, which is holding our country back. We must set them free.
translation: 血液清洗活动为那些能证明他们没有非基督徒祖先的人提供了很好的清扫机会.问题在于,我们国家一些最有野心、能力最强的人被清扫了,而他们正掌握着我们国家的命脉.我们必须让他们获得自由

original: The Folwark system was a system of production that encouraged the production of agricultural surpluses. Peasants were encouraged to work in them through either the use of rents of compulsion. It would form the bedrock of the Polish economy.
translation: 大农场系统是一种能增加农业产出的系统.农民被鼓励在田中劳作,并被付给劳作薪资.这项系统能成为波兰经济的奠基石

original: Was the principal that no law could be enacted without the full support of the nobility. Although it would act as a break on royal power it would also ensure that the commonwealth enjoyed the support of the nobility.
translation: 如果没有贵族支持,法律不可能被制定下来.即便法律干扰着皇室的权力,但它也保证了贵族对整个联邦的支持

original: The Chosen Infantry (Piechota Wybraniecka) were regular infantry drafts from the Royal Peasants. The system was developed to allow the Kingdom to have a standing army of infantry.
translation: 非正规军是从农民中招募的常规步兵部队.它让王国能保持一支随时可用的步兵军队

original: The hussars were originally light cavalry troops used for scouting, but with the decline of the old feudal army we have switched over to professional regiments. The new heavier hussars will form the core of it. People will soon fear Poland's winged Hussars.
translation: 轻骑兵是一种用作侦察的轻型骑兵部队，但随着封建军队的衰落，人们把他们重编成正规军团。带有更好护甲的新型轻骑兵成为骑兵的主力，敌人很快就会败在波兰翼骑兵的铁蹄下。

original: The Compute Army (Wojsko Komputowe), was based around an annual budget calculated (computed) and approved by the Sejm. The idea was to give the Commonwealth a stable standing army for the defense.
translation: 半正规军的组建基于年度预算收支。他们经过国会认可，是联邦的主要防御军队。

original: The Foreign Section (Cudzodziemski Autorament) were units trained in the German manner and initially had German officers. They provided the spine of the new Polish army, improving the performance.
translation: 涉外军团是以德国方式训练的，一开始主要由德国军官指挥。他们为波兰的军队提供了顶梁柱，改善了军队的能力。

original: There is nothing quite like seeing your comrades die in terrible agony to make you wonder if staying on the battlefield is really such a good idea. Using field fortifications can give the illusion of protection and give our troops more heart.
translation: 见到战友痛苦地在面前倒下会令你对战场心生厌恶。使用野战防御工事能让你有一种被保护起来的心里感觉，并让部队更有勇气。

original: The fall of the House of Hohenstauffen in 1250 lead to chaos in the Empire and the Golden Bull of 1356 legalized anarchy by calling a constitution. However in 1438 the Imperial title was regained by the most noble house of Habsburg from its power base in Austria. Austria must hold onto this title and seek to reform the Empire to make it Holy, Roman and an Empire once more.
translation: 1250年霍亨斯陶芬王朝的衰亡导致了帝国内的混乱。1356年的金玺诏书通过颁布宪法规定了无政府状态属于合法。然而，在1438年，大多数哈布斯堡的贵族通过他们在奥地利的权力而重新获得了皇帝头衔。奥地利成为重振神圣罗马帝国的基地。

original: The defense of our frontiers is a serious issue, not so much how to do it but how to pay for it. The solution we have hit upon it to make generous land grants on the frontier to build up a professional military class. Not only will this ensure our frontier is adequately defended at a reasonable price but these men will be available for other tasks.
translation: 我们前线的防御是个重大议题。问题不在于怎么做，而在于怎么付钱。我们的解决方案是，在前线建立一支正规军。这不仅仅能解决我们的前线防御问题，而且我们能以合理的价格让这支军队去做他们该做的事。

original: The Fuggers are a merchant family from Swabia, who originally made money from weaving and shrewdly invested the profits into land. Building up their power they are now one of the wealthiest houses in the Empire. We must gain exclusive access to their services as bankers.
translation: 弗格尔世家是来自施瓦本的商贾家族。他们从纺织业和精明的地产投资中致富，现在是帝国中最有钱有权的一个家族。他们在银行事务中应该得到特权。

original: Bella gerant alii, tu felix Austria, nube!
translation: 让别人打仗吧，你，幸运的奥地利，结婚去吧！

original: Our confessor William Lamormaini has recommend a small piece of book keeping that will tidy up the religious affairs of our realm. There is no harm in it so we might as well pass this small edict.
translation: 忏悔者威廉·拉莫迈尼推介了一本能规划我们王国宗教事宜的小册子.这没什么危害,这条小布告可以被通过

original: There is nothing in theory stopping us from having more diplomatic relations, however, maintaining them requires time and effort. By streamlining our court we can ensure that we get the information we need to smooth ruffled feathers when they occur.
translation: 理论上没什么东西能组织我们变得更民主.然而,保持民主性却需要时间和精力.我们可以通过使王庭合法来得到如何梳理杂务的信息

original: Essentially the ministry for war. It is the full time bureaucracy administering our army. One of its most important jobs is to know where our armies are. That way armies can receive the things they need, in particular men.
translation: 原本是战争部门.它完全掌管着我们的军队.它最重要的一个职责是,了解我们的部队在哪里.确保部队中每一个人都能得到他想要的东西

original: The original Great Wall was built from stone and earth, however, it has proved inadequate to stopping the barbarians to the north. We feel we must massively upgrade the wall, using bricks, to keep the barbarians out of the Middle Kingdom.
translation: 原本,长城是用石头建立起来的,然而,事实证明,它并不能抵挡北方野蛮人的入侵.我们认为我们应该对长城进行大升级,使用砖头来把野蛮人挡在我们天朝的长城之外

original: The Revival of the Training camps

Originally founded by the Emperor Yongle, they stagnated in the 1430s but it is time to revive them again. The specialist training our troops receive is vital if we are to resist the barbarians we find on all sides.
translation: 集训营原先是由永乐皇帝建立的.在1430年左右,它们衰亡下去了,但现在,应该复兴它们.

original: The outside world offers nothing to the Middle Kingdom, let us stay at home to ensure none of their dangerous ideas enter our body politic. We must limit our contacts and keep the Middle Kingdom stable.
translation: 外面的世界对天朝一点好处也没有，让我们呆在家里，确保不会让他们危险的想法影响到我们的国家。我们必须限制我们与他们的接触，这样才能稳保天朝江山永固。

original: The Yellow River is the life blood of the Middle Kingdom, it provides some of the Empire's richest Agricultural land. However the river is also prone to flooding. We must ensure that the dykes that protect the farmland are in top condition.
translation: 黄河是中国的母亲河，孕育了帝国最肥沃的部分农地。然而，黄河也经常发洪水。确保大堤能保护农地是我们的首要任务。

original: The Salt monopoly used to be one of the greatest revenues for the state. Yet previous Emperors saw fit to end it in the name of trade. It is time to return the trade of salt back to control of the state.
translation: 食盐垄断曾经是国家最大的收入来源。然而，前几任帝王以贸易之名废止了它。现在，是时候把食盐的贸易权重新收归国有了。

original: Currently we expect peasants to provide work for the state, which is detrimental to our economy. If we abolish it and replace it with a head tax, we will encourage more people to take part in the cash economy.
translation: 当前,我们希望农民能为国家工作,这对经济不利.如果我们废除它,并用人头税来替换之,这将会鼓励更多的人投入到现金经济中去

original: If we create a professional standing army we can defend the country. The creation of a new professional army will allow us to defend the country, and more importantly create a system that regularize recruitment.
translation: 如果我们建造一支正规军,我们就能防御国家.建造一支正规军能让我们进行防御,更重要的是,我们还创建了一种正规的征兵体系

original: The German way is that every son receives a share of their father's inheritance and every son may style himself as duke. Although this seems a fair and equitable system, the problem is that the sons can never seem to agree on what constitutes fair and equitable, leading to conflict. From now on the eldest son will receive the full inheritance.
translation: 按照德国人的方式,每个儿子都能继承他们父亲的一部分遗产,而且每个儿子都能称呼自己为公爵.尽管这看起来是一个公平的体系,但问题在于,每个儿子之间互相都认为这不公平,而这往往会引起争端.现在,只有长子才会继承父亲的全部遗产

original: Bring in the Bavarian Purity Law
There is a conspiracy to sap and impurify all of our precious bodily fluids, this must be stopped. From now on beer in Bavaria will be pure and this will keep the people safe.
translation: 有一个玷污我们珍贵生命之泉的阴谋,我们必须要制止.现在,巴伐利亚的啤酒将变得纯净而安全
建立巴伐利亚国家管弦乐队

original: To show the world how great Bavaria is we will found and support one of the finest orchestras in Europe. Every visitor to our court will marvel at the virtuoso performances and bring word far and wide of our status.
translation: 为了展示给世人巴伐利亚的高度精神面貌,我们资建了欧洲其中一个最好的管弦乐队.每个宫廷的访问者都沉浸在这完美的艺术中,我们将声名远扬

original: The Geistlicher Rat is a separate council of state, separate from the privy council, dealing solely with ecclesiastical affairs. The goal of this council is to ensure the discipline of the clergy and to promote the one true faith throughout the Duchy.
translation: 宗教议会是一个与私人议会相互独立的议会.它只处理教会事务.这个议会的目的在于训练神职人员,并且在整个公国中寻找真正的上帝的使者

original: In order to improve the finances of Bavaria we are going to set up a monopoly on the sale of strong beer. The beer must first be sold to factors of the Duke. Coupled with monopolies on grain and salt, the sales of beer will bring in strong revenues.
translation: 为了增加巴伐利亚的财政收入，我们准备对烈啤酒实行垄断经营。啤酒必须首先卖给公爵的管家。与谷物和食盐的垄断合在一起，啤酒销售的垄断将带来极大的收益。

original: Prior to this the Army of Bavaria has been a combination of feudal levies and mercenary regiments. This will simply not do, first rank countries in our age have professional armies and Bavaria will too.
translation: 从前，巴伐利亚的军队是封建征兵和雇佣兵军团的合体。这样不太好，我们这个时代的强国都有正规军，巴伐利亚也应该有。

original: Found the Royal Order of Saint George for the Defense of the Immaculate Conception
translation: 设立保卫圣母无原罪始胎的圣乔治王室勋章

original: The Order of the Garter, the Order of the Golden Fleece, every great state seems to have an order of chivalry associated with it. So too will Bavaria. Not only will it show the world the importance of Bavaria but it will also provide us with a tool of patronages.
translation: 嘉德勋章、金羊毛勋章，似乎每个大国都有一个荣誉的骑士勋章，巴伐利亚也要有。这不仅能向世界展示巴伐利亚的地位，也能给我们提供一种赞助方式。

original: The Qizilbash, or Red Heads, are a Shiite military movement ready to fight and die for their religious convictions. They are ready to support our state and could form the nucleolus of our army.
translation: 奇兹尔巴什或红头军，是一个什叶派的军事组织，能够随时为宗教信仰而战斗和牺牲。他们总是能支持我们的国家，并可以形成我们军队的核心。

original: Persia has long been famous for its rug and carpet manufacture. However, when the Mongols swept through our lands there was great destruction. For Persia to recover we must recover our economic strength as well. It is time to encourage the recovery of our ancient strengths.
translation: 波斯自古以来就以地毯织造而闻名于世。然而，当蒙古人扫荡了我们的领土后，处处只剩下废墟。为了恢复波斯的荣光，我们必须善用经济支柱产业。是时候恢复我们古代的优势产业了。
