translation: 在这丛林世界生存,我们需要的是战士.尤其是战斗过的战士.培训那些人,我们择日再战

original: There is one thing we cannot escape - the need for money. A reform of our tax system will ensure that we have the money we need.
translation: 有一件事我们无法逃避,我们需要钱.我们需要对税收制度进行改革,将确保我们有足够的钱.

original: Mercenaries are rather mercenary when it comes to payment. If we ensure that our contracts are properly administered and payment is prompt we will be able to negotiate better terms.
translation: 雇佣军唯利是图,只管收钱.如果我们能我们的合同得到妥善安排,我们将能够以更好的条件进行谈判.

original: We are extending our contract experience with mercenaries to a more general setting where all contracts would be given legal underpinning. Knowing that your business partner would be forced to keep their word allowed trade to grow and thrive.
translation: 我们对合同加了一层又一层的限制,所有的合同都会依法行事.这样,您的业务合作伙伴将被迫履行诺言.这样会让贸易增长和繁荣.

original: People are not the problem, it is finding them and putting them in uniform. A system of regular levies from our ever willing peasants will ensure that we will have more manpower, even if it is never enough.
translation: 制服农民是一个简单的事情.我们可以用任何手段让农民统一定期缴纳款项,我们还会拥有更多的人手,哪怕这永远不够用

original: Traditionally land has been the only mark of status, as it was through land that wealth and power came. With the recovery of trade, a new road to wealth has appeared. If we ensure that the new mercantile class receive recognition for their success at home, we will encourage them to compete more aggressively abroad.
translation: 传统的土地一直是地位的唯一标志,因为通过土地才能获得财富和权利.随着贸易的复苏,一个新的财富之路已经显现.如果我们已经确认商人在本土获胜,我们会鼓励他们到国外加入竞争.

original: If we ensure that land tenure rights are recognized and strengthened we will give the current holder the incentives to improve his land and increase production.
translation: 为了让人们更多的使用土地,我们会给当前持有人奖励,以提升土地的产量

original: Ozans sing and play the saz, they continue the traditions of Yunus Emre, Kaygusuz Abdal and Pir Sultan. Thanks to these traveling bards many interesting stories and epics have thrived throughout the years. We should support them as they are a part of our culture.
translation: 这些流浪诗人为我们带来了许多尤努斯埃姆雷,阿卜杜勒和皮尔苏丹的故事,感谢这些年来传布这些史诗以及故事的流浪诗人们.我们应该资助他们,因为他们已经是我们文化的一部分了.

original: Many independent Turkmen beyliks existed already under the Sultanate of Seljuq as well, especially in border areas, in order to ensure safety against the Byzantine empire.
translation: 许多独立的土库曼部落已经被并入到塞尔柱苏丹的保护之下,特别是在边境地区我们应该为了保证他们的安全而警告拜占庭帝国.

original: Our light cavalry would often go raiding the neighboring infidel lands and would sometimes even settle them. Historically, they were one of the first divisions to face the opposing military, would attack trading routes to cut enemy's supply and transportation. Known for their courage in battle, unpaid they lived and operated as raiders on the frontiers.
translation: 从历史上看他们的作用经常被用来攻击敌人的贸易路线以及补给和运输.而这些轻骑兵则经常袭击邻近的异教徒土地,有时甚至会实行屠杀.必要时他们也都会投入到最前沿的战斗英勇作战.

original: Our caravanserais are supporting the flow of commerce, information, and people from China to Europe across our lands. By building more of them along our part of the Silk Road will ensure that we gain more of it.
translation: 通过建立更多的驿站可以让我们沿着丝绸之路的商队获得更多的利益,而且我们的商队驿站不仅支持贸易运输也可以用来作为军情的传输.
安那托利亚贝立克建筑

original: Our architecture flourishes as numerous libraries, caravanserais, hammams, madrassas and other buildings are being built in increasingly different styles resulting in innovative and original works.
translation: 我们正在建造众多的图书馆,商队旅店,浴池,宗教学校和其他建筑物.这些建筑物充满各种不同的风格.从在创新上能够得到发展.

original: Legacy of the Great Seljuq Empire

From their homelands near the Aral Sea, the Seljuq Turks advanced in the 10th century first into Khorasan and then into mainland Persia before eventually conquering Anatolia. They established an empire later called the Great Seljuk empire and had profound effects on the Near East. We have grown strong enough to proclaim our state as the successor to this great empire of our forefathers. Rejoice!
translation: 塞尔柱突厥人在十世纪从他们位于咸海附近的家乡迁徒至呼罗珊，然后进入波斯本土，最终征服了安纳托利亚。他们在这片土地上建立了一个强盛的大塞尔柱帝国，并对近东地区产生了深远的影响。而我们现在已经强大到足以宣布成为这个伟大帝国的继承者了，我们的祖先会为我们感到骄傲的。欢呼！

original: Maratha cavalrymen have a long tradition of service as 'Bargirs' for the Deccan sultanates. The increased militarization of the Deccan due to the many wars fought in the area has made our cavalry one of the most dangerous forces in India.
translation: 被称为「巴格尔」的马拉塔骑兵长久以来一直为德干苏丹国服务。德干人在印度越来越多的军事行动，使得我们的骑兵成为了这一地区最危险的军队之一。
马哈拉施特拉邦的要塞

original: In these hilly and densely forested lands keeping many and well maintaned forts is a necessity for offense as well as defense. Keeping our many forts well maintained should be a top priority.
translation: 在茂密的森林和丘陵地带兴建城堡是必要的,无论是进攻还是防守这些要塞都能够给予我们帮助.

original: The villages of the Desh are full with able men who would be more than willing to serve in our armies. Let us train and recruit all Marathi speakers to serve in our armies.
translation: 德什的农村地区有非常多愿意为我们军队效力的人才。让我们招募所有会说马拉地语的农民加入我们的军队。

original: Let us create an office entirely devoted to the running of our state and its armies. With a skillfull minister in charge, the Peshwa, our country will be versatile enough to expand quickly and efficiently.
translation: 让我们创建一个完全致力于国家及军队运转的政府机关。在一个经验丰富的大臣——佩什瓦的管理之下，我们的国家将足够全能以至于更快速并高效的扩张。

original: Strengthen ties with Brahmin Financial Families

The financial sector of our state is dominated by Brahmin banking families. Let us integrate them further in our state by hiring them as tax collectors, creating regulations to strengthen their rights and protect their traditions. We will have gained the favor of our financiers as well as access to able and learned administrators.
translation: 国家的金融业主要由婆罗门银行家所掌握。我们应该制定一个有效的税收和法规政策，用以保护他们的权利和传统，这样可以让我们和他们通过更融洽的关系来培养我们自己的金融管理人员。

original: A growing state needs a bureaucracy capable of quickly assessing new lands. We must expand and differentiate our bureaucracy, reexamining any demands on revenue and quickly assess the demands and worth of new lands.
translation: 越来越多的国家因为他们的土地需求而导致政府行政效率的减少.我们应该扩大和改革我们的官僚政府从而能够满足我们人民的需求,保证国家能够持续富强.

original: Westerners and Muslims cannot be allowed to dominate the Indian Ocean. We must endevour to expand our navy and create viable naval bases along our western coast.
translation: 我们不能让西方人和穆斯林的舰队称霸印度洋,必须扩大我们的海军用以同他们来对抗保护我们的国家.

original: The Pagan dynasty was the first kingdom established by the Burmese. If we can unify their land along with Ayeyarwady river, other countries will recognize that we are the successor of the old kingdom of Pagan.
translation: 蒲甘王朝是缅甸的第一个王国。如果我们能够统一伊洛瓦底河的领土,我们就能迫使其他的国家承认我们是蒲甘王朝的继承者。

original: The relationship between the lord and his vassals in Southeast Asia is defined as 'mandala', the circle. While the lord controlled the country from the center, the vassals would have greater independence. If the personal relation between us and our vassals are beneficial, then our tributaries will pay tribute to us and would also help us with providing men in time of war.
translation: 东南亚的领主和封臣的关系就像曼荼罗一样。领主在中心统治国家，封臣有更大的独立性。如果我们和封臣们私下关系不错，他们就会给我们贡品，并且在战时给我们提供人力。

original: Nats are Burmese spirits revered often in conjunction with Buddhist practice. The 37 Great Nats and other small spirits are worshiped, especially in rural areas. This popular religious custom unites our diverse subjects together.
translation: 自然崇拜往往是缅甸人在与佛教修行一道崇敬的精神.这些精神崇拜往往在广大农村地区存在,并与其他流行的宗教习俗成为我们多元化的文明.

original: The Europeans have begun to appear in our realm. If we settle and grant them land, those 'Bayingyi' would be willing serve us as soldiers of our army.
translation: 欧洲人已经开始出现在我们的国家里了,如果我们对他们友善并给予他们土地的话,他们会很乐意为我们的军队服务.

original: The Chakravartin is an ideal universal ruler in both Hinduism and Buddhism, one who rules ethically and benevolently over the entire world. It is a symbol of not only spiritual kingship and leadership, but also temporal as well.
translation: 转轮圣王是印度教以及佛教的轮宝之王，王拥有七宝（轮、象、马、珠、女、居士、主兵臣)，具足四德（长寿、无疾病、容貌出色、宝藏丰富），统一须弥四洲，以正法御世，其国土丰饶，人民和乐。

original: If we compile our existing laws and customs into a new law book written in simple Burmese language, this Manu Kye Dhammathat, the Manu Kye Law Book, will gain enormous popularity among our subjects.
translation: 假使我们用缅甸语编译一部根据古印度法理学为基础的法典,我们将名声大噪,于是《摩奴法典疏解大全》（全书共分18章,几乎把历来的大小法典著作全都包含在其中）作为一部对古代印度《摩奴法典》的疏解性著作而问世.

original: The 'Hluttaw', the royal release, is the central council of ministers in our court. Its fiscal, executive, and judicial branches are the administrative organs of our nation.
translation: 皇家会议是由国家的律法,财政,行政以及司法人员所组成的最高顾问会议,也是国家的行政部门.

original: The influence of our clan extends far beyond our own borders. We are able to draw upon the Rajputs of our clan from all over northern India when filling the ranks of our armies.
translation: 拉杰普特的各大家族的影响已经远远超出了国家的边界，我们应该将他们的力量并入我们的军队从而让其更为强大。

original: The lands of Rajputana can be harsh and unforgiving. The only way to achieve lasting control of many of these areas is through control of the impressive fortresses that exist in the region. The repair, maintenance and construction of these forts should be our priority.
translation: 拉杰普塔纳的土地是严厉和无情的,我们就必须在这里的土地上建造庞大的堡垒来加强统治,并且应该将这种维持投入作为最优先的.

original: Like their masters the Rajput cavalry horses are meticulously trained to perform on the field of battle. It is said that a Marwari horse may only leave the battlefield under one of three conditions - victory, death or carrying a wounded master to safety. By taking good care of these divine beings we ensure the everlasting dominance of our horsemen on the battlefields of India.
translation: 拉其普特骑兵的马就像他们的主人一样训练有素而勇敢,而马拉马离开战场只有三种情况-胜利,死亡或者带着他受伤的主人回来.照顾好这些忠诚且勇敢的马是保证我们的骑兵在印度战场的驰聘疆场的关键.

original: Rajput bards tell stories of our people's many battles against foreign invaders and how our ancestors would rather die than admit themselves defeated. We must encourage this spirit of unity and give the bards reason to write new ballads of bravery in the face of death.
translation: 拉其普特吟游诗为我们的人民传唱了许多反对外国侵略者的故事和我们祖先宁死不屈的精神.我们应该鼓励这些诗人传唱鼓励这种的团结精神,这些勇敢的故事会成为我们的新民谣.

original: Rajput painters already have an excellent reputation. We must encourage our artists to develop their skills and add to the glory of our dynasty by creating a school of painting particular to our state.
translation: 拉杰普特画家的声誉和口碑非常好,我们可以鼓励这些艺术家们通过创建一所学校来建立我们自己的艺术体系,这是我们国家的荣耀.

original: The upbringing and traditions of Rajput warriors ensure a wide base for recruiting officers to lead our armies. In order to capitalize on this we should ensure that career opportunities are abound to encourage all these promising young men to serve as officers both in our own armies and abroad.
translation: 具有传统教养的拉其普特武士是我们国家的骄傲,应该让他们进入军队作为榜样激励我们年轻的一代.

original: Throughout the years migratory Rajput traders have traveled the roads of Hindustan. These entrepreneurs must be encouraged and given incentives to grow their enterprises. Soon our clan-members will have established trading houses all over India.
translation: 多年来,四处行商的拉杰普特商人游历了周边的国家.必须给予这些商人鼓励和资助来成立发展商行,这样我们的商队很快就能出现在印度各地.

original: We believe that God, the most merciful has previously revealed Himself to earlier prophets such as Moses and Jesus for the Jews and Christians. They should be allowed to freely practice their faith.
translation: 我们相信最仁慈的上帝将自己的意志交给了犹太人的先知摩西以及基督徒的耶稣,因此应该允许他们自由的去选择他们的信仰.

original: Christian states based in the north have slowly extended their power over the rest of Al Andalus under the flag of reconquista. The time has come to liberate our Andalusian brethren.
translation: 身在北部的基督教国家已经慢慢扩大了他们的势力范围了,我们应该举起安达卢斯的旗帜收复失地,解放我们在安达卢西亚的人民的时机已经到来了.
安达卢西亚曾经的辉煌

original: Al Andalus was once a center for learning with exceptional scholars like Ahmad Ibn Rushd, Abu Al Qasim and Muhammad Ibn Tufail. We should continue this state of mind of our forefathers.
translation: 安达卢西亚曾经拥有过艾哈迈德·伊本鲁西德,阿布卡西姆和穆罕默德·伊本·图费勒这样具有卓越贡献的优秀学者,因此我们应该将这里作为教育的中心以继承我们先祖的精神.

original: The Strait of Gibraltar -named after the great Muslim general Tariq ibn Ziyad- connects the Atlantic Ocean to the Mediterranean Sea and separates Europe from Africa. If we can secure our control of this narrow strait, trade will be more profitable.
translation: 伟大的穆斯林将军塔里克伊本齐亚德将连接大西洋到地中海和欧洲与非洲分离的海峡命名为直布罗陀海峡.如果我们控制了这条狭窄的海峡,那么我们在军事以及贸易上的利益将会得到更多.

original: Our poets describe it as a pearl set in emeralds, in allusion to the color of its buildings and the woods around them. On a hill overlooking our capital, the Alhambra is a sprawling example of Andalusian genius at architecture, design and engineering.
translation: 阿罕布拉宫是一座庞大的安达卢西亚建筑,设计与建造它的人是天才.我们的诗人形容它如一颗明珠一样亮丽一颗祖母绿一样璀璨.而它正在山上俯瞰我们繁荣的城市.

original: Fight our common enemies and Moorish warriors around the Mediterranean Sea holding the crescent banner will rally around us. Historically, the Moors were the medieval Muslim inhabitants of Al-Andalus, Maghreb, Septimania and Sicily.
translation: 从历史上看,摩尔人是中世纪的安达卢西亚,马格里布,塞普提曼尼亚和西西里岛的穆斯林居民,这些地中海勇敢的摩尔勇士为了抗击共同的敌人已经团结在了月牙旗帜下.
科尔多瓦的继任哈里发

original: In 929, Abd-ar-Rahman III proclaimed himself Caliph of Córdoba and reigned for half a century as the most powerful ruler of Iberia. Today our state has become strong enough to follow in his footsteps and proclaim the title of Caliph, and declare our state as the Caliphate of Granada. There is no conqueror but God!
translation: 公元929年,阿卜杜勒·拉赫曼三世自称科尔多瓦的哈里发以及伊比利亚半岛最强大的统治者而统治了半个世纪.今天,我们的国家已经变得足够强大到追随这位半岛统治者的脚步了,让我们宣布格拉纳达继承哈里发的称号并成为伟大的征服者吧!

original: The Pope has the sovereign authority to establish religious canon and law in the Catholic church. The State shares a special relationship with those who conform with the Catholic authority.
translation: 教宗在教会宗教经典以及教论具有无可置疑的权威,在天主教国家中拥有至高无上的权利

original: Into Rome flow the riches of Christian Europe.
translation: 从欧洲流入罗马基督教的财富.

original: We control the great city and the ancient capital of the Romans. We are the preservers of their marvelous tradition.
translation: 我们控制了伟大的城市罗马古都,他们的传统和传奇得以让我们所保护.

original: The Donation of Constantine demonstrates our authority to bestow the title of the Emperor of the Romans upon whomsoever we choose. It may also prove that we're rather good at forging documents.
translation: 君士坦丁的捐赠证明了我们赋予罗马人的皇帝这一称号是荣耀的权利,它也可以证明我们的文件所具有的合法性.

original: We will consolidate our power in Papal provinces by seizing it from the local princes.
translation: 在罗马教宗的势力范围内我们将巩固我们从地方诸侯取得的力量。

original: Years of collecting and donations have made Vatican City the home of many museums. We've accumulated one of the most impressive art collections in history.
translation: 多年的收集和捐赠已经让梵蒂冈城的博物馆日渐繁荣,其中甚至收藏了在历史上让人印象深刻以及独一无二的艺术收藏品.

original: Being the Vicar of God to Roman Catholics gives us a certain amount of political leeway. The Papal Bull, documents carrying the Pope's official seal, carry the weight of the very word of God. With these rulers have been cursed and entire continents divided.
translation: 信仰上帝的牧师能够给予罗马天主教徒提供一些必要的政治选择的余地,教宗的文件所印的公章是代表着上帝的意志.这些权利赐予那些应该被诅咒的君主以及领主合法的统治权.君权神授!

original:
'Young boys in the forest 
 cut down the small trees 
 and crawl to their lord kneeling' 
 
 The traditional Japanese ideal, Bushido, the way of the warrior samurai, created a national atmosphere of discipline and self-sacrifice in the mid and upper warrior classes.
translation:
'森林里的年轻男孩 
砍伐小树林 
跪着送到他们领主哪里' 

日本人的传统，武士道，使得武士阶层变的更具有自律和牺牲精神.

original:
'Pen cuts across fine rice paper 
 kanji runs black thick 
 the sword upon white flesh' 
 
 The concept of mastery of both art and war played a large role in the Bushido tradition. The military teachers of Japan realized that the arts - such as painting, flower arrangement, and gardening - inspire discipline and practical understanding in soldiers. By the time of the Edo period, Japan will have a highly literate population.
translation:
'书写漂亮的汉字
日文的厚重 
刀剑的光亮' 

战争与艺术是武士道传统的重要一部分. 日本的军事家认识到了艺术 - 比如绘画,插花,园艺 - 能够启发武士对战争的理解. 日本江户时代,将形成一个非常有文化的群体.

original:
'Grandmother in the smoke 
 grandfather on the rocks 
 black sticks glow orange and gifts ascend' 
 
 A man owes his life to his lord and his ancestors. A man who honors his ancestors will be respected by both men and lords.
translation: 人应该对祖先和领主有所感恩. 尊敬祖先的人会得到人们和领主的尊重.

original:
'To heaven his circle raises 
 his left hand the sun 
 his right the moon' 
 
 One of the most influential works of military literature ever written, the book by Miyamoto Musashi is held in the same high esteem as the Sun Tzu's Art of War.
translation: '偏于剑术之利,岂能窥剑术之秘乎' \n\n宫本武藏所编写的《五轮书》在军事价值上几乎媲美《孙子兵法》.

original:
'In the snow he falls 
 last of the bread in hand 
 above his head the lord's tower looms' 
 
 The masterless samurai of Japan are ready to do our bidding if we choose to invite them into our service.
translation:
'大雪纷落
手里只还有最后一块面包 
在远方是领主的天守阁' 

如果我们邀请这些浪人,她们将随时为我们服务.

original:
'Daimyo sits in comfort 
 scent of flowery tea 
 man with face to floor' 
 
 Warlord vassals of Japan commanded great armies for, and sometimes against, their lords in Kyoto.
translation:
'大名舒适的安坐 
品尝花茶的芬香 
武士侍立于旁 

大名指挥她们的军队，有时支持有时反对他们在东京的领主.

original:
'Sweet green field 
 pink flowers bloom 
 a life to sword will yield' 
 
 Death played a key role in the fanatical warrior philosophy of Bushido. Men willingly gave and took their own lives for the sake of honor and respect. It was said that Bushido itself meant to accept death, or to even look for it.
translation:
'甜蜜的梦境 
樱花绽放 
刀剑随时带来死亡' 

武士道中,死亡是不可少的部分. 武士们随时原因为了尊严献出声明. 据说武士道本身就意味着死亡，或者说忽视死亡.

original: A compendium of translations of Greek Byzantine books of law and great works of ancient philosophy to Serbian language was issued by Stephen Dusan on 21st of May 1349 in Skopje. It served as an inspiration for Serbia's very first Code of Laws.
translation: 斯蒂芬·杜珊在斯科普里1349年5月21日发表了有关古典哲学的法律和伟大著作的拜占庭希腊语书籍的塞尔维亚语译文的纲要.它为塞尔维亚最初的法典提供了灵感.

original: With the Ottoman Empire looming on the eastern horizon and most of Balkans subdued before Baryaktar, Serbia shall serve as the last Balkanite bastion of Orthodoxy, the continuation of the Eastern Christian civilization.
translation: 随着奥斯曼帝国在东方的地平线上隐约现身,绝大多数巴尔干半岛各国都屈服于巴伊拉克塔尔之下.塞尔维亚应当作为东正教在巴尔干地区最后的堡垒,延续着东方基督教的文明.

original: Although light cavalry formations as a concept were an old Roman idea, the first Balkan hussars - or gusars (corsairs or pirates) as they were known, appeared as auxiliary units of the Byzantine empire, recruited mainly from Byzantine held Serbia in the 10th and 11th century. Even after the Byzantine power dwindled, this tradition remained, and was further refined in the following centuries.
translation: 尽管轻骑兵编队只是古罗马理念中的一个概念,第一次在巴尔干地区出现的骑兵部队被普遍认知为巴尔干骠骑团（或者说海盗们）,作为拜占庭帝国的辅助部队现身于历史舞台,其成员主要从在十和十一世纪由拜占庭控制的塞尔维亚募集而来.即使在拜占庭没落之后,这个传统也仍然在持续着,并在此后的几个世纪中进一步细化完善.

original: Re-establish the Alemmanic Guard - the tradition of a standing army comprised mainly of German nobles and knights, second or third sons with little hope of inheritance, and nothing but a military career as their prospect in life.
translation: 重建阿勒曼尼克卫队——一个由德国贵族和骑士们,以及继承希望渺茫除了军旅生涯以外毫无人生前景的次子及三子们组成的常备军卫队.

original: Invite the second wave of Saxon miners all the way from the Holy Roman Empire to settle in Serbia. We can re-open the ancient gold mines that had once made the small Serbian Despotate the richest country in Europe.
translation: 用各种办法邀请第二波萨克森矿工从神圣罗马帝国到塞尔维亚定居。这样我们就能重新开采那些古老的矿山，这些矿山曾经让弹丸小国塞尔维亚成为全欧洲最富裕的国家。

original: Adopt the concept of a standing army comprised mostly of foreign mercenaries. This is quite unlike the age-old tradition of levied peasants, reducing the impact of war on the Serbian economy, especially agriculture.
translation: 采纳主要由外国雇佣兵组成的常备军的理念.这完全不同于古老的征召农民的传统,并且能有效的减少战争对塞尔维亚经济的影响,尤其是农业.

original: Unlike their northern counterparts in Hungary, Hajduks in Serbia and neighboring Balkan lands have earned a more infamous reputation. These men lived the hard life of brigands, always in danger, always on the move: preying on poorly defended roads, ambushing Turkish tax collectors and merchants. However, during wars these experienced, tough men often filled the ranks of Serbian armies, providing excellent - if a bit undisciplined - infantry.
translation: 不像在匈牙利北部的同行们那样,黑盗客们在塞尔维亚和邻近的巴尔干地区更加恶名昭彰.他们作为山贼艰苦的生活着,总是活在危险之中,行踪不定：掠夺缺乏防御的道路,伏击土耳其税吏和行商们.然而这些经历使坚韧的人们往往加入了塞尔维亚军队的行列,提供了优良的但是有点散漫的步兵.

original: Horses are alien to Orissa and the lands here are unsuited to raise them. Our jungles are, however, famously teeming with elephants. In the dense jungles of Eastern India well executed tactical cooperation between elephants and infantry can be just as deadly as a cavalry arm. Let us further increase the size of our elephant corps and refine their tactics.
translation: 奥里萨邦的土地不适合牧养马匹,但他们的土地与丛林却是著名的大象栖息地.在印度东部出现的大象与他们的主人之间的配合就如骑兵的手臂一样灵活.更多优秀强壮的大象出现是我们强大的保证.

original: Worship of Jagannath, the lord of the universe, is what unites these lands. Older rulers of Orissa have been considered to be the sons of Jagannath. Our current dynasty might not be his sons but we must certainly make sure to imprint on all that our ruler is the servitor of Jagannath and that any disobedience to him equals treason against lord Jagannath himself.
translation: 我们的土地和人民自古就崇拜查伽纳什-宇宙之主.而我们的王朝一直是查伽纳什的儿子和仆人,任何敢于质疑这一点的人都等同于叛国罪.

original: The lands of Orissa have long been divided among many different princelings. However the time of these Mandaleshvaras is over! We must take control of these lands and appoint regional governors, Parikshas, instead of allowing these petty princelings to dilute our imperial authority.
translation: 奥里萨邦的领土早已被当地的豪族所瓜分.现在这种情况结束了,我们必须通过委任当地的长官来对这些土地进行控制,而不能让那些豪族任意瓜分国家的利益.

original: Orissa is famed for its high quality textiles since ancient times. Let us further encourage the textile guilds of Orissa to refine their methods of production of the fine Kalingam cloth.
translation: 自古以来奥里萨邦就以高质量的纺织品而闻名.我们应该对奥里萨邦的纺织行会进行鼓励和赞扬.

original: The glory of past dynasties is reflected by the greatness of the temples they left behind. We should strive to improve on the many great temple complexes in our lands and hire architects to construct new ones to further the development of Kalingan architecture.
translation: 历代的寺庙都是祖先留下的珍贵荣誉,我们应该在我们的土地上建造更多的寺庙.让我们的建筑师兴建新的寺庙吧.

original: The high quality salt of Orissa is in demand all over India. Let us do what we can to encourage the salt trade so that we may grow rich from it.
translation: 奥里萨邦高质量的盐是全印度的需求,让我们鼓励盐业贸易和生产得到更多的财富.

original: Tradition tells us that our ancestors sailed to distant shores in Indonesia, China, Persia and Africa but today the seas are dominated by foreigners. We should expand our navy and reclaim our maritime heritage!
translation: 传说告诉我们,我们的祖先曾经航行到达印度尼西亚和遥远的中国海岸.波斯和非洲也曾到达过.而现在他们由外国人所控制,我们应该扩大我们的军队重新夺回这些.

original: Punjab, the land of the five rivers, is one of the most fertile regions on Earth. Apart from allowing us to export food and cotton to our neighbors this also allows our many cities to grow and encourages all sorts of specialized production. We must do our outmost to encourage the growth of agriculture and to defend our farmers from the bandits and brigands of the adjoining areas.
translation: 旁遮普,五大河流的土地,是地球上最富饶的地区之一.不仅能够向我们的邻居出口粮食和棉花,也使我们的许多城市发展和鼓励各种专业化生产.我们必须尽我们努力以鼓励农业增长和捍卫我们的农民免受毗邻的地区土匪和强盗骚扰..

original: Situated at India's westernmost border the Punjab has always been at the crossroads of economic and cultural exchange between India and Persia. The ancient Grand Trunk Road, which connects eastern India to the Persian world, runs right through our lands before heading up into the Afghan mountain passes. These passes are, however, plagued by tribal raiders and bandits. We should encourage the traffic along this ancient and vibrant route and do everything in our power to look after the wellbeing of these traders by constructing caravansarais and policing these roads.
translation: 坐落在印度西部边境的旁遮普邦一直是印度和波斯之间的经济和文化交流的十字路口.古代的大主干路,连接印度东部的波斯世界,在进入阿富汗山口贯穿我们的土地.然而,这些道路被游牧部落和土匪的持续骚扰着.我们应该发展这片古老而充满活力的路线并且尽最大努力为这条路线提供防卫.

original: The Punjab is a major centre for textile production. Cloth from our weavers is specially made for markets all over Asia and Europe and our weavers are among the most productive in India.
translation: 旁遮普省是纺织生产的主要中心.我们的纺出的布的市场遍布亚洲和欧洲,我们的织工是印度最能干的.

original: Sikhism, a religion native to the Punjab, is growing rapidly in our lands. Members of this faith come from all castes and background and will defend their state regardless of their former professions.
translation: 锡克教,旁遮普的本土宗教,在我们的土地正在迅速发展.来自所有种姓和背景的成员,不管他们以前的职业,都将捍卫自己的信仰.
采用官方化的旁遮普文

original: We should adopt a standardized script instead of the many different ones currently in use in our lands.
translation: 我们应该采取旁遮普文的一个标准的版本,而不是在在我们的土地上使用的许多不同的版本.

original: The administrative system of the Misl states of the Punjab allow them to field impressive cavalry forces. In times of need we may call upon these forces to fight a common enemy.
translation: 旁遮普的许多邦省被允许拥有一定的骑兵部队.在需要的时候我们可以征召这些力量对付共同的敌人.

original: The ways of our forefathers were sound and have served us well over the years. In order for our armies to continue to triumph on the battlefields we must, however, aim to create a more professional force. By studying the way far away countries organize their armies and making adapting their methods when prudent we may create a more efficient Punjabi army while still retaining the unique qualities of our current military system.
translation: 我们的祖先已经所建立的军队已经存在了几百年了,为了能够在战场上继续我们的胜利我们必须致力于建立一只更专业的军队.通过学习遥远的先进国家的组织和技术我们能够创造出一个更符合旁遮普特色且更有效的军队.

original: For centuries our people have dealt with maritime affairs and with new regulations like the Ordo Marinaritiae we are laying down good basis for the future of Ragusa.
translation: 几个世纪以来,我们在海事领域颁布了许多新的法规,比如海事条例.这为拉古萨的未来奠定了良好的基础.

original: Our capital is the door of the Balkans and the East, a place of commerce of metals, salt and spices. Thanks to our tax exemptions for affordable goods, our capital will stay as a center of trade for years to come.
translation: 我国首都是巴尔干连接东方的门户,交易盛产金属,盐和香料.相应的低税收政策促使这里成为贸易中心.

original: Our maritime affairs and land trading has significant success under the patronage of Constantinople. By paying them a symbolic tribute we can maintain our independence and receive trading benefits. Historically, in 1481 Ragusa passed into Ottoman protection by paying an increased tribute of 12.500 ducats. For all other purposes, Ragusa was virtually independent.
translation: 在君士坦丁堡的支持下,我国的海上和陆上贸易发展迅速.在支付象征性的费用后,我们维持着自身的独立.历史上,1481年,拉古萨倒向了奥斯曼,保护费也增长至12500.但是,拉古萨依旧独立.

original: Ships are needed both for our own protection and to support our extensive trade networks across the Mediterranean. A strong naval presence will make Ragusa one of the leading maritime forces of the world.
translation: 舰队是我们军事和经济的基础.强大的舰队是拉古萨强大海军的证明.

original: The old shipyard situated in Ragusa could not please the great demands of our maritime affairs. Therefore, the construction of a new shipyard in Port Gruz has started. Historically, in 1525 a major shipyard in Port Gruz was built along with smaller shipyards elsewhere to meet demands.
translation: 位于拉古萨的旧船坞不能满足新时代我们对船只的需求。因此，在格鲁兹建立新船坞的计划开始实施。历史上，1525年格鲁兹建成了一个巨大的船坞。同时，也有许多小船坞在其他地方建成。

original: Non Bene Pro Toto Libertas Venditur Auro

Roughly translated, Liberty is not well sold for all the gold. Borrowed from Aesop's story about a wolf that rather be free and starve than to be fat and a slave. This is the pledge that we make in Ragusa.
translation: 直译过来就是全世界的黄金也比不上自由.这个格言出自伊索寓言里一匹狼,它宁愿饿死也不愿在笼子里安宁地死去.这正是我们拉古萨人的写照.

original: The Rector's palace is the seat of our government and the residence of our Prince. Historically, the rector held considerable influence, however, real power was in the hands of three councils that were held by the nobility.
translation: 教区牧师的宫殿是我们政府的所在地和王子的住所。历史上来说，教区牧师有相当大的影响，然而真正的权力却在掌控了三级会议的贵族手中。

original: Guilds specific to every sort of craft are founded to insure the quality of products and to train young artisans.
translation: 对每一种工艺品的制造我们都成立了协会用以保证产品的质量和培养年轻的工匠.

original: Some cities are given the special right to open fairs in every spring and autumn. These seasonal markets are quite attractive for foreign traders.
translation: 一些城市会在每一年的春季和秋季开放集市,这些季节性的市场对于外国商人具有很大的吸引力.

original: German lands are grouped into regional circles. Their functions are keeping local peace with common forces, collecting the imperial taxes and coordinating opinions for the Imperial Diet and the Imperial Chamber Court.
translation: 德国领土分成每一块的邦联区域.其作用是用来维持当地安稳和控制军队,征收帝国的税收和协调帝国议会的决定.

original: German lords and cities enact laws concerning the daily life of their folks to secure the local peace and public morality.
translation: 德意志领主在城市里制定法律以确保他们的人民日常生活和全得到保障.

original: Both Catholic and Protestant German lords have an exclusive right to control religious matters in their demesnes according to the principle 'Whose realm, his religion'.
translation: 信奉天主教和新教的德意志领主在他们各自的领地内制定不同的宗教权利和法律事务.

original: The House of Thurn und Taxis pioneered the German postal service, a complex network of the communication which covers various European regions and all of Germany.
translation: 图尔恩达科马车行开创了德意志的邮政服务,他们所涵盖的范围包括欧洲大部分地区和整个德国.

original: German Dukes make their residences in cities, and govern the land from there. In this way, the cities become not only administrative and economic centers, but also many cultural buildings are constructed by their monarchs.
translation: 德国的公爵们在城市中建立住宅并在那里统治着土地。这样一来城市不仅只是政治和经济中心，也有许多文化的的建筑被他们的君主建立。

original: Since the early days when Ryukyu was divided, China has recognized the privileges of our right to rule and are willing to give us assistance to strengthen our nation.
translation: 很久以前,琉球四分五裂,是天朝认可了我们的权力,协助我们统一.

original: The religion of Okinawa is a great clash of Asiatic and ancient religions. It constitutes polytheism, ancestor worship, and elements of animism, along with various . It is unique for its focus on females as the majority of the priesthood. We can establish a formal hierarchy of priestesses, including a high priestess position, to insure that the island's spiritual needs are attended.
translation: 琉球一直存在亚洲外来宗教和本地原始宗教的冲突.这里有多神教,祖先崇拜,泛灵论.最独特的是,我们认为女性是权力的主体.因此,建立了母系社会.在女酋长的带领下保持着文化的传承.

original: Shuri Castle is the palace of the Ryukyuan Kingdom on the great island of Okinawa. Its grounds include several sites of national pride, including the famous Shureimon gate. Shisaa yaibin mi!
translation: 首里城是琉球王国的宫殿所在地.在那里,矗立着许多知名的建筑,比如守礼门.Shisaa yaibin mi!

original: The Chinese have given us access to trading ships. By means of these, our fleets will sail all the way north to Korea, and to lands far in the south, such as Malaya, Sumatra, and Siam.
translation: 天朝允许我们进入他们的港口贸易.沿着他们开辟的商路,我们的贸易范围北至朝鲜,南至马来半岛,苏门答腊和暹罗.

original: Because of our amicable position and our excellent relations with many other nations, they, especially the Chinese have decided to grant us free trade in their ports by offering us trade agreements. Many trade items can be found within our lands, from Japanese lacquerware, Chinese glazed ceramics and even Indian ivory and Arabian frankincense.
translation: 由于我们的和善的立场和与许多国家的友好关系，他们——尤其是中国人，将会通过贸易协定的形式给于我们在他们港口中自由贸易的权利。许多交易品在我国是根本寻找不到的，有日本来的漆器、中国的釉面陶瓷，甚至印度象牙和阿拉伯乳香。

original: In the ages past, we have sent many of our best and brightest to be educated by the Chinese in their national academy, as they have set a quota for Ryukyuans to study there. Now that we have built a National Academy of our own, we can invest more into technological improvements.
translation: 在过去,我们派遣大量学者前往天朝太学学习.天朝也为我们预留了一些名额.现在我们要建立自己的太学了,这可以加快技术进步.

original: In the king's fevered dream, he saw the three mountains above a great sphere, and upon it, under our majestic mountains, every city of man and every tribe of men. Yamapikarya! But was it just a crazy dream?
translation: 国王做了一个噩梦,他看见空中出现三座大山,而自己正在最高的山上俯瞰下面的各种肤色各种语言的人.Yamapikarya! 这一定是个疯狂的想法.
恒河 - 布拉马普特拉河交汇

original: The mighty Ganges and Brahmaputra have traveled far to intermingle and spread out into the Bengal Delta, funneling trade and commerce in its wake. For thousands of years the area around the delta has been a natural place for the easy exchange of goods and ideas.
translation: 恒河同布拉马普特拉河在孟加拉三角洲交汇,带来商业和贸易.几百年来,这里一直是个充满活力的城市.

original: We Bengalis are primarily rice eaters, and the rainfall and soil in the area lends itself to massive surplus rice production, with the mighty silt laden rivers and monsoon allowing for three separate growing and harvest seasons a year.
translation: 孟加拉人主要吃大米.当地的降雨和土地也适合稻米生长.丰富的水源和季风使这里可以一年三熟.
孟加拉印度教苏菲派融合

original: Beyond the eastern frontiers of the Islamic world, came Sufi mystics to settle land grants or to commune with nature in Bengal, intermingling with the Hindu population. Cooperation led to extensive land reclamations in forested and marshy areas and helped to introduce new syncretic forms of music, painting, dancing and sculpture reflected in the temples and shrines constructed during this period.
translation: 在伊斯兰世界的东部,苏菲派于孟加拉生根发芽,在印度人中传播.同原本的印度教思想的碰撞催生出了大量全新的音乐,绘画,舞蹈和雕塑.

original: Wars may torch the granaries and markets. The weather may wither or crush the crops in the fields. Elephants and ants may try to eat what we have planted. Give us a little oil, however, and our fish-laden rivers will give us the food we Bengalis desire most!
translation: 战争会毁了集市,天气会毁了庄稼,动物会吃掉存粮.但是,对于我们来说,只要从河中捕捞鲥鱼,再配上芥子酱,就制成了孟加拉人最喜爱的菜肴.

original: Native to our region, Jute is a long, soft, shiny vegetable fiber that can be spun into coarse, strong rope, matting or thread. In high demand for its resilience and relatively light weight, we can benefit from its cultivation and production.
translation: 在我们这里,黄麻是一种又长又软,还很有光泽的植物纤维.我们用它来制作各种衣服.由于需求量很大,我们也因此获益.

original: What's that? People will give us gold and silver for our flowers!? The opium of our region is highly prized and easily grown, commanding twice the price of any other opium in the world. Let the trade begin!
translation: 什么！有人会用金子换花！我们这里的罂粟品质好售价高,来贸易吧.

original: The Bengal Renaissance that took place in this region was a reaction to the encounter and impact of Europeans arriving for not only commerce, but for study, art and scholarship. The Bengal Renaissance blended together Hindu teachings from the past with Western education, politics and law, as well as a re-casting of Bengali culture. This led to a flourishing of the arts and sciences.
translation: 孟加拉的文艺复兴是对欧洲入驻当地并使其社会经济蒙受巨大打击而形成的刺激性反应,是一种混合了印度教教义和西方教育理念以孟加拉文艺复兴的形式激励政治、法律和文化等方面提升,从而复兴孟加拉国的辉煌时期.

original: Our people are united in our own unique view of the world represented through our Thunderbolt form of Buddhism. It guides our very governance and daily life in familiar and expected patterns for the lowest serf to the highest lama.
translation: 这里的人们都信奉金刚乘佛教。它每时每刻都指引着人们，无论是最低贱的奴隶还是最尊贵的喇嘛。

original: The vestiges of the original and indigenous Bön faith still hold sway in Tibet, both competing with and merging with the Vajrayana way of Buddhism. The divine presences or Bön deities are incorporated into the very construction of the people's homes making them in effect a castle (dzongka) against the malevolent forces outside it. The fierce and inspiring Gods, Elementals, Demons, and Spirits are quite a contrast to the serene Buddha.
translation: 西藏原始的土著信仰依然存在，无论是与金刚乘佛教的斗争还是合并。那些信仰的人依然视其为神圣的存在，这使他们拥有了一个精神上的堡垒，在面对外部恶劣环境时能够起到鼓舞人心的作用！

original: Domesticated yaks have been kept for thousands of years by our people, cultivating and improving our knowledge of their breeding will only make them more useful. In addition to pulling plows and being able to ride them, they give us their milk, fibre and meat, and carry a heavy load through deep snow. Their dried droppings are an important fuel, used all over Tibet, and is often the only fuel available on the high treeless Tibetan Plateau. Their butter is an ingredient of the butter tea that Tibetans consume in large quantities, and is also used in lamps and made into butter sculptures used in religious festivities. Their use is ever expanding with our knowledge and ingenuity.
translation: 家养的耗牛数千年来一直都是我们宝贵的资源。除了够驾驭它们拉犁，它们还给我们提供了宝贵的牛奶和肉、纤维，还有非常需要的驮力。他们的粪便更是一个重要的燃料，在西藏各地因为缺乏树木而成为青藏高原唯一的燃料。他们的黄油是藏族酥油茶的主要原料，也用来制灯及制成黄油雕刻用在宗教节日上。

original: Dgelugspa, also known as the Yellow Hat sect, is a school of Vajrayana Buddhism focusing on principles of universal compassion as the fundamental spiritual orientation. Founded in the late 14th century, the Dgelugspa became the pre-eminent Buddhist school in Tibet since the end of the 16th century.
translation: 格鲁派，也被称为黄教，是从十四世纪末后期以同体大悲为精神导向的一个金刚乘佛教教派，在十六世纪末成为西藏著名的佛教学派。

original: Construction of the Potala Palace began in 1645, under the direction of Lozang Gyatso, the Great Fifth Dalai Lama. Rising a thousand feet above the valley floor in Lhasa, with stone walls that measure sixteen feet thick at the base, this fortified palace commands an impressive place. Within its thirteen stories, this center of government has over 1,000 rooms, 10,000 shrines and 200,000 statues.
translation: 伟大的五世达赖喇嘛罗桑嘉措于1645年在位于拉萨一千英尺以上的谷底开始兴造布达拉宫.布达拉宫的基座拥有十六英尺厚,这种坚实的巨石基座让人印象深刻,而这座宫殿高达十三层拥有超过一千间房间以及一万多个佛龛和二十万座雕像,堪称宏伟的宫殿建筑.

original: Nyingma, also known as the School of the Ancient Translations is the oldest school of Vajrayana Buddhism, incorporating mysticism and local deities shared by the pre-Buddhist Bön religion. Historically, the Nyingma tradition is unique amongst the schools in that its supporters never held political power, and therefore its practitioners were mostly removed from the political machinations of Tibet, focusing on austerity, celibacy and mysticism. Their presence, however, cultivates discipline in our society and keeps us attuned to our roots.
translation: 宁玛派被称为金刚乘佛教最古老的宗派，从历史上来看宁玛传承的教派其信众中从来没有获得过政治上的权利，因为宁玛派的信众大多都被西藏的政治阴谋所清除掉了。所以他们一直都信奉神秘主义和独身主义。

original: The Pale Earth, or Sakya School of Vajrayana Buddhism, derives its name from the unique grey landscape of Ponpori Hills in southern Tibet near Shigatse, where Sakya Monastery, the first monastery of this tradition was built by Khon Konchog Gyalpo (1034–1102) in 1073. The Sakya tradition was founded in the late 11th century by Drogmi, a famous scholar and translator who had studied at Vikramashila University in India. This school is known for its studious and academic bent and its colleges produce Tibet's most inquisitive minds.
translation: 苍白的学校，或萨迦派密宗佛教。源于邦科里山在西藏南部日喀则附近的独特的风景。第一座传统的寺庙萨迦寺庙是由坤尔杰布于1073年建立的。而萨迦派是于十一世纪末著名的学者和翻译家所创立，而现在这座学校是培养西藏学识最为丰富的地方。

original: From the coast of Malabar to that of Coromandel the history of South India is closely tied to overseas trade. These lands attract all manners of merchants from west and east alike to compete and cooperate with our own merchant groups such as the itinerant Nanadesis or the Chetti merchants who travel abroad to establish their trading firms in far away ports. We must not take these traders for granted however. By establishing ports and villages that are free of taxes and tolls we may persuade domestic and foreign traders alike to keep their bases of operation in our lands rather than that of our neighbors. Let us create such sanctuaries and watch the merchants flock to our cities.
translation: 从马拉巴尔海岸到乌木海岸，南印度的历史与远洋贸易息息相关. 这里汇聚了东西方来的商旅在这里互相竞争，也有合作. 譬如说那些居无定所的仄迪商人，他们常在远地建起自己的商行. 不过我们切不要将这些外贸机会看成理所当然的，他们想要在我们的土地上做生意，是因为我们的港口和村落都向商人提供免税优惠. 我们应建立一些旅店与瞭望台，以吸引更多商人涌进我们的城市.

original: Southern India is home to many fertile regions such as those along the Krishna and Kaveri basin. However many areas are not so fortunate. Recent times has also seen increasing migration into our lands from the north, many of these new subjects tend to settle in the drier regions where they won't have to compete with existing settlements. In many cases these regions might also be quite productive given that a number of investments into canals and water tanks could be made. By ensuring that those who invest in these things are guaranteed a share in the increased income of the area we might quickly and cheaply encourage such a development in our lands.
translation: 南印度有不少肥沃的地区，譬如说奎师那河和高韦里河河谷一带. 不过，也有一些地方不怎么幸运: 最近北方很多人迁到这里，大多数移民都选择在比较干旱的地方定居，以免与原居民起冲突. 这些地区农产量也不错，不过必须先挖好灌溉渠与储水池. 出资兴修水利的人，都可以在产量提升后获得一份分红. 这样那些干旱的高地就可以很快地发展起来，我们也不用花费太多.

original: The cosmopolitan and militarized political situation in South India attracts all kind of mercenaries. Apart from the indigenous Telugu, Kannada and Tamil groups Maratha horsemen, Persian or Turani Horsemen, Turkoman gunners, Mavales and Berads are all competing to serve in our armies. Among other things this competition means that hiring these groups is cheaper than it might otherwise have been.
translation: 南印度强国如林，互相争战，自然吸引不同的佣兵团。除了本地的泰卢固人、卡纳达人、泰米尔人，还有马拉塔骑兵、杜兰尼骑兵、土库曼火枪兵、摩婆罗军、比拉德人，都争相加入我军。这意味着雇佣他们的价钱要比平常更便宜。

original: The political landscape of southern India is full of ancient and well rooted petty chiefdoms and dependencies over which central authorities have limited control. While taking control over all these areas would be an arduous and lengthy process we might instead attempt to insert people loyal to us in the local hierarchies. With a royal mandate to create, improve and defend fortified settlements these new leaders would rely on authority bestowed on them by the state rather than ancient traditions. These new power holders will allow us to exert a much greater deal of control over our hinterlands and will prove a much more reliable source of troops than the old chiefdoms ever did.
translation: 南印度一带，古老部族盘根错节，王权难以伸张. 想要直接控制这些地区，过程往往漫长而艰巨，不如在当地有力部酋中，扶植一些忠于我们的人物. 这些新领袖，往往更依赖我们所赋予的统治权，而不是当地的古老传统. 因为这些权力新贵，我们可以保持对边远地区的控制. 他们也提供更多兵源. 对比传统土酋，实在好太多了.

original: If the mettle of a true king is his patronage of the temples and religious communities in his lands then there have been many great rulers in southern India. Grand temple cities such as Tirupati or Madurai bear witness of extensive royal patronage. Indeed in recent times these temple complexes have been growing even more grand and monumental, with south Indian temple complexes in many ways dwarfing those that can be found in northern India. In order to live up to the expectations placed upon us as rulers we should patronage the temple communities in our lands and make sure that they adequately communicate the greatness of our dynasty.
translation: 要称为真正的王者，对神庙与祭司的布施，必须要比任何南印度君王都要多. 提卢巴地，马杜赖这些神庙都市，见证一众王家施主的慷慨. 最近，这些崇拜中心越来越富丽堂皇，使北印度的神庙都会都要黯然失色. 众人都在期待我们，我们应该继续为神庙布施，好使祭司能继续宣扬我朝伟大.

original: Let us gather the great poets and writers of this age at our court. The great works produced under our patronage shall be remembered for centuries to come!
translation: 邀请诗人作者入居王廷，美妙作品将要流传百世!

original: With the ties between west, east and the farther east growing stronger a new class of successful merchants have begun to emerge. These rich individuals exercise control over production, shipping and financing around the Indian Ocean. Merchant capitalists like these are now the main driving force behind the development of the trade in our lands and while their growing influence may seem alarming (as does their willingness to invest in foreign trading companies) their activities are also very beneficial to our country.
translation: 在这东西交汇之处，极东之地开始出现一批成功的商人. 他们富有得不得了，掌握印度洋上的生产，运输，金融. 大豪商现在成为我们国内贸易成长的大推手，不过他们投资外国的行为，也值得我们警诫. 无论如何，大豪商的活动对本国带来无穷利益.

original: All our kings descend from the great Sukaphaa who founded our kingdom in 1228 after his long journey into Assam. Swargdeo Sukaphaa was also the first of our rulers to realize the great need of documentation for the coming generations and it was he who had the first 'Store that teaches the ignorant' or Buranji created. Thanks to this and other Buranjis created throughout the history of our kingdom we know the history of our people well and it is not hard to identify the many heirs of Sukaphaa.
translation: 我们的君王可以追朔到苏卡法1228年长途跋涉到阿萨姆建立王国算起. 苏卡法也是第一个认识到重要史料对子孙后代的重要性的统治者为了教导“无知”,菩愣记诞生了.感谢苏卡法和其它菩愣记的编写者,这让我们知道了我国的历史以及如何分辨苏卡法的继承人.

original: When our Tai ancestors first arrived in Assam the lands that were available to them were marches and swamps. They quickly realized that these lands were not as productive as they could be. Making use of the wet rice cultivation techniques of our old homeland has allowed us to prosper in an area that others found too poor to care about. While we are no longer restricted to the marches of Upper Assam, rice cultivation remains the backbone of our economy.
translation: 当我们伟大的祖先第一次抵达阿萨姆邦的土地时就发现那些土地很适合种植.但是他们很快就意识到这些土地并不像以前那样肥沃了.利用湿地水稻栽培技术,我们的故乡已经极为繁荣了.虽然我们不再局限于上阿萨姆的土地上到处开垦,但是水稻种植仍然是我国经济的支柱.

original: The Assamese terrain and the Brahmaputra river in particular is our greatest ally against foreign invaders. Any foreign army that wishes to advance along the Brahmaputra river will have to endure the rains of summer at which point they will have to take great care not to be cut off from their supply lines along the river. By preparing for guerilla tactics, assaulting the invaders supply lines and raiding their stores we can ensure that an enemy risk getting cut off in very hostile lands with starvation and epidemic diseases taking their toll.
translation: 阿萨姆地形特别是布拉马普特拉河我们反对外国侵略者的最大的盟友.任何外国军队,希望渡过沿布拉马普特拉河将不得不忍受夏天雨季,他们将不得不采取非常谨慎的措施以防止被切断补给.进行游击战术,袭击侵略者的补给线,并袭击他们的后勤部队,我们可以确保外国侵略者会处于一片充满敌意的土地中,将会冒着饥饿和瘟疫的巨大风险.

original: Since our people arrived here in the 13th century we have made use of a corvee labor system inspired by our South-East Asian roots. Paiks are used for defense, civil construction and military production and are an integral part of our kingdom. As our country grows, however, this system is in need of restructuring. A thorough reexamination of all Paik duties, Paik quotas and a new and clear graded system for the officers of the system will create a resilient system that will be of great help to us against any foreign threats.
translation: 自从我们的人民在13世纪来到这里,我们采用一种借鉴自东南亚而诞生的差役制度. 帕克斯用于国防,民用建设和军事生产,是王国不可分割的一部分.由于我国的发展,这个系统是需要重组.彻底重新确立帕克斯的职责,帕克斯将确立一个新的明确的分级制度,一个弹性的系统,这将帮助我们对抗任何外国的威胁.

original: Due to the hierarchical organization of our society it is important that we are seen to uphold justice in our lands and that our subjects feel that they enjoy the protection of the state. Making use of the Paik system we can create a chain of appeals from lower officers all the way up to the ministers of the king.
translation: 由于于我们的社会等级制度,在我们的土地对正义的坚持是非常重要的,民众将欢呼国家对他们的保护.利用帕克斯体系,我们可以建立一个从低到高的上诉体系..

original: We have observed that our western neighbors have devised an ambitious administrative system where all lands are routinely surveyed to better evaluate their worth. We should introduce similar measures here. By inviting land surveyors from the west and training our own in their methods we might be able to increase our tax revenue substantially. We must also henceforth make renewed surveys regularly to account for the changing trends of economy and demographics.
translation: 我们观察到我们的西部邻居已经制定了一个雄心勃勃的行政制度,即对所有土地例行调查,以更好地评估其的价值.在这里,我们应该采取类似措施.通过从西部的邀请土地调查者并用他们的方法培养我们的,我们也许能够大幅增加我们的税收.今后我们还必须对经济和人口变化趋势进行调查..

original: Our country draws much of its strength from old traditions and from making the most of the resources within our borders. It is time, however, to look outwards and see what other parts of the world can offer us. By instituting official positions specifically for diplomacy and by encouraging exchange with other kingdoms we might both enrich our culture and find new allies against our local enemies.
translation: 我国的大部分国力来源于古老的传统和边境地区丰富的资源.然而现在是时候放眼世界了,看看它们能提供哪些其他东西给我们.通过建立专门的外交官职以及鼓励和其他国家贸易,我们可以丰富我们的文化并找到对抗本地敌人的新的盟友.

original: Originating out of the worship of the Hindu Goddess Ambaji by women through dance, our people have refined a new and very graceful form of dance called the Garba. The basics of the dance are singing and clapping rhythmically in a circular formation. Today, our men and women gather together to use this dance to celebrate any occasion with great fervor, coming together as a community and wearing exquisitely embroidered outfits. All of us together, young and old, peasant and prince, Muslim and Hindu, dancing in an ever growing circle.
translation: 起源于妇女通过舞蹈向印度教女神阿姆巴吉的祈祷,我们的人民创造出了一种新的非常优美的舞蹈形式即加霸.这种舞蹈围成一个圆形发出有韵律的歌声和鼓掌声.今天,我们的男女聚集在一起,在任何场合都以用舞蹈来庆祝,一起穿着精美刺绣服装.我们所有的人一起,年轻人和老年人,农民和王子,穆斯林和印度教徒一起共舞.

original: Jainism is an ancient way of life, put into its current form by Mahavira (599 BCE – 527 BCE). For a thousand years, Gujarat has been the stronghold of the Jain community and faith, with many holy sites and temples. Royal dynasties have patronized the religion, forming a common community with Hindus. Muslim invasions from the east, by Mahmud Ghazni (1001 CE) and Mohammad Ghori (1175 CE), oppressed the Jaina community, vandalizing temples or converting them into mosques, as well as having burned Jaina libraries. However, the Jains of Gujarat have survived, adapted and prospered, using their connections with Jain communities across the world to serve as a hub for both the faith and commerce.
translation: 耆那主义是一种古老的生活方式,大概形成于（公元前599年至公元前527年之间） .一千年来,古吉拉特邦一直是耆那教大本营,许多圣地和寺庙,历代王朝都信奉耆那教,逐渐与印度教徒形成了一个共同的团体.在穆斯林从东部由马哈茂德加兹尼（公元1001年）和宁拉娜（公元1175年） 开始入侵之后,压迫的耆那教,损坏寺庙的财物,或将它们转换成清真寺,以及烧毁吉安娜库...但耆那教徒在古吉拉特邦依然幸存了,利用用他们与世界各地的耆那教的联系为信仰与商业服务.

original: In the late 16th century, Gujarati Lipi, a new script and writing system was developed. It was developed by mercantile interests and became also known as the saraphi (bankers), vaniasai (merchants) or mahajani (traders) script, due to its association with commerce. It's use became widespread rapidly throughout Gujarat, Kutch and Sindh, to represent those languages, study Sanskrit and became adopted by the Zoroastrian Community to write Avestan. It provided a common writing system for many different communities, binding them together as well as facilitating unity and a common identity.
translation: 16世纪后期，古吉拉特文，一个新的文体诞生了。由于商业利益，它是由银行家，商人以及贸易家共同创造的。迅速在整个古吉拉特邦的喀奇和信德省传播开来，取代了那些语言。它为不同群体提供了一个通用的书写标准，并促进他们之间的团结。

original: There is nowhere our people do not trade! On every shore our people pursue commerce, following the trade winds... our fleets sail to and fro seeking new opportunities. Our merchants know the craft and value of making good and hardy ships on a merchant's budget.
translation: 有我们的商人无处不在！到处都有我们的商人在进行贸易...我们的船队不断的航行以寻找新的机会.我们的商人都知道如何获得最高的利润.

original: Hub of the Indian Ocean Trade

Due to the nature of the monsoon trade winds and its geographic location, Gujarat has long served as the hub of all trade in the Indian Ocean going east. Gujarat is an essential intermediary in east–west trade, between the Red Sea, Egypt and Malacca: Gujarati merchants were important middlemen bringing spices from the Mallaku Islands as well as silk from China, and then selling them to the Egyptians and Arabs.
translation: 于季风与信风和其独特的地理位置,古吉拉特邦曾长期是通往东印度洋所有贸易的节点.古吉拉特邦是红海,埃及和马六甲之间的东方贸易的一个重要中介：古吉拉特商人是将香料与丝绸卖给埃及人和阿拉伯人的重要的中间商.我们的省份受益于这一市场准入.

original: Following Arabs and Portuguese in the early 17th century, the British East India Company established a factory in Gujarati land in 1614. Many foreigners from the west are coming to our lands to purchase our goods wholesale in ever greater quantities... this can only have a good outcome! Right?
translation: 在17世纪初，继阿拉伯人和葡萄牙人之后，英国东印度公司也于1614年在古吉拉特设立了一家工厂。越来越多西方的外国人来到我们的土地上大量购买我们的商品……这只会有一个良好的结果！不是吗？

original: The beginning of the 19th century saw tens of thousands of Gujaratis move to Africa to work as mercantile middle-men between the colonial powers and the indigenous populations with whom they already had trading relationships. Our people are establishing permanent trading communities and sending the wealth home.
translation: 在19世纪初期,数以万计的古吉拉特人到非洲作为殖民国家之间的中间商,并于土著居民建立了贸易关系.我们的人民正在建立永久性的交易据点,并将财富不断送回国内..

original: Florence has long been the cultural capital of Tuscany. With the renewed interest in the classical world a clever Prince may attract the new thinkers to benefit us all.
translation: 佛罗伦萨一直都是托斯卡纳的文化都会，现在已对古代经典重拾兴趣，也吸引新思想到来.

original: The strife between city states has given rise to mercenary companies. Let us ensure they know our purse is full and encourage their presence in times of need.
translation: 城邦间的冲突令佣兵集团崛兴，他们应该知道我们钱袋常满，最好就随时候命.

original: From England to Naples, all know of our bankers. Our golden Florin has financed everything from the Hundred Years War to new industries.
translation: 从英格兰到拿玻里，我们的银行家名闻遐迩. 上至百年战争，下如新工业发展，都由我们打造的金弗罗林支撑着.

original: With the abolishment of the republic and introduction of the hereditary Duchy we must show the glory of Tuscany. Many great works shall be commissioned to the glory of God and the Duke.
translation: 共和政体既由世袭公国所取代，我们更要显扬托斯卡纳的荣光. 大量伟大作品可彰显天主与公爵的荣耀.

original: In order to attract more trade we have declared the port of Livorno a free port. There shall be no duties on goods traded here and the inhabitants may worship as they wish.
translation: 要吸引更多贸易，我们宣布里窝那港为自由港. 经由那里出入的货物无须缴税，各人也可以以自己的方式敬拜天主.

original: To cement our religious liberties and reform our administration we shall no longer permit clergy in our civic administration.
translation: 教士从此不得参与内政，以巩固宗教自由与行政改革。

original: The Holy Father himself has declared his support of our territorial ambitions. To unite the regions of central Italy we shall have to raise standing armies of our own commoners.
translation: 圣父已然支持我们的扩张野心. 统治意大利中部,我们需要一个平民的军队.

original: Congress shall make no law respecting an establishment of religion, or prohibiting the free exercise thereof...
translation: 国会不得制定关于下列事项的法律: 确立国教或禁止信教自由...

original: ...or abridging the freedom of speech, or of the press; or the right of the people peaceably to assemble, and to petition the Government for a redress of grievances.
translation: ...或是剥夺言论自由或出版自由.

original: A man who isn't a self-sufficient landowner can hardly be a proper citizen of a Republic. Claiming the land to the West will allow us to expand our yeomen freeholding citizenry.
translation: 凡非能自给之地主不应视为合适的共和国公民. 索求西部土地将扩充自耕地主公民之总数.

original: In the darkest times, a nation's resolve is tested and forged in the fires of adversity.
translation: 当困顿之际，正时考验一国之决心，使其在厄运之焰中铸成.

original: Free craftsmen are productive craftsmen, so no craftsmen are as productive as ours.
translation: 自由的匠人，是最有效率的匠人，所以没有哪国的工匠比我们更能干.
闪耀的山上之城，人类的灯塔

original: Naturally, our fledgling Republic is viewed as an inspiration to the entire human race, which is as it should be.
translation: 我们新生的共和国，生来便是对全人类的启示，我们是当仁不让.

original: The best thing about the West is how empty it is, how ready to be molded by our settlers. No one opposes this except a few benighted savages who need to catch up with the times...
translation: 西部的好，正在于空荡无人，准备接受移民的塑造，没有人会反对. 除了那几个蒙眛野人，那些最要赶上时代的人...

original: In 1291 the cantons of Schwyz, Uri, and Unterwalden banded together to escape from the Habsburg inheritance, and since then, they and the other cantons have been resolute in resisting foreign incursions on our autonomy within the Empire. Nonetheless, we still aren't a proper country but an alliance or confederation of cantons with a coordinated military policy to protect our privileges. This decentralized model helps to keep our realm responsive and stable.
translation: 在1291年,乌里,施维茨和下瓦尔登州联合起来摆脱了哈布斯堡王朝的统治,从那时起,他们和其他州一直坚决抵抗外国入侵我们在帝国之内的自主权.尽管如此,我们仍然不是一个正常国家,仅仅是一个各州保护我们的特权的军事联盟.这种分散的模式有助于保持我们在领域里敏捷反应和稳定

original: How many kings have had cause to shout 'Summon the Switzers' whenever there has been an assassination attempt? From the Swiss Guard who protect His Holiness in Rome to the Swiss mercenaries serving as auxiliaries and bodyguards in most of the courts of Christendom, Swiss mercenaries have proven legendary in their ability. Perhaps our native sons will give us a discount for working in our courts?
translation: 多少位君主在受到暗杀的时候大喊召集瑞士佣兵？从保卫教宗的瑞士卫队到在大部分天主教宫廷提供保镖服务的瑞士佣兵，瑞士佣兵证明了他们传奇般的能力。或许他们会给同为本地人的我们一些折扣？

original: Throughout the late 13th and 14th centuries, we have been constantly repelling Habsburg (and, often, by extension, Imperial) incursions into our lands. Our mighty soldiers have played a major role in that, but the hardy, difficult terrain of our mountainous home has made invasion equally difficult.
translation: 在13到14世纪，我们一直在不断地击退哈布斯堡王朝（ 往往是帝国扩张）入侵到我们的土地.我们伟大的战士发挥了重要作用,但是我们山区的险要地势同样难以入侵.

original: Even as the most gruesome of wars rages, there's usually little call to bring Switzerland in: after all, both sides need their Swiss mercenaries, and neither wants to be cut off. Perhaps if peace is prosperity, we should focus more on peace.
translation: 即使最可怕的战争肆虐,瑞士也是很少被卷进去.毕竟,双方都需要他们的瑞士雇佣兵,不希望雇佣不到瑞士佣兵.如果和平意味着繁荣,我们应该更加注重和平.

original: The Reformation threatens to tear our land apart. Some provinces join the Protestant movement, others Reform, and still others remain Catholic. Our land is ravaged by violence and confusion. Why must we kill each other over transubstantiation and predestination when we could turn our mountain home into a realm united once more?
translation: 改革教威胁到了我们领地的统一.一些省份加入新教运动以及其他的改革教,还有一些省份保持天主教.我们的土地被暴力和混乱蹂躏着.我们为什么一定要陷于杀死对方的宿命中当我们可以把我们的家乡变的更加团结的时候？

original: Other countries shed political malcontents and authors with texts critical of their governments banned abroad. Some of these figures are quite interesting, and what harm would it do us to let them criticize their homelands from the safety of their new Alpine refuge? We will establish a tradition of Switzerland as the land where exiles can speak their mind freely.
translation: 其他国家庇护政治的不满者和作者都有她们政府的规定.有些数字是挺有意思的,它会做给我们带来什么样的维护如果为这些批评者提供庇护,我们将建立一个流亡者可以畅所欲言的瑞士传统.

original: Some fools think that clockwork is for clocks alone. When one witnesses the power of rotating gears ticking away, it's obvious that clockwork can do just about anything one wants it to do: maybe the Creator of the Universe himself wound up existence like a clock and let the gears spin on their own, ticking away the centuries. Be that as it may, Swiss clockmakers are the greatest masters of the art of clockwork in existence, barring God Himself of course.
translation: 有些傻子认为发条只是为时钟准备的.当一个目击旋转齿轮滴答地走着的功率时,很明显发条可以用来做的任何一件想要它做的事：也许宇宙的造物主的像时钟一样让齿轮转动,滴答滴答走数百年.正如这样,瑞士的钟表师或许是除了上帝之外最优秀的钟表大师.

original: Decades of disease and famine have mostly pushed the English invaders from our lands. Meanwhile, the Irish people grow all the stronger from their harrowing experiences. Yes, there is no stronger man on God's green earth than an Irishman!
translation: 几十年的疾病和饥荒将英国侵略者从我们的土地驱离.同时,爱尔兰人从他们的悲惨经历变得更强.是的,在上帝的绿色地球上,没有人比爱尔兰人更强！

original: The Clanns of Ireland make up a strong political body for land and family management. In smaller families, the family elected chieftain is in charge of maintaining the family and protecting their lands. Land and leadership is passed through the family electorate system of Tanistry. From the royal clanns the symbolic high king of Ireland is elected, creating a bond of union between the Irish families.
translation: 爱尔兰氏族组成了强大的土地和家族管理政治机构。 在较小的家族中，当选的酋长负责维护家族和保护领地。 土地和领导权通过凯尔特式的家族选举制度。 从皇室成员中选出爱尔兰象征性的高级国王，从而在爱尔兰家庭之间建立联盟纽带。

original: Heartily did the Norman invaders embrace the Irish traditions; so much so that it was said they put on the airs of being 'More Than Irish'. The very nature of our culture is contagious, and for centuries yet will men embrace our way of life.
translation: 诺曼侵略者真诚的接受了爱尔兰的传统,以至于有人说他们比爱尔兰人更像爱尔兰,我们的文化的本质是会传播的,几个世纪以后或许她们会接受我们的生活方式.

original: The English government in Dublin and their Irish Parliament puppets have been weakened as result of England's many conflicts in the Hundred Years War and the War of the Roses. Their influence no longer holds any sway over the true lords of Ireland, and now is the time to strike out for our independence.
translation: 由于英格兰在百年战争和玫瑰战争中诸多冲突,在都柏林的英国政府和爱尔兰傀儡议会已经衰弱了.他们的影响力影响到爱尔兰真正的领主,现在是时候了独立了！

original: In 1487, the Irish lord John de la Pole, Earl of Lincoln, invited a host from Burgundy to Dublin to support the crowning of Yorkist English pretender Lambert Simnel. Ireland would make for a fine base of resistant against the English mainland, and forever keep the would-be occupiers at bay. We may also one day gain powerful supporters, such as the Kingdom of Spain.
translation: 在1487年，爱尔兰主约翰·德·拉·波尔,林肯的伯爵,从勃艮第请来了一位主教到都柏林为约克的英国篡位者兰伯特 斯米尔加冕.爱尔兰将会成为抵抗英国大陆的抗基地,并永远将可能的占领者留在对岸.我们也可能有一天获得强大的支持者,比如西班牙王国.

original: While the English may toil and spin in the winds of the Reformation, the Irish people as a whole are determined to remain under the wing of their lord The Pope.
translation: 当英格兰人在宗教改革的风中劳苦和纺线的时候，爱尔兰人作为一个整体决定留在教宗的羽翼之下。

original: No English lord could contain the will of the Irish for long. Despite all efforts, rebellion after rebellion sprouted in an attempt to displace English rule. Insurgency after insurgency will spring up in their path, and Ireland shall never truly be theirs. And, as they sail from our lands, we shall further influence resistance against the protestant imperialists on our eastern flank.
translation: 没有英格兰领主能够长期容忍爱尔兰人的意志.经过一切努力后,企图取代英国统治的起义不断发生.起义分子将不断出现,但爱尔兰从来没有真正属于他们. 因为他们来自我们的土地,我们将进一步抵抗我们东侧的新教帝国主义对我们的影响.

original: Formerly loose mercenary bands, the Gallowglasses are being consolidated into a national army. Their institutional experience is almost unrivalled, and their septs are the perfect foundations for regiments.
translation: 从前的雇佣军团伙，现在正被合并成一支国家军队。他们的制度经验几乎是无可匹敌的，他们的族群关系是团契的完美基础。

original: Now that the greedy, neglectful English landlords have been driven out of Ireland, our farmers are finally able to manage their produce in peace. Blights and crop failures are addressed as matters of critical state importance rather than as peripheral concerns of an irrelevant colony.
translation: 现在，贪婪的、粗心大意的英国地主们被赶出了爱尔兰，我们的农民终于能够和平地管理他们的农产品。枯萎和作物歉收被视为重要的国家重要性的问题，而不是无关的殖民地的外围关注。

original: Some say that salt is worth its weight in gold... perhaps it would be more accurate to say that gold is worth its weight in salt. Either way, by exchanging these two commodities, we have set up thriving trade networks.
translation: 有人说盐与黄金等价...也许更准确的说,黄金与盐等价.无论是哪种,由于这两种商品交易,我们已经成立了欣欣向荣的贸易网络.

original: For many years we were a subject of the Mali Sultanate. As Mali's power has weakened, ours has grown, and we can now claim to be fully independent of Malian overlordship. Let us take steps to make sure we remain so.
translation: 多年来,我们是马里苏丹国的一个附庸国.由于马里的力量有所减弱,我们也强大,我们现在可以从马里那里完全独立了.让我们采取措施以确保我们的独立.

original: Despite the best efforts of centuries of Sunni sultanates, West Africa is still plagued by the menace of Animistic pagans. By lifting the banner of jihad, we can cleanse our lands of the unbelievers and expand our frontiers at the same time.
translation: 虽然经过数个世纪的逊尼派苏丹的最大努力,西非仍然被泛灵信仰困扰威胁这.举起圣战的旗帜,我们可以清除异教徒还能扩展领土.

original: We have been told that the Sankore Mosque's school is the greatest center for learning in the entirety of Africa. Who could be surprised if this is true, seeing wise men from distant Arabia and the Maghreb here arguing the finer points of philosophy and religion?
translation: 我们已被告知尚克尔清真寺的学校是整个非洲最伟大的学术中心.如果这是真的,看到从遥远的阿拉伯和马格里布来这里争论哲学和宗教,谁会感到惊讶？

original: Like Mansa Musa of Mali once did, our rulers can travel to Mecca as well, fulfilling the fifth pillar of Islam bearing gold as a symbol of our wealth and power. Like Mali of old, let us have the world wonder at the wealth and grandeur of Songhai.
translation: 像马里的曼萨穆萨曾经做过的一样,我们的统治者可以前往麦加,用黄金填满伊斯兰教的第五大支柱轴承作为我们的财富和权力的象征.像老马里一样,让世界对奇迹般财富和宏伟的桑海感到惊叹！

original: The Holy Law that the Prophet used when ruling Medina should be the unshakable foundation of the laws we use to run our society. By reforming our criminal code to reflect the teachings of the Prophet, we will bring harmony and justice to our society.
translation: 先知统治麦地那时期制定的神圣法律应该是我们统治社会不可动摇的根基.通过我们的刑法改革以反映先知的教诲,我们将为我们的社会带来和谐与正义.

original: Our merchants frequently bring back fascinating things from the courts of North Africa. Perhaps it would be possible to have them bring back yet more fascinating trinkets?
translation: 我们的商人经常从北非的宫廷带回一些迷人的东西.也许应该让他们带来一些更多迷人的小饰物？

original: Brittany has never been part of France. Though we have been ravaged by Franks, Vikings, and the English in the past, we have, thus far, maintained our identity as a people apart. Let all of our neighbors be aware that Brittany will remain free, the last home of true Gallic traditions.
translation: 布列塔尼从来不是法兰西的一部分。虽然我们过去被法兰克人，维京人和英格兰人蹂躏，但至今为止我们任然保持独立。让我们所有邻国知道，布列塔尼将保持自由，真正的高卢传统的最后一个家园。

original: First called in the 14th century, the Estates of Brittany allowed free men from all rungs of society, even the Third Estate, to share their grievances and petition the Duke for redress. By calling in the Estates, we can vent some of the tension in our lands.
translation: 在14世纪首次出现的布列塔尼阶级议会接受社会各阶级的自由人（即使是第三阶级）分享他们的不满并向公爵请愿。通过调解，我们可以缓解我们的领地上的一些紧张局势。

original: The old kings of Francia called the militarized frontier between their lands and Brittany the Breton March. At the time, they wanted it to keep us out. Let us revive the fortifications of the Breton March, this time to keep our enemies out.
translation: 法兰克的老国王把他们的土地和布列塔尼之间的军事边境称为布列塔尼边戍。当时，他们希望用这个隔绝我们。让我们修缮布列塔尼边戍的防御工事，这次是让我们的敌人滚出去！

original: The French may have claimed to be the 'eldest daughter of the Church' since the days of Clovis, but their observance is spotty and their fealty to Rome only evident when it suits them. The Breton doesn't hide his veneration of the Blessed Virgin or his loyalty to the teachings of His Holiness and the one true Catholic Church.
translation: 自克洛维斯时代其，法兰西人便自称为「教会长女」，但他们并不是总是守规矩，只有当罗马和他们利益一致时，他们才会忠诚于罗马。布列塔尼人从不掩饰自己对万福童真的致敬或其对教宗教导和唯一真正天主教教会的忠诚。

original: Brittany is uniquely exposed to danger from invasion from the seas, as our country contains more than the usual amount of coastline. We need an adequate number and supply of ships to prevent ourselves from falling to foreign invaders.
translation: 布列塔尼对来自海上的入侵尤其危险，这是由于我们拥有超乎寻常的漫长的海岸线。我们需要足够数量的的船只来保护自己免受入侵之苦。

original: We must turn to other powers in order to protect our independence from centralized power, whether in England or France. The diplomat's gilded tongue does as much to defend us as the guns of our troops.
translation: 我们必须求助于其他强国,以保护我们无论是在法国还是英国中央集权下的独立.外交官的言辞能够和我们的部队的枪一样捍卫我们.

original: In 1464, Jehan Lagadeuc wrote the first trilingual dictionary, which contained words in Latin, Breton, and French. This amazing book was the first dictionary in either the Breton or the French language. By distributing copies of the Catholicon, we can show that Breton is just as much a major language as French.
translation: 1464年，查汉编写写的第一部三语字典，其中包含在拉丁语、布列塔尼语和法语。对布列塔尼语或法语来说这部惊人的书是第一部字典。通过传播这部大字典，我们可以表明布列塔尼语是和法语一样的主要语言。

original: The lucrative trade takes our merchants as far as China, Hindustan, Arabia, and even Swahili coasts. The riches to be had attract more and more of our children to the mercantile life.
translation: 利润丰厚的行业尽可能需要我们的商户,在中国,印度斯坦,阿拉伯,甚至斯瓦希里海岸.财富吸引了我们的孩子越来越多的商业生活.

original: In our lands, Islam spread peacefully through emulation of the noble examples of Sufi saints. Let the unbeliever worship what he will, we are more concerned about developing the best personal relationship with Allah that we can.
translation: 在我们的土地上,伊斯兰教通过模拟苏菲圣人的高尚榜样和平传播教义.让非信徒崇拜他,我们更关心的是尽我们所能发展更多个人与真主的关系.

original: Nutmeg, clover, humble black pepper...every grain is worth its weight in gold in the eyes of those cursed with less spicy national cuisines. Our spices' desirability abroad has increased their value at home, as well.
translation: 肉豆蔻,三叶草,不起眼的黑胡椒......在那些缺少香料的国家美食中，每一粒都价值得其等重的黄金.国外香料的需求也增加了他们在本地的价值,.

original: We have created a rich literary and cultural tradition in a sophisticated language featuring loan words and phrases from languages from Arabic and Persian to Chinese that is rapidly becoming the lingua franca of the region, allowing easier communication of foreign ideas to our land.
translation: 我们已经创建了一个丰富的文学和文化传统,它使用一个复杂的充满来自阿拉伯语,波斯语和中国语单词和短语的语言,这种语言已经迅速成为当地的通用语言，让外国的思想在我们的土地上更容易沟通.

original: Our merchants' vessels pay for themselves on their extensive trading missions, meaning that it's cheaper when we have to convert them to warships in wartime.
translation: 我们的商家的船只在其广泛的贸易使命,这意味着它是便宜的时候,我们必须将它们转换为战舰在战时为自己作战.

original: The Sultanate of Pasai, founded in the 13th century, was the first Muslim kingdom in our region. Since those days, we have extended the word of the Prophet all throughout this archipelago. Let's reflect on how far we've come.
translation: 十三世纪建立的苏木都剌国,是本地区的第一个穆斯林王国.从那时以来,我们已经把圣训传遍了整个群岛.让我们回忆我们走过的路.

original: The other islands of this archipelago need to feel the benefit of enlightened Muslim rule as well. By settling them, we get access to their rich goods and they get access to the words of the Prophet. What could be fairer?
translation: 这个群岛的其他岛屿需要感到开明的穆斯林统治的利益.通过解决他们,我们获得其丰富的商品,他们获得的先知的话.还有什么比这更公平的？

original: Our sailors have been to the Swahili coasts and as far as Hindustan and even the Malay lands. We can play a critical role in the flow of goods between these wealthy regions.
translation: 我们的斯瓦希里海岸水手已经已经尽可能前往印度斯坦甚至马来人的土地.在这些富裕地区之间的货物流动,我们可以发挥关键作用.

original: Every cavalryman has heard that the best horses are Arabian horses, and who has a larger supply of these beauties than we do? Put some of our top horses to stud and watch as we produce a steady supply of the greatest horses known to man.
translation: 每个骑手都知道最好的马当然是阿拉伯马,谁又能比我们提供更多的这种漂亮的动物？把我们的一些顶级马配种,看看我们产出人类已知的顶级神骏.

original: The people of our lands were the first to hear the words of the Prophet Muhammad, peace be upon him. Every day we can see clans and tribes descended from people who lived in his day and heard his words. Though Islam may spread far and wide to the ends of the Earth, never forget that it started in this holy oasis of faith.
translation: 我们的土地的人是第一次听到的话先知穆罕默德,愿他安息.我们每天都可以看到氏族和部落的后裔人听从了他的话.尽管伊斯兰教可能蔓延到天涯海角,永远不要忘记,它开始在这个神圣的信仰的绿洲.

original: There is no god but Allah, Muhammad is His messenger. By now, all men should know these holy words, but a shocking amount still dwell in the pitiable state of ignorance of Islam. Our missionaries are ready to spread the words of the Prophet.
translation: 没有上帝,只有真主,穆罕默德是他的使者.到现在为止,所有的人应该知道这些神圣的话,但仍然居住在一个令人震惊的,对伊斯兰教的无知可怜的状态中.准备好我们的传教士去传播先知的话.

original: There aren't many sharply-delineated man-made borders in Arabia, and even if there were, the Bedouin would ignore them. Though the Bedouin nomadic journeys through our lands and into others has risks, it also facilitates easy access to trade through the entire region, as Bedouin nomads know no import tariffs or trade embargoes.
translation: 阿拉伯半岛不会有太多的人造边界,即使有,贝都因人会忽略他们.通过我们的土地和别人的贝都因游牧旅程虽然有风险,但也有利于方便地访问通过整个区域贸易,贝都因游牧民族不知道进口关税或贸易禁运.

original: Our people are divided into many clans and tribes. If we can ensure that all the clan leaders serve our state we will have an valuable source of commanders and experienced Bedouin raiders that cannot be overestimated.
translation: 我们的人民分为许多氏族和部族。如果我们能确保这些氏族的长老完全效忠于我们，那么我们一定会获得无数的贝都因精锐士兵。

original: We hear that the Europeans cannot get enough of this ancient drink of ours. Coffeehouses are booming all over Europe and, though they have attempted to plant it elsewhere, the original coffee of Arabia will always be the best and most desirable.
translation: 我们听到,欧洲人不能得到足够的我们这种古老的饮料.咖啡馆在欧洲各地蓬勃发展,虽然他们曾试图将它栽在别处,原来的阿拉伯咖啡将永远是最好的.

original: Although Arabia has many different clans, tribes and countries, all share in the use of the Arabic language, it forms the unifying feature of all Arabs. Under a strong leadership we can unite all Arabian lands under a single flag and one ruler.
translation: 阿拉伯虽然有许多不同氏族,部落和国家,使用阿拉伯语言的所有人,形成了统一的特点,所有的阿拉伯人.在一个强有力的领导下,我们可以团结所有阿拉伯土地在一个单一的国旗下和一个统治者手中.

original: Italy is the birthplace of the Renaissance, in these lands the knowledge of the ancient world have been explored and its ideals reborn. Our philosophers, artists, authors and universities remain at the forefront of European scholarship.
translation: 意大利是文艺复兴的发源地,在这些土地上已经探索古代世界的知识和重生的理想.我们的哲学家,艺术家,作家和大学仍然在欧洲学术前沿.

original: The many wars of the Italian city states have attracted a host of military contractors or Condottieri from far and near. Should we ever desire to go to war finding mercenary bands willing to fight for us will not be hard.
translation: 意大利邦国之间频繁战争吸引了众多或远或近的军事投机者或者称之为意大利佣兵的团体.如果我们期望寻找一只愿意为我们而战的意大利佣兵从而发动战争并不困难.

original: Every inch of Italian soil has been hotly contested for generations. Over the centuries the many claims of various noble houses have been meticulously documented, forged and fought over. Any foreign invader would have a very hard time making credible claims to these lands, much less actually integrating them and controlling the various parties within them.
translation: 意大利的每一寸土壤在几代人的时间中竞争激烈.在过去的几个世纪里,各种贵族精心制造了许多索赔,伪造和争夺.任何外来入侵者将有一个非常艰难的时间作出对这些土地的宣称,他们实际上更难控制与整合这些土地.

original: The arrival of the cannon has changed the battlefields and sieges of Italy forever and our old medieval fortifications are no longer quite up to the task. Italian engineers have recently pioneered a new style of fortresses with thick earthen ramparts and ditches. Instead of maintaining our outdated walls we should build such fortifications as they are more suited to modern warfare.
translation: 大炮的到来已经永远改变了意大利的战争,我们的古老的中世纪防御工事不再坚挺.最近,意大利工程师们开创了一种新的风格的厚厚的土城墙和沟渠作为堡垒.相对于维护过时的墙壁,我们不宜构筑工事,因为他们更适合现代战争.
文艺复兴时期的艺术和建筑

original: All of Christendom watches with envy as the Italian courts overflow with some of the finest architects, artists and poets of our age. We must take care to extend our patronage wide enough that none of this talent has to be wasted on the barbarian courts outside of the peninsula.
translation: 所有基督教徒都羡慕意大利生产了一些我们这个时代最优秀的建筑师,艺术家和诗人.我们必须足够照料他们,扩展我们的的影响力,因为半岛以外的野蛮人使得这个天赋被浪费.

original: The Italian city states have a long history of diplomatic relations and traditions. We would be wise to make use of this to further our international ambitions. The reputation and experience of our ambassadors will allow us to greatly expand our influence outside our borders.
translation: 意大利城市国家的外交关系和传统有着悠久的历史.我们将是明智的,利用这个我们能够达到进一步的国际顶级的野心.我们的边界之外的声誉和经验将极大地让我们的大使扩大我们的影响力.

original: A new form of improvisation theatre have become common in the Italian lands. Various theatre companies have are traveling and performing on temporary stages with common people and nobility alike as their spectators. By sponsoring some of the better companies and ensuring that they perform during carnivals and other festivities we would undoubtedly earn the gratitude of our subjects.
translation: 即兴戏剧的一种新的形式在意大利的土地已成为普遍.各种剧团旅行和临时阶段的普通百姓和贵族都作为他们的观众表演.通过赞助一些更好的公司,并确保他们的表现嘉年华会及其他庆祝活动期间,毫无疑问,我们将获得感谢.

original: The constant journey over dunes and hills under the beating, unrelenting sun can put a man in a poetic mood, where he reflects on battles fought, loves lost, and journeys taken long before and how the steps he takes have been taken by his ancestors centuries back. Their poems, redolent of past victories and lost glories, will encourage our men to fight ten times harder.
translation: 在无情的太阳下，在沙丘和山迈间永恒的旅途,可以把一个人置于创作诗歌的情绪。在诗里反映了经历的战斗,丢失的爱恋,许久以前的旅途以及如何走过那些祖先们多少世纪前走过的路途。他们的诗歌,让人回想起过去的胜利和失去的荣耀,将鼓励我们的人十倍的努力.

original: Our ancestors have long held to the strictest school of Islamic jurisprudence founded by Ahmad ibn Hanbal in the 9th century, and its strict prohibitions against anything that remotely resembles idolatry and commitment to a rigorous code of Islamic conduct brings harmony to our society.
translation: 我们的祖先长期恪守于艾哈迈德·伊本·罕百里于9世纪建立的极其严苛的教法学派。这个教法学派严格禁止任何偶像崇拜现象，并且用一套严厉的教法保证伊斯兰世界的和谐。

original: A pious man knows the ninety-nine names of Allah, but only the camel knows the one hundredth, which is why they always look so smug. The camel, the mighty ship of the desert, has made our nomadic lifestyle possible for centuries by hauling goods across the trackless desert. If you can take the camel's stink and its smug grin, watch as it proves its worth many time over.
translation: 一个虔诚的人都知道安拉的99个名字,但只有骆驼知道的百分之一,这就是为什么他们总是看起来那么如意.拉货跨越人迹罕至的沙漠,骆驼,浩浩荡荡的沙漠之舟,为我们取得了几个世纪的游牧生活.你可以把骆驼的臭味和自鸣得意的笑容,看成是它一次又一次实现了其价值的证明.

original: Since before the days of the Prophet, Bedouins have been experts at the art of the raid. An army may march on its stomach, but it won't march far when our raiders take the food right out of the army's mouth through rapid hit and run seizures of their supply lines. Pull back and let the raiders do their work and watch as the invader dies of thirst.
translation: 远在先知诞生的时代,贝都因人已经是劫掠的专家.兵马未行,粮草先行,一只军队如果粮草呗劫掠如何作战？让这些贝都因人去干活吧,然后我们只要坐看侵略者被渴死就好了.

original: The man who rides for pleasure or military occupation has no idea what true horsemanship is. The Bedouin rides to trade, to eat, to live. It should surprise no one that, in addition to the finest horses, Arabia produces the finest cavalrymen.
translation: 无论是为了乐趣还是为了作战而骑马的人不知道什么是真正的驭者。贝都因人骑着马贸易，骑着马吃饭，骑着马生活。因此没有人应当对这一事实感到惊讶：除了最好的马，阿拉伯还养育了最优秀的骑兵。

original: Our loosely-organized way of handling our affairs has its upsides. Perhaps we could allow the tribes to continue providing for the upkeep of their own soldiers and horsemen while bringing them together in a more modern military pointed outwards rather than within?
translation: 我们组织松散的方式处理我们的事务有其上涨空间.也许我们可以让部落继续提供自己的士兵和骑兵的保养,同时将他们一起放在一个更现代的向外的军事目标中,而不是在里面？

original: 'If any of you worship Muhammad, you should know that Muhammad is dead. But those of you who worship Allah, let it be known that Allah is alive and cannot die.' The shrines to the Prophet and his Companions lay a mockery to the wise words of Abu Bakr. Those who worship at these shrines are guilty of shirk, of exalting Man to the level of praise only Allah is due. If we destroy these shrines, we will enforce true tawhid, or monotheism, throughout our land and purify this holy oasis of faith of the pollution of idolatry.
translation: '如果你们崇拜穆罕默德,你应该知道,穆罕默德是死的.但那些你崇拜真主的人,让人们知道真主是活着,不能死.“先知和他的同伴的艾卜·伯克尔明智的话,嘲弄那些崇拜谁在为这些圣迹犯推脱,不吝赞美之词人的层次的一致好评,只有真主是由于.如果我们破坏这些圣地,我们将强制实施真正的统一圣战组织,或一神教,在整个我们的土地和净化污染的偶像崇拜的信仰这个神圣的绿洲.

original: Custodian of the Two Holy Cities

Our people feel particularly connected to the holy places of Mecca and Medina, the cradle of Islam. Their place of origin affords them the feeling of being a chosen people and also provides them with special status in the eyes of many other Muslims.
translation: 我们的人民与与伊斯兰教的摇篮--圣地麦加和麦地那建立了特殊的联系。初始之地使得他们觉得自己是被选中的人，也在许多穆斯林眼中给他们提供了特殊的地位。

original: With the spice trade flowing up the Red Sea, we must ensure that we take part in this lucrative trade.
translation: 随着香料贸易在红海中流动,我们必须确保我们参加这个利润丰厚的贸易.

original: The holiest city of Islam is ruled by our Sharifs who are descendants through a long and honourable lineage. Historically, the Sharif was charged with protecting the cities and ensuring the safety of pilgrims performing the Hajj.
translation: 伊斯兰教的圣城是由谢里夫——一个古老而荣耀的家族统治的。漫漫历史中，谢里夫一直守护着这座圣城，保证前来朝觐的虔诚教徒的安全。

original: The inhospitable terrain of the Arabian desert has made our warriors stronger and able to wear down our enemy before moving in for the killing blow.
translation: 阿拉伯沙漠,荒凉的地形使我们的战士更强,能消磨我们的敌人并对其杀害打击.

original: The Mahd adh Dhahab, also known as the Cradle of Gold, is the gold mining area near our city of Medina. We must ensure that we make more use of this mine to the benefit our people.
translation: ,也被称为黄金的摇篮,是我们的麦地那市附近的金矿区.我们必须确保我们更多地利用该矿区的利益来保护我们的人民.

original: The Hajj pilgrimage is one of the five pillars of Islam, that must be carried out by every able-bodied Muslim who can afford to do so at least once in his or her lifetime. Pilgrims around the world will come to our lands to fulfill their religious duty.
translation: 朝觐是伊斯兰教的五大支柱,每一个身强力壮的穆斯林,只要能够负担得起这样做,都应该至少在他或她的一生中进行一次朝觐.世界各地的朝圣者来到我们的土地,来满足他们的宗教义务.

original: Hejaz was once at the centre of the Caliphate under the leadership of the first four caliphs: Abu Bakr as-Siddîq, Omar ibn Al-Khattâb, Uthmân ibn Affân and Alî ibn Abî Tâlib. We have once again grown powerful enough to proclaim the title of Caliph and our state as the successor to the Caliphate. God is Great!
translation: 汉志在初代四位哈里发：阿布.巴克尔.西迪克，奥马尔.本.哈塔卜，奥斯曼.本.阿凡，阿里.本.阿比塔利布领导下曾是伊斯兰世界的中心。我们再次成长到了足够强大去宣称哈里发的头衔并继承了哈里发政体。安拉胡阿克巴！

original: The Divya Upadesh laid out nine principles that formed the core of Nepali political and national life as well as guidelines for successful foreign policy. While it was not written until the 18th century, it encapsulated centuries of Nepali thoughts on governance, war and peace. Following these principles Nepal has been able to avoid the subversion of nearby Empires and the marauding Westerners.
translation: 奠定了迪夫亚的达摩波罗的九项原则,形成了尼泊尔政治和国民生活的核心以及成功的外交政策的指导方针.虽然它没有被书写出来,直到18世纪,它封装了几个世纪以来尼泊尔的想法与调节战争与和平的办法.遵循这些原则,尼泊尔一直能够避免附近的帝国和劫掠的西方人颠覆.
