original: Our people live and die without losing sight of the great peaks that surround us. We know the hills and mountains like the back of our hands. Even the Gods have settled at the heights. We shall always keep in mind the important lesson we have learned... build our forts to take advantage of the environment.
translation: 我们的人民生活和死亡在伟大的山峰上,这些山峰环绕我们的视线.我们应该回到我们手中的丘陵和山区.即使是众神纷纷落户高度.我们应始终保持记住我们所学到的重要一课,建立我们的堡垒和利用环境.

original: Nepal was united just before our time by Jayasthiti Malla (ruled from 1382-1395), who united the valleys, imposed order across them, and issued universal coinage. Not only a military master, Jayasthiti Malla drafted the first comprehensive codification of law in Nepal, based on the dharma of ancient Hindu texts. All the varied principalities and hill tribes will now heed our call.
translation: 尼泊尔团结之前,我们的由贾亚思提·马拉统治（统治从1382年至1395年）,他团结山谷,征收秩序,并发出普遍货币.不仅是军事的主人,贾亚思提·马拉还第一个在尼泊尔编纂全面的法律,在佛法的基础上用古老的印度教文本起草.现在所有的各种执政和山地的部落都能听到我们的呼声.

original: The Islamic invasions of the 14th century left widespread damage across the plains to the south, and many noble Rajput families have been deposed and fled to our mountains to try to re-establish themselves as landholders. Let us grant them land and harness their fighting experiences and warrior traditions.
translation: 14世纪伊斯兰入侵留下了广泛的破坏,他们越过平原到达南部,许多高尚的拉杰普特家庭已被驱赶,逃到山区尝试重新建立自己的地主家庭.让我们给予他们土地和利用他们的战斗经验和战士.

original: The Malla kings shored up their position by claiming to be reincarnations of the Hindu god Vishnu and establishing the cult of the Kumari, in which a young girl was designated a living embodiment of the Goddess of War, Durga, whose role it was to bless the Malla's rule during an annual celebration. After the Malla Kings fell, this tradition continued onwards with other dynasties in Nepal. Let us anoint a new Kumari to inspire our people!
translation: 马拉国王稳定了自己的位置,其中一个年轻的女孩自称是印度教大神毗湿奴的化身,并建立库马里崇拜,这种崇拜被指定为生活的办法,其作用是祝福：战争的女神杜尔加马拉的统治期间,有一年一度的庆祝活动.在马拉国王驾崩之后,这个传统一直延续下去直到在尼泊尔其他朝代.让我们建立一个新的库马里鼓舞我们的人民！

original: The Gurkhas are a tribal people mainly from the mid-western and eastern Nepali hills. They are fierce fighters and we have found that including them as irregulars with our armies brings us great success on the battlefield. Their name derives from the Hindu warrior-saint Guru Gorakhnath, and their war cry is Jaya Mahakali, Ayo Gorkhali! (Glory to Great Kali, The Gurkhas approach!) Eventually our Gurkhas' military prowess will be feared world over.
translation: 廓尔喀人主要来自尼泊尔中西部和东部的山地部落。他们是勇猛的战士，我们已经发现把他们编入作为非正式部队在战场上带来巨大的成功。他们的名声可以追溯到印度战神郭拉洽，他们的战吼是「Jaya Mahakali, Ayo Gorkhali!」（荣耀归于大卡利，廓尔喀人来了！）总有一天我们廓尔喀的军事力量会让全世界畏惧。

original: King Prithvi Narayan Shah (1723-1775) re-unified Nepal and picked off his enemies one-by-one by blockading trade routes and besieging valleys piece by piece. His military strategy proved effective in the hills and mountains of Nepal, keeping rival militaries starved for supplies and unable to coalesce into a force that could overwhelm him in a pitched battle.
translation: 国王普里特维·纳拉扬·沙阿（1723年至1775年）重新统一尼泊尔,一个接一个打败他的敌人通过封锁贸易路线和一块一块的围攻山谷.他的军事战略被证明是有效的,保持在丘陵和山区的尼泊尔对手的军队急需物资并且无法凝聚成一种力量,可以在酣战中压倒他们.

original: We have been driven from Acre and we have been driven from Cyprus, but the Order of the Hospital of St. John will retreat no further. In pagan times a Colossus stood sentinel over Rhodes' harbor, but today the greatest fortifications the world has ever known have taken up the guard.
translation: 我们被赶出阿卡，被驱逐出塞浦路斯，但圣若翰医院骑士团再也不会后退。在异教时代，一座巨像戍守着罗得岛海港，而如今我们便是守护此地的世界最坚固堡垒。

original: The Order is named the Knights Hospitaller for a reason: we were originally the protective force of a pilgrims' hospital in Jerusalem. Though Jerusalem is lost to the Saracens, we still provide medical aid to those in need, including our brave knights, who heartily return to the battlefield much faster than most armies.
translation: 骑士团被命名为医院骑士团的原因是：我们原来是一个耶路撒冷的朝圣者医院的保护者。即使耶路撒冷已经落入萨拉森人之手，我们仍会为包括我们英勇的骑士在内的所有人提供医疗服务，使他们能以十足状态，尽快回到战场上去。

original: There are members of the Order from all of Latin Christendom. Here a German voice, there a French song, everywhere a Latin prayer. Our men come from the lands of every crown in Latin Christendom and have an easier time asking them to help defend us against the Saracen foe.
translation: 骑士团的成员来自拉丁基督徒大家庭.这里传出德语的谈论,那里传来法语的歌曲,到处都有拉丁语的祈祷.我们的人来自拉丁基督教世界的每一片领土,并能够更简单的请求他们帮助我们抵御仇敌撒拉逊人.

original: In our frequent clashes with the dreaded corsairs of the Turkish and Barbary menaces, the thought has occurred to us that the corsairs might have the right idea about seagoing looting and pillaging of the coast, but that they are directing their predations to the wrong targets. Piracy may be a vile sin in peacetime, but in times of war it's known as 'privateering' and that's surely another thing altogether, right?
translation: 在我们与北非和土耳其的可怕的海盗的频繁冲突中,我们的思想开始改变：海盗可能拥有海轮抢劫的正确思维并掠夺海岸,但他们选错了目标.海盗可能在平时是一个卑鄙的罪恶行为,但战争时期它被称为'私掠船',这是毫无疑问是另一回事,难道不对吗？

original: The Reformation has harmed our cause as German and Scandinavian knights have started murmuring questions about the nature of the Communion Host, but the always-present threat of the Turk has a way of making such disputes seem minor. Perhaps we should focus on defending the realm and debate theology once the Saracen threat is safely at bay?
translation: 宗教改革损害了我们的事业,因为我们来自德国和斯堪的纳维亚的骑士已经开始叨咕关于圣饼性质的问题,但始终存在的土耳其人的威胁使得我们有办法让辩论变得不那么重要.也许我们可以专于防守并将辩论放在撒拉逊人对海湾的威胁消除以后吗？

original: The famed Turkish privateer Hayreddin Barbarossa fought many legendary encounters against the Knights, but Barbarossa was hardly the only corsair we've encountered. Turkish raiding and looting of all of southern Europe, tolerated by the Barbary states and funded by the Turks, must end. The Knights will do their job protecting innocent sailors at any cost.
translation: 著名的土耳其的私掠者巴巴罗萨？海雷丁帕夏与骑士团进行了多次传奇交锋,但他并不是我们唯一的海盗对手.土耳其人在北非国家的和土耳其的资助下袭击和抢劫所有的南欧国家,这必须结束.骑士团将不惜一切代价保护无辜的水手.

original: Knights of our Order were present in the wars against Saladin. Knights of our Order fought in defense of the last Outremer Crusader outpost, Acre. If any Knight of the Order needs inspiration to heroic deeds, he need look only at the deeds the Knights of the Order of the Hospital of St. John have accomplished in the past. The name Knights Hospitaller is truly eternal, as is our famed courage in battle.
translation: 我们的骑士团在对抗萨拉丁人的战斗中组建，我们的骑士团在十字军最后的据点阿卡城英勇抵抗。如果骑士团的任何骑士需要英雄事迹的灵感，他只需要看看圣若翰医院骑士团过去所完成的一切。医院骑士团的名字是真正永恒的，就像我们在战斗中盛名卓著的勇气一样。

original: Rather than unreliable tax farming, why not just directly tax the middleman? The aristocrats tax the peasants, we tax the aristocrats. They can either pay up in kind through livestock and agricultural tribute, or pay in our ancient currency of nzimbu, valuable cowry shells.
translation: 比起不可靠的农业税,为什么不直接向中间人纳税？贵族收农民的税,我们收贵族的,他们既可以用实物支付的方式通过牲畜和农产品支付,也可以用我们古代的壳币支付

original: Our leader, the Mwene Kongo, or as the foreigners on our shores address him, the Manikongo, was selected by a committee of elders who could have chosen any member of his family. Other countries may rely on customs like primogeniture, but our way makes sure there's an heir available, even if the old ruler's son might occasionally resent the slight of not ascending to the throne.
translation: 我们的领袖,姆韦内·刚果,或我们海岸边外国人所称呼的刚果王,是由一个长老委员会从家族成员中选出.其他国家可能依赖长子继承制的风俗,但我们的方式确保我们有一个继承人,尽管老王的儿子偶尔会因为无法登基而不满

original: The Europeans have come to us, but many of their customs do not interest us. Powerful though they may be, we have no need for their laws. However, we do have need of their firearms. Let us trade in order to replace our people's traditional bows and arrows with a new tradition, muskets.
translation: 欧洲人到来,但我们对他们的习俗不感兴趣.尽管他们可能是强大的,我们不需要他们的法律.尽管如此,我们确实需要的枪支.让我们交易火枪以取代我国人民的传统弓和箭.

original: There's nothing a crowned sovereign enjoys more than exchanging word with the exotic ruler of a distant land, a land too far to be a natural adversary. Perhaps our distant correspondents can protect us from other, more avaricious foreign monarchs.
translation: 没有什么比与远在天边的异国统治者外交更让王朝统治者感兴趣的了,那片土地实在太远,难以成为天然的对手,也许我们的遥远的朋友们可以帮助我们抵御其他更为贪婪的外国君主.

original: The triangle trade brings guns to us, takes slaves from us to the Americas, and brings agricultural goods from the Americas back to Europe. Those guns allow us to conquer more rival tribes and gain even more captives to sell to the Europeans to give us the funds to buy even more guns! Some have said that the triangle trade is immoral, but they'll change their tune when they see our new muskets and how many more slaves we can capture with them and how many more muskets we can purchase with the proceeds.
translation: 三角贸易给我们带来枪支,把我们的奴隶送到美洲,从美洲带回欧洲农产品.这些枪使我们能够战胜对手部落并获得更多的奴隶以提供我们资金以购买更多的枪！有人说,三角贸易是不道德的行为,但当他们看到我们的新的火枪和我们俘获的奴隶与我们能购买的火枪后,他们会改变主意的.

original: Every once in a while, a disquieting report surfaces that overzealous Europeans have kidnapped one of our noblemen and sent him to a fate worse than death, a horrifying voyage in shackles and a short, gruesome life in a sugar plantation. Let's take steps to keep the Europeans satisfied with our supply of foreign captives to keep our own people safe from the horrors of slavery. If we keep conducting these slave raids on the other tribes of Africa, it will keep our own people safe and bring in the revenue to keep our kingdom strong and our own people out of the chains.
translation: 曾经有一段时间,一个令人不安的报告显示狂热的欧洲人绑架了我们的一位贵族之后,让他生不如死,在经过一个可怕的航程之后,将他束缚在一个甘蔗种植园里,过着一种可怕的生活.让我们采取一些措施以让欧洲人满意,我们向欧洲人不断提供外国俘虏,以保持我们自己的人民的安全,从奴隶制的恐怖.如果我们继续袭击其他非洲部落获得俘虏,这将保持我们自己的人民的安全,并为我们带来可观收入,进而保持我们的王国强大和我们自己的人民的安全.

original: We have attempted to peacefully deal with multiple European nations in hopes that their good relations with us would keep the others from conquering us, but one of the lions circling us might someday bite. We must strengthen our army if we want any hope of repelling the Europeans if war someday comes.
translation: 我们试图以和平方式处理与各个欧洲国家的关系以避免他们侵略我们,但围绕在我们周围的群狮总有一只某天会咬人.如果某天战争爆发我们想要击退欧洲人,那么必须加强我们的军队.

original: All those politicians, soldiers and diplomats who played an influential role in establishing their nation, by winning their country's independence and creating a new system of governance.
translation: 那些政客,军人和外交官们通过赢得国家的独立和建立了新的管理系统在成立他们自己的国家时发挥了重要作用.

original: While the New World colonies had to import a lot of manufactored products, they also became a major supplier of raw materials for the European market.
translation: 然而新大陆的殖民地不得不大量进口制造业产品,他们也成为了欧洲市场的主要原料供应商.

original: Spreading Christianity in the New World by converting the indigenous peoples was a priority of especially the Catholic Church, and often went hand-in-hand with commercial interests in the process of colonizing the New World.
translation: 通过使当地土著皈依基督教从而在新大陆传播基督教是天主教会的优先工作，并且在殖民新大陆的过程中这常伴随着商业利益。

original: The ideas that freedom of thought and freedom of speech is the right of every man were strong in the colonies. That without it there could be no such thing as public liberty.
translation: 思想和言论自由的理念在殖民地是根深蒂固的.没有它就没有什么公众自由可言.

original: In the absence of regular garrisons, colonial militias played an important role in local conflicts and border raids against native tribes and other colonies. Made up of adult male citizens who often were expected to provide their own weapons and equipment.
translation: 在没有正规军的情况下,殖民地民兵——由被期望于自己提供自己的武器装备的成年的男性公民们组成,在当地冲突和土著们以及其他殖民者们对边境的袭击中发挥了重要作用.

original: The movement to push the colonial frontier further and further inland in the New World, by establishing everything from small trade stations to full settlements with large areas of cultivated land.
translation: 通过小贸易站建立的大面积农耕土地的全面定居点，使新大陆的殖民地边境向着内陆越推越远。

original: Many of the leaders of the New World independence wars did not only possess the necessary military skill but also the charisma needed to encourage morale and hold together the army and being an inspirational leader for the people.
translation: 很多新大陆独立战争的领导人们不只具备必要的军事技能，他们也拥有鼓舞士气的人格魅力，使军队紧紧地团结在一起并成为他们的精神领袖。

original: We have been granted considerable self rule by our Suzerain, allowing us to more efficiently handle local matters before they turn into a problem.
translation: 我们已经从宗主国那里得到了相当大的自治权，这使我们能在地方事务变成一个问题之前相当有效的处理掉它。W

original: Our sheriffs are foreigners who can ignore many of the restrictions imposed on tax collection by the local elite. This allows us to raise more revenue.
translation: 我们的郡守是外国人，他们可以忽视很多当地精英强加给关于税收的限制。这允许我们得到更多的财政收入。

original: Our nation is a fortified border against our Suzerain's enemies, who has invested a great deal into our fortifications to ensure that they can resist modern artillery.
translation: 我们的国家是对抗我们宗主国的敌人的强化边境，那些敌人投入了投入了大量兵力的以确保他们能对抗我们的近代炮兵构筑的防御要塞。

original: Our nation enjoys extensive privileges in controlling border traffic and customs dues, allowing us to exercise more control over the trade flowing through our lands.
translation: 我们的国家享有控制边境的交通和海关费的大量特权，使我们可以更好的支配那些通过我们土地的贸易路线。

original: The cities of our nation are home to many recruitment centers where our suzerain raises mercenaries to fight their wars. We can benefit from this by using some of those mercenaries for our own army.
translation: 我们国家的城市是我们宗主国募集为他们打仗的雇佣兵的募兵中心。我们可以通过利用一部分雇佣兵为自己作战而从中受益。

original: By handing out estate to foreign nobles willing to move to our nation we can create an aristocracy that is loyal to our own interests and increase our agricultural revenues.
translation: 通过分发财富让外国贵族愿意到我们的国家来，我们可以创建一个忠于我们自己利益的贵族阶级并提高我们的农业收入。

original: By taking in advisors from our Suzerain's court we can learn how better to administrate our own nation.
translation: 通过从我们的宗主国那里得到顾问，我们可以学习如何更好地管理我们自己的国家。

original: The Mali Empire has always been a decentralized affair, a collection of towns pledging loyalty to a Mansa with the Mansa's main duties to protect the routes between them and to defend them against bandits, raiders, and invaders. Some of our vassals have sensed blood in the water and used our period of weakness in the early 15th century to end all pretense of vassaldom. We must first remind them of the Mansa's rightful authority if we want our Empire to regain its former glory.
translation: 马里帝国的统治一直极为松散,城镇忠诚于曼萨是因为曼萨保护他们之间的贸易线,使他们免受土匪,强盗,和侵略者的袭击.我们的一些附庸背弃了忠诚,并在15世纪初我们虚弱的时候,不再对我们的效忠.首先,我们必须提醒他们曼萨的合法权力,如果我们希望我们的帝国恢复其昔日的辉煌的话.

original: The twin gold fields at Bambuk and Bure are renowned as the largest gold deposits anyone has ever heard of, and they are ours. Bure goldmines produce fantastic wealth that famously destabilized the entire economy of Egypt through inflation when Mansa Musa visited there. Our economy, though, is used to a constant influx of gold and is more difficult to inflate.
translation: 班布克和布雷两大黄金产地被誉为全球最大的黄金储地,他们是我们的.布雷金矿产生梦幻般的财富,当曼萨穆萨携带大量黄金参观埃及之后,动摇了埃及整个经济体系,使其通货膨胀不断上升.不过,我们的经济,由于有不断涌入的黄金,是很难发生通胀的.

original: The Sahara doesn't stay in one place...it can wax and wane depending on rainfall, and the habitable belt known as the Sahel we reside in can grow or shrink accordingly. A major drought could render much of our kingdom useless desert, an addition to the Sahara where no one reigns but death. However, in good years, we might reclaim some of the marginal land from the Sahara and make it productive again.
translation: 撒哈拉不会停留在一个地方...她的兴衰取决于降雨,萨赫勒地区中我们的可居住地带会相应增大或缩小.一场大旱可能使我们的王国许多土地变为沙漠,除了死亡不会有任何东西.然而在好的年份中,我们可能从撒哈拉那里重新获得一些土地,并使其再次可以开垦.

original: Whether pagan or Muslim, Mandinka men have been the greatest fighters the Sahel has ever seen. The courage of our troops is admirable, as is their pride. When the Mansa raises an army, not only is it the largest in all the Sahel, its the best.
translation: 无论是异教或穆斯林,曼丁卡的男人一直萨赫勒见过的最伟大的战士.我们的军队的勇气是值得钦佩的,是他们的骄傲.当曼萨征集军队的时候,不仅大部分人员来源于萨赫勒地区,最好的也是萨赫勒地区的.
阿布巴卡里二世的失落舰队

original: Around 1312, the Mansa Abubakari II left his throne to sail on an exploration for the limits of the ocean. Neither he nor his fleet were ever seen again, much to the relief of his successor, Mansa Musa. As Abubakari once thought, perhaps there is value to seeing the limits of the ocean. Unlike when he tried it, though, this time the Mansa will stay home.
translation: 大约1312年，曼萨阿布巴卡里二世离开他的王座上开始了海上航行,探索无限的海洋.无论是他还是他的船队再也没有出现过,他的继任者曼萨穆萨对此大感欣慰.正如阿布巴卡里曾经以为,看到海洋的边界是极有意义的.不过,这一次和他当时的尝试不同,曼萨将留在家里.

original: In our kingdom, salt is worth its price in gold. South of us, in the great forests of the Ashanti and the Yoruba, salt is worth considerably more than gold. Luckily for us, we have our own supplies of salt and enough gold to obtain an endless supply of it. Perhaps we could find yet more markets of people for whom salt is more valuable than gold?
translation: 在我们的国度,盐是与黄金等价.我们南方,阿散蒂和约鲁巴的大森林中,盐的价值大大超过了黄金.我们很幸运,我们有自己的食盐供应和足够的黄金来获得源源不绝的食盐.也许我们可以在盐是比黄金更宝贵的地方找到更多的市场.

original: Even before our Empire existed, the great Wagadou, the Ghanan Empire that preceded us, sold slaves across the desert to the Arabs, and we have followed suit all these years, supplying the Arab world with a vast amount of slaves. Now the Europeans clamor for a yet greater number of slaves to work in their holdings in the so-called New World. We've had little report, but the amount of slaves they demand is truly stunning and they keep coming back, sometimes even raiding our shores and abducting our subjects. The time has come to impose order on the slave trade and restrict the Europeans to select commercial ports where they will purchase, not steal, slaves.
translation: 在我们的帝国存在之前，旧加纳帝国伟大的瓦加督，穿越沙漠出售奴隶给阿拉伯人，我们这些年来纷纷效仿，向阿拉伯世界提供了大量的奴隶。现在欧洲人要求更大数量的奴隶，带去他们所谓的新大陆。我们获得的小道消息显示，要求的奴隶数量相当惊人，并且不断有需求。有时甚至会袭击我们的海岸和绑架我们的人民。是时候制定奴隶贸易的秩序和限制的欧洲人在哪些港口买奴隶，而不是抢奴隶。

original: Each clan should be under the protection of an animal totem, better describing each clan's place within our society.
translation: 每个部落都应该在一个动物图腾的保护之下,以更好地描述每个部落的社交地盘.

original: Rather than engaging in warfare against one another, we should encourage our people to direct their energies toward a ceremonial game using many of the rituals of warfare, but where the aim is to control a ball with sticks.
translation: 与其在战争中互相对抗,我们应当鼓励我们的人把他们的精力直接放在有很多战争仪式的礼节游戏上,但其目的还是为了用球棒控制球.

original: We should heed the wisdom of the mothers of our clans, who tend the fields. Let them have a voice in the governing of the tribe and the choosing of our leaders!
translation: 我们应该注意到部落母亲——照料着我们的领地的人的智慧.让他们在部落的统治阶层中有所建言并选取我们的领袖!

original: By recognizing certain acts on the battlefield as 'coups' worthy of retelling and celebration, we can encourage our young men to show greater bravery as they, too, attempt to win fame and glory.
translation: 通过承认在战场上值得复述和庆祝的某些行为——'政变',我们可以鼓励我们的年轻人们展示更大的勇气,因为他们也试图赢得名誉和荣耀.

original: As duties are divided among the people, we should also look to establish a tradition of chiefs who are solely responsible for matters of warfare, and who can in turn quickly gather the best warriors of our people.
translation: 由于职能在不同的人之中分散开来,我们应当建立一个传统的单独负责战争冲突的职位,并任命一位可以快速的集结起我们最好的战士的长官.

original: By honoring and respecting our great storytellers, we can ensure that the traditions and ideas of our people are passed down from generation to generation.
translation: 通过认同并尊重我们的吟游诗人,我们可以确保我们人民的传统和理念代代流传.

original: When the bitter cold comes to our land, our villages and fields can no longer provide for us. At that time, we must remain mobile in search of hunting grounds where we may yet find food.
translation: 当严寒降临我们的土地,村庄和田野就不再能提供食物给我们.在那个时候我们必须持续迁移来找到也许还能提供给我们食物的猎场.

original: By using lighter birchbark canoes rather than the heavier elm-wood canoes of our Iroquois cousins, we can better take advantage of the waterways and portage of North America, greatly expanding our ability to direct the flow of trade.
translation: 通过使用较轻的桦皮独木舟而不是我们的易洛魁表兄弟们用的那种较重的榆木独木舟,我们可以更好地利用北美的水路及陆路运输,极大地扩展了我们的直接贸易流量.

original: It is tradition among our people that the dead cannot be interred in the communal burial pit until a Feast of the Dead is held. Then, and only then, can they reach the land beyond where the sun sets. We should safeguard this ceremony at all cost.
translation: 除非举行亡魂节否则死者不能被埋葬在集体墓穴,这是我们人民的传统.也只有这样,死者们才能到达超越太阳落下的土地.我们应当不惜一切代价维护这个仪式.

original: We should not tolerate murder or other crimes amidst our people. Those who would do so should not only be killed in turn, but should be left to starve, or suffer some equally painful punishment.
translation: 我们不应该容忍那些杀人犯或者其他罪人们混在我们的人民之中.他们应该同样被赋予死的制裁,或者让他们挨饿,遭受其他同等痛苦的惩罚.

original: We occupy a unique position at the crossroad of many trade paths, between a great number of tribes. We should leverage this position to become the expert traders of North America.
translation: 我们占据着许多部落的贸易路径十字口这个独一无二的地理位置.我们可以利用地理位置成为北美的专业贸易员.

original: There are those who would come into our land to preach the faith of their people and tell us more of their world. It would be wise of us to welcome them, and let those who would listen to them listen.
translation: 有人会进入我们的土地来传播他们的信仰并告诉我们更多他们的世界的事情.欢迎他们并聆听他们的话语是一个明智的选择.

original: We should make up for our want of numbers by using our diplomatic influence to convince villages of friendly tribes to lend us some of their warriors.
translation: 我们应该通过外交影响说服那些友好部落的村庄们借给我们一些他们的战士以达到我们所希望的人数.

original: Thanks to our unique position as middlemen, we have the opportunity to establish ourselves as leaders among any alliance in North America! We should seize that opportunity at all cost!
translation: 由于我们独一无二的中间商地位,我们有机会建立在北美我们自己作为领导人的任何联盟!我们应当不惜一切代价抓住这个机会!

original: We must always honor the great gift of Hiawatha and the Great Peacemaker, the Great Law of Peace, which united our five nations under a single purpose, and gave us our rules of governance.
translation: 我们必须永远铭记和平使者海华沙的伟大功绩,在大和平法案之下我们五个国家为了一个目标团结在了一起,并且拥有了统治的规则.

original: To the west, the Seneca guard us against intrusion from our enemies. They are by far the most numerous members of our confederacy, and we should tap these numbers to allow ourselves to field greater armies.
translation: 在西方,塞内卡保护我们免受敌人入侵.到目前为止他们拥有联盟中最多的人口,我们应该利用这些人口让自己得到更强大的军队.

original: To the east, the Mohawk stand astride the great rivers leading to the sea and are in position to allow or prevent other tribes from trading. We should leverage this position to our economic benefit.
translation: 在东方,莫霍克横跨在通向大海的大河的有利位置,从而允许或组织其他部落的交易.我们应该利用这个位置是我们的经济受益.

original: At the very heart of our land, the Onondaga keep the flame alive. We should maintain a tradition of choosing our leader, the Tadodaho, from among their people, for they are the masters of compromise between the Eastern and Western halves of our people.
translation: 在我们土地的心脏地带,奥内达加保存着生命的火焰.我们应在选择我们的领袖时保持传统,在他们的人中选择塔杜达霍,因为他们是东部人民和西部人民的调解大师.

original: It is a long-established tradition of our people to adopt captured warriors in the tribe. But to replenish our numbers and ensure our ability to conquers, we should seek to adopt not only individual warriors, but entire tribes among the Iroquois.
translation: 接受被俘获的战士是我们的人民的一个历史悠久的传统.但是为了补充我们的成员以确保我们的征服能力,我们不应该只是接受个别的战士,而是应该接受易洛魁人的整个部落.

original: We may not be the largest tribe in terms of number, but our strong tribal structures grant us something others lack: unity! Our warriors fight as brothers, and stand together on the field of battle. So long as we maintain this tradition, we cannot lose!
translation: 我们可能不是在数量上最大的部落,但是我们有力的部落结构给予了我们一些其他部落没有的东西:团结!我们的战士像兄弟一样在战场上并肩作战.只要我们坚守着这一传统我们就不会失败!

original: We should delegate some of our chiefs to visit the far-away home of our friends and allies, thereby strengthening that friendship.
translation: 我们应该委任一些官员们访问那些距离我们家园遥远的朋友和盟友们,从而加强友谊.

original: Before us, there lived in these land a people who built great mound-cities. They are gone now, but their mounds remain, and we can gain much from studying and using them for the construction of our own town.
translation: 在我们之前,这里生活着建造了那些巨大山丘城市的人们.现在他们已经都消失了,但是他们的山丘城市却还保存着,我们在建设自己的城市时可以从中学习借鉴很多.

original: Before us, there lived in these land a people who built great mound-cities. They are gone now, but their mounds remain, and we can gain much from studying and using them for the construction of our own town.
translation: 在我们之前,这里生活着建造了那些巨大山丘城市的人们.现在他们已经都消失了,但是他们的山丘城市却还保存着,我们在建设自己的城市时可以从中学习借鉴很多.

original: Before us, there lived in these land a people who built great mound-cities. They are gone now, but their mounds remain, and we can gain much from studying and using them for the construction of our own town.
translation: 在我们之前,这里生活着建造了那些巨大山丘城市的人们.现在他们已经都消失了,但是他们的山丘城市却还保存着,我们在建设自己的城市时可以从中学习借鉴很多.

original: Those enemies who dare to venture in our lands must never be able to rest. We must strike while they attempt to sleep, damage their supplies, and ensure that they leave our land never to return.
translation: 那些敢于进入我们的土地的敌人必须永远无法安心休整!我们必须在他们试图睡觉时袭击他们,破坏他们的供给,确保他们离开我们的土地之后永远不会再回来.

original: We are powerful, and we are deadly warriors, but we have few trade goods in our lands. Our neighbors, however, are always willing to pay for captives to put to work. By raiding enemies and taking captives to sell, we can greatly increase our wealth.
translation: 我们是强壮而致命的战士,但是我们的土地却几乎没有贸易商品.然而我们的邻居们总是很乐意购买奴隶让他们去工作.通过突袭敌人以抓获俘虏出售,我们可以极大地增加财富.

original: The Swan Feather Mantle is a mark of great prestige among our people. We should ensure that our chiefs always earn them!
translation: 天鹅绒斗篷是我们的人民中极致威望的标志.我们应该确保我们的首领们总是拥有它们!
密西西比河下游的斯巴达人

original: Travelers in our lands tell us of an ancient realm who valued military prowess above all other mark of status, as we do. We must strive so that in the future, our name is likewise remembered!
translation: 在我们的土地上的旅行者们告诉我们有一个和我们一样比起其他国家都更重视军事力量的古老的王国.我们必须奋斗以便在将来我们的名字也同样被铭记!
未被征服的和不可征服的

original: We must never surrender our land, regardless of how many efforts others make to claim them.
translation: 不管其他人多么努力的宣称我们的土地,我们也决不放弃自己的土地.

original: In our traditional homeland, the fortified city of Ackia guards the paths leading to our other settlements. We should always strive to remember this, and to install powerful fortified cities where they can deny enemies access to our homeland.
translation: 在我们传统的家园里,阿卡亚的要塞城市守卫着通向我们其他定居点的道路.我们应当总是努力铭记这些,并更加加固那些可以阻止敌人进入我们家园的要塞城市.

original: Adopting a more tolerant view towards the minority religions in our country will greatly increase our religious unity.
translation: 通过对少数民族的宗教更加容忍的意见可以极大地增加我们的宗教团结程度.

original: By being more careful in selecting and educating our diplomats, we will greatly increase our chance to exert our influence and establish a favorable position in other countries.
translation: 通过更加慎重的选择和教育我们的外交官,可以极大地提高我们发挥自己的影响力和在其他国家中建立一个有利地位的机会.

original: We must never forget the corrupt priesthood we once allowed to rule over us, and we must never forget the battles we fought to destroy them. Let us never allow such a group to reign over us again.
translation: 我们必须永不忘记那些我们曾一度允许统治我们的腐败的祭祀们,我们也必须永不忘记我们摧毁他们的那些战斗.让我们决不允许这样的集团再次统治我们.

original: By organizing the younger, more war-like member of the tribe under the leadership of a Red Chief, assisted by scouts, medicine men and a war council drawn from the seven clans, we can greatly enhance our ability to muster in times of war.
translation: 通过在红色酋长的领导下组织部落里那些更好战的年轻人,辅以侦察兵,医务人员和从七个部落中选拔出的战争委员会,我们可以极大地增强战争时期我们的征召能力.

original: As we grow, we will encounter many new people and new ideas. We must never close ourselves to those ideas, but instead we must seek to integrate them within the working of our people, improving government, methods of warfare and even methods of communications.
translation: 随着我们的成长,我们会遇到很多新的人,新的理念.我们决不能否认这些理念,反而应该吸收其为己所用,改善我们的政府,战争方式甚至是通讯方式.

original: Sometimes, women step outside their normal roles and distinguish themselves on the field of battle. These women should be appointed to the rank of Beloved Women, or Ghigau, given a voting seat on the Council of Chiefs, and given responsibility over the fate of prisoners of war.
translation: 有时候,有些女人们会在战场上和他们平时的在外的形象区分开来.这些女人们应当被委任为战争主母,在酋长委员会中享有投票席位,并且给予她们终结战俘的命运的责任.

original: Our position, at the heart of a land of mountains and narrow passes, makes it difficult for enemies to reach our land and conquer our towns.
translation: 我们的位置在山区的中心地带,道路只有狭窄的小路,这使得敌人很难抵达我们的土地征服我们的村庄.

original: By electing one of our chiefs as our representative among foreigners, we can great enhance our ability to negotiate and reach agreements with them.
translation: 通过选举一名外国人作为我们的酋长代表,我们可以极大地增加和他们谈判并达成协议的能力.

original: Your Main Trade City is already located in this node.
translation: 你的主要贸易城市已经处于这个节点.

original: You can only move your trading port to a full city.
translation: 你只能把你的贸易本埠移动到一个完全的城市.

original: You can only move your trading port to a core province.
translation: 你只能把你的贸易本埠移动到一个核心省份.

original: You cannot move your trading port when at war.
translation: 你不能在战争期间移动你的贸易本埠.

original: You need §Y$POWER$§!£dip to move your trading port.
translation: 你需要§Y$POWER$§!外交点数来移动你的贸易本埠.

original: You need to own and control $NAME|Y$ to move your trading port to it.
translation: 你需要拥有并控制$NAME|Y$才能迁移贸易站到此处.

original: The Duchy of Kurland is established on the lands of Schwertbrüderorden, the Livonian Brothers of the Sword. Our first duke was the Grandmaster and our nobility, the knights of the Order. The noble converted to Protestantism and the Order secularized, but the Christian Knights' fortress stands firmly.
translation: 在利沃尼亚骑士们,也就是利沃尼亚宝剑骑士团的土地上库尔兰公国成立了.我们的第一任公爵是骑士团的领袖和贵族.他改信了新教并且让骑士团世俗化了,但是基督教的骑士城堡依然巍然屹立.

original: While our people are mainly Latvians, the majority of our ruling class is, however, German. Hence it becomes a necessity to ensure the power of our nobles. The privilege issued by Gotthard Kettler the first duke of Kurland and Semigallia allows our landholders to enserf the native peasantry on their lands and grants them a high juridical power, this shall strengthen our authority effectively.
translation: 虽然我们的人民大多是拉脱维亚人,然而我们的统治阶层却大多是德国人.因此确保我们的贵族权利就变得十分必要.库尔兰和瑟米利亚公国的第一任公爵哥特哈特·凯特列尔颁布了一项特权,允许我们的土地所有者使当地农民变成奴隶并且给予了他们高司法权,这将有效的增加我们的权威.

original: Our country may be small, but definitely not insignificant, the Duchy of Kurland was among the most important trading states around the Baltic Sea. We should push this one step further. By promoting the Mercantilist policy, we can forge our nation into a true power in the region!
translation: 我们的国家虽小,但绝不是无足轻重,库尔兰公国是波罗的海诸国中最重要的贸易国之一.但我们应当走的更远.通过推行重商主义政策,我们可以让我们的国家在该地区获得绝对性的力量!

original: The flourishing mercantilism and a successful agriculture contribute to the development of industry. We may not be the world's factory, but our products are all over Europe - we can produce anchors and cannons, prepared bricks and tiles, glass and cloth and even more, ships built in Goldingen, Libau and Windau are sold in England and France. Such a prospering economy will certainly be only good for us...
translation: 繁荣的制造业和成功的农业有助于工业的发展.我们也许不是世界工厂,但我们的产品遍布欧洲——我们可以生产链锚和大炮,制备砖瓦,玻璃,布匹甚至更多.我们的船建造于戈丁根,里堡和温道并被销于英法.这样繁荣的经济对我们来说肯定只有好处...

original: The discovery of the New World has brought changes that cannot be ignored on our continent. This is an age of opportunity and we must not fall behind! With our wealth we can support a considerable fleet, which is the key of exploration and colonization and thus guarantee our interests overseas and the prosperity of our whole country.
translation: 新大陆的发现为我们的大陆带来了无法忽略的改变。这是一个充满机遇的时代，我们必须不能落后!当我们的财富可以支撑起一个庞大的舰队时，那便是探索和殖民的关键，从而保证我们的海外利益和整个国家的繁荣。

original: Mitau Palace is the largest Baroque style manor in the Baltic States, alongside the summer palace in Ruhenthal, they are also probably the most impressive palaces in the region. Designed by the famous architect Bartolomeo Rastrelli, these magnificient buildings shall of course bring us some good fame.
translation: 米陶宫是波罗的海诸国最大的巴洛克风格庄园,在瑞内佛尔的夏宫旁边,他们也许是该地区最令人印象深刻的宫殿.它由著名建筑师巴尔托洛梅奥·拉斯特列利设计,当然,这些宏伟的建筑会为我们带来一些好的名声.

original: The Curonian Kings are the descendants of the ancient Curonian chiefs. Back to the ages of Livonian Order, they enjoyed a series of privilege and served in the army during war times. After the foundation of the Duchy, they lost some of their privileges and are pushed back from the military service. Maybe we should re-promote them again, so that our country can make the best use of these descendants of fierce warriors.
translation: 库尔兰国王卫队是古代库尔兰酋长的后代们组成的.回顾利沃尼亚骑士团时代,他们享有一系列的特权并在战争期间在军中服役.公国成立之后,他们失去了一些特权并从军中归来.也许我们应该重组他们了,使我们的国家可以最好的利用这些凶猛的战士们的后代.

original: Governing a large nation means ruling over many diverse peoples, each with their own customs and traditions. By incorporating these traditions into our official code of laws we create a happy and loyal populace.
translation: 管理一个大的领土意味着管理很多拥有着自己的习俗和传统的不同民族.通过把这些传统整合到我们官方的法典中我们可以得到一批幸福又忠诚的子民.

original: Sometimes the best way to get people to do what you want is to let them believe that they're making their own choices. Such a system of indirect rule will reduce the unrest in newly acquired provinces.
translation: 有时候让民众去做你想让他们做的事情的最好办法就是让他们相信他们正在做他们自己的选择.像这种间接统治的系统将减少新获得的领土的动乱.

original: Different cultures have different customs, and for some reason tend to resist attempts from above to change said customs. We can turn this weakness into a strength by incorporating local leaders into our system of government and having them carry out our will in a way that is palatable to them.
translation: 不同的文化有不同的习俗,出于某种原因,当我们试图改变这种习俗时会受到抵制.通过一个他们乐意接受的方式——将当地领导合并到我们的管理体系中并让他们执行我们的意志,我们可以把这个弱点转化为力量.

original: Our nation is a bastion of tolerance and enlightenment. By ensuring that all other nations know this, we can foster better relations abroad.
translation: 我国是一个容忍和启蒙的堡垒.通过确保其他国家知道这一点,我们可以培养更好的国际关系.

original: Inheritance can be a tricky business. By clearly defining roles and rights for our dynasty through Cadet Branches, we can ensure a more stable line of succession.
translation: 继承问题可是一件棘手的事情，通过建立次子分之来明确界定我们王朝的规则与权利，这样我们就可确保一系列更加稳定的继承。

original: Strengthen our income by establishing a formalized system of yearly tribute from our vassals.
translation: 通过建立一个正式的封臣每年朝贡体系可以加强我们的收入.

original: By bringing the ruling elite of our subject nations into our government we can smoothen the process of integrating their provinces significantly.
translation: 通过将服从我们的国家的统治阶层的精英整合到我们的政府中我们可以平滑而效果显著的整合他们的领土.

original: As with a man, a nation's reputation is everything, and the establishment of an official propaganda service will ensure our good name is not smeared by the lies of our enemies.
translation: 作为一个人,国家的声望就是一切,建立一个官方的宣传服务可以确保我们的好名声不被敌人的谎言所玷污.

original: With communications being what they are, it is difficult to ensure that our diplomatic dispatches arrive in a timely fashion. Creating a network of post offices and courier rest stops will make it easier for our voice to be heard in distant lands.
translation: 让通讯设施保持原状的话很难确保我们的外交急件及时送达.创建一个邮局和快递休息站的网络将会使我们的声音在偏远地区更容易被听到.

original: By granting considerable autonomy to vassals in border regions, these 'Marcher Lords' will be able to raise large military armies to support us in our wars.
translation: 通过给予那些在边界的封臣们高度自治权,这些'边界领主'们将会在战争时能够让我们征召很多军队.

original: By teaching our naval officers to lead boarding actions against enemy ships, we can gain an edge in naval combat even when fighting superior enemy fleets.
translation: 通过教导我们的海军军官去领导登上敌船的行动,我们甚至在面对优秀的敌方舰队时也能取得优势.

original: The concept of outfitting warships with rams goes back thousands of years, but great advancements in metallurgy have been made since then and we should take advantage of these to create sturdier rams.
translation: 舾装军舰上的金属撞角的历史可以追溯到数千年前，然而相较那时冶金已经有了长远的进步，我们应当利用这个优势并建造出更坚固的撞角。

original: By promoting the navy as the career choice of the nobility's second and third sons, we can create a professional corps of naval officers to oversee our gunnery crews.
translation: 通过晋升那些选择了海军作为职业生涯的贵族的次子及三子们,我们可以创建一个专业的海军军官团来监督我们的射击人员。

original: Wood may be the ideal material for shipbuilding, but it has a tendency to deteriorate over time. By fitting our ships with copper sheathing below the waterline we can reduce this deterioration, allowing them to better withstand long journeys.
translation: 木材也许是造船的理想材料,但它会随着时间的推移逐渐恶化.通过给我们的船在水线下装配铜的保护壳,我们可以减少这种恶化,使它们能够更好地承受长途旅行.

original: Corvettes were a class of small warships that were designed to escort friendly vessels and harrass the enemy, relying on speed and maneuverability rather than massed firepower.
translation: 轻护卫舰是一类被设计用来护送友方船只和骚扰敌军的小型军舰,它们依靠速度和机动性而不是集中的火力.

original: By establishing a national arsenal where our warships can be built and maintained according to uniform standards, we can field a larger navy.
translation: 通过建立一个可以根据统一标准建造和维护战舰的国家兵工厂,我们可以调遣更大规模的海军.

original: By conscripting our able young men for our garrisons we can ensure that we have enough men to defend our borders.
translation: 通过征召年轻人作为守军,我们可以拥有足够的边境守卫力量.

original: Investing more resources into our supply trains will allow our army to operate for longer periods of time in hostile land.
translation: 投入更多的资源在供给列车上可以让我们的军队在敌对领土上活动更长的时间.

original: It is an unfortunate fact that ships tend to be damaged during battle, and equally unfortunate that the damage is rarely able to be repaired at sea. To alleviate this problem we will create a system of sheltered ports along our coastline where our ships can patch themselves up.
translation: 船舶往往在争斗中被损坏是一个不幸的事实,而且同样不幸的是这些损坏很少能在海上进行修复.为了缓解这个问题,我们应该创造一个在我们的海岸线上可以修补船只的避风港系统.

original: Through the establishment of a professional Diplomatic Corps we ensure that the hard-learned lessons of senior diplomats are passed on to the younger generation.
translation: 通过建立专业的外交使节团,我们可以确保老一辈的外交官总结出来的经验传给年轻一点.

original: By establishing a Civil Service of eager young bureaucrats will ensure that we are able to quickly adapt to new advances in administration and governance.
translation: 通过建立一个由年轻又野心勃勃的官僚们组成的行政部门可以确保我们快速适应管理和统治的新进度.

original: Giving our cities self-governance in matters of trade will allow us to open new, profitable trade routes.
translation: 在贸易方面交给我们的城邦自治将使我们打开新的有利可图的贸易路线。

original: Establish a state-sanctioned Inquisition to maintain the religious purity of our populace by rooting out heretics and blasphemers.
translation: 建立一个通过铲除异教徒和亵渎者的国家批准的异端审问会来保持我们的人民的宗教纯洁性.

original: Many would consider controlling the hills and jungles of Gondwana, Jharkhand and the Garjats a daunting task and it is true that holding our realm together isn't always easy.\nThe key to doing so lies in controlling and maintaining the many little forts that dot these regions.\nBy securing the loyalty of the chieftains in control of these forts, and making sure they have what they need to keep them in good shape, we can be sure to be able to resist even quite powerful enemies.
translation: 许多人会认为控制冈瓦纳，贾坎德邦和戈杰特的山丘和丛林是一项艰巨的任务，事实上，把我们的王国境内牢牢掌控的确并不容易。\n能做到这些的关键是控制和维护住遍布各个地区的小堡垒。\n通过确保首领们的忠诚以确保这些堡垒的控制权，并确保他们所需是他们保持良好状态，我们可以肯定抵抗想当强大的敌人。

original: The belief system of our people is diverse and perhaps a bit unorthodox. While we worship many of the same gods as our neighbors in the plains we also worship spirits, tree gods and animal gods. We should embrace this diversity and be seen to support all of the various faiths of our subjects.
translation: 我国人名的信仰体系是多样的，甚至可能会有点异端异教在内。虽然我们崇拜和我们在大地上的大多邻居相同的神，我们也崇拜灵神，树神，动物神。我们应该接受这个多样化并支持我们的国民信奉不同的信仰。

original: The Elephant and the Tiger command respect all over India. Many rulers would seek to use these animals as symbols of their royal power. It is even said that some kings would travel far and go through many ordeals to obtain elephants for their Royal stables.\nWhat is a symbol to these far away rulers is part of our everyday life. In these lands such beasts, and others just as mighty, roam in great numbers. Our people know them well and many worship gods in the form of tigers, cobras or the very trees of these jungles. Any outsider would do well to think twice before risking the wrath of such gods or those who worship them.
translation: 大象和老虎在印度各地都让人肃然起敬。许多统治者会用这些动物作为他们王权的象征。甚至说一些君主将会不惜远行历经考验也要得到大象作为王室的坐骑。\n这些遥远的王室象征其实是我们日常生活中的一部分。这片土地上有很多这样的野兽在漫游着，而还有更多和它们一样凶猛的。我们的人民都知道这些并且会崇拜这片丛林里那些以老虎，眼镜蛇或恰好是树木形式的神灵。但是任何局外人如果想要冒险激怒或者崇拜那样的神灵最好三思。

original: Caste as a rigid structure has never been an integral part of our society and many in our realm would deny belonging to any caste at all. Being pragmatic and flexible about these things allows our state to more easily absorb even the most diverse groups of people.
translation: 种姓制度作为一个刚性结构从来就不是我们社会的一部分，并且我们王国内很多时候根本就不承认种姓制度。让我们对待种姓务实和灵活一点，我们的国家就能吸收最大限度的各式各样的人群

original: Our forts do not only keep us safe from invaders, they are also excellent points from which to launch attacks on trade caravans or the cities of the plains. By using our knowledge of our lands to trick and ambush our opponents we may defeat stronger foes than would otherwise be possible.
translation: 我们的堡垒不仅从侵略者手中保护我们。他们也是发动对在平原的商队或者城市的攻击时的优秀的攻击点。通过运用我们对自己领土的认知去欺诈并伏击对手，我们就能打败比我们想象的还要强得多的敌人。

original: While we may not have the grand ceremonies of the cosmopolitan courts of the great cities of India we do have our own traditions of kingship. Some of these traditions surely date back to the venerable kingdoms that came before us in these lands such as the Haihayas of Tripura or the Naga kings of Barasuru.\nThere is strength in tradition just as there is in novelty. Our courtly traditions command the respect of our people and are not merely meant to make foreign dignitaries feel at home.
translation: 虽然我们没有像印度大城市的世界化场所的盛大典礼，我们也有自己的君王传统。一些传统甚至可以回溯到在我们到来之前就在这里存在的伟大王国，比如特里普拉邦的希哈雅或者巴鲁书鲁的娜迦。\n这些传统中蕴含的力量正如其新意一般。我们的宫廷传统指使我们去尊重我们的人民，而不是仅仅为了让外国政要感觉到宾至如归。
和首领们的关系正式化

original: We command the respect and loyalty of the many chieftains who control the forts within our realm but it is now high time to replace these personal loyalties with a more formalized relationship. When the chieftains are all bound more directly to the state and acknowledge their obligations to it we will have a much easier time both taxing and controlling them.
translation: 我们靠着尊重和忠诚指挥着那些控制着我们王国内堡垒的众多首领们，但是现在是时候用一种更正式的关系来替换这些个人忠诚了。当这些首领们直接被国家所约束并承认他们的义务，我们会更容易控制他们并征税。

original: After the collapse of the Hohenstaufen ambitions to dominate Christendom in the 13th century, in 1264 His Holiness Urban IV wisely removed the titles King of Naples and Sicily from the Hohenstaufen portfolio and bestowed them upon our ancestor Charles of Anjou, who also seized the title King of Albania by his own merits. The treacherous Aragonese, citing their marriage into the Hohenstaufen line, stole Sicily from us in 1282 and recently finished their violation of Papal will by usurping the title 'King of Naples' in 1442 away from our Good King René. The legacy of Charles of Anjou has fallen far, but we remember the vast holdings of our forefathers and their claims stretching all the way to Albania and Jerusalem.
translation: 在霍亨斯陶芬王朝住在基督教的野心崩塌之后的十三世纪，神圣的乌尔班四世在1264年从霍亨斯陶芬王朝手中收回了那不勒斯和西西里国王的头衔并把他们赐予了我们的祖先，凭着自己的功绩统治着阿尔巴尼亚王国的安茹的查理。而奸诈的阿拉贡，通过引证他们和霍亨斯陶芬王朝的婚姻，在1282年从我们手里偷走了西西里并在最近完成了他们的那违背了教宗的意愿的篡夺来的头衔，那不勒斯王的头衔在1442离开了我们的好国王勒内。安茹的查理的遗产已经离我们远去，但是我们仍记得我们先祖曾经持有的那一路从阿尔巴尼亚延伸到耶路撒冷的辽阔的土地。

original: The senior line of the House of Anjou went extinct in 1435 when Queen Joanna II of Naples passed away. Long live our junior line, the House of Valois-Anjou, fusion of the two greatest houses of France! Through the fusion of two dynasties, the royal blood of Hugh Capet flows twice over. With a little work and planning, the devious throne-snatching of our Angevin forebears and the military valor of our Valois ancestors can unite to make the House of Valois-Anjou greater than either.
translation: 当那不勒斯女王乔万娜二世在1435年去世后，安茹王朝的直系血脉就此断绝。我们欢呼一个新的王室诞生了，它就是融合了法兰西两个最显赫家族的瓦卢瓦 - 安茹王朝，随着两大家族的融合，雨果-卡佩的王室血脉再次得到延续。我们只需稍作调整，就能把我们那善于计谋的安茹祖先和英勇的瓦卢瓦祖先血脉结合在一起，使瓦卢瓦 - 安茹王朝比任何时候都强大。

original: Composite monarchy is a technical term for a kingdom that contains different pieces that are governed by their own legal codes and traditions but are nonetheless united under one crown. Can there be a better description for the Angevin realms? Once upon a time our family had to govern lands from Anjou to Albania. Today, our reach might be somewhat smaller, but the duties of a Duke of Lorraine, a Duke of Bar, a Duke of Anjou, and a Count of Provence are considerably different even when all those titles are held by the same man. By our flexibility in running vastly different realms to one common goal, we placate our subjects and create a whole that is far greater than the sum total of its parts.
translation: 复合君主制是一个术语，表示一个君主国由不同的地区组成，每个地区都有各自的法律和传统，然而处于同一个人的统治下。最典型的的例子莫过于安茹王朝的领地。曾经我们的家族不得不管理从安茹到阿尔巴尼亚的领土。今天，我们的管理范围可能小了一些，但是洛林公爵、巴尔公爵、安茹公爵和普罗旺斯伯爵的职责却大不相同，因为这些头衔是同一个人持有的。通过共同目标在各个地区的灵活变通实现，我们使国民满意并且达到了总体大于部分和的效果。

original: Completed in 1449 by Good King René, this fortress is one of the mightiest in all Christendom and is one of the finest examples of military architecture of our day. Use it as a fortress, as an armory, as a prison, or just as a recreational chateau for a ruler in need of relaxation.
translation: 在1449年由好国王勒内完成的这个城堡是基督教世界最强大的堡垒之一，也是我们这个时代的最佳军事建筑范例之一。我们可以把它当成一个堡垒，一个军械库，一座监狱，或者只是让统治者轻松一刻的娱乐城堡。

original: We are not subjects to the Valois of Paris. Sometimes, however, we feel that Paris has forgotten our ancient privileges. Perhaps if we make common cause with other noblemen trying to break out of Paris' grasp, we will find the strength in numbers needed to retain our prerogatives.
translation: 我们并非巴黎的瓦卢瓦的国民，尽管如此，我们时时觉得巴黎已经忘记了我们古老的特权。如果我们能和其他贵族一起为了共同的目标去试图打破巴黎的控制，我们会发现因为我们人多势众，特权因此被保留。

original: Our land is a natural Mediterranean port. The ancient Greeks realized the value of Marseilles when they settled it under the name Massilia at the dawn of memory. While Marseilles can remain the great commercial hub, Toulon would make a perfect place for a dockyard, naval armory, and staging ground for a fleet for our great country.
translation: 我们的领土是一个天然的地中海港口。当古希腊人在马西利亚黎明的记忆下定居的时候他们就认识到了马赛的价值。虽然马赛可以保持成为一个出色的商业枢纽，土伦却是一个出色的船坞，海军军械库，并为我们伟大的祖国展现出一支舰队。

original: One of the things that distinguishes our tongue from French is the use of 'oc' instead of 'oui' for yes. This can be observed at any hour of the day by people shouting 'Oc! Oc!' when presented with the chance to own boutis, stuffed wholecloth quilts. These distinctive pieces of Provence's heritage can be found in any place in Europe and their quality leaves foreigners swooning. Much like the Angevin holdings have always been a quilt of different peoples and heritages yet still one distinctive whole, the boutis is a glorious metaphor for our beautiful country.
translation: 我们的语言和法语的一个不同之处是我们用“oc”代替“oui”表示“是”。随时可以看到，人们有机会拥有布蒂（bouti），即有填充物的全棉被的时候，都会惊叹道"Oc! Oc!"。这些鲜明的普罗旺斯文化遗产遍布欧洲各地，并让外国人惊叹不已。如同安茹家族领地拥有多元的民族和文化，同时仍然是一个独特的整体，布蒂是对我们美丽的国家的一种自豪的比喻。

original: The Indian Ocean trade takes our merchants as far as Arabia, Hindustan, Malaya, and even China. Let us keep supporting our merchants so we can increase our profit from this lucrative trade.
translation: 印度洋的贸易路线把我们的商人带到远至阿拉伯，印度斯坦，马来西亚甚至天朝。让我们继续支持我们的商人，便能从这个有着丰厚利润的贸易里获得更多的利益。

original: Our sailors are aware of the region's monsoons, and use them to link themselves with the port cities of the Indian Ocean and the Red Sea. They also developed an understandable way of defining the islands of the Indian Ocean in their navigational reach. They would name archipelagos or groups of islands after the most important island there from the Somali point of view.
translation: 我们的水手们都知道该地区的季风，并利用它们来连接印度洋和红海之间的港口城市。他们还开发了一种容易理解的界定航线上印度洋小岛的办法。在离开最关键的索马里的一点之后，他们可以说出所有群岛或者岛屿的名字。

original: Historically Somali merchants from Mogadishu established a colony in Mozambique to extract gold from the mines in Sofala and controlled the East African gold trade for several centuries.
translation: 从历史上来说，来自摩加迪沙的罗马里商人在莫桑比克建立了殖民地并从索法拉的矿山中提取金矿从而控制了几个世纪的东非的黄金贸易。

original: Ibn Battuta was extremely impressed during his visit in the 14th century by the splendor of Mogadishu. Vasco Da Gama, who passed by Mogadishu in the 15th century, noted that it was a large city with houses of four or five stories high and big palaces in its center and many mosques with cylindrical minarets.
translation: 伊本.白图泰在十四世纪摩加迪沙的辉煌时期访问的时候留下了深刻的印象。瓦斯科.达.伽马在十五世纪经过摩加迪沙的时候做了记录，这是个大城市，有很多四五层高的房子，并在市中心有一个呗很多清真寺和圆柱形尖塔包围的大宫殿。

original: In order to facilitate regional trade, we should start minting our own coins, a move which will have the effect of centralizing our commercial hegemony.
translation: 为了促进区域贸易，我们应该开始铸造自己的货币，此举有助于我们集中商业霸权。

original: From India and Arabia, trading sea vessels come to lay anchor at our beautiful city, as the first natural harbor in the Horn of Africa to trade and take supplies on their journey to East Africa.
translation: 来自印度和阿拉伯的海上贸易过往商船都要在我们作为非洲之角的第一个作为天然的交易良港美丽的城市停泊，这里他们将采购补给并继续他们驶向东非的旅途。

original: Historically Mogadishu was the center of a thriving textile industry known as toob benadir, specialized for the markets in Egypt.
translation: 历史上摩加迪沙曾是繁荣的纺织工业中心，被称作贝纳迪尔的禁忌，尤其是在埃及市场上。

original: The true emperors of the Eastern Roman Empire, the line of Alexios I that saved the empire after his predecessors brought us to the brink of destruction at Manzikert, have lived in reduced circumstances here in Trebizond after we were driven out of Constantinople by Isaac Angelos in 1185. The Nicaean usurpers known as the Palaiologoi now claim to be emperors, but the world knows that the rightful heirs of the Byzantine Empire will be back to expel both usurpers and Turks someday.
translation: 拜占庭帝国真正的皇帝，阿莱克修斯一世从他的先祖手中拯救了帝国并把我们曼齐克特带入了毁灭的边缘。在1185年被伊萨克.安吉洛赶出了君士坦丁堡之后我们不得不在特拉比松过着比以前贫穷的多的生活。被称作巴列奥略的尼西亚篡权者现在宣称了皇位，但全世界都知道，拜占庭帝国的正统继承人终有一天将会归来一并驱逐篡权者和土耳其人。

original: Much as the Alps separate the French and Italians, the Pontic Mountains separate our last Greek holdout in Anatolia from the Turks who have seized the Anatolian Plateau. Pontus has always been more Greek than rest of Anatolia...perhaps the legacy of the great Mithridates of old will inspire our warriors and strike as much fear into the Turks as he did the Romans?
translation: 就像阿尔卑斯山分割了意大利和法国一样，本廷山脉分割了希腊和安纳托利亚使，我们可以抵抗占据了安纳托利亚高原的土耳其人。本都比起剩下的安纳托利亚更加倾向希腊，或许是古老的伟大国王米特拉达梯的遗产激励着我们的战士，袭击土耳其人使他们恐惧就像他们曾经对罗马人的所作所为一样。

original: Princess Anna Komnene, the daughter of the father of our line, Alexios I Komnenos, wrote The Alexiad, a biography of her father that is stunning in its intricacy and ability to evaluate his actions. Perhaps good can come out of unorthodox ideas like letting an educated woman write history?
translation: 公主安娜.科穆宁，是我们先祖血脉阿莱克修斯一世的女儿，撰写了阿莱克修斯传，记录了他父亲惊人的举措并评估了他的行为。也许我们能从一些非正统的观念，比如让一个受过教育的女人写传记，中获得收益？

original: Anna Komnene might have been the first extraordinary daughter of a Komnenos Emperor, but she wasn't the last. Rulers across Europe want the legitimacy of Alexios I's bloodline in their own families and our princesses have become one of our top exports. Even Turkish rulers marry our daughters, and so we have gained eyes and ears in every court that matters.
translation: 安娜.科穆宁可能是科穆宁王朝皇帝的第一个紫衣贵族女儿，但她并非最后一个。整个欧洲都希望阿莱克修斯一世的合法血脉在自己的家族流传，而我们的公主就变成了最佳的出口品。即便是土耳其人娶了我们的女儿们，我们也能使其每一个宫廷遍布自己的眼线。

original: The Lessons of the Fourth Crusade
translation: 第四次十字军东征的教训

original: Isaac Angelos, who deposed our line in 1185, was himself deposed and blinded, and, on the pretense of putting the blind old fool back on the throne, the Venetians sacked the City of World's Desire in 1204. We used the collapse of Angelos authority to seize Trebizond and attempt to resurrect our empire. If your far larger enemy is facing misfortune and outside invasion, it is time to strike.
translation: 艾萨克.安吉洛，在1185年废黜了我们王朝的统治，被自己所蒙蔽并吹嘘这是把皇冠送回给古老的时代的愚蠢之徒。在1204年威尼斯人贡献了那座全世界所渴望的城市。我们趁安吉洛家族王权崩塌的时候夺取了特拉比松并试图复活我们自己的帝国。如果比你强大的多的敌人正在面临不幸或者外敌，那么这就是时候去袭击他了。

original: Even when this city was called Trapezus in the mists of Antiquity the ancient Greeks could see how useful a location it was, the point where the land route across Asia encounters the sea route that leads to the Mediterranean. In the days of the Khans, we grew famous as the terminal point for the great Silk Road, as the wealth of China and India passed through Trebizond on its way to Europe. There's no reason not to try to keep some of the wealth passing through.
translation: 即便这个城市还是被称作达特拉比宗被古老的迷雾所围绕的时候，希腊人就发现了这是个多么有用的地方，这里是跨越了亚洲的陆路转向通向地中海海陆的地方。在可汗统治的日子里，我们扩大了伟大的丝绸之路的终点，使天朝和印度的财富通过特拉比松流向欧洲。我们没有道理不去试图留下一部分流经的财富。

original: In the ancient world, every educated man worthy of respect was educated by a Greek tutor, and now, as the Turks threaten every Greek city in the Mediterranean, more and more scholars of Greece are entering their ancestors' line of work abroad. Many of these eminent men have sympathies with the Komnenoi cause and could be persuaded to give us accurate reports of goings-on abroad.
translation: 在过去，每个值得尊敬的受过的教育的人都是由希腊导师教育的，而现在，随着土耳其人威胁着每一个地中海的希腊城市，原来越多的希腊学者前往海外的他们古老的家族。血多这些杰出的人们都很同情科穆宁王朝的遭遇，并能被说服给予我们准确的在海外发生的事情的报告。

original: In our city-states on the Swahili coast we can trade with people from Arabia, Hindustan, and even distant China, and then sell their exotic wares deep inland into the heart of Africa, placing us in a very lucrative position.
translation: 在我们斯瓦希里的海岸的城市我们可以和来自阿拉伯，印度，甚至遥远的天朝人交易。我们出售给他们一些非洲心腹地带的异国商品，把我们放在了一个非常有利可图的位置。

original: Thanks to the monsoon cycle, sometimes it is very easy for ships to go east in the ocean and other times, westward travel is expedited, allowing for a steady, predictable flow of trade that is as reliable as the weather. Our captains still have to pilot the vessels in those storms, of course.
translation: 感谢季风循环，有时候向东行驶非常简单，而其他时间向西行驶的速度会大大提升。出于贸易稳定考虑，可预测的洋流就像是气候一样值得信赖。当然我们的船长仍需要在行驶过程中注意风暴。

original: The Swahili culture is a mélange of Arab and Bantu traditions, language, and values, and when we embraced Islam, we built something unique in Africa or Arabia. The great mosque was carved from coral and inspires awe and wonder in travelers from all corners of the world.
translation: 斯瓦希里文化是阿拉伯和班图的传统，语言，价值观的融合，当我们拥抱伊斯兰的时候，我们建立了一些无论非洲还是阿拉伯都独一无二的事物。大清真寺是由珊瑚雕刻而成并使来自世界各个角落的游客们都惊叹不止。

original: Swahili city states are always exciting affairs. You never know if you'll find an Omani seaman, a Gujarati captain, a Malay spice trader, or even a brave merchant from the mysterious Island of the Moon, Madagascar. Some sailors come with tales of exciting new ideas put into effect in their lands, and we can try their experiments for ourselves.
translation: 斯瓦希里的城市里总是有很多让人兴奋的事情。你永远不知道你是否能找到一个阿曼的水手，一个古吉的船长，一个马来的香料商人，甚至一个从马达加斯加的神秘卫星岛来的勇敢商人。一些水手们带着令人激动的有着新理念的故事来到了这里，我们也许可以把它们用做实验自己。

original: Sadly, the people of the interior have not yet heard the word that there is no God but God, but even unbelievers have faith in the power of the gold coin. The riches of our land may attract them to serve under our banner... perhaps someday it will even inspire them to live under our Prophet.
translation: 很不幸，很多内陆的人都没有听过这句话：世界上没有上帝只有阿拉。但是即使是不信者也会有对金币的强大信仰。我们土地上的财富可能会吸引他们在我们的旗下工作，这样也许早晚有一天他们就能被阿拉所感化。

original: The Europeans are new guests in our market and their fondness for ivory is truly remarkable. It must be a rare commodity back where they come from. The elephants are plentiful and are unlikely to ever run out, so we will keep harvesting their tusks for our clients' insatiable hunger for ivory.
translation: 欧洲人是我们市场的新顾客，他们对象牙的喜爱程度已经无可加复了。这必须是个对他们来的地方来说的罕见的商品。大象很充裕而且它们跑不出去，所以我们将会继续为了我们那些对象牙贪得无厌的顾客们狩猎。

original: Is there a port in the Indian Ocean where you can't hear Swahili spoken somewhere in the shipyards? It's doubtful: our merchants have sailed every corner of the ocean. As a result, people expect to see Swahili in their societies and our ambassadors have an easier time establishing themselves.
translation: 有没有一个印度洋的的港口的船厂里你听不见斯瓦希里语？这值得怀疑：我们的商人已经遍布了大洋的每个角落。因此，人们希望斯瓦希里人建立一个群体，我们的大使也可以更方便的管理他们。

original: To strive for a more tolerant society we must allow other faiths to worship in peace. The Candi Shrines are dual purpose allowing Hindus and Buddhists to worship together creating a greater sense of religious harmony. If we can continue this policy with other religions, we can ensure religious unity.
translation: 为了争取一个更加宽容的社会，我们必须允许其他宗教在和平时期拜神。寺庙圣地让印度教徒和佛教徒一同拜神的双重用途对我们的宗教和谐有重大意义。如果我们能继续这样对待其他宗教，我们将能确保宗教团结。

original: Our contact through trade with the Indian people has influenced our style of thinking. Our art, architecture, and culture have all grown from cultural exchange with our trade partners, by continuing a relationship with others like we enjoyed with the Pala new thoughts and ideas will be more easily integrated into our realm
translation: 与印度人民的贸易一直影响着我们的思考方式。我们的艺术，建筑和文化都通过我们的贸易伙伴得到了交流成长，就像我们享受帕拉一样继续这段关系，新的思想和理念将会更容易的融入到我们的国家。

original: Dharmashastra is an important tradition pertaining to Hindu religious law. With these set of principles, our religion has become more widespread.
translation: 摩奴法论是一个关于印度宗教教法的重要律法。我们的宗教可以随着这一系列原则更为广布。

original: Our economy relies on trading links stretching from India in the west and China to the North, by finding new markets to exploit and new trading partners we can further grow our economy.
translation: 我们的经济依赖于从印度西起至天朝北部的贸易链，通过开拓市场寻找新的贸易伙伴我们能进一步发展我们的经济。

original: Our fertile lands, and advanced irrigation practices ensure that we can harvest twice a year instead of the traditional once. This further strengthens the output of the realm.
translation: 我们肥沃的土地和先进的灌溉方式能让我们一年两熟而不是传统的一年一熟。这进一步的确保了王国的出产。

original: As our dependence on the sea trade continues we must re-design ships to become more viable, by emulating western design shown in their trade ships we can enhance our shipyards and build ships cheaper than ever before.
translation: 因为我们依赖海上贸易所以我们必须继续重新设计船舶使其更加可靠。通过模仿和西方贸易时他们使用的船只我们可以加强我们的造船厂，使其建造成本比以往都要更便宜。

original: The Terracotta Boars were an integral part of the Majapahit economy, an early form of banking, that could have evolved into a fully fledged taxation and revenue system.
translation: 赤土公猪是满者伯夷经济，一个早期的金融型式的重要部分。而现在这已经演化成了一个完全成熟的税收财政系统。

original: Since the earliest periods of our state, Ban has been the title of local rulers and office holders in Croatia. Historically, the institution of ban continued in various forms until the 20th century.
translation: 从我们国家早期看来，在克罗地亚邦是一个当地统治者或者正式持有者的头衔。从历史上看，邦以各种形式继续存在着直到二十世纪。

original: The city of Split was always a focal point of the rapidly expanding Venetian Mediterranean trade network. Now returned firmly to Croatian control, we can prosper from their status as traders and use the wealth generated by trade to further our goals of a unified and strong Croatian state.
translation: 在迅速扩大的威尼斯地中海贸易网中，斯普利特总是焦点。现在是时候让它回到克罗地亚的控制之下了，通过斯普利特中间交易商的地位我们可以繁荣起来，并利用由交易产生的财富促进我们统一和富强克罗地亚的目标。

original: Slavonia, also known as the granary of Croatia, is the most fertile agricultural region of our lands. It is located between the Sava River on the south and the Drava and Danube rivers on the north and east. We must ensure that we make more use of this region to the prosperity of our people.
translation: 斯拉沃尼亚，也被称作克罗地亚的粮仓，是我们国家中土地最肥沃的农业区。它位于萨瓦河的南边和德拉瓦河与多瑙河的北面和东面之间。我们必须确保我们能更多的利用这片土地使我们的人民繁荣。

original: We have received a message that His Holiness in Rome called Croatia a Bulwark of Christianity for our struggle against the heathens. Let it be known that no heathen will pass Croatian soil easily.
translation: 我们得到了一个消息，罗马的尊者称克罗地亚为基督教的壁垒，为反对异教徒做斗争。让众人知晓没有异教徒能轻松跨过克罗地亚的土地吧。

original: The Sabor, in its various forms, has represented the identity and opinions of our people since the national councils in the 9th century. Historically, the Sabor of Cetin held in 1527 was a decisive event of importance for the extension and confirmation of Croatian statehood.
translation: 议会，在它多样的形式中，从九世纪的国家议会起就代表了人民的身份的一件。从历史来看，在1527年切廷举行的议会这个重要的决定性的事件确认和延伸了克罗地亚的国家地位。

original: Our support for the Renaissance thought is bearing its fruits, Dubrovnik and other Dalmatian cities have become the center of a Croatian Renaissance, which are producing, in addition to works of art and science, an extensive literature that will have a lasting influence on the development of the Croatian literary language.
translation: 我们对文艺复兴思想的支持终于带来了结果，杜布罗夫尼克和其他的达尔马提亚城市都成为了克罗地亚文艺复兴的生产中心，除了艺术和科学的大量产出，大量的文学将会持续的影响克罗地亚文学语言的发展。

original: The Pandurs are a skirmisher unit in service of Vienna and have earned a reputation for being brave, audacious, and ruthless soldiers. Let us put them in use for the benefit of Croatia.
translation: 游骑兵是一种服务于我也拿的散兵单位，并赢得了勇敢，大胆，无畏的声誉的士兵。让我们为了克罗地亚的利益使用他们吧。

original: In 1291, the last bastion of the continental holdings of the Kingdom of Jerusalem fell to the Mamluk sultan Baibars, but we have never forgotten that for the last hundred years of the Kingdom of Jerusalem, all the legitimate kings have been Lusignans. Even now, over a hundred years in exile, new Lusignan kings have been known to sail to the Holy Land in the dead of night to be crowned in secret in our once and future kingdom.
translation: 1291年，最后一个堡垒在大路上属于耶路撒冷王国的堡垒被马鲁穆克苏丹拜巴尔攻陷了，但是我们永远不会忘记持续了百年的耶路撒冷王国，所有的合法国王都是吕西尼昂家族。即便是现在，流亡了百年的今天，新的吕西尼昂国王仍会在夜深人静时驶向圣地秘密的在我们曾经和未来的王国中加冕。

original: It's not a coincidence that the Saracens collectively refer to the people of Christendom as Franks: French presence in the Crusades has been critical ever since the earliest days. The spirit of the crusader kings like Philippe II Auguste and St. Louis IX isn't absent in Cyprus: our own King Peter once heroically seized a bit of the Anatolian coastline. Let's prove we still have that fire in us.
translation: 撒拉逊人把基督教徒统称为法兰克人不是一个巧合：法国人在甚至在最早期的十字军中都一直扮演着最重要的角色。十字军诸王的精神领袖，像是菲利普二世.奥古斯特和圣路易十六世是不会在塞浦路斯缺席的：我们的彼得国王英雄般的占据了一块安纳托利亚的海岸线。让我们证明我们仍还有着往日的荣光吧。

original: In the aftermath of the Third Crusade, Philippe II Auguste of France held a contest to determine the greatest wine in the world. Does it shock anyone that our Commandaria proved the Apostle of Wines in this greatest of competitions? Commandaria is ancient and just as tasty as it was hundreds of years ago. Even the Turks have developed a taste for it, despite supposedly refraining from alcohol.
translation: 第三次十字军东征之后，法王菲利普二世.奥古斯特举行了一场比赛以确定谁是世界上最高的葡萄酒。我们的卡曼达蕾雅酒是葡萄酒中最初的使徒是否在这个伟大的比赛中震惊了所有人？卡曼达蕾雅酒自古已有，而且百年间味道从未改变。即便是尽量避免酒精的土耳其人也品尝过它。

original: What king of Christendom doesn't covet the title King of Jerusalem? Sadly, many have claimed it despite our continued hold on the title, but others respect us enough to wish to infuse their own dynasties with Lusignan blood to bring themselves closer to the Holy Land in name and spirit. This last redoubt of Christendom in the East cannot survive without Western help, so we must take advantage of this.
translation: 基督教世界里哪个国王不觊觎耶路撒冷国王的头衔？可悲的是，尽管我们一直保有着这封号，却有很多人主张它；而其他人则仰慕我们，仰慕到希望能在他们自己的王朝中注入吕西尼昂的血脉，让他们在名义上精神上都离圣地更近些。基督教世界在东方最后的堡垒没有西方的支援是无法残存的，所以我们必须利用这一点。

original: Many, many powers have swept through Cyprus over the centuries, and the Crusaders have no desire to be just one in a succession of owners. Everywhere you look, this island is fortified with the finest examples of Medieval castles and fortifications, proof that we are here to stay, to the dismay of both the Turks and the Greek locals.
translation: 过去的几个世纪里很多很多势力都横扫了塞浦路斯，而十字军不止满足于仅仅只做其中一系列的主人之一。你看，这个岛屿被无所不在的堪称范例的中世纪城堡和工事所强化，证明了我们在这里驻扎这，让土耳其人和希腊人为之沮丧。

original: The memories of the legendary Barbarossa brothers who bedeviled the Eastern Mediterranean in the late 15th and early 16th centuries is vivid, but they were only the most famous of the many corsairs that are the bane of Mediterranean sea travel. Our navy needs to gain the strength to match these freebooters on their own terms.
translation: 传说中的巴巴罗萨兄弟在十五世纪末和十六世纪初困扰着地中海的记忆是鲜明的，但是他们只是众多地中海海上贸易的祸根中的最有名的一个。我们的海军需要得到足够的力量去靠我们自己捕获这些强盗。

original: Perhaps the brothers Barbarossa, brutes that they were, hit on a valuable strategy. We can utilize our critical position in the Eastern Mediterranean to launch unrestricted raiding on Turkish vessels and reap the economic rewards of their wealth. Pirates may be the enemies of all nations, but privateers are merely contracted businessmen, right?
translation: 也许巴巴罗萨兄弟是畜生，但是却让我们偶然发现了宝贵的战略。我们可以利用我们在东地中海重要的地理位置，无限制的对土耳其船只发动突袭，夺取他们的财富以获得经济回报。海盗可能是所有国家的敌人，但是私掠船却之和商人有协议，不是吗？

original: Fortifications of medieval Navarra took shape of cubical stone tower castles of multiple elevations, which overlooked the lands they were built to protect. They serve as residences for nobles and are an important point of defense during enemy invasions.
translation: 中世纪的纳瓦拉防御工事以立方石塔为形并有多种高度，这样可以俯视他们所需保护的土地。他们作为贵族的住所并在敌人入侵时成为防御的关键点。

original: Kings of Navarra have a tradition of recruiting mercenary companies to do their bidding. The most famous of such companies, the so called Navarrese Company, was a group of mercenaries recruited from the Gascogne and Navarran lands and is known for its successes in fighting and securing lands in Greece.
translation: 纳瓦拉国王有招募佣兵大队做竞标的传统。最著名的团体，所谓的纳瓦拉大队，是一群来自加斯科涅和纳瓦拉地区的佣兵，并因为他们在战斗中的胜利和包围希腊广为人知。

original: Our favorable location on the Atlantic Coast allows us to easily partake in the colonization efforts in the New World. Our small kingdom surrounded by larger states can only hope to expand in distant oversea lands.
translation: 我们在大西洋海岸优越的地理位置使得我们可以轻松地参与在新大陆的殖民。我们小小的王国被大国们包围，所以只能寄希望于在遥远的海外地区扩张。

original: Basque whaling has hundreds of years of traditions. Basque specialists are often used by other countries who would wish to expand and improve their fisheries. We should capitalize on this expertise and expand our whaling enterprises with outposts on both sides of the Atlantic.
translation: 巴斯克捕鲸已有数百年传统。巴斯克专家总是被其他希望扩展和提升渔业的国家所用。我们应该利用这一专长用前哨站在大西洋两岸扩大我们的捕鲸事业。

original: In addition to Navarra's trade flowing towards Aragon and Castile, we should also look to open the routes across the Pyrenees. This will allow us not only to profit from the flow of trade goods in both directions, but will also bring into Navarra modern bourgeoise ideas of contemporary France.
translation: 除了流向阿拉贡和卡斯蒂利亚的贸易，我们应该开发一个跨越比利牛斯的贸易。这将使我们不仅从贸易双向流动中获益，同时也可以为纳瓦拉带来法国的现代资产阶级思想。

original: Euskalerriaren Adiskideen Elkartea, the Royal Basque Society of Friends of the Country was founded to encourage development of Basque economy, culture and science. Founded with the profits from the Royal Gipuzkoan Company of Caracas, a monopolist in trade with Venezuela at a time, it will benefit the country greatly in the coming years.
translation: 国家之友巴斯克皇家社团的设立是为了鼓励巴斯克的经济，文化和科学的发展。建立于现时委瑞内拉的贸易垄断者，加拉加斯皇家吉普斯夸公司的利益关系，我们将在未来几年中获得极大的收益。

original: We cannot allow the old laws of the land to fragment and disorder our state any longer. Modern and forward-thinking Navarra must centralize all the power with the government, rid of the remnants of the old laws and autonomies.
translation: 我们不能让旧法律继续撕裂和扰乱我们的国家的。现代和前瞻性的纳瓦拉必须通过政府集中所有的权利以摆脱就法律和自治的残留。

original: The maintenance of our empire, and the world, require a constant stream of captives. Only through a state of constant warfare can we ensure that we have access to such a supply. The world cannot afford peace.
translation: 为了维护我们的帝国和世界，我们需要无穷无尽的俘虏，只有通过战争我们才能确保我们的所需，这个世界受不起和平。

original: The gods brought life into the world through their own sacrifice, and it is through our sacrifices that we sustain them and enable them to maintain the world. If we were to stop, the consequences would be terrible.
translation: 神通过他们自己的牺牲为这个世界带来了生命，现在通过我们的牺牲来维持神使他们能够维持这个世界。如果我们不这么做，后果是可怕的。

original: By instituting a network of houses of youth, schools where education and military training are mandatory for the youths of the lower classes, we ensure that our army never wants for new recruits.
translation: 通过建立青年住宅网，下层阶级的青年将会强制在学校接受教育和军事训练，我们确信我们的军队不会希望要新兵的。

original: Sacred brotherhoods of warriors, the Eagle knights and the Jaguar Warriors are the pinnacle of our fighting forces. The thought of one day being counted among their numbers inspire many young warriors to attempt the acts of bravery that would win them admission.
translation: 战士们的神圣的兄弟，鹰骑士和豹战士是我们最强大的战士。它们将会激励很多年轻的战士去尝试这种勇敢的行为以赢得它们的信任。

original: The cities of the empire send yearly great caravans bearing exotic feathers, rare mineral, jewels and shells, and other treasures to our capital to be added to the imperial treasury, bringing us great wealth.
translation: 帝国的城市每年都用大篷车送来异国风情的羽毛，稀有矿石，宝石和贝壳以及其他宝物加入到我们的国库资本中，这给我们带来了巨大的财富。

original: The stunning artificial islands we have learned to build in the lake of Mexico are not merely great architectural feat, but a great source of agricultural production, feeding our capital.
translation: 我们学会并造于墨西哥湖的令人惊叹的人工岛不仅是个伟大的建筑壮举，同时也是供应着我们首都的重要农业生产来源。

original: Traders travel far afield, to provinces beyond even the reach of our authority, and to rulers who defy us. If these traders were to, perhaps, also serve us as eyes and ears, what secrets might we learn?
translation: 商人总是走得很远，前往那些我们的权力无法管辖并且领主违抗我们统治的省份。也许这些贸易商可以提供给我们耳目？我们能从中获取一些秘密。

original: Our ancient legend state our royal lineage is descended from the union of a princess and a panther. This ancient tale can only enhance our prestige and fame among our neighbors.
translation: 我国古代传说我们的王室血统是一个公主和猎豹产生的。这个古老的传说可以增强我们对邻国的威望和声名。

original: Through raiding our neighbors, we obtain slaves who cannot only be employed economically or bartered to our neighbors, but who can also be made to serve in our army. In such ways we increase the number of men we may call to arms.
translation: 通过袭击我们的邻居，我们得到的奴隶不仅仅可以提升我们的经济，卖给我们的礼金，还可以让他们组成军队。用这种方式我们能增加我们称之为军队的人数。

original: The Migan and the Mehu are the two chief ministers of our kings. One oversees the north, the other the south; one oversees justice, the other commerce. Together, they bring peace and prosperity to our land.
translation: The Migan and the Mehu are the two chief ministers of our kings. 一个负责北部，一个负责南部；一个监管司法，一个管理经济。总之，他们为我们的土地带来了和平和繁荣。

original: By introducing a number of effeminate young noblemen in the royal harem and presenting them as royal wives, we can give them the freedom to act unseen as the king's eyes and ears, especially in matters of palace intrigue.
translation: 通过引入一些柔弱的年轻贵族并把她们收做后宫娶做妻子，她们就会扮演看不见的国王的二木的角色，特别是对于宫廷阴谋的问题。

original: Once a corps of elephant hunters, the Mino, 'our mothers' in Fon, have become a fabled part of our military. Reputed for discipline, effectiveness and bravery, the presence of this all-female unit of royal bodyguards inspire the rest of our troops.
translation: 一旦大象猎人的队伍，美浓，“我们的母亲”，成为我军传说的一部分。者将被誉为纪律，效率和勇气，女性皇家保镖的存在也将极大地机理我军其他部分。

original: As more and more foreigners come to our shores, it is necessary to establish a new office in our government to study their ways and learn their secrets, so we may benefit from them.
translation: 随着越来越多的外国人来到我们的海岸，我们有必要在政府中建立一个新的部分去学习和研究他们的秘密，我们也许会从中受益。

original: A vast palatial complex in our capital would be a sure sign of our power to all who would dare challenge it.
translation: 一个在我们首都的庞大城堡是给所有胆敢挑战我们的人展示力量的明确象征。

original: Our lands are vast and full of dangers where an ignorant foreigner would get himself lost and eventually die, but we know better.
translation: 我们的土地广阔而危险，一个无知的外国人在哪里终将迷路并死亡，然而我们却对此有所了解。

original: Foreigners can offer us a variety of goods in exchange for our Siberian fur. Therefore we should use this fur trade as a key to bring more prosperity to our people.
translation: 外国人为了我们的西伯利亚毛皮可以给我们提供各种各样的商品。因此我们应该利用皮草贸易给我们的人民带来更多的繁荣。

original: The many slaves that have been captured during the raids will work for the benefit of our people till they die!
translation: 从突袭中抓获的俘虏将会为了我们人民的利益工作到死！

original: Our settlements aren't surrounded by strong walls, but they are well-hidden deep inside our vast lands, where no foreigner has come before.
translation: 我们的定居点没有被坚固的城墙所包围，但是在外国人到来前它们都深深的隐藏在我们辽阔的土地之中。

original: What could be better than hunting? Only successfully raiding our pesky neighbors is the way to glory!
translation: 还有什么比狩猎更美好？只有成功的袭击我们讨厌的邻居才是通向荣耀的道路！

original: Strong leaders are always in the center of attention. One successful raid means more volunteers joining for the next one.
translation: 强而有力的领导总是人们关注的焦点。一次成功的突袭意味着更多的志愿者加入下一次。

original: Hunting is a vital part of the survival of our people. By expanding our hunting areas and establishing new settlements we could obtain more fur.
translation: 狩猎使我们人民生存的重要组成部分。通过扩大我们的手里范围并建立新的定居点我们能得到更多的皮毛。

original: Since ancient times our ancestors were an important link in the Horn of Africa connecting the commerce of the region with the rest of the world. Our sailors and merchants were the main suppliers of spices and various luxury goods. We should keep supporting this profitable trade network and maintain maritime contacts with Arabia, Hindustan, Persia, Egypt, and as far away as China.
translation: 自古以来我们的祖先就在非洲之角和其他地区的贸易链接中扮演着重要一环。我们的税收和商人是香料或者其他奢侈品的主要供应商。我们应该继续支持这一有利可图的贸易网，并保持与阿拉伯，印度死他，波斯，埃及，甚至遥远的天朝的联系。

original: Historically the Istunka was an annually held tournament developed in the Ajuuraan State, and was centralized in the 19th century under the Sultanate of Geledi. The event consists of several teams engaging each other in mock combat.
translation: 历史上，安全演习是阿居乌壤每年都举行的比赛，并集中在十九世纪苏丹格勒德。这个活动是几只队伍互相接触的模拟作战。

original: While the House of Gareen was the ruling hereditary dynasty of the Ajuuraan State, they claimed supremacy and religious legitimacy over other groups in the Horn of Africa.
translation: 当加林王朝是阿居乌壤的世袭执政王朝时，他们宣称了他们的在政权和宗教的合法性高于非洲之角其他任何人。

original: Muslims from Hindustan, Al-Andalus, Arabia and Persia come and settle in our coastal cities. Some seek refugee because of the instability in their regions, others come to conduct business or for religious reasons. Due to their strong tradition in learning, they will enrich our lands and we will employ them as advisers and commanders.
translation: 穆斯林们从印度斯坦，安达卢西亚，阿拉伯和波斯来到我们的沿海城市定居。一些难民来到这里是因为他们原本所在的地区处于动乱之中，也有其他的人是来开发新的业务或者出于宗教理由。由于他们强大的学习传统，他们将会充实我们的土地，我们可以聘请他们担任顾问和指挥官。

original: By monopolizing the water resources of the Jubba and Shebelle Rivers we have the control of taxation and agriculture in this region firmly in hand.
translation: 作为一个水源帝国，阿居乌壤垄断了朱巴河和谢贝利河的水源。阿居乌壤的统治者开发了一个新的同业和税收系统，这在非洲之角地区一直被使用到十九世纪。

original: We have received news that the cities of our Swahili brethren to the South were sacked and plundered by the Portuguese infidels. These pesky westerners won't stop until they subjugate the rest of East Africa. We should prepare ourselves and show fierce resistance!
translation: 我们已经收到了我们南部的斯瓦西里语兄弟的城市被葡萄牙异教徒细节和掠夺的消息了。除非这些讨厌的西方人征服了东非全境否则他们不会停下的。我们也应该准备去展示激烈的抵抗了！

original: Our traditional weapons such as the sword, spear, and bow are not sufficient any more in our struggle against the Portuguese. By keeping good relations with our Turkish brethren we could receive assistance in the form of firearms and cannons which will be much more effective in dealing with these infidels.
translation: 我们的传统武器，诸如剑，矛，弓已经不足以支持我们继续对抗葡萄牙了。通过与我们的土耳其兄弟保持友好关系，我们可以得到枪支和火炮的援助，这将更加有效的处理这些异教徒。

original: Ever since the early middle ages Bosnia has been a safe haven for all kinds of heretics. Accepted and largely left to themselves in the remote hinterlands of Bosnia, these small groups thrived into communities and entire monasteries, bringing forgotten and mysterious knowledge from all over Europe. As the crusades and inquisitions rooted out all challenges of Rome one by one. Not even centuries of both Catholic and Serbian Orthodox Church persecution have managed to defeat them, as Bosnian Church flourishes to this day, it will continue its studies of long forgotten texts.
translation: 从中世纪早期开始波斯尼亚就一直是各种异端的避风港，接受他们留在波斯尼亚的腹地，这些小团体蓬勃发展成了自带修道院的社区，带来了被全欧洲所遗忘的神秘知识。随着十字军东征和宗教审判清除了所有胆敢挑战罗马的人，几个世纪以来天主教和塞尔维亚东正教都试图彻底根除他们。但是随着波斯尼亚教会的一夜暴富，他们将继续研究那些早已被人们所遗忘的东西。

original: By coronating himself as King of Serbs, and Bosnia and the Seaside and the Western Lands, and accepted by the Serbian Orthodox Church as the sole champion capable of replacing the failing Nemanjic dynasty, Bosnian King Tvrtko has sealed the course of Bosnian state as well as set its ultimate ambition - the legacy of the Serbian Empire. But in doing so he has also laid claims to lands owned by powerful princes, an insult that won't be easily forgotten. The path towards the stars is full of hardships.
translation: 通过加冕自己为塞尔维亚，波斯尼亚和西部黑海的土地的王，并被塞尔维亚东正教会承认为唯一能取代没落的内马尼奇王朝的勇士，波斯尼亚国王特夫尔特科确立了波斯尼亚最终的野心——塞尔维亚帝国的遗产。同时，他也提出对强大诸侯的土地的宣称，这是不能轻易忘却的耻辱。前方的道路布满荆棘。

original: History of medieval Bosnia has been one of everlasting balance between its rulers and their nobles. Pressured from the outside by both Rome and Hungary eager to conquer Bosnian lands, rulers of Bosnia have had to proclaim themselves nominally Catholic, in order to prevent crusades against their domains. But at the same time virtually all of their nobility remained loyal to the indigenous and to both Rome and Serbian Orthodox Church - heretical Bosnian Church. This meant that ruling Bosnia was a perpetual game of balance, one that only masters of this game could play and live to tell. In this game of thrones, you either win or you die.
translation: 中世纪的波斯尼亚历史一直是处于统治者和贵族们的平衡之中。除了来自外界罗马和匈牙利渴望征服波斯尼亚的土地的压力之外，波斯尼亚的统治者不得不宣布自己是名义上的天主教徒，以防止对他们发动的圣战。但与此同时几乎所有的贵族忠于本土罗马和塞尔维亚东正教两者——波斯尼亚教会的异端。这意味着波斯尼亚的执政者在玩一场永无止境的平衡游戏，只有精通这场游戏的大师才能活下来讲述这个故事。在这个权利的游戏里，你只有胜利，或者死亡。

original: Proximity to Italy and ruling over parts of the Adriatic Sea has always meant one thing for Bosnia, most of its roads lead to Rome one way or another. But here is the thing that it goes other way around as well.
translation: 接近意大利并且统治着一块亚得里亚海域对波斯尼亚历来意味着一件事情，大部分这里的道路都通向了罗马。但是总有些事情是截然相反的。

original: In their core the lands of Bosnia are a collection of smaller duchies and principalities, some of them having roots that go back centuries. Historical vassals of foreign empires and realms, Bosnian lands will not serve any master again.
translation: 波斯尼亚的核心领地都是由小公国组成的，它们中的一些甚至可以回溯几个世纪。历史上的海外附庸？波斯尼亚的土地不会再为任何人服务了。

original: Due to its position between a hammer and an anvil, the West and the East, the cities of Rome and Constantinople, Bosnia has to adapt in order to thrive. While to some maintaining good relations with lands far away is a matter of luxury and prestige, to Bosnia it's a matter of survival.
translation: 由于夹在锤子和铁砧之间，西方和东方，罗马和君士坦丁堡，波斯尼亚不得不为了茁壮成长而适应。与遥远的土地保持良好的关系是一个奢侈而名誉的事情，也是波斯尼亚的存亡问题。

original: Over the Hills and Through the Woods

Situated in the harshest part of the Balkan Peninsula, Bosnia is a country dominated by mountains, hills and river valleys without any significant infrastructure or a road network. Some say that crossing the Alps with an army is easier than getting through Bosnia during the winters - as at least one person did it. Bosnian winters are not as forgiving. All those who enter its hills and forests will perish!
translation: 波斯尼亚位于巴尔干半岛最险峻的地方，国土被山地，丘陵和河谷所覆盖而且没有任何基础道路设施。有人说翻越阿尔卑斯山都比在冬天通过波斯尼亚更容易——至少还真有一个人做到了翻越阿尔卑斯山。波斯尼亚的冬天可不那么简单，谁敢试图进入山峦和森林都将死亡！

original: The legend of the first dismounting, the 'descalecat', tells the story of a Dragos, a Vlach noble whose hunt for an aurochs led him to ride into the lands of Moldavia. Impressed with the beauty of the realm he chose it for his new homeland and settled there with his people. The aurochs head became his princely standard.
translation: 关于“下马”的传说，讲述了一个德拉戈什的故事，一个哇垃圾贵族为了追捕一头野牛而追到了摩尔达维亚的土地上，被这个美丽的土地所深深打动，他选择了这里作为了新的家园并和他的子民于此定居。而野牛头成为了他的王侯标准。

original: Unlike in the western feudal states, in Moldavia serfdom is less common and there remains a large group of free peasants, the razesi, who either own lands themselves or work in the boyar estates. Those free peasants prove to be valuable recruits and form the mainstay of our armies.
translation: 不同于西方封建国家，摩尔达维亚的农奴制度是不常见的，这里仍有大量的自由农民。在拉泽斯，无论是拥有自己的土地还是在博伊尔的庄园工作，这些农民都被认为是有价值的新兵并成为我们军中的中流砥柱。

original: The upper boyars, the vlastelin, are the highest class of the Moldavian society. They are exempt from all taxes paid to Hospodar, but have a duty to provide a number of warriors proportional to the number of villages they own.
translation: 上位博伊尔，君王，是摩尔达维亚社会的最高阶级。他们被免除赋税给大公，但是有责任提供和他们所拥有的村庄成正比的战士。

original: Inspired by the Byzantine way of running the state, Moldavian Hospodars hold far more power over their subjects than most western feudal rulers. Hospodar can sentence even his most powerful boyars to demotion, confiscation of fortunes and even beheading if that is his will.
translation: 通过拜占庭管理国家的方式受到的启发，摩尔达维亚大公比起大多西方封建领主有更多的权利。大公甚至可以随他所意的让他最强大的博伊尔降级，没收财产，乃至斩首。

original: Moldavian Orthodoxy proved resistant to foreign influences, it survived through the Mongol invasion and rejected Hungarian Catholic missionaries. The Metropolis of Moldavia, the autonomous Orthodox church of the realm, doesn't just work tirelessly to preserve the Orthodox faith, its churches and monasteries are also centers of learning, art and culture.
