original: The Weser is silting and shipping is having an increasingly hard time to reach the ports of our state. It has been suggested that an artificial port might be created at Vegesack further north to allow the sea trade to more easily reach our city.
translation: 威悉河正在慢慢淤积。船队想到达我国港口越来越难。有人提出了在更北的弗格萨克建立人工港口来提供畅通的海贸渠道。

original: Bremen has been sieged in nearly every conceivable war fought in northern Germany. The walls, gates and moats of Bremen have not always been enough to hold back the would-be invaders but over the centuries they have served us well. Let us expand these fortifications with Bastions and other new inventions in the field and they will continue to do so for hundreds of years more.
translation: 不来梅几乎在德国北部每一场可能的战争中都受到了围城。城墙、城门和护城河并不总是足以挡住可能的入侵者，但是在过去数个世纪中依然立下了汗马功劳。让我们利用棱堡和其他的新发明来扩充这些防御工事，这样他们可以继续在未来几个世纪里保护这座城市。

original: The port at Vegesack, north of Bremen, has increasingly come to serve as a new center for our shipping and shipbuilding. Here innovative entrepreneurs such as Johanne Lange have begun to apply the new shipbuilding techniques of the modern age, some even speak of a ship driven by Steam. In order to further the Bremish maritime development, however, we need to find an entirely new city at the very mouth of the River so that the access to the ocean is entirely unhindered.
translation: 位于不来梅北部的弗格萨克港，近来正逐渐成为我们新的航运和造船中心。这里，如乔安·兰格这样创进的企业家已经开始应用现代的新造船技术。有些人甚至开始讨论蒸汽动力的船只。为了进一步推动不来梅的海事发展，我们需要在入海口建立一座全新的城市来获得完全不受限制的海港。

original: Break the Power of the Estates
A strong ruler cannot allow the Estates to hinder his power. We must break the power of the Estates once and for all so that we can undertake whatever goals we see fit.
translation: 一个强大的统治者永远不会允许权贵限制他的权力。我们必须一劳永逸地摧毁权贵阶层的势力从而保证我们能达成任何我们想达成的目标。

original: Education is important and many German universities will only receive the well to do or those of the Catholic faith. Let us found a new university that aims to be free of these restraints for the betterment of our subjects.
translation: 教育很重要，然而多数德国大学只接受来自富裕家庭的学生和天主教徒。让我们建立一所新的不受这些约束的大学给我们的人民带来进步。

original: All over Europe and the German lands Reformers are debating and reinventing the Christian faith. Let us welcome these learned men so that they can debate freely under our protection.
translation: 在整个欧洲和德国的土地上改革宗都在辩论和重塑基督教信仰。让我们这些学者，让他们可以在我们的保护下自由辩论。

original: Many countries all over Europe have been getting rid of some of their finest talents just because they belong to one of the various new Christian faiths. Let us profit from their mistake and receive any such men looking for a new home.
translation: 整个欧洲大陆上，许多国家都在驱逐一些自己国家最优秀的人才，仅仅因为这些人皈依了新兴的基督教信仰。让我们从他们的愚蠢错误中获益，接收所有因此而在寻找新的家园的人们。

original: The armies of Europe are always evolving and a state in Germany will have to stay up to date or face its end. Let us modernize our armies and adopt the finest ideas regarding training, equipment and tactics that we can find.
translation: 欧洲的陆军总是在不断地演进而一个德意志国家如果不走在它的最前沿就将无可避免地迎来自己的中结。让我们现代化我们的陆军并且采纳我们所能找到的最优秀的训练、装备和战术方法。

original: A modern army is expensive and training, however, rigorous is no substitute for real experience. Let us allow other states to rent entire units of our forces so that they may receive real combat experience even in times of peace but above all so that we may easier pay for their equipment and food.
translation: 现代陆军昂贵的，然而无论多么严酷的训练都无法代替真正的作战经验。让我们允许其他国家从我们的部队中整只整只地雇佣连队，这样即使在和平时期他们也将会取得许多真正的作战经验。更重要的是，这样我们能更轻易地支付他们的装备和食物。

original: The world is changing and within our borders are many with ideas on how to improve our economy. Let us give them the freedom to undertake their bold new schemes so that our country may have the finest Manufactories and Iron Mills.
translation: 世界正在改变，在我们的国家内部就有许多人有着关于如何增强我国经济的想法。让我们给这些人空间来施展他们大胆的新计划，这样我们的国家才可能建立起最优秀的制造工坊和炼铁厂。

original: Each year since the great plague of 1382 that killed almost 8000 inhabitants and the great fire of 1383 we hold a great procession. It shows our repentance for our sins and our devotion to God.
translation: 自1382年大瘟疫带走8000居民,1383年大火烧遍城市以来,每年我们都会举办大巡游. 借此我们向主彰显负罪之心.

original: The 'Erbmänner' of Münster are the nobility of our great city. They are the only ones who own passive electoral rights and if we elect a bishop out of these men, we can sure of the loyalty of all noble families in our bishopric.
translation: 明斯特的城市贵族是我们伟大城市的显赫人士. 他们是唯一拥有被选举权的人,而从其中选出主教则能保障这些贵族和主教的忠诚.

original: In these days of reformation we have to defend Catholicism in the bishopric by inviting Jesuits, and encouraging the founding of monasteries for the old orders. Some of these monasteries will train excellent missionaries for our purposes.
translation: 在宗教改革的日子里,我们需要邀请耶稣会保障公教权威,并建立既有修会的修道院. 其中一些修道院可以提供优秀的传道士.

original: The Peace of Westphalia was signed in Münster and Osnabrück. The treaties ended the Thirty Years' War in the Holy Roman Empire and fully established the independence of the Dutch Republic.\nBy promoting our cities as an ideal place for diplomatic negotiations we are sure to gain high renown across all of Europe.
translation: 威斯特伐利亚和平协定签署于明斯特和奥斯纳布吕克. 协定终结了神圣罗马帝国的三十年战争,并决定了荷兰共和国的完全独立.\n通过宣传我们城市作为和平与外交的绝佳土地,我们定能在欧陆取得好名声.

original: It is our duty to maintain a strong army in order to prevail against our Protestant neighbors. The soldiers of the Imperial Army are perfect for our goals. They are well-trained and battle tested soldiers ready to defend our great bishopric against heretical nations.
translation: 维持强大的军队对抗新教敌人是我们的义务.这些帝国军队的士兵为此而生. 他们训练有素久经沙场,随时准备抵抗异端敌国保卫我们伟大的主教国.

original: Due to the intense bombardment of besieged cities using mortars, prince-bishop Christoph Bernhard von Galen, has gained the nick name 'Bommen Berend'. Let us make this choice of arms the guideline of our generals henceforth.
translation: 由于攻城时大量使用迫击炮,大主教克里斯托弗 伯恩哈德 冯 盖伦 得到了"伯恩哈德大爆弹"的诨名. 让我们以他为榜样教育我们的将军们如何选择武装.

original: The education of our people is the backbone of our state. The schools in our realm are some of the oldest in all of Europe. Let us build new schools and hire many teachers to provide affordable education for our people.
translation: 人民的教育是国家的脊梁. 在我们的国度内有着欧洲最古老的一些学校. 让我们扩展学院,聘请教师来为人民提供优惠的教育.

original: This land has been ruled by the Percy family for centuries, and they have become synonymous with it. The Percies will remain a backbone of this independent kingdom and be a powerful force for the Northumbrian monarchy.
translation: 这片土地在珀西家族的统治下已有数个世纪，这个名字与当地紧密联系在一起. 珀西家族将会成为独立王国的主心骨.

original: Before the creation of England, Northumbria was an independent kingdom which, in the 7th century, achieved overlordship of England's north. It is up to us to do justice to our ancestors and restore their hegemony.
translation: 在英格兰建立之前,独立的诺森伯兰王国在7世纪成为了英格兰北部的领主. 祖先的遗产是否能被发扬光大取决于我们.
不列颠基督教的发源地

original: Although not the first place in Britain to be converted to Christianity, the kingdom of Northumbria was where it most firmly took root. Saints made their homes here, and the monastery at Lindisfarne was a major early Christian centre. Let us cultivate this heritage as a centre for the true believers of the British Isles.
translation: 诺森伯兰尽管不是不列颠最早皈依的国度，但基督教在这里深深扎根。圣徒在这里定居，林迪斯法恩修道院是早期主要的基督教中心。让我们培育这笔遗产，是我们的国家成为不列颠群岛上真正信徒的中心。

original: Northumberland has the greatest concentration of castles anywhere in the British Isles. Refortified and updated, they will protect us from our enemies.
translation: 诺森伯兰在不列颠群岛中有着数一数二的城堡密度. 在重新装备修缮后,这些城堡可以很好的保护我们.

original: As well as being a religious centre, the monastery at Lindisfarne was renowned for its production of high-quality manuscripts like the Lindisfarne Gospels. Let this legacy inspire us to further cultural achievements in the future!
translation: 林迪斯法恩不仅因作为宗教中心而闻名,其产出的高质量,名为林迪斯法恩福音的手稿也享有盛名. 让这个遗产激励我们创造更高的文化成就!

original: Beside our strong religious roots, Northumberland is also starting to see a rise in innovation. The Literary and Philosophical Society is a centre for this, and we hope that it will provide us with many innovations in the future.
translation: 除去优厚的宗教背景，诺森伯兰也逐渐见到变革的曙光. 文学与哲学协会正是变革的一个中心，我们希望它能带来更多进步.

original: As the industrial era dawns, it has become clear that Northumberland is home to large coal deposits. More efficient mining practices and the development of the great port at Newcastle will allow us to exploit this to the full.
translation: 工业时代的黎明来到，诺森伯兰被发现是一座大煤矿的所在地。更高效的挖掘技术以及发展纽卡斯尔大港会让我们更好地利用这一资源。

original: With the ascension of Min Saw Mon on the Arakanese throne a new era has begun. Our royal dynasty has ties far into the past yet the move of our capital to Mrauk-u promises great new things for our kingdom and people. The Arakanese Chronicle will forever tell this story of our line and our people to future descendants.
translation: 随着弥修摩登上阿拉坎王座，历史翻开了新的篇章。 我们的王朝历史悠久，但迁都至妙乌会给王国带来新风， 阿拉坎的史记将为未来的子民讲述我们的传奇。

original: The Bengali Sultanate is an influential neighbor, both culturally economically and as a military force in our region. As a neighboring kingdom we would be wise to integrate any Bengali immigrants into our society and open our minds to their ideas and their faith.
translation: 孟加拉苏丹国是本区域内在经济文化和军事上都有着相当影响力的邻居。作为邻国，接纳任何来自孟加拉的移民与他们的他们的思想与宗教是明智的。

original: The bay of Bengal is a rich trading hub around which everything in this region revolves and Arakan's position is quite close to its center. We must make good use of this position and do what we can to encourage Arakan's growing role in international trade.
translation: 孟加拉湾富饶兴盛，是这个地区事务的中心，而阿拉坎离此中心很近。我们必须好好利用这一地理优势，鼓励阿拉坎在国际贸易中成长为重要角色。

original: The rich trade ports of the Bengal delta are full of easy pray for pirates. This has attracted adventurers from our lands as well as from far away places such as India or even Europe. We should welcome these pirates and allow them to use our country as a base for their raids on the ports of our enemies.
translation: 孟加拉三角洲富庶的贸易充斥着海盗们的猎物。来自印度甚至遥远欧洲的冒险者们接踵而至。 我们应当欢迎这些海盗使用我们的基地并利用他们劫掠我们敌人的港口。

original: Arakan has never been a Muslim nation, yet the monarch has styled himself a Sultan. Making sure that we act as a part of the greater Indo-Persian world and keeping track of the court culture of our Muslim neighbors can be quite beneficial.
translation: 阿拉坎从不是一个穆斯林国家，但君主们却称呼他们自己为苏丹。这有利于我们确保自己是大印度波斯世界的一部分，并与近邻宫廷的文化保持联系。

original: The Sultan takes advice from Muslims who have had experience in the courts of India. Looking abroad for outstanding courtiers can only bring good things.
translation: 苏丹听从那些在印度宫廷享有盛名的穆斯林顾问的建议。寻求国外的优秀人才百利而无一害。

original: Complex trade contracts made with other nations give an impression of sophistication and encourage foreign merchants to trade in our cities
translation: 通过与其他国家签订复杂的贸易合约能营造一种优越先进的印象，并吸引外国商人到我们的城市进行贸易。

original: Our branch of the House of Wettin, the Ernestine Line, and our rivals in the Albertine Line, have come to an agreement to divide our lands peacefully. We are the rightful rulers of Thuringia!
translation: 韦廷王朝的后继，我们恩斯特系与对手阿尔布雷希特系，最终和平地签署了瓜分土地的条约。我们是图林根的合法统治者！

original: Let us make the great fortress town of Erfurt the strongest fortifications in all of Germany. Many armies have come to conquer, but few succeed.
translation: 让我们把埃尔福特镇建成全德意志最坚固的要塞。铁打的堡垒流水的兵。

original: Our line is renowned for being protectors of the great reformer Martin Luther when others sought to silence him. Europe knows that we do not stifle unorthodox thought.
translation: 当他人试图压制伟大的宗教改革者马丁路德时，我们王朝闻名于对他的保护。 全欧洲都知道我们不会扼杀非正统的思想。

original: We should strive to make the new university at Jenna into a great a new beacon of learning throughout Germany! These students are the future of our country, let us encourage them to think freely and passionately in order to advance society. A few duel wounds is a small price to pay for great ideas
translation: 我们应当努力将新设的耶拿大学建立成德意志的新学术圣地！这些学生是我们国家的未来， 激励他们为社会的前进而自由激情地思考。决斗中的些许负伤不过是伟大思想的小小代价。

original: Due to the large number of males in the Ernestine Branch of the Wettins, various duchies have been split off during most generations for junior members of the dynasty. But, conversely, this means when a line dies out, there are always heirs in a sister duchy to take over, with minimal fuss or outside interference.
translation: 韦廷王朝的恩斯特系中男丁众多， 许多公国在几个世代中因晚辈而分裂出来。但相反地，这意味着当一个旁系绝嗣，总有同宗公国能安稳地继承它，外人无从下手。

original: The city of Weimar has become one of the great centers of the Enlightenment in Germany. Renowned writers and artists such as Goethe and Schiller now make Weimar their home. With such famous personages living here, we shall become famous throughout Europe as a center of learning and culture!
translation: 魏玛已经成为了德意志最伟大的启蒙主义中心。 知名作家与艺术家，例如歌德和席勒现在都定居于此。借着名人的荣光，我们必将成为全欧洲学术与文化的明灯。

original: With so many branches, our line of the Wettins usually has many young lords and ladies available on the royal marriage market. Others may sneer that we are merely the 'stud farm of Europe', but we know that royal marriages are among the greatest assets available in the diplomacy of our era.
translation: 韦廷王朝众多的旁系意味着许多佳人俊材可以被参与联姻。 其他人嘲讽我们是“欧洲种马牧场”，但我们知道联姻是本世代最重要的外交筹码。

original: The legend of Judith the queen who annihilated the Axum Empire endangering our lands five centuries ago is forever proof of our military capabilities. Let us restore the Armies of Gudit to protect ancient legacy of Beta Israel! We are few but we are strong, as we are the Chosen People.
translation: 五个世纪前犹迪斯女王摧毁了觊觎我们土地的阿克苏姆王国，这一传奇成为了我们军事实力的永恒证明。 让我们重建犹迪斯的军队，保护贝塔以色列的古老遗产！ 我们短小而精悍，我们是天选之人。

original: The Mountains of Semien have served us well in the many wars against stronger neighbors. By organizing our defenses against these natural fortifications we can greatly increase the efficiency of our defenses.
translation: 在多次抵抗强邻的战争中，色眠的群山是我们的天然屏障。围绕这些自然工事组织防御，能大大提高我们的防御效率。

original: The Kebra Nagast, or The Glory of the Kings, is a 14th-century account written of the origins of the Solomonic line of the Emperors of Ethiopia. The text, in its existing form, is at least 700 years old and it contains an account of how the Queen of Sheba met King Solomon and about how the Ark of the Covenant came to Ethiopia. It is the ancient story describing birth of Beta Israel and our great legacy - and we won't let it perish.
translation: 柯布拉 奈加斯特，意为诸王的荣耀， 是14世纪时对埃塞尔比亚皇帝所罗门一系起源的记录。 这些流传了700年的文献记录了示巴女王与所罗门王的会面，以及约柜如何抵达埃塞尔比亚。这些远古的传说描绘了贝塔以色列的起源以及我们伟大的遗产，我们不会令其消亡。

original: Our Christian and Muslim neighbors have declared that Jews may not hold land in their kingdoms. This has led to a number of our brothers and sisters in faith having adopted new vocations. Throughout Ethiopia the Beta Israeli men work as builders while the women decorate castles and churches. By encouraging some of these men and women to settle in our lands, free of oppression, we can benefit from the narrow-mindedness of our neighbors.
translation: 我们的基督徒与穆斯林邻国宣称犹太人不可在他们的国度拥有土地。这导致我们的许多同胞不得不选择其他职业。在整个埃塞俄比亚，贝塔以色列的男性从事建造者的工作，而女性则去装饰城堡与教堂。我们可以鼓励这些男女来我们的土地定居以免除压迫，邻国狭隘的心态使我们受益匪浅。

original: Ours is a holy dynasty of kings and privileged descendants of Zadok, once high priest during the reign of King David and King Solomon. Zadok's descendants have been ruling the Kingdom of Semien and the people of Beta Israel for centuries, while bravely fighting anyone wishing to destroy us. Our right to this land is undisputable.
translation: 我们神圣的王朝源自大卫王与所罗门王时的大祭司撒都的后裔。撒都的后人统治色眠和贝塔以色列人长达数个世代，并英勇地与敌人斗争着。我们对此地的权利无可辩驳。
散落的贝塔以色列部落

original: Jews are living in small communities across the entire world, serving as artisans, advisors, bankers, merchants, scholars and mercenaries; they need to know there is one place in the world where they can be truly free and safe. Let us encourage Jews from all neighboring regions to settle in our country.
translation: 犹太人聚居于分布在全世界的小社群中，他们从事工匠、顾问、银行家、商人、学者或佣兵等职业；他们应知这个世界上有一片安全且自由的净土。让我们鼓励附近地域的犹太人到我国定居。

original: The Enlightenment is changing the courts of Europe forever and Jewish intellectuals have been playing an important part in this process. Let us integrate the Jewish Enlightenment in our society and reap the benefits of secularization, studies of the Hebrew language and Jewish history.
translation: 启蒙运动永久地改变了欧洲宫廷，而犹太知识分子在这一进程中扮演了重要的角色。让我们把犹太启蒙主义整合到我们的社会中，并从研究世俗化、希伯来语和犹太历史中获益。

original: Before his death by lightning strike, the legendary King Mangrai created most of the institutions of our kingdom. We still strive to emulate his example.
translation: 在传奇般的孟莱王雷殛身亡前，他为我国创立了许多制度。我们仍然以他为榜样。

original: Just as a Pan-Na is a thousand rice paddies, a Lan-Na is one million. A nation so blessed readily yields all the food and wealth it needs.
translation: 正如潘纳拥有数以千计的稻田，兰纳更是其千倍。我们国家必定是受到上天祝福，才能轻而易举地依靠土地自给自足。

original: It is said that the waters of the Mae Kong River have their origins in a great benevolent serpent. Whatever the truth, they provide our realm with great fertility and abundance.
translation: 传说湄公河源自一位善良的蛇仙。无论传说真实与否，湄公河为我国带来富饶和生机。

original: Half the relic of Sumanathera was carried by a white elephant to the top of the mountain, where it stopped and fell dead. Here the king instantly ordered a great temple be constructed.
translation: 素贴一半的遗物由山顶的白象背负，也是在那里，它离开了世间。于是国王立刻下令建造一所宏伟的寺庙。

original: Our kingdom has long brought in tribute from smaller realms to the east and south. We can slowly assimilate them under our control.
translation: 我国素来接纳东南方小国朝贡。我们可以慢慢同化他们，将其纳入我们的统治下。

original: Elephants are a potent weapon of war, and we would be wise to use them to scatter and destroy the armies of our enemies.
translation: 战象是战场上的利器，使用它们来冲散和摧毁敌军是明智之举。

original: We must do what we can to intertwine our great families with the dynasties of neighboring states. This will both help us achieve our goals and gain us valuable friendships in the long run.
translation: 我们须尽力与邻国的王室联姻。这不仅能帮助我们达成目标，也能带来长久的友谊。

original: The founder of Pagarruyung Kingdom was Adityawarman, cousin of the king of Majapahit Empire. From the many inscriptions he left behind our people have inherited his devotion for esoteric Buddhism. We have to ensure his great legacy will endure as the influence of Muslim Sultanates spread among these islands.
translation: 帕迦鲁荣王国的奠基者阿底提耶跋摩，是满者伯夷国王的表亲。从许多铭文中可以了解到，我们沿袭了他对怛特罗佛教的投入。在穆斯林苏丹们的影响力席卷整个群岛时，我们必须确保这一伟大的传统不受侵犯。

original: Our kingdom is prosperous thanks to export of gold, wise politics and the trade connections of our merchants in the archipelago. Many of the Minangkabau people have worked as intermediary traders for the Srivijaya empire, Aceh or Malacca. Trade is in the blood of our veins.
translation: 我们王国繁荣得力于黄金的输出、优良的政策与群岛间的贸易。许多米南佳保人在三佛齐、亚齐或马六甲从事商贸。贸易流淌在我们的血液中。

original: Istano Basa Pagarruyung, our royal palace is built in the traditional Minangkabau Rumah Gadang vernacular architectural style. It is the center of our state and our entire culture, the proof of eternal right of Pagarruyung dynasty to these lands - and it will be our heart for centuries.
translation: 帕迦鲁荣大宫，是一座传统米南佳保鲁玛嘉丹式的建筑。这里既是我国政治文化的中心，也是帕迦鲁荣王朝统治此地数个世纪的证明。

original: The royal power of Istano Basa Pagarruyung has been split into three recognized reigning kings: the King of the World (Raja Alam), the King of Adat (Raja Adat), and the King of Religion (Raja Ibadat). Collectively they are called the Kings of the Three Seats (Rajo Tigo Selo). Their cooperation ensures our strong diplomatic position in the civilized world - unlike other savages who would be ruled by a sole Tyrant chief!
translation: 帕迦鲁荣大宫的权利分化为三个王座：治世之王（拉者阿兰）、治民之王（拉者阿达）和治教之王（拉者伊巴怛）。作为一个整体他们被称为三王座（拉者 提戈 瑟罗）。他们之间的合作确保了我们在文明世界的强大地位，而不像那些由暴君统治的野蛮人。

original: Our people are not as numerous as the people of Java but we are very influential as there is nothing more important than education in our culture. In addition to being renowned as merchants, the Minangs produce some of Indonesia's most influential poets, statesmen and scholars; adaptation to new techniques is the key to the greatness of Pagarruyung.
translation: 我们的人口不及爪哇，但是在我们的文化中，教育是最重要的。除了以经商闻名，印度尼西亚中最具影响力的诗人、政治家和学者都来自米南佳保。适应新的技术是帕迦鲁荣强盛的关键。

original: Our traditional architecture and the functions of the Rumah Gadang House reflect the culture and values of the Minangkabau. A Rumah Gadang serves as a residence, a hall for family meetings, and for ceremonial activities; rich ornaments and splendid looks make that the symbol of Pagarruyung and our architectural capabilities.
translation: 我们的传统建筑鲁玛嘉丹是米南佳保文化和价值观的写照。鲁玛嘉丹不仅可作为居所，也是家族聚会和礼仪活动的举办场所。繁复的装饰与华贵的装点彰显着帕迦鲁荣建筑的伟大。

original: Adat Perpatih is a combination of practices and rules of life for the Minangkabau people. Property and land is passed down from mother to daughter, while religious and political affairs are the responsibility of men. Tradition protects the honor and dignity of the Adat Perpatih so that, however, poor an Adat Perpatih woman may be, she will always be cared for. This ensures that our society is not divided by petty conflicts.
translation: 阿达贝巴提是米南佳保人生活中一系列风俗规则的集合。财富和土地从母亲传到女儿手中， 而宗教和政治事务则是男性的职责。传统保障了阿达贝巴提的荣耀和尊严。不论阿达贝巴提的女性如何贫困，她也能得到应有的照料。这保障了我们的社会不会因为琐碎的冲突而分裂。

original: In our culture, ancient traditions are still running strong. Let us sacrifice wine, meat and rice to foster the faith of our people in the righteous worship of our ancestors, the spirits and gods of nature.
translation: 我们的文化中，古老传统仍十分兴盛。让我们献上酒、肉与米，鼓励人民祭拜祖先、鬼神和自然之灵。

original: Our yearly Dragon Boat Festivals follow an old tradition. Being organized by the clan chiefs and monarchs to be as splendid and exquisite occasions as possible, they take our people's minds of their sorrows.
translation: 一年一度的龙舟节是我们古老的传统.宗族头领和王族尽其所能组织盛大的节庆,让民众忘记伤怀.

original: The Miao are divided into several tribes only barely held together by our common culture, language and history. Welding together the Hmong, Li, Yao, and the White, Red, Blue and Black Miao would mean our armies could be coordinated much more efficiently.
translation: 苗族分为许多部族,仅由共同的文化语言和历史维系在一起. 联合赫孟,黎,瑶,白苗,红苗和黑苗意味着我们的军队指挥更加有效.

original: The Miao are renowned silversmiths, having devised a smithing technique based upon a specific silver alloy the secret of which we jealously guard. Our famous jewelery will help us spread our fame.
translation: 苗人是出名的银匠,保存着特殊的合金配方.我们著名的珠宝工艺增进我们的名声.

original: Our traditions dictate that no Miao may marry outside of his tribe. Whilst this decreases the freedom of the individual, our intra-tribal bonds are strengthened and sustained through this.
translation: 我们的传统决定苗人不可与外族成婚. 这样虽然限制了个人自由,但部族间却能更紧密的联系在一起.

original: Most of the Miao live in highly mountainous areas. We should be able to use the terrain and our knowledge of it to protect ourselves again enemy assaults.
translation: 大多数苗人居住在山林之间. 我们应当利用这类地形和我们丰富的知识防御敌人.

original: The Miao have always been a rebellious lot; we proved our worth as mighty and courageous warriors in our many uprisings against our Chinese overlords. We should utilize the experience learned from our past endeavors.
translation: 苗人自古不服统治; 我们通过多次反叛抵抗汉人统治证明了我们是多么优秀的战士. 我们应当利用这一经验.

original: 'The maritime customs of Barcelona', universally known as 'the Book of the Consulate of the Sea' is a collection of maritime customs and ordinances collected over the course of the 14th and 15th century. This remarkable book is one of the earliest collections of Maritime law and a sign of the strong maritime as well as judicial traditions of our people.
translation: "巴塞罗那海事馆"，或称为"海事馆之书"，是一些列关于定于十四十五世纪海事规定与要则的合集. 此书作为早期海事法的重要性标记着我国悠久的航海与法律传统.

original: Since 1265 The Council of One Hundred is the fundamental structure of the municipal government of Barcelona. The municipal authority rests on 3 counselors elected by a Council of one hundred individuals.
translation: 自从1265年以来,百人理事会就是巴塞罗那地区行政的基础. 这个行政实体依赖于由一百人选出的三个行政官.

original: While our country is young its institutions rest on centuries of legal and administrative habits. Continuing the old traditions of Roman law the Constitutions of Catalonia have been promulgated by the Catalan Courts since 1283.
translation: 即便我国历史尚浅，但其法律和行政体制却可追溯到数个世纪之前. 沿袭古老罗马法,加泰罗尼亚宪法是加泰罗尼亚法庭自1283年以来的核心.

original: Catalonia have many potential threats and enemies. The coast have often come under attack by Barbary pirates and across the Pyrenees invasions have often been staged into the core of the Catalan region. We must do what we can to fortify our country to ensure the safety of our young state and to make the most of the local geography.
translation: 加泰罗尼亚四面受敌. 海上有巴巴利海盗,比利牛斯山外有入侵者.我们必须加强这些地区的防御并最大化的利用当地地形,保障我们的国度能存活.

original: In times of war it is customary for groups of Catalans to take up arms. These groups, known as Miquelets, are maintained at parish level rather than by the central or the provincial governments. As they are called to duty by the sound of the village bell (Someten) they are also frequently called 'Somatenes' and while some would regard them as mere bandits they are always ready to defend Catalan lands from foreigners, from Turks and Frenchmen to the Castilians who would presumptuously call themselves 'Spanish'.
translation: 在战时，加泰罗尼亚人便会武装起来。由这些人组成的团体被称为米克莱，他们由教区负责供给，而非由中央或省级政府给养。每当村中大钟（索梅坦）响起，他们便武装起来，因而也得名「索梅特纳」。虽然一些人把他们视作山贼，但他们始终保卫加泰罗尼亚不受外国人侵扰，不论敌人是突厥人、法兰西人还是自称「西班牙人」的卡斯蒂利亚人。

original: 'Viurem lliures o morirem' (We live free or die) is the motto of the Catalan army and is printed on the black flags it carries. Guided by these words our men will endure, even when outnumbered and without allies for the freedom of their people.
translation: "不自由毋宁死"是加泰罗尼亚军队在黑旗上的标语. 这句话激励着士兵承受最恶劣的战事,保卫人民的自由.

original: Once our ancestors pioneered new techniques of iron-smelting in the Pyrenees. We must once again strive to be at the forefront of metallurgical advancement and encourage new techniques and the establishment of Iron Mills in our lands.
translation: 我们的祖先在比利牛斯山发明了新式的冶铁法. 我们应当秉承传统,走在冶金行业的前列,建立先进的冶铁厂.

original: The national epic of our people tells the story of the two brothers Phra Lak and Phra Ram and is ever present in our culture, from dances and drama to songs, paintings sculptures or manuscripts. The two brothers are the epitome of moral leadership, ethics, selflessness, and living true to Dharma and remain the foremost role model for every member of our people from the peasants to the rulers themselves.
translation: 关于古代两兄弟罗什与罗摩的国家史诗象征着我国的文化,包含诗歌台剧,绘画与雕塑. 这两兄弟是道德,领导与无私的典型,秉持达摩,是我国民众与统治者共同的榜样.

original: The legendary ancestor of our people, Khun Borom was sent by his father Indra, the king of gods to be the ruler of the Tai people. Khun Borom ruled the Tai people for 25 years and taught them to use new tools and other arts. Khun Borom then divided the Tai kingdom among his seven sons, giving each one of them a portion of the kingdom to rule. Thus Laos was born and this divine ancestry sets us apart from other peoples
translation: 我们祖先的传说告诉我们,天神因陀罗将他的儿子坤布伦派往人间，成为我们泰族人的神王. 坤布伦在人间统治了泰族人25年并教会了我们使用工具的技艺. 坤布伦之后将泰族人的王国分封给自己的七个儿子,每人治理王国的一部分. 因此老挝闪亮登场,这种神圣的血统将使我们与众不同.

original: The Phi are the tutelary gods of our people. Belief in these ancestral spirits live on side by side with religions such as Buddhism and Hinduism in our lands and this syncretism strengthens our state and its ability to harbor citizens of many faiths.
translation: 菲是我国民众的保护神. 对这些祖先神灵的信仰与佛教,印度教等共同存在,并融合在一起,加强了我国接纳多种信仰人民的能力.

original: Although elephants were used in other areas of the world in warfare, nowhere are they used in such numbers as here. In Laos, They are the key element of warfare and their numbers reach into the thousands. Allowing us to deliver devastating charges even in the thick jungles of South East Asia.
translation: 象在世界的许多地方被用在军事上，但在老挝军用象的数量最多. 战象是老挝战法中核心的一环,最多时达千头. 战象勇猛无敌,让我们能称霸东南亚的密林.

original: Lao people live at the center of the overland trade routes in Southeast Asia. In the south trade flows down the Mekong to Vientiane. In the north and northwest the overland trade routes from Burma and Lan Na pass toward Yunnan, where they join with the Chinese Southern Silk Road. We have to capitalize on these riches and build a state that can thrive on the trade that is brought to us.
translation: 老挝人自古居住在东南亚的商路之上. 南边,贸易自湄公河到万象;北边与西北,兰纳与缅甸的商路通向云南,最终接入中国的南丝绸之路. 我们必须得利与此,赚得盆满钵满.

original: Our people live on the highlands between dangerous and countless kingdoms if we are not prepared to defend our homeland ferociously we will easily come to be ruled by others.
translation: 我国人民居住在危险的山岳地带，四邻是无尽的异邦国度。如果没有做好保家卫国的准备，我们将被异邦人轻易地征服与统治。

original: Memory of the My Son Temples

The Great Temple Complex of our ancestors at My Son have been a part of royal traditions and ceremonies for centuries. When the Temples where lost by us to outside forces they have fell into disrepair and ruin. Now their memory is a symbol of what our civilization once achieved and what we must strive to live up to.
translation: 我们祖先在美山建立的寺庙群是长久来统治和仪式的中心.当这些寺庙为外人占领,便慢慢疏于修缮而破败. 现在对它们的追忆是我们伟大文明再一次崛起的目标.

original: Maritime and Riverine trade is the backbone of our economy. Our sailors are a natural part of the Indian-Ocean, Chinese as well as Malay Trade networks and it is also by ship that we bring the riches of the upper areas of our country. A system of wells along the coast ensures that both our and foreign traders are never far from being able to restock on this vital resource.
translation: 海上与河上的商路是我国的支柱. 我们的水手游与印度洋,中国海和马来贸易网络之间. 通过船舶我们也为国家内陆带来富庶. 沿着海岸的贸易系统保障了外国商人绝不会缺乏商品交易.

original: Through our culture and history our people is tied to India and the greater Indian World. Our familiarity with their culture is of great help when dealing with the Tamil and Telugu Maritime Traders and Merchants of South East Asia.
translation: 我们的历史文化都与印度世界紧密相连. 我们对他们文化的熟悉大大的有助于和泰米尔以及泰卢固在南洋商人的交流.

original: While we have been driven south by the Dai Viet our people was once said to cooperate with them. Let us aim to once again put our differences aside, or at least find new friends to protect us.
translation: 在我们被曾经与我们人民协作的大越驱赶至南方后.让我们放下不同的己见,再一次为同一目标而协作,或者至少找到一个能够保护我们的新朋友.

original: The ships that trafic our rivers bring us the rare Agarwood that is so highly sought abroad. We must do what we can to uphold this monopoly and make sure that we are the only source of the finest varieties.
translation: 河上之船带来沉香木,海外有人重金求.我们无论如何要保障对此高品质商品的垄断.

original: Our people are surrounded on all sides by different religions, cultures and societies. While we have thrived under these circumstances in the past it is said that many now wish our demise. We must fortify our cities and be prepared for whatever our enemies may have in store for us.
translation: 我们的人民被多种宗教文化包围. 即便我们在这样的境况中存活了下来,仍有不怀好意之徒期望我们的毁灭. 我们必须加固城市,备战备荒.

original: Our people have come to be more and more marginalized in many of the regions that where once under Champa control. As a result they are now migrating to new lands. For some the Cham diaspora has meant settling in Khmer lands, others move to the islands. While this is far from an organized movement of people if we provide them with places to settle they will surely prefer to do so under our protection over moving into the lands of our neighbors.
translation: 原本由占婆统治的地方,我们的民众越来越被排挤. 他们被迫迁徙. 这些占婆人有些去了高棉,有些向岛屿迁去. 即便无人组织,这些移民理所当然更愿意接受我们的保护,而非迁入我们的邻国.

original: Our nation is named after the hot springs, famous even in Roman times. Those who come to bathe in the soothing waters leave refreshed and invigorated.
translation: 我国充斥着温泉,自罗马时代就一直闻名于世. 洗了温泉,身心焕然一新.

original: Legacy of the House of Zähringen

For as long as anyone can remember our lands have been ruled by the ancient house of Zähringen, whose lineage can be traced almost to the beginnings of the Empire. The Zähringen title of Margrave, above that of a mere count, is one our rulers proudly maintain to this day.
translation: 很久很久以前,策林根家族便治理此地.家族血脉早过帝国. 策林根身居侯爵,绝非普通公爵那般角色.

original: Baden has always been a small state, often fragmented by the various branches of the ruling house. Over the years we have learned that the only way to maintain ourselves against greater powers is an active diplomacy.
translation: 巴登自古以来是个小国，往往由家族不同直系分割统治。这些年来，我们明白了在大国间生存的唯一方式是积极的外交。

original: The various members of our ruling dynasty have taken up differing sides in the Reformation. While this sort of thing has torn other states apart, the members of the different branches of the margravial family have, in their wisdom, decided a general live-and-let-live attitude would be the best course for Baden, even if we do squabble from time to time.
translation: 统治王朝中的许多成员选择了宗教改革的不同派系。这样的事情虽然会分裂国家，但侯爵家族的成员们依靠自己的智慧决定了互相尊重其他人的宗教信仰才是巴登生存的最佳办法，即便冲突不可避免。

original: For a long time, the various branches of our house have ruled over different parts of Baden. Now, however, only one line survives, reuniting the region, and making it strong and whole again!
translation: 长久以来,家族的支系统治着巴登不同的地方. 现在只有一支血脉留存,统一此地,唯有统一才是强大!

original: It pays to have friends in high places! By deft diplomacy and playing one power off another, we may be able to successfully annex massive amounts of land around us. It is time to seize this opportunity and expand our nation's size and population five-fold!
translation: 走后门好处多多! 合纵连横，穿梭与大国之间，我们也许能吞并许多附近的土地. 是时候让国土和人民都翻几个翻了!

original: With our ambitions comes a need for a greater title. Let us proclaim the Grand Duchy of Baden and claim our rightful place above the many Counts, Margraves and Dukes of Germany.
translation: 我们对于土地的野心伴随着更高头衔的需求. 让我们宣称自己是巴登大公国,凸显于德意志的公国侯国之间.

original: Sadiya has thrived in this region as a kingdom ever since the great Birpal founded our country. While our people did not originate here we have made this area our home and our history here goes much farther back than our Ahom neighbors. This is our land and we will defend it to the last man or woman, death before dishonor.
translation: 萨迪亚自比尔帕建立王国以来便一直存在. 我国民众在此长久居住,久于我们的阿霍姆邻居. 誓死保卫国家!

original: Our country lies at the axis of Tibet, Burma and India and the influence of all of these neighbors can be felt here. High in the mountain areas we control lie Buddhist monasteries while animist religions still thrive among the tribes in the hills. Most of the Sutiya people themselves have, however, adopted the Hindu religion of our southern neighbors. Our state is used to harboring many different faiths and this strength allows us to thrive in this heterogeneous region.
translation: 我国在西藏、缅甸与印度交汇之处。这些印象深远的邻居各自的宗教也呈现在此。高山上的佛寺、密林里原始宗教部落、皈依印度教的苏提亚人都是我们的邻居。我国充斥着不同宗教，对他们的容忍使得我们能继续存在。

original: Dominated by hills, woods and the high mountains of the eastern Himalayas our country is a rare beauty to some but an inhospitable defense-line to others. Let us marvel at what is ours and defend it at the same time by constructing fortifications that make good use of our natural defenses.
translation: 我国位于喜马拉雅东段的高山与山下丛林之间,具有美妙的景色,但对于敌人有着一道坚固的防线。让我们惊异于我们所拥有的美妙景色，并在同一时间通过修建堡垒来保卫它们，这些防御设施充分利用了我们具有的自然优势。

original: Nature is a powerful force in this region, always close ready to reclaim that which is not maintained. A strong state must build and keep great temples of monuments, to please the gods and to show the glory of our country to our people and foreigners alike.
translation: 在这片大地上自然具有伟大的力量,随时准备摧毁未经修缮之物. 一个强大的国家需要建立与维护强大的寺庙，以此取悦神灵，传播荣光.

original: The waters of the great river Dihang has traveled far to reach us before turning southwest into the lower areas where it is known as the Brahmaputra. The river provides is both a source of food, water and transportation. It binds the valley together and lets us travel further in a day than we could otherwise hope to.
translation: 大河迪汉流过我国,转向西南进入下游,下游的人称之为布拉马普特拉河. 大河供养我们食物水源,方便交通. 它连通河谷,相比于其它方式让我们能向更远处旅行.

original: Some claim that it was from us that the Chinese once learned of Gunpowder. If this is true it is not a legacy we have poorly managed. Let us adopt the tactics of the nations of the far west and make our infantry the strongest part of our army.
translation: 有人称中国人是从我们这偷学如何制作火药. 如果这是真的,那我们也该发扬这一传统. 让我们从西方人那学习战术,让我们的步兵成为军队中最重要的部分.

original: Tea is a native plant in this part of the world and our lands are ideally suited to grow it. With the arrival of foreign traders in both India and China the demand for this plant has increased astronomically. Let us give the foreign traders what they seek and invest in large tea plantations in our country.
translation: 茶在这里是当地古老的植物,非常适合在这里种植. 随着外国商人于印度和中国寻找这种东西，对于这种商品的需求与日俱增. 让我们向他们卖茶并在我们的国家大力投资茶种植业.

original: Neither Brahmanic or Buddhist influences have ever gained much of a following here. The people of Manipur is firmly rooted in the faith of our ancestors with their over 360 deites. This ancient religion may not gain us many friends in a world of castes, monks and greater religious communities but in these hills our traditions give us strength.
translation: 婆罗门与佛教徒都未尝能在此赢得很多追随者. 曼尼普尔的民众严守祖先信仰,供奉超过360个神灵. 这古老的宗教或许不能为我们在印度教世界带来许多盟友,但在山林之中,我们的传统既是我们的力量.

original: As a small valley state surrounded by bigger neighbors we have always had to comit fully to warfare or risk being destroyed. The Kings and Queens of Manipur have always stood ready to lead our armies in the field against our Shan or Kachar enemies.
translation: 如此的山谷小国,四面环敌,必须全力投入战斗并冒着被毁灭的风险来保卫领土. 曼尼普尔的君王们随时准备着领导我的军队,对抗我们掸邦与克查的敌人.

original: Unlike most states in this area the kingdom of Manipur has roots that go back millenia. Our legends and myths tell stories of kings that united the Meitei, Nagas and other tribes in this region to found the core of what is our state today.
translation: 不同于许多邻居,曼尼普尔历史悠久,上溯千年. 我们的传说讲述着一位统一曼尼普尔,那加兰和该区域其他部族并建立如今王国核心区域的国王的故事.

original: Where others have sought the comfort of widely spread scripts and literary traditions our kingdom have instead cultivated the ancient script of our ancestors. The Manipuri literary traditions are distinctly our own and mirror neither those of the Shan to our east or the Bengali to the west.
translation: 当他人寻求那些广为流传的文字和文学传统时,我国从祖先那接过了自己的文字. 曼尼普尔文学传统是属于我们自己的，与东部的掸邦或是西部的孟加拉都大有不同.

original: The Hills and valleys of Manipur have always been rather diverse and a great deal of minor chiefs and chieftains hold power over various tribal constallations. Let us unite our areas, with force if necessary, to create a stronger more unified Manipurean state.
translation: 在曼尼普尔的山谷密林中有许许多多有不同酋长首领统治的小部落. 让我们不惜运用武力联合这些部落,建立一个统一的曼尼普尔国家.

original: While our kingdom has always shunned stronger outside influences yet perhaps the time is ripe to cultivate closer ties to the west. Increasing numbers of our people have already come to embrace the Hindu religion alongside the faith of our forefathers and learning the script and language of our neighbors can only help increase our influence in the area.
translation: 我国一开始是拒绝外来影响的,但是现在是时候同西方建立更紧密的关系了. 越来越多的国人信仰了印度教同时保持了对我们祖先的信仰，学习我们邻居的语言文化，通过这些只会增加我们在此地的影响.

original: It is good to stand strong against invaders but a state without friends cannot survive forever. Let us seek new allies among the far-western countries and seek to involve and entangle them in the politics of this region to serve our purposes.
translation: 坚决抵抗敌人固然重要,但一个没有朋友的国家是不可能永远生存下来的. 我们需要寻求遥远西方新的盟友,拖他们下水,达到我们的目的.

original: Since time immemorial Somali ships have traveled to faraway markets, from the Arab Peninsula, the Swahili Coast and Egypt to India, Persia or even further. Along the coasts of Africa a great number of Somali seafaring cities have thrived and still thrive today continuing this heritage.
translation: 从古以来,索马里的船只穿梭在阿拉伯半岛,斯瓦希里海岸,从埃及到印度,到波斯甚至更远的市场中. 在非洲海岸上,海洋贸易建立的城市屹立至今.

original: The best way to be safe in a world as dangerous as this is to build a wall. A number of sensibly placed forts throughout our realm will help both defend our ports against western pirates and our settlements against the waves of migrating pastoralists of the inland.
translation: 在危险的世界中保障安全的最好办法便是建造城墙. 在国境内一系列仔细设立的要塞能保障我国港口不受西方海盗的侵袭,也能抵御内陆迁徙而来的游牧民.

original: While the loyalty of all our subjects to the state is undoubtedly great there is a bond that goes beyond the borders that some would draw on maps. We can always rely on our clansmen to support us as they rely on us to support them. Whether they reside inside our borders or not they are an extra resource to draw upon in times of need.
translation: 当我们的子民对国家都无比忠诚的时候,还有一种力量连接着我们与其他部族,超越了画在地图上的国界。我们可以随时依靠我们的部族来支持我们，就像他们依靠我们来支持他们。无论他们是否居住在我们的边界内，当在需要的时候，他们可以起到意想不到的作用。

original: Islam is far from a young religion in this region, yet it is not as firmly entrenched as in some other areas of the world either. Strong Christian kingdoms have from time to time come to threathen our state in the past and with the arrival of Western Christian ships along the coasts of East Africa it seems some precautionary measures might be needed. Let us look to the wider Muslim world for its expertise and equipment. Let our armies be as frightening as those of the Ottoman Empire.
translation: 伊斯兰教在此扎根已久，但仍不及在其他的地方基础深厚. 在过去强大的基督教国家一而再再而三的威胁我们,而现在随着西方基督徒的船只航行在东非海岸边,似乎需要采取一些预防措施. 让我们在广大的穆斯林世界寻求人才和装备，让我们的军队强大的如同奥斯曼帝国一般.

original: The Indian Ocean is in many ways one big economic sphere. Demand for slaves in the Indian Deccan or our abundant frankincense in Yemen dictate the conditions of our economy. Let us wisely consider our policies in regards to this trade so that we may grow fat from it rather than risk the merchants looking to the ports of our neighbors.
translation: 印度洋从许多方面来说都是一个巨大的经济区域. 印度德干对奴隶的需求和也门对乳香的需求都决定了我们的经济情况. 让我们运用政策推进贸易增强我们的经济实力,避免商人在去我们邻居的港口寻求贸易.

original: We are not the only ones to take an interest in the wealth of the Indian Ocean and the Red Sea. Be they western Pirates or Arab Corsairs they're all out to profit from the trade which we live of. We must meet this challenge and encourage our own Corsairs to take the fight to the enemy.
translation: 我们不是唯一觊觎印度洋与红海财富的人. 西方和阿拉伯的海盗都妄图从我们的贸易命脉中得利. 我们必须应对这些挑战并鼓励我们自己的海盗对抗这些坏蛋.

original: Some have come to regard our lands as a refuge when their homelands descend into increasingly chaotic conditions. Let us emphasize this trend and try to attract the valuable talents of the wider Muslim world to our borders where they can be put to good use.
translation: 当故乡纷争不断,许多人来到我国寻求庇护. 让我们推动这一潮流,吸引更多穆斯林世界流离的人才为我们所用.

original: At the mouth of the Irrawaddy river our ports are the natural entrepots for all the goods of Upper Burma. Jewels, rubies, elephants, teak, musk and other precious goods are shipped through our ports to China, India and even further west. The riches of our great city are such that the reflection of the smallest glimpse of light from our gilded cloth and walls may blind the unaware traveler at night.
translation: 在伊洛瓦底江口,我们的港口是所有来自上缅甸的商品的转口港. 首饰珠宝象牙美木麝香以及许多其他珍贵的商品通过我们的港口运往中国,印度和遥远的西方.我们伟大的城市的财富，多到以至于我们镀金布和墙壁上最小的一瞥光的反射都可能亮瞎晚上不知情的旅客的眼睛

original: Our country is famed for the vases and jars we produce from the clay and sands of our riverbanks. Martaban vases are used all over South East Asia, both ashore and on ships to store the water necessary for longer voyages.
translation: 我国用河岸的泥土制作的陶器瓶壶享有盛名。马达班陶器瓶壶在整个东南亚都被广泛使用，无论在岸上使用或是远航船上用来储存淡水。
达摩悉提判卷（收录达摩悉提王所做裁决的的文献）

original: Our rulers pride themselves to always be both fair and careful when dispensing the justice of the state. For this purpos they all educate themselves fully in all matters related to law and religion and their wise rulings have become widely known both here and abroad. Let us create collections of these rulings so that even the most distant local courts may benefit from the wisdom of the throne.
translation: 我们的君主历来为他们公正的统治而自豪. 为了这一目的,他们告诫自己无论何时都要按照法律与宗教来治理国家,他们智慧的裁决闻名于国内外. 让我们整理这些律法的合集,让最偏远的山村中的法官都可以从中得到智慧.

original: The history of the Mon people in this region goes over a thousand years back in time. The Mon or Ramans have lived here long before many of the groups that would now seek to control it. Let us seek inspiration in the old legends of our country and find cherish our ancient traditions.
translation: 孟族人在此地的历史已有千年.孟人,或称罗摩人,在此长久居住，他们居住的时间远久于那些后来尝试征服自此的民族.让我们在古老传说中寻找灵感,发扬我国古老的传统.

original: Our military traditions have served us well over the years but there are things we might learn from outsiders. Let us invite foreign officers from far and near. From France to the closer Shan states there are techniques and weapons we have not yet mastered that we would do well to incorporate.
translation: 我们的军事传统长久以来都十分有效,但也是时候向外来者学习了.让我们邀请远近他邦的军事顾问.不论是法国还是掸邦的军人都能给我们带来我们未曾掌握的一些新的武器和战术.

original: The Mon monarchy has always been strongly tied to the Theravada traditions of our people and in this country even a Monk might be king. Let us never forget this historical strength and do what we can to uphold the moral of our religious community or risk being deposed as an unworthy ruler.
translation: 孟族的君王历来与上座部佛教传统紧密联系在一起，甚至僧人都能成为国王。让我们利用这一历史优势，在宗教群体中赢得声望或是冒着被罢黜的危险去做一个糟糕的统治者。

original: Over the centuries of fighting over the riverine landscape of Lower Burma many of the Mon people have fled to other parts of Asia. Mon traders, soldiers and monks play a role in the domestic politics of many of our neighbors and now that we have consolidated our hold over the Mon homelands we may use their influence to our advantage.
translation: 数个世纪以来,下缅甸的河流的纷争不断,许多孟族人流离失所,去往了亚洲的其他部分. 孟族的商人,军人和僧人在许多邻国的事务有着不小的影响.现在我们已经统一了孟族的土地,我们可以利用他们的影响力来为我们我国谋取利益.

original: Like most states among these islands we have ancient ties to the Indian subcontinent. Our kingdom is said to be one of the oldest existing Indic kingdoms that once sprung up all over these islands. Cherishing these Brahmanical traditions we are still at home in all the major ports of India and the travelers and Merchants of the subcontinent are always welcome among us.
translation: 正如群岛中许多国度一般,我们在远古时也与印度次大陆有许多关联. 我们的王国被认为是印尼最早的王国,拥有许多岛屿. 这些婆罗门传统意味着在印度我们如同在家乡,而来自印度的旅客商人也受到亲人般的待遇.

original: The Islamic faith has spread like a wildfire in our region, both through conversions along the coasts and the arrival of traders from afar. In order to prosper in this area we must welcome these newcomers and avoid alienating both those who convert and those who don't.
translation: 伊斯兰教如野火般,传遍了这个地区许多国度. 这种传播是通过沿着海岸的传教以及从远方而来的商人完成的. 为了这地区的繁茂,我们需要接纳这些新来的商人,同时小心不要边缘化了那些穆斯林和不愿当穆斯林之人.

original: For centuries traders have come from China and India seeking the richest of these forests, Ivory, Teak, Pearls, Jade and Medicinal woods can all be found in abundance here. We must monitor this trade closely so that we may control it and tax it wisely.
translation: 数个世纪以来,同中国和印度的商人来到这里寻找森林中的财富,象牙,珍珠,翡翠和药材在森林中遍地都是.我们需要进一步监管这些贸易,便于控制贸易并有效地征税.

original: Pirates grow more and more bold in their raids and some have even begun to raid up into the deltas where our most valuable trade ports are situated. We must take act decisively against this threat by strengthening our fortifications, moving some of our wealth even further inland and patrolling our coastlines.
translation: 海盗们愈发猖狂,甚至袭击三角洲内,劫掠我们最宝贵的贸易站. 我们必须坚决抵抗这些威胁,加强工事,把财富进一步移至内陆,并巡逻海岸.

original: This archipelago has seen its share of wars and sharp political changes over the years and with the arrival of European ships and colonists in this region this has only increased. Together with the great ease with which one can move between these islands there is a steady migration of people from one island to the next. Our state has always prospered from letting foreigners in, let us welcome those who wish to settle here and assign places for them to live.
translation: 多年来之间冲突不断并产生了巨大政治上的变化,而随着欧洲船只和殖民者的到来,这些冲突和改变只会越来越多. 在岛与岛之间交通便利,移民也易于从一座岛屿向其他岛屿迁徙.我国自古便受惠于接纳外族人,让我们接纳这些移民,安排他们定居.

original: While we have come to be the dominant state of the Kutai coastline there are a number of other realms where our people live in various principalities and kingdoms. Let us unite the Kutai people into one Kingdom with strong central rules for all to follow.
translation: 尽管我们是库泰沿岸最大的国度,在其他国家仍有我们的同胞居住在那里. 让我们将库泰人民团结在一个强大的中央集权王国中.

original: Many parts of the forests and mountains of the inland are beyond our control, with various tribal constellations and micro-states professing vassalage when it suits them. Let us extend our authority over these people and formalize our relationship once and for all.
translation: 山林间许多地区都不在我们的控制之下，部落与小国星罗棋布，见风使舵. 让我们巩固对他们的控制,建立正式的主从关系.

original: Though our island is yet little more than a stop on the way for traders from richer and more influential lands we benefit highly from the busy trafic of trading vessels that criss-cross these islands. Chinese, Indian or Javanese traders all frequent our ports and the more attractive we make them the more our importance in this network grows.
translation: 尽管我们的岛屿只是更强大富庶国家商人停靠之地,但贸易流通也能让我们获利不少. 中国,印度和爪哇来的商客接踵而至,吸引他们在此停留能大大增强此地的贸易竞争力.

original: All of the islands of South East Asia are frequented by the Bajau, though none remember their origin by now. Known by their own as Sama, the Bajau lead their entire lives on their boats and live from trading and raiding the various ports of the islands that surround us. Let us encourage these natural sailors to come to our ports to sell their goods and replenish their stockpiles so that we may grow rich from their journeys and learn their secrets.
translation: 巴瑶族人在所有东南亚岛屿都留下过足迹,但他们的起源仍是未知. 巴瑶族又称为萨马族，完全在海上,依靠在岛屿间贸易和劫掠生活. 让我们鼓励这些天生的水手来我们的港口交易补给，并让我们能一边赚钱一边学习他们的秘密.

original: A Prau is a kind of vessel local to this part of the world and the most famous of them originate in our lands. While varying in size and form these ships allow us to quickly move large quantities of goods and people along our coasts and between the islands of the Archipelago.
translation: 发源与此地的普鲁亚船世界闻名. 虽然大小各异,但这些船都能在群岛间快速运输人与物资.

original: Within our lands a great number of petty rulers hold sway and though they all acknowledge us as their 'elder brother' and superior among equals the continuation of the pretence that power can be shared is causing greater strain than it is worth. Let us unify these lands fully and reap the rewards of direct control of the agricultural as well as maritime parts of the island.
translation: 在我们国境内，许多小君主各自为王，仅仅承认我们是地位同等的国家,损害了我们的尊严. 让我们统一全境，以受利于对农业和海商的直接控制.

original: In order to make the most of our situation we must strive to learn from our neighbors. There are ideas and concepts all over South East Asia that we would do well to study and adapt to our own society. Let us send our most gifted men abroad to study the ways of the Chinese, the Europeans, and the people of the other islands. Let us also interview any foreigner frequenting our ports for new ideas. If what we learn is found useful we must create similar concepts suited to the needs of our own people.
translation: 为了未来着想,我们必须向邻国学习. 在整个东南亚有许多值得我们学习的思想. 让我们送最优秀的人才去中国,欧洲和临近的岛屿学习，同时邀请长期往来我国港口的外国人,直接向他们了解新思想. 对于有用的,我们应当吸收适应传播给民众.

original: Outside powers would control the trade of these islands and force us all to use their ports exclusively. They aim to make the most out of every single item sold and their influence is threatening to stifle the ancien trade network of our region. Let us open our own ports to traders of all nationalities, competing with the outsiders by offering much lower prices.
translation: 其他国家或许会想控制本地岛屿,并限制使用他们之外的通商口岸. 他们寻求从每件商品中都获利,这样的举措威胁到了我们对这一古老贸易商路的控制. 让我们对所有国籍的商人开放港口,通过价格优势与这些国家对抗.

original: This archipelago is ideal for raids and pirates and the mountains and forests of the inland offers equally good opportunities to make life bitter for a foreign invader. As natives of this region we can make better use of these facts than most and we should do so to counter the hostile incursions of foreign powers.
translation: 群岛最适合劫掠,而其中的山林同样适于抵抗入侵者. 作为此地原住民,我们可以运用地利抵抗外国势力.

original: Though Chichen Itza is an abandoned ruin, its cenote remain one of our most sacred site. The well is an entrance to the afterlife, and ritual sacrifices carried there have greater power than those carried anywhere else.
translation: 奇琴伊扎虽为废墟,但天然井仍是我们最重要的圣地. 此井是通向往生的入口,在此进行的献祭能比它处带来更大的回报.

original: From time immemorial, we have built immense cities and great pyramids in a harsh jungle land.
translation: 远古以来,我们就一直在密林之中建造宏伟挺拔的城市和金字塔.

original: Xiu, Cocomes and Itza have been for many eras the ruling houses of the Mayan People in Yucatan. Their struggle, and numerous betrayals of one another, have left behind a fertile legacy of feuds and offenses awaiting repayment.
translation: 休,科科美和伊扎家族在尤卡坦统治玛雅人以有许多个世代. 他们之间明争暗斗,旧伤不断,新伤再来.

original: Strangers have begun washing on our shores, claiming to have crossed the sea in great boats with wings, only to fall off them. Some have married amongst our people, and become honored advisors to our rulers.
translation: 不知什么时候开始,海边开始出现外族人，宣称他们乘坐羽翼船越过大洋,但却落水漂至此处. 有些同我族通婚,有些成为了备受尊敬的王家顾问.

original: Since before the fall of Mayapan, our land has been divided in provinces. Though they have now grown into autonomous areas, they remain an effective way of administrating the land.
translation: 玛雅潘陨落前，我们的土地分为许多省份. 虽然他们现在各自为政,但治理效率却不减当年.

original: Some of our towns lie so deep in the jungle that they are effectively beyond the reach of enemies, making them far harder to conquer.
translation: 一些我们的城市藏在密林深处,敌人无从抵达,更无法征服.

original: We must not tolerate, not even for a moment, foreign rule over our people. No matter how long we have to wait, we will rise up again to seek our freedom.
translation: 我们绝不认可外族的统治，不论忍耐多久，我们必将崛起，重获自由。

original: Our patron-god is the lord of the sky. Through him come the rain and sun that make our land fertile, and that protect us from famine.
translation: 我们的保护神,天主，赐予我们甘霖雨露与阳光,保佑我们土地肥沃,不愁吃喝.

original: The Ilo'kab lineage has long provided our people with warriors, and their fighting traditions have been honed to their finest as a result. We are lucky to have such fighters at our side.
translation: 伊洛卡血脉源远流长,勇士辈出，他们的优秀的武术传统逐年精进. 有这样的勇士是我们的福气.

original: Trade and production have long been concern of the Tamub lineage. They have learned much of the ways of commerce, and through them we can greatly enrich our nation.
translation: 塔木血脉长久以来就专注于生产和贸易. 他们对商贸了如指掌，是我国重要的财富.

original: By recording the names and deeds of glorious ancestors, our noble houses can ensure their right to rule and the power of our nation.
translation: 通过不断宣传祖先的荣光，我们的贵族能继续维持他们牢固的统治。

original: Our people still sing the tale of the vengeance of our lord K'iq'ab, who led us into great battle along with our Kaqchikel allies to avenge the murder of his father by the K'oja traitors.
translation: 我们的民众仍在传颂基亚布引领我们,同卡基科盟友对抗叛徒科亚,为他父亲复仇的故事.

original: We have recorded our history from the dawn of creation to this very day so that it will last beyond our time.
translation: 我们记录了开天辟地至今所有的历史，并使其流传千古。

original: For thousands of years the cloves, nutmeg, sandalwood and other spices from our islands have reached the finer tables in Europe, China, India and Persia. This long journey has many stops but it starts here, among our islands and the incredibly productive sources of spices that they are.
translation: 千年以来,丁香,肉桂,檀香与其他各种香料都通过此地去往欧洲,中国,印度和波斯人的餐桌上. 千里之行始于此地，而我们的岛屿香料产量举世无双.

original: While the diversity is great among the Spice Islands there are certain myths and traditions that are known among the people of all of these islands. These tales help us identify true rulers and give our growing realm legitimacy.
translation: 尽管香料群岛民族众多，但某些传说却脍炙人口。这些故事指出谁才是正统，帮助我们建立合法统治。

original: At a glance we would lack the population and lands to stand up to other states. What we do have, however, is a network of loyal ports and islands extending far into the archipelago that surrounds us. All these islands will support us and allows us to control their production of spices. In order to make full use of this influence, however, we must extend and enforce this network and centralize the power of our central islands.
translation: 乍一看与他国相比我们缺乏人口与土地. 然而我们有一系列岛屿和它们忠实的港口,漫步整个群岛. 这些岛国帮助我们控制香料生产. 为了进一步增强影响力,我们应该提高集权,扩张控制.

original: Throughout these islands, in the many bays, ports and river mouths there are goods and tribute to be collected. Let us send forth a number of permanent trade agents to look after our interests in the various parts of the archipelago and to maintain our monopoly on the valuable goods we then export to the rest of the world.
translation: 这些岛屿中,不论是海湾,港口还是河口,许多货物可以课税. 让我们组织一批永久性的贸易经理人在群岛维护我们的利益,加强我国出口世界获取的垄断.

original: There were once four kingdoms in the islands of Maluku and if not all of them remain they continue to play an important role both in the royal ceremonies of our people and as a common legend to gather around in times of hardship.
translation: 曾经摩鹿加岛有四国,大多已消亡,如今他们只在皇家仪式和民间故事中出现,带领我们度过难关.

original: Throughout the centuries the Papuans have raided the islands and ships of this region. With the growing European presence in the area, however, we must put such things behind us and band together against hostile outside forces.
translation: 许多世纪以来,巴布亚人侵扰这地区的船只与岛屿. 当欧洲人越发猖狂，我们需要摒弃旧仇,联合对抗外来势力.

original: While it is true that the Europeans seem untrustworthy they are equally treacherous to each other. Let us seek to ally these newcomers when it suits us and discard them when their help is no longer required.
translation: 尽管欧洲佬不可信任,勾心斗角，但还是让我们与其中一些国家联盟，直到他们的帮助可有可无为止.

original: Once Ladakh was divided into two kingdoms ruled by two brothers. One day once a fitting monarch has been born to one of the lineages these kingdoms will once again be united and a victorious new dynasty will lead our people into the future.
translation: 拉达克曾经分为一对兄弟各自统治的两个王国. 某一天将会有一位伟大君王自其中一条血脉诞生,联合两国,领导人民走向光辉未来.

original: Our country has seen enemies come and go. From the Great Tibetan Empire to the great Karkota Kingdom of Kashmir under Lalitaditya to the Islamic raiders that now haunt us. The mountains that are our home, however, are also our castles. Let us further fortify the natural defenses that we have and never fear an invader or raider again.
translation: 我国经历过许多敌人。其中有伟大的吐蕃帝国，罗尼陀狄耶统治的克什米尔伽诃多王国，甚至是现在的伊斯兰匪徒。伟大的山丘既是我们的家园也是我们的壁垒。让我们进一步加固这些天然城墙，这样以来就不再需要惧怕任何敌人了。

original: Wool from the Roof of the World

High above the rest of the world the Ladakh plateau seemingly has little to offer compared to the fertile plains of India or even the trader cities of the Tarim Basin. For as long as anyone can remember, however, the nomadic Changpa has passed back and forth over our lands, herding their Changpa goats that give the finest wool imaginable, a highly sough after commodity to all our neighbors.
translation: 拉达克高原在世界之巅,既没有印度的沃土平原,也没有塔里木盆地的贸易都市. 但长久以来，羌塘牧民在此地来往放山羊,养出的羊毛举世无双，邻国争相抢购.

original: Our religious ties with Tibet has made our society stronger than our Muslim and Hindu neighbors who would control our lands to tax our trade and steal our wool. Let us further fortify the faith by constructing great monuments, Gompas and monasteries in these high mountains and by supporting the Monastic orders whenever we can.
translation: 我们与西藏的宗教关系使我们的社会比那些觊觎我们羊毛的印度教或穆斯林邻国更强大。让我们加强宗教，在山中建立大寺。

original: By writing down the fates of the monarchs that has come before us we can be sure that the world will never forget the origins of our victorious dynasty. Even in a time far from now we can be sure that our royal chronicles will keep the memory of our kingdom alive.
translation: 通过记录国王君王的事迹,世界将不会忘记这伟大王朝. 即便在遥远的未来,我们也能保障皇家编年史能维护我们王国的存在.

original: In order to avoid strife and discord between the many sons of our monarchs we must listen to the advice of the wise Lamas of our monasteries. Only one son must be allowed to inherit the crown while his brother may come to lead a monastery each among the many establishments in our country. In this way the family shall be able to make good use of its potential instead of squandering it squabling over the succession.
translation: 听从智慧的喇嘛教诲,我们能避免天灾人祸,保障国家统一. 只有王的一个儿子可以继承王位,而他的兄弟都必须进驻寺庙. 这样以来家族能好好发挥其能力,而非内斗.

original: The Wool that our kingdom exports have gained greater and greater fame abroad. We have received letters from the Emperor och China as well as the Russian Tzar. We should make good use of the fame our goats have brought us and encourage the foreign trade so that we may grow rich from it.
translation: 我国的羊毛声名远扬。中华天子和俄罗斯沙皇均遣使来信。我们应当利用这一好名声,鼓励外国商人来帮助我们创造更多的财富。

original: The decline of Great Zimbabwe has brought political instability and autonomous local chiefs have thrived in its wake. As the princes of the conquered peoples it falls upon us to maintain a strong army in order to enforce unity on these shattered lands.
translation: 伟大的津巴布韦的陨落伴随着许多政治动荡，独立自治的长老们也随之出现. 作为被征服人民的贵族，我们的职责是维持一个强大的军队,统一分裂的国土.

original: In order for our subordinate chiefs to prove their loyalty before us and before the gods they must once a year travel to the capital to rekindle their local fire using ours. Once a year has passed our army will extinguish their fire and they will have to make a new journey.
translation: 每年,地方长老们需要来我们的首都用圣火点燃他们自己的火堆,证明他们对我们和神明的忠诚. 而每年,我们的军队也都会前去熄灭他们的火堆,迫使他们来首都觐见.

original: Our state was once part of the Great Zimbabwe empire and while its decline is now behind us we still cherish some of its traditions. It is from a Great Zimbabwe that we have inherited the style and technique we use to construct our stone houses and our fortified cities which has allowed us to control this plateau so efficiently.
translation: 作为曾经屹立在大地的桑给巴尔帝国的一部分,即便帝国覆灭了,我们仍保留着一些他们的传统. 继承自帝国的建筑规格样式和建造技术如今运用在石制房屋和要塞都市中,使我们如此有效地控制这片高原.

original: Our ruler is not only our leader in the temporal sense but is also expected to speak on our behalf before the spirits of the dead. Before any campaign or harvest he will communicate our respect and our needs to the spirits of our ancestors through ceremonies or dances. Without a great ruler to maintain the royal graves and keep in close contact with our dead things might go awry very quickly for our country.
translation: 我们的君主不仅是现世生民的领袖,也是生者在逝者面前的代表.开战或收获前,他要向先祖的亡灵传达我们的敬意和需求. 如果没有一个伟大的君主重视皇家陵寝,且能维持与先祖的对话,我们的国家恐会江河日下.

original: Traditionally all important administrators, even on the local level, have been appointed from the extended royal family. As our empire has grown and matured, however, it is time we draw from the local knowledge of our subjects and allow them to elect their own administrators.
translation: 传统上,所有的行政官,不论职位高低,都由皇家钦定. 然而,随着我们王国的成长,是时候依赖我们子民的智慧,让他们自行选官了.

original: With the arrival of new traders in the Zambezi area we must ensure that our authority is respected. Everyone who wishes to do trade here and bring our dear gold and ivory to other shores must first be approved by our ruler and pay us the Curva tax in order to be granted free access. Should payments lapse all foreign merchandise will be confiscated by the Mutapa state.
translation: 随着越来越多商人来到赞比西地区，我们保障自身的权威的必要性日渐突出。任何期望在此交易走黄金和象牙的商人都必须经由我们伟大君主的同意，并缴纳一笔科瓦税。如有怠慢，任何外国货物都将被直接收缴。

original: Western travelers have named our land Ophir and the gold mines of the plateau and the control over the Zambezi trade have made many envious over the centuries. Let us extend a more direct control over these lands and the resources under our rule and avoid incursions by greedy foreigners and local potentates alike.
translation: 西方旅者把我们的土地成为欧非尔，而许多人垂涎对此高原上金矿的控制已久. 让我们加强对这些土地资源的控制,预防国内外贪婪之徒.

original: As every army since the days of Alexander has learned our lands can be quite hostile to outside invaders. Intermittent mountains with treacherous passes, deserts and hills await any enemy of ours and the population itself is used to use this terrain to its advantage to ambush and decimate any armed party intent to pass through these lands.
translation: 自从亚历山大以来的每支军队都明白我们的土地对外来者多么不友好. 掩面不断的山脉与崎岖的山路,兼有各式沙漠和山丘,面对我们的敌人微笑. 我们的人民利用这样的天险进行奇袭,可以摧毁任何妄图穿越此地的军队.

original: We live in a time of opportunity and challenges. The impact of our decisions are such that ballads and legends are being written about the heroes and warriors of this age already. Let us act in accordance to the Baluchi code and give those that come after us an ideal to aspire to for generations to come.
translation: 我们的时代机遇与挑战同在. 我们决断的影响记录在关于英雄勇士的诗歌传说中. 我们的行为应当符合俾路支教条,并成为后辈的榜样.

original: The Baloch are a proud yet divided people. Used to enjoy the freedom of independence we are perhaps held back by our lack of unity. Let us name our ruler Khan of all Baloch and unite behind a common cause. Our neighbors will never again be safe.
translation: 俾路支人骄傲却无比分化. 尽管过去保有相当的自由,但缺乏统一. 让我们自称俾路支的大汗,统一我们的子民,给邻国带去恐惧.

original: Tribal loyalties are strong in our lands and in many ways trying to supplant these by loyalty to our state can be a futile exercise. Instead of trying to create an army like that of our Indian or Persian neighbors let us work with the system we have. Each major tribe should be made accountable to create and maintain an army to our standards and to pay for the expeditions we order. In return we will strengthen their authority over the minor tribes under their control.
translation: 此地的部族关系紧密,而尝试让他们服从国家则十分困难. 我们应当尝试像波斯或印度邻国那样组织一支正规军. 每个主要部落应当负责组织和维护一部分军队. 作为回报,他们可以保有相当的自治权.

original: We control a region considered dangerous or even intraversible by many and raiders from our lands have for millennia prayed on the traders of surrounding regions. Yet it is possible to travel through Baluchistan and Makran from Kabul to Sindh and we know the passes and paths through the mountains and deserts. Let us open our routes to traders and tax them for our protection.
translation: 我们的控制区被认为危险而难以穿越,千年以来满是土匪. 而通过俾路支和莫克兰去喀布尔和信德的路则一直为我们所知. 让我们开放商路,保护商人,顺便课税.

original: Traditionally tribal chiefs, often elected from within their clans, control the lands and their produce in this region. It is time we create a more efficient system where we appoint a chief to act as landlord on our behalf. This way we know who is accountable and where his loyalties lie and we can control the produce to a much greater degree than today.
translation: 传统上,部落酋长由部落选举而出，他们控制自己的土地并生产物资. 是时候让我们建立一套更有效的体系,通过钦定酋长和领主,我们可以让更可信的人控制这些土地,生产更多物产.

original: Our troops have gained a strong reputation fighting as mercenaries or allies in the armies of others in Persia or the subcontinent. Let us use their experience and their new contacts to bring forth a new breed of professional and competent officers.
translation: 我们的军队作为雇佣军和其他波斯或印度国家的盟友举世闻名. 让我们利用这一经验和人脉,训练出一批更专业的军官.

original: The siege of Orleans by the English troops in 1428, and the later rescue by Joan of Arc in 1429, demonstrated to all the strategic importance of Orléans in France: whoever holds the city holds both sides of the Loire River.
translation: 1428年,英格兰围攻奥尔良. 1429年,圣女贞德前来解围,证明了奥尔良对法国的战略重要性:掌握奥尔良之人掌握了卢瓦尔河的两岸的控制权.

original: If there is one crossroads for trade in France, it is in Orleans. The Loire Valley offers easy access to the lower course of the river and the Atlantic ocean; upstream lie Burgundy and the Rhone valley, downstream the Mediterranean Sea; finally Orleans is the northernmost town along the Loire River, and as such offers easy access to Paris through the plain of Beauce.
translation: 如果说法国有一个贸易节点,那便是奥尔良. 卢瓦尔河谷提供了向下游和大西洋的通路; 勃艮第和通向地中海的罗纳河谷在上游; 而奥尔良是卢瓦尔河谷最北的城市，通过平原便是巴黎.

original: Orléanais holds all the trumps to become a major production center once again, after wars and devastations: not only is his position an asset for trade, but the fruitful plain of Beauce promises a prosperous future. Soon Boyne will be the saffron capital of Europe, if not the world, and traders will flock from faraway countries to buy the precious spice.
translation: 奥尔良人一度掌握着最主要的生产基地，即便在战争摧毁之后，不仅地理上利于贸易，肥沃的平原也提供丰饶的未来. 很快布瓦内就将是欧洲,甚至是世界的藏红花之都，全世界都会争相前来购买这香料.

original: Some rulers needed a long time before really discovering this obvious fact: Nowhere in France is the weather more pleasant, or landscape more beautiful and peaceful than here. With the secret out, magnificient new palaces are being built here, the Châteaux of the Loire Valley, showing both the power of the owners and the great talents of our architects.
translation: 某些君主久久才明白一个道理: 全法国,这里的气候最宜人，风景祥和. 这个秘密为世人所知后，华美的宫殿拔地而起，这就是卢瓦尔河谷的城堡，向世人展现着权力和建筑技艺.

original: Our city needs a great cathedral and the one we have has borne the brute of the conflicts of the last centuries. Let us begin the construction of a new great Cathedral worthy of our great city.
translation: 我们的城市需要一座大教堂,现有的一座已经历了数个世纪的战火. 让我们建一座新的大教堂,以配得上我们的城市.

original: Orleans is faithful to those who love it, and a rebel alongside those who think any authority is not guaranteed. From Joan of Arc, the maid of Orléans; to Jean Calvin who studied law here and later rejected any papal authority; or Jean-Baptiste Poclain who later took the name of Molière and constantly made fun in his theatre plays of any form of hypocrisy in religion or society, the children of Orleans has set their mark upon the world.
translation: 奥尔良不亏待爱护她之人,同时也支持那些反对权利是固有的起义者. 圣女贞德是奥尔良的少女; 约翰加尔文在此学习法律,进而反对教宗权威; 以及本名让 巴蒂斯特 波克兰的莫里哀,在他的喜剧里嘲弄社会与宗教的虚伪. 奥尔良的子女们在世界上留下了他们的印记.

original: It has been said that Hormuz is 'a vast emporium where there were peoples and goods of every description from all parts of the world' or that 'If all the world were a golden ring, Hormuz would be the jewel in it'. For centuries traders have been coming to our islands to sell and buy their goods and in time our kingdom has become synonymous with the wealth they bring.
translation: 古话说"世界各地的人都到霍尔木兹的大市场来"或是"若世界是枚金戒,霍尔木兹便是上面的宝石". 许多个世纪以来,商人进出我们的岛屿进行交易，我们的王国也变成了他们获利的同义词.

original: While Qeshm and Hormuz may not be the most hospitable places to act as the base for a Kingdom they are safer than the coastline which is often raided or attacked by those who covet our wealth. Let us build strong fortresses on these islands to protect what is ours and those who would come to trade with us.
translation: 格什姆岛和霍尔木兹岛或许不是最适合作为王国中心的地方，但它们远比绵延的海岸线安全的多,远离觊觎我们财富之人的侵扰. 让我们建起大要塞,保护这些岛屿和在岛上交易的商人.

original: Since time immemorial we have paid the people of the coastline for their protection and for allowing us access to the additional fresh water and food we require. Let us replace this old institution with a more efficient and formal relationship.
translation: 不知从何时开始，我们向岸上人进贡,换取他们的保护和额外的淡水食物. 让我们用更现代有效的系统替换这一古老过时的体系.

original: An Island kingdom needs to look far abroad for friends and allies. Let us seek out those who would support us among the enemies of those who would attempt to subjugate us.
translation: 作为一个岛国，我们需要自远方寻求盟友。让我们与愿意支持我们的友邦结盟，以对抗那些妄图征服我们的敌人。

original: We have aquired our position not only by making sure that those who would trade at our port are safe here and on their way here, but also by either eliminating or outbidding our competition. We must adopt a constant policy of monitoring the trade ports around the Persian Gulf to ensure that none would dare attempt to surpass us.
translation: 我们能得到今天的地位,仰赖于保障来此交易之人的安全,同时排挤我们的竞争对手. 我们必须建立长期政策,监视波斯湾的贸易港,保障我们的垄断地位.
开发格什姆和霍尔木兹

original: Qeshm and Hormuz might seem inhospitable and barren yet the islands have always had a certain wealth themselves, iron and salt can both be obtained here and as long as extra water and food is brought from the mainland they can support cities. It is time we spend some of our wealth to make this centre of our kingdom more sustainable.
translation: 格什姆岛和霍尔木兹岛虽然贫瘠,不适于居住，但它们却创造了许多财富. 盐铁本地有卖，而大陆上供给食水,城市便能存活. 是时候投资建设我们的王国中心了.

original: Fishermen, traders and even pirates have always frequented our islands and our state has also maintained considerable navies. It is, however, high time we create a greater and more modern navy worthy of our kingdom's reputation as the centre of the Persian Gulf.
translation: 渔夫商人甚至是海贼都常光顾我们的岛屿,我们也有数量可观的船只. 但是时候扩展更加现代的海军,配得上我们王国的名声和在波斯湾中心的地位.

original: The Greek Church stand as the oldest and most prestigious of all the orthodox churches and our Christian faith has always been one of the most important things to bind our people together during harsh and arduous times. Let us cherish our Christian heritage and find strength in our faith.
translation: 希腊教会是正教会,是整个基督教信仰中最古老最受尊敬的一支,而保障我们的子民度过难关一直是我们最重要的责任. 让我们维持这一传统,在信仰中寻找力量.

original: For millenia the Greek people have traversed the Mediterranean sea and while foreign powers have come to dominate the region politically Greek captains and Greek sailors still make up a sizable part of their navies. Let us draw from their experience as well as the experience of the Greek pirates, smugglers and fishers throughout the region to create a strong navy for our state.
translation: 千年以来,希腊人穿梭在地中海,外国势力在此建立霸权,也得仰赖许多希腊人水手航船. 让我们利用来自希腊海贼,偷渡者和渔夫的传统,建立一支符合我国国情的海军.

original: The arduous years of foreign occupation both under the Franks and the Turks saw the birth of a staunch resistance among the Greek populace. Eventually some groups would take to the mountains and continued a violent resistance to foreign occupation from there. These 'theifs' can now be integrated into our army as an efficient irregular arm, ready to strike at our enemies with both fervor and experience.
translation: 在法兰克人和突厥人统治下的年岁里，许多希腊人投靠了抵抗军. 最终这些组织退居山林,从那里组织抵抗外族统治. 我们可以收编这些"山贼",作为拥有丰富经验,狂热的非正规军,随时准备投身战斗.

original: Educated and resourceful men are always in demand and as a result many of our countrymen have during the centuries moved abroad to take service in the courts of countries all over Eastern and Southern Europe. With an independent Greek state once again in existence we can convince a number of these Greek nationals to return to the lands of their childhood or forefathers.
translation: 任何国家都希望获得教育良好的人,在过去的几个世纪里,我们的国人流离在外,服侍南欧和东欧的朝廷. 当独立的希腊国崛起时,我们可以说服这些同胞回归家园.

original: From Rome to Venice and later the Ottoman Empire many have sought to control the trade between East and West by conquering Greece and the Greek islands of the Eastern Mediterranean. As an independent Greek state it is our duty and our heritage to control this trade for ourselves rather than allow others to grow rich from our strategic position.
translation: 从罗马，威尼斯，到今日的奥斯曼帝国，都尝试通过征服希腊及东地中海周边岛屿来控制东西方之间的贸易。 一个独立的希腊有责任继承遗产，我们应当主动取得贸易主动权，而非拱手让出这些战略要地。

original: Greece was once the cradle of Western Civilization and our ancestors are still revered throughout Europe. Let us make good use of this reputation to obtain the valuable alliances we need to grow.
translation: 希腊一度是西方文明的摇篮，我们的先祖仍受整个欧洲敬仰。让我们利用这一点，获得更多有价值的盟友。

original: Our ancestors were great thinkers, statesmen and philosophers and their ideas remain strong foundations of stringent tought to this day. Let us combine our strong intellectual heritage with the new ideal of Enlightenment that has enveloped the courts of Europe. This will allow us to develop ideas of statehood and to reform the Greek language to fit the modern era.
translation: 我们的先祖曾是伟大的思想家，政治家和哲学家，他们的思想为今日的新思潮奠定了坚实的基础。让我们联合这智慧财产和欧洲启蒙运动的新思想，用以改革希腊的政治理念和语言从而适应现代。

original: Few states can claim a heritage as old as ours. The Katoch have ruled for thousands of years, seen the likes of Alexander or Timur come and go and continue to play an important part in every way in our country.
translation: 很少有国家比我们的历史还要长久。卡托奇家族数千年以来一直维持着统治，不论是亚历山大还是帖木儿都未曾取代我们的统治。

original: Legends tell of the demon Jalandhara whose head fell into the Kangra valley after a battle with Shiva. While surrounded by barren hills and high mountain our homeland is green and lush. The Kangra valley allows us to support a much greater population than our size and location would indicate but is also an enticing target for any would be conqueror.
translation: 传说阇烂达罗被湿婆斩首于坎格拉峡谷。在荒地和群山的包裹之中，我们的家园郁郁葱葱，草木繁盛。坎格拉峡谷让我们能够突破领土大小的限制维持更多的人口，但这也引来了敌人的觊觎。

original: The Martial traditions of our people go far back, and while our cousins in the Rajput states to the south may be more famous we have proven time after time that we can make life very miserable for an invader. Everyone leaves eventually.
translation: 我们民族的尚武传统源远流长，然而我们南方的拉吉普特兄弟在军事上更出名。但我们一次又一次地证明我们可以让侵略者血本无归。

original: Our state was once built around the strong Kangra Fort and the control over the surrounding areas that it's strategic location allowed. Let us strive to control and maintain all the important forts of this wider region and control our surrounding areas in the same manner.
translation: 我们的国度是建立在宏伟的坎格拉要塞对周边领土的控制上。让我们控制并维护这广大地区的所有重要堡垒，用同样的方法维持我们的统治。

original: Not far to our south lies the fertile plains of the Punjab and yet the vast mountain and glaciers of Ladakh, Tibet and the Himalayan peaks are also quite close by. These seemingly different regions still have need for each other however. From our north comes precious woolen products that the southerners are willing to pay quite a price for, the north itself has simpler needs but still yearn for many of the more luxurious products the south can provide.
translation: 南方不远便是旁遮普的富饶平原，而拉达克，西藏和喜马拉雅的高山与冰川也并不遥远。这些看上去极为不同的地区却彼此各取所需。我们可以把北方出产的羊毛制品卖到南方，也可以向北方兜售南方的各种豪华奢侈品。

original: These mountains provides peace, quiet and an inspiring scenery to those who need it, to others they provide protection against those who have something to fear from the people of the lowlands. Let us invite and patronize the talented painters of this age, offer them shelter and let our mountain landscape inspire them to create greater works of love and our divine stories.
translation: 山川如此静美，她美妙的景色启迪了人们的心灵，也保护人们免受山脚下敌人的恐惧。让我们邀请并资助一些才华横溢的当代画家，为他们提供庇护，让这山川激发他们的创作来描绘我们的神话故事。

original: As time goes by our state faces newer threats, the names and religions of those who would occupy our lands may differ over time but whether Sikh, Ghurka, Timurid or Hellene we must be able to defend ourselves. Let us create a new army building upon the base of the mountain warfare we know so well yet with a healthy influx of new ideas from the various peoples that covet our lands.
translation: 时过境迁，新的威胁接踵而至，征服我们国度的人有不同的名字，信仰不同的宗教，但不论是锡克，廓尔喀，帖木儿还是希腊人，我们都必须确保我们能保卫自己。我们可以根据山地作战经验以及外来者不断涌入的新知识建立一支新军。

original: For as long as anyone can remember streams of goods have traveled through the Tarim Basin, from oasis city to oasis city, tying together the vast economic sphere of East Asia and China with that of Transoxiana and Persia. Silk, spices, cotton, carpets, tobacco and many other goods that pass our lands eventually reach the courts of Europe or the palaces of the Chinese emperors. We must keep these traders safe at all costs as we would be nothing with out them and this journey is both dangerous and ardous.
translation: 长久以来，塔里木盆地的绿洲城市间就有物资往来，连接着东亚，中国到河中地区及波斯。丝绸，香料，棉花，地毯，烟草和其他许多商品都从这条道路通往欧洲或是中国。我们必须不惜一切代价保障这些商旅的安全，即便这条商路充满了艰难险阻。没有了这些商旅我们将一无所有。

original: The Taklamakan may be inhospitable but our cities thrive around the oasis along its border as well as by the Tarim river. Life may not be as easy up here as in the lowlands of India or China but wheat, corn and cotton grow well enough. The names that describe our region, High Tartary, Altishahr, Kashgaria or Xinjiang evoke images of legendary beauty and good life among those that know them.
translation: 塔克拉玛干难以生存，但我们的城市环绕着绿洲和塔里木河旁繁荣发展。 这里的生活即便不如中国和印度的平原便利，但这里适合小麦、谷物和棉花生长。无论外人怎么称呼我们，高原鞑靼，回疆，喀什葛尔还是新疆，都能激发出对壮丽美景和美好生活的想象。

original: Our culture is urban yet our isolation in the far reaches of the world means that few have heard of our history or language. Let us endeavor to write down the history of our people and our cities so that the world may learn of life here in one of the more remoter, yet centrally important corners of the world.
translation: 我们的文化具有都市特点却长期与外界分离，这意味着少有人了解我们的历史和语言。让我们写下我们历史的篇章，记录我们的人民和城市，让世人知晓我们这里的生活，无论天涯海角。

original: Among the most revered members of our society are the Khojas, devout men descended from the Prophet or the first four Caliphs. Tales tell of Khojas inspiring the conversion of great Mongol lords and Lamas bending the knee to islamic power. We have allways made the most devote of our kind our rulers and therefore teh Khojas are already influential players in our state. Let us empower them further and see how long their abilities and pure faith can take us.
translation: 和卓是我们社会里最受尊敬的群体。他们是先知或是最初四个哈里发的后人。传说和卓推动了蒙古的贵族和喇嘛皈依伊斯兰教。我们一直都推举最虔诚者为我们的领袖,因此和卓在我们国家的政治舞台上具有深刻影响力。让我们扶持他们，见证他们虔诚的信仰带领我们前进。

original: While we have always welcomed traders of all faiths and cultures we must never forget that our military strength comes from the purity of our faith. Let us expand into our surrounding regions both to spread the true faith and to aquire regions that would make our homeland easier to defend.
translation: 即便我们一直欢迎各种信仰和文化的商人前来，但仍不能忘记我们强大的军事力量来源于纯粹的信仰。让我们布国威于四方，传播我们的正确信仰，同时更好地保卫我们的家园。

original: We must not let petty rivalries divide our state! For too long our people have been divided between the Aqtaglikh, people of the White Mountain, and the Qarataghlik, people of the Black Mountain. If we can unite Black and White, north and south, our country will stand strong once again.
translation: 我们不能让一些细微琐碎的争端分裂国家！长久以来我们的人民分为白山派和黑山派。如果我们能联合这两个派别，统一天山南北，我们的国家就能重新崛起。

original: For centuries, even millenia, traders have dared the perilous journey to reach our desert cities.
