Be it to dare the Taklamakan, the Apricot Road of Baltistan or the glaciers of Ladakh they have all eventually arrived in Yarkand, Kashgar or any of our other great cities. Times change, however, and the steady stream of traders is waning, with the opening of maritime routes from east to west many no longer feel the long land journey to be worth it. Let us act decisively to protect the overland trade by abolishing any direct taxes or fees.
translation: 千百年来，商人冒险穿越沙漠来到我们的城市。不论是塔克拉玛干，大勃律的杏路还是拉达克的冰川，他们的终点总是叶尔羌，喀什葛尔或是其他壮丽城市。然而时过境迁，随着东西方海上贸易通道的发达，路上商旅愈发减少。我们必须果断采取行动，废除苛捐杂税从而保护这里的陆路贸易。

original: Not long ago, the House of Luxembourg routinely supplied the Holy Roman Empire with its emperors. The fact our tiny nation often acceded to the rulership of such a vast empire gives us fame far beyond a land our size would normally enjoy.
translation: 直到不久前，卢森堡王朝仍拥有着神圣罗马帝国的皇冠。我们以一个小国的身份却能统治如此庞大的帝国，这一点就能为我们带来了不逊色于任何大国的名誉。

original: The rough and hilly terrain of our nation makes it difficult to invade; indeed, many armies simply choose to go around in order to avoid attempting to traverse the region, and the losses that would entail.
translation: 我们国家崎岖不平的地形使得她难以被征服。事实上许多军队选择直接绕开此地，避免损耗。

original: The Moselle River flows along our eastern border. Let us steer the local trade along it so as to better control the commerce of the region.
translation: 摩泽尔河流经我们的东边边界。让我们通过这条河流引导我们当地的贸易，以便于更好地主导附近地区的贸易。

original: The great castle in the center of our capital city is acknowledged to be one of the finest fortifications in the world. Few armies would even contemplate besieging such a forbidding fortification. As we expand our influence over other areas let us make sure that we construct fortifications as imposing as the one that guards or home.
translation: 在我们首都中央的堡垒被认为是世界上最首屈一指的要塞。没有任何军队胆敢攻下它。随着我们的影响渐渐扩大，我们要确保新建的要塞与原本的那座一样稳固。

original: The great military route known as the Spanish Road runs through our lands. Let us make good use of this circumstance in our own military endeavor to reinforce our armies more efficiently!
translation: 被称作西班牙之路的重要军事通道就在我国领土范围之内。我们应当充分利用这种优势，增强我们军队的增援效率。

original: Our great state has a long and prestigeous history and is by now one of the most well regarded in either the French of German regions. Even in the incredible event that we would come under foreign ruler our title would be one of their most prestigious. Let us properly underline this by proclaiming the original duchy of Luxembourg as a Grand Duchy, by now one of many great titles born by our rulers.
translation: 我们伟大的国家拥有者光辉长久的历史，在法兰西和德意志地区都享有盛名。即便偶尔处于外国统治之下，我们的头衔仍是最尊贵的。让我们正式宣称原本的卢森堡公国为大公国，把它作为我们君主许多尊贵头衔中的一个。

original: Our location between France, the Low Countries, and the German states means that we should maintain a very active diplomacy. We must keep good relations with all of them, yet still watch them closely.
translation: 我们地处法国，低地国家和日耳曼国家中间，意味着我们需要维持积极主动的外交。我们得保持与这些国家的良好关系并盯紧他们的一举一动。

original: Our state rests on the traditions of generations of Telugu warriors before us. Men who have fought in the service of many of the great Indian empires and most recently made up the aristocracy of the erstwhile Kakatiya Empire. This ensures a steady supply of able warriors and captains for our armies regardless of what the future may have in store for us.
translation: 我们的国度是基于一批泰卢固武士的传统而来。这些勇士为许多强大印度帝国效劳，曾经是昔日卡卡提亚帝国的贵族。这保障了优良武士源源不断地充实我们的军队，预防任何可能的未来。

original: Since the early Reddy rulers kingship and literature has been intertwined among our people. Our rulers are expected to be scholars and authors in their own right and to patronize the great poets and authors of our age.
translation: 瑞迪王朝以来，君王与文学就与我们的人民息息相关。君主不仅应当是学者和作家，也需要去支持当代伟大的诗人和作家们。

original: Not long ago the Kakatiya empire ruled these lands, with it's Telugu aristocracy and disregard for the strict Caste hierarchies of some of our neighbors it is still a role-model for our state to aspire to. There are valuable lessons to be learned from the Kakatiya state and we must bring these with us while shape our own policies in the present.
translation: 不久前还存在的卡卡提亚帝国治理土地，它拥有的泰卢固贵族和对我们邻国仍然奉行的严格种姓制度的抵制仍影响着我们。卡卡提亚流传下来许多值得我们学习的东西，我们应当把这些融入当下的政策中。

original: A number of great fortresses in the Eastern Ghats guard our lands from invasions from the upland powers. We must keep these strongholds well maintained and up to date or risk squandering the backbone of our defenses.
translation: 东高止山脉许多宏伟要塞保护我们不受高地国家的入侵。我们必须修缮并维持这些要塞,否则对国防有相当的威胁。
普拉塔帕鲁德拉的传奇

original: The last Kakitya ruler, Prataparudra II, died as a prisoner of the Sultanate forces that subdued his kingdom. According to some, however, he survived and granted on his vassals the right to found new kingdoms, such as our state. Let us promote this legend and have it written down so that generations to come can learn of the roots of our great state.
translation: 卡卡提亚末代君主，普拉塔帕鲁德拉二世死在夺下其王国的苏丹牢里。也有人说他活下来了，并承诺他的附庸建立新国家的权利，这也包括我们的国家。让我们大力宣传这一传说，让后人了解我们国家的根源所在。

original: Andhra is home to some of the greatest Diamond mines in the world. Over the centuries these great mines have been the source of both the majority of the worlds known diamonds but also great stones such as the Koh-i-Noor. It is time, however, that we modernize our great mines and take care to develop them to their full potential.
translation: 安德拉拥有着世界上最大的钻石矿。许多个世纪以来这些矿脉不仅仅是世界大多数钻石的出产地，也是光之山等许多著名钻石的来源。现在是时候对这些大矿脉进行现代化改造，全方位地发挥他们的潜力了。

original: The Coromandel Coast has always been the source of wealth with it's great bustling ports and many traders from far-away countries. One of the old Reddy rulers of Andhra wisely tried to keep regulations on the Coromandel trade to a minimum, stimulating the growth of our ports greatly. Let us re-enact this policy in the modern era and reduce trading regulations in order to allow traders a freer rein.
translation: 乌木海岸因其繁华港口和远道而来的商贩获得了巨额的财富。先前瑞迪王朝的某位君主明智地把贸易限制降到最低，刺激了我们港口的繁荣发展。现在，我们应当再次施行这一政策，减少贸易限制，促进贸易自由。

original: For hundreds of years our kingdom has fought to spread the Christian rule in Iberia, a battle we then continued as part of the crown of Castille. This has left us with a country rich in Martial traditions and battle hardened officers.
translation: 几百年来，我们的王国一直在伊比利亚为基督教而战，就算成为卡斯蒂利亚王国的一部分之后也仍未改变。这为我国留下了深厚的军事传统和许多久经沙场的军官。

original: The Cortes of Leon were one of the oldest, if not the oldest, parliament in the world. The ancient rights and traditions of our parliament is a strength for any ruler wishing to seek council or help from his subjects.
translation: 莱昂的议会有可能是世间最古老的议会。我们议会的古老权利和传统让那些想要从议会或臣民中寻求帮助的君主们受益匪浅。

original: Halfway across the world lies heathen kingdoms of untold riches. Our generation Leonese adventurers seek to make their fortunes in the name of the true faith overseas just as their ancestors forged their reputation during the reconquista in Iberia.
translation: 世界的另一端满是异教王国和金银财宝。我们这一代的莱昂冒险者纷纷以传播正确信仰为名前往海外去寻求名声与财富，正如他们的祖先在伊比利亚收复失地运动中所作的那样。

original: The prestigieous university of Salamanca has become the centre for a new school of jurisprudence as well as philosophical and economic thought. Let us patronize the learned men of the School of Salamanca and make good use of their coherent interpretations of Natural Law, Property and the Natural Rights of Man.
translation: 著名的萨拉曼卡大学不仅仅是法学圣地，也教授哲学和经济思想。让我们支持萨拉曼卡大学的学者，充分利用他们对自然法，私有财产和天赋人权的完整阐释。

original: Asturian sailors have for centuries lent us their experience and maritime traditions. It is, however, time to modernize and expand the Leonese navy. We must create proper naval bases along the coast and commence the construction of a large new permanent navy.
translation: 阿斯图里亚斯的水手数个世纪以来贡献着他们在航海上的经验和传统。然而现在是时候现代化以及扩张海军了。我们必须在沿岸建立正式的海军基地以及着手创立一支庞大的常备海军。

original: For many years during our union with Castille the Leonese language has been losing ground to Castilian. While we have reversed this trend there is still much work to be done. We must issue an official Leonese grammar and ensure that the language is used in all layers of our administration. In addition let us patronize those who can develop the language, the great writers, actors and poets of our nation.
translation: 许多年来，卡斯蒂利亚和莱昂的联合统治使得莱昂的语言被卡斯蒂利亚语所埋没。即便这一趋势已经转变，我们还有许多工作要完成。设置标准的莱昂语法，并保障莱昂语是所有行政机构的官方语言。此外，我们还要支持我国那些能推动语言发展的人，例如伟大的作家、演员和诗人们。

original: From the Castilians to the French there have been many peoples intent to conquer our people and suppress our culture. In times of war we must resist foreign occupation at all cost with arms in hand, this is as true for our professional forces as it is for the guerillas that protect the lands beyond the frontlines.
translation: 从卡斯蒂利亚人到法兰西人，许多民族试图征服我们的子民，压制我们的文化。战争来临时，我们必须拿起武器不惜一切代价抵抗敌人的占领，不论是前线作战的正规军还是在后方保卫我们家园的游击队。

original: Traditionally our society is composed by five castes. The Zimo rule as lords, the Black Yi (Nuohe) lead as the aristocracy, the White Yi (Qunuo) are freemen, the Ajia serve as serfs and the Xiaxi are our slaves. By strengthening this regime, we can ensure a lasting stability for our country.
translation: 传统上，彝族有五个阶级。兹莫是统治者，黑彝(诺合)是贵族，白彝(曲诺)是自由民，而阿加是佣农，最后是作为奴隶的呷西。强化这一制度，我们可以保证国家长治久安。

original: The mountains around us are our natural defense and we must develop strategies and tactics that make good use of this. To us this is our home, to invaders it will be their grave.
translation: 我们周遭的群山是天然的屏障，我们必须好好利用这种优势制定战略战术。群山既是我们的家园，也是敌人的坟场。

original: Unlike the many scattered tribes around us our domains are linked to each other. With such a chain of domains and settlements we have better opportunities for maneuver, stronger connections and our local lords will be able to support each other more efficiently.
translation: 不像许多分散的部族，我们的统治阶级之间互相保持联系。这样的统治链条保证了战术灵活的同时，也能使地方土司更有效得互相提供支援。

original: Many outsiders tend to see us as savages. Such ignorance and arrogance appalls us! Our solar calendar system is simple to understand and therefore a useful tool in agriculture. The fools that think themselves our betters can keep their complicated calculations while we disseminate our superior calendar in our lands.
translation: 许多外族人认为我们蛮荒无比。如此的看法真是愚昧自大! 我们的太阳历不仅简单易懂，对农业也有相当的助益。虽然那些外国蠢货认为他们通过复杂的计算方式得出的历法更为优越，然而我们在自己的领土上推行自己的高级历法。

original: Bimo, the 'master of scriptures', are the Shaman-priests of our people. They officiate at births, funerals, weddings and holidays, taking care of our people's spiritual life. We should promote them and their rites and defend our beliefs against all foreign cults.
translation: 毕摩，“诵经之人”，是我们的萨满祭司。他们主持生日，红白喜事和各类节日，指引我们的精神世界。我们应当支持他们和他们的仪式，用以抵抗外族邪教。

original: Large Skyward Tombs are the resting places for our ancestral kings and leaders. These gigantic pyramids are a proof of our continuous authority over the lands we still rule. We must renovate these tombs to ensure their legacy lives on and quiet anyone who would question our rule.
translation: 大天墓是我们的先王领袖安息之地。这些巨大的金字塔建筑是我们统治这片土地的权威见证。我们需要翻新这些天墓，确保我们的遗产，没有人能够质疑我们的统治。

original: We are the children of Black Tiger. Just as the tiger is the overlord of all beasts, we are the natural overlord of all human realms!
translation: 我们是黑虎之子。就如老虎是百兽之王，我们也是人类中的天然霸主！

original: Rivers have always been the lifeline of the Rus' lands. And thus our ancestors have built a mighty city at the confluence of two of the perhaps most important rivers in Old Russia: Volga and Oka. Located between the wealth of the old lands and vast and unexplored riches of the unknown Eastern expands our city grows to rival even Moscow itself. We cannot but praise our forefathers for their vision.
translation: 罗斯人的土地从来离不开河流。正因如此我们的先祖在伏尔加和奥卡两条古老大河交汇处建立了这座伟大的城市。在古老旷野以及未知东方之间的富饶财富繁荣了我们的城市，甚至使她成了莫斯科的对手。我们不得不赞美我们先祖的深谋远虑。

original: Building your house near the road can bring you both wealth and disaster. The same goes for the treacherous rivers of Russia. One day you might greet a fur trader, and tomorrow pirates may torch your house the ground. Wat matters is that you never give up. If your house is burnt, you shall build a new, bigger one in its place. If your walls are torn down, you shall build them again, taller. Whatever hardships come, we shall endure.
translation: 在路边建房，财富与灾祸皆至。俄罗斯的河流也同样充满了欺骗。今天你见到的是毛皮商人，明天他就成了烧杀抢掠的海盗。关键是永不言弃。房子被烧了还能建个更新更大的。城墙倒了重新修起来便是。无论多么艰难，我们都会挺过去的。

original: Situated at the border of Russian lands and the endless steppes and their raiders, the provinces of Nizhny Novgorod have never been as organized as the Russian interior. Vast forests and remote villages has resulted in a more self reliant spirit among our people. It is, however, time to establish a reliable and predictable system of taxation. So that we can bring law and order even to the most remote areas under our rule.
translation: 坐落在俄罗斯的边境上，这片土地充满了无穷无尽的干草地和土匪，下诺夫哥罗德从未像俄罗斯内部那样组织有序。广袤森林和穷乡僻壤使得我们的人民只能自强自立。但现在是时候建立一套更可靠稳定的税务系统，这样做可以给我们统治之下即便是最偏远的地区也能带来法律和秩序。

original: From its birth Nizhny Novgorod has slowly developed as a fortified city protecting the Russian interior from raiders, be they river pirates or land conquerors. Our city has been destroyed and damaged countless times by every would-be-invader of Rus' but Nizhny has always endured and grown bigger. Stone walls and citadels now tower over our beautiful city, and we will ensure their strength endures the ages to come.
translation: 自建立以来，下诺夫哥罗德就缓慢发展成了一座要塞城市，从而保卫俄罗斯的腹地不受强盗、海盗或是入侵者的威胁。我们的城市被摧毁过无数次，但下诺夫哥罗德每次都会浴火重生。石头城墙和城堡耸立在美丽的城市中，我们要保障它们能够经受时间的考验。

original: Unlike other principalities of the ancient Rus', Nizhny has never been the most populous, or the one with the most fertile lands or even active traders. But none of the other ancient cities of Russia have what we have: rivers. If we manage to establish - and dominate - the river trade, we could effectively connect the vast riches of Tatar lands and Siberia with the old centers of Russia, making our city the most important center in all the Russias.
translation: 不像古罗斯的其它小邦，下诺夫哥罗德不是人口最多的，也不是最富庶，甚至不是商旅光顾最多的地方。但这些古代罗斯城市缺少我们所有的：河流。如果我们建立并控制水路贸易，我们可以有效地把富饶的鞑靼领土，西伯利亚和古老的俄罗斯中心连接在一起，把我们的城市变为全俄罗斯最重要的中心城市。

original: For centuries other Russian principalities have looked at us with condescension or greedy eyes, considering our city an insignificant border town. But no more. Nizhny shall rise to challenge the beauty and splendor of them all. Even Moscow and Novgorod will look at us with jealousy in their eyes. Let them. We'll give them a sight to behold.
translation: 许多个世纪来，俄罗斯的其它小国要么觊觎我们，要么把我们看作是微不足道的荒郊野岭。但从今往后，下诺夫哥罗德将崛起为他们中最光辉绚烂的城市。即使是莫斯科和诺夫哥罗德都会对我们嫉妒不已。我们会让他们刮目相看。

original: Ever since we can remember our lands have been raided by various peoples living in the Endless sea of grass on the other side of our forests and fields. As our brothers in the west scheme and plot against each other, why should we sit idle? Let us ride out into the steppe and create a new order, with our great state at the top.
translation: 从有历史记载以来，我们的土地就饱受着来自无边无际草原以及森林和田野的敌人的侵扰。我们西边的同胞互相勾心斗角的时候，我们为什么要坐以待毙？ 让我们向东进展，在草原上建立一个新秩序。

original: None can claim to know northern Scandinavia as we do but its mountains, rivers and deep forests can appear quite hostile to some. We will make good use of our knowledge of the terrain that surround us and make life as miserable as possible for any southern invader.
translation: 对斯堪地纳维亚北部的了解无人比得上我们，但它的崇山峻岭却对一些人来说凶险无比。我们可以充分利用这一点，将地形作为有利武器对抗南边的入侵者。

original: Reindeer herding is one of the most important parts of the Sami lifestyle as well as a cornerstone of our economy. It is imperative that we do what we can to protect our herds and the lands they use.
translation: 畜养驯鹿是萨米人生活中重要的一部分，也是我们的经济基础。我们必须不惜一切保护驯鹿群和他们生存的土地。

original: The Southern Kingdoms would try to regulate our contacts with them. Especially appointed Birkarls have traditionally had a monopoly on the Sami trade and have even been told to collect taxes from our people. It is time we start to dictate the terms of this relationship and create our own trade regulations.
translation: 南方的王国尝试控制我们与他们的联络。传统上由他们负责税收贸易的官员受指派，垄断着萨米的贸易，甚至从我们的子民手上收税。是时候由我们来规定贸易条款，并制定我们自己的贸易规则了。

original: Encourage growth of the Winter Market

Our people live in a very widespread area and the northern winters can be both long and cold. Let us create a great common market in one a central location in which representatives of all the Samis under our control and in neighboring areas can gather. Here commerce can thrive even during the darkest winter nights and here the thing may gather to settle common issues.
translation: 我们的子民分散在广阔的土地，而北国的冬季又长又冷。让我们在一个地区中心建立一个共同市场——此地能代表我们控制下的所有萨米人，其周边地区也可以便利地聚集 。这里将生意兴隆，而在最黑暗的冬夜，我们也可以聚在一起共商国是。

original: The ancient Shamanic traditions of the Noaidi has been constantly retreating northwards before the Christian missionaries of the south. Let us protect the Noaidi and promote their traditions as an integral part of our state. No matter what the future has in hold for the faith of our subjects these traditions are part of our roots.
translation: 古代的诺埃迪萨满传统不断地被南方来的基督教传教士逼向北方。让我们保护诺埃迪和他们的传统，并把它作为我们国家传统的一部分。不论未来如何进展，我们子民的这些信仰都是我们根源的一部分。

original: Our people have been living off the lands for centuries. Through fishing, hunting and foraging. This is expertise that can come in good use on long campaigns even in foreign lands.
translation: 我们的子民依靠这片土地生存已有许多个世纪。捕鱼，狩猎和采集的经验可以在与他国长期作战时用上。

original: The Sami people may not speak one tongue but our state could certainly use a common literary language. There have been attempts to standardize such a language by various outsiders but it is high time we do create one ourselves according to our own needs.
translation: 萨米人虽然说着不同方言，但我们国家必须建立一套共同的标准书面语言。许多外族人曾多次尝试规范我们，但现在是时候根据我们自己的需要来规范一套标准了。

original: Like Egypt downstream, we are a land dependent on the Nile and its tributaries. Our agriculture makes the greatest use of the fertile fields flooded by the rivers flowing through our lands.
translation: 如同下游的埃及，我们的土地依赖尼罗河及其物产。我们的农业正好充分利用了这些肥沃的冲积平原。

original: From the ruins of the Ancient Nubian kingdoms to the still living legal and religious traditions of the Medieval Nubian kingdoms our people are rooted in an a rich heritage from an ancient civilization. As we go forward let us not squander the gains of the past but instead make good use of the legal and social traditions of our ancestors.
translation: 从古代努比亚王国的废墟到中世纪努比亚的法律和宗教传统，我们的人民从古老文明中继承了丰富遗产。我们在前进的道路上不能总是陶醉于过往的辉煌，而是应充分利用先祖们的法律和社会传统。

original: From ancient times, we have been known as a nation of fierce warriors. Many have come south from Egypt or out of the mountains of Ethiopia thinking to conquer us, but few have had any sort of success.
translation: 自古以来，我们就是一个勇士的国度。南下的埃及人和群山之外的埃塞俄比亚人都尝试征服我们，但结果都是徒劳。

original: Some would call our country isolated yet traders from far-away countries have always sought and found our cities. From the Romans of ancient times to the Italians, Arabs and Turks of today. Let us encourage the long-distance trade in all directions.
translation: 有些人认为我国与世隔绝，但从古代的罗马到现在的意大利，阿拉伯和土耳其的商人总是不断地探寻我们的城市。让我们鼓励各个方向的长途贸易。

original: Nubia is home to Christians and Muslims as well as Animists and other traditional religions. Unlike in some parts of the world these faiths have not gotten along well. This region has just been through a very tumultuous time where conversions and migrations have distorted the old religious balance, perhaps forever. Now that the situation seems to have stabilized it is time to spread the word of our state religion and promote a common unified religious culture among our people once and for all.
translation: 努比亚是基督徒，穆斯林，泛灵教徒和其他传统宗教信徒的共同家园。在这个世界上的其他地方，这些宗教之间彼此争强斗胜。这片地区曾饱受剧烈动荡，许多传教的尝试和迁徙的移民打破了古老的宗教平衡，这样的情况或许永远没有尽头。而如今局势已经缓和下来，是时候推行我们的官方宗教，并在我们的人民中间一劳永逸地促进团结而统一的宗教文化。

original: The best way to control the great expanses of the desert is by being mobile. We must train and maintain an efficient Cavalry in order to defend ourselves and expand in these lands.
translation: 控制广阔沙漠的最佳办法是保持行动自如。 我们必须训练和维持一支高效的骑兵，以保护和扩张我们的国土。

original: While not all of our lands are desert they are surrounded by it and to some extent divided by it. Let us create a chain of fortifications to bind our lands together and defend the Trans-Saharan trade routes as well as the cataracts of the Nile themselves from robbers as well as rebels and foreign invaders.
translation: 尽管我们的土地不全是沙漠，但却被沙漠环绕和分割。让我们建立一整套要塞系统把我们的土地连接在一起从而保护穿越撒哈拉沙漠的贸易商路，除此之外还有尼罗河大瀑布保护当地居民免受那些叛乱者和外国入侵者的威胁。

original: Princes of Mazovia are among the last living descendants of the Piast dynasty, which united and ruled Poland for centuries. We do not hesitate to recall this heritage whenever our prestige or legitimacy come into question.
translation: 马佐维亚亲王是联合并统治波兰数个世纪的皮雅斯特王朝最后的传人。我们会毫不犹豫得用这古老传承向世人宣示我们所拥有的威望和正统性。

original: For a long time Mazovia was at the border of Christendom, with pagans to the north and east. Now our enemies would pretend to be even more Catholic than we are, yet they still desire our lands. Our borders must always be well protected, our forts well maintained and our troops well trained for there is no region the enemy will pass through before reaching our fortifications.
translation: 多年以来，马佐维亚就是基督教世界的边缘，在他的北部和东部接壤着许多异教国家。现在我们的敌人假装是比我们还虔诚的天主教徒，却仍然觊觎着我们的土地。我们的边界必须戒备森严，我们的要塞必须修缮一新，而我们的军队则必须训练有素，这样无论敌寇进犯哪个区域都将先面临我们的防御工事。

original: If we are to keep our independence we need a well-trained diplomatic service. Dukes of Mazovia have often been mediators between the Polish crown and Teutonic Order and we have a tradition of successfully negotiating alliances and keeping our country safe from the ambitions of our neighbors.
translation: 我们必须要有一批训练有素的外交官来保障我们的独立。马佐维亚的公爵常常是波兰与条顿骑士团之间的仲裁者，而传统上我们也赢得了许多盟友保障我们不受贪婪邻居的侵扰。

original: They may live in peasant­like mansions, they may often own only one eight of a single village and sometimes they might not be able to afford a horse – but they are nobility, and they do make large percent of Mazovian population. We have to accept that nobilitatis Polonis est aequalis, and make good use of these men as low ranking officers and dragoons.
translation: 他们住在农民一样的宅第里，有些人仅仅是村中的小户，有时他们连马都养不起。但他们仍是贵族，且占有马佐维亚人口中的相当比例。我们必须确保贵族们的平等权益，我们可以把这些人作为军队里的低阶军官和龙骑兵。

original: As Mazovia always enjoyed some degree of autonomy, sometimes even independence from the rest of Poland, our laws differ quite a bit from those followed in the rest of the Polish lands. By writing down and confirming our own sets of laws we strengthen our state and reinforce our unique status.
translation: 马佐维亚一直享有一定程度的自治权，有时甚至直接独立于波兰。我们的法律与波兰其他地区相比非常的不同。通过撰写和批准一整套我们自己的法律条文，我们可以巩固我们的国家，并且强化我们的独特地位。

original: Through long and furious disputes the Polish nobility govern its homeland. As many nobles lack the means to travel far regularly the location of Mazovia is perfect for organizing the joint diets of the Polish and Lithuanian lands. We can proudly claim that it is our nobles that make kings rather than the kings regulating the nobility.
translation: 经过漫长而激烈的争论，波兰贵族统治了他们的国土。由于许多贵族缺乏定期远足的手段，而马佐维亚则是波兰人和立陶宛人聚集召开贵族会议的完美地点。我们可以骄傲的宣称是我们的贵族成就了君王，而非君王约束贵族。

original: Trade is what fills our coffers and what makes our cities grow. Mazovia's location allows it to control much of the trade of our region as both the Polish-Lithuanian trade and the northward stream of Grain from the Ruthenia flows through our lands. Let us encourage traders to use our country as the great Emporium of the Polish lands.
translation: 贸易是我们财富的源泉，也是我们城市扩张的动力。马佐维亚的地理位置让它能控制这地区与波兰立陶宛以及鲁塞尼亚向北的谷物贸易。让我们鼓励商人将我国变成波兰土地上最大的贸易市场。

original: One of the largest paths of pilgrimage in Christendom leads to the Cathedral of Santiago de Compostela in Galicia. The shrine to the Apostle James draws foreigners from across the known world, but their gold all speaks the same language to our coffers.
translation: 基督世界最重要的朝圣道路之一就是前往加利西亚的圣地亚哥大教堂。门徒雅各的圣祠吸引了世界各地的朝圣之人，不过他们的金钱对我们来说并没有什么不同。

original: Unlike the dry scrublands to the south, Galicia's landscape is dominated by mountains and ceaseless rain. Galicians themselves are almost as inhospitable to invaders as the terrain, as many a foreigner came to realize. Let none dare step in our land!
translation: 不同于南方干旱的灌木林，加利西亚的大地被群山和绵绵不绝的雨水所环绕。加利西亚人对待入侵者正如这大地一般不友好。没有人胆敢跨入我们土地一步!

original: The last centuries has been dominated by bloody conflict between the nobility and church on one side, and the urban burghers on the other. In the worst years, many cities have been independent in all but name from the Galician crown. By crushing these petty oligarchs, peace and order will return to the realm.
translation: 过去的几个世纪里，我们一直被贵族和教会与城市市民之间的血腥冲突所支配。在最黑暗的日子里，许多城市宣称从加利西亚的王权下独立。通过摧毁这些蕞尔小邦，和平与秩序将回到我们的王国。

original: The Atlantic is a harsh mistress, and only the sturdiest vessels may survive her harrowing embrace. Galician vessels have always been renowned for their sturdiness. With further patronage from the Crown, these dockyards can continue crafting formidable ships that can withstand waves and cannon alike.
translation: 大西洋是一个冷酷无情的女神，只有最坚固的船只才能摆脱她痛苦的拥抱。加利西亚的船只素以其坚固闻名于世。随着政府进一步支持，造船厂可以继续建造这些可以抵御风浪和坚船利炮的船只。

original: 'Santiago y Cierra!' (St. James and close!) was the rallying call of Spanish crusaders against the Moors during the Reconquista. It was in Galicia that the holy remains of St. James were found, so let it be known that the Apostle holds our people in especial esteem. Victory and glory await only the bold, and none are bolder than Galicians!
translation: 「雅各保佑，冲锋！」是收复失地运动中西班牙十字军对摩尔人进攻时的口号。 而加利西亚拥有雅各的圣遗物，我们的子民格外受使徒庇佑。胜利与光辉只眷顾勇者，而加利西亚人最英勇无畏！

original: It takes a brave sailor to set out in the treacherous waters of the Cantabrian Sea and Bay of Biscay. But not even some of the harshest weather in the known world has dampened Galicia's love of the ocean. After the harsh battering of countless storms, the Galician fleet knows no fear from mere shot and cutlass.
translation: 只有最勇敢的水手敢在坎塔布里亚海和比斯开湾航行。 但即便是世上最恶劣的天气也丝毫不能减少加利西亚人对海洋的迷恋。与连绵不绝的狂风巨浪相比，加利西亚海军对那些不值一提的火炮和刀剑毫无畏惧。

original: The Galician peasant is equally legendary for his hardiness and rebellious temperament. By drafting the members of the bandit 'brotherhoods' into our army, we can gain a hardened core of ruthless and experienced soldiers. Our high-born classes are sick of having their manors burned down anyway.
translation: 加利西亚农民的顽固和桀骜不驯世间少有。通过招募土匪强盗组织“兄弟会”的成员，我们的军队能获得一支冷酷残忍又富有经验的士兵骨干。反正我们的上层已经对这些打家劫舍，放火烧山的行为感到不厌其烦。

original: Julius Caesar himself admired the talent of center Gaul smithies. Iron ore on ground; vast, deep and unpopulated forests; large rivers offer all the necessary conditions to this industry which hasn't been equaled in France since this distant era.
translation: 尤利乌斯 凯撒本人都曾敬佩中部高卢人的冶铁能力。分布在地表，广阔深邃而无人居住的森林的铁矿石以及大江大河都是冶铁工业必须的要素。自古以来，整个法国就没有比这更好的场所了。

original: Commentaire sur la Coutume du Pays et Duché de Nivernais
Let us gather all traditional laws in our realm and create an updated commentary to be able to adapt the laws, customs and regulations of Nivernais to better fit the modern era.
translation: 让我们收集国内所有传统律法，更新增添一部分当前讷韦尔公国的法律法规和习俗的注释，使其更适应现代。

original: The city of Nevers is blessed with lot of clay and marl and in Morvan access to an un-smoking firewood while the Loire river ensures that products can be easily moved up and down to the rich cities along it. Let us use these favorable conditions to their fullest and encourage those trained in the craft of Faience production to settle here. Our state shall be the Faience capital of France.
translation: 讷韦尔城拥有大量的陶土和泥灰，莫尔旺山有无烟的柴火，而卢瓦尔河能够保障商品很便利地运往附近上下游的富饶城市。让我们充分利用这些有利条件，鼓励那些经过训练的彩陶工匠在此落户生产。我们将成为法国的彩陶中心。

original: Our men are tough and our women stout. How could it be otherwise? The kitchen of Nivernais builds strong character as does the foul weather of our province. Only true Frenchmen could live here and work the fields, forges or forests of our country.
translation: 我们的男人坚韧无比，而女人则不屈不挠。不然怎么办？讷韦尔就如同一座厨房浇灌了我们这样的性格，正如我们省份里的恶劣天气。只有真正的法国人可以生活在我们的田野，铁匠铺和林地里。

original: The majestic river of Loire is like a fiery horse, capable of either the greatest calm or the most devastating wrath. Over the years many have tried to tame it by raising strong bridges of wood or stone at Decize, Nevers or La Charité, yet they have always had to be rebuilt after the next strong flood. While this is the source of many of the region's sorrows it has taught us to deal with the forces of nature, a lessen any invader would have to pay for more dearly.
translation: 卢瓦尔河的桀骜不驯正如烈马，时而平和如镜，时而波涛汹涌。多年来，许多人尝试通过在代西兹，纳维尔或拉沙里泰建造坚固的桥梁来驯服它，但他们能做的只有在泛滥后重建这些桥。即使带来了很大的牺牲和悲痛，但造桥的经历仍教会了我们如何对抗大自然的力量，任何渺小的侵略者都必须付出更大代价。

original: Everyone knows that the best wet nurses are found in Nivernais, and over the years these women have nourished many children to health both at home and abroad. From great emperors and kings to the farmers sons and daughters back home the Morvan Wet Nurses produce strong children who then become strong adults. We must ensure that we never forget how to raise strong men and women as a country is only as successful as its inhabitants.
translation: 所有人都知道最好的奶娘出自讷韦尔，而多年来这些女子喂饱了许多国内外的健康孩子。无论多么伟大的皇帝国王，还是平凡农夫的子女，莫尔旺的奶娘们让这些孩子都能茁壮成长。我们必须确保我们能够抚育健康的国民，这对于国家的成就来说至关重要。

original: Greatest Palace of the Loire Valley
translation: 卢瓦尔河谷中的辉煌宫殿

original: The world needs to see our country for the great place that it is, the foremost of the French regions and the Heart of Europe. Let us renovate the old fortifications of Nevers into the greatest palace this region has ever seen.
translation: 我们要让整个世界都知道整个法国地区，乃至欧洲腹地最为光辉灿烂的宫殿就在我国。让我们修缮这座讷韦尔的古老城堡，并把它改建成这片地区最辉煌的宫殿。

original: It has always been known to the French kings that men from the provinces are best suited to dictate the trade policies of the kingdom as our people are masters in the art of trade. France is ideally located, at the crossroad of the Atlantic and the Mediterranean, between England and the Italian cities as well as Germany and the Iberian Peninsula. The wealth of the world flows through our lands!
translation: 法国国王素来知晓我国国民精通贸易，因此用这些人来指导贸易政策是再好不过了。 法兰西地理位置极佳，同时临近大西洋和地中海，在英格兰和意大利的城市之间，此外还隔开了的德意志地区和伊比利亚半岛。整个世界的财富都要从我国领土经过！

original: Our ancestors used to protect themselves in heavily fortified castles. With the coming of the renaissance, however, prestige and power no longer relies on such fortresses. Let us instead build magnificently decorated palaces to show our prosperity and splendor to other Frenchmen and foreigners alike.
translation: 我们的先祖过去用坚固的堡垒保护自己。 随着文艺复兴的潮流袭来，威望和权力不再依赖于这样的城堡。让我们转而建造绚丽夺目的的宫殿，以此向其他法国人和外国人彰显我们的富饶与辉煌。

original: From the wet areas of England to the dry regions of the Holy Land our knightly ancestors fought valiantly from horseback. Had they seen us today they might make fun of our ruffs and laces yet underneath this magnificent varnish we still exert the 'furor gallicus' and none can resist us on the battlefield!\nLet our musketmen be to the modern battlefield what the French Knights were to the medieval wars. All shall fear the might of our armies!
translation: 从英格兰的湿地到圣地的荒原，我们饱含骑士精神的先祖勇敢的在马背上战斗。他们要还活着，肯定会嘲笑我们的皱领和花边。但在这奢华服饰的表面下，我们仍保有高卢人的勇敢，没人能在战场上抵抗我们！\n让我们的火枪手在现代战场上如同中世纪骑士那样战斗。所有人都会惧怕我们的军队！

original: Our people have always believed in standing strong for their cause. When the French people's opinion is set nobody can hinder us from expressing it. Whether we side with the pope or against hem we must remain firm in our convictions!
translation: 我们的人民一直保持着坚定的信仰。当法国人有什么想法，无人能阻拦我们表达。不论站在教宗那边或是对抗他，我们必须紧紧把握自己的信念！

original: France is to many known as the land of good cooking. Every province is famed for its wines, dishes, cheeses and cakes and it is a proven proverb here that good food builds good character. As our region is home to some of the most delicious food its reputation goes beyond that of many of the other areas of France. We must cherish and guard our culinary traditions and strengthen our regional identity.
translation: 法国以美食闻名于世。每个省份都有自己闻名的美酒，美食，奶酪和蛋糕，而古话说得好，美食能培养良好的品性。我们家乡盛产最美味的食物，闻名法国全国。我们必须珍惜并保护这一烹饪传统，增强我们的地区认同。

original: French culture and French language is the carrier of the ideas of the modern age. As the enlightenment spreads from court to court so does the respect for all things French. It would be wrong, however, to presume that this is strictly a spread of Parisian ideas and values. As French becomes the language of all courts, books and plays our influence spreads worldwide with it.
translation: 法国的文化和语言承载着现代理念。随着启蒙运动在宫廷中传播，所有有关法国的事物也倍受人们尊敬。然而仅仅把这完全当作是巴黎人理念和价值的传播，那就有失偏颇了。随着法语成为所有宫廷，著作和戏剧的语言，我们的影响也深达海外。

original: The foreigners always speak of France as the country with one king. This well may be true but this does not mean in any way that the king is alone to undertake anything positive for our fellow Frenchmen. The French provinces have a life of their own, and be it under the royal authority or in a more autonomous way they are able to produce strong men and beautiful wives, great philosopher, artists and learned men. Paris matters little to us in day-to-day matters. We must stand up for our own people for we are the true Frenchmen and without us the French region would be both weaker and blander.
translation: 外国人说起法国，似乎法国只有那么一位国王。虽然这是事实，但仅有一位国王显然是不能成事的。法国各省份有各自的生活方式，不论是处于皇家权威之下还是拥有更多自治权，那里的男性都很健壮，有着美丽的妻子，更不用说那些伟大的哲学家，艺术家和学者。巴黎对我们的日常生活毫无影响。我们的人民必须作为真正的法国人代表，没有了我们法国就会变得弱小和沉闷。

original: The ruler of our state is known as the 'Bahr Negasi' or the King of the Sea and the contact with the Red Sea and its flow of trade and people has always been a defining feature of our history.
translation: 我们国家的统治者被称作"巴赫内贾西"，海上之王。在红海边上，贸易商旅络绎不绝，这勾勒出了我国历史的风貌。

original: In 328 AD the first bishop of Axum was named by the Pope of Alexandria. Much has transpired since that day but we still hold on to our Christian faith and look to Alexandria and Ethiopia for religious guidance. Let us safeguard the Christian traditions of our ancestors and integrate the monastic orders in our society.
translation: 公元328年，阿克苏姆的第一个主教由亚历山大教宗任命。自那以来天下剧变，但我们仍恪守基督信仰，并向亚历山大和埃塞俄比亚寻求指引。让我们保卫祖先的基督教传统，将修道会纳入我们的社会体系。

original: Our traditional powerbase is not as large as those of some of our neighbors. It is imperative that we do not tie our country diplomatically to any single one of our neighbors. Instead we need to be prepared to make deals with whoever necessary to protect ourselves from Christian and Muslim foes alike.
translation: 我们国家传统的权力基础不如邻国那么大。我们不应将我们的安危维系在邻国中，而需要随时准备与任何能保卫我们的国家结盟，不论他们是基督徒还是穆斯林。

original: When the state falters local influential elders, the Shimagile, are always ready to step in and assume responsibility for the day-to-day running of their provinces. As we move to centralize our rule, however, perhaps it is time to let these elders either assume positions in our administration or take a step back to be replaced by government appointed officials.
translation: 当国家孱弱不堪时，被称作为师马吉的地方长老们，随时都准备接管地方省份的日常行政。我们应当加强集权，或是让这些地方长老在政府中任职，或是任命行政官员替换他们。

original: Over the centuries we have from time to time had to accept foreign overlords due to diplomatic circumstances beyond our control. Once our society has recovered, however, we have never hesitated to throw out any foreign officials and raise our own banners in rebellion. Whether fighting the Ethiopians to the south or the Muslim Empires to the north we must be ready to defend every last piece of our land.
translation: 数个世纪以来，外交环境迫使我们不得不接受外国领主的统治。一旦我们的社会恢复元气，我们会立刻摆脱这些外国官员，通过起义建立我们自己的国家。不论是南方的埃塞俄比亚人还是北方的穆斯林帝国，我们都会做好准备，寸土必争。

original: The spice transit trade is not what it once was and while the products of Africa and Arabia themselves still attract far-away merchants our fortunes seem to have declined with the decrease of the Red Sea Spice route. We must build on our strengths and instead of yearning for what once was it is time we reorient our trade policies to fully focus on the stream of goods from Ethiopia and the Sudan.
translation: 香料中转贸易不再有过去那么兴盛，尽管非洲和阿拉伯的物产仍吸引远方的商人前来选购，但红海的香料贸易已大不如从前。我们必须建设自己的力量，而非沉醉于过去的光辉。是时候改变我们的贸易政策，全身心专注于来自埃塞俄比亚和苏丹的贸易。

original: The age of princes is upon us and it is time we realize our full potential as a power in this region. Let us expand our state at the expense of our neighbors. We must not let ancient traditions or allegiances hinder us for if we don't grab what land and power we can someone else will.
translation: 贵族王室的时代到来了，我们必须发挥自身的潜力，成为地区主导。让我们通过吞并邻国扩张国家。不要让古老的传统和忠诚阻碍我们获得新的土地和权力。

original: The city of Jumie, now more widely known as Dali, was always the capital of our country and the center of our power. We must renovate it and expand it to not only show our respect for this ancient city but also to demonstrate our wealth. A mighty capital will be enough for our people to recognize us as the legitimate successor of the old kingdom of Nanzhao.
translation: 苴咩，现在被称作大理，一直是我们的首都和权力中心。我们必须重建和扩展这座城市，展现我们的财富和荣耀。一个强大的首都足够让人民承认我们才是南诏王国的正统继承者。

original: Tea is produced in great amount in our country, and only the most ignorant will see it merely as 'a nice drink'. For centuries our neighbors have been importing this important trade good from us, and sometimes they are willing to pay dearly for the coveted goods. By strengthening our control over the tea-horse trade route we would have a firm hold over all its tea and would be able to dominate this trade.
translation: 我国大量产茶，只有最愚蠢的家伙才觉得茶只是一种"好喝的饮料"。数个世纪来，我们的邻国一直进口我们的茶，有时他们会为了这垂涎欲滴的商品花费甚多。通过增强对茶马古道的控制，我们可以牢牢地在茶叶贸易中占据支配地位。

original: While not a Confucian state per se, we live close to the Han lands and know well how effectively they can run their country. This is a huge advantage that we should not ignore, by adopting their political theories we would be able to strengthen our state.
translation: 虽然我国本质上不是儒学国家，但我们离汉人的土地很近，也知道他们如何有效地治理国家。我们不应忽视这种巨大优势，采纳一些他们的治国之道可以加强我们的国家。

original: Theravada Buddhism is a considerable influence in our lands as the dominant faith in the entire region we live. This can be a powerful tool to us. By promoting the Theravada teachings we can pacify the peoples under our rule as well as those who will soon be ruled by us.
translation: 上座部佛教在我国有相当的影响力，它是我们整个地区的每一块土地上的主要信仰。我们可以将它视为一个强有力的工具。 可以通过推进佛教教育来安抚那些我们治下的以及那些即将纳入我们统治的臣民。

original: Ngel Zex, or Benzhu in the tongue of the Han people, are the local patron gods worshipped by some of our people. Benzhuism has a pantheon of numerous deified ancestors, god-like heroes, and mighty nature gods. People pray to these gods for good harvests or health. Any attempt to ban or limit such a faith would be ridiculous as the practice of Benzhu worship can keep our society very stable. We should not only tolerate the practice but also promote it in the many villages and small settlements under our control.
translation: “武增”或者汉人口中的“本主”，是一些本地民众的保护神。本主信仰饱含许多神灵,先祖和英灵。人们向这些神灵祈求健康或丰收。任何尝试禁止或限制这种信仰的行为都是不可理喻的，对本主的崇拜使得我们国家十分稳定。我们不应仅仅允许这种信仰，更应该在一些我们控制下的小村落和聚居地去推崇它。

original: Our land is fertile, but unfortunately, also rugged. To build a great nation, we must overcome the mountainous terrain around us. We should encourage terracing so that more lands can be cultivated and more people can be fed.
translation: 我们的土地肥沃却崎岖不平。要建立一个大国，我们只有征服周围的群山。我们应当鼓励在更多土地上建立梯田，收获更多粮食供养更多人口。

original: Our country is rich because its of fertile lands but there's another great fortune in our possession in the form of rich copper mines. The mines in our control produce ores of high quality and in large quantity we must make good use of this advantage and develop the production of this dear metal.
translation: 我国的富庶不仅来自于土地的肥沃，更在于地下丰富的铜矿矿脉。这些铜矿在我们的手中变得质量过硬，产量丰厚。我们应当充分利用这一优势发展这种冶金产业。

original: Our nation is one of polar opposites between the rulers and the ruled. Our elite has little in common with our subjects, differing greatly in language, diet, customs, appearance and even sleeping habits during winter. In order to ensure our continued rule, we shall have to be tolerant of their strange ways.
translation: 我国两极分化，统治者和被统治者之间大相径庭。我们的精英阶层与被统治的人民不论是语言，饮食，传统甚至是“冬眠习惯”都极其不同。为了保证我们的继续统治，我们只有容忍他们不同的生活方式。

original: When crossing the cold northern seas it is important to have skilled navigators, so that we do not lose our bearings or forget the best hunting spots out on the ice.
translation: 穿越北冰洋时，带上经验丰富的领航员十分重要，这样才不会忘记我们的方向或是冰上最佳的狩猎点。

original: Jan Mayen is cold and harsh, and its natives are not friendly to those from other, weaker and smaller races. We can use this to our advantage, should we ever be invaded.
translation: 扬马延冰冷荒芜，原住民对那些嬴弱不堪的种族都不太友好。我们可以利用这一优势，对抗潜在的入侵者。

original: The proud lineage of our monarchs, standing far taller on two legs than the rulers of any other nation on Earth, should be evident to all!
translation: 我们君主令人自豪的血脉，双脚站立的时候比地上任何国家的君主都要高大伟岸！

original: Though we are used to getting our way through fear, sometimes it is necessary to employ diplomacy when dealing with other countries. A generous gift of raw fish and seal meat will do wonders to thaw up frozen relations.
translation: 一直以来我们习惯于用恐惧手法开拓道路，但偶尔利用外交手段同他国交流也是相当有必要的。像鲜鱼和海豹肉这样的礼物肯定有助于外交破冰。

original: Our empire has grown, and its ruling class can bearly keep up with the demands of all our subjects. To continue to administrate our country efficiently, we will need to attract more talented administrators from the northern lands where they currently dwell.
translation: 我们的帝国成长了，而统治者难以满足统治所有臣民的需要。为了能有效的治理国家，我们需要从北方的土地吸引来更多优秀的官员帮助我们统治。

original: We are a race of natural warriors, and for us the right to bear arms is the most cherished right of all!
translation: 我们是天生的勇士一族，握爪的权利是最值得捍卫的！

original: Our lands have a long history of strict preservation of Brahmin learning. Indeed even our rulers are of the Brahmin caste. Let us continue to safeguard and support the Mithila Brahmins and their sanskrit schools.
translation: 我们国家长期以来严谨地保存了婆罗门的学识。实际上我们的统治者就处于婆罗门阶层。让我们保持这一传统，支持弥萨罗婆罗门和他们的梵语学校。

original: Throughout the centuries Tirhut has been a crossroad for traders. In order to thrive Tirhut must welcome and protect all of them, from the rich merchants moving their wares along the Grand Trunk Road between Bengal and Kabul to the many baniyas traveling between their shops in Nepal and their shops in Bihar. Even the small scale Paikars who sell various things along our roads must be protected by our state.
translation: 许多世纪以来，蒂鲁德都是商路交汇之处。为了生存，蒂尔胡必须接纳和保护他们所有人，不论是从孟加拉到喀布尔的商人还是从尼泊尔到比哈尔的旅客。即便是兜售小商品的行脚商也应当受我们保护。

original: It is the duty of any righteous ruler to maintain a great number of poets and scholars at court. Traditionally this has been especially true in our lands and many famous men and lineages have thrived here. We must open our arms to all men of learning, from the 'Pandits singing the essence of the Vedas to the Munshis elated with Persian knowledge'.
translation: 任何公正的君王都有义务在宫廷供养一批学者和诗人。在我们的传统里这一点至关重要，尤其是一些伟人和他们的世系在我们的土地上生根发展。我们必须张开双臂欢迎有识之士，不论是唱吠陀经的班智达还是满腹波斯学识的孟希。

original: The Tirhuti Purbias took to the use of firearms early and today they are known both for their marksmanship and for their skill in producing gunpowder itself. Let us make this group the core of our infantry arm and create a strong and modern army.
translation: 蒂鲁德的印度兵早早就拿起了火枪，而如今他们因射击技术和火药生产闻名于世。让我们将这群人作为步兵的核心，建立一个强大的现代部队。

original: A great number of tributaries to the Ganges criss cross our country. Rivers such as the Kosi, Gandak, Mahananda or Bagmati water our lands and provide transportation for our merchants. At times, however, they are also a great hindrance. Great rains can sometimes flood large areas of our state, spreading disease, destroying roads and harming our crops. As natives of these lands this is something we have grown used to handling. An invader on the other hand could easily find himself in a much harsher situation.
translation: 恒河纵横的支流有很多穿越了我们的国家。 诸如戈西河，布里根德格河，默哈嫩达河与巴格马提等河滋润着我们的土地，为我们的商人提供交通。 然而，有时它们也是很大的阻碍。 大雨有时会淹没我们州的大部分地区，传播疾病，摧毁道路，伤害我们的庄稼。 作为本地人的我们可以很好的处理这些。 但在另一方面，对于入侵者来说他们很容易发现自己处于如此严酷的境地。

original: Once poetry, songs and even scholarly works were being produced in the Maithili language and the Tirhuta script. Let us once again ensure that the language of our region becomes the carrier of our culture.
translation: 曾经一度诗歌文学都用迈蒂利语和蒂鲁德塔文写成。让我们确保这种语言可以承载我国的文化。

original: A multitude of lakes in our lands as well as the quality our soil and climate make Tirhut ideal for the cultivation of many of the cash crops that are so sought after in the west. Let us expand the cultivation of Indigo and Sugar so that we may grow rich from their expensive fancies.
translation: 我们的土地不乏湖水和沃土，加上气候适宜，蒂鲁德是种植西方人需求的许多经济作物最佳的地区。让我们扩展染料和蔗糖种植，从西方人兜里大赚一笔。

original: The Legions of Rome, at their peak, were considered one of the finest fighting forces the world had ever seen. With the Empire's rebirth, its armies must once again strive for nothing less than this level of martial excellence.
translation: 巅峰时期的罗马军团曾被认为是世界上最善战的军队之一。随着帝国的重生，他的军队必须再次攀登上这个巅峰。

original: Roman law shines like a beacon in a sea of turmoil, and the people of the provinces can rest easy in the knowledge that peace and order have been restored throughout the Empire.
translation: 罗马的法律就像是风暴中的灯塔在混沌中散发着闪亮的明光，和平与秩序在整个帝国中重建，各行省的人民籍此便可高枕无忧了。

original: Rome is once more an 'Empire Without End' and the golden wings of the Imperial Aquila stretch across ever more provinces. Fortunately, Roman officials can fall back on centuries worth of tradition in the effective integration of new lands.
translation: 罗马曾经是一个“永无尽头的帝国”，帝国金鹰的翅膀延伸跨越至世界的尽头。幸运的是，罗马官员可以回归千年前的传统价值并由此高效地整合新的土地。

original: The celebrated architecture of ancient Rome has returned in style, and new impressive public works are being erected in cities all over the Empire. A new era of man-made Wonders is upon us.
translation: 古罗马的的优美建筑风格已经重生，帝国境内的各个城市正在兴建令人影响深刻的宏伟公共建筑。一个人造奇迹的新时代由我们来开启。

original: Even after the fall of the Western Empire, Rome's legacy continued in Europe and many of its successor states were desperate to claim some of its former glory for themselves. Now, as the Roman Empire rises from the ashes like the proverbial phoenix, many cannot help but stare in awe.
translation: 即使在西罗马帝国衰亡后，在欧洲依旧传承着罗马宝贵的遗产，她众多的后继者极度渴望为自己夺一份她昔日的荣耀。如今，罗马帝国已经如凤凰般涅槃重生，众生不禁叹观止矣。

original: For the Senate and People of Rome! The Imperial Senate may not wield as much political power as in the days of the ancient Republic, but they still provide the citizens of the Empire with a sense of representation that was simply unheard of in most feudal societies.
translation: 为了元老院与罗马人民！帝国参议院也许不会拥有与古时共和国的元老院同等的政治权利，但参议院依然可以代表公民的权益，这在大多数封建社会中几乎是见不到的。

original: To efficiently administrate a great empire consisting of myriad provinces and wildly different cultures is a monumental task. This was accomplished when ancient Rome was at the height of its power, but we have had to relearn many of those lessons and adapt them to better suit the modern world.
translation: 要有效的管理由无数的行省和多样的文化组成的巨大帝国实为一项难事。但是在权利巅峰时期的古罗马，这是完全可行的，所以我们不得不重新学习这些经验，并且改造它使其更加适应现代世界。

original: Ireland is a divided land surrounded by would-be conquerors and those who would use her to fight their own conflicts. If we are to be free we must seek friends and allies. After all, the enemy of my enemy is my friend. Even if he is a Scotsman.
translation: 爱尔兰是一块分裂的土地，被那些将来的征服者与内斗者割据着。如我们想自由，我们必须要寻求朋友和盟友。毕竟，敌人的敌人就是朋友，哪怕他是个苏格兰人。

original: Throughout the centuries, the clans have been the base of our society and culture in peace, and source of strength in times of war. However, a new era is now upon us, one where these same clans could be the force bringing us down and disuniting our people and efforts. In order to survive this brave new world, we must do away with some traditions of the old and change our ways.
translation: 数世纪以来，氏族一直是我们在和平时的社会与文化基础、战争时期的力量源泉。然而新的时代已经到来，如今同样是氏族他们却成为了让我们失望的一支力量，分裂我们的人民和成功的果实。为了在这个美丽新世界生存下去，我们必须摒弃一些旧传统，并且紧抓我们的机会。

original: Kingship over Ireland has always been a dream and ambition of our rulers. On our island there are many ways to expand one's influence and dominion. But what other way beats forcing one's rival to pay Cios Dubh - the ultimate privilege of being protected by Thomond's arms?
translation: 全爱尔兰的王权是我们的君主长久以来的梦想与野心，在这座岛屿上有很多方法可以扩展一个势力的影响力与统治地位。但不如另辟蹊径，击败并强迫一国的宿敌让他们支付「黑色租金」以便得到终极特权——托蒙德的庇荫。

original: As our power and influence grow, so does our ambition. In order to subdue the rest of Irish rulers and impose our dominion, we must establish contacts with the military centers of Europe, places where we can hire experienced men of war, a hammer we can use to forge a unified Ireland in case charm and diplomacy won't do.
translation: 随着我们逐渐增长的实力与影响力，与一并增长的野心，为了征服其他的爱尔兰地区的统治者并且施加我们的统治，我们必须与欧洲的军事中心建立联系，在那里我们可以招募到有战争经验的人，这是一把可以用以锻造统一爱尔兰的铁锤，而这样的事魅力和外交可做不到。

original: There are many ways a man can be wealthy in life. We have been blessed with the best pastures on this island, and now the size of our livestock is the envy of entire Ireland.
translation: 人生在世，致富之路千条。上天垂怜令我们拥有了整个爱尔兰最为丰茂的草场，因畜牧而积累的财富为全岛所传诵称羡！

original: There are few who can rival our battle prowess, or courage to meet the enemy in the field of battle. But for ages, ideas and military concepts have had to travel long and far to reach our land from elsewhere. Now is the time to master our own ways and reform our army to be not a mere application of someone else's ideas, but one made in our own image to serve our own needs.
translation: 我们高超的作战技巧和在战场上与敌人作战的非凡勇气都难遇对手。然而一直以来，境外的军事理念和思想总是需要穿越重重时间与空间的阻隔才能抵达我们的国境之内。当此之时，我们的军队应该按照自己的方式来进行改革，而不仅仅只是照搬他人的理念，以此组建一支符合民意和国情的军队。

original: For generations our leaders have dreamt of a unified Ireland. And great as that dream may be, Ireland is still just a tiny island, a pebble in a sea of rocks. No, our new generations dream of a much bigger dream. One of an untouched virgin land to the west across the sea, land where we can establish a new Ireland, a country without rivals.
translation: 统一爱尔兰的梦想一直在统治者当中代代相传。而与这个“伟大”的梦想相对应的现实却是，爱尔兰仅仅只是一个小巧的岛屿，就如同一颗大海中的卵石一般渺小。不，我们的后代们应该拥有一个更加远大的梦想。西渡重洋，那里有一座我们未曾触及到的处女地，一片我们可以建立没有纷争的新爱尔兰的美丽土地！

original: Situated in the middle of a major Irish trade route, Sligo is in a perfect position to be a trade hub of the entire island. To that end we must establish trading contacts with our neighbors and let the trade flow.
translation: 位于爱尔兰的主要贸易通路中心点之上的斯莱戈具有绝佳的优势发展成为全爱尔兰岛的贸易中心。为了实现这个目标，我们必须和我们的邻居们签订正式的贸易协议来活跃和发展岛内的贸易活动。

original: For centuries many invaders have come to our lands seeking control over the strategically important Castle of Sligo. So many times has this old fort been repaired and again destroyed, that today we are not even sure where the main ruins are, even though parts of it still stand. In any case, this old fort is a symbol to our people. If we can rebuild it, we can turn this powerful rebirth of a legend into a New Hope for them.
translation: 数个世纪以来，入侵者们多次进攻以期控制我们的战略要冲——斯莱戈城堡。因此，这座古老的堡垒被多次重建并再次被摧毁。时至今日，我们甚至不能确认这座堡垒的原址究竟在什么地方，即使斯莱戈城堡的部分遗址依旧矗立在这篇土地之上。无论如何，这座城堡一直被我们的人民视作精神象征。倘若我们能够重建这座城堡，那么我们能够通过这个传奇的重生为我们的人民树立一个新的希望。

original: Sligo has been a point where various cultures met for ages. Some would come in peace, some as conquerors, but in the end they all left something behind them. It is up to us, their descendants, to embrace this legacy and build a future that celebrates our origins.
translation: 长久以来，斯莱戈一直是一个多种文化激烈碰撞的交汇点。有些文化以和平的方式传播，有些文化则伴随着刀剑而来，而最终，这些文化都对斯莱戈的本土文化产生了深远的影响。作为这些文化的后代，现在将由我们来继承这些遗赠并开创一个更加美好的未来。

original: As we have watched our neighbors squabble and fight their petty wars over trivial matters for centuries, our people realized that moving the chess pieces out in the open, for the whole world to see, was not the only way. Using our contacts as well as trading influence, we could also not only move the chess pieces, but play a whole different game, one that only a few could see at all.
translation: 数个世纪以来，我们眼睁睁地看着我们的邻居因各种琐碎的理由互相争吵和发起一场场小家子气的“战争”，我们的人民逐渐意识到令人一目了然的按照游戏规则来行事并不是唯一的选择。我们不仅仅能够在桌面上纵横捭阖，利用贸易协议和贸易影响力，我们还能够在完全能够在暗中进行一场只有少数人才能够参与的另一场游戏。

original: The location of Sligo is both a blessing and a curse. Its position allows us to open up our land to the sea trade, but as our ancestors learned the hard way, it also invites all sorts of seaborne would-be conquerors to our walls. Thus to secure safety of our people we must adapt, study both land and sea techniques of our enemies and learn to apply them.
translation: 斯莱戈的地理位置既有上天赐予的天然优势也是危机四伏的。她的位置既令我们能够自由地开展繁荣的海洋贸易，同时也让我们的祖先们见识到了世界的阴暗面，在海上漂流着的各种所谓的“征服者”们也被她的繁荣所吸引。因此，为了保护人民的财产安全，我们必须迎难直上，向我们在海洋上的敌人们学习先进的技术，师夷长技以制夷。

original: Influence over Ireland and wealth rivaled by none of our neighbors are fine ambitions in life. They have served our ancestors well. But this is a new age. Rumors of new lands being discovered to the west reach us, and perhaps it is time for us to join the exclusive group of nations that are able to sail the seas and seek glory and riches in lands far away.
translation: 将我们的影响力传播整个爱尔兰岛并让我们的经济再无敌手会是一个不错的目标。虽然海军的祖祖辈辈们为这个国家贡献良多，现在已经进入了新的时代。有关于在西方发现了新大陆的流言传播得沸沸扬扬，或许现在已经是时候让我们加入探索新大陆的国家行列之中，在那片土地上攫取荣耀和财富。

original: In our time we have achieved many glorious things: We built a bustling trading network. We sailed the seas near and far. We met new and interesting people. And we traded with them.
translation: 在我们自己的时代里，我们完成了许多光荣的成就：我们创建了一个熙攘的贸易网络。属于我们的船帆遍及四海，无远弗届。我们在新世界中遇到了无数的新朋友和有趣的人。当然，我们也和这些人相互贸易。

original: Since the earliest days of kingdom of Desmond, our forefathers knew that the best way to master a land was to be ever present. And thus they constructed castles and manors and other great buildings that stand proud to this day. And thus we carry on that tradition to this day. A lesson well learned.
translation: 在德斯蒙德王国建立之初，我们的祖先们认为统治一片土地的最佳方式应当是让他们的权威在那片土地上永远存在着。因此他们建造了大量的城堡，庄园和其他伟大的建筑并至今仍高傲地挺立着。如今我们也应当继承这个优秀的传统。前事勿忘后事之师。

original: Family. Family never changes. Especially when it comes to nobility. But why should we fear our cadet family lines like the rest of Europe? Our own kin? No, instead of fear, schemes and plots, we shall make use of them, carve up the land, hand out titles, manors and castles, expand the royal family and create presence in every dark corner of our kingdom.
translation: 家庭，对于家庭的感情不应被改变。特别是在贵族当中这一观念更应被贯彻。但是为什么我们要像其他的欧洲贵族们一样对自己的家族旁支充满恐惧呢？我们自己的血脉？不，相比于恐惧，阴谋和诡计，我们更应该任用我们的旁支，划分给他们土地，分封给他们贵族头衔，庄园和城堡，扩大我们高贵的家族，让属于我们的荣光照耀到王国的每一个阴暗角落。

original: Many would-be invaders came to our lands seeking plunder and easily won glory. But all of them would break against the kingdom of Desmond. Tall and proud our people stand against all perils and despite all odds, such is our way. The strongest Gaelic Bastion.
translation: 曾经许多入侵者来到我们的土地上并总是轻而易举地满载战利品和荣誉而归。而在此之前，所有的入侵者们都需面对来自德斯蒙德王国的阻击。我们的人民总是满怀着内心的骄傲去面对所有的艰难险阻并蔑视一切的不公，这就是我们的生存之道。世上最为坚固的城堡——盖尔棱堡。

original: The old kingdom of Munster is long gone, its lands divided, and authority almost entirely diminished. But its legacy and glory still lives in the proud dynastic lines of Desmond, its true sons and heirs. No, we shall never forget, and one day we shall reclaim the lands of Munster.
translation: 古老的芒斯特王国已经消逝在历史长河之中，它的国土分崩离析，属于它的权威也几乎完全消失。然而芒斯特的遗产和荣耀被德斯蒙德王朝所继承并存在于这个王朝的血脉当中，子孙和储君们代代相传。不，我们永远都不应该忘记，总有一天，我们将会光复整个芒斯特王国。

original: Our forefathers stood up to invaders and conquerors countless times. Even in times of great suffering and loss, our kingdom endured against all storms, and survived to this day. Where many lords of Ireland bowed and banded together in order to survive, the proud sons and daughters of Desmond stood on their own. Independent and without masters until the bitter end.
translation: 我们的祖先无数次站起来抵抗入侵者和征服者， 经历了无数艰难困苦而挺到今天。 爱尔兰的诸领主领导着德斯蒙德的骄傲的儿女们为生存而奋斗。 独立，没有主人，直到苦难结束。

original: Life has never been easy in our land. You need to be tough merely to survive, and you need a heart of a warrior to succeed out there. Talents highly appreciated and often sought after among the warring nations of Europe. Instead of watching our sons fight between each other for often worthless stretches of land, encourage them to go out in the world and seek military service and a life of honor and glory.
translation: 在我们的土地上的生活十分不易。 你需要足够坚韧才能生存，你需要一个战士的心，才能在这里成功。 欧洲交战各国迫切需要额外的军力。 我们应当放弃无休止的争夺土地的内战，鼓励我们的战士走向世界，追求光荣与尊严。

original: For centuries the kingdoms of Europe have gone through wars and hardships forging themselves into powerful nations and colonial empires. Our greatest achievement? Not only surviving the most humble of origins, but thriving in the middle of all that, despite all odds. What else could a man really ask for?
translation: 几个世纪以来，欧洲几个王国通过战争和各种其它手段崛起为强权及殖民帝国。我们呢？起于草芥之间，且挺过了各种风雨，维持着盛世直到今日。除此之外，一个男人还能有其它更好的追求吗？

original: The Great Lakes that feed our people with fish and water their fields are sought by many. Seeking a better life for themselves, a constant trickle of nomadic peoples come to settle within our borders. If we can integrate these Nilotic peoples in our country we shall never lack the manpower we need to expand.
translation: 我们人民捕鱼及取水的大湖（指的是中非的几个大湖）是许多人所追求的，不断有寻求更好的生活的游牧民族在我们周边定居。若我们能融合这些尼罗河人，就不会缺乏扩张所需的人力。

original: Legend tells us that all the Great Lakes were once controlled by the mighty Kitara empire. It is our task to reunite what was once shattered and reclaim our rightful legacy as the true heirs of Kitara.
translation: 传说，这一片所有的大湖曾经都处于基塔拉帝国控制下。我们应当致力于收复基塔拉帝国的碎片并称自己为她的正统继承人。

original: Since time immemorial our people have believed that any son can inherit the father. Through the practice of Polygamy any woman that bears the child of our ruler may be married into the royal family and their offspring made royal heirs.
translation: 自古以来，我们人民相信任何一个儿子都有继承权。 通过一夫多妻制的做法，任何为我们统治者生下孩子的女人，都可以嫁入王室，而他们的后代有继承权。

original: Just as legend tells us that these lands were once united under Kitara and the great hero Ruhinda we are united by a belief in a common set of Taboos and a common Pantheon. While different spirits are honored by different clans and different kingdoms we all have a common past. We must protect the families that maintain our shrines and temples. Others shall judge us by how well we treat these lineages and they may curse those who anger them.
translation: 传说，这些土地曾经英雄鲁欣达手上统一为基塔拉帝国，因为我们有共同的信仰。而现在，虽然不同的氏族及王国信奉不同的神，但我们依然有共同的过去。我们必须保护那些维护我们神社和寺庙的家族。毕竟周围的人都在看着我们，若我们对这些人不敬，会招致骂名。

original: Assembling raiding parties ad hoc may have worked well for our ancestors but it is high time we create a system to maintain a more permanent military force. From the many great lineages of our kingdom we shall pick the most honorable to serve as our soldiers for generations to come. In return for special privileges these men shall be stationed in camps along our borders and train for the inevitable wars to come.
translation: 临时拉壮丁可能在我们祖先那时还好使，但现在是时候组建常备军了。我们将从王国的贵族里挑人组建军队（并给予他们特权），作为特权的回报，他们将驻扎在边境，为不可避免的战争而进行训练。

original: Each of the Kingdoms of the Great Lakes consists of a number of clans, often transcending the political borders that we have fought so hard to establish. We must ensure that we have the support of the hundreds of clans within our realm so that we can stand united before our enemies.
translation: 每个大湖区的王国都有一些宗族，其分布往往跨过国界。 我们必须确保我们得到在我们国内的数百个氏族的支持，以在我们的敌人面前团结一致。

original: Ubugabire, personal client and patron relationships are the foundation upon which much of our society has been built. Let us formalize these relationships and make them political rather than personal. A system upon which the state itself can draw loyalty rather than the ruler personally. This system of privileges and administrative authority will allow our state to grow while efficiently managing the new lands we conquer.
translation: Ubugabire，即保护和被保护约定，是我们社会得以建立的基础。让我们正式化这种约定，使其成为国家的而非个人的。国家本身可以通过规章制度来获得(人民的)忠诚，而非通过统治者个人获得。这种制度将使我国得到发展，同时有效地管理我们新征服的土地。

original: We are well equipped to solve the many long-standing problems and conflicts of the people around Lake Malawi. Our people are relative newcomers to these lands and we are not bound by ancient traditions or preconceived notions of what is possible. Our flexibility is our strength and will allow us to dominate other powers in this region.
translation: 我们有能力解决马拉维湖周围人民长期存在的许多问题和冲突。 我们的人民是这些土地的新主人，我们不受传统束缚。 灵活性是我们的优势，将使我们能够主宰这一地区的其他势力。

original: Once a year we invite the heads of all royal lineages affiliated with us to our capital to perform the ritual of Mlira, the great spirit that once led our ancestors to this country. As we light the fires around Lake Malawi we affirm the position of the chiefs so that we can celebrate our mutual ties.
translation: 每年一次，我们邀请所有手下的酋长们到我们的首都祭祀米拉拉——曾经引导我们祖先到这个地方的大神。 当我们点燃马拉维湖周围的篝火时，我们强化了与这些人的关系。

original: The lands around the southern tip of Lake Malawi are fertile and well suited to feed an expansive state. Our growing population ensures a steady stream of new recruits to help us realize our political ambitions.
translation: 马拉维湖南端的土地肥沃，非常适合供养一个扩张中的国家。 我们不断增长的人口确保新的兵源不断增加，以帮助我们实现我们的政治野心。

original: Traditionally all traders of ivory converge at the southern end of Lake Malawi. From there their goods are sent south along the Shire and Zambezi river systems before they are taken over by the distribution system of the Swahili trade states. We have an excellent position to control this trade and develop the Lake Malawi trade region.
translation: 传统上所有的象牙贸易商都聚集在马拉维湖的南端。 从那里，他们的货物沿着希勒和赞比西河向南发送，然后到达斯瓦希里。 我们拥有控制这一贸易路线和发展马拉维湖贸易区的地理优势。

original: The adventuring spirit of our people has made our warriors and traders known far beyond our borders. In every village between Lake Malawi and the sea Maravis can be found serving as soldiers or middlemen in the lucrative Gold or Ivory trades. We should encourage our men to seek their fortunes abroad so that their experience may benefit our country.
translation: 我们人民的冒险精神使我们的战士和商人经常出国打拼。 在马拉维湖和海马拉维斯湖之间的每个村庄都可以找到在有利可图的黄金或象牙贸易中作为护卫或中间人的人。 我们应该鼓励我们的人在国外寻求财富，他们的经历会对我们国家有益。

original: The ever growing presence of western merchants have brought at least one good thing. Maize is a crop of the New World yet it is very well suited to our lands and our needs. We must do what we can to encourage the spread of Maize cultivation for 'Maize is life'.
translation: 西方商人的不断涌入，至少带来了一件好事。 玉米是新大陆的一种作物，但它也非常适合在我们的土地生长，且吃起来不错。 我们必须传播「玉米是生命」这种思想，尽可能的鼓励玉米种植。

original: While slaves are nothing new to this region western slaver expeditions have been growing ever more daring in the lands we control, leaving no man, woman or child safe. Foreigners are infiltrating our country in an attempt to rob it off it's most precious commodity. We cannot afford to let this attack on our authority go unanswered!
translation: 虽然本地也会使用奴隶，但西方奴隶贩子在我们控制的土地上越来越猖狂。男人，女人或孩子的安全都难以保证， 外国人正在渗透我们国家抢走我们的人民作为他们的的商品。 我们不能容忍这种行为！

original: Much as we cherish our roots we are completely isolated as the only Muslim state on Madagascar. In order to survive and thrive here we must continue to intermingle and integrate with the ancient masters of this land, the Tompon-Tany, forming a new identity in a new land.
translation: 作为马达加斯加唯一的穆斯林国家，纵使我们完全孤立，我们一样珍惜我们的“根”。为了在这里生存和繁衍，我们必须继续交融，并与这片土地自古以来的主人们，原住民们，在这片全新的土地上创造一个全新的认同。
用阿拉伯文书写的用于转写马尔加什语的手稿

original: Our ancestors brought a rich Arabic scribal tradition with them to this island that we have now begun to make use of to create texts in Malagasy. Let us institute special offices to protect and honor our ancient legacy as well as the scribes that make Malagasy a literary language.
translation: 我们的祖先将丰富的阿拉伯抄经士传统文本带到了这座岛上 ，我们现在开始用以在马拉加什书写记录。 让我们设立特别机构来尊重和保护我们的古老遗产，以便使马拉加什语能够真正成为标准语言。
安德里亚尼（部落统领）的办公室

original: Our country is dominated by four aristocratic clans, the Anteoni, the Antemahazo, the Anteisambo and the Zafikasinambo. The power balance between these four groups is constantly shifting but they all aim to create a more powerful state for us all. We must pick our leader, the Andrianoni, from one of these four clans and let their competition for this title drive their ambitions for our country.
translation: 我们的国家由四大家族所统治，分别是安泰奥尼家族，安泰马哈祖家族，安泰伊桑布家族和扎菲卡西南布家族。这四个家族之间的制衡是不断变化的，但他们的目标都是为了一个更强大的国家。我们必须从这四个部落之中选出我们的领袖，安德里亚努尼，用对这个称号的竞争为了我们的国家来驱使他们的夙愿。

original: Our country produces a larger number of skilled specialists than we can put to good use. This has led to a large number of men leaving our lands to seek employment elsewhere on the island. Let us continue to encourage this trend and benefit from a reputation as a country of learning. No Malagasy ruler shall be without an Antemoro Ombiasa advisor.
translation: 我们国家拥有的技师已经远超我们能够完全利用的程度。而这直接导致了有大量的成年男子离开我们的国家前往岛上其他地方去寻找机会。让我们继续大力支持这一趋势而且能从作为一个学习型国家的美名中获益。没有一个马拉加什的领主不应当拥有一个安泰莫罗萨满作顾问

original: Few Malagasy societies are as knowledgeable about proper religious ritual as we are. Let us make this knowledge our weapon to create a stronger and healthier society. By making religious rules the law of our people we can strengthen our unity and lessen the influence of foreigners within our borders.
translation: 很少有马拉加什的社群像我们一样对正确的宗教仪式了如指掌。让我们将这个优势作为我们的武器来创造一个更健康更​​有力的社会。通过将宗教戒律变为我们人民的法律，我们可以加强团想结，同时减轻外国人在我们边界活动的影响。

original: Strengthen control over the Slave Trade
translation: 加强对奴隶贸易的控制

original: The demand for slaves from the Swahili trade states grows greater and greater by the day. Our religious and cultural ties to the greater Indian Ocean world makes us the ideal middle men for this trade. Let us encourage those that seek to bring Malagasy slaves to do so from our ports and to make their business in our marketplaces.
translation: 斯瓦希里国家对奴隶的需求日益增长。我们与印度洋周边国家的宗教和文化联系使我们成为这个贸易理想的中间商。让我们鼓励那些寻求做马达加斯加奴隶贸易的人从我们的港口出发，并在我们的市场上做生意。

original: Traditionally the political power in our country lies with the aristocratic clans while the power over the spiritual aspects of our people is divided among four sacerdotal clans. If we could manage to unite both of these functions, the high clergy and the office of the Andrianoni, we would achieve unprecedented control over the Antemoro state.
translation: 传统上，我们国家的政治权力集中在贵族部落，而我们人民精神世界的统治力则分属于四个神圣部落。如果我们能够联合这两个职权，高级神甫和安德里安衲里办公室，我们将能够实现对安泰莫罗国家的前所未有的统治。

original: Swahili and Arab traders are eager to sell us gold and to trade for cloth, slaves and cattle but not everyone that seek our harbors have good intentions. We must always keep the fortifications of our port cities up to date so that they are able to withstand oversea raids as well as invasions from the center of the island.
translation: 斯瓦西里和阿拉伯的商人们急于向我们卖出黄金来获得一些布匹、奴隶和牛。不是每个人都怀着好意来到我们的港口。我们必须不断更新港口的防御工事，使它们能够抵御海外袭击和或者岛内来的侵略。

original: The rulers of our people all trace their ancestry back to the Maroserana, a great lineage that have given kings to a wide number of the states of this island. The origin of the Maroserana remain a mystery but their authority is unquestioned, as is their ability to conduct trade with the mainlanders to acquire the red gold that we hold sacred.
translation: 我们人民的领主们都将祖先追溯到Maroserana，这是一个伟大的血统，向这个岛屿的许多领地都授予了王衔。 Maroserana的起源仍然是一个谜，但他的权威却是毫无疑问的，以及与内地人交易获得我们所拥有的神圣的红金（含铜）。

original: Maritime trade has always been the main driving force in this region and where traders go pirates will always follow. As European ships have begun to master the Indian Ocean their floating wealth has attracted an increasing number of fortune seekers. Let us protect these pirates for a modest fee. It is only right that we are able to draw some profit from the riches that would otherwise just pass us by.
translation: 海运贸易一直是这个地区的主要动力，而无论商人们走到哪里海盗就会如影随形。随着欧洲来的船只开始掌控印度洋，他们那些浮动的宝藏吸引了越来越多的求金者。让我们用一个微薄的价格来保护这些海盗。只有这样，我们才能从本来只会从我们身边经过的财富中获得一些利润。

original: The people of the interior have been brought up fearing our warriors and their constant raids. Let us build upon this tradition of warfare and create a strong army ready to rise up as we need it.
translation: 岛民们一直畏惧着我们士兵不断的袭击。让我们倚靠这种战争传统，创造一支我们需要的能让我们崛起的强有力的军队。

original: Our kings are the keepers of the sacred Dady relics from which all authority in our lands stem. The close ties of the royal family to these sacred spirits of our ancestor makes them ideal to act as the local authority in the villages we control. We must enforce the sacred law and ensure that all positions of power remain with our royal princes.
translation: 我们的国王是神圣达迪的遗物的持有者，这代表着我们脚下土地的权威。皇室成员和我们先祖的英灵之间的联系能够使他们能成为我们所控制的村庄的一个理想的地方权威。我们必须通过强化这个神圣的戒律来确保所有的权位都留在我们的王子们的手中。

original: Our state controls the coastline of one of the busiest parts of the Indian Ocean trade network and it is only natural that a great number of traders from a wide range of cultures reside within our borders. What we cannot risk, however, is these merchants setting up their own societies beside our own. We must forcefully integrate all foreign merchant communities and make sure that they realize how much they rely on our protection.
translation: 我们的国家掌控着印度洋贸易网络中最繁忙的海岸线，自然有很大一批来自不同文化的传统的商人们生活在我们的国家。我们不能冒险让这些商人团在我们的社会之外建立自己的小社群。我们必须强力介入所有的外国商会同时让他们知道他们有多需要我们的保护。

original: Traditionally we have relied on irregular periodic collection of revenue to finance our state. Strength of arms and religious authority has always ensured that this has worked well enough. If our state is to grow, however, the time has come to create a more efficient and reliable permanent taxation system.
translation: 传统意义上来说我们依赖得是间歇性的收入来补充国家财政。 武装力量和宗教权威一直帮助我们确保这一过程的良好运行。但如果我们的国家要增长，那么现在是建立一个更有效率和可靠税收制度的时候了。

original: The highlands of Madagascar are divided between many petty princes, constantly bickering between themselves. Our first priority must be to unite these lands and make their petty rulers obey us, either through diplomacy and intermarriage or by use of force and conquest.
translation: 马达加斯加的高地被许多的小王子所分割统治，并不断产生着纷争。我们的首要任务就是统一这些土地，用外交或者联姻来让这些小领主们顺从，也不排除动用武力和直接征服。

original: Traditionally each village in our realm is protected by a powerful Sampy idol. With the creation of a greater Imerina Kingdom, however, this is an unnecessarily provincial custom. Let us instruct all chiefs to bring their Sampys to our capital. The twelve most powerful Sampy will be from now on protect the entire kingdom while all other Sampys must be destroyed!
translation: 传统意义上来说，我们境内的每一个村庄都收到了一个守护神的保佑，而随着一个更强大的梅里纳王国的诞生，着这一切都不在那么必要了。让我们通知那些酋长将他们的守护符带到我们的首都，十二个最强大的化身将从现在起保卫我们的国家，而剩下的那些等待他们的只有灭亡。

original: The central highlands of this island are ideal for wet rice cultivation and have been used for rice cultivation for longer than anyone can remember. We must continue to expand irrigation works to create rice paddies in all lands under our control, securing marshes and swamps and building terraces wherever possible.
translation: 岛上中部的高地是种植水稻的不二之选，这片土地的耕种历史比任何人的记忆都要久远。我们必须继续拓展这里的水利灌溉工程，在我们手头所有的土地上开垦稻田，保护好这些沼泽地，能够让我们尽可能多的修建梯田。

original: The highlands of Madagascar are in many ways a natural defense line against the people of the coasts but our country lack a true stronghold. By fortifying the central hills around our capital, digging hadivory moats and hadifetsy trenches and creating proper stone gates to block off invaders, we can properly utilize our natural defenses.
translation: 马达加斯加道上的这片高地从很多方面来考虑都是我们放着海岸人民的天然防线，但是我们还缺那么几个真正的碉堡。通过加强首都周围山头的防御，开掘平原上的护城河和壕沟，修建一座适宜的石门来挡住入侵者。利用好自然防御必然大有裨益。

original: For centuries the Andriana Noble class has served us well. As our realm grows larger and more modern, however, there are a number of ways in which these nobles could be made to serve us more efficiently. Let us divide the noble families into sub-castes with different tasks. We should also strengthen the authority of our fief holders and their ability to take up taxes on our behalf.
translation: 几个世纪以来，安德里安衲贵族们已经竭力为我们服务者。随着我们的领土的不断扩张和我们越发现代化的生活，现在有一些方法可以让这些贵族们为我们更好的服务。让我们将这些贵族们依据其不同的任务划分成不同的次姓。同样我们也得不断加强我们作为保护人的权威，同时这也代表着我们能够征税的能力。

original: One law must rule this land. Let us create a code of laws common to all people under our control. There must be harsh rules for those that would break the rules of society. Let anyone turn to our ruler for justice.
translation: 只有一种法律可以统治这片土地。让我们订立一个对我们治下所有人都有用的共同的法律。那些违反规则的人必定被严惩，让所有人都因我们的正义而选择我们。

original: A great country requires a great army. The traditional tax of labor that all our subjects must provide gives us an excellent recruiting ground for a new, larger and better equipped force. Armed with the best weapons our state can provide, the Foloalindahy, 'the 100 000', shall be our first defense as well as our fiercest offensive force.
translation: 一个伟大的国家不可能没有一种伟大的军队。每个人都必须上缴的人头税，为我们建立一支更大更强更精良的部队打下了一个良好的基础。装备着我国最好的武器。弗洛安丽娜拉西，“十万之师”，将是我们最尖锐的矛和最坚固的盾。

original: The western coast of Madagascar is covered in rainforests and a great number of small states with their independent chiefs. Whether tending their cattle or setting out to sail the open seas our people are used to their independence to such a great degree that any conqueror would find it hard, if not impossible to integrate this area into a larger realm. For every settlement there is a new group of warriors ready to fiercely guard what is theirs.
translation: 马达加斯加的西海岸被雨林所覆盖，而其中还有着数目众多的小小部落和他们的酋长。无论是养牛还是出海，我们的人民都习惯于自主和独立。在很大程度上，任何征服者都很难讲这片区域融入更大的疆土之中。对于任何的“解决方案”，这里都有一群年轻的战士准备他们狠狠地来个教训。

original: For too long our people have been divided into a myriad of small states ruled by petty local rulers. We must unite all the chiefdoms within our borders and force all chiefs to truly bend the knee to one person. We must become the indivisible many, Betsimisaraka, not just in name.
translation: 长久以来，我们的人民分散于无数小国之中。所以我们必须团结我们的疆域内的所有的酋长，亦或是强迫他们真正屈服于一个人。我们之间必须是密不可分的，“不可分离者”并不只是说说而已。

original: While our people are now united bending the knee to a common overlord has not come easy for them. By summoning all subordinate chiefs to the capital we can employ them as prestigious royal Ompanghalalan envoys. Some would call this a policy of hostage-taking, we simply see it as a way to remind our independent-minded people of their loyalties.
translation: 虽然我们的人民已经屈服于一个共主，但这件事缺陷的并不那么容易。通过召集所有的酋们来到都城，我们可以将他们聘为皇家信使。有的人会将之称之为“质子”，但是我们只把他看作是提醒我们所有有独立思想的人他们应有的忠诚。

original: While our coast has always attracted a fair number of pirates we are now seeing a growing number of European buccaneers looking to cut into the wealth of the Indian Ocean. These men are in need of safe ports and many have already begun to settle in our lands, intermarrying with the local population. We should welcome these newcomers and their ships, strengthening our own power on the open seas.
translation: 虽然我们的海岸已经吸引了相当数量的海盗，但我们现在发现越来越多的欧洲海盗正在寻求插手印度洋的财富。 这些人需要一个安全港口，而且已经有许多人已经开始在我们的土地上定居和我们的土著们交涉。 我们应该欢迎这些新来的人和他们的船，来显示我们在这片海域上的权力。

original: Our country remains divided into a great number of chiefdoms, with laws and customs differing from settlement to settlement. Let us institute a right for each of our subjects to turn to the highest justice instead of their local chiefs. This way we can guarantee the uniformity of law within our borders and more easily resolve conflicts between inhabitants of different cities.
translation: 我们的国家仍然还是处于一个因酋长大量存在而分裂的情况，法律和习俗在不同的情况下又表现的不同。让我们为每一个人都争取最终的正义而不是依靠当地的酋长，而这样我们就可以保证我们领土范围内的法律的统一，同时更容易解决不同的城市的居民之间的争端。

original: Our western ports are very attractive to the many European powers that now wish to control the Indian Ocean. We would greatly benefit from such powerful friends. Let us approach these seafaring powers and strike deals with them for the use of our coastline in their naval endeavors.
translation: 我们西边的港口对许多想控制印度洋的国家来说非常有吸引力。而我们也将十分收益于拥有这样强大的朋友。让我们不断接近这些海上的力量，和他们打交道，利用我们的海岸线来和他们周旋。

original: Our society cherishes skilled warriors above all else. While we have often acknowledged foreign overlords we have always earned our right to autonomy by spearheading the expansion of their realm. But great warriors can be found in many places. Rather than compete with surrounding tribes let us open our arms to skilled warriors wherever we find them. This way we will not have to fear fierce opponents such as the cannibalistic Zimba as they will rather be fighting for us than against us.
translation: 与其他相比，我们的社群更欣赏那些娴熟的勇士。尽管我们经常顺从那些海外霸主，但我们已经通过不断扩大领土来争取我们自己的自治权。但真正的勇士不论何时何地都会出现。与其和周边的部族之间进行争斗，不如敞开怀抱拥抱那些无论我们何时遇到的勇士们。在这种情况下，我们不用去害怕那些像食人辛巴那样凶猛的对手，因为这些勇士们只是愿意和我们搏斗而不是与我们为敌。

original: The Maravi Kalonga state has brought many new innovations to this region and we have often found ourselves in their shadow, politically as well as technologically. Adopting the most useful Maravi ideas would allow our state to grow and develop.
translation: 马拉维曾经给这片区域带来了许过革新，让我们无论是政治上还是科技上都受制于人。所以，努力吸收马拉维的理念中的精华会有助于我们国家的扩张和发展。

original: The Zambezi River is the artery of all trade in this region. On this river Ivory is brought from the north and west to the oceanic trade ports in the east. All local powers have a natural interest in controlling this trade but few have as natural an access to the river as we do. Let us do our utmost to shut any other states out from the Zambezi trade and force them to use us as middle men for any trade between the seaside cities and the African uplands.
translation: 赞比西河是这片地区的贸易主干道.源源不断地象牙从北方和西方通过赞比西流入东部的临海贸易点.流域两侧所有的贸易力量都想掌控这条贸易线路,但是他们都没像我们这样的地理优势.让我们竭尽全力把这片贸易区域的其他贸易力量驱除,迫使他们接受我们成为中非高地与临海城市之间的贸易中间人

original: Traditionally the lowest and perhaps most influential level of authority in our country has been the councils of village elders. This has perhaps worked well to preserve the old ways in local societies but if our state is to grow we need to empower the local chieftains instead, creating a class of people able to act in a quicker and more dynamic way while also being responsible directly to our ruler.
translation: 我们国家内的村内长者议会有着最为低级但又可能是最有影响力的传统意义上的权威。这种模式在保护地区传统方面十分有效，但是如果我们的国家要发展就必须要通过扶植一个行动迅速，充满活力且直接听命于我们的统治者的阶层来巩固我们地区酋长的权威

original: Water is essential to the growth of anything that lives. The Shrine of the spirit of the rainmaker Mbona is perhaps the most important spiritual center in our lands. Here the great spirit speaks to the living through his successive wives. Let us promote the cult of Mbona and ensure that the power of appointment of new spouses for the spirit lies with our ruler.
translation: 水是万物的生命之源。造雨者博纳的神庙可能是我们土地上最为重要宗教中心，在这里伟大的灵魂通过他的继任妻子与世人对话。所以，让我们大力推崇博纳教派，并且确保我们的统治者牢牢掌握任命博纳神新任妻子的权利吧。

original: The Shire river valley is the source of much of our people's wealth. Here the precious Machila cloth is produced and from this region we can export salt and iron. These commodities can be put to good use to tie less fortunate petty rulers closer to us. Once they rely on us for these vital products we can start to draw them closer into our circle of underlings.
translation: 希雷河谷是我们大部分国民的财富源泉。这里不仅生产珍贵的马休拉服饰，而且还是我们重要的盐和铁的出口地。我们可以好好利用这些商品来引诱那些缺钱的统治者向我们靠拢。一旦他们在这些重要战略物资上开始依赖我们我们就可以开始逐步将他们纳入我们的势力范围。

original: The lands we conquer must be governed. While it may be necessary to preserve the authority of local rulers initially we need to ensure that we rely on people we can trust. Whenever we are able to do so we ought to promote local representatives from our own junior lineages rather than local dynasties.
translation: 我们所征服的地盘必须要好好统治。所以扶植一个值得我们信赖的地方领袖来管理是很有必要的。但是请记住，无论我们何时这样做，我们都应该安插我们的族人来掌权，而不是那些地方势力。

original: Our heartland's position away from the coast, with a wide belt of Savannah and only the Kongo river to help with transportation makes it hard for an invader to establish proper supply lines. Even a more technologically advanced invader should think twice before invading our country.
translation: 我们国家的中心地带远离海岸线，中间隔着一片一望无际的大草原，而在这片草原中只有一条刚果河来辅助运输补给。这个天然的地理屏障给每一个尝试建立补给线的入侵者造成了巨大困难。所以甚至连那些科技领先的势力，在入侵我们国家前也要慎重考虑。

original: The depredations of the great elephant herds against our lands cannot be ignored. Battles against them give our youth an excellent occasion to prove their mettle.
translation: 我们不能无视在我们土地上偷猎大象的行为。我们的青年将在与那些偷猎者的战斗中证明自己的勇气。

original: To ensure that power remains in the hand of the aristocracy, we should strive to appoint the best and brightest of our nobles to the positions they are most suited for, rather than favoring family ties.
translation: 为了保证贵族掌权，对于重要职位，我们应该根据贵族的能力来任命，而不是根据他们的家世。

original: The passage of boys into manhood is an event to be marked with solemn ceremonies. Through these rites anyone can become true members of the tribe and bolster our numbers.
translation: 男孩的成人仪式需要一个庄重的庆典来铭记。只用通过这个仪式的人才能正式成为我们部落的一员。

original: In the past various groups have left these lands and created kingdoms in other parts of Africa. By sending forth not only armies, but settlers to live in the conquered land, we can greatly empower our nation.
translation: 在过去，许多人离开了这片土地在非洲的其他角落建立了王国。在派出军队扩张的同时，也要移民到我们所征服的地方。通过这种手段我们就能大大加强我们的国家力量。

original: No man can rule alone. Better to have subordinate chiefs under our paramount rulership to handle local matters, and let them in turn pay homage to us.
translation: 每人可以仅凭自己来统治。我们最好在我们至高无上的领导权下给予附属国领袖以处理地方事务的权力，并以此换取他们的忠心。

original: As far as they are from the growing global trade networks there have always been those willing to pay us for the great tusks of the elephants we slay. We should encourage this commerce and regulate it to our benefit.
translation: 从我们所宰杀的大象上割下的象牙畅销各个国际贸易网点。我们应该鼓励并好好管理这项生意来让我们从中受益。
