original: At the northern end of Lake Malawi our state is at a crossroads of various migrating groups. Large numbers of foreign clans are settling or passing through our lands, often bringing new materials and customs with them. While the arrival of groups such as the Kyungu or Mwaulambyas has not been without friction integrating them can certainly be to our benefit.
translation: 我们国家在马拉维湖北部的尽头是许多移民部族经过的十字路口，许多外国部落或途经这里，或在这定居，每次他们的到来都携带着新的物件和新的习俗。尽管有些团体像乌干达和瓦兰比亚的部族间会有摩擦，将他们融入我们的国家肯定会让我们受益。

original: Once the people here worshipped divine snakes. Now that they have the Kyungus to lead them they are instead honoring our ancestors. As their living representative the King is a god among men and the health of our kingdom depend upon him. We must therefore protect and empower him as much as we can, and in case of the unthinkable event of him catching any form of illness we must be ready to smother him so that another Kyungu can take his place.
translation: 这里的人们曾经信仰神圣的大蛇。现在乌干达人带领着他们祭奠先祖。国王作为先祖们的化身已经被人们神化，他的健康与国家的安康息息相关。我们必须经可能的保护并巩固他的权力。当意料之外的事情发生而让国王染上任何形式的疾病时，我们也要做好准备去抹杀掉他好让另外一个乌干达人来替代。

original: While our people have come to increasingly embrace the ancestor cult of our ruling family we need greater control over how and when they worship. Let us institute an office responsible of our main shrine that the caretakers of all other shrines must answer to. Through regularized rituals all priests and chiefs must come to our capital to profess their loyalty to their rulers.
translation: 现在越来越多的人开始接受我们祭奠先祖的宗教仪式了，我们必须加强控制祭奠先祖的方式和时间的权力。让我们来设置一个宗教管理司来负责我们主要的神庙和神庙的神职人员。通过这种规范化祭奠仪式，所有的宗教人员和地方首领就必须到我们首都来向我们首领公开效忠。

original: While people and goods have always moved between the Luba region of Central Africa and the coastal region of East Africa this has mostly been direct to the kingdoms of the south, with the Zambezi as the main node of the trade network. Lately, however, the Yao peoples have become increasingly involved in moving goods between our lands and the coast and an increasing number of our own merchants are now bringing ivory, slaves, cloth, beads and mphande shells between the coast and the Kongo River basin. Let us embrace this new development and seize our place as the new entrepôt of East Africa.
translation: 大量在中非卢巴和东非海岸地区之间的人员和货物都以赞比西河做为主贸易网络流向了非洲南部的王国。但是最近雅欧人也开始愈加涉足从我们与海岸边的货物运输事业中。我国也有越来越多的商人从海河和刚果河流域进口象牙，奴隶，服饰，贝壳。让我们大力发展新的贸易设施，成为东非洲贸易的中转站。

original: Break the power of the Makambala

The Makambala are the priest administrators that help run our kingdom. They assist the heir that succeeds and they ensure that no pretenders to the throne remain. Over time their influence and lust for power has grown however. It is time we curb their power and remove their right to kill royal princes or kings. Only when the power is firmly in the hands of our Kyungu will our country be able to truly grow and prosper.
translation: 玛卡玛巴拉是辅助国家运转的神职人员管理机构。他们帮助我们的继承人顺利完成权利交接，并且清除其他的皇位竞争者。但是他们的影响力和对权力的欲望随时间流逝而越来越强。为了防止养虎为患，我们必须限制他们的权力，剥夺他们对皇子和国王的生杀权。只有这样，我们的国王才能牢牢掌握住权力，国家才能繁荣昌盛。

original: A growing number of Swahili Merchants have begun to settle in our lands as a result of the growing overland trade between our lands and the coastal cities. The Swahili have much longer experience of being part of the Indian Ocean Trade network and we could well stand to benefit from their experience. We should both allow and encourage this trend as a way to develop our trade network, regardless of any ill will from our own merchant community.
translation: 越来越多斯瓦西里商人在我们的土地上定居，让我们和海岸城市间的贸易愈加繁荣。斯瓦西里人对于印度洋贸易网络比我们更有经验，我们能从他们的贸易经验中受益。我们应该大加提倡这股移民风来帮助建设我们的贸易网络，忽略其给本地商人带来冲击的负面影响。

original: According to tradition our founder went on a great journey of enlightenment to lands to the west before uniting our people. We shall strive to learn from his example and study the world around us so that we may learn how to best make use of it.
translation: 根据传统,建立我们国家的祖先在团结我们的人民之前都踏上了往西去的启蒙之路。我们必须从中汲取经验，好好观察这个世界，并学会因地制宜，利用周边的的资源。

original: Woot, who gave the animals their names, is our distant ancestor and we are his children. We owe it to him to be steward of the lands and take good care of his legacy.
translation: 乌特是我们的先祖，他曾经给动物命名。他留给我们的遗产-------这片土地，将由我们代他掌管，并用心维护。

original: Our artisans are renowned far and wide, and it is said that they cannot leave a surface undecorated. Let us make the most of this reputation and spread their work wherever we go.
translation: 我们的艺术家们声名远扬。据说在他们眼前不能放任任何一片未经装饰的土地。让我们好好珍惜这份名声，并在我们随到之处传播他们的著作。

original: Tradition recalls that our founder usurped the power of a local chieftain to begin building his power. Like him, we should be shrewd, and willing to use indirect means to achieve our goals.
translation: 根据历史，我们的国家的创始人建立王国之路始于篡夺一名地方酋长的权力。向他一样，我们也要精明点，要善于采用间接手段来实现我们的目的。

original: The masks associated with our masquerades often represent the Ngesh spirits of the lands that surround us. In channeling them, we channel their aggressiveness and unpredictability, invaluable tools in warfare.
translation: 我们在假面舞会上戴的面具通常代表着在这片土地上环绕我们周围的尼格仕灵魂。每当战争来临，我们通过面具与灵魂沟通，将灵魂身上的野性，不确定性以面具为载体散播于战场各处。

original: When a new king is anointed, court sculptors create a single statue of him, his Ndop. Changed constantly to reflect the King's life, it will hold his life force in death. In life, it can stand in for him, and serve as a symbol of his power both spiritual and temporal.
translation: 每当一个国王登基时，雕刻工就会为他制作一个雕像。这个雕像常不停被修葺来映射国王的生活，当国王死去时，她将是国王生前权力的化身。而在国王活着的时候，雕像作为国王的替身，在精神上和形式上代表着国王权力。

original: A good nobility is a preoccupied nobility. There are so many courtly titles in our realms that some say half of our men have one. Let us make sure the members of our court spend more time competing with one another for attention and visibility, rather than threatening our rule.
translation: 一个好的贵族从来不会闲着。我们国家有太多人有头衔了，据说有一半的成年男性有头衔。让我们确保我们宫廷内的成员们花更多的精力在相互比较，争出风头上，而不是暗中觊觎我们的统治。

original: Let us establish a noble court to assist the king in bringing law and order to the land, creating a more stable government for his successors.
translation: 建立一个贵族议会来协助国王在国内上推行法律和行政法规，为国王的继承人建立一个稳定的政府。

original: When a king dies, the village from which he exercised his kingship should become a shrine to his now-divine existence. In that way, we ensure that proper respect for royalty can be maintained.
translation: 国王驾崩时，他的处理国事的宅第将成为一个纪念他神格的庙宇。通过这样，我们能确保对皇权的尊重能够延续。

original: In creating a secret society spread across our lands to maintain and preserve our cultural tradition, we empower our nation to better survive the tides of time and fortune.
translation: 我们通过在国内建立一个秘密组织来维持和保护我们的文化传统，并以此来帮助我们国家经受住时间的考验

original: Free-verse poetry, chanted and recited, can be used to evoke a wide array of feeling. Before a battle, it can inspire courage in our warriors, and for this purpose we should always make use of it in times of warfare.
translation: 不受格律束缚的诗歌，圣歌，朗诵文都能激起大范围的共鸣。在战斗之前，它能够提升我们士气。出于这个目的，我们应该在战争中好好利用它。

original: The Bambudye have mastered the use of Lukasa boards of colored beads. By using specific sets of colors, forms and ideograms, they can facilitate memorization of information, and make it far easier for us to understand the lay of our land and its history
translation: 邦布耶人掌握了卢卡萨板上彩色珠的使用方法。通过使用特定组合的颜色，款式和符号来帮助记录信息，并让我们更方便去掌握我们土地的位置和历史。

original: Our country was founded by the great hero Mbidi Kiluwe, a hunter and a blacksmith. Let us ensure that his tales are never forgotten and that our people are always reminded of the importance of those professions in our lands.
translation: 伟大英雄比迪基鲁维的职业是猎人和铁匠，但他同时也是我们国家的建立者。确保他的传说永不会被遗忘，并铭记猎人和铁匠对我们国家的重要性。

original: As the greatest kingdom of our region, lesser kings look up to us, and wish to learn from us. Many petty dynasties abroad even claim our lands as their own origin. This diplomatic influence can be just as potent a tool as our weapons.
translation: 作为这片地区最伟大的国家，居然很少国王尊重我们，并虚心向我们学习。在国外，许多可怜的王朝甚至宣称我们的土地属于他们。这些外交威望带来的影响就和我们手中的武器一样有影响力。

original: Tradition dictate that no son should turn on his father and no nephew on his uncle. By incorporating both conquered and joining chieftains into the royal family as junior members, we strengthen the ties of allegiance between us and our newly conquered lands.
translation: 传统要求儿子不能背叛父亲，侄子不能反叛叔叔。通过将被征服地区的领袖合并进我们的皇室家庭，我们可以提高被刚征服地区人民对我们的忠诚度。

original: Though our King's body may die, the King himself can never die. Rather, the incumbent become his predecessor, taking on name, ties of kinship, and personality. In that way, we ensure the eternal continuance of our kingdom.
translation: 尽管我们国王的肉身可能会故去，国王本身却永生不死。或者说，现任国王将化身为先王，获得他的名字、他的亲属关系以及他的人格。通过这种方法，我们确保王国的永续。

original: Not all parts of the realms are as happy to pay tribute as others. In order to deal with this fact we should establish an order of officials whose role it is to wander the realm with military forces ensuring compliance with tribute.
translation: 并非国内的所有地区都乐意同其他人一样朝贡。为了处理这一问题，我们应该组织一批官员，率领军队在国内巡游以确保朝贡的顺利。

original: Our capital and our cities are built on the model of the camps of army night camps. They have wings, vanguards and fronts. In ensuring that military thinking is everywhere in our daily life, we improve our readiness for warfare.
translation: 我们的首都及城市都是以军队夜宿营地为标准建造的。他们都有着两翼、先锋和前军。这种军事化的思维充斥我们的日常生活，更好地确保了我们随时都准备着应付战争。

original: When our king sends an army out to war, he also sends a general to displace his enemies, replacing them with a new subservient realm of Lunda subjects.
translation: 当我们的国王将一支军队派去打仗时，他同样会派遣一名将军去取代敌人，将其变为屈从于隆达的一个新的从属国。

original: The Queen-Mother, the Rukonkesh, should be in charge of managing local affairs of the court so that the ruler, the Mwant Yav, can focus on more important tasks.
translation: 王太后，亦即鲁孔开什应该负责管理宫廷内的地方事务。这样一来，统治者，亦即姆万特·雅乌将可以专注于更为重要的事情。

original: The title of our ruler, the Mwant Yav, literally translate as 'Lord of the Vipers', embodying that he stands for peace and war, for prosperity as well as destruction. He is a powerful friend to those who will stand on his side - and a deadly enemy to those who would oppose him.
translation: 我们统治者的头衔，亦即姆万特·雅乌，按字面翻译即为“蝰蛇之主”，象征着他代表了和平与战争，繁荣与毁灭。对于那些与他并肩作战的人而言，他是个强大的朋友；但对那些反对他的人而言，他是个致命的敌人。

original: With the fall of Great Zimbabwe many traditions and customs have been lost. The Mutapa has built a new kind of state, independent of the age old legacy of these lands. Our people on the other hand have chosen to cling to old traditions, we still construct stone buildings that leave outsiders in awe and we still cherish that which once was.
translation: 随着大津巴布韦的衰亡，许多传统和风俗都已遗失。姆塔巴建立了一种独立于这片土地的古老遗产之外的、新式的政体；而相对的是，我们的人民选择了坚持传统，我们依旧建造令外来者敬畏的石制建筑，我们也依旧珍惜曾经的一切。

original: Agriculture and trade bring us what we need for our day-to-day living but the main export of our country remains the abundant gold which can be found all over the Zimbabwe plateau. While such riches are a blessing to our state this metal can also be quite dangerous unless it is kept under firm control. Our state must tightly regulate all trade and ownership of Gold in order to avoid the destructive influences of fortune seekers or greedy middle men.
translation: 农业和贸易给我妈带来了日常生活所需的东西，但我们国家赖以出口的主要商品还是丰饶的黄金——津巴布韦高原上随处可见。虽说这等财富是我们国家的福气，但若我们不加以强力控制的话，这种金属也会变得相当危险。我们的国家必须牢牢地控制住所有有关黄金的贸易和贮藏，以免招致淘金者或贪婪的中间商们带来的破坏性的影响。

original: A powerful faction has begun to grow in our lands, showing a strong loyalty to their leader and dissatisfaction with their lot in life in the Zimbabwe plateau. The Rozwi, or 'destroyers', are disciplined fighters ready to unify the Shona peoples and create a new type of state. If we do not embrace them we may well find ourselves overrun against our will.
translation: 一个强大的派系正在我们的土地上扩张，其成员向领袖忠心耿耿，而且对自身在津巴布韦高原上拥有的一切心怀不满。罗兹维，亦即“破坏者”，他们是纪律严明的战士，随时准备着去统一绍纳人并创建一个新型的国家。如果我们不接受他们，我们很可能会发现我们违背了自己的志愿。

original: The Mutapa entrusted each subordinate chief to bring his taxes to their capital. We cannot imagine a more inefficient custom. Let us instead create a consistent system of hierarchical tax collection where each person will pass the riches on upwards towards the state coffers in an organized and efficient way. The army must also at times work as an arm of the royal bureaucracy to ensure that none of our subjects forget what we are owed.
translation: 姆塔巴委托属下的每个酋长将其税金带至首都。我们想不出比这更没效率的习俗了。我们应当创造一种协调的等级制课税系统，每个人将以一种井井有条且富有效率的方法将钱财上缴至国库。军队也必须偶尔以王室官员爪牙的身份效力，以确保我们的子民不会忘记欠我们的东西。

original: Discipline, preparation and training are what win battles. With this in mind our commanders have successfully begun to pioneer elaborate new tactics and a new army organization. Let us make good use of these innovations by dividing our warriors into regiments and then let them train regularly with their bows, assegais, daggers and axes. Practice will also allow them to fight in formation without fear, defeating much more numerous enemies.
translation: 纪律，战备和训练是赢得战争的要素。将这些铭记在心，我们的指挥官们已经成功地开始倡导精心设计的新战术，以及新的军队体制。我们要好好利用这些革新，将我们的战士分配至军团中，定期训练他们使用弓箭、标枪、匕首和斧头的能力。练习也同样能使他们英勇无畏地结阵战斗，打败更多的敌人。

original: Our superstitious neighbors believe they are protected by natural deities or their own ancestors. We have on the other hand seen the greatness of Mwari, the one god who created the world from nothing. As he speaks the mountains tremble and our ruler is his oracle. Let us spread the cult of Mwari among all peoples so that all may see the divine authority of our ruler.
translation: 我们迷信的邻居相信他们被自然神灵或他们自己的祖先所保护。而我们则看到了姆瓦里的伟大，由虚无中创造了世界的唯一神。当他开口说话，群山都会颤抖。我们的统治者则是能够聆听他神谕的人。我们要向所有人传播姆瓦里的信仰，这样一来所有人都将见识到我们统治者的神圣权威。

original: The growing intracontinental trade, with goods flowing back and forth from the central parts of the Kongo river basin to the trade cities of Eastern Africa, the Great Lakes and the Zimbabwe highlands has greatly enriched the Vashambadzi, our native merchant community. Let us support this group over all others by baring Swahili traders as well as European fortune seekers from trading within our borders.
translation: 内陆贸易日益增长，货物来回流动于刚果河流域中部至东非、大湖地区和津巴布韦高地的贸易城市之间，这使得博商巴吉，即我们的本土商人群体们大发横财。我们应将斯瓦希里商人和欧洲的淘金者们剥除出我们国内的贸易，以此来支援博商巴吉。

original: Malwa was the seat of more than one great Rajput kingdom of old and even under Muslim rule the Rajputs remain very influential as landholders and nobles. Instead of fighting them for authority we should empower the Rajput clans within our lands and encourage Purbia soldiers to take service in our armies. Rajputs are excellent warriors and cooperation could bring great things to both them and us.
translation: 马尔瓦是好几个伟大且古老的拉杰普特王国的所在地，即使是在穆斯林的统治之下，拉杰普特人依旧以地主和贵族的身份保持着巨大的影响力。我们不应与他们争夺权力，而应授予我们境内的拉杰普特部族以权力，并鼓励富卢毗耶武士在我们的军中效力。拉杰普特人是杰出的武士，与他们的合作能给我们双方都带来巨大的好处。
摩腊婆艺术及建筑流派

original: A great number of our nobles have, however, begun to commission the local Indian artisans, blending Indian and Persian fashions. Rather than try to emulate Samarkand, Shiraz or Delhi we should favor this new Indo-Muslim style by employing the best minds, voices and hands of both the Persianate and Indian worlds. Let us commission Cook Books, Kalpa Sutras and great secular pieces of architecture and enjoy the fruits of Malvi painters and singers and let others try to conserve the culture of our ancestors.
translation: 许多贵族都开始雇用本地的印度工匠，混合使用印度和波斯的风尚。相较于模仿撒马尔罕、设拉子及德里的风韵，我们更应雇用波斯和印度最优秀的人才，以此来支持这种全新的印度-穆斯林混搭风。我们应当委任匠人们创作迷津书、劫波契经及宏伟的世俗建筑，享受摩腊婆的画家与歌者们创作的果实，让其他人去守着我们祖先的文化吧。
保护德里-苏拉特贸易线

original: The ports of Gujarat are among the largest in the world and large quantities of Northern Indian goods pass through our lands to reach them. Thousands of pilgrims also enter our lands every year headed for the Arabian Sea and the Holy Cities of Mecca and Medina. As rulers of the main trade route between the sea and the rich northern Indian plains it is our duty to defend all traders as well as pilgrims.
translation: 古吉拉特的港口足以跻身世界前列，大量产自印度北部的货物都经由我们的地盘到达那里。每年，成千上万的朝圣者也会进入我们的国土，向着阿拉伯海及圣城麦加和麦地那进发。作为海洋和富饶的北印度平原间主要贸易路线的统治者，保护所有的贸易商及朝圣者是我们的职责。

original: While rich our heartland in the Malwa plateau is also open to attacks from any direction. We must guard our cities with great citadels, built to withstand any attacker and to control the trade and pilgrimage routes that crisscross our country. Let us make use of all the wealth we possess to make the great citadel of Mandu the model for all to follow. Beautiful and impregnable.
translation: 我们位于马尔瓦高原的心脏地带很富饶，但也直面着来自任何方向的进攻。我们必须构筑宏伟的堡垒来拱卫我们的城市，抵挡所有进攻者并控制国内交织的贸易及朝圣路线。我们要动用我们掌控的所有财富，让曼杜的堡垒成为值得效仿的模范，美丽而固若金汤。

original: Unlike the surrounding regions the soil and climate of the Malwa plateau lends itself very well to both agricultural production and the growing of cash crops such as Sugar, Indigo or Opium. Our position on the route between the Indo-Gangetic plain and the sea also makes export of the goods we produce very efficient.
translation: 与周边地区不同，马尔瓦高原的土壤和气候得天独厚，及其适合农业生产，以及种植如蔗糖、靛蓝及鸦片等经济作物。我们这位于中央平原与海洋之间的地理位置也使得货物出口非常高效。

original: Our predecessors wisely broke the ties with the weak Sultans of Delhi after Timur sacked their capital in 1398. Malwa now stands independent but our close ties with the rest of the Persianate world have also been greatly weakened. If our state is to grow we must draw from local talents instead. Jain bankers and Merchants have run the economy of the Malwa plateau long before we came here and by allying these powerful groups our state can shed the last dependence on those that would control us.
translation: 自从帖木儿于1398年洗劫了德里首都之后，我们的前人非常明智地切断了同虚弱的德里苏丹的联系。现今马尔瓦已经独立，但我们同波斯世界其他部分的紧密联系也被极大地削弱了。如果我们的国家想要发展，我们必须转而任用本地的人才。早在我们来到这里之前，耆那教的银行家和商人已经在掌控马尔瓦高原的经济了。通过与这些势力庞大的团体结盟，我们的国家能够摆脱对那些可能控制我们的势力的最后一丝依赖。

original: Highly sought after for both its medicinal and recreational purposes Opium is one of the most famous exports of the Malwa plateau. Due to the growing presence of foreign traders in Western India we have noticed a marked increase in demand lately. Poppy farmers are already trying to increase their production, we would be wise to ease up on trading regulations to allow them to spread their product more efficiently.
translation: 在药用和消遣方面都有着极大需求量的鸦片是马尔瓦高原最出名的出产之一。由于外国商人在西印度的活动越来越频繁，我们已经注意到鸦片的需求量近来显著提升。罂粟农已经开始尝试增加产量，一个较为明智的选择是放松对贸易的限制，让他们的产品传播更有效率。

original: Pattani is famous for its peppers and tropical woods. By continuing to develop this production we can gradually become a significant force in the Asian market and rival Aceh, Sunda and Malacca.
translation: 北大年以其盛产胡椒和热带木材而闻名。通过持续开发这类生产闻名最终能成为亚洲地区一个不容忽视的势力，并同亚齐、巽他及马六甲相匹敌。

original: Chinese trade restrictions hamper sea trade throughout South-East Asia. The merchants of Pattani have become skilled in bypassing these restrictions, bringing the wealth of China to our Sultanate's ports.
translation: 中国的贸易禁令束缚了东南亚的海上贸易。北大年的商人们已经熟于钻空子绕过这些禁令，将中国的财富带回我们苏丹国的港口。

original: In collusion with Portuguese and Chinese merchants, we can create a network of smugglers that could be used to spy on and influence rival nations.
translation: 通过勾结葡萄牙和中国的商人，我们可以构建一个走私者的网络，以此来监视和影响我们的宿敌国家。

original: Bands of disaffected pirates have begun settling in Pattani. Let us use their knowledge and experience to disrupt sea trade and enrich our nation.
translation: 由心生不满的海盗们组成的团伙已经开始在北大年落草了。我们应利用他们的知识和经验来破坏海上贸易，并为我们的国家从中牟利。

original: Our state is a vital link in trade routes connecting China, Siam, and India. Let us promote our role as an Entrepôt and encourage merchants from China sell their goods in Pattani, where we can store them until they are sold to merchants heading west.
translation: 我们的国家是连接中国、暹罗和印度的一个至关重要的节点。我们应提升我们作为转口港的地位，并鼓励中国的商人们在北大年贩卖货物，这样一来我们就能将其储存起来并卖给从事西方贸易的商人。

original: The security of our ports is what makes Pattani an attractive place to live and trade. Let us assure every man or woman that their property is secure from theft or seizure.
translation: 我们港口的安全性使得北大年作为一个吸引人的地方以存在并参与到贸易中。我们应向每个男人和女人保证他们的财产十分安全，不会被窃取，也不会被夺取。

original: A healthy capital is vital to our country. Let us build a new canal network to provide fresh water throughout our larger cities. This will secure the future growth of our cities and of our nation.
translation: 一个健康的首都对我们的国家而言是至关重要的。我们应修建一个新的水道网络向我们的城市提供清洁的水源。这能够保障我们的城市和国家未来的发展。

original: The invigorating effects of coffee have long been known by our people as the plant grows wild in our lands. While we cannot claim to produce as much of the valued beans as some of our neighbors the name of our kingdom is now being spread across the globe wherever the Kaffan drink is adopted and nowhere is the variety of beans as great as here.
translation: 由于咖啡植株在我国的土地上四处疯长，我国的人们早早地认知到了咖啡的提神功效。虽然我们无法像我们的邻国那样大量生产这种备受珍重的豆子，我们王国的名字还是传遍了全球每一处接纳了咖法饮料的地方，况且没有哪里拥有和我们这一样多的咖啡豆品种。

original: Our modern Kingdom was founded when the Minjo clan usurped power from the Mato Dynasty. While strangers from a northern land the Minjo managed to take control peacefully from the kings of old and to this day we revere this development and the royal bracelet and ring that they brought with them. All the clans among the Kaffan people must stand united if we are to thrive.
translation: 我们现在的王国是在敏久部族从麻透王朝那里夺取权力后建立的。尽管是一个来自北方的异邦人，敏久还是成功地自之前的国王那里和平地取过了权力。直至今日，我们依然崇敬着他的这一成就以及王权手镯和戒指。如果我们想要繁荣昌盛，所有的卡法人部族都必须团结在一起。

original: The Kaffan highlands are among the most fertile in southern Ethiopia. While contact with the greater Nile and Indian Ocean trading spheres remains something of an ordeal the three harvests per year that the rich earths of Kaffa can ensure our self-sufficiency.
translation: 咖法高地堪称埃塞俄比亚南方最为肥沃的土地。尽管连接了泛尼罗河流域和印度洋，区域贸易还是被当做苦差，毕竟卡法高地肥沃的土地使得一年三熟的农作物完全可以自给自足。

original: Kaffa's stability rests on the strength of our clans and our ability to integrate new clans. The outside world is one of turmoil and conflict and over time more and more Christian clans have come to enjoy our protection. By allowing the major clans such as the Bosho, Hindata, Koijo or Gurabo to keep kings subservient to ours we can ensure that each one of them will work for the betterment of our kingdom.
translation: 咖法的稳定立足于我们部族的力量及整合新部族的能力。外部世界充满了混乱与冲突，随着时间的推移越来越多的基督教部族开始前来接受我们的庇护。允许诸如博绍、辛达塔、科依乔或著拉博等主要部族的首领保留国王的称号向我们臣服，我们能够确保他们会为改善我们的王国而效力。

original: Strengthen Ties With the Ethiopian Church
translation: 同埃塞俄比亚的教会加强联系

original: Our Christianity is one of the frontiers. Very few monasteries exist among these mountains and few among the people of Kaffa have themselves met a Christian missionary. Nevertheless the Christian rite and their traditions are what cements the power of our monarchy. We should strive to strengthen our ties with the Christian peoples to our north and invite them to found monasteries in our lands. Christian rituals should be made an inherent part of every royal ceremony.
translation: 我们的基督教义是我们在此的前沿阵地之一。在卡法，我们只有少数的修道院坐落在山地，只有少数卡法人见过传教士。然而，基督教的仪式和传统是巩固我们君主政治的有力手段。我们必须加强与北方基督徒的联系，邀请他们在我们的土地上建立修道院。基督教的仪式应当在所有皇家仪式上成为固有的一部分。

original: We have built a kingdom of many peoples and our ruler is the master of many Kings. The time has come to use the organization built by our ancestors to expand and unify all minor kings under the rule of our Atio, the King of Kings.
translation: 我们曾经建立过一个臣民众多的国家，我们的王是诸王的领袖。现在，是时候让我们拾起先人的遗产，拓展我们的势力，让那些次等的王们听命于我们的皇帝，这位万王之王了。

original: Coffee, Gold, Slaves and Cotton are valuable goods but the Kaffan plateau lies somewhat isolated from the major trade routes of Eastern Africa. If we cannot make traders come to us we must take our goods to them. Through military expansion and new laws directed at facilitating the flow of goods we can take our rightful place among the trading nations of the region.
translation: 咖啡，金子，奴隶和棉花是我们重要的货物，但是咖法高原有些远离东非的主要贸易路线。如果我们不能让商人来找我们，我们就得主动把货物给他们。通过军事扩张和通过鼓励商品流动的法律，我们能够在这些商业国家中占据一席之地。

original: Following the fourth crusade large parts of formerly Byzantine possessions fell into the hands of Latin Franks and Italians. Ever since the Ionian Islands have been ruled by Neapolitan and Venetian families. Over time Italian customs and language has become more and more ingrained with our native ones and under foreign rule we have managed to steer clear of the Turkish expansionism on the Greek Mainland.
translation: 在第四次十字军东征后，拜占庭帝国的财产落到了拉丁-法兰克人和意大利人的手里。从那以后，爱奥尼亚群岛一直被那不勒斯和威尼斯人统治。随着时间流逝，意大利人同我们的传统和语言在这里一并变得根深蒂固；我们已经能够摆脱土耳其在希腊本土的扩张主义影响了。

original: In constructing the Angelokastro, or Castle of the Angels, the Byzantines realized the importance of fortifying these islands. The Frank and Italians who came after them have continued to construct a great number of castles and forts here and with so many greedy eyes resting on our possessions we would do well to continue that tradition. Let us build a strong system of forts and fortified ports so that we can use the environment of these beautiful yet rugged islands to our advantage. Italian, Turk or Greek, anyone wishing to conquer what is ours should know that there is a high price to be paid.
translation: 在建造安盖洛卡斯特罗或天使城堡时，拜占庭人意识到强化这些岛屿的防御的重要性。 在此之后统治这里的法兰克人和意大利人继续在这里兴建了大量的城堡和堡垒。考虑到有那么多人对我们的财富垂涎欲滴，我们必须继承修建防御工事这一传统。让我们构建一个强大的，由堡垒和强固港口构成的防御体系，这样我们就能把这美丽而坚固的群岛变成我们的军事优势。不论是意大利人，土耳其人还是希腊人，任何想要侵略我们的领土的人必然要为此付出惨重的代价。

original: Our beautiful islands are ideally situated at the crossing between Greece and Italy and at the mouth of the Adriatic. They are also blessed with a thriving local economy built on olives, raisins and fish. Nonetheless we have a significant population shortage, especially outside the major islands of Corfu, Zakynthos and Kefalonia. Let us send word to the people of the mainland, Italian as well as Greek, that we welcome skilled newcomers and that there are fortunes to be made in these fair lands.
translation: 我们美丽的群岛理想地坐落于希腊和意大利之间，正在亚得里亚海的出海口。上天赐予了这里繁荣的，仰赖于橄榄，葡萄干和鱼的繁荣经济。然而，我们在这里缺少人口是个严重的问题，特别是在远离主要岛屿的科孚岛、扎金索斯岛和凯法利尼亚岛。让我们告诉居住在本土，意大利和希腊的人们，我们有多么欢迎那些熟练掌握技术的新移民在这片美丽的大陆上创造财富吧。

original: Due to their unique position our islands act as a door to the rich trading cities of the Adriatic in general and to the Venetian merchants in particular. Many influential Venetian families have a long-standing representation here due to the precious Currants and Olives we produce but it is our strategic position that will allow us to truly profit from their presence. Tolls and tariffs will ensure that we are profiting as well as we can from the rich ships that constantly pass through our waters.
translation: 由于我们群岛处在亚得里亚海繁荣的贸易城市的出海口——特别是维也纳商人进出亚得里亚海的必经之地——的得天独厚的地理位置，许多有影响力的威尼斯家族凭借着我们生产的葡萄酒和橄榄在这里有持久的影响力。然而，实际上是这一群岛的战略地位才能使我们能从他们的存在中获利。通行费和灌水能保证我们从这些频繁通过我们水域的，装载着财富的船只中获利。

original: We are positioned to control the Adriatic but in order to do so we must compete with the major naval powers of the Mediterranean. There is no lack for experienced sailors or captains on our islands but the sheer number of galleys others can bring against us is daunting. Let us create an arsenal along the lines of the Arsenale Nuovo in Venice to mass produce warships. Only this way will we be able to create a war fleet capable of defending our homes.
translation: 我们迟早要控制亚得里亚海。但是为了达成这个目标，我们必须同地中海的首要海军力量竞争。我们的群岛上并不缺乏有经验的水手和船长，但是其他国家可以用巨量的大帆船压制我们。让我们仿照威尼斯的新军械库建造兵工厂并通过它生产大量战舰，只有这样我们才能建造一直足以保卫我们我们家园的舰队。

original: Ionian sailors have always frequented ports from the Black Sea to the Levant and we have long profited from our position between east and west. With the development of our navy and the growth of our economy, however, local merchants have increasingly come to organize themselves in joint companies to invest in these trading ventures. Some families now control hundreds of small ships that regularly call the ports of Rumelia and Anatolia, Crete, Cyprus, Syria, Egypt and the many trading ports of the Italian Peninsula. We must do what we can to further encourage these entrepreneurs by abolishing hindering rules, regulations and tariffs and accommodating their trade.
translation: 爱奥尼亚的水手常常走黑海到黎凡特的航线，我们因此长期从我国的西部和东部的航线中获利。随着我们的海军实力增长和经济的发展，我们的商人逐渐组织起股份公司，并开始投资这些贸易线路。有些家族现在已经掌握了上百艘小型船只，可以周期性地在鲁米利亚和安纳托利亚、克里特、塞浦路斯、叙利埃及和意大利半岛的众多贸易港口停靠并贸易。我们要尽我们所能，通过废止组织他们贸易的规则、规章和关税鼓励这些企业家们的贸易，并令我们适应他们的贸易。

original: While some would say that the Ionian Islands are too influenced by the various foreigners that have ruled them over the centuries they are also one of the longest standing independent Greek states in existence. Let us take up the torch as the leading Greek polity and establish a modern university opened to all Greek scholars. Under our protection the great minds of the Greek nation will instruct a new generation of Hellenic intellectuals.
translation: 尽管有人说爱奥尼亚群岛在几百年来被外来者们影响地太深了，但是他们也是到目前为止存在时间最久的独立的希腊国家。让我们接过希腊贤者点亮的政治火炬，建立一个向一切希腊学者开发的大学吧。在我们的庇护下，这些希腊国家的大师们将塑造新一代的希腊知识分子。

original: Attacking Lorraine means traversing the mountainous wilderness of the Vosges, an area that any army would find very difficult to traverse. Let us plan our defenses accordingly and aim to always make the most of the local environment.
translation: 进攻洛林就意味着要穿越孚日山脉那些多山的荒野，这对任何一支军队来说都不是什么容易通过的地方。我们得在这里部署防御，充分利用起这里的地形。

original: Our land is blessed with numerous deposits of iron ore, making us a center of production of weapons and other metalwork. We must encourage this metal industry to thrive and aim to become the foremost producer of arms in our region.
translation: 我们的土地蕴藏着丰富的铁矿，这令我们成为了武器制造业和其它金属工业的中心，我们必须鼓励这里的金属工业，成为这一带最重要的武器制造商。

original: Our country is the direct continuation of the Kingdom of Middle Francia, known as Lotharingia after its ruler Lothair, grandson of Charlemagne. His kingdom stretched from the North Sea to Italy, separating what would become France and Germany. With such a vast legacy, it is easy for us to find long-lost claims to territories we don't currently rule.
translation: 我们的国家是中法兰克王国的直接继承者，以其统治者，查理曼之孙洛泰尔之名，被称作洛泰尔尼亚。这一王国从北海延伸至意大利，在分裂之后分别成为法国和德国的雏形。有了如此庞大的遗产，我们可以轻易地为这一我们尚未统治的地区制造一个宣称。

original: Our country lies on the very edge of the Holy Roman Empire, with a covetous France just to the west. The lands ruled by Burgundy hem us in to the north and the south, and they desire to unite their lands by annexing ours. In order to maintain our independence, we must be deft at diplomacy, lest one or the other takes control of us, or we are ground between the millstones.
translation: 我们的国家在神圣罗马帝国的偏远边界上，贪婪的法国就在我们的西方。被勃艮第王朝统治着的领地从北方和南方包围了我们，并且他们一直试图吞并我们以连接自己的领土。为了保证我们的独立，我们需要在外交政策上更为灵活，防止某国借此控制我们，否则我们就要被大国碾碎了。

original: We are a nation divided by language; many of our people speak French, while a large number speak German. In order to put up a unified front to the world, we must work together as one, despite our linguistic differences.
translation: 我们的国家被语言所割裂开来。有相当一部分人说法语，但是绝大多数人都说德语。为了能让我们以团结一致面对国际挑战，我们必须克服语言困难，团结协作。

original: Scattered among our territories are the Three Bishoprics of Metz, Toul, and Verdun. These states are not easily annexed as their independence is guaranteed by a number of old and prestigious treaties. Instead we ought to focus our efforts at cooperating closely with the church and its worldly princes for the betterment of us all.
translation: 我们的领土上散布着梅斯、托尔和维尔德三个主教辖区。想吞并这三个地区并非易事，因为他们的独立是被一系列古老而被广泛承认的条约所保证的。相反，我们应该着力于同教会以及世俗权力紧密合作，这样对大家都好。

original: Let us refurbish our capital to be a shining example of modern urban planning, a great project worthy of our ambitious state. In order to tie together the old and the new we must create a great monumental square, a place where every visitor can marvel at our greatness.
translation: 让我们好好翻新一遍我们的首都，让它成为现代城市规划的典范，使它配得上我们雄心勃发的伟大国家。为了联系历史和未来，我们得修建一座辉煌的纪念广场，在那里，一切游客都会对它的辉煌感到惊奇。

original: We have decided to allow the notables of our realm to meet in a bicameral assembly known as the Estates of Württemberg. Although it will somewhat lessen the ruler's absolute power, it will conversely allow for the better governance of the realm.
translation: 我们已经决定让国家的名流参与到符腾堡的两院制等级议会中来，尽管这可能削弱统治者的绝对力量，但是这将反过来协助我们更好地统治我们的国家。

original: Although the Duchy of Swabia has long since passed into history, its name still remains a powerful force for unity in the region. The various principalities, free cities, ecclesiastical lands, and other petty states in the region have banded together in a league for mutual defense. As one of the greater states in Swabia, let us assume the role of the natural leader of this league in times of war.
translation: 尽管斯瓦比亚公国早就成为了历史，但是它的名字依旧是统一这一区域的强大力量。该地的公国、自由城市、教会领地和其它小国已经通过一个联盟团结起来进行共同防御。作为斯瓦比亚地区的大国之一，我们应当在扮演此地战时的天然领导的角色。

original: We are hardly the only state in Germany to be plagued by peasant rebellions from time to time. While revolting peasants are quickly crushed and their concerns ignored, those of the petty nobility and of the burghers are not so easily dismissed. Perhaps we should expand the rights of the people to a sufficient amount in order to keep them happy and less prone to unpleasant rebellions.
translation: 我们是德意志中少数的被时不时发生的农民叛乱困扰的邦国之一。尽管参加叛乱的农民很快就被击溃，他们的声音也很快消失了；但是那些小贵族和市民却没那么容易被我们遣散。或许我们应该把人权分享给更多的人，保证他们的愉快，让他们更不愿意发动叛乱。

original: The Imperial Circles are to oversee matters of defense, taxation, and other administrative tasks in the empire. Württemberg is a natural state to be one of the directors of the 'Swabian' circle, which means that during times of war, we are able to call upon and lead the troops of the region.
translation: 帝国行政圈是用于监督帝国的防御、税收和其它行政事务的。符腾堡是施瓦比亚行政圈的一个天然领导者，这意味着在战时，我们可以号令和领导此地的军队。

original: It is time to better organize the church in our state. With this "Grosse Kirchenordnung", we will not only make the church more efficient, but bind it more closely to our state.
translation: 我们该更好地组织我国的教会了。借助这个国教会总纲，我们不仅能让我们的教诲更有效率，而且更让他贴近我们的国家机器。

original: It is time for our nation to build a grand palace to exhibit the greatness of Württemberg to the world.
translation: 我们是时候建造一座辉煌的宫殿，向世人展示符腾堡的伟大了。
帝国代表者会议主要决议

original: The hundreds of petty states which make up the Empire are a bureaucratic nightmare, as well as making the maps so untidy. The Emperor and the Imperial Diet are planning to do away with these tiny states, merging them into the larger states - like us, for example. Let us take advantage of this by claiming as much as we can!
translation: 组成帝国的上百个效果简直是官僚体制的噩梦，更何况这让地图也显得杂乱了。皇帝和帝国议会正在准备废除这些小国，把它们整合进更大的的国家里——比如我们。让我们好好利用这个机会吧！

original: From Wallonia in the west to Poland in the east able miners and metalworkers are drawn to the Slovak Ore Mountains. We must welcome this foreign talent as the development of the mining industry is the very backbone of our economy.
translation: 从瓦隆到波兰以西，能干的矿工和金属工人被吸引到斯洛伐克矿山。我们必须欢迎这些外国的人才，因为矿业是我们经济的支柱。

original: The Carpathian region is sorely lacking in institutions of higher learning. Let us create a great Danubian university, as a sign of our newfound confidence and to avoid relying on foreign scholars, jurists and bureaucrats. Learned men will flock to our borders, not to serve us but to train a new generation of administrators for our great country.
translation: 喀尔巴阡一带极其缺乏高等教育。我们应该建设一所规模巨大的多瑙河一带的大学，以此显示我们的新得到的自信，避免过度依赖外国学者，法官和官僚。学识渊博的人会蜂拥而至，他们不仅是为我们服务的，而是来培养新一代的国家管理者的。

original: As sources of gold and silver grow scarce in continental Europe the Kremnica Mountains remain one of the foremost centers of gold production in the world. If we ensure that the great burghers of Kremnica are always provided for and that the mine and mint remain active we will find that we will never lack bullion.
translation: 在欧洲大陆的金银资源逐渐枯竭时，克雷姆尼察的山脉中依然保留着世界上最重要的金矿。只要我们能保证克里姆尼察的市民能成为稳定的后勤，矿场也一直开工，我们就永远不会缺金条。

original: Some say we have more castles per person than any other region in the world but given our many powerful neighbors who can blame us? We must be true to this legacy and never leave a border unguarded or our castles understaffed. This is surely the best way to safeguard our independence in a dangerous world!
translation: 有人说我们这里人均占有的城堡比世界上任何一个地方都多，但是在强敌环伺的前提下，谁能说我们做得不对呢？我们必须坚持这一政策，不让任何一寸边境无人把守，不让任何一座城堡无人把守。这是让我们在虎伺狼顾的凶险世界中保证我们独立的最好方法了！

original: Traditionally the city leagues of the Carpathian Mountains have greedily looked after the interests of the cosmopolitan elites within. Their privileges have grown under king after king and the mining towns have become increasingly rich and arrogant. By stipulating that each league provide the state with a number of muskets, cannons and other equipment for our defense we can both nurture our growing arms industry and increase our standing army.
translation: 传统上喀尔巴阡山脉的城邦同盟渴望着来自城市精英们的利益。他们的特权在一个又一个国王期间增长，最小的城市也变得富有与傲慢。通过规定每个同盟提供给国家大量的滑膛枪，加农炮以及其他用以防御的设备，我们既可以培育我们正在发展的军工业，也可以增强我们的军队。

original: In their eagerness to spread the word of reformation in our lands Protestants have begun to translate the catechism, the Bible, hymns and various pamphlets to the Slovak language. Eager to fight back Catholic communities have also begun to propagate for a Slovak written language of their own. While this religious schism looks like it will split our society for some time their determination will ensure that the Slovak language will soon be as literary as any other Slavic tongue. We must do what we can to strengthen this development for the benefit of Slovak people.
translation: 他们热心的在我们的土地上传播改革。新教徒开始将教义，圣经，圣诗以及大量的小册子翻译成斯洛伐克语。急切反击的天主教社区也开始为了他们自己的斯洛伐克书面语而传播。虽然宗教上的分裂看起来分裂了我们的社会。但一段时间后他们的努力将会确保斯洛伐克语与其他斯拉夫口语相比将很快书面化。为了斯洛伐克的好，我们必须做我们可做的去强化这种发展。

original: The Spirit of Enlightenment is sweeping across Europe. Eager to spread the light of knowledge to the Slovak people some of our greater minds are founding academies and attempting to codify the Slovak language. Having long been resigned to serve foreign masters the Slovak people is now awakening to take their place as the foremost among the Slavs of Central Europe. The time has come for a new Greater Moravian Empire!
translation: 启蒙主义精神以及遍及欧洲。渴望着传播知识之光给斯洛伐克人民，我们的一些伟大的学者成立了院校并努力将斯洛伐克语正规化。长时间从服侍外国中解放的斯洛伐克人已经觉醒并将作为中欧的斯拉夫人之王。是时候向着一个更加伟大的摩拉维亚帝国前进了！

original: The world shall tremble for we have reunited the Golden Horde! We were one of the main constituent parts of Genghis Khan's empire and the main political force in Eastern Europe and the Steppes for centuries. Born again the Golden Horde will strive to forge the empire that was lost and unite the Hordes of Central Asia.
translation: 世界将为我们重建金帐汗国而颤抖！我们曾是成吉思汗帝国的上半部分以及数个世纪来东欧与草原的政治力量。重生的金帐汗国将努力去打造失落的帝国并联合中亚的游牧部族。

original: Our ancestors refined the Mongol administrative system over the centuries but they were not shy of incorporating the ideas and methods of the cultures they subdued. Our system of administration is in part based on traditions dating back to the Great Genghis Khan himself and in part on what we have adopted from Persians and Muslim bureaucrats in the lands conquered. If our reborn Golden Horde is to thrive and continue to expand we must be ready to build an empire on pragmatic adoption.
translation: 几个世纪来，我们的先人精致化了蒙古的行政系统但他们并不羞于结合他们所制服的文化的理念与行政方法。我们的行政系统部分基于追溯到成吉思汗本人，部分基于被我们征服与接受的波斯与穆斯林官员。如果我们重生的金帐汗国要兴盛与继续扩张，我们必须准备建立一个才用务实的帝国。

original: Our empire may no longer be ruled from horseback but our armies still very much are. Over the centuries we have stayed true to our origins ensuring that few can match the skill of our riders. As we go forward and adopt new technology and tactics when needed we build on the strong organization and martial tradition of the Mongol Empire.
translation: 我们的帝国或许不再由马背上的人所统治，但我们的军队仍是。几个世纪来，我们秉持传统以保证只有少数人的能力比得上我们的骑手。当我们前进并接受新的科技与战术时，我们需要建立蒙古帝国的强大的，有组织的武力传统。

original: Not all riches in this world originate in the lands under our rule. Trade is the source of all wealth and the Golden Horde has always protected merchants. By ensuring the safety of anyone who wishes to move goods through our country we can ensure a steady stream of furs, Chinese craftsmanship, silk, spices and other necessities to our cities. Whether they choose to sell their goods to us or not their mere presence will generate wealth for our people.
translation: 不是所有富有的人都来源于我们统治的土地。贸易是所有财富的来源，金帐汗国一直保护商人团。通过确保任何想要通过我们国家运送货物的人的安全，我们可以确保一个稳定的皮毛，中国工艺，丝绸，香料以及其他我们城市所需的贸易流。不管他们选择将货物卖给我们或不卖，他们的存在都将为我们的人民带来财富。

original: Just as we bring destruction to our enemies we must bring peace to the many who reside within our borders. Before the misfortune of Timur Sarai and the Golden Horde cities were once the envy of the world. Let this be the model for all our cities. By upholding the internal peace and encouraging talented men and women from all over our empire to plan and populate new and great cities we will tame the steppes.
translation: 在我们给敌人带来毁灭的同时，我们必须为仍居住在我们国土内的人带来和平。不幸发生前，帖木儿与金帐汗国的城市都曾是令人嫉妒的存在。让这成为我们所有城市的模范。通过捍卫内部的和平，鼓励帝国各地有才华的男人与女人去规划并建立新的伟大城市，我们将驯服草原。

original: Restraining and inflexible doctrine has never managed to win many followers among the Tatar hordes. When the Great Öz Beg Khan adopted Islam it was the Islam of Sufi Shaiks and not zealous Qadis that he invited into his lands. Centuries of tradition and loyalty are what we would build our state upon. Religion has a part to play but we would rather see our country thrive than fall apart in the struggle to ensure that all share a common faith.
translation: 打压与死板的教条从来无法在鞑靼族内赢得许多追随者。当伟大的 月即别可汗接受伊斯兰教时，他邀请的是伊斯兰苏菲谢赫并非狂信徒卡迪。世纪以来的传统与忠诚是我们国家建立的基础。宗教已经占有一席之地，除非我们想要国家分裂，内部争斗而不是兴盛繁荣，就应该确保所有人信仰同一个宗教。

original: While the Hohenzollern family is most notable for being Electors of Brandenburg, the family first came to prominence in Franconia. The Hohenzollern's status as Burgraves of Nuremberg enabled the dynasty to place itself in a position to acquire Brandenburg. While the Ansbach branch is a junior one, our land remains one of the family's first notable titles and the Hohenzollerns have left a clear mark on our state.
translation: 当勃兰登堡成为选帝侯时，那是霍亨索伦家族最显著的时刻。这个家族扬名于法兰克尼亚。霍亨索伦家族作为纽伦堡伯爵的地位开启了一个王朝让它得以获得勃兰登堡。在安斯巴赫的分支是一个被联统国，我们的土地仍是家族的显著头衔，霍亨索伦也在此留下了显著地标记。

original: Our principality and its sister Bayreuth are the result of the division of the Burgraviate of Nuremberg. Many of the territories disputed between the two were annexed to the Free City of Nuremberg. We must strive to reunite the Burgraviate and be ready to wage war against Nuremberg to regain suzerainty over our rightful lands.
translation: 公爵领与它的姐妹拜罗伊特城是纽伦堡伯爵分裂的结果。两者争议许多的领土被纽伦堡自由市所吞并。我们必须努力重建伯爵领并准备发动对纽伦堡的战争以夺回我们土地的宗主权

original: After sieges and general tear the castle at Plassenburg is in a sorry state. Let us rebuild the castle into one of the most splendid palaces in the Empire. The fortifications must be vast enough to withstand several armies, and its amenities impressive enough for a king!
translation: 经历了围城与普遍的撕裂后，普拉森的城堡处于一个糟糕的境地。让我们重建帝国内最优秀的城堡。要塞必须足够巨大以抵挡不少的军队。作为王的城堡，它的设施也必须足以令人印象深刻。

original: Having listened to Luther's testimony at the Diet of Worms our Margrave is imploring us to be among the first to embrace the reformation. We must maintain a close correspondence with the reformer and shelter other proponents of the reformation that require our assistance. Together with other rulers we can unite the Protestants of the Empire around common articles of faith. Our influence on the Reformation is what our state will be known for.
translation: 在沃尔姆斯的会议上听取路德的证词后，我们的侯爵恳求我们成为诸国中第一个拥抱改革的国家。我们必须与改革者与其他需要我们帮助的支持者维持一个紧密的联系。与其他帝国内新教诸侯联合形成一个统一的教义。我们在宗教改革中的影响会让我们的国家闻名。

original: Let us offer asylum to Protestants fleeing the Counter-Reformation religious wars. In combination with administrative and social reforms, an influx of new people to populate open or war-ravaged lands will allow our state to flourish and quickly recovery from the destruction wrought by long conflicts.
translation: 让我们为逃离天主教改革宗教战争的新教徒们提供庇护所。在行政改革与社会改革的结合上新人口的流入填充了开放的或是饱受战争蹂躏的土地。这使得我们的国家繁荣并快速的从长时间争斗所带来的毁坏中恢复。

original: It is said the city of Ansbach was once attacked by a man-eating wolf. Our superstitious citizens believed the wolf to be the vengeful spirit of the recently passed Bürgermeister reincarnated. This werewolf was eventually chased from the forest and killed. Relieved to have defeated their fears the locals cut the wolf's snout and dressed it in men's clothing together with a mask and wig and hung from the gallows. While bizarre to some this daring confrontation with their greatest fear is what marks our people and we should allow it to be our guiding inspiration going forward. We must let authors, poets and scholars cast their light upon this story and let every child learn of it from young age.
translation: 据说安斯巴赫城曾经被一只吃人的狼人所攻击。迷信的市民们相信狼代表着最近过世的市长的转世的复仇。这只狼人最终被驱赶到森林中并被击杀。战胜他们的恐惧而松了一口气的当地人，切下了狼的吻部并将与一个戴假发的面具一同装饰在男人的服饰上并挂在绞刑架上。异乎寻常的这些敢于与他们最大的恐惧对抗的人象征着我们的人民，我们应该允许这成为指引我们向前的鼓舞。我们必须让作家，诗人与其他的学者将他们的灵光倾注于这个故事，让每一个孩子从小时候就知晓。

original:
Auf, Ansbach-Dragoner!
Auf, Ansbach-Bayreuth!
Schnall um deinen Säbel
un rüste dich zum Streit!
translation:
上啊，安斯巴赫的龙骑兵！
上啊，安斯巴赫与拜伊罗特！
扣紧你的剑
现在，武装起来准备战斗！

original: Our rulers are descendants of saint Michael of Chernigov and our country was part of Great Principality of Chernigov. This heritage establishes us as the heirs of one of Russia's greatest states.
translation: 我们的统治者是契尔尼戈夫的圣迈克尔的后裔，我们的国家曾是曾是契尔尼戈夫大公国的一部分。如此的遗产让我们成为了俄罗斯最伟大的国家之一的继承人。

original: Our position between Grand Duchy of Lithuania, Grand Duchy of Moscow and Golden Horde forces us to rely on diplomacy. We have no choice but to master the art of treaties, agreements and pacts to ensure our existence.
translation: 我们的位置处于立陶宛大公国，莫斯科大公国及金帐汗国的局势迫使我们依靠外交。我们没有选择只能掌握条约，协定及协议上的艺术来确保我们的存在。

original: Maintaining good relations with the Tatars has been imperative to our survival and has overtime strengthened our state. We must continue to closely monitor the politics of the Hordes. If they see us as a valued partner and a functioning part of their economy we can stand to gain from their dominance on the Steppes.
translation: 与鞑靼保持良好的关系对我们的生存来说势在必行并会随着时间的推移强化我们的国家。我们必须密切监控着游牧的政治形势。如果他们将我们看做一个有价值的伙伴和他们经济的一个有用的部分，我们就可以开始从他们手中得到草原的霸主地位。

original: Many Russian principalities have changed their inheritance systems for perceived practical gain. We will instead safeguard tradition and remain loyal to our tested and true system - agnatic seniority. We know, as our ancestors did, that there is no worse fate than a Noble Regency due to standing without an heir.
translation: 许多俄罗斯的大公国已经因为感觉到切实的利益而改变他们的继承系统。我们将保障传统并保留对饱受考验与真实的系统的忠诚-男性优先。我们知道，正如我们的先人所做，没什么比缺少继承人而导致的贵族摄政更糟糕的了。

original: Cities of the Upper Oka Valley

Our Grand Duchy in the Upper Oka Valley may look small to some but the cities of Odoyev, Novosil, Belyov and Vorotynsk are made of a strong and sturdy people. In times of war any citizen will be obligated to provide for our military.
translation: 我们位于上奥卡谷的大公国也许从某些方面看很小，但奥多耶夫，诺沃西利， 波洛夫斯基和沃罗滕斯克都由强壮与坚实的人组成。在战争时任何市民都将有责任为我们的军队做出贡献。

original: The Zasechnaya Cherta line of defenses has kept the Russian states defended from steppe nomads and other threats. For centuries our cities have been an integral part of this line, leaving us with great practical experience in fortification, traps and abatises. With the direct threat gone we can put this knowledge to use to develop our fortification agency unlike any other.
translation: 大鹿砦防御线已经让俄罗斯的国家抵御了草原游牧与其他的威胁。数个世纪以来我们的城市是防线的重要部分，让我们在防御工事，陷阱，鹿砦方面有着大量的实践经验。最直接的威胁已经消失时，不同于其他，我们可以将这些知识用于开发我们的防御工事。

original: The Oka River is one of the oldest trade routes in Russia. From our river valley we can reach Volga, and through that we can reach the Don and the Sea of Azov or Caspian. The wealthy lands of Persia are thus easily within our reach. Our traders regularly visit these rich foreign lands to sell the products we are famous for while importing silk, spices and all exotic goods known to man.
translation: 奥卡河是俄罗斯最古老的贸易线路之一。从我们的河谷可以到达伏尔加河，再通过它我们可以到达顿河甚至亚速海与里海。因此富有的波斯土地就在我们可到达的范围内。我们的商人频繁地拜访这些富有的外国土地去售卖我们著名的出口丝绸，香料以及所有被世人熟知的充满异国风情的产品。

original: Once, our kingdom was divided in 52 independent states. Each state had their own garh, a fortress around which the state was organized. Our ancestor, Kanakpal, spent 60 years uniting and integrating these fortress-states into our kingdom. To this day we employ the lessons learned and our state continues to rely on our ability to adapt to accommodate new additions to our state.
translation: 曾经，我们的王国分裂成了52个独立国。每个国家都有他们自己的Garh，一个围绕国家的堡垒。我们的祖先，迦那波罗，花费了60年的时间重新统一与继承这些堡垒国回到我们的王国中。至今，我们利用了过去学到的经验，我们的国家继续依靠我们适应新传统的能力。

original: With our backs against the impassable Himalayas we cannot yield an inch of our land to any invader. Yet the mountains themselves are a means to a defense. In Garhwal every valley has at least one fort and our citizens are always ready to meet an invader with sword in hand.
translation: 我们的背后正对着不可逾越的喜马拉雅山脉，我们不会退让任何一英尺的土地给侵略者。同时这些山脉本身就是一种防御手段。在加瓦尔每个山谷有着至少一个堡垒，我们的人民也随时准备着用手中的剑去抵挡侵略者。

original: As a small state at the periphery of the Indo-Gangetic plain our enemies have always been able to mobilize much larger armies. We must therefore fight twice as fiercely so that it can be known that any invader will have to pay very dearly for an attempted conquest. The message must be clear, we will show no mercy! At best an invader can expect to get the noses of his soldiers back.
translation: 作为印度河-恒河河川周边一个小国家，我们的敌人向来能动员更庞大的军队。所以我们必须与两倍以上的敌军激烈战斗，因此被世人所知任何侵略者为了一个尝试性的征服付出深深地代价。意思已经很清楚了，我们绝不心慈手软！一个侵略者最好的下场就是拿回他的士兵的鼻子。

original: Sitting at the foot of the Himalayas, ours is a country of true natural beauty. Our people take great pride in this, and the serene grace of the mountains is enough to pacify even the wildest of dissidents.
translation: 坐落在喜马拉雅山的山脚，我国是一个有着真正自然美景的国家。我国人民也为此而自豪，这些来自山中的安详的恩典，足以安抚最狂暴的异见者。

original: The source of the holy river Ganges lies within our kingdom. This makes our kingdom a holy place and earns us the respect and gratitude of the peoples of India.
translation: 恒河的源头就坐落在我们的王国内。这让我们的王国成为了一块圣地，为我们赚得了印度人民的尊重与感激。

original: Protecting the Land of the Gods

Our kingdom is blessed with a great number of temples and monasteries. For centuries pilgrims have come here seeking enlightenment and solitude. We must embrace and encourage this part of our legacy and make sure to always protect those that seek our shrines.
translation: 我们的王国受着大量神庙与寺庙的祝福。数个世纪来朝圣者们来到这里寻求启蒙与独修。我们必须接纳并鼓励这部分我们的遗产并确保一直保护那些寻求我们神社的人。

original: Unlike many of our neighbors our country is small and the resources are few. We have had to learn how to make peace with each other regardless of which gods we pray to. Hindus, Jains, Buddhists, Sikhs and Muslims are all among our subjects and we must do our utmost to limit any friction this mix can cause.
translation: 与许多邻邦不同，我国地少物稀。无论我们信仰为何，我们都得学着与他人和睦相处。印度教徒、耆那教徒、佛教徒、锡克教徒和穆斯林混居在我们的人民之中，故而我们必须尽力避免其间可能引发骚乱的摩擦。

original: Whilst the peasants of Europe are bound to the shackles of Feudalism, the peoples of Dithmarschen maintain their independence. Our neighbors have long wished to subdue our people, forcing them into the cruelty of Feudalism. Our peasants will only be subjects to the good shepherd and not the hired hands of foreign tyrants!
translation: 当欧洲的农民被绑在封建制度的镣铐上时，迪特马申的人民维持着他们的独立。我们的邻居长久以来希望征服我们的人民，强迫他们接受残酷的封建制度。我们的农民只会被教育成优秀的牧羊人，并非外国暴君的打手！

original: In the lands of Dithmarschen functions of state are largely overseen by the many parishes that dot these lands. While the princes and kings that surround us govern from fortified castles, our people administer lands through the sacred temples under God's divine mandate.
translation: 在迪特马申的土地上，各种功能的区域被大量遍布于此的教区所监督。当围绕我们的亲王与国王从要塞化城堡中统治，我们的人民，在神明神圣的委任下，通过神圣的神庙管理者土地。

original: The independence and wealth of Dithmarschen has long been reliant on commercial activity abroad. From the Baltic through the North Sea, our traders are welcome wherever they dock, and work tirelessly to bring more wealth to our own shores.
translation: 独立且富有的迪特马申长时间依赖于国外的商业活动。从波罗的海到北海，我们的商人不论停泊在何处都受到欢迎，并孜孜不倦的工作，将财富带回我们的海岸。

original: It is said that when harvest fail or the fishermen's haul are poor, many of our peasants assume the mantle of piracy. We could never admit or condone such actions but it's our custom to salvage leftover maritime cargo and recover vessels abandoned by the victims of piracy.
translation: 据说，当收成不好或者渔夫没好收获时，许多我们的农民会采取海盗行为。我们绝不会承认或纵容这种行为，但我们有着打捞残余的海上货物或修复海盗受害者们抛弃的船只的传统。

original: For centuries great floods and storm tides have devastated our lands, sweeping entire settlements under the sea. To protect against this threat, it is vital that we construct dikes facing outwards against the sea and continue in our efforts to always rebuild what is lost.
translation: 几个世纪来大洪水与风暴带来的潮汐蹂躏着我们的土地，将整个乡村扫入海底。为了保护我们应对这种威胁，修建向外对着大海的堤防工事十分重要，同时继续努力重建所失去的一切。

original: Many religious orders exist within our territories, dutifully serving their god and helping to guide our peoples to live their lives in accordance to the Lord's teachings. As we continue to expand our influence we should cherish this heritage and continue to have the orders be an integral part of our state.
translation: 我国境内存在着许多宗教团体，他们忠实地侍奉着自己的神，引导着我们的人民顺从着神的旨意生活。在我们扩大自身影响力的同时，我们也应当珍视这项遗产，使这些宗教团体内化成我们国家的一部分。

original: The farmers of Dithmarschen are not bound to give the product of their labor and toil to petty lords. This means any extra produce can be used by our farmers themselves and ensure that our people will always be wealthier than the exploited subjects of our neighbors.
translation: 迪特马申的农夫并不需要上交他们的辛勤劳动的产品给小领主们。这意味着任何额外的产品可以被农夫们自己使用，确保我们的人民永远比邻国那被剥削的从属更富有。

original: The Hatakeyama clan belongs to three Ashikaga sub-branches which are traditionally appointed to Kanrei. Because of this our name has carried more prestige than most in the Shogunate.
translation: 畠山氏属于足利的三个分支之一，传统上曾指派为幕府代表。因此比起在幕府中的大部分人，我们的名字带来了更多的威望。

original: Some consider our clan leaders as rebellious troublemakers due to our many conflicts with other daimyo. This is, however, but a sign of our resilience. We will never surrender and will fight for what is ours even if the Shogun himself would oppose us!
translation: 因为我们与许多大名的冲突，有些人将我们氏族的领袖比作反叛的闹事者。这反而是我们弹力的一个表现。我们绝不投降并会为我们而战斗，即使将军本人也反对我们！

original: Mount Koya has been a holy place for the Japanese Religions since ancient times. The Kongobu-ji temple and other religious institutions on this mountain traditionally pray for the health and safety of our rulers, as they have prayed for those that came before us.
translation: 自古时打起，高野山便是日本宗教的一个圣地。正如它们已经为我们之前的统治者祈祷，传统上，在这座山上的金剛峯寺以及其他的宗教设施会为我们统治者生命与安全而祈祷。

original: Our fiefs are distributed across the entire land and, the clan leaders cannot govern everything themselves. We must instead appoint men of merit to govern our territories, and act as the hands, eyes and ears of our ruler.
translation: 我们的封地遍布整个大陆，而氏族领袖们无法单靠他们自己统治一切。我们需要转而指派一个优秀的人统治我们的领土，并作为我们统治者的手，眼与耳。

original: Our administration has always been centered on Wakae castle, a stronghold located between several key commercial cities. As we expand let us continue to create fortified centers of administration and economy across our territory.
translation: 我们的行政一直集中于若江城，一个位于数个关键商业城市之间的据点。我们扩张的同时，让我们继续强化领地内行政与经济的中心的防御。

original: Sub-branches such as the Bishu and Soshu have fought each other for the throne of our clan for decades, causing serious political strife and instability. We must unify these clans once and for all and ensure they do not cause any problems in the future.
translation: 数十年来，尾州与相州的分支为了我们氏族的王座而互相征战，导致了严重的政治争论与不稳定。我们必须一劳永逸的联合这些氏族并确保他们在将来不会导致任何问题。

original: If we are to master the use of firearms we must learn from those that have perfected their use. In our lands the mercenary Saika-shu are renowned for their proficiency with such weapons and would make a fine example for our armies to follow.
translation: 如果我们想精通对火器的使用，我们需要从已经能完美使用他们的人那学习。在我们的土地内，雇佣兵杂贺众因精通这种武器而闻名，他们将会成为我们军队遵循的一个好榜样。

original: Due to our close ties with the Shogun family we have a good claim to take on the mantle of the Shogun if the main line should perish. Even though the Bakufu appear safe now we must ensure none forget what is our birthright.
translation: 由于我们与将军家族的紧密联系，如果主家沦落，我们有着一个好的对将军的宣称。尽管幕府现在表面上安定，但我们必须确保没人会遗忘我们生来的权利。

original: Tokaido or 'The East Circuit' is the location of the most important trade route between Central and Eastern Japan. Let us do all we can to exert control over this region so that we can control the economy of the entire region.
translation: 东海道，或‘东环道’是日本中部与东部最重要的贸易路线。让我们尽一切去使出在此地区的控制力，这样我们可以控制整个地区的经济。

original: Our clan has a glorious past that everyone should be given the opportunity to learn about. Let us compile the complete history of our clan and our people, with tales of past deeds to serve as an example for our sons and neighbors alike.
translation: 我们的氏族有着一个光荣的过去，那理应让所有人都有机会认识到。让我们编写我们氏族与我们人民的完整历史，让过去的行为传说化，作为我们后代与邻国同样的榜样。

original: We need a strong and clear clan law to ensure that we can rule our subjects, be they vassals or commoners, fairly and efficiently. By compiling all laws and edicts we will ensure a lasting clan structure. The 'Imagawa-Kana-Mokuroku' will be the most significant law collection in Japan.
translation: 我们需要一个强力且清楚的氏族法以确保我们可以统治我们的从属，不论是附庸或是平民，公正且有效。通过修订所有法律与法令我们将确保一个持久的氏族结构。‘今川假名目录’将会成为日本最显著的法律集。

original: Sometimes, the best way to defeat an enemy is to make him your friend. Securing our flanks through marriage will not only pacify our foes and gain us new allies at the same time, but will ensure we can ultimately dominate them through blood as well.
translation: 有时，打败一个敌人最好的方法就是让他成为你的朋友。通过联姻确保我们的侧翼，这不仅会安抚曾经的敌人，同时还会带来新的盟友。这也最终会确保我们通过血脉支配他们。

original: In the Shadow of Mount Fuji

Mount Fuji is famed as the most beautiful landscape in all of Japan, and has been described by great poets since ancient times. By taking the role as the custodians of this mountain seriously our clan benefits from its reputation.
translation: 富士山因其最美丽的景观而在日本闻名，自从古时起被古诗所描述。通过成为这座山的管理者，我们的氏族将因此大大获利。

original: Japan and Kyoto are mired in political chaos. As close kinsmen of previous Shoguns it is our obligation, and our right, to guard the Emperor and the Shogun. We must seize our place at the front of the Shogunate before other clans take the opportunity!
translation: 日本与京都深陷政治混乱中。作为前任将军的近亲，我们有责任也是我们的权利，去保护天皇及幕府。我们必须在幕府之内夺得我们的地位，赶在其他氏族抢占先机之前！

original: Our ancestors once belonged to the Genji clan, of the Minamoto family. They have served both Shogunates as warriors and officials, and this tradition of loyal service runs through the blood of our people.
translation: 我们的祖先曾经属于源氏一族。他们曾经作为幕府的武士和官员服侍幕府，这种忠诚的服侍传统透过血脉传递给我们的人民。

original: The mountainous lands of Izumo are rich in iron ore and are famous for their high quality armor, spears and swords. We should cherish this heritage and ensure that the very fact that something was made in Izumo becomes a quality trade mark known to any warrior.
translation: 出云多山的土地有着丰盛的铁矿并以其的高质量盔甲，长枪与剑而闻名。我们应当珍视这个遗产，确保这个绝对的事实让出云成为了所有武士都熟知的一个高质量的贸易关口。

original: Even when defeated in battle a strong castle allows our armies to retreat and recuperate. With a number of strong castles throughout these lands we will be able to control the battlefields of Japan. Let us make our main fortress of Gassan-Toda an example which we seek to emulate in all provinces that fall under our rule.
translation: 当被击败时，一个强固的城堡允许我们的军队撤退并休养。在各处有着大量强固的城堡，我们能够控制日本的战场。让我们把我们主要的月山-户田堡垒作为示范，让所有我们控制的省份的堡垒向它看齐。

original: The sea-route is an underestimated way to transport goods around Japan. We must turn our fishermen and local traders into maritime merchants.
translation: 海上线路在日本的货物运输上一直被低估。我们必须将我们的渔夫与本地商人转化为海上商人。

original: We are the custodians of the Kizuko Shrine, the place where the first Emperor of Japan was born. The shrine is revered but it has suffered over the years. Let us ensure that the Kizuki Shrine is always well maintained and that we will protect all pilgrims.
translation: 我们保管着杵筑神社，第一任天皇诞生之地。神社被奉为至宝但也在过去遭受了不少苦难。让我们确保杵筑神社一直被良好的维持以保护所有的朝圣者。

original: The greatest silver mine in Japan lies within our realm. Developing and safeguarding this source of wealth is going to be a cornerstone not only in our own economic policy but even that of the entire archipelago.
translation: 日本最大的银矿位于我们的王国内。开发与维护这个财富之源将不仅是我们经济政策的基石，同时也是整个群岛的基石。

original: Our warriors have always cherished loyalty above all other virtues and would never abandon our cause even in the face of certain defeat. Let us honor the ten best of them as an example for all to follow, an example to keep morale high for all who fight for us.
translation: 我们的武士十分重视忠诚，将其视于所有美德之上。就算是面对着确凿的失败。他们也不会抛弃对我们的忠诚。让我们赞赏最优秀的十个，并将他们作为所有人的榜样，这可以让为我们而战的人士气保持高昂。

original: Our clan is one that traditionally most often occupies the title of Kanrei. This position gives us power to act for the Shogunate and gives us power in Japanese politics.
translation: 传统上，我们氏族大部分时候都占据着管领的职位。这个职位给了我们代为将军行动的权利，也给了我们在日本政治中的力量。

original: Our kinsmen and retainers own several rich provinces of Central Japan and they are very loyal to the clan leader. Through internal harmony our clan will be among the most powerful in the realm.
translation: 我们的近亲与仆从在日本中部拥有着数个富饶的省份，同时他们也对氏族领袖十分忠诚。经由我们氏族内部的和谐，我们氏族将会成为王国内最强大的力量。

original: While Kyoto has declined during civil wars, Sakai city has grown to be one of the richest cities of Japan. By fostering a good relationship with the merchants in Sakai we can strengthen our economy.
translation: 当京都在内战之后逐渐沦落时，堺市正在成为日本最富有的城市之一。通过培养与堺市商人的良好关系，我们可以增强我们的经济。

original: Civil War is tearing Japan apart. Let us raise a glorious army of the east and drown the forces of the west in our troops.
translation: 内战正在撕裂日本。让我们召集一只荣耀的东军，用我们的士兵淹没西方！

original: If we are to be able to raise an army of the size necessary to prevail in these times we must expand the Ashigaru portion of our forces dramatically. Massive numbers of lightly armored foot soldiers will allow us to overcome our enemies.
translation: 这段时间内，如果我们能够召集足以战胜敌人的军队，我们必须扩展一部分在我们军队中数量极大的足轻。大量的轻装徒步士兵将让我们驯服我们的敌人。

original: The Yamabushi, pilgrims and monks following the Shugendo, travel from state to state. As many of our own clan members are devoted to Shugendo we should strive to make the Yamabushi our informants on foreign relations.
translation: 山伏，即遵循修验道的朝圣者与和尚，在国与国之间周游。介于我们氏族的许多人都忠于修验道，我们应当努力将山伏作为我们在外国的眼线。

original: It is important to stand strong in times of war but in times of peace we must build a strong society with tenable institutions of government, education and economics.\nThe age of destruction is over, now is the time of construction!
translation: 在战争时保持强大固然重要，但和平时，通过建立政府机构，经济机构及教育机构，以此建立一个稳固的社会。\n毁灭时代已经过去，现在是建设的时间了！

original: Our clan has been assigned the post of Kanto Kanrei, the deputy of Kamakura Kubo, governor of Eastern Japan. Our task is to help the Kubo to rule this wild region, but also quelling any inclination he might have to revolt against the Shogunate.
translation: 我们的氏族被指派为关东管领，统治日本东部的镰仓公方的副手。我们的任务就是帮助公方统治这个狂野的地区，同时平息任何有反对幕府倾向的势力。
山内家和扇谷家开枝散叶

original: The Houses of the Yamanouchi and Ogigayatsu are two important branches of the Uesugi family and its domain. As long as the both lines are friendly, our clan will remain strong. We must do all we can to avoid enmity between our brothers.
translation: 山内家族和扇谷家族是上杉家的两个重要分支及势力范围。只要这两家是友好的，家族就能保持强盛。我们一定要尽全力避免兄弟阋墙。

original: Kamakura is the most important political city in Kanto region. It is also the central office of the former Shogunate, and the city has not lost political function completely ever since. As the protectors of Kamakura we are seen as the rulers of Kanto. Let us utilize this position to its fullest to attract warriors to our cause.
translation: 镰仓是关东地区最重要的政治中心。它也是战国前期的统治重心，并且这座城市从未丧失其政治影响力。作为镰仓的保护者，我们被视作关东的统治者。让我们充分利用这个地位，把军队吸引到我们的信念之旗下。

original: Our clan has fostered a spirit of courage and justice, that would make enemies fear us in the battlefield. We must let the world know about the strength of our clan leaders. Everyone will fear and respect the Dragon of Echigo.
translation: 我们家族已经培养出了勇敢正直的精神，这将会让敌人在战场上闻风丧胆。我们一定要让世界知道家族领袖的强大。每个人都将会对越后之龙既畏且敬。

original: The Nokizaru Ninja operate from within our lands and are loyal to our cause. They may not be the most famous group in Japan but there is little doubt in their ability. Let us integrate the covert operations of the Nokizaru in our plans and military operations whenever we can, they are eager to carry out the will of our Lord.
translation: 轩辕忍者在我们领地上行动并且忠诚于我们的事业。他们也许不是日本最著名的团体，但是没有人质疑他们的能力。不论任何时候，让我们整合计划里轩辕众的隐秘行为和军事行动，轩辕众渴望执行我们领主的意志。

original: Ever since the days of the Kamakura Bakufu our northern lands have been home to the 'Agakita Shu' or Northern Agano Band. A group of very independent-minded local strongmen from clans all over Japan. They may not be the easiest to deal with at all times but this region is a good breeding ground for skilled samurai.
translation: 自从镰仓幕府北方的土地成为“扬北众”或者北阿贺野部的家园以来，这群来自全日本宗族，很具有独立思想的当地强人也许不是在所有时候都容易相处，但这个地区是一个培养技艺高超武士的好地方。

original:
The time has come for reform and in order to reform our society we must stay true to the 'Denoku no Ji' - the way of the monarch.

'1.Our county is to be inherited from fathers to sons. Nothing should be considered as the property of monarchs.
2. Our people also belong to the country. They are not the estate of monarchs.
3.Monarchs are here to serve the country and the people, not vice versa'.
translation: 改革的时代来临，为了改革我们的社会，我们一定要忠于“传国之辞”——君王的道路。我们的郡县将会实施父子继承制。没有东西会被认为是君主的财产。我们的人民也属于国家。他们不是君主的财产。君主在这里服务国家和人民，并不是反之亦然。

original: We are descendants of the Nitta clan, the biggest rival of the old Ashikaga family. To some this would be a proof of our loyalty while to others this makes us a natural opposition candidate. We must cleverly utilize this lineage in the many political overtures of this age.
translation: 我们是新田氏——历史悠久的足利家族最大的对手——的后裔。对一些人来说，这证明了我们的忠诚，而其他人来说，这让我们成为了天然的反对者候选人。我们一定要明智地在这个政治派系众多的时代利用好这一血统。

original: At the zenith in the past, our clan leader was assigned to the Shugo of 11 provinces, almost 1/6 of Japan! We must recover our provinces and go on to then fulfill the ultimate political goal of our ancestors!
translation: 在过去的巅峰岁月，我们家族的领袖曾被委派管理11个州，几乎是六分之一个日本！我们一定会巩固我们的领地，并且继续实践我们祖先的最终政治目标！

original: As many of the other Shugo clans squabble within themselves over who is the rightful heir to whom, they turn to us to help mediate their disputes. In doing so we can gain more allies and contacts, not to mention destabilize our rivals.
translation: 因为许多守护家族在他们自己内部争吵关于谁是谁的合法继承人，他们向我们寻求帮助来调解争议。这样做可以让我们收获更多的盟友和联系人，更不必说动摇我们的对手。

original: Let us forge a great western army to unite the squabbling states of Japan. Bravery and skillful generals with well-trained soldiers will easily force the easterners on their knees!
translation: 让我们打造出一支强大的西军来团结混乱的日本。英勇无畏而且战术高超的将军们配合训练精良的士兵，可以轻易地让东军屈膝投降。

original: Though a purely symbolic victory, our successful acquisition of the Hosokawa family shrine for our own clan is a major boost to morale, and will serve to remind our family of what we can achieve when unified.
translation: 尽管只是一场纯粹象征意义上的胜利，但是我们我们自己的家族，对细川家圣地的成功夺取极大地鼓舞了士气，这将会提醒我们的家族，当团结起来的时候，我们能够取得什么样的成功。
山名家分支的重新统一

original: As Japan enters into a new period, we can no longer uphold our old methods of governance. The branches of our family that have been assigned to other provinces have grown too autonomous and rebellious. We must reunite them by whatever means possible and bring order to our realm!
translation: 当日本进入一个新时期时，我们不再赞同陈旧的统治策略。我们家族中被委托管理其它州的分支已经成长得过于自治和难以控制。我们必须通过任何可能的手段重新团结他们，给我们的国家带来秩序！

original: Our homelands Tajima and Inaba are mountainous and isolated. Fortunately this also means that they will be hard to reach for any would-be conqueror. Let us build our defenses around the natural strengths of our geography and make any attacker regret ever turning their greedy eyes to our possessions.
translation: 我们的家乡但马国和因幡国山地广布而且孤立。幸运的是，这意味着它们对我们潜在的敌人来说易守难攻。让我们在天然的地理优势周围建立防御措施，让任何入侵者后悔把他们贪婪的目光投向我们。

original: As an honorable clan dating back to the early Kamakura period, we have a strong claim to rule the entire Oshu province. Fortunately for us, what land Oshu exactly covers is not well defined.
translation: 作为一个可以追溯到早期镰仓幕府时代的荣耀家族，我们对统治整个奥州有着强有力的宣称。对我们来说幸运的是，奥州确切的覆盖范围并没有被明确定义。

original: Sometimes, bringing over clans into our family is easier through marriage and adoption instead of through spears and swords. Marrying off our daughters and offering our spare sons up for adoption will ensure we can quietly expand without garnering too much attention.
translation: 有时候，通过联姻和收养能够比战争更容易带来家族的壮大。把女儿们嫁出去和让儿子们被收养将会确保我们能够安静地扩张，不会引起太多注意。

original: Although our domain is far from Kyoto, we are eager for the latest cultural trends in the Imperial Capital. A recent movement is Renga, a form of collaborative poetry which requires creators to master stanzas and other rules of Japanese literature. Training this can refresh our thought, making them ready for new innovations.
translation: 虽然我们的领地离京都很远，但是我们渴求帝国首都的最新文化潮流。一个最近的成果是连歌，组诗的一种形式，要求创作者精通诗节和其他日本文学的规则。练习连歌可以更新我们的思维，让我们为新的改革做好准备。

original: We must actively seek out ways to incorporate western weapons in our army. Mobile, arquebus-armed units should make up the elite corps of our army, allowing us to bring new weapons and techniques to where they are needed the most. Through modern firepower we will dominate the battlefield.
translation: 我们一定要积极地寻求在军队中学习西方武器。机动部队，火绳枪部队单位应该成为我们军队的中坚力量，允许我们能够把武器和科技带到最需要的地方。通过现代火力，我们将会主宰战场。

original: Commissioning a series of ships built in the Western style to carry our trade across the seas will put us in a good position to dominate the markets and better direct the flow of goods.
translation: 委托制作一系列西方式舰船在海上装载我们的贸易货物将会为我们带来占领市场和更好地引导贸易流提供更好的位置。

original: We are excellently positioned to reach the lands of the westerners, not by going west, but by crossing the Pacific Ocean to our east. Let us seek out the homeland of the Nanban traders, seeking alliances, technology and more lucrative trade agreements.
translation: 我们成功地到达了西方人的土地，并不是上西天，而越过太平洋到我们的东方。让我们寻找到南蛮贸易者的故土，寻求盟友，科技和更有利可图的贸易协议。

original: Harsh weather and mountainous geography make Tohoku a poor region in the eyes of many. There is, however, great potential to improve upon our lands. By founding new towns, encouraging and protecting trade, building waterways and increase the cultivated land we can substantially improve our heartland. By abolishing stifling tolls and taxes we can also make our subjects wealthy and the region prosperous.
translation: 严酷的天气和多山的地形让东北地方成为一个很多人眼中的穷困地区。然而这里仍然有很大的潜力改良土地。通过建立新的城镇，鼓励和保护贸易，修建水渠和增加可种植土地，我们能够不断改善我们的心脏地带。

original: The history of the Shoni clan in Kyushu began when our leader was appointed as the vice minister of Dazai-fu in Chikuzen province. This institution is the diplomatic and military center of the region, and we traditionally govern Northern Kyushu as representative of the Emperors.
translation: 当我们的领袖被任命为筑前州太宰少贰时，九州少弐家的历史开始了。这个机构是该地区的外交和军事中心，按照惯例，我们作为天皇的代表管理北九州。

original: As a leading samurai family in Northern Kyushu, we have bravely fought against two Mongol invasions in the late 13th century. People are saying that Japanese gods saved us, but it was in fact our men who fought for Japan!\nShould the need arise we will once again rise to defend both Kyushu and the realm at large from outside invaders.
translation: 作为九州武士家族的领袖，我们在13世纪晚期曾两次英勇抗击蒙古入侵。人们传说是日本的神灵拯救了我们，但是拯救我们的其实是为日本而战的人民！当需要的时候，我们会再一次奋起，与外来入侵者斗争，保卫整个九州和王国。

original: One of our vassals, the So clan in Tsushima Island has rich experience of negotiations with Korea. In this way we have always been able to keep a channel open towards the outside, even in times when the official relations have been forbidden.
translation: 我们的一个封臣，对马岛的宗氏，有着和朝鲜进行外交的丰富经验。这样我们总是能够保持海峡向外畅通，甚至是在官方交流被禁止时。

original: Northern Kyushu is full of good ports for foreign trade, but Nagasaki in Hizen province is arguably the best place of them all. Let us make this city our main gate towards the West.
translation: 北九州拥有大量对外贸易的优良港口，但是肥前的长崎可能是它们中最好的。让我们使这个城市成为我们通往西方的正门。

original: The lands of Hizen are home to many fierce warriors. Some, like the leader of the Ryuzoji family, have earned epithets for their prowess. Let us ensure that men of quality can always rise in our ranks and that we make the most of the fierce reputation of our men.
translation: 肥前的土地是众多勇猛战士的家乡。有些人，像龙造寺康家的领袖，因为他们的勇猛而赢得了称号。

original: In these trying times it is important to have a guiding principle. Hagakure is a theory about Bushido which focuses on how we should live and die.
translation: 在这些尝试改革的岁月里，有一个纲领性原则是很重要的。叶隐是武士道中的一套关于我们如何生存与死去的理论。

original: Famines, diseases and other natural disasters remain a constant threat to our economy and political stability. Within our realm the Nabeshima family have pioneered a way to counter these issues by introducing new technologies from the West. We would be wise to learn from them and integrate new technology and methodology to safeguard our realm for the times to come.
translation: 饥荒、疾病与其他自然灾害持续不断地威胁着我们的经济和政治稳定。在我们领地上的锅岛家倡导一种通过引介西方科技来解决问题的方法。我们应该理智地效仿他们，整合新的科学技术和方法论，在未来来临之时保卫我们的国家。

original: The Ogasawara clan belongs to an old sub-branch of the Genji and rules the Shinano province as its Shugo. This land is mountainous and unwelcoming to some. For our people, however, it has for a long time been an integrated part of their defense against outsiders.\nLet us take this experience with us wherever our armies go and always make sure we obtain good local information to make the most of the terrain in any region we do battle.
translation: 小笠原家属于源氏的一个古老分支，作为守护统治着信浓国。这片土地山地众多，不适于一些人生存。然而对于我们的人民来说，它作为一个防御外来者的整体已经很久了。不论任何时候军队出征，让我们记住这个经验并且确保我们取得了完备的当地信息，在战斗时最大程度地发挥地势的作用。

original: Suwa Taisha at Suwa Lake is one of the oldest shrines in Japan, and highly adored not only in Shinano. Its most important festival, Onbashira-matsuri, proves the bravery of our people as they travel the sacred logs from the mountain to the shrine.
translation: 诹访湖的诹访大社是日本最古老的圣地之一，不仅仅在信浓被狂热地崇拜。它最重要的节日，御柱祭，证明了我们人民的勇敢，他们需要把圣洁的原木从深山中运到圣地。

original: Horses in Kiso area are our unique friends. They aren't tall like the Arab horses and don't run quickly as the Mongol ones. What they do have is high stamina to survive in the high mountainous.
translation: 木曾地区的马是我们独一无二的伙伴。它们不像阿拉伯马一样高大，也不像蒙古马一样善于奔跑。他们真正拥有的是在深山中生存的顽强毅力。

original: Shinano province is divided into ten Kori, each ruled by an independent samurai family. We have to unite the lands of these disloyal lords to fully utilize their resources.
translation: 信浓国被划分为十个郡，每一个郡都由一个独立的武士家族统治。我们必须联合这些不忠诚的领主，最大程度地利用他们的资源。

original: Traditional styles have high value in our society. We have formalized the system of martial arts and etiquette. Our school of manners should be learned by every samurai.
translation: 我们社会上的传统习俗具有很高价值。我们已经拥有行之有效的军事艺术和礼仪规范系统。我们的行为规范教育应当被每一个武士学习。

original: The Central Mountain Route, 'Nakasendo' is one of the most important routes between central and eastern Japan. We must build towns, inns and castles along this mountainous route to tie the regions together.
translation: 中山道是日本中东部之间最重要的通道。我们一定要在山道上建立城镇，旅店和堡垒，将整片区域连接起来。

original: A great pilgrimage lies within our lands but time and wars have not been kind to its buildings and institutions. We must restore the temple and show our folks a proper and respectful attitude to the traditional Japanese religions.
translation: 一个伟大的朝圣之地坐落于我们的领地上，但是时间和战争破坏了它的建筑和体系。我们必须重建寺庙，向我们的民众展示一种对待传统日本宗教的合适且尊敬的态度。

original: There are many hostile and strong clans with brave warriors in our region. We must unite the petty lords of these lands and join their armies to ours!
translation: 我们的领地上存在许多敌对并强大，拥有英勇战士的部落。我们要团结这些土地上小规模的领主，让他们的军队加入我们！

original: The Otomo clan are the Shugo of Bungo since the Kamakura era. These lands are known for their highly fertile grounds and the rich harvests of this region allow us to feed larger armies than many other Daimyo.
translation: 自从镰仓时代以来，大友家就是丰后守护。这片领地因其非常肥沃的土地，丰饶的产量而闻名，这允许我们能够比其他大名养活更多的军队。

original: We have many retainers from the sub-branches of our clan and other old and independent-minded families. While they are in some ways an independent-minded group they still show the utmost devotion to our clan and a zeal to see it prosper. Truly we are blessed to have such loyal followers.
translation: 我们在家族分支和其他老牌独立家族有众多家臣。他们在一定程度上是有独立意识的团体同时，也对我们家族有很大贡献，热心于我们家族的繁荣。我们真诚地祈祷拥有这样的追随者。

original: Others may shun the foreigners as barbarians, but we recognize the benefits and advantages of trade with them. Let it be known that they will always be welcome in our ports, and we will be able to expand our trade network further than our rivals.
translation: 他国可能避南蛮而不及，但我们晓得与他们贸易的好处。让他们知道，我们的港口随时欢迎他们。这样，我们就可扩张贸易网超越竞争对手。

original: Our increasing interactions with the foreigners have drawn the interest of many within our clan towards the Christian faith. The Christians have many powerful protectors among our lords and vassals, and few are as zealous as recent converts. Let us make good use of these Christian converts, regardless of which route our own realm takes and use their influence and their zeal to further our case.
translation: 随着与南蛮交往的加深，家族中许多人开始对基督信仰感兴趣。我们的领主及封臣中有许多有力的基督教保护人，其中少数甚至有如刚受洗般狂热。无论我国要采取何种路线，都让我们好好利用这些新入基督徒及其热忱，为我所用。

original: As we further strengthen our ties with the west, many have suggested that we do something unheard of and send an embassy to learn more about our new friends, their technology, ideas, and ways of life, and hopefully find new allies as well.\nWe must never balk at foreign customs or ideas, for many can be put to good use in our own homeland.
translation: 随着我们与西方联系的加深，很多人认为要做一些前所未有之事，即派遣使节以对我们的新朋友加深了解，了解他们的技术、思想及生活方式，同时寄望于寻找新盟友。\n我们从未拒绝异国习俗及思想，许多这些都可有益于我国。

original: A great cannon has made its way into our arsenal, and its effects are devastating; capable of reducing entire fortifications and formations within a few shots. These weapons have quickly become known as 'Kunikuzushi', destroyer of provinces, and we should cast as many of them as we can in order to triumph in the field of battle.
translation: 一种强力的火炮进入了我们的武库，其威力无匹。能在数炮之内攻陷一座堡垒。此种大炮很快被称作“国崩”。为在战场上取得胜利，我们应当多铸几门这种大炮。

original: Our chronicle says we are descendants of Prince Imseong of the ancient kingdom Baekje in Korean Peninsula. This legend allows us a prestigious position in East Asia.
translation: 谱牒记载我等乃古朝鲜半岛百济国琳圣太子之苗裔。此等传奇使我等于东亚具有显赫地位。

original: Our geographic position has left us as the most active Daimyo for trading with Korea. Ginseong and other exotic goods are practically monopolized by our merchants. We must do what we can to retain this favorable position and leverage it to out-compete any upstart that would challenge us.
translation: 我们的地理位置使得我们是与朝鲜贸易中最为活跃的大名。朝鲜人参和其它异国商品实际均掌于我们的商人之手。

original: In order to retain good relations with China and Korea for our traders, we need to patrol East China Sea constantly. As long as pirates and smugglers are common in these waters the foreigners will not trust us and may act against us. If we help them on the other hand we stand to gain favors, titles and prestige at the foreign courts.
translation: 为保持我国商人对华及对朝贸易，我们必须常年在中国东海上巡逻。只要这些海寇及走私者还在该处海域活动，别国人就不会信任我们，甚至可能会对我等采取敌对行动。但如果我们能在这点上帮助他们，我们就能从别国朝堂获得支持、头衔及名望。

original: Hakata has been a key trade port in Western Japan since the Heian period. Merchants of this city sail to both Korea and China, as well as far beyond the South China Sea and even South East Asia. We must make good use of their commercial network in order to expand our influence over the trade networks of East Asia.
translation: 自平安时代以来，博多便是西日本的一处关键贸易港。该处的商人航至朝鲜、中国及南海之外，以至东南亚。我们应当好好利用他们的贸易网络，来增强我们在东亚贸易网上的影响力。

original: The genealogy says that the ancestors of the Utsunomiya clan were originally members of the Fujiwara family in Kyoto. This kinship to such an ancient and revered family is one we can still use in the form of diplomatic connections with the Imperial Court and the other clans.
translation: 家系谱称宇都宫氏之祖原为京都藤原氏。与如此古老显赫之氏族有血缘关系，使得我们能在与天皇朝廷及其他氏族的交往上派上用场。

original: Shimotsuke was once the home of Nasu no Yoichi, who was the most epic archer in the old Genpei War. To this day the warriors of Shimotsuke learn his school of archery.
translation: 下野国曾为那须与一之故乡，他是古代源平争乱中最为传奇的弓手。如今，下野国的武士均在他的弓道场练习弓术。

original: Shirakawa no Seki is a major barrier of Tokaido. Let us use this gate to the Tohoku region as a check point for the control of trade goods and people alike.
translation: 白河关为东海道之要隘。利用这座通往东北之大门，我等可控制财货贸易及其百姓。

original: The family members of the Utsunomiya have branches almost everywhere in Japan. Some of them are more powerful than others and in Western Japan their insight into naval warfare can benefit the main branch of the clan.
translation: 宇都宫氏支系几乎遍布全日本。其中有些支流较它枝为强，嫡家可从西日本庶流对于水战的洞见中获益。

original: Other clans such as the Oyama have put our rule over Shimotsuke to question over the years. We must break these groups and make these old enemies into loyal vassals. Once they have surrendered we will be more powerful united than we have ever been divided.
translation: 其他家族，如小山氏，常年质疑我家在下野国的统治。我们应当打破这群乌合，使这些旧日反对者成为忠诚的封臣。一旦他们臣服，我们就会获得比分裂更强的统一。
