original: As one of the oldest clans in Kanto, we have a keen insight of politics in this region and worked as mediator between different factions many times. In this way, we also know how to expand our territory effectively without provoking the hate and fear of others...
translation: 作为关东最古老的氏族之一，我们在该地政治上有着深刻洞见，常年作为诸派别间的调停者。如此，我们亦知晓如何有效扩张领地而不被他人憎恨提防。

original: Since the ancient era, Mount Nikko has been a famous holy site for Shugendo, the mountain asceticism that mixes Shinto and Buddhism. Even the mightiest Shogun must love this mountain and desire to build a private shrine here.
translation: 古来日光山便是修验道之圣地，此种山间苦修混合了神道及佛教。即便是权势最盛的将军也喜爱此山并在此修建了私人神社。

original: Trade has been a profitable enterprise for our clan. But we must never stop looking for more opportunities to expand the reach of our merchants. If it means going through the proper channels and paying the necessary tribute that is what we must do. On the other hand, if what is required is underhand diplomacy and dynamic decision-making, then we must not hesitate to take action either. Anything that gives us a favorable position in new markets must be considered!
translation: 贸易曾是我们一族一项有利可图的事业。但我们从未停止在寻找扩张商贸范围的机会。如果过河过海要缴必要的税负，那我们就一定会给。但如果有必要使用阴谋，我们也会毫不犹豫地去做。对我们在新市场上位置有利的事情我们就一定会去考虑！

original: As our trade network begins to expand, we come in contact with more foreigners and more faiths. Regardless of what they believe, their coin is good, and so we should be as open to their ideas as we need to secure their commerce.
translation: 随着贸易网扩展，我们接触到了越来越多的外国人及其宗教。无论他们有何种信仰，他们的金币都是顶呱呱的，只要需要和他们贸易，我们就要对他们的思想保持开放。

original: Within our clan, our retainers are divided between two groups; administrators and militarists. Both have their uses, but we should be careful to not favor one side too much to keep both under control. This way we can reap the benefits of their healthy competition.
translation: 我们家族内部，家臣分为了两个派阀：武断派和文治派。两党均有其用，但我们要注意不要太过偏党其中一派，要同时统御两派。只有如此才能从他们的良性竞争中获益。

original: We have been recognized as the head of all the Minamoto branches and all samurai in Japan after the line of Minamoto Yoritomo went extinct. Leadership of our clan comes with high expectations of martial prowess and success in the field of battle will be seen to confirm our worth.
translation: 自源赖朝血裔绝嗣，我们便成了源氏诸支和所有武士的中流砥柱。我们家族的栋梁地位来自对英勇战技和战场上胜利的期望，我们会不负众望。

original: When the Kamakura Shogunate fell we kept the Emperor and the Imperial Court safe. This has afforded us a position at the forefront of all clans in Japan, as the true protector of the Empire and the courtly traditions.
translation: 镰仓幕府失坠之时，我们确保了天皇和朝廷的安全。这使我们在日本诸大名中拔得头筹，是皇国和传统的真正栋梁。

original: We must strengthen the officials of the empire such as the Bugyoshu Magistrates and the Hokoshu Commanders, at the expense of the strong-willed and often rebellious Daimyos that have come to dominate the realm. A strong bureaucracy will sometimes be the only thing that stands between us and an open civil war.
translation: 我们必须强化帝国的官僚，如奉行众的文官及奉公众的武官，以统治该地的桀骜不驯的大名利益为代价。强力的官僚体系将是我们和露骨内战之间的唯一屏障。

original: Shugo daimyo are important vassals for the Shogunate, but they have also proven to be both too independent and disloyal. We must reform this system and bring them all more strongly under our control.
translation: 守护大名是幕府的重要封臣，但他们太过独立不忠。我们必须改革体制，把他们牢牢控制在手中。

original: As the head of the Genji in Mino, we have led other local samurai since the 12th century. Our domain occupies a strategic position from which to control the neighboring regions.
translation: 作为美浓源氏的首领，自世纪以来我们便领导着当地其他武士。我们的领地都是战略要津，能够控制邻近地区。

original: Ranjatai is considered an Imperial treasure and is normally locked away in the Todai-ji Temple. Only very limited people are allowed by the Emperor to have a small piece of this fragrant agarwood, and our clan leader belongs to this small circle. An honor that reflects on the entire clan.
translation: 兰奢待平时锁在东大寺，是皇室御宝。只有极少数人能受天皇御赐一小片此等香木。我家当主便是其中一人。全家族都与有荣焉。

original: Powerful clans in Mino are gathering under our Kikyo-mon to unite against foreign invasions. Internal harmony is one of the most important things for defending home!
translation: 美浓的有力家族齐聚在桔梗文下，抗击外敌侵扰。保卫家园最重要的便是内部和谐！

original: Just like Inabayama castle, allows us to control the mountain routes of Mino we must strive to establish powerful castles in the provinces we conquer so that we will always have the strategic and tactical advantage.
translation: 如稻叶山城使我们能控制美浓的山路一样，我们要奋力在新征服的领地上建设更多坚城，使得我们一直处于战略及战术优势。

original: We have traditionally been entrusted to police the estates of aristocrats in Kyoto. In these times of strife however, securing the revenue of these families can be quite hard. As we are the ones bleeding to protect these estates it is only right that we also take the direct ownership of them.
translation: 传统上我们受托监管京都公卿的庄园。但处此战国之世，保障这些贵族的收益十分困难。既然我们为保护这些庄园流过血，我们就有权直接拥有这些庄园。

original: We are at the dawn of an era where innovation must be valued higher than tradition. Some have realized this long ago while others are reluctant to follow. Let us emulate those that lead the way, such as the Saito family, instead of being left hopelessly behind.
translation: 我们处在新时代的拂晓，这个时代革新将比传统更受重视。有些人早便意识到了这点，但其他人却还抱残守缺。让我们迎头赶上先行者，如斋藤家，而不是落在后面被取代。

original: In our home province the three big rivers of Kiso, Nagara and Ibi, often cause serious floods in our rice fields. We should control such streams and increase the fertility of our lands in all provinces under our rule.
translation: 我们的本土有三条大河，木曾川、长良川和揖斐川，三者经常在我们的稻田上泛滥。我们应该控制此类河川，增强我们控制下所有土地的肥力。

original: We are one of the oldest Genji in Kanto region, and have fought for clan's glory in Eastern Japan even before Minamoto no Yoritomo founded the Kamakura Shogunate.
translation: 我们是关东最古老的源氏之一，在源赖朝镰仓开幕之前，就已在东国为一族荣誉而战了。

original: Although we are appointed to the Shugo of Hitachi, local lords have organized an Ikki coalition against us. We need to remind them who is the legitimate ruler of this land.
translation: 虽然我们被任为常陆守护，当地领主却组成联盟发起一揆反对我们。我们当提醒他们谁才是当地的合法统治者。

original: Kashima Jingu is one of three most important shrines in Kanto. This shrine worships Takemikazuchi who is the god of thunder and swords, and also known as the patron of Sumo wrestling. The custodianship of this shrine strengthens the resolve of our armies.
translation: 鹿岛神宫是东国三社之一。祭奉武甕槌大神，是雷与剑之神，同时亦以相扑保护神闻名。监领该神宫能增强我军士气。

original: We have elected to build our centers of administration where they have the best access to cities and trade routes. We would rather build our government around political and economic centers than strong fortresses.
translation: 我们选择在舟车辐辏之地建立行政中心。我们更偏爱在政治经济中心建立政府，而不是在高城深垒中。

original: Our clan is known to highly respect faith, right and virtue. While this can lead to some difficulty as we leave ourselves open to scheming, it is an attitude that earns us the respect and loyalty of many.
translation: 我等一族在信仰、正直及美德上素有高名。虽然这使我们在采取阴谋手段上束手束脚，但却可让我们获取许多人的尊重和忠诚。

original: Be it against the Hojo, Date or any other intruder in Kanto or Tohoku, we have always done a good job of presenting ourselves as a reasonable third party for other clans to attach themselves to in order to protect themselves from invaders. This tradition of eastern coalitions will serve us well as long as we make sure that the clans that rely on us never have to worry about protection.
translation: 为应对关东或东北的北条、伊达等入侵者，我们一直作为可接受的第三方势力表现良好，让其他家族为自保聚合在我们旗下。只要确保这些家族在我们保护下无可担心，这套东国联合的传统就可一直有益于我们。

original: Our system of administration is rather unique and ingenious. Instead of allowing our house to be continually caught up in succession disputes, we avoid them by establishing territorial rule for cadet branches on the stipulation of alternating rule. This allows us to exert effective control over our domain while avoiding unnecessary revolts.
translation: 我们的行政系统有些独特及精巧。为防止家族陷于继承争议，我们采用建立分家封地和主家共同统治的制度。这使得我们在领土上进行有效统治，同时避免不必要的争乱。

original: Our fief Akita in Northern Dewa province was ancient frontal zone of Japan toward northern 'barbarians'. The border of Japan has expanded far into the North, but the spirit of our ancestors still lives in our blood.
translation: 位于出羽国北部的秋田藩曾是我们日本与北方虾夷的边界区。现在日本的国界已向极北扩张，但我们的血液中仍流淌着先辈所传的大和魂。

original: We are among the first Japanese who founded trade posts in Hokkaido. From the Ainu we can gain access to exotic goods but also to the knowledge they gain through their ties to continental Asia.
translation: 我们是日本各国中第一批在北海道设贸易站的。我们可以从虾夷人手中换取异国货物，也可以从他们口中得知关于亚洲大陆的新奇信息。

original: Due to settling some of our clan members far away we have need of developing quick and safe means of communication. We must invest in ways to close the distance between the branches of our clan so that we can be sure to always act as one.
translation: 我们的氏族分居各地，相互远离，所以我们需要开发一种安全而快捷的交流方式。我们必须投资开发一种方法，让各氏族联系更为紧密，习俗始终如一。

original: Our settlements in Hokkaido have proven useful but we would stand more to gain from actively trying to monopolize all northern trade. Let us ensure we have merchants and trade posts in every important port of northern Japan!
translation: 我们在北海道的定居店已证明对贸易帮助极大，但我们还需要建立更多定居点，才能确保对北方贸易的有力垄断。让北日本的每个重要商港都有我们的商人与贸易站吧！

original: Our experience with our unruly and independent-minded Ainu subjects have made us well equipped to handle the integration of foreign cultures. We must ensure that regardless of their origin all our subjects are always clear on who the ruling partner in our relationship is.
translation: 我们对化外之民，心有反骨的阿伊努人附庸的统治经验让我们在整合异国文化时得心应手。我们必须让任何一个附庸国都明白到底谁才是老大。

original: In the old days, our clan leaders would introduce themselves as the Shogun of Oshu. With the fall of yet another Shogun in Kyoto, this claim is once again remembered. Let us ensure that we are seen as the supreme power of the north by all means available.
translation: 很久以前，我们的氏族领袖会自称为奥州的幕府将军。随着京都又一个幕府政权的倒台，奥州的宣称又被再一次提起。让我们确保自己在北方的霸权状态吧。

original: We live in a polygamous society, but even so bad health and other unfavorable events can sometimes threaten our line of succession. Introducing an adoption system into the clan law would secure the seamless transition of power between our clan leaders.
translation: 我们虽然生活在一个一夫多妻制的社会，但疾病与不测仍会威胁到继承的进行。把养子制纳入氏族法中将确保氏族首领能顺利地完成权利交接。

original: The Chiba clan is an old branch of the Heishi (Taira) from the late Heian period. This clan is recognized as one of the eight mighty factions in the Kanto region and gives us more power and influence than our political situation would otherwise indicate.
translation: 千叶氏族是平安时代旧平氏家的一支。千叶氏族被认为是强大的关东八家的一家，这给予了我们更多的政治力量与影响力，不过我们的政治地位也受关东八家所挤压。

original: Taira no Masakado, a great warrior and close kinsman of our clan in the ancient era, once tried to become the Emperor of Eastern Japan. Masakado couldn't fulfill his ambition unfortunately, but his dream to create a new country for samurai should be our guide at all times.
translation: 平将门，是我们家族古代的一位伟大武士，曾试图成为整个东日本的天皇。平将门已无法实现他的野望，但他建立武士之国的梦想仍将指引我们奋勇向前。

original: The Kamakura Kubo, the highest deputy of the Ashikaga Shogunate in Kanto region, lost his power during the recent civil wars. However, his political influence has still some importance. We should declare our intention to help the Kubo and use his prestige for our own expansion!
translation: 镰仓公方，足利幕府在关东的最高副手，在最近的内战中失势。然而他的政治影响力仍举足轻重。我们应该主动请战，帮助公方，并利用他的威望来实现我们的征服野望。

original: We are not only brave soldiers, but also men of sophistication and culture. The poet meetings at our castle Moto-Sakura can help us to investigate the spirit of logic and harmony.
translation: 我们不仅是勇武的战士，也是有修养而通雅趣的文人。在佐仓城的诗会能让我们体悟和谐，心存智理。

original: Katori Jingu in Shimousa province worships a god for the Japanese warriors of the ancient Ezo conquests. Thus, this shrine is also adored by many masters who belong to the Katori School of martial arts. We should exploit this fact for the betterment of our own samurai.
translation: 坐落于下总国的香取神宫供奉着武士们对古虾夷地征服战争中的神灵。神宫同时也被香取道场的师傅们所钟爱。我们应该扩建神宫，改善武士们的祭拜环境。

original: Large parts of our domains are marshy areas that would not support intensive agriculture. Recent technological developments in the field of irrigation however, allow us to cultivate new fields and to drain marshes when needed. Let us undertake a grand project of developing the lands under our control for the betterment of the economy.
translation: 我们的大部分领地都位于沼泽之上，无法精耕细作。最近的技术进步让我们能排干沼泽，开垦新地。我们应该订立一个开发土地的计划，由此扩大生产，改善经济。

original: Our long coast makes a weak navy dangerous. We need to reform our navy to ensure it is up to date and that our sailors are well trained. The seas shall be our strength instead of a constant threat to our power.
translation: 我们有绵延的海岸线要防卫，这让我们的小型海军捉襟见肘。所以必须要改造我们的海军，让舰只更新换代，让海员训练有素。我们要让海洋成为我们力量的一部分，而不是让海洋成为我们发展的威胁与掣肘。

original: Since the ancient era, men of Satsuma province were known as brave soldiers. We also respect this tradition, and military training is actually an important part of our daily life.
translation: 自古代以来，萨摩国的人们就是有名的武士。我们也将遵照这一传统，把军事训练贯彻到日常生活中去。

original: The Satsunan School was originally a place for the sons of nobility to be taught the tenets of Neo-Confucianism. In time it has extended itself to teaching proper conduct both on and off the field, as well as the basics in the arts of chivalry. Our continued patronage of this school will ensure we have a large pool of well-educated and disciplined samurai to bring our domain to glory.
translation: 萨南学派曾是贵族子女们学习儒家思想的地方，现在也开始教授武学与武士道。我们对学校的不懈资助能确保我们始终有一批饱读诗书的文人与纪律严明的武士，他们的存在能保证我们的繁荣昌盛，长治久安。

original: We are the Shugo of three provinces (Satsuma, Osumi and Hyuga) in Southern Kyushu but our political influence over this realm is de facto very weak. Let us reunite what civil war has torn apart and recreate a strong Kyushu realm.
translation: 我们是三国（萨摩国、大隅国、日向国）在北九州的守护者，但我们在这个地区实际的政治影响非常弱。让我们重统内战而分裂的三国，重现九州盛世。

original: Tsurinobuse, 'lure and ambush', is our most effective tactic which enables us to beat outnumbering enemies. We must make this a central tactic of our armies and surprise the dull-minded commanders of other clans.
translation: 钓野伏战法，即引诱敌人上钩，再埋伏击之。这是我们最有效的战法，往往能以少胜多。我们必须让这个战法成为我们部队的核心战术，給其他氏族愚蠢的指挥官们一个惊喜。

original: The westerners who first landed on Tanegashima Island brought new and interesting weapons with them. Arquebuses such as those are becoming an increasingly common sight all over Japan but nowhere have they been available for as long as here.
translation: 登陆种子岛的西人也带来了新奇的武器。铁炮这样的武器将在日本变得越来越常见，但唯有这里才是铁炮的起源之地。

original: Ryukyu has a vital role in the international trade in the East China Sea, but their golden age has come and gone. We should strive to learn from their success and their mistakes and secure a similar position for ourselves.
translation: 琉球一直是东亚海域必不可少的贸易中枢，但他们的黄金时代早已过去。我们应该努力学习他们的兴衰功过，让处于相同贸易地位的我们能一直繁荣下去。

original: Thanks to frequent and early contact with the western countries, we have learned a lot about foreign technologies and ideas. Based on these we can carry out reforms in economy, industry and education to help us gain an edge over other Japanese clans.
translation: 由于最近与西方诸国的频繁接触，我们学习到了许多西方的科技与理念。我们能以此改造经济，生产与教育，让我们在日本各氏族间取得领先地位。

original: Our ancestors helped Minamoto no Yoritomo during the foundation of the Kamakura Shogunate. As the reward of this contribution, we were ranked as his Gokenin and got awarded the fief in the Hyuga province. This is an honor few families in Kyushu enjoy.
translation: 我们的先辈帮助源赖朝建立起了镰仓幕府。作为回报，幕府授予了我们“御家人”的称号，并让我们统领日向国。九州少有氏族能获此殊荣。

original: Not all families in our lands are our ardent supporters. The Tsuchimochi are powerful and still retain their independence. We must secure their support and add their power to our own if we are to dominate the Japanese battlefields.
translation: 并非所有家族都对我们忠心耿耿。土持氏实力雄厚，又保持独立。如果我们想在日本的战场中驰骋制霸，就必须让土持氏效忠于我们。

original: According to Japanese mythology, our home is believed as the first place in Japan where the divine ancestors of the Japanese Emperors landed. The glorious conquest of the Imperial Family started in this land, and sets an excellent example for us to follow.
translation: 按日本古神话的描述，我们的家乡是日本天皇神降之地。天皇一族对此地的光荣征服我们仍铭记于心，这也将成为我们一族的崇高目标。

original: The Shugo government style is outdated and empowers weaklings simply based on their lineage! Let us do away with the pretense of being inferior to the Shugo and instead let our strength and ability speak for itself!
translation: 守护这种幕府职位早已落后于时代，他们都是些一脉相承的懦夫！我们应该摆脱这些卑庸的守护，用实力来证明自己！

original: In order to properly defend ourselves we must build a system of fortifications where each castle can always support the next. There can be no 'blind spot' in our defensive line!
translation: 我们需要建立一个城堡防卫体系，让每个城堡都能相互支援，这样才能妥善的保护好我们自己。我们的防御绝无死角！

original: Some of our family members have quite taken to the foreign Christian faith. We must of course make sure that this is harmless to traditional religions but as long as there is no harm to us there is no reason to disallow people to choose their own faith.
translation: 家族里的一些人对西方的基督教抱有好感，不过我们得先确保这个外来宗教对传统宗教无害。只要对我们没有妨碍，我们就没理由让他们选择自己的信仰。

original: The cedar of the large forests in our domain is of especially good quality. We should provide support for this industry to develop so that we can make use of the timber in our projects.
translation: 我们领土中的大片雪松质量极佳。我们应当支持对雪松的开发，最大限度地把这些上好的木板利用到我们的建设中去。

original: We are the Shugo of Tango, the gate of Kyoto in San'in-Do and a land of great economic importance.
translation: 我们是丹后国的守护，丹后国是京都在山阴道的门户，也是重要的经济枢纽。

original: The Isshiki clan is one of four powerful clans that are traditionally appointed to be the Chief of military and police in the samurai-Dokoro. It is thus our responsibility, and our privilege to keep the peace in Kyoto and other important areas.
translation: 一色氏族是被钦命为侍所别当，负责掌管军政警务的四大家族之一。保卫京都，加强卫戍是我们的天职。

original: Ama no Hashidate is a thin strip of land between the two sides of the Miyazu Bay. This is one of the three most scenic landscapes in Japan and many aristocrats visit our territory to see this wonder of nature. Famous poets have also praised its beauty and in doing so bring prestige to our name.
translation: 天之桥立是连接宫津湾两端的一片纤细沙州。被誉为日本三景之一，有许多王公贵族造访我国，只为看一眼这世间绝境，著名的诗人也在此落笔。这一切都给我们带来了大量的威望。

original: Our former possessions were lost due to the whims of hostile Shoguns. We still remember when our clan wielded considerable power in these lands however, and we must not give up our claim to all we once ruled.
translation: 我们因敌对幕府将军的佯动而失去了这片地区的统治权。但我们仍记得氏族先辈们对这片土地的辉煌统治，所以一定不能放弃这片故土。

original: One of our retainer clans have managed to get a firm grasp of how to best make use of firearms. Let us follow their lead and have our soldiers train with these new weapons and build further upon the tactics of the Inadome.
translation: 我们的一支仆从氏族掌握了使用火器的诀窍。就让他们以新式武器训练我们的武士，又以稻富流铁炮术进行长远建设吧。

original: It is our duty to maintain the roads of our domain and it is also in our interest to have ready access to the great cities of the realm. These routes will be used not only by traders and travellers, they will also ensure our troops can march quickly from one part of our realm to another.
translation: 我们有责任维护我们领国里的道路，而道路建设也有助于连系区域内的大城市。 不仅行商和旅者要使用这些道路，我们的部队也需要依靠这些部队在地区间快速移动。

original: We have several good natural harbors in our lands that up until now have remained undeveloped. Let us expand, fortify and improve on these locations so that new cities can grow along our coastline.
translation: 我们的国土上有许多优良的天然港口，但目前还没完全开发。让我们扩建这些港口，为其增设防御，改善基础建设，这样新的城镇就会在海岸线上茁壮地生长起来。

original: The Tsutsui clan was initially a commoner family, until the Kofukuji Temple appointed us to a rank of administrative monks. Our activities, however, are not limited to the religious sphere and we fight as bravely as any warriors.
translation: 筒井氏族最初只是平民家族，直到兴福寺任命我们为寺中的住职。但我们的行动绝不仅限于宗教领域，我们也会像勇武的武士一样去战斗。

original: Our defeat of the Ochi or Toichi clans in the Eikyo Civil War once established us as the leading clan in this area. The memory of this victory is still very much alive and people everywhere respect us for this great accomplishment.
translation: 在永享之乱中打败了越智氏和十市氏后，我们氏族一跃成为本地区最大的势力。我们的胜利仍记忆犹新，而各地的人们也都为我们的壮举敬佩有加。

original: Kasuga Jinja at the foot of Mikasa Mountain has stood for centuries and is often patronized by both Emperors and the noblest aristocrats. The custody of this complex brings great honor and prestige to our clan.
translation: 三笠山下屹立百年的春日神社，常有天皇与贵族来贡献香火。对神社的供奉给我们氏族带来了无匹的威望。

original: Our home is landlocked and mountainous. This has made us used to fight in circumstances where others would be hesitant to go and over time our armies have grown more resilient to harsh terrain than those of other Daimyo.
translation: 我们的领国身处内陆，四面环山，易守难攻。这让我们的部队灵活机动，比其他大名的部队更适应山地作战。

original: Centuries ago Nara was named the southern capital of Japan and to this day it is home to many prestigious temples and shrines. While Kyoto is now the unquestioned capital of the realm Nara remains a city of political and economic importance and it lends a credence and legitimacy to our rule that other Daimyo can but dream of.
translation: 几百年前，奈良曾是日本在南方的首都，而它现在成了诸多久负盛名的寺庙与神社的家园。虽然京都现在毫无疑问是日本的唯一首都，但奈良仍是南方经济与政治的核心。这给予了我们统治的合法性，而其他大名只能干瞪眼。

original: We must remain level-headed and observe the conflicts of our many neighbors rather than get involved at first opportunity. Through careful maneuvering we can ensure that we will survive and slowly expand in these dangerous political times.
translation: 我们必须保持清醒的头脑，对邻国间的冲突保持关注而非第一时间介入。通过谨慎的操作，在这些危险的政治时刻我们可以确保生存并缓慢扩张。

original: While it is ancient, the Kofukuji Temple in our lands has functioned as a cultural and innovative center for centuries. By respecting tradition while also being open to how to integrate new ideas we can bring our Clan to greatness.
translation: 古老的兴福寺在过去数个世纪中一直作为我们土地上的文化与革新中心。尊重传统，同时对整合新理念保持开放的态度，我们可以将我们的家族带向辉煌。

original: Unlike other powerful clans in Kyushu, the Kikuchi family settled before the establishment of the Kamakura Shogunate. Other families come and go but we have lived, and will live on this island for all times.
translation: 与九州岛其他有权势的家族不同，菊池家族在镰仓幕府建立之前就已经在这里定居。其他家族起起落落，但我们将永远在这片岛屿上繁衍生息。

original: Our lands have been called the Lands of Fire since the age of mythology when Emperor Keiko saw unexplained spots of moving fire in what would become our realm. These strange fires can still be observed of the coast at times and has left our country with a mystical reputation.
translation: 自景行天皇看到无法解释的火焰移动，我们这块土地就被称为火焰之地。现在这些火焰仍能在海岸边时不时看到，给我们的国家蒙上了一层神秘的色彩。

original: Aso Jinja is the most important shrine in Higo province, and its grand priest has a position of great political influence. Integrating this office with our family through adoption would allow us to acquire significant religious authority.
translation: 阿苏神社是肥后最重要的神社，神社的大宫司有巨大的政治影响力。将这所神社整合进我们的家族将使我们获得相当的宗教权威。

original: Our rich lands are an attractive target for greedy neighbors. We must therefore consolidate and fortify our lands to make them as unappetizing as possible for foreign invaders.
translation: 贪婪的邻居对我们富饶的土地垂涎欲滴。因此我们必须巩固这些领土的统治，使外国入侵者尽可能敬而远之。

original: We have always been close to the influx of new traditions and religions and have over time learned the value of being tolerant of new customs. Let us attempt to find a way to harmonize new and old religions.
translation: 我们总是处于新传统与宗教思想汇入的风口浪尖，并逐渐学习到了容忍这些新习惯带来的价值。让我们尝试找到一种协调新旧宗教的方法。

original: We are fortunate to have as strong supporters as the Akahoshi, Jo and Kumabe families. We have perhaps been too lenient with them for this reason in the past however. We must abolish their individual power and influence so that they can become a more reliant and loyal part of our clan structure.
translation: 拥有像赤星氏、城氏和隈部氏这样强大的支持者对我们来说是幸运的，但可能因此对他们过于宽容了。我们必须废除他们的个体权力与影响力，这样他们才能成为我们家族结构中更值得信赖与忠诚的一部分。

original: The recent refurbishing and construction at Kumamoto castle sets the trend for how we should rule the cities under our control at all times. A strong and impenetrable castle provides the security needed for economic and political growth.
translation: 最近在熊本的城堡修缮与建筑工作确立了我们日后控制城市的方式。一座强固的城堡为经济、政治的发展提供了必须的保护。

original: Since the late Heian Period in 12th century, we have been the biggest naval power in the Seto Inland Sea, and our strong navy is how we acquired the title of Shugo of this province.
translation: 自平安时代晚期的12世纪起，我们就是濑户内海上最强的海军实力，并凭此获得了伊予守护的名号。

original: The war God of Oyamazumi Shrine is adored by many Japanese great samurai. As the defender of the shrine, we enjoy a reputation of resilience in battle attributed to divine patronage.
translation: 大山祗神社所供奉的战神被许多杰出的日本武士所崇拜。作为这座神社的守护者，在神的庇护下，我们在战斗中享有坚韧不屈的美誉。

original: We have a long history of internal conflicts and opposition to the clan leader. We must fully pacify and integrate the minor branches and strengthen our rule of the clan.
translation: 在悠久的家族历史中充斥着内部斗争与对家主的不满与敌对。我们必须安抚并整合这些小的分支从而加强我们对家族的统治。

original: The Seto Inland Sea has a special importance to the trade routes of Japan and maintaining naval dominance here can make or break our clan. We must ensure that we always have a strong navy to control maritime trade.
translation: 濑户内海对日本的贸易路线有特殊的重要性，能否在这里能保持海军的主导地位是我们家族的兴衰关键。我们必须确保时刻拥有一支强大的海军来控制海上贸易。

original: Our clan has been blessed by a strong and well-placed castle around which our administration, economy and military activities can be planned. This has allowed us to build an administrative structure in peace that we can make good use of far outside the borders of our original domain.
translation: 我们的家族被一处强固且地理位置优越的城堡所庇护，在这里我们计划政治、经济与军事活动，这使得我们可以在远离本土的地方和平建立统治秩序并对此加以利用。

original: Our grip of the internal trade is strong but there are fortunes to be made on the mainland as well. Let us pursue the wealth of continental Asia and grow rich from the opportunities that await on the other side of the sea.
translation: 我们对国内贸易保持控制，但大陆同样蕴藏着财富。让我们追求亚洲大陆的财富，从大海另一边的机会中攫取利益。

original: The Murakami Clan is well known as the Suigun, 'navy'. Let us integrate them fully in our own clan and send these fearsome privateers to rule the Seven Seas!
translation: 村上氏被称为Suigun，即“海军”。让我们将他们完全融入我们自己的家族，这些可怕的海盗会统治七海！

original: We are originally a cadet branch of the Kai-Genji, and our founder was given a fief in the Oshu province in the 12th century as a reward for loyal service to the Kamakura Shogunate. After that point we have grown accustomed to this region with its harsh winter, and know how to utilize these conditions in our strategies and tactics.
translation: 我们原本是甲斐源氏的一支旁系分支，在12世纪时家族建立者获得了一块奥州的封地，作为对镰仓幕府忠诚的嘉奖。在那之后，我们已经习惯了这个地区的严冬，并了解如何在我们的战略与战术中运用这些自然条件。

original: Mutsu has nine 'Gates' from where people in ancient days sent horses to Kyoto. The tradition of horse farming continues and is one we should cultivate as it allows us to raise cavalry more easily than many of our neighbors.
translation: 陆奥有九座“门”，即在古代进献马匹给京都的地方。养马的传统一直在延续，我们也应该大力扶持，这让我们可以比邻居们更容易地训练骑兵。

original: We know a good relationship with strong factions in Kyoto is vital to our clan and therefore we must go through great efforts to maintain close bonds with the Imperial Capital. Our distant home shall not make us isolated.
translation: 我们知道，与京都强大派系的友好关系对我们的家族至关重要，因此我们必须尽力维持与帝国首都的紧密联系。偏远的地理位置并不会导致我们的孤立。

original: We cannot allow rebellious retainers such as the Tsugaru or Kunohe to hold power in our lands. We must crush the aspirations of these families and once and for all establish who is the head of our clan.
translation: 我们无法容忍像津轻氏、九户氏这样叛逆的家臣继续在我们的领地上拥有权力。我们必须粉碎这些家族的野心，并一劳永逸地确立谁才是我们家族的领袖。

original: As our territory grows we must be open to adapt our administration when that is needed. As we have proven when we built our new capital at Morioka, laws, traditions and even the old capital itself must not be allowed to stand between us and our rise to power.
translation: 随着领土扩张，政治改革势在必行。在盛冈的新首都的建立已经证明，在通往崛起的道路上，法律、传统甚至旧首都本身都是必须消除的障碍。

original: Since the Heian period Chosonji has been the most important Oshu temple of the old Fujiwara clan. While their rapid fall teaches us the transience of human life, we shouldn't forget how brave and rich they could become when they ruled northern Japan. Let us make the rise of the Fujiwara our guide as we meet the challenging times of the Sengoku Jidai.
translation: 自平安时期，藤原氏的中尊寺就是奥州地区最重要的寺庙。虽然他们的迅速衰败告诉了我们人世的无常，但我们不应该忘记他们统治日本北部时的勇猛与富有。让我们面对战国时代的挑战时，以藤原氏的崛起作为向导。

original: Due to cold winds in the late autumn and heavy snows until the early spring, our people often suffer from severe famines and hunger. We must build reserves of food and look into how we can improve the lands under our control to counter future catastrophes.
translation: 由于秋季凛冽的寒风与直到早春的大学，我们的人民往往会遭受严重的饥荒。我们必须建立粮食储备，并研究如何改善这片我们治下的领土，以应对未来的灾难。

original: We are an honorable branch of Genji in Kai. We do not directly belong to the current Shogun's lineage, but our clan has richer history and braver warriors than those newcomers.
translation: 我们是在甲斐地区源氏的荣耀分支。我们并不直属于现在将军的家系，但我们家族比那些新来者拥有更悠久的历史与更勇敢的战士。

original: Kai is a mountainous province with many rapid streams which often cause serious floods on our rice paddy fields. We need to control these rivers to make the agriculture more convenient and effective.
translation: 甲斐是一个多山的领国，有许多湍急的河流，经常导致我们的稻田发生严重的洪水。我们需要控制这些河流，使农业更加便利与高效。

original: Although our territory is rather geographically isolated, with few connections to other regions, we aren't lacking for sources of information. Our well-organized communication system with signal fires and horse posts, and our skilled ninja, allow us to surpass most in the field of intelligence.
translation: 虽然我们的领土在地理上是孤立的，与其他地区鲜有交集，但我们并不缺乏信息来源。我们组织完备的通讯系统包括烽火、宿场以及训练有素的忍者，这使我们在情报方面超越了绝大多数其他家族。

original: The discovery of gold in the Kurokawa mountains will allow us to maintain good relations with our neighbors and enemies alike if we should so choose.
translation: 黑川群山中发现的金矿使我们能与邻居和敌人保持良好的关系，如果我们选择这么做的话。

original: Koshu Hatto, the 'laws of Kai province', will allow us to reform our clan structure and improve the daily life of our people. These new laws will guarantee that not only our retainers but even our own leaders must abstain from arbitrary verdicts. If we do something wrong, everyone should be able to point out the mistake and remind us to respect the law as written.
translation: 甲州法度，即“甲斐的法律规范”，将允许我们改革家族结构，并改善人民的日常生活。这些新的法律规范将保证，无论是家臣还是家主，都必须避免武断的裁决。如果我们做错了，每个人都应能指出错误，并提醒我们要遵守法律。

original: Strong leaders will be a more reliable safeguard for a domain than any number of strong castles. Our generals must train hard for their future work under the guidance of our leader, the 'Tiger of Kai' to ensure the quality of our leadership.
translation: 对于保护领地，无论多少强固的城堡，都不如强大的领导者可靠。我们的将军们必须为未来在家主“甲斐之虎”指导下的工作努力训练，以确保我们的领导能力。

original: Eventually the era of warfare will be over and we will be left with the memories of our victorious ancestors. We should have these stories written down for the generations to come, so that our lives may serve as an example for how to live and fight as an honorable samurai.
translation: 最终，战争的时代将会结束，我们取得胜利的祖先们的回忆将会流传下去。我们应该将这些故事写下来传给后人，这样我们的人生就可以作为一个值得尊敬的武士生活和战斗的例子。

original: The clan leaders of the Shiba are traditionally appointed to the chief of the military office at the Imperial Court. While this post today means just an honorable position without any military service toward the Emperor, people still expect great things of our military ability and will interpret any victory, however, minor, as a sign of our prowess.
translation: 传统上，斯波家的领袖被任命为皇室的军事长官。虽然这个职位现在只是个荣誉头衔，并不意味着对天皇的军事服务，人们仍然期待着我们的军事能力，并且会把任何胜利——无论多么微小，都诠释为我们英勇的标志。

original: We traditionally hold Echizen, Owari and Totomi. These lands allow us to grow rich from rice paddies and the workshops of Japan's most skilled artisans.
translation: 我们在传统上拥有越前、尾张和远江。这些土地让我们可以从水稻田和日本最熟练工匠的作坊中致富。

original: We are one of the clans that traditionally hold the Kanrei position. This lends great prestige and influence to our Clan and would do even more so if we could manage to get a firmer grip over its appointment.
translation: 我们是传统上担任管领一职的几个家族之一，这给我们的家族带来了巨大的声望和影响力，如果我们能成功地更稳固掌控它的任命，我们将获得更多。

original: The Atsuta Shrine in Owari Province is the home of the most famous legendary sword, one of the three sacred Imperial treasures, Kusanagi no Tsurugi. This holy weapon attracts warriors from all over the realm and our custodianship over it brings courage to the heart of our followers.
translation: 尾张的热田神宫是三神器之一，最著名的传奇兵刃，草雉剑的保管处。这件神器吸引着全日本的武士，而我们作为它的守护者，同样为追随者们带来了勇气。

original: Oshu province is our second home and is the source of our clan name. We must make use of our ties to Oshu to secure the strong war horses of that region.
translation: 奥州是我们的第二家乡，也是我们家族名称的来源。我们必须利用我们与奥州的纽带来获得该地区强壮的战马。

original: We have talented, but ambitious vassals such as Oda, Asakura and Kai in our divided realm. These families can also at times be the cause of fraction in our realm, however, and we would be wise to rein them in. Close supervision and sufficient rewards could make these families the greatest assets of our rule.
translation: 在我们分封的领地上，有像织田氏、朝仓氏、甲斐氏这样有才干却野心勃勃的家臣。这些家族是我们领地的一部分，但我们会明智地控制他们。密切的监督和充分的奖励可以使这些家庭成为我们统治的最大财富。

original: The Mogami clan in Dewa province is one of our more powerful cadet branches. Just like other samurai in this snowy area of Northern Japan, they have proven themselves as tough and brave soldiers. Let us recruit the Mogami to our armies and unleash the northern terror on the meek southerners around us.
translation: 出羽的最上氏使我们最有权势的旁系分支。就像其他日本北部冰雪之地的武士一样，他们也证明了自己是坚强勇敢的战士。让我们招募最上氏进入我们的军队，将北方的恐惧释放到周围温顺的南方人身上。

original:
Kublai Khan, the Shizu Emperor of Great Yuan Ulus, named our incomparable empire based on this famous phrase from I-Ching Tuanzhuan, pleased by its auspiciousness and appropriateness. We have at last begun to live up to this name again by reclaiming the legacy of the Great Yuan.

'Vast Ye Qian Yuan, the heavenly, the primal, the dominant nation of all under heaven!'
translation:
元世祖忽必烈，以《易经》的《彖传》中这句著名的短句命名了我们的无与伦比的帝国，取其吉祥如意的寓意。我们终于开始再次使用这个名字，重拾大元的遗产。

“大哉乾元,万物资始,乃统天！”

original: The pacification of Mongolia, of China, Tibet and all other parts of the Great Yuan Empire, once allowed an unprecedented economic growth to take place. Now that we have reclaimed the Yuan heritage we should also live up to the name and protect all within our borders. Let the trade flow freely, under the benevolent protection of the Great Khagan and his kin.\n
translation: 蒙古、中国、西藏以及大元帝国的其他所有地区的平定，曾经一度实现了前所未有的经济增长。现在我们已经重拾了元的传统，我们应该以此为名保护疆域内的所有人民。让贸易在伟大可汗和他亲属的仁慈庇佑下自由流动。

original: A Savage Kingdom Holy and Enchanted
translation: 神圣而迷人的野蛮王国

original: Weaker nations fear our might and name us savages. Yet they crave strength such as ours and gasp at our grandeur while sighing at their own cowardice. Let us bear the name of 'Savage' proudly, no one excels at fierceness like the sons of the Great Khan.\n
translation: 软弱的国家畏惧我们的意志，并称我们为野蛮人。他们渴望如我们一样的力量，因我们的伟大而屏气，为自己的怯弱而叹息。让我们昂首接受“野蛮”之名，大汗的子民勇武无人能敌。\n

original: The Three Teachings and Nine Schools All Respected

The Yuan Empire is not a mere nation of conquest. We learn from our subjects and strive to better our rule. All the schools and branches of Chinese philosophy must be revered. We must gain the wisdom of these masters as our own and use it to hold together and expand an Empire worthy of its name.\n
translation: 元帝国不是一个只懂得征服的国家。我们向不同的国民学习来完善自己的统治。汉人的所有学派和分支都必须受到尊重。我们必须汲取这些大师的智慧化为己用，以此建立团结统一，扩张成名副其实的帝国。\n

original: As the One Khagan of all Hordes our ruler should be accompanied by his Keshiktens, and as the Son of Heaven over the Middle Kingdom he is to be defended by Weijun, the Imperial Guards. They are the two wings of our leader, and will balance each other's power as factions in our state.\n
translation: 作为所有部落的共主，我们的可汗应有怯薛军随侍左右。作为凌驾于中原王国之上的长生天的儿子，他应有卫军（即帝国禁卫）的守护。怯薛和卫军是我王的双翼，并作为国内不同派系互相掣肘。\n

original: The Chinese have a long and stable tradition of government that could serve us well. In order to maintain an empire as great as ours, however, we must not let ourselves be blinded by the Chinese ideals of meritocracy and service. Mongol government stresses loyalty and reliability and has a long tradition of employing able men from all over the empire.\nWe should strive to find a golden balance between Mongol and Chinese traditions in order to create a hybrid government that is just as able to rule the highlands of Tibet, the vast Steppes and the great expanse of China itself.\n
translation: 汉人有长期稳定的治政传统，能为我们所用。然而，为了维持我们伟大的帝国，我们不应该被汉人的精英阶层管理理念蒙住双眼。蒙古政府强调忠诚和可靠性，并有向全国征集人才的优良传统。\n我们应当致力于平衡蒙古和中华的传统，建立一个混合型政府，以适应对于西藏高原、辽阔草原和广阔中华大地的统治。\n

original: A Thousand Miles as if at Home

The Grand Ulus of the Yuan, was once universally praised for its extraordinary road system. Along its well-guarded routes it was possible to travel effortlessly over vast distances. We should strive to recreate this legacy if we are to rule an empire as vast as that of Kublai Khan.\n
translation: 大元曾因其出色的道路系统而享誉世界。沿着妥善防卫的路线，可以轻易驰骋千里。我们要致力于重建这一传统，以统治如忽必烈大汗那样辽阔的帝国。\n

original: We are entered into a covenant with God to settle the New World. We shall be a City upon a hill, with the eyes of the world upon us, a model to all future colonies.
translation: 我们和上帝立约定居于新大陆。我们是山巅之城，受全世界瞩目，是所有未来殖民国的模范。

original: The old rulers of Beloozero, themselves sprung from some of the oldest and finest families in Russia, intermarried with the descendants of the Great Genghis Khan. While his kin are no longer on our throne they still make up an influential part of our nobility. We must cherish our martial past and create an army worthy of a Russian Khan.
translation: 白湖城的旧统治者是从俄罗斯最古老最优秀的家族脱颖而出，与成吉思汗的后裔联姻。尽管他的家族不再是王族，他们依然是贵族中极具影响力的一部分。我们必须珍惜我们的军事传统，建立配得上罗斯可汗的武装力量。

original: Founded in the late 14th century the Kirillo-Belozersky and the Ferapontov monasteries are the greatest and to many most prestigious monasteries in all of Rus'. The influence of these monks and of the greatness of the monasteries themselves, ensure that there are few who have not heard our name spoken in veneration.
translation: 修建于14世纪晚期的基里尔白湖修道院和费拉邦多夫修道院是俄罗斯最伟大、最著名的修道院。修士们的影响力和修道院的宏伟，确保了我主受赞颂之名几乎无人不知。

original: Once, the proud families of Beloozero made names for themselves far beyond our borders. Today many of the ruling class are descendants of Muscovite nobles, traditionally the Moscow rulers have even appointed their sons to rule our fair lands. We must strive to limit foreign influence and instead do our utmost to promote the venerable Beloozersk families.
translation: 白湖城骄傲的家族们曾经声名远播。如今，许多统治阶层都是莫斯科贵族的后裔，传说这些莫斯科统治者甚至任命他们的儿子们继续统治我们。我们必须限制这些外国人的影响力，并尽力推崇尊贵的白湖城家族们。

original: The very location of the principality of Beloozero lends itself to control of the northern trade. From Beloozero we can control the lakes and rivers that make up the transportation lines of Northern Russia, Siberia and Karelia.
translation: 白湖城得天独厚的地理位置赋予它对北方贸易的掌控力。通过白湖城，我们可以控制组成北俄罗斯、西伯利亚和卡累利阿运输线的湖泊与河流。

original: In the past some have called our state small and made fun of its humble origins. Yet whether as an independent principality or as a cog in the machinery of a much larger state we have always been able to muster quality leadership to lead even the largest armies of our day. The Officers of Beloozero come from a long tradition of military service and we must do our best to preserve this spirit and the transfer of knowledge between the generations.
translation: 过去有人嘲笑我们国小位卑。然而，不管是作为一个独立公国，还是作为一个大得多的国家机器里的齿轮，我们一直都能召集高素质的将领来带领当代最大的军队。白湖城军官们源自有悠久传统的兵役，我们必须竭力保持这种精神和知识传承，代代相传。

original: The Beloozero principality of our ancestors was built in a northerly and, to some, harsh environment. From early time we have relied on the rivers and lakes of this land to transport anything from trade goods to armies and we are quite used to making the most of the terrain under our control. Even as our state grows we must ensure that all Beloozero troops are properly trained to make the most of the terrain in which they fight and that all Beloozero subjects are properly prepared to make life hell for any invader.
translation: 我们祖先的白湖城亲王国建立于北方严酷的环境里。从很早以前起，我们就依靠这里的河流湖泊来运输包括商品和军队在内的一切，我们非常善于最大程度地利用自己掌控的地形。尽管我们的国家在扩张成长，但我们必须保证白湖城依然能最大程度利用战斗所在的地形，并且保证所有白湖城国民都能时刻准备抗击任何侵略。

original: Technological development and patronage of the arts is something that many of our former princes have been known for. This is a tradition we should cherish as it is what has allowed our state to stay relevant in a changing world. The time has come institutionalize spending on scientific advancement.
translation: 我们以前的许多王公以科技发展和技术赞助闻名于世。这是我们应当珍惜的传统，是我们在变迁的世界中保持影响力的关键。把科研经费制度化的时机已经到来。

original: Our ancestors have squandered their legacy and sold out part of our realm to foreign rulers. We must not lose any effort in retaking these areas from the rulers of Moscow or any other families that have taken control of territory that should rightfully be ours.
translation: 我们的先辈浪费了他们的遗产，将部分疆域卖给了外国人。我们必须不遗余力从莫斯科或其他家族手里收回这些原本属于我们的领土。

original: Our great city dates to the very founding of the Russian states in this region. Few states now remain with such a long and glorious past but the Tatars have broken our political influence. With the yoke finally receding we must once again rise to live up to our past as the founders of the Russian states.
translation: 我们伟大的城市可以追溯到罗斯诸国在此建立。如今几乎没有哪国保有如此悠久光荣的历史，但鞑靼人打破了我们的政治局势。在野蛮的枷锁终于消失之际，必须重新建立并坚持我们的传统，作为罗斯诸国的立身之本。

original: As the home of the influential Bishops of Rostov our city has a firm grip over the souls of the Russian people. We must work with the Church at all times and when we can we should help them increase their influence. By working for the elevation of our bishops to Metropolitans of the entire region we can increase their influence and ensure their support for years to come.
translation: 作为罗斯托夫有影响力的主教们的家乡，我们城市牢牢掌握着罗斯人民的精神。我们必须始终与教会通力合作，在力所能及时助他们提高影响力。通过帮助我们的主教们成为全境的大主教，我们可以提高其影响力，并确保将来得到他们的支持。

original: Rostov has always been one of the main market towns of its region. As our influence grows so does that of our merchants. Let us ensure that we have their interest at heart when we enact new laws and stipulations so that we can maintain our hold on the trade in these lands.
translation: 罗斯托夫一直是境内的集市中心。随着影响力的提升，我们的商人也水涨船高。我们要确保颁布新法新规时照顾到他们的利益，以此保证我们对地区贸易的掌控。

original: Our city is no longer living up to its name as one of the oldest and most influential centers in Russia. Let us embark on a program of construction of monumental landmarks so that it is clear to anyone who visits our fair city what a great place it is. A modern Kremlin and a great Cathedral is but the first steps to show off the influence, ingenuity and most of all, wealth, of the Rostov rulers.
translation: 我们不再是俄罗斯境内最古老最有影响力的中心城市。让我们着手启动不朽地标的建设，让每一个游客都知道这是一个多么伟大的地方。大教堂和现代化的克里姆林宫是第一步，它们彰显了罗斯托夫统治者的影响力、创造力，以及最重要的财富。

original: Whether dominated by bishops or princes our city has always been at the center of political developments in the Russian lands. This long history of political influence has given us a tradition of diplomacy that we must maintain.
translation: 不管是受主教还是王公统治，我们城市一直处于俄罗斯政治发展的中心。由来已久的政治影响力赋予我们外交活动的传统，我们必须保持。

original: Lately workshops for the production of popular enamels have begun to spring up all over our realm. The demand for these beautiful pieces of art is great but they are also quite possible to produce in great numbers. We should encourage the growth of this industry and take any knowledge we can gain from it to apply it to other means of production in our realm.
translation: 最近珐琅流行，生产珐琅的作坊如雨后春笋出现在国内。对于这些精美艺术品的需求量很高，但或许也可以大批量生产。我们应当支持这个产业，并从中总结知识经验，尽可能地应用到国内其他生产中。

original: The Margraviate of Moravia and the privileges of the Moravian diet date back to the 12th century. This title gives us great influence in the region as kings or even emperors have competed for the good will of the Moravian estates for centuries.
translation: 摩拉维亚侯爵辖区和摩拉维亚饮食可以追溯到12世纪。这个头衔赋予我们在境内巨大的影响力，几个世纪以来，国王和皇帝们都争相赢取摩拉维亚的善意。

original: When the lands of the Bohemian crown got overrun by the Hussite heresy we opened our arms to the Catholic refugees and we should strive to shelter anyone haunted by such religious persecution.
translation: 当波希米亚的王权被胡斯异教徒颠覆，我们向天主教逃难者张开双臂，并努力保护任何人免于宗教迫害。

original: Moravia is a rich land on the crossroads between Bohemia and Austria. This has allowed our burghers to thrive and both Brno and Olomouc have become influential trading centers in their own right. We must do what we can to make the most of this strategic position, and to strengthen the interests of our burghers and artisans.
translation: 富足的摩拉维亚位于波希米亚和奥地利交界处。这让我们的市民茁壮成长，布尔诺和奥洛莫乌茨都成为各自地区颇具影响力的贸易中心。我们必须尽量利用地理优势，提高市民和工匠的利益。

original: For over a thousand years the hills of Moravia have been used to produce our famous wines. We must continue to protect our vineyards and to promote Moravian wine to our neighbors.
translation: 一千多年来摩拉维亚的山丘都被用来生产著名的葡萄酒。我们必须继续保护葡萄园，并将摩拉维亚酒销往四邻。

original: Our proximity to the German regions has led to a long history of close cooperation and integration with the German political and economic sphere. There is hardly any major Moravian city that does not have a German quarter.
translation: 我们紧邻日耳曼地区，故而与德国的政治经济领域有悠久而紧密的合作交融。几乎所有摩拉维亚主要城市都有日耳曼人居住区。

original: The Jesuits do admirable work for the counter-reformation and are in many ways at the forefront of education and the crafting of theological arguments. Let us invite the Jesuits to start seminars and create universities within our lands.
translation: 基督教徒为反宗教改革做了令人钦佩的工作，他们走在教育学和神学争论的前沿。让我们邀请基督教徒开设课程，并在境内建立大学。

original: Centuries ago, long before the current powers that now dominate Europe, this region was all subdued by Great Moravia. We must cherish this legacy and build a new empire for the Moravian people.
translation: 几个世纪前，早在现在的权贵主宰欧洲之前，整片大陆都在大摩拉维亚治下瑟瑟发抖。我们应当珍惜这个传承，为摩拉维亚人民建立起新的帝国。

original: For a century now the Brotherhood of the Blackheads, consisting of unmarried merchants, ship owners and foreigners, have taken it upon themselves to protect the Estonian burghers. We should strengthen our ties with the Brotherhood so that we may rely upon them in years to come.
translation: 一个世纪以来，由未婚商人、船主和外国人组成的黑头兄弟会，都以保护爱沙尼亚公民为己任。我们应当加强与黑头兄弟会的羁绊，在此后的岁月里继续倚仗他们。

original: The coastlines of Estonia have attracted foreign sailors for centuries. Along the Baltic shores our country is home to Danes, Swedes and Germans. Let us embrace our maritime heritage and strive to become a maritime power to be reckoned with.
translation: 数百年来爱沙尼亚的海岸线一直吸引着外国船员。在波罗的海沿岸，我国是丹麦人、瑞典人和日耳曼人的家。让我们拥抱我们的沿海传统，成为举足轻重的沿海势力。

original: Let us found an academy for the furthering of Estonian knowledge, laws and theology to compete with other European centers of learning.
translation: 让我们成立一个学院，促进爱沙尼亚知识、法律和神学的发展，以此和其他欧洲学术中心竞争。

original: Baltic Merchants have long dominated our cities and our exports are all overseas. We must continue to strengthen our historical ties with the Baltic trading organization, while also favoring the Estonian traders, shippers and entrepreneurs that are now trying to carve out their own niche in the region.
translation: 波罗的海的商人团在我们的城市里长久以来都举足轻重，我们的贸易出口也全部经由海路进行。我们必须继续加强与波罗的海贸易组织的历史羁绊，同时也支持爱沙尼亚本地商人、船员和企业家，帮助他们尝试开拓自己的市场。

original: The Livonian order covered our country in a tight network of castles so as to defend us against heathens and Russians alike. This has served us well but defenses have to be maintained. As a small people surrounded by hostile neighbors we would do well to carry on the Livonian legacy and maintain and expand the defensive line we have inherited.
translation: 利沃尼亚骑士团把我国包含在了一个紧密的堡垒网络里，以助我们防御异教徒或俄罗斯人之类的攻击。这曾经很好地保护了我们，而防御工事必须继续保持。作为一个强敌环伺的小民族，我们必须好好坚持利沃尼亚的馈赠，维护并扩展我们继承的防线。

original: Foreign scholars of the Enlightenment have finally realized the greatness of the Estonian language and culture. While they are surely late to discover what we have always known, we should not hesitate to profit from their fascination.
translation: 启蒙运动的外国学者终于意识到爱沙尼亚语言与文化的伟大。虽然他们肯定很晚才会发现我们早就知道的事情,但我们应该毫不犹豫地从这个魅力中获利。

original: A movement to promote the Estonian literary language among all Estonians, be they inside our borders or living under foreign rule. Russians, Swedes, Germans, Lithuanians and other peoples have tried to keep our people in the dark for too long. It is time we claim our spot in the sun and it is time the world read our thoughts and commands in the Estonian language.
translation: 在所有爱沙尼亚人中促进复兴爱沙尼亚文学语言的运动，无论是在我们的边界还是生活在外国统治之下。无论是在我们的边界之中还是生活在外国统治之下。俄罗斯人，瑞典人，德国人，立陶宛人等民族都试图把我们的人民永久藏在黑暗中。现在是时候在阳光之下宣传我们的主权了并且现在世界要以爱沙尼亚语来思考我们的想法和命令。

original: Few can boast a lineage as great as ours, as we are descendants of the moon, Chandra, himself. Let us commission a great genealogy to commemorate our ties to the Lunar dynasty and to describe the history of our people.
translation: 很少有人能匹敌我们的家族血统，因为我们是月亮与月神自身的后裔。让我们记录下一份伟大的家谱，来共同铭记我们与新月王朝的纽带，描述我们人民的历史。

original: Our kingdom lies on the border of Hindu, Tribal, and Muslim kingdoms, and these states all have something to offer in terms of administrative strength. We must strive to adapt our practices to what is best suited for the disparate parts of our kingdom. In the plains we will appoint governors directly as the Muslims do, but in the tribal hills we will rely on the traditional feudal chiefs that hold the land.
translation: 我们的王国与印度诸国，游牧部落以及穆斯林诸国接壤，所有这些国家在行政力量上都可圈可点。我们必须努力让行政措施在王国的各地因地制宜。在平原地带，我们会像穆斯林一样指定官员，但在隶属部落的丘陵地带我们则依赖拥有领地的传统封建酋长。

original: While our Kingdom has worshipped Shiva and other Hindu Gods for centuries, many of our subjects also practice Tribal and even Muslim customs, as well. We have learned that, if we are to thrive, we must be flexible and not let matters of worship get in the way of true kingship.
translation: 虽然我们的王国已经信仰了湿婆与印度教诸神几个世纪，但是我们很多附庸仍然遵从部落甚至穆斯林的习俗。我们认识到，如果我们想要变得兴旺发达，我们必须要灵活，避免信仰上的问题成为真正统治上的阻碍。

original: Great power has to be vested in the commanders of our armies for them to be able to achieve success, yet there is danger in giving them too much power. We must strive to divide the responsibility for our armed forces among several specialized generals and ministers that we trust, rather than to risk one person having total control.
translation: 我们的军官被授予了很大的权力以便他们来取得胜利，但是给予他们过度的权力可能会带来危险。我们必须想方设法在我们信赖的专业的将军与大臣们中划分军权，而不是冒险让一人独揽大权。

original: The village headmen are responsible for tax collection and the local implementation of royal decrees, and have served our kingdom well for centuries. As we grow, however, so too does the need to oversee these headmen. Let us appoint trustworthy men as ‘Missips’ to oversee local representatives and ensure better central control over our provinces.
translation: 村里的长官们负责征收税款和在当地执行皇家法令。他们几个世纪以来一直为我们的王国服务。然而，随着底层人民的成长，开始需要监督这些长官。让我们任命可信赖的人作为检察官来监督这些地方代表，确保他们能够更好地掌控我们的省份。

original: Many of our farmers complain about being harassed by raids from the tribal inlands. Let us create local defenses to protect our people from the whims of raiders, bandits, and marauding enemy armies. A peaceful countryside is one that can grow rich and profitable.
translation: 我们的许多农民抱怨他们的土地被内陆部落骚扰。让我们在当地建立防御工事来保护我们的人民不受掠袭者、强盗和敌军的袭击。和平的乡村价值千金！

original: The Lower Saxon Circle administrates and coordinates the states in our part of the Holy Roman Empire. By working within it we can unite the princes against outside threats, while we also strengthen our own grip over the rich Lower Saxon lands.
translation: 萨克森人在神圣罗马帝国中起到管理和协调各州的作用。通过它，我们可以团结诸侯来对抗外界的威胁，同时我们也加强了对富裕的下萨克森土地的控制.

original: Our region is wealthy and many have money to spend on great buildings and works of art. Along the entire river Weser we are seeing beautiful castles built in the new architecture of our era. We must embrace the Weser renaissance and create great buildings to overshadow those of our lessers.
translation: 我们的地区很富有，很多人都愿意花钱在伟大的建筑和艺术品上。沿着整条河，我们看到按照新建筑形式建造的美丽城堡。我们必须接受威悉河的文艺复兴，创造出伟出大的建筑来盖过之前的光辉。

original: Hanover has great need of talented men to protect and expand our domains. Let us hold annual fairs to identify the most skilled marksmen in our lands. This way we can ensure both the income of our local merchants and a good supply of recruits at once.
translation: 汉诺威需要人才来保护和拓展我们的疆域。让我们举办一年一度的博览会，以寻找我们国家最熟练的射手。这样我们就能同时保证当地商人的收入的同时征募大量的新兵。

original: A great state like ours deserves a great capital. The gardens of the Herrenhausen castle, in Hanover, are already famous. Let us expand and build them up to be a truly unique wonder of our great capital, one that will attract curious travellers from near and far.
translation: 像我们这样的伟大国家应该有一个伟大的首都。汉诺威的海恩豪森城堡的花园已经很有名了。让我们继续扩展并建造他们，使其成为我们伟大的首都真正独特的奇迹并吸引世界上好奇的旅行者。

original: Hanover has always had a strong class of wealthy farmers to keep the nobility in check. The Hanoverian ‘Meiers’ have over time come to extend their rights to control the land to the brink of making them hereditary. Let us take this final step and profit from allowing the Meiers to thrive.
translation: 汉诺威一直有保持贵族权利的富农阶级。随着时间的推移，汉诺威的“Meiertum”们逐渐扩大了他们的权利，将土地控制在他们的手上。让我们采取最后的行动，允许这些人继续发展。

original: Our international ties have led to us having a constant presence in foreign capitals. We should create a permanent institution to handle our embassies in the capitals of other states to improve both the ability and efficiency of our diplomats.
translation: 我们的国际关系使我们需要经常出现在外国首都。我们应该建立一个常设机构来管理我们在其他国家首都的大使馆，来提高我们外交人员的能力和效率。

original: In the past our armies have suffered scathing defeats at the hands of both Prussian and French soldiers. We must build a new and stronger army, determined to restore the glory of Hanover and to learn from past mistakes.
translation: 在过去，我们的军队遭到普鲁士和法国士兵的严厉打击。我们必须建立一支更强大的新式军队，并从过去的错误中吸取教训，决心恢复汉诺威的荣耀。

original: The Aq Qoyunlu, or the White Sheep, trace their lineage to Bayandor Khan, the leader of one of the twenty-four Oghuz tribes and the grandson of Oghuz Khagan himself. The blood in our veins is that of true warriors and makes us the predestined leaders of all other peoples.
translation: 白羊，追溯他们的家族，可到巴扬多可汗，他是24个乌古斯部落的首领，也是乌古思可汗的孙子。我们血管里流淌着真正的战士的血液，上天安排我们成为其他民族的的领袖。

original: For many years it has been to our great detriment that we have been unable to settle the succession disputes of our federation. We must settle the disputes of the sons of the White Sheep and unite as one. After decades of warfare there will be few who can stand before us if we would just work together instead.
translation: 多年来，我们一直未能解决我们联盟的继承纠纷，这对我们是不利的。我们必须解决白羊之子的争端，团结一致。在几十年的战争之后，我们只要合作，将会无人可挡。

original: Iran might seem ripe for an army such as ours. It is easy to conquer and keep under foot. However, if we are to extract any form of revenue from our new subjects we will need to rely not only on our military elites. There is no reason that the old administrative families of these lands should not continue to carry out their work. Let us embrace the ancient traditions of Iranian bureaucracy, as long as we make it clear that the military might lies with the armies of the White Sheep.
translation: 从我们这样的军队来看，伊朗的军事体制似乎已经成熟了。征服和统治是很容易的。然而，如果我们要从我们的新臣民中获得税收，我们不仅需要依靠我们的军事精英。我们应当让这些国家的从政家庭继续开展他们的工作。让我们接受伊朗官僚机构的古老传统，只要我们清楚地表明，军事力量属于白羊军队。

original: The tribes in our confederation are held together by the loyalty to our great ruler but there are many conflicts within this disparate group of supporters. If we want to avoid splintering over petty tribal conflicts we should strive to keep all conquered land directly within our ruling family, rather than among the chiefs that support us.
translation: 我们的部落联盟是由对我们伟大统治者的忠诚团结在一起的，但在这群不同的支持者之间存在着许多冲突。如果我们想避免部落在琐碎的冲突中分裂，我们应该努力使所有被征服的土地直接归属于统治家族，而不是属于支持我们的首领。

original: Our realm lies at a crossroad between the empires of the Mediterranean and those of Greater Iran. In many ways this region is one of few friends and many enemies. If we are to find allies we will have to look far abroad, perhaps even among the Christian realms of the far west.
translation: 我们的王国位于地中海的帝国和大伊朗之间的十字路口。在许多方面来看，这个地区拥有很少的朋友和许多的敌人。我们需要向外看，甚至走到遥远的西方基督教土地来寻找我们的盟友。

original: These are dangerous times and many look to millenarian sects for answers. We must do what we can to curb religious extremism in our lands, while also working together with the more organized dervish sects that many of the Turkoman warriors belong to. By carefully choosing who to ally and who to fight we can build a stronger state, one that will have the allegiance of the Dervishes without the chaos that religious extremism can bring.
translation: 这是一个危险的时代，许多人向千年教派寻求答案。我们必须尽我们所能来遏制我们土地上的宗教极端主义，同时也要与许多土库曼战士组成的更有组织的德尔维希教派一起工作。他们谨慎选择为何而战，从而建立起一个强大的国家。没有宗教极端主义所带来的混乱，换来的是德尔维希人的忠诚！

original: The source of a land’s wealth is its population. The lands under our control have, however, suffered from centuries of warfare. We must protect our urban and rural subjects alike from wanton raids and coercion. Instead we must build and enforce a set of laws to make living and raising wealth in our realm safe and worthwhile. We will grow rich as our subjects prosper.
translation: 土地财富的来源于它的人民。然而，我们控制下的土地遭受了数百年的战争。我们必须保护城市和农村的臣民，免受肆意的掠夺和强迫。我们必须建立和执行一套法律，保护我们臣民的生命和财产。民强才能国富。

original: We are fortunate to be served by loyal and well educated Persian administrators that have perfected the art of governance for generations. Sadly, however, a hereditary office is one that over time might stagnate and lack for innovation.\nBy reducing the number of inherited offices with each generation we can make sure that we reward not only loyalty, but also ability. Able administrators must rise to high positions regardless of which family they come from.
translation: 忠诚的、受过良好教育的波斯行政人员为我们服务是十分幸运的，他们已经完善了几代人的治国艺术。然而，遗憾的是，世袭公职可能会随着时间的推移而使国家停滞不前，缺乏创新。\n通过减少每一代人继承的公职数量，我们可以确保我们奖励的不仅是忠诚，还有能力。有能力的管理者无论来自哪个家族，都将得到晋升。

original: With large deserts, high mountains and large tribal communities, Khorasan might seem like an inhospitable place. Yet it is here, at the crossroads of Central Asia, Iran and India that many empires have chosen to base their capitals. Under Shah Rukh the region has prospered in relative stability, and from the markets of Herat to the shrines of Mashhad we have built a reputation as the home of both great scholars, and thriving cities.
translation: 在一大片沙漠、高山和众多部落群之中，呼罗珊看起来似乎是一片荒凉之境。然而由于它处在中亚、伊朗和印度的十字路口，因此许多帝国都选择在这里建立自己的首都。在沙哈鲁统治下，该地区相对稳定，从哈烈市场到马什哈德神社，我们因拥有伟大的学者和繁荣的城市而声名远扬。

original: The majority of our armies are still made up of the tribesmen that Timur brought with him to this region. By organizing these troops in a more centralized manner than his predecessor, Timur strengthened his military power but he also made these Turko-Mongol emirs very powerful men in their own right. Where he was able to command their loyalty through personal gratitude and marriages we need to win their support in more long term ways.
translation: 我们大部分的军队仍然是由帖木儿带来的部落勇士组成。他通过比前任更集权的方式组织这些部队，帖木儿加强了自身的军事权威，但他也让这些突厥 - 蒙古人的埃米尔获得了更大地影响力。他能够仅通过个人的情谊和婚姻来赢得他们的忠诚，而我们则需要考虑以更长远的方式来赢得他们的支持。

original: A realm as diverse and geographically divided as Khorasan can be hard to hold together. Often provincial governors will have to act quickly and with little chance to ask the center for instruction. It is essential that we have governors that we can trust both in terms of loyalty and ability.\nThe Timurid and Genghisid practice of putting the princes of the dynasty in such positions would likely serve us well. Every governor will be motivated to do the most of his position if he has hope to inherit the throne himself.
translation: 在呼罗珊这种复杂多样且分散的地域中王国通常很难维系。地方长官大都自行管理，几乎不向中央寻求指示。我们必须要有值得信任且既忠诚又有能力的地方长官，这至关重要。\n帖木儿和成吉思时代让王室成员担任这些位置的做法，可能对我们来说很有借鉴意义，如果这些王子们都希望自己能继承王位，那么他们就会更积极地去发挥自己的才能。

original: Agriculture comes at great cost in Khorasan, the land is dry and there are no major rivers to speak of. Our Persian administrators are suggesting that if our cities are to reach their full potential we will have to invest in a great number of irrigation works and canals. With enough water even the rarest fruits can be grown from Herat to Mashhad and we can build gardens to the envy of all of Asia.
translation: 在呼罗珊进行农业种植花费巨大，土地贫瘠缺少水源。我们的波斯执政者们认为只有投入到灌溉事业和运河建设才能使我们的城市发挥出全部的潜力。有了足够的水，从哈烈到马什哈德，我们可以种植最稀有的水果并建造起使整个亚洲嫉妒的花园。

original: Khorasan has a long history as a center of scholarly learning, and our hold over this land is new and untested. Let us fund the great scribes of the age, allowing them to compose the greatest chronicles of our age, firmly establishing our house as the leading dynasty of Eastern Persia.
translation: 呼罗珊作为一个学术研究中心有着悠久的历史，我们刚刚统治这片土地，还未经过考验。让我们为这个时代的伟大抄写匠提供资金，让他们编写我们这个时代最伟大的编年史，使我们的家族领导东部波斯。

original: These lands are home to many Sufi shrines, orders and their lineages. The great Sheiks often take an active part in the social and political life in our society, and their influence stretches far from our borders. Even the faraway rulers of India patronizes Khorasani Sheiks of the Chisti or Naqshbandi Sufis, and Great Sultans send letters hoping to lure our wise sages to their courts.
translation: 这些土地是许多苏非主义神殿、牧师和他们的家族的家园。伟大的教长积极参与我们社会的社会和政治生活，他们的影响力超越了疆界。即使是遥远的印度统治者也会对契斯特教团或纳克什班迪教团的呼罗珊教长提供资助，而伟大的苏丹也写信希望将我们的智者们带到他们的宫廷。

original: Between the Oxus, India and Iran, Khorasan is a region of great importance for long range commerce. The Silk Road passes through, connecting Samarkand with Iran and the Mediterranean, and is joined in Herat by the Grand Trunk Road from India.\nThis long journey is a perilous and arduous one for many merchants however. By vowing to protect all merchants passing through our lands, and constructing regular caravanserais along the trade routes, we can greatly limit the risks and likely attract even more wealth to our great cities
translation: 在阿姆河、印度和伊朗之间，呼罗珊是一个非常重要的地区。丝绸之路穿过此地，连接了撒马尔罕、伊朗与地中海，并与印度的大干道相连。\n然而，对于许多商人来说，这次长途旅行是一件危险且艰巨的事。通过发誓保护所有通过我们土地的商人，并在贸易路线上建立正规的商队，我们可以极大地减少风险，并可能吸引更多的财富到我们的大城市。

original: Mawarannahr, the land Beyond the River

Transoxiana, the land beyond the Amu Darya, or Oxus, has been known since the days of the great Iskandar of Macedon as the end of Persian culture. Our lands are where Iran ends and Turan starts, a realm of great cities, but also dominated by Turko-Mongol tribes.\nIn more recent times Transoxiana was the starting point for Timur Lenk's Empire and it remains the base for many of the clans that supported his bid for power. As Timur has shown we could do great things as long as we keep them united.
translation: 自马其顿的亚历山大大帝时期以来，河中地区，即阿姆河（或名乌浒河）之外的土地就被人们就看作是波斯文明的边缘。我们的土地是伊朗和图兰的交汇处，是一片拥有繁荣城市的地区，但它被突厥-蒙古部落所控制。\n近来河中地区成为帖木儿建立帝国的兴起之地，也是许多支持他争夺天下的氏族领地。正如帖木儿所说：只要我们团结一致，我们就能干大事。

original: While he was far from the first conqueror to come to Transoxiana, Timur made the region the center of his Empire and he brought treasures, artists, builders and artisans from the entire world to his great capital in Samarkand. We must strive to uphold this legacy, and continue to embellish this foremost jewel among cities. From the courts in Castile to the palaces in Beijing everyone shall covet the gilded city on the Silk Road.
translation: 当他距第一个征服者很远之后来到河中地区的时候，帖木儿把这里变成了他的帝国的中心，他把全世界的珍宝、艺术家、建筑商和工匠带到他在撒马尔罕的伟大首都。我们必须努力维护这一遗产，并继续美化这一城市。从卡斯蒂利亚的宫廷到北京的宫殿，每个人都会羡慕这座在丝绸之路上的镀金之城。

original: Through education and training our rulers acquire the virtues of great kingship, but there is no school that will teach how to survive in the political climate of Transoxiana. Ever since the days of Timur, young princes, uncles and cousins have plotted against one another for the right to rule this region. When one of our princes reach adulthood and manages to take on the reins of power, we can be sure that they are, if nothing else, quite adept at espionage and politics.\nIf our realm is to ever be free of this poisonous atmosphere we must put an end to such infighting, striving to outsmart the lesser scions of the family once and for all.
translation: 通过教育和训练，我们的统治者获得了伟大的国王的美德，但没有一所学校能教会我们如何在河中的政治漩涡中生存。从帖木儿时代起，年轻的王子、叔伯和堂兄弟就为了争夺这个地区的统治权而相互密谋。当我们的一个王子长大成人，并设法掌握权力的时候，我们可以肯定他们是非常善于从事间谍活动和政治的。\n如果希望我们的王国能够永远摆脱了这种有害的氛围，我们就必须制止这种内讧，力求一劳永逸地战胜家族中较弱的子孙。

original: While it is going to be a long while from determining any battles in the open lands of Transoxiana, gunpowder promises to change warfare to its very foundation. Turkic cannoneers have already made a name for themselves in India and Iran. The time has come to make sure these talented men of war never leave our lands. Let us put the most skilled gunsmiths to work and create the greatest artillery arm in Central Asia.
translation: 虽然离决定河中地区的开阔土地上的战斗胜利还有很长一段时间，但火力已经注定要改变战争的基础。在印度和伊朗，突厥炮手们已经十分出名。现在是确保这些有才华的战士永远不会离开我们的土地的时候了。我们让最熟练的军械工人在中亚工作，以制造出最强大的炮兵部队。

original: Our realm his home to some of the greatest minds of this era. Great thinkers, philosophers, writers, artists and astronomers. If we are to truly benefit from their brilliance, however, we must dare give them the tools to aim higher. Let us build great works and buildings in the name of science. We will provide astronomical observatories, libraries and all patronage aspiring minds might require.\n\n'Religions rise and fall, empires crumble into dust, but the works of science are for all time.'
translation: 我们的王国是这个时代最伟大思想的故乡。我们有伟大的思想家、哲学家、作家、艺术家和天文学家。然而，如果我们真的要从他们的才华中获益，我们必须敢于给他们更高的目标。让我们以科学的名义建造伟大的工程和建筑。我们将提供天文观测站、图书馆和资助给那些有高远理想的人。\n\n'宗教兴起衰落，帝国化为尘土，但科学永恒。

original: While many places benefit from being transit points for the Silk Road, we are are the center of one of its greatest Entrepôts. From east to west traders know of the reputation of Bukhara and Samarkand, and are willing to cross the deserts of the Tarim Basin and Iran or the great steppes to the north, to be able to sell their wares here, bringing home our silk, paper and whichever exotic goods they can find here to their homelands.\nOur wealth depends on keeping the peace. Without Timur, and Genghis Khan before him, many find this too dangerous to undertake. We must endeavor to protect all traders in our lands and negotiate right of passage for any long distance traders that seek our markets.
translation: 虽然许多地方作为丝绸之路的过境点收获了巨大的财富，但我们才是它最伟大的转口中心之一。从东到西，商人们知道布哈拉和撒马尔罕的声誉，并愿意穿越塔里木盆地和伊朗的大沙漠或大草原,来这里出售他们的商品,并带回我们的丝绸、纸和他们可以找到的任何外来商品到他们的祖国。\n我们的财富依赖于维持和平。没有帖木儿和他之前的成吉思汗，很多人觉得贸易太过危险。我们必须努力保护我们的土地上的所有商人，并与寻求我们市场的长途贸易者协商通行权。

original: When the Arabs once came to Persia they dubbed our region Jibal, the mountains, as the many mountains of the Zagros and Alborz ranges is what defines it. On the western border of greater Iran the region is the gateway between the states of the Turkic Caucasus and Greater Iran.\nYet Jibal is not all mountains, for in the basins lie a number of Iran’s oldest and greatest cities and between these basins passes and roads connect the urban population of our Empire. As the empires before us, from the ancient Medes to the Timurids, we must fortify passes and patrol the roads as well as we can, as they are the lifeline of our state.
translation: 当阿拉伯人来到波斯的时候，他们把我们的地区称为“吉布尔”，意思为山。它的来源是扎格罗斯和厄尔布尔士的众多山脉。伊朗西部边境是突厥高加索地区与伊朗之间的门户。\n然而，吉布尔并不是都是山，因为在盆地里，有许多伊朗最古老、最伟大的城市，这些盆地的关口和通道连接着我们帝国的城市人口。就像我们之前的帝国一样，从古代的米底王国到帖木儿，我们必须加强关隘，并尽可能地在道路上巡逻，因为它们是我们国家的生命线。

original: Regardless of if they consider themselves Sunni or Shia, the great majority of our subjects honor the Imams, the family of Muhammad and even Ali. While this conviction is regarded as a weakness by some legal scholars it is something that unites our people, be they Sufi mystics, regular Sunnis, Alevis or Twelver Shias.
translation: 不管他们认为自己是逊尼派或什叶派，我们大多数人都尊敬伊玛目、穆罕默德家族，甚至阿里。虽然这一信念被一些法律学者认为是一个弱点，但它的确把苏菲派神秘主义者、普通逊尼派、阿拉维派或十二世什叶派的人民团结到了一起。

original: For hundreds of years Iran and the Caucasus have been dominated by Turkic warriors. They have made up the military foundation of a number of states such as those of the Ilkhanate, Seljuks or more recently the Timurids. Ajam sits at the very center of the greater Turko-Persian region, and for this reason it was here that the Ilkhans once constructed their capital at Sultaniyya. Today the Ilkhans are long gone but their monuments and their traditions remain, in Sultaniyya their mausoleum still bear witness to the empire that once was.\nIf we want to dominate this region we must embrace the Ilkhanate ideals of kingship, and win the loyalty of the Turkic warriors that still dwell here.
translation: 数百年来，伊朗和高加索地区一直被突厥人统治。他们已经建立了一些国家的军事基础，如伊儿汗国，塞尔柱，或最近的帖木儿。阿贾姆位于在突厥波斯地区的中心，也正因为这个原因，伊儿汗国人曾经在苏丹尼耶建造了他们的首都。今天，伊儿汗国早已远去，但他们的纪念碑和传统依然存在，在苏丹尼耶，他们的陵墓仍然见证着曾经的帝国。\n如果我们想要统治这个地区，我们必须接过伊儿汗国的王权，并赢得仍旧居住在这里的突厥战士的忠诚。

original: High Persian culture remains a constant through the ages, no matter which conquerors come and go. Iran has fallen many times, but in the end it is Persian language and culture that spread to their homelands. From Anatolia to Samarkand, and even Bengal, it is the tongue of Hafiz and Rumi that will open doors to traders, politicians and scholars.
translation: 征服者来来去去，波斯文化却始终不灭。伊朗已经衰落了很多次，但最终还是波斯的语言和文化传播到了征服者的祖国。从安纳托利亚到撒马尔罕，甚至孟加拉，哈菲兹和鲁米将为商人、政治家和学者敞开大门。

original: These lands have been dubbed Iraq-e Ajam, or Foreign Iraq, by outsiders and are dominated by Persian citydwellers and Turkic warriors brought by the Mongols, Seljuks and Timurids. On the outskirts of the great settlements, however, a great number of groups of nomads and semi-nomads traverse and populate the region, Arabs, Turkomans, Baluch, Kalaj and Bedouin. Some have been here for centuries, others arrived more recently, all of them have traditionally been left mostly to their own devices. We should make use of these groups in our defenses, as none knows the Persian countryside better than they do.
translation: 这些土地被外界称为“伊拉克 -阿贾姆”或外伊拉克，由蒙古人、塞尔柱和帖木儿带来的波斯城市居民和突厥人统治。然而，在大定居点的外围，大量的游牧民族和半游牧民族穿越并居住在该地区。阿拉伯人、土库曼人、俾路支人、卡拉伊和贝都因人，他们中有些人在这里已经有好几个世纪了，有些是最近才来，他们都习惯了自行其是。我们应该利用他们来防御，因为没有人比他们更了解波斯的乡村。

original: To this day the legacy of the Persian Empire lives in the form of the kingly title Shah, used by Persianate rulers everywhere. We must unite the entire Iranian people under our ruler, Shahanshah, the King of Kings.
translation: 直到现在，波斯帝国的遗产仍以波斯统治者所使用的高贵头衔——沙阿的形式存在。我们必须把所有的伊朗人民团结在我们的统治者——万王之王之下。

original: In many countries Persia and Persians, derived from Fars and Farsis, are the names used to refer to all of Iran. So important has our impact on the culture and economy of this region been. From the foothills of the Zagros mountains to the coasts of the Persian Gulf, the lands of Fars harbors some of the oldest and most famous cities of Iranians and Iranian culture.
translation: 许多国家所说的波斯与波斯人，自法尔斯与法尔斯人演化而来，用以指代伊朗全境。我们对这个地区的文化和经济有着巨大的影响。从扎格罗斯山脉的山麓到波斯湾的海岸，法尔斯的土地上坐落着一些最古老、最著名的伊朗和蕴含伊朗文化的城市。

original: For centuries Fars and Shiraz has been a vibrant center of philosophy, theology and culture, attracting the great thinkers of its age from all over the Persianate and Islamic world. We must not squander this heritage, let us continue to patronize the arts, literature and theology so that we can continue to shine as the brightest jewel in Persia.
translation: 几个世纪以来，法尔斯和设拉子一直是充满活力的哲学、神学和文化中心，吸引着来自各个波斯地区国家和伊斯兰世界的伟大思想家。我们不应该浪费这种传统，让我们继续资助艺术、文学和神学，这样我们就能继续成为波斯最明亮的宝石。

original: Where other regions have been quick to support new rising conquerors, or quick to surrender with armies outside of their walls, Fars has often favored a more careful and balanced approach. The key to survival in a dangerous world is not to surrender as soon as we are threatened, but it is also not to go looking for a fight that we don’t yet know who will win. As new claimants to supremacy in Persia come and go we will carefully consider our options. Our people will be here long after any newcomers are gone, regardless of if they win or lose their petty conflicts.
translation: 当其他地区迅速支持新崛起的征服者，或在城墙外迅速投降之时，法尔斯经常支持一种更为谨慎和平衡的方式。在危险的世界里，生存的关键是不要在我们受到威胁的时候立刻投降，但也不是去进行一场我们没有把握的战斗。当新的霸权来到波斯，我们将仔细考虑我们的选择。不管他们在冲突中获胜或失败，我们的人民在任何新来者消失后都将依旧居住在这里。

original: Legend has it that it was in Persia wine was once discovered. A girl, having lost the favor of king Jamshid, drank the fermented grape juice in order to end her life. Instead she found the secret of wine and in little time it spread from the royal court.\nWine has been produced and consumed in Persia for millennia, but none can compete with those made from the excellent grapes cultivated on the terraced slopes of the Zagros mountains in Fars. The reputation of Shirazi wine has spread far beyond the borders and is greatly in demand even in India and Europe.\nWe must expand our irrigation system and do what we can to increase our wine production, while marketing our highly sought after goods on foreign markets.
translation: 在波斯有一个关于葡萄酒的传说。一个女孩失去了贾姆希德国王的宠爱，喝了发酵的葡萄汁，想结束了她的生命。机缘巧合，她发现了酒的秘密，并短时间内就在宫廷里广泛传播。\n葡萄酒在波斯生产和消费了几千年，但没有一个能与那些用在法尔斯的札格罗斯山脉梯田上种植的优质葡萄制成的酒竞争。设拉子酒的声誉已经远远超出了国界，甚至在印度和欧洲都有很大的需求。\n我们必须完善我们的灌溉系统，尽我们所能增加我们的葡萄酒产量，同时在国外市场推销备受我们追捧的商品。

original: As a center of learning it is perhaps no wonder that the workshops of Fars have risen to fame for the great output of books and miniature paintings. Famous master painters and bookmakers have always settled in our cities and enjoyed our protection.\nThe Shirazi school can only blossom with lavish support to create more books, however, and that is something we must provide if we are not to be overshadowed by Indian or Azerbaijani bookbinders and painters.
translation: 毫无疑问，法尔斯的工作室作为一个学习中心以大量的书籍和微型绘画而闻名。著名的画家和作家们总是乐意定居在我们的城市里，接受我们的保护。\n但设拉子学校需要在慷慨的支持下才能蓬勃发展，从而创造更多佳作。如果我们不想被印度以及阿塞拜疆的书商和画家掩盖光芒，我们就必须提供这些东西。

original: While Fars is home to many sedentary Persians, and great cities and industries, it is also populated by large groups of nomadic tribesmen. The Qashqai and other groups have often been at odds with the city dwellers, leading to expensive conflicts between the two that does not benefit the realm.\nWe must integrate the Qashqai and give them place in our cities while guaranteeing their rights to use land for grazing. In return we ask that our ruler will be consulted for the appointment of new Ilkhans, their traditional leaders.
translation: 法尔斯不仅是许多波斯人的家，也是伟大的城市和产业。它也居住着大量的游牧部落。Qashqai和其他团体经常与城市居民发生冲突，导致两国之间代价高昂的冲突，这对国家没有好处。\n我们必须整合Qashqai，让他们在我们的城市中拥有土地，并保证他们使用土地的权利。作为回报，我们要求他们任命传统领导人时需向我们的统治者征求建议。

original: With its close proximity to the gulf trade routes, its great importance to Persian culture and its relative safety from the enemies of our people, Fars is an ideal place from which to rule a Persian state. Let us take inspiration from the great Empires before us and create a capital worthy to this name. We must expand and renovate every part of the capital, building new canals for irrigation, public baths, bazaars, city walls, squares, palaces, mosques, madrassahs and gardens.\nAll who wish should be allowed space to settle here for this will be the greatest capital man has ever seen!
translation: 它靠近海湾的贸易路线，它的波斯文化及与其相关的安全受到我们人民的重视，法尔斯是统治波斯地区的理想场所。让我们从我们之前的伟大帝国中汲取灵感，创造一个名副其实的首都。我们必须扩大和更新首都的每一部分，建设新的灌溉渠、公共浴室、集贸市场、城墙、广场、宫殿、清真寺、宗教学校和花园。\n所有人都应该被允许定居在这里，这将是人们见过最伟大的首都！

original: The Luri people of our state inhabit a region that many would find inhospitable. In fact the Zagros mountains have been seen as a barrier between Iran and Mesopotamia for centuries. This does not bother us as most of our people are used to a nomadic life however, moving their sheep across the slopes and passes as they please.
translation: 我们国家的卢里斯坦人居住在一个许多人认为不适宜居住的地区。事实上，几个世纪以来，扎格罗斯山脉一直被视为伊朗与美索不达米亚之间的一道屏障。然而，这并不会让我们感到困扰，因为我们的大多数人都习惯了游牧生活，他们在山坡上赶羊，并按照自己的意愿行进。

original: When the Kingdom of Malamir ruled this region they used their power to cut a great road out of the mountains, greatly improving the ease of which trade could be conducted across the Zagros while also getting their own cut for the upkeep.\nToday the Kingdom of Malamir is no longer, as Shah Rukh crushed it in the 1420’s, but the road remains. We must learn of the Atabaks and not let their road go to waste. By continuing to ensure its upkeep we ensure that we can provide a valuable service to our neighbors and that we will never go without money.
translation: 当马拉米尔王国统治这一地区时，他们利用他们的力量在群山中开辟出一条伟大的道路，在减少自身维护费的同时，极大地提高了在扎格罗斯地区进行贸易的便利程度。\n今天，沙鲁克在1420年摧毁了马卢米尔王国，但道路依然存在。我们必须学习阿塔博人，不要让他们的道路白白浪费。通过继续维护它，我们可以为我们的邻国提供有价值的服务，并且充盈我们的国库。

original: The nomadic life of most of our subjects can be enticing to some. There are many groups, both nomadic and sedentary, for which there is no longer room in the vast plains of Mesopotamia or the valleys of Iran. People who have found themselves on the losing side of wars, who have been cleared away to make way for irrigation or who have been deemed to unruly to remain when central power was expanded.\nWe should open our arms to these people and allow them to settle as new tribes in our mountains. Nobody will be as determined to defend their new homes such as those who have lost everything
translation: 我们臣民的游牧生活对很多人来说是很诱人的。游牧部落和定居者已经占据了美索不达米亚平原或伊朗的山谷的所有土地。那些处于战争失败方一边的人们，已经被驱除从而方便胜利者定居，或者当中央政权扩张时，他们被认为不能继续居住。\n我们应该向这些人张开双臂，让他们在我们的山脉中作为新的部落定居下来。没有人会像那些失去一切的人一样坚决捍卫他们的新家园。

original: While we know all among our people are good Muslims it is not always clear that the learned sages of the plains would agree with that assessment. Few here speak or read Arabic and many live in relative isolation from the outside world. Between our veneration of local shrines, the emamzadas (descendants of the Imams) and the prevalence of syncretic sects such as Yarsanism, would like strike the most learned of the Ulema as quite unsettling. Yet this openness to variety is also a strength, for it is hard to imagine a people we would have trouble integrating in our society due to religious concerns.
translation: 虽然我们都知道我们的人民都是优秀的穆斯林，但并不清楚我们的圣人是否会同意这种看法。这里很少有人说或读阿拉伯语，许多人与外界相对隔绝。在我们私下对神龛的崇拜、伊玛目的后裔和像雅赛尼派这样的融合教派的盛行之间，打击博学乌勒马的人最让人感到不安。这种多样性的开放也是一种力量，因为很难想象我们会因为宗教问题而在融入社会的过程中遇到麻烦。

original: Some would say that our cloth is not as sophisticated as the silken fabrics of the people of the plains, but the wool our sheep provides allows us to create both robust and beautiful textiles that there is a high demand for far beyond our own lands.
translation: 我们得承认我们生产的的布料没有那些平原地区生产的丝绸精致。但我们这里的绵羊毛可以织出更柔韧，花纹更精美的纺织品，而这在全球市场上无疑是很受欢迎的。

original: Life in the mountains is not always easy. Our people is hard and strong, having endured a lifetime in rough terrain, defending their herds against raiders and withstanding the attacks of foreign invaders when necessary. Over the centuries we have also acted as king-makers and helped various pretenders in the Persian realm.\nNow the time has come to rise for ourselves, to seize the lands around us and to form an army able to destroy those of the sedentary weaklings.
translation: 山中的生活从不是一帆风顺的。我们的人民一生都在这样艰苦的环境下保护他们的牲畜免受劫掠，在必要时出征作战抵御外敌入侵，这些都锻炼了他们坚强的意志以及强健的体魄。几个世纪以来我们也援助过那些波斯王室的窜叛军来让自己的势力得到进一步扩张。\n现在，我们崛起的机会来了，让我们组建一支所向披靡的军队并征服周围的土地，赶走那些无能的懦夫们！

original: Perhaps it is better to look far away for allies rather than in our immediate vicinity. We hold in our lands a number of resources that the European India-Companies desire, and many of their agents have already expressed an interest in further cooperation. Let us forge alliances with the European kingdoms and guarantee the safety of their merchants in exchange for their protection and patronization.
translation: 也许将目光放的更远，才能找到更合适的盟友，而不能拘泥于自己周围。那些在印度经营贸易公司的欧洲人无不对我们的资源垂涎欲滴，他们也曾示意过想加深与我们的合作。让我们与那些欧洲国家们缔结盟约，我们会保证他们的商人在这里通行无阻，而他们也要保障我们的安全，并给予我们经济上的支持。

original: We are the confederation of the Black Sheep. Our lineage goes back to the great Oghuz Khans and our warriors have made the world tremble. Once we bowed our heads to the Ilkhans and Timur but we now stand independent and stronger than ever, ready to take on the leadership of all the Turkic clans of Iran, Anatolia and the Caucasus.
translation: 我们是黑羊部族联盟。我们的世系可以追溯至伟大的乌古斯可汗，我们的军队让整个大陆颤抖。我们曾经对伊儿汗国和帖木儿帝国俯首称臣，但现在我们重获独立，并且拥有着比以往更加强大的力量。我们蓄势待发，一定会征服所有伊朗，安纳托利亚以及高加索地区的突厥部落。

original: While many of our military campaigns against our Timurid overlords have given us valuable experience perhaps the most important gain was the title of Timurid governor, given by Shah Rukh to Jahan Shah in order to help him pacify our people. What Shah Rukh did not realize is that this allows us to claim the legitimacy of the Timur, who once defeated and conquered all states in the Caucasus. This newfound honor gives us a platform to build a lasting hold over the Caucasus, Azerbaijan and perhaps one day even Persia.
translation: 我们在与宗主帖木儿之前的抗争中总结了大量的经验教训，但真正对我们来说十分宝贵的是来自帖木儿帝国的沙哈鲁给予贾汗·沙赫的阿塞拜疆总督的头衔，沙哈鲁想通过他的监管来让我们顺从于他的统治。但沙哈鲁没有想到，这样的头衔使得我们可以去宣称那些帖木儿曾经征服过的高加索地区。这些使得我们日后在高加索地区，阿塞拜疆地区，乃至波斯地区的统治得到进一步巩固。

original: Our region has proven perilous for many invaders.
