The mountains, deserts, plains and forests of the Caucasus and Iran require quick adaptation to local circumstances and a keen eye for strategic and tactical advantages. Our prolonged warfare against other Turkoman federations and the Timurids have allowed us to perfect a dynamic form of warfare, mixing raids, grand maneuver warfare and pitched battles.
translation: 很多入侵者都忌惮我们繁琐的地形。高加索和伊朗地区那高耸的峰峦，无垠的荒漠，错综交错的丛林与平原给予了我们对新环境的适应能力，以及针对特定地形的战术实施能力。我们长长的战场宽度允许我们灵活地穿梭在战场，强大的机动力让我们与那些土库曼联盟以及帖木儿的作战中通过混合突袭，或者正面激战得到更大优势。

original: A truly great ruler is one who knows how to delegate. We have subdued a great number of states over a wide and diverse range of climates and landscapes. If our empire is to grow we must learn to empower local petty dynasties that surrender to our rule, allowing them to tax their own people and raise their own armies in our service.
translation: 一个真正伟大的统治者懂得如何适度下放权力。我们现在控制的省份有着很大的地域跨度，这些地区气候环境各不相同。如果我们的帝国想要继续发展，那我们一定要想办法分散一些权力给其他的一些在我们控制下的小势力。他们会按照他们的准则征税并组织军队，而这些最终都将为我们所用。

original: As conquerors of Iran and Iraq we have inherited the cities and palaces of the great empires before us. If we are to survive and thrive in this region we must add our own monuments and architecture to theirs and patronize the Persianate scholars of our subject peoples.
translation: 作为伊朗和伊拉克的征服者，我们继承了那些曾经名噪一时的帝国的遗产。如果我们想在这里繁衍生息，那么我们应该在那些已有的设施上添砖加瓦，并资助那些臣服于我们的波斯学者。

original: Centuries of warfare, ever since the Mongol invasion, has left the lands of Iran and Mesopotamia devastated. Great irrigation works that once guaranteed the well being of our subjects have been laid to waste and agriculture is held hostage by the whims of the seasons.\nIn the short run we must build up stores of grain so that we can help our people in times of need. In order to secure the future, however, we must restore what was once ruined and rebuild the public works that will allow the Qara Qoyunlu lands to be fertile and productive once more.
translation: 自从蒙古西征以来，连年的战乱让伊朗和美索不达米亚的土地满身疮痍。那些曾经的灌溉工程允许我们供养我们的属国，可现在它们皆已荒废，因此庄稼的收成也只能听天由命。\n在这危急存亡之秋，我们必须广筑粮仓，以此应对爆发的饥荒。同时为了可持续性发展，我们也要重新落实以前的水利灌溉工程，兴建公共设施，这会让我们黑羊的土地变得更加富饶。

original: While our lands might look poor and arid to some it has been blessed in two important ways. The first is that we produce much of the fabled frankincense and myrrh that is demanded by the many peoples of the world.\nThe second is the seasonal monsoon, or Khareef, with its characteristic mist. It ensures that the land is green and even lush for part of the year. Without this water our state could not exist as we know it.
translation: 尽管我们的土地看起来干涸又贫瘠，但它仍然是收到祝福的。首先我们可以在这里栽培“传说中”的乳香和没药，这在全球范围来说都是不可多得的珍宝。\n另外季风也常常与我们心意相通，它往往用那独特的雾气来宣告雨季的到来。这种季风为我们的植被带来了充足的水分，没有了它恐怕我们恐怕也将不复存在。

original: The Mahra have been in this region for a long time. According to some we have been here longer than all other groups of southern Arabia. We have, however, often been a lesser partner of greater neighbors. Mahri soldiers have served in the armies of Yemen or Oman and our mercenaries are what made a name for us abroad rather than our own armies.
translation: 马赫里人民在这片土地扎根很久了，一定程度上来说我们可以说是阿拉伯南端附近资历最老的的了。然而，和我们强大的邻国们相比我们常常处于一个相对尴尬的被动地位。周围的也门和阿曼常常租借我们的军队外出征战，所以，和常备军相比，我们的佣兵往往更受人们的欢迎。

original: Our language is unlike many of the others spoken in this peninsula, many even make a difference between the Mahri and Arabs. Be that as it may our people descend from the sons of the great Mahra bin Haydan bin Qahtan bin Yarub. Since time immemorial our people have been divided in two groups. The Banu Sar control the coastal Mahra country while the Banu Shahawih control the inland.\nIf we are to prosper we must unite the inland and the tribes of the inland and the coastal tribes. For both groups are needed to both defend and expand our country.
translation: 我们的语言风格和其他在阿拉伯半岛上的国家差异甚大，马赫里语和阿拉伯语之间有很多出入。

original: We have sailed the waters of the Arabian Sea for hundreds of years and few captains know the waters as well as we do. There are Mahri communities from the Swahili cities of East Africa to the bustling suburbs of Cairo or Basra. Our maritime heritage has made our sailors highly sought after not only to man ships, but also as valuable pilots to guide ships of all nations through treacherous or unknown waters.
translation: 我们已经在阿拉伯海这里遨游了数百年了，很少有其他的船长能在对海洋的理解方面与我们的船长相媲美。我们的马赫里人从东非的斯瓦西里漂洋过海来到熙熙攘攘的开罗和巴士拉。我们总结的海军经验不仅让我们的水手更娴熟地在船上工作，也让那些提督们快速跨过未知的危险水域。

original: The Camels of Mahra are famous far beyond our own borders. They were valued by the Caliphs of old and ancient poets, such as Abu Tammam, have sung praise to their names. We have even been told that in faraway countries the very name Mahri or ‘Mehari’ have become synonymous with a riding camel.\nThe Mahri camels have served pilgrims, merchants and raiders well for centuries. As our state expands and modernizes we must continue to maintain the ancient breeding and keeping traditions that has allowed us to foster such versatile beasts of burden.
translation: 马赫里的骆驼的名声已经远远传出我们的边境。阿布塔马姆，一位伟大的诗人，曾经为它们题写诗篇。一定程度上，人们一提到马赫拉，脑海第一浮现的往往就是我们的骆驼。\n几个世纪以来，那些朝圣者，商人，甚至是一些作战的士兵，都经常与马赫里骆驼为伴。随着我们领土的扩张以及社会的蓬勃发展，我们仍要铭记我们的古老传统，继续训练这些于我们有益的骆驼。

original: The skill and experience of our navigators is known from Zanzibar to Timor, but we cannot risk trade secrets dying with a single man. We should have our best navigators compile a new handbook for navigation. Up to date and with no secrets kept, for the benefit of future generations of seamen.
translation: 我们精湛的航海技术从桑给巴尔到帝汶岛无人不知无人不晓。但我们决不能将这些秘密烂在肚子里而不传承下去。我们现在应该督促我们最伟大的航海家编纂一本航海宝典，毫无保留地将这些与时俱进的经验教育传给我们的下一代海员。

original: Traditionally much of the power in our society has been in the hands of the ‘Mukaddams’, chiefs that control the various communities in the inland, while our Sultans have spent much of the year on the island of Socotra. This can sometimes lead to unnecessary bloodspill internally and even new conflicts arising with our neighbors.\nIt is time we step in to control the chiefs or, if need be, replace them with more loyal servants.
translation: 一般来讲，我们国家的很大一部分权力被握在“穆卡达姆”，即内陆不同群族的酋长的手中，而我们的苏丹通常在索科拉岛上处理事务。长时间内部的分歧这有时会导致不必要的冲突。\n现在是时候让那些酋长言听计从了，或者干脆让那些真正臣服我们的人接管他们的位置。

original: Ever since ancient times Yemen has been known as the felicitous Arabia. Where much of the peninsula is barren, deserted and dry, Yemen has been blessed with a mild highland climate, rainfall and good farmland. From the coastal cities of the low-lying Tihama to the terrace farmlands of the Yemeni highlands, our country is prosperous and arable.
translation: 也门一直被誉为富饶的阿拉伯地区。虽然阿拉伯半岛的土地大多是荒芜而贫瘠的，也门却有着温和的山地气候，适度的降雨量，以及肥沃的土地。从低洼的沿海城市帖哈麦到也门高地的梯田，我们的国家繁荣而富强。

original: Every year an incredible number of ships cross the Arabian and Indian Oceans to deliver spices, cotton, silk, gems, incense, slaves and other highly sought after goods, between Egypt and India. In order to make this journey they must pass the Bab-el-Mandeb, a tiny strait between our coastline and Africa. We must make good use of the power our position gives us, both by protecting the many trade ships in our waters, and by making them pay for the trouble.
translation: 每年成千上万的商船穿过阿拉伯海和印度洋来进行交易，数不清的香料，棉花，丝绸，香，奴隶和一些其他贸易品往来于埃及和阿拉伯之间。而位于我们与非洲交界处的曼德海峡便是这条航线的必经之路。我们一定要对其加以利用，既可以保护我们的贸易，又可以痛宰我们的对手。

original: The rulers of Yemen through the centuries have all wanted to leave their mark on the land, and they have seldom been poor. It is time we make use of our wealth to build great works of irrigation, construct our own Madrasahs and castles, so that we can rival the dynasties of old. Let no visitor have any doubts that they have arrived in the most impressive of Arabian countries.
translation: 也门的历代统治者都曾在这里留在他们的足迹，当然他们在财政方面从来都鲜有难色。我们现在可以利用我们的财富去修建水利设施，伊斯兰学校，以及城堡，以此追赶那些比我们有更多阅历的古国。不要让任何一位来访者质疑我们在阿拉伯半岛的伟大地位。

original: The Yemeni inland, the highlands and even the lowland around the coastal cities is home to a variety of strong tribal leaders. Many of these clans can field strong groups of warriors that have proved very capable of ejecting foreign invaders over the centuries, they are, however, just as likely to turn on our own tax collectors.\nIt is time we properly unite these warring tribes to create a loyal population, united against our common enemies rather than disjointed groups intent on always defending their own autonomy.
translation: 也门的内陆，高地，甚至沿海低地曾经属于一些强大的部落。这些部落里强壮的战士一直保卫他们的领地，驱逐侵略者。\n现在，我们应该统一这些不和的部落了，这样可以增加我们的人口，一起对抗共同的敌人，而不是为了自己的利益自相残杀。

original: For centuries Yemeni traders have set out from ports such as Zabid, Mocha or Aden and some dynasties have even placed their capitals on these coastline cities. Rainfall and soil may have made Yemen a thriving country but trade is what sustains our wealth. We must support our traders and merchants in all that we do for without them our state would be of little consequence.
translation: 几个世纪以来，也门的商人们在扎比德，摩卡，以及亚丁等港口城市活跃，而这些地方也是历代王朝的都城。充足的雨量和肥沃的土壤让我们自给自足，而真正让我们发家致富的是商业和贸易。我们一定要支持我们的商人，没有了他们我们的国家将一事无成。

original: Our position in this world is very attractive and this will always mean that we draw unwanted attention from countries near and far. It is time we use the wealth and influence we have built up to secure alliances and guarantees from the great powers of this world, to safeguard our positions both on land and at sea.
translation: 作为中东地区最南端的国家，我们不可避免的吸引了全世界许多国家的目光。我们应该利用积蓄的财富来和其他强权缔结盟约，这样既保护了我们的领土的主权，又保证了在海上的贸易流通。

original: Where other Shias await a hidden Imam or hide among Sunnis, Sufis or other heresy, our people instead follow the Zaidi Imam. He is our leader in the worldly, as well as the spiritual realm, and he and his descendants will always guide us against infidel, heretic or any other enemy that might cross our path.
translation: 当其他什叶派信徒仍在等待隐遁的伊玛目或是在逊尼派治下躲躲藏藏，我们的人们却早已追随宰德伊玛目的教诲。他是我们在俗世和精神世界的领袖，他和他的后代将永远引导我们对抗异教徒，异端或任何其他可能阻挡我们道路的敌人。

original: Yemen has always had a reputation as the most fertile and felicitous part of Arabia, and this is true. There are few places in this peninsula with as good farmland or as much rainfall as ours. The Yemeni highlands that we call home are especially temperate and welcoming in many ways, here we can grow both food and the famous coffee plants of our people.
translation: 也门一直被誉为阿拉伯半岛最肥沃和适宜的区域，而且这也是事实。这个半岛少有像我们这样的好耕地和高降雨量。我们称之为家园的也门高地，各方面来说都尤其温和宜居，在这里我们可以种植食物和我们人民著名的咖啡作物。

original: For too long the scions of our dynasty have fought each other for leadership of our state. It is time we find a strong leader who can take the Rassid faithful and lead us to victory against foreign enemies and dissenting internal tribes alike.
translation: 长久以来，我们的王朝的后代为争取国家的领导权而互相争斗。 现在是时候让我们找寻一个强大的领导者了，他可以接纳伊本·拉希德的信徒，带领我们取得胜利，对抗外敌和敌对的内部部族。

original: In our defiance of the worldly rulers that seek to control our country we have often had to build strong defensive structures. The Yemeni highland have always had to be full of defensive installations, from great forts to small towers. This attitude of constant vigilance is one we must take with us as we expand into the lowlands and other areas. We must always be vigilant and ready to defend what is ours.
translation: 在我们对抗试图控制我们国家的世俗统治者的过程中，我们往往不得不建立强大的防御建筑。 也门高地一直都布满防御设施，从大堡垒到小哨塔。 这种不断警惕的态度，是我们向低地等区域拓展时也不能抛弃的。 我们必须时刻保持警惕，准备好捍卫我们的东西。

original: It has been said that a foreign commander once said that troops sent to Yemen would ‘melt away as salt dissolved in water’. While this is a testament to how hostile this land can be to an outside invader it is also a goal we must strive for. Let us unify our people and all work to defeat any outside invaders. United there is nothing we could not do!
translation: 据说一名外国指挥官曾经说过，派往也门的部队会“像溶解在水中的盐一样融化”。 虽然这喻示了这块土地对外界的侵略是多么的抱有敌意，但这也是我们必须争取的目标。 让我们统一我们的人民，全力打败外来的侵略者。 团结起来就没有什么是我们做不到的！

original: Just as we control the source of most of the world's coffee we are in a unique position to control the Red Sea trade, as well as the overland trade in Arabia. This source of wealth must be exploited.
translation: 正如我们控制世界大部分咖啡的来源一样，我们处于控制红海贸易以及阿拉伯地区陆路贸易的独特地位。 这个财富来源必须被利用。

original: The Musha’sha’ know that Sayyid Muhammad bin Falah is the embodiment of the Mahdi and it is according to his will that we have carved out a state for the righteous in these lands. We are strengthened by our faith and the mystical exaltation that allow us to perform extraordinary acts, in the name of his radiant dynasty. The end is near and it is time the world learn to follow the teachings of the Musha’sha’!
translation: 穆沙萨人知道赛义德·穆罕默德·本·法拉赫是救世主的化身，遵从他的意志我们在这片土地上为信义之人雕刻出了一个国家。 我们的信仰和神秘的喜悦使我们强大，这允许我们能够以他光辉灿烂的王朝之名成就非凡的举动。 末日将至，现在是让世界学习遵循穆萨沙教义的时候了！

original: Messianic Legacy of Muhammad bin Falah
translation: 穆罕默德·本·法拉赫先知的遗产

original: Spreading the word of Sayyid Muhammad and his descendants is more than a mission for the Musha’sha’, it is our duty. We must enlighten all those that we come to rule as well as spread the word to the oppressed subjects of our neighbors.
translation: 传播赛义德·穆罕默德和他后代的教诲不仅是穆萨沙的使命，更是我们的责任。 我们必须开导所有由我们来统治的人，并且把这些训言传播给邻国被压迫的臣民。

original: The area around the Shatt al-Arab to the Persian gulf is a maze of rivers, swamps and islands that any invader will find very hard to control or even navigate. Using the landscape to our advantage has been the way of the Musa’sha’ warriors since the inception of our state and finding ways to make use of this experience as we expand will allow us to continue to defeat foes that would appear stronger than we are.
translation: 阿拉伯河到波斯湾周围的地区是河流，沼泽和岛屿的迷宫，任何侵略者都很难控制甚至找寻到方向。 自我们的国家成立以来，利用这种地形是我们国家的穆萨沙战士进行战斗的方式，并且在我们扩张的时候设法利用这个经验将使我们能够继续击败比我们更强大的敌人。

original: The Mushasha message have always rung through to the righteous but it has an especially strong influence among the arabic tribes of Iraq and northern Arabia. The support that we enjoy from these tribes is a strength that we should put to good use both to rule and expand our influence.
translation: 穆萨沙的福音总是应合正道，但对伊拉克和阿拉伯北部的阿拉伯部落的影响力却是尤其强大。 我们从这些部落得到的支持，是我们应该善加利用来统治和扩大影响力的一个力量。

original: While our state has come a long way since its founding by Muhammad ibn Falah we are still carriers of his legacy, and his descendants are still of central importance to the Mushasha government. Over the years however his dynasty has grown and much time and energy is lost to intrigue, factionalism and plotting between the branches and their various supporters. Let us settle these differences once and for all and establish a clear succession for who is head of the family.
translation: 虽然我们的国家自穆罕默德·伊本·法拉赫建立以来已经走过了很长的路，但我们仍然是他遗产的继承者，他的后代仍然是穆萨沙政府的核心。 多年来，他的王朝已经成长起来，但许多时间和精力却被家族各分支和他们支持者之间的阴谋和宗派主义所消耗。 让我们一劳永逸地解决这些分歧，并确立明晰的继承顺序来决定谁是家族之长。

original: Having friends is a necessity in a hostile world. Our religious convictions make it unlikely that anyone will consider us anything else than heretics, something that can make it hard to find partners among our neighbors. We must therefore not be afraid of doing what we can to cultivate good relations with stronger states in our vicinity.
translation: 在这个充满敌意的世界中拥有朋友是必要的。 我们的宗教信仰使任何人都把我们当成异端分子，这使我们很难在邻居中找到伙伴。 因此，我们应该毫不犹豫尽我们所能与邻近的强国建立良好的关系。

original: Sufis and Shias of the Middle East

There are many Shias in the lands of Iran and Iraq that have had to lead lives in secret for centuries. Waiting for the Mahdi to finally reveal himself and even among the ones who consider themselves Sunnis there are those, wise from years of sufi practices, who show a great interest in the new teachings of the Musha’sha’. Let us invite these men and women to our lands, some will undoubtedly bring our theology further while others can help us develop the lands that we now control.
translation: 伊朗和伊拉克的土地上有许多什叶派，几百年来不得不秘密地生活着。这些等待先知马赫迪最终现身的人，还有那些信仰苏菲派实践多年的明智者，甚至那些认为自己是逊尼派的人当中，都有人对穆萨沙的新教义表现出极大的兴趣。 让我们邀请这些男人和女人到我们的土地，有些人无疑会进一步增进我们的神学理论，而另外一些人则可以帮助我们开发我们现在控制的土地。

original: From the high Hindu Kush, the rivers of Helmand, Khash Rud, Farah Rud and Harut Rud all converge on Lake Hamun and the Gud-i Zirah depression. This creates a special type of irrigated lowland that is different from the surrounding deserts and mountains. The lake, said to contain the seed of Zoroaster, has been imperative to the well being of our people over the centuries both as a center of irrigation and to drive our watermills.
translation: 从兴都库什山脉流下的赫尔曼德河，哈什河，法拉河和哈鲁特河都汇集在赫尔曼德湖和古德里拉河谷。 这创造了一个特殊类型的灌溉低地，不同于周围的沙漠和山脉。 湖泊里据说有琐罗亚斯德的后裔，而且几百年来对我们人民的生活至关重要，其既是灌溉的中心，也是驱动我们水磨坊的动力来源。

original: For 200 years Sistan was the base for the Saffarid dynasty, overcoming the Tahirid governors of the Abbasid caliphate they were able to carve out an empire in Eastern Persia. While the Saffarid Empire did not last for long, the dynasty demonstrated the strength that the people of Sistan can possess. We should strive to emulate our Saffarid ancestors and remember that what looks like a distant province is actually the seeds of empire.
translation: 200年以来，锡斯坦是萨法尔王朝的根据地，在推翻了阿拔斯王朝哈里发政府任命的塔希尔王朝的总督后，他们最终在东波斯开创了一个帝国。 虽然萨法尔帝国并不长久，但王朝却显示了锡斯坦人民所拥有的力量。 我们应该努力效法我们的萨法尔祖先，并记住，看似偏远的省份实际上却能够孕育出一个帝国。

original: We control the forts and cities of Sistan but in the mountains, hills and deserts that surround our state there are many tribes that lead a life almost entirely independent of our rule. We must subdue the tribes of these areas both in order to safeguard the peace in the lowlands and to extend our control over the highlands.
translation: 我们控制锡斯坦的堡垒和城市，但在我们国家周围的高山，丘陵和沙漠中，有许多部落过着几乎完全独立于我们统治的生活。 我们必须征服这些地区的部落，以维护低地的和平，扩大对高地的控制。

original: Sistan’s time as a great empire may have been short but for centuries we have provided armies and leaders for the wars of Ilkhans, Karts, and Timurids. We should proudly preserve this tradition of service in our ranks as we make good use of the experience earned in the war of foreign powers.
translation: 锡斯坦作为一个伟大帝国的时间可能是短暂的，但几个世纪以来，我们已经为伊儿汗国，卡尔提德王朝和帖木儿王朝的战争提供了许多军队和将领。 我们应该自豪地把这种服役的传统保留在我们的部队中，以使我们充分利用在对外战争中所获得的经验。

original: We control important points on the overland routes between Afghanistan, Khorasan and Iran. Lands that have historically often been considered unsafe by traders, with some daring to cross them despite the dangers that they pose. We should create a network of well guarded stopping points for caravans and do our utmost to protect any traders in our realm. In this way we can encourage the transit trade to grow and attract more wealth to our realm.
translation: 我们控制阿富汗，呼罗珊和伊朗之间的陆路贸易路线上的重要节点。 这些地方历史上往往被贸易商认为是不安全的土地，但仍有无视危险敢于通行的商人。我们应该建立一个有守卫的商队停靠网点，并尽全力保护我们领土内的任何贸易商。 通过这种方式，我们可以鼓励过境贸易的发展，为我们的国家吸引更多的财富。

original: Through the centuries the dynasties of Sistan have often found it wise to chronicle their own history as rulers of the province. This is a wise tradition that we should follow. Unlike them however we would do well to first compile all old histories of Sistan so that we might create a new great work over the history of this kingdom from ancient times until today.
translation: 几个世纪以来，锡斯坦王朝经常发现，作为该省的统治者将其历史编年记录下来是明智的。 这是我们应该遵循的一个明智传统。 然而不同于他们，我们最好先把锡斯坦的所有旧史汇编起来，以使我们可以创作出一部伟大的新作，记录这个王国从古至今的所有历史。

original: Sistan was once a center of culture, religion and scholarship. We should once again aspire to these qualities. By inviting scholars, founding schools, mosques and charities we can restore the reputation of what once was, to the general benefit of our people and government.
translation: 锡斯坦曾经是文化，宗教和学术的中心。 我们应该重新追求这些美名。 通过邀请学者，创办学校，清真寺和慈善机构，我们可以恢复曾经的声誉，增进我们人民和政府的普遍利益。

original: Surrounded by mountains on all sides Tabarestan follow the entire Caspian coastline. It is a mild and wet area, ideal for rice cultivation, with some of the oldest cities in the Iranian region. In times of war and upheaval Tabarestan is also often left at peace due to its protected position, and therefore boasts a large population compared to its size. This relative peace and old settlements has also made all the countries of Tabarestan important stops on the Silk Road, allowing us to benefit from the wealthy Trans-Asiatic Trade networks.
translation: 塔巴里斯坦沿着整个里海沿岸，且被群山包围。这是一个温和湿润的地区，非常适合种植水稻，还有一些伊朗地区最古老的城市。在战争和动乱时期，塔巴里斯坦由于其优越的地理位置也经常不被战火波及，因此人口繁荣增长得与其大小都不相称。这个相对和平和古老的定居点也使塔巴里斯坦诸国成为丝绸之路上的重要节点，使我们能够从富有的跨亚洲贸易网络中受益。

original: All around us great kingdoms are collapsing. We have seen Timurid princes fight over the destroyed remnants of their ancestral legacy, while turkic tribesmen combat over the mountains of Azerbaijan. Millenarianism is gripping the people all over Persia and many are taking up arms against their old rulers. If we to survive in such a time of turmoil we must form a strong army of our own, manned by the local soldiers that for generations have seen foreign conquerors come and go. It is time we look not only to defend ourselves but to strike at those who will surely otherwise devour us.
translation: 我们周围的大国正在崩溃。 我们已经看到帖木儿诸侯们为他们祖先的遗产大打出手，而突厥部落战士则在阿塞拜疆的山脉中作战。千禧年主义正在吸引波斯各地的人民，许多人拿起武器反对他们的旧统治者。如果我们要在这样一个动荡的时期生存下去，就必须组建我们自己的强大的军队，由当地的士兵组成，他们几代人都见过外国的征服者来来去去。现在我们不仅要保护自己，还要击败那些一定会来侵吞我们的人。

original: The Caspian shoreline is a land of forests, wetlands and rice paddies, but most of all it is a land of silkworm plantations and mulberry plantations. As the home of its own type of mulberry tree and as the first region to cultivate silkworms in Iran, we now have a tradition of silk production going back almost a millennium. The silk produced in our cities is famous not only in Iran and Khorasan, it is well known in the cities of Italy, France and Germany, as they all seek to import as much of this rare commodity as they can lay their hands on. The only limit on how much their merchants purchase from us is how much we can produce. There are however ways we might still make the silk production business more efficient. Let us expand the silk production so that we may grow rich while our weavers fashion the world.
translation: 里海沿岸遍布森林，湿地和稻田，但最重要的是蚕园和桑园。作为有自己独特品种的桑树之乡，作为伊朗第一个养殖蚕的地区，我们生产丝绸的传统可以追溯到将近千年前。我们的城市生产的丝绸不仅在伊朗和呼罗珊闻名遐迩，而且在意大利，法国和德国的城市都很有名气，他们都试图尽可能多地进口这种稀有商品。他们的商人从我们这里购买数量的唯一限制是我们能生产多少。不过，我们仍然可以使丝绸生产更有效率。让我们扩大丝绸的生产，使我们的织布风行世界，给我们带来财富。

original: Increasing number of hostile ships are putting our oversea trade in the Caspian at risk. Whether foreign countries or pirates we can never tolerate that others pray on the trade that is the livelihood of our country. While a full navy might not be possible in the Caspian Sea we must be ready to construct a number of ships to patrol the great inland sea at any cost, even if it means bringing in shipbuilders from very distant countries.
translation: 越来越多的敌对舰船使我们在里海的贸易处于危险之中。无论是外国敌舰还是海盗，我们决不能容忍别人染指我们国家的生命线。尽管在里海难以备有一支完完整整的海军，但我们必须随时准备建造一定数目的船只，不惜一切代价巡逻这个大的内陆海域，即使这意味着我们必须从非常遥远的国家引进造船厂。

original: There are many countries that have made this region their home, even within our borders there is a number of local rulers of ancient dynasties that enjoy a high degree of autonomy. We cannot allow this to continue much longer, we must reduce the castles of such local princes and put people we can trust in charge of ruling the land.
translation: 有很多国家把这个地区当成了自己的家园，甚至在我们的国土上也有一些远古王朝血脉的地方统治者，享有高度的自治权。 我们不能再允许这种状况延续下去，我们必须减少这些地方诸侯的城堡，指派我们可以信任的人统治这片土地。

original: This region has often been a safe haven for people of different cultures and religions. Sheikhs, warlords or merchants can all find a place here. Perhaps it is because of this that Tabarestan has acquired such a heterogenous population. Living among the small states of the Tabarestani coast there’s everything from Sunnis and Zoroastrians to Shia Nizaris, Zaidis and Jafaris. This is in many ways thanks to the protection of the mountains that surround us.\nThe best way to work for peace however, is to prepare for war. We must build strong fortresses to guard the passes that lead through the mountains that protect us, and keep strong garrisons at hand to protect the freedom we enjoy.
translation: 这个地区往往是不同文化和宗教的人们的避风港。 谢赫，军阀或商人都可以在这里找到一个容身之所。也许正因为如此，塔巴斯坦已经获得了相当数目的异族人口。生活在塔巴里斯坦沿岸的小国，其信仰从逊尼派和琐罗亚斯德教到什叶派的尼扎里派，宰德派和贾法里斯派都有。这在很多方面得益于我们周围群山的保护。\n然而，为和平而努力的最好方式就是为战争做准备。我们必须建立强大的堡垒，以保护通行群山的道路，并保持强大的驻军，以捍卫我们享有的自由。

original: As a stop on the silk road our country has long prospered from trade and traders from Armenia, India, Russia or other faraway places are a frequent sight in our cities. We would do well to further ease trading by constructing more caravanserai and inviting the many merchants that still pass through this region to settle and make a life for themselves in our cities.
translation: 作为丝绸之路上的节点,我们国家长期从贸易中获利,来自亚美尼亚,印度,俄罗斯甚至更远的地方的贸易者在我们的城市内随处可见.我们应该尽力去进一步通过建立商队旅馆,邀请许多仍在此区域的商人留下并永远留在在我们的城市内来放慢这些贸易.

original: We have enemies in all directions, making a strong army a necessity for a state such as ours. Fortunately we are not a weak people. From the irregular Gazis and the Akinci raiders to the Sipahis of the Ottoman Empire the world have come to know the military might of the Turkish people. Let us build an army for an Empire, taking inspiration from wherever military competence can be found while also drawing from the strengths and experiences of those that came before us.
translation: 我们的敌人无处不在，因而我们很有必要建立一支强大的军队。幸运的是我们并不弱小，从非常规的加齐以及阿金希人掠夺者，到奥斯曼帝国的斯帕希骑兵，世界已经知晓了突厥强大的军事力量。让我们为帝国建立一支军队，在任何能为军队所用的地方寻找灵感，并同时学习先人的经验。

original: Since the fall of Rûm the Turkish people have been divided, serving minor Beys from the bosphorus to the mountains of Kurdistan. It was our duty to restore the legacy of the Seljuk Sultans of Rûm and unite the Anatolian Turks. Our ambition however must be much higher than that. The Seljuk Turks once ruled one of the greatest empires known to man, it is evident to anyone who sees our empire that the restoration of this state is now our destiny, as is the reclamation of the Roman lands that were once ruled from what is now our heartland.
translation: 自罗姆苏丹国的衰落以来，突厥人民已经被分裂了，服侍自博斯普鲁斯至库尔德斯坦群山中的贝伊们。收回塞尔柱罗姆苏丹国的遗产与联合安纳托利亚突厥民族是我们的与生俱来的权利。我们的雄心也绝不仅这点，塞尔柱突厥是曾无人不晓的伟大帝国，正因他们曾在我们的腹地统治世界。任何人都知道我们重建帝国与光复罗马故土乃是天命所归。

original: Rûm was not only an Anatolian state but also one that strongly honored the Persian traditions of kingship. Especially as Persia itself fell to Mongol conquerors. Under the sultans before us Persianate culture blossomed and Persian poets and scholars found patronage. Men such as Najm al-Din Razi, Qane'i Tusi, Baha' al-Din Walad and Rumi himself made their homes under Rûm’s protection and the Sultans themselves were versed in Persian literature and poetry.\nWe must cherish our Persian legacy as well as our Turkish and aspire to make our homeland a paragon of Persianate culture, the foremost of Islamic nations.
translation: 罗姆不仅仅只是一个在安纳托利亚的国家而已,同时也极度遵从波斯的王权传统.特别是波斯早已沦陷于蒙古侵略者之手.在先祖的统治时期,波斯文化百花齐放,波斯诗人和学者无不被赞助.像是Najm al-Din Razi，Qane'i Tusi，Baha' al-Din Walad 和 Rumi一样的伟人们都被罗姆所庇护并在此安家,苏丹们也都精通波斯文学与诗歌. \n我们必须珍惜我们的突厥文化一般珍视波斯遗产并立志让我们的祖国成为继承波斯文化的典范,伊斯兰国家的先驱.

original: The Sultans of Rûm ruled over the people of Anatolia, Muslims and Christians. It was during their reign that Islam became the dominant religion in the region but their policies accepted all subjects. Often inviting even Christians from the nearby lands to seek out the domain of Rûm. We would do well to learn from their example.
translation: 罗姆的苏丹统治着安纳托利亚的人民,不论是基督徒还是穆斯林.就是那时伊斯兰成了这个地区的主流信仰,但他们的政策海纳百川,接纳所有的信仰.这使得邻近国家的人,甚至是基督徒,都会自发的来到罗姆.我们应该从这个例子中学习经验.

original: Like the Rûm sultans of the past we must establish a strong and durable navy that can withstand both Christian pirates and the fleets of other Muslims. The ability to control and expand over the Mediterranean and protect our coastlines is going to be one of the main challenges of our Empire.
translation: 正如过去的罗姆苏丹国一般,我们必须建立一支强大而又坚挺的海军,帮助我们抵御基督海盗以及其他穆斯林国家的舰队.夺得地中海甚至之外的控制权并保护我们的海岸线对我们的帝国来说是首要的目标之一.

original: The greatest of Sultans require grand monuments and buildings. Let us make the lands of Rûm the envy of the Islamic world, with mosques, madrasas, caravanserai, gardens, canals and palaces unlike any other. Through architectural patronage we can create an enduring and unique legacy for our dynasty.
translation: 只有大量的纪念碑与建筑才配得上最伟大的苏丹.让我们用清真寺,宗教学院,商队旅馆,花园,运河以及宫殿等等不同于他人的建筑把罗姆的土地打造成伊斯兰世界仰慕之地.有着前人的范例我们就可以为我们的王朝建造一个流传后世的,独一无二的遗产.

original: Our predecessors were always ready to defend the righteous and to combat the spread of heretical sects. So too must we do our utmost to promote the pure forms of religious worship and limit the the influence of heretical rulers who would otherwise try to seduce and mislead the faithful.
translation: 我们的继任者致力于守护正义并与异端学派的传播作斗争.所以我们应该尽最大的努力去促进正统学派的权威并削弱那些尝试勾引,让正统学派走上歪路的异端的统治者的影响.

original: Ardabil is where Safi al-din Ardabili lived and worked. His shrine continues to be the political and military center of the Safaviyya or Safavid Order, a strong mystic order still led by his successors. The Safavids have a strong influence on all politics both in Ardabil and surrounding countries and as long as we work closely their religious fervor will allow us to defeat enemies many times our size.
translation: 阿尔达比勒是萨菲丁-阿尔达比利居住与活动的地方，他的圣陵随后成为了萨法维耶或萨法维教团的政治与军事中心，一个由他的继承人带领的强大而神秘的组织。萨法维教团对阿尔达比勒以及周围国家的政治事务各方面都有着巨大的影响，只要我们密切的与之合作，他们的宗教热情就能让我们击败众多敌人。

original: Whether they profess to be Shiites or not mystical Islam and support of Ali is widespread among the Turkoman tribesmen of Iran, Anatolia and the Caucasus. The Safavids have quickly come to gain strong support among these groups and many are now flocking to their banners. Styling themselves 'Qizilbash' or 'Redheads', after their characteristic red hats, they could be the core of a new army, ready to fight and die for the head of the Safavids.
translation: 不管他们自称是什叶派或者其它神秘的伊斯兰学派,对阿里的支持在伊朗,安纳托利亚和高加索的土库曼部族广泛传播.萨法维教团很快的取得了这些团体的强力支持而且大量部族已经跟随在它的旗下.被命名为'基齐勒巴什'或者 '红头兵',以他们那典型的红色帽子命名,他们能成为新军的核心部分,并随时准备好为了萨法维教团战斗至死.

original: Millenarian sects have begun to spring up all around the Iranian lands but we know that our sheikhs are the only legitimate Shii rulers in the world. We must spread the word of the Sheikhs of Ardabil and force any Shiite masters in the territory under our control to accept that they are but deputies for our messianic authority.
translation: 千禧年主义结社异端已经开始在伊朗的土地上传播,但我们知道我们的谢赫才是唯一指定的世界的什叶派的统治者.我们必须传播阿尔达比勒谢赫的话语并强迫任何在我们控制之下的领土的什叶派教团的领袖们接受我们的救世主的权威.

original: For a long time this region has been an heterodox mix of religions, with honor of Ali and the Sunni Caliphs existing side by side. We must show those troubled the right way by clearly outlining what it is to worship properly, and acting to limit the Sunni influence of our enemies among at least the lower classes. Punishing those that do not comply if needed.
translation: 长时间以来这个地区就是非正统信仰的集合,对阿里与逊尼哈里发的拥护共同存在.我们必须向这些干扰正途的做个示范,清楚地告诉他们什么是正确的信仰,同时限制逊尼派敌人的影响力至最低.适当地的惩罚对那些拒不执行的人是很有必要的.

original: The enemies of our state are many but we also have the support of Shias, Alevis and Sufi orders far beyond our borders. Let us work together with these elements so that no Sunni Empire can feel too safe before before the armies of the faithful.
translation: 我们的国家有着许多的敌人,但我们也有着远在国外什叶派，阿列维斯和苏菲教团的支持.让我们与这些教团一同合作,让逊尼派帝国在真信者的军队面前颤抖吧!

original: Shiites have always been a minority in the Muslim world and apart from the Fatimid caliphate, centuries ago, there has not been any major Shiite governments. This means that unlike the many Sunni dynasties that have ruled this region before us, we do not have a complete legal and institutional framework to stand on. In order for our growing state to thrive we must do our utmost to create our own, lasting, institutions for Shiite law and administration.\nLet us invite foreign Shia religious scholars, such as the Amilis from the Levant, to help us shape an enduring framework for our state.
translation: 什叶派一直是伊斯兰世界的少数派,而且除了数个世纪之前的法蒂玛哈里发,就再没出现过强大的什叶派国家.这意味着不同于此前统治者这一地区的逊尼派王朝,我们并没有一个完备的法典以及制度框架来支撑我们.为了让我们成长中的国家兴旺,我们必须尽力创立我们自己的,延续的,为了什叶派法而制定的制度和行政系统. \n让我们邀请国外的什叶宗教专家,像是黎凡特的阿米里,来帮助我们国家塑造一个持久的框架.

original: What started as a religious sect in Ardabil is now ready to claim overlordship over all Iranian lands. The time has come to take our rightful place among the great nations of this world, and the Persian Empires that came before us.
translation: 以阿尔达比勒的一个教派起家,我们现在已经能宣布对整个伊朗地区的统治权.是时候取得我们在强国之间正当的地位了,正如此前的波斯帝国一般.

original: Georgia has one of the oldest Christian churches in the world, tracing its roots back to the Christianization of the region by Saint Nino, over a Millennium ago. Through the centuries the Georgian church has served as an increasingly unifying force in all Georgian states up to the unification of the country under the Bagrationi dynasty. From then on the Church has served as a central element in Georgian culture, in the face of Byzantine as well as Mongol or Muslim influence. With few other Christian kingdoms left in this region and with the splintered loyalties within Georgia today the Church still has an important role to play as a unifying force against outsiders.
translation: 格鲁吉亚有着世界上最古老的基督教堂之一,追根溯源可到圣尼诺基督化这个地区--一千年前.尽管数个世纪以来,格鲁吉亚教会就作为一个驱动整个格鲁吉亚地区的日益统一的力量,直到全国都归于巴格拉季昂王朝统治之下.自那时起,在面对拜占庭、蒙古人或穆斯林的影响时,教会就作为格鲁吉亚文化的一个核心.如今只有少数基督王国还在此地区留存,但有着分散的格鲁吉亚境内的忠诚者,教会依旧作为一个面对外敌时让我们统一的重要力量.

original: Georgia has gone through a tumultuous time over the last centuries since the Mongol invasion. At times divided and with an increasing influence of local nobles, and changing outside pressure, the old Georgian Feudal system has been de facto made obsolete in some ways, or at least been partially discarded. It is time to create order and regulation among the Georgian nobility and people. We should create a new work of rules, guidelines and regulations, detailing the obligations of subjects and nobles towards the king and the state. A solid legal foundation for the legal bodies of our kingdom is the only way to go forward.
translation: 自蒙古入侵以来,格鲁吉亚已经经历了一段动荡不安的时期.分裂的持续与本地贵族持续增长的影响力与不断改变的外部压力,旧的格鲁吉亚封建制事实上已经在某种意义上过时了,或者应当抛弃一部分.是时候创立格鲁吉亚贵族与人民的秩序和行为准则了.我们应当编写新的法典,规章以及制度,详细的阐述人民与贵族对国王与国家的义务.有着坚实的法律基础的我们王国的法律机构是唯一让我们向前进的方法.

original: Samtskhe is in many ways a cultural and religious borderland, right where Christianity and Islam meet in the Caucasus, and where Turks, Armenians, Mongols, Greek and Turkomans mix and and live side by side. This has been the source of many conflicts in our past but it has also made our state different than other parts of Georgia. The fact that our rulers use the Turkic title Atabeg, is but one sign of how different we are to the other parts of Georgia.
translation: 萨姆茨赫在许多方面都是文化与宗教的交界处,就在这里基督教与伊斯兰在高加索相遇,也是在这里,突厥、蒙古、希腊、土库曼文化融合交汇,并存.这曾是我们过去许多冲突的根源,但这也让我们与格鲁吉亚的其他部分不同.事实上我们的统治者使用土耳其头衔阿他贝格,这就是我们与格鲁吉亚其他部分不同的显著象征.

original: While a part of Georgia Samtskhe has been largely independent for centuries. This has required a constant awareness of politics in Georgia as well as very active diplomacy with the larger empires we have bordered. From the Mongols and Ilkhans to Timur our rulers have always made sure that we have a direct channel with those that have the most power. Likewise we have when necessary played an active part in the internal politics of the kingdom of Georgia, both meddling in succession struggles, and allying with the royal dynasty, when it suits us. We would do well to uphold this tradition for the future of our small state depends upon it. Let it never be said that we have done to little or acted without sufficient intelligence.
translation: 数世纪以来，作为格鲁吉亚的一部分，萨姆茨赫在很大程度上一直处于独立。这要求不断知晓格鲁吉亚的政治局势，同时主动与我们接壤的庞大帝国外交。自蒙古与伊儿汗国到帖木儿，我们的统治者一直确保我们与这些有着最强大力量的国家有直接的联系渠道。同样，我们在需要时也会主动参与格鲁吉亚的内部政治，既干涉继承斗争，当时机适合时又与皇室联姻。为了我们这个依赖于此的小小国家的未来，我们应该延续这个传统。让我们永远不要说我们只能做一点或者我们没有足够的能力去做它。

original: Our country is a mountainous borderland that has acted as a frontier against foreign invaders of Georgia many times. For this reason we have learnt to build strong fortresses and be ready for drawn our defensive warfare. This legacy is one we must strive at all costs to uphold, the fortresses of Samtskhe must be well maintained, manned and supplied for foreign invaders are not a possibility but a certainty.
translation: 我们的国家位处群山边界,这些山脉就像天然屏障一般为格鲁吉亚抵挡了多次外国侵略者.出于此因我们学会了建立坚固的堡垒并准备好打一场防御性战争.这是我们必须努力以一切代价延续的遗产,必须维持萨姆茨赫堡垒,为了肯定的而不是可能的外国侵略者做好人力物力准备.

original: Be they Muslim or Christian, Georgian, Turkic or Iranian, Samtskhe has often had to bow to foreign kings and sultans. In order to create an enduring state and economy we need to build our own institutions, that last regardless of who desire our lands at the moment. Let us issue our own coinage and laws as well as patronize our own theologians and writers.
translation: 不论是穆斯林还是基督徒,格鲁吉亚人、突厥人或是伊朗人.萨姆茨赫常常不得不像外国国王或苏丹鞠躬.为了成立一个持久的国家与经济我们需要建造我们自己的,不管当下谁渴望我们的土地都将持续下去的典章.让我们铸造我们自己货币,编写自己的法典,并同时保护我们的神学家与作家们.

original: Our position at the crossroads of Georgia, Anatolia, Armenia and Azerbaijan also mean that a great number of traders seek to cross our lands. The constant raids of nomadic tribesmen however means that many now doubt the safety of our roads. We must properly defend all roads and merchant inns in our lands, ensuring that the trade can flow into our state unhindered.
translation: 我们处在格鲁吉亚、安纳托利亚、亚美尼亚和阿塞拜疆的十字路口.这同时意味着有大量的商人想要穿过我们的土地.然而游牧部落不断的掠夺却让许多商人都怀疑我国商路的安全性.我们必须适当地防卫我国之内的整个商路与商人旅店,确保贸易畅通无阻的流入我国.

original: The Caucasus have for a long time now been shaped by nomadic emperors and the pastures of Samtskhe have attracted many tribesmen to settled within our lands. We must make not let this break down the stability of our kingdom but instead make deals with the tribes so that they may take part in our military ambitions.
translation: 高加索已经被游牧皇帝塑造了很长的时间,我们国内的萨姆茨赫牧场也吸引了许多部落.这些情况不应该动摇我们王国的稳定，而是要与这些部落达成协议,让他们也加入到我们的军队.

original: The lands of Samtskhe are home to places both sacred and revered among the Georgian people. The cave monastery of Vardzia, the ancient church of Atskuri with its miraculous icon of the Virgin Mary, the Monastery of Ancha with its Anchiskhati icon, are some of the most significant holy places in our care. By protecting and curating the Samtskhe church, separate from that of Georgia, we ensure that our people stand united even in the face of adversity.
translation: 萨姆茨赫是格鲁吉亚人崇敬与向往的神圣家园。瓦尔齐亚的有着众多洞窟修道院，阿茨库里的教堂供奉着神秘而古老圣母玛利亚圣像，安恰的修道院则敬仰着安切斯卡提。这些都是我们心中时时思念的众多圣地。保护与协助管理这些与格鲁吉亚不同的萨姆茨赫的教堂，我们可以确保我们的人民即使在面对逆境时也能团结一致。

original: The leader of the Sufi Khalwati lodge in Baku, Sayyid Yahya Bakuvi, is by far the most influential master of the order. This charismatic leader has grown the order from a small movement to have thousands of members. The influence of Yahya Bakuvi and his followers is great upon our state and their faith is tied to ours.
translation: 巴库苏菲派圣地的领导者叶海亚·巴库维赛义德是迄今为止教团中最富影响力的长者。这个富有魅力的长者已将教团从一个微小的运动发展为拥有数千个成员的庞大团体。叶海亚·巴库维和他的追随者对我国拥有巨大的影响力，他们的信仰与我们命运密切相关。

original: Shirvan has maintained its existence for centuries through rigorous use of fortifications, walls and castles. Emperors come and go yet the castles and forts of our mountains keep us safe in victory as well as in defeat.
translation: 通过严格使用防御工事，城墙和堡垒，希尔万几个世纪以来巍然屹立。 皇帝更迭变换，但我们山上的城堡与要塞却令我们在不论胜利或失败中都能保持安全。

original: Our people have a long and proud martial tradition, having fought Mongols, Timurids, Qizilbash and Tatars. Through learning from these experiences and absorbing their best qualities our armies have grown even stronger. In order to further our own ambitions in a time of turmoil we must strive to be even stronger than those states that would come to subdue us.
translation: 我们的人民拥有着骄傲而悠久的军事传统，曾蒙古人，帖木儿，基齐勒巴什和鞑靼人交手。通过吸取他们的长处与经历这些战火的锤炼，我们的军队变得愈发强大。为了这动乱时期进一步实现野心，我们必须努力变强让那些国家臣服于我们。

original: The Shirvan Shah’s were for centuries famous for their patronage of high Persian culture, arts and poetry. The Iranian region has since been entirely transformed by emperors such as Timur or Jahan Shah, yet the Persian language and culture remain what binds this region together. Let us invite poets, scholars and writers from all over the Persian world to our capital, and establish the fame of the Shirvan court once again.
translation: 希尔万沙阿数世纪以来以赞助波斯高原文化、艺术以及艺术而闻名。此后，伊朗地区虽然完全被帖木儿或贾汗·沙等帝王所改变，然而波斯语言和文化仍然作为这一地区的组成部分被保留了下来。让我们邀请来自波斯世界的各地诗人、学者和作家到我们的首都，再次建立希尔凡的名声。

original: Expensive goods from Italy as well as Bengal easily find their way to our Caspian ports as the Caspian Sea is a major transit point for long range trade through Baku, Astrakhan, and the cities of of Tabarestan. We must see that these traders have all that they need, both in terms of safety and comforts and to support our own merchant community so that we may continue to draw upon the wealth of the world.
translation: 来自意大利和孟加拉的昂贵货物在我们的里海港口很容易找到销路。因为通过巴库、阿斯特拉罕和塔巴斯坦等城市的远距离贸易中，里海是其主要中转站。我们必须重视这些贸易商，为他们提供安全和舒适的经商环境并支持我们自己的商人团体，以便我们可以继续吸取来自世界各地的财富。

original: Since the reign of Ibrahim the first our rulers have embarked on putting our wealth to use by constructing great works of architecture. The mosques, mausoleums, palaces, bathhouses, pavilions and monuments of our dynasty will show the world the greatness of the Shirvan Shahs.
translation: 自易卜拉欣，我们的第一个统治者以来，我们就开始为伟大的建筑艺术投入大量财力。那些我们王朝建立的清真寺、陵墓、宫殿、浴室、亭台和纪念碑将向世人昭示希尔万沙阿的伟大。

original: Cosmopolitan Baku, at the shores of the Caspian sea, has always drawn merchants from afar. As is common in the Caucasus and Iran many of these merchants are Armenian but there is also a large group of Indians who come, to trade, and to visit the fire temple at Ateshgah, where seven fires burn out of the ground without end. In order to make these foreign merchants settle in our lands we should encourage them to patronize and extend this temple and its petroleum wells.
translation: 坐落在里海海滨的国际化城市巴库永远都吸引着来自远方的商人。 这些商人中有许多是来自亚美尼亚，这在高加索和伊朗很常见。但也有一大批前往阿特加火祠参观与经商的印度人。那里的神庙有着七团从地下燃出的不灭圣火。为了安顿在我们的土地上这些外商，我们应该鼓励他们赞助与扩建这座寺庙和其中的燃井。

original: Our people came from the desert, to rightfully take control over al-Haasa from the weak Jarwanids and the greedy Hormuzi merchants. Yet other desert tribes, such as the Dawasir, now desire what is ours. While it is important that we embrace the new maritime nature of our state we must never forget our Bedouin past, or other desert tribes could displace us just as quickly as we seized this prize from our predecessors.
translation: 我们的人民来自沙漠，从衰弱的贾尔万王朝和贪婪的霍尔木兹商人手中合法地控制着哈萨。然而其他那些沙漠部落，比如代瓦西尔，现在正觊觎着我们的领地。不过最重要的是，虽然我们已经拥有了这个新的海洋国家，但我们绝不能忘记我们作为游牧部落的过往，否则我们也会像前任那样迅速被其他游牧部落所取代。

original: Lord of the Bedouin of the East

We have come a long way since we took control of Al-Haasa and Hofuf. We must however never forget that this honor does not belong to us alone. As the lord of the East it is our duty to go on frequent pilgrimages to the holy cities, bringing the wealth that is under our control to the Sharifs so that all can see that the righteous are now in control over Al-Haasa
translation: 从我们控制哈萨和胡富夫后，已经过了很久了。 但是我们必须永远不要忘记，这个荣誉并不仅限于我们。 作为东方的领主，我们有责任时常去圣城朝圣。把我们的财富带到谢里夫，让众人看到正义者现在控制着哈萨。

original: The port cities under our control are the principal pearl fishing ports in the Arabian Ocean, and very likely the entire world. The wealth this brings us is what once attracted the captains of Hormuz to this coast and without it it is not certain of our state would exist at all. We must at all cost protect and patronize the Pearl fishing industries, as without it the steady stream of silver and silk from the east would die out in an instant.
translation: 我们所控制的港口城市是阿拉伯海乃至全世界最主要的珍珠渔港。 它曾经吸引过霍尔木兹船长探寻这个海岸，现在则为我们带来了巨大的财富。如果没有它，我们的国家根本无从谈起。我们必须不惜一切代价保护和赞助珍珠渔业。如果没有这些来自东方源源不断的丝绸与银币，国家顷刻间就会灰飞烟灭。

original: The trade cities of Eastern Arabia are where we earn our livelihood. The cities themselves however are vulnerable. Foreign ships might easily descend on the coastline and hold our traders hostage. This is how once the Hormuzi came to control our country and this is how Turks and Portuguese threaten to do so in the future.\nWe would do well to build strong stone fortifications in our principal ports, so that we can protect the wealth of our merchants.
translation: 东阿拉伯的贸易城市是我们谋生的地方。然而城市本身却十分脆弱。 外敌的船只很容易于海岸线发动突袭，将我们的商人掠为人质。这就是霍尔木兹曾运用过的策略，也是土耳其人和葡萄牙在将来对我们的威胁。\n我们需要做好在主要港口的防御，建立坚固的防御工事，以便能够保护我们的财富与商人。

original: While the Pearl fishing has made our ports famous the trade in horses is perhaps what brings the most ships from India to our shores. Arabian horses are in high demand across South Asia and Iran, and the ports of Haasa are the principal source for the maritime trade of this commodity. The desert tribes bring us a constant supply of fine war horses that we then send to the best battlefields of India.
translation: 尽管珍珠渔业使我们的港口出名，贩卖马匹却可能是来自印度的最大海路贸易。南亚和伊朗对阿拉伯马的需求旺盛。而哈萨的港口是这种商品主要的海路贸易来源。沙漠部落供应给我们源源不断的优质战马，然后我们将它们送到印度最佳的战场。

original: An increasing number of Christian ships have been seen in the Persian gulf lately, threatening our ships and ports. In order to battle this new enemy however we will need to build a new and modern navy. Let us learn from those who have already fought the Christians on sea and invite Turkish shipbuilders and sailors to settle in our country.
translation: 最近越来越多的基督教船只波出现在斯湾，威胁着我们的船只和港口。为了与这些新的敌人作战，我们需要建立一支新的现代海军。让我们向那些已在海上与基督徒交战的国家学习，并邀请土耳其的造船者和水手定居我们的国家。
拉玛 伊本 贾比尔的传奇

original: For a country such as ours taking command of the sea-lanes is of vital importance. We must not hesitate form employing the sea-dogs and pirates as they have experience and skills far beyond most captains, and know our waters better than anyone.
translation: 对我们这样的国家来说，掌握海上航道是非常重要的。 我们必须毫不犹豫地雇用海盗和老水手，因为他们具有远超大多数船长的经验和技能，并且比任何人都更了解这片海域。

original: Though the name is old and shrouded in legend many claim that the name Hadramut means that ‘Death has Come’. Given the hostile nature of this landscape this would at the very least be fitting. Mountains, deserts and extremely dry expanses make up the majority of Hadramut, and its people is used to defending what they have with any means. Had it not been for the more welcoming coastline it would be hard to imagine a harsher land, and one harder to subdue.
translation: 尽管这个名字非常古老并且笼罩于传说之中，许多人声称「哈达拉毛」这个名字意思是死亡来临。这个名字倒是非常适合这种极其恶劣的地理环境。山脉，沙漠以及极其干旱的戈壁组成了哈达拉毛的主要部分，她的人民已经习惯于用任何手段保护他们所拥有的一切。如果不是因为更受欢迎的海岸线，如此残酷的土地已经是难以想象的了，更不用说去征服它了。

original: The Hadramut Kathiri tribes are not united however and the land risks being fractured and weak the next time an outsider wishes to cross our borders. Let us bring in reinforcements from the deep deserts to help settle this tribal conflict once and for all. The Yafii tribe has already started migrating into the area and would make a good and loyal force.
translation: 哈达拉毛的卡迪里部族并不团结，当有外人试图进犯我们的边界时，我们的国土会四分五裂，我们的国家会虚弱不堪。让我们从沙漠深处引入援军来一劳永逸地解决部落冲突。雅法部族已经准备启程迁往这一地区，他们将成为我们忠实的力量。

original: Our history is one of constant warfare and hostility, but no society can endure without peace. It was for this reason that our ancestors began the custom of demarcating hawtas, areas entirely devoid of violence, respected by all tribes and authorities.
translation: 我们的历史中充斥着永无休止的战争和敌意，但如果缺少和平，没有哪个社会能够长久发展。正是由于这个原因，我们的祖先开始划定一个缓冲区，这个区域没有暴力，并且被所有部落和权威所尊重。

original: While perhaps not as lucrative as in the past the production and export of Incense remains the primary form of income for our people. The ports of Shihr and Mukalla once served as the primary ports for the export of this commodity, not only from our lands but from the nearby Dhofar and Qishn. Let us expand our harbors and encourage the trade in incense so that we can once again aspire to be the primary exporter of Incense in the world.
translation: 虽然可能不像过去那样有利可图，熏香的生产和出口依旧是我们人民的主要收入来源。希赫尔港和穆卡拉港曾经是出口熏香的主要港口，但现在，附近的佐法尔和基什恩也逐渐兴起。让我们扩建海港并且鼓励熏香贸易，从而使我们再度成为世界上首屈一指的熏香出口国。

original: Hadramhis are not only excellent warriors of the deserts but also have a long tradition of long range sailing. Some take to joining the crews of the many foreign ships that seek out our ports, while others build their own Dhows and set out to trade and settle far from home. The future of our state lies in this maritime trade and we must encourage local captains and sailors for the good of our nation.
translation: 哈达拉毛人不仅是优秀的沙漠战士，而且还拥有远距离航海的悠久传统。一些人加入到寻找我们港口的外国船只的船员中去，而其他人建造了他们自己的单桅三角帆船打算出海贸易并在远离家乡的海外定居。我们国家的未来在于海上贸易，我们必须鼓励当地的船长和水手们为了我们国家的利益而努力。

original: With the exception of the coastline, Hadramut is a hot and dry land, with little rainfall and very poor possibilities for any form of agriculture. It is no wonder that the Hadramuti people for generations have sought their fortunes across the Arabian Sea. There are Hadramhi communities in India, Indonesia, the Hejaz and along the East African coastline. Many do return home eventually, bringing with the experience and skills acquired in faraway lands to our state.
translation: 除了海岸线以外，哈达拉毛是一片酷热而干燥的土地，几乎没有降雨和农业发展。无怪乎世世代代的哈达拉毛人越过阿拉伯海去寻求财富。哈达拉毛人的社群在印度、印度尼西亚、汉志以及非洲东海岸都能见到。许多人带着他们从遥远土地上学来的经验和技能最终回到自己的祖国。

original: There are many naval powers interested in friendly ports in the Arabian Sea even if they would rather not hold any land here. Let us seek alliances with the great powers of the east and west, countries with naval ambitions looking for a friendly state among the many maritime Sultanates of the east.
translation: 即便他们不愿在这里占有任何土地，仍旧有许多海军强国对阿拉伯海中的友好港口感兴趣。让我们从那些拥有海权野心以及正在寻找可靠伙伴的东西方的强权中寻找盟友。

original: Far from a bustling metropolis the Rock Castle of Hisn Kayfa is an ancient stronghold in the Kurdish mountains. Rock fortresses such as this have served the Kurdish tribesmen for generations and we would do well to learn from their experiences. The value of well maintained castle cannot be overstated, this is as true on the banks of the Tigris as it was in the Grand city of Cairo, or the hills of Palestine.
translation: 远离繁华都会的石头城寨哈桑凯伊夫是库尔德山脉中一座古老的据点。库尔德人祖祖辈辈都生活在像这样的城寨里，我们应当好好学习他们的经验。一座拥有良好维护的城堡的价值怎么夸大也不过分，无论是底格里斯的河岸上，还是开罗的大城市和巴勒斯坦的山丘上，都是如此。

original: Our ancestors once ruled a great empire, spanning the entirety of Syria, Upper Mesopotamia, Egypt and the Hejaz. While not much remain of this empire our name still commands respect among the Kurdish tribes we now rule. If we can rally these warriors to our cause, we might yet strive to rebuild that which was taken from us by treacherous slaves.
translation: 我们的祖先曾经统治着一个横跨叙利亚，美索不达米亚，埃及和汉志的伟大帝国。虽然这个帝国国运短祚，但我们家族的名字仍然在我们统治的库尔德部落中备受尊敬。如果我们能够重整旗鼓，我们定能从那些背信弃义的奴隶们手中夺回属于我们的那一切。

original: Our great ancestor, Salah ad-Din, elevated our family to greatness through his utter unwillingness to compromise with the righteousness of his faith. He threw down the Fatimid Caliphs and their Shia state, and he defeated the Christian crusaders in the levant.\nOur time is once again one of religious turmoil with Shiism on the rise. We must take up the mantle of the great conqueror and be a force for the righteous in the Middle East.
translation: 我们伟大的祖先萨拉丁以其高贵而正义的信仰铸就了我们家族的辉煌。他赶走了法蒂玛王朝的哈里发和他的什叶派国家，在黎凡特地区击败了基督教十字军。\n我们的时代一次又一次随着什叶派的崛起而陷入宗教动荡。我们必须接受这伟大征服者的衣钵，成为中东地区的一支正义之师。

original: Turkic Cavalry armies dominate the middle eastern battlefields, be they highly trained Mamluks, the Shia Qizilbash sectarians or the Sipahi cavalry of the Anatolian Turks. Let us also recruit from the masses of nomadic warriors that roam these lands, and meet our enemies on equal terms.
translation: 突厥骑兵主宰着中东战场：训练有素的马穆鲁克，信奉什叶派的基齐勒巴什以及安纳托利亚的西帕希骑兵。让我们从中招募那些流浪的战士从而使我们与敌人之间不相上下。

original: The time has come to reclaim what was once lost by our ancestors. Let us act now to reclaim the empire that once was, and to create a strong Sunni bulwark against Infidel, Shia and traitors alike in the middle east.
translation: 是时候夺回我们祖先曾经失去的东西了。让我们现在行动，去光复曾经的帝国，建立一个对抗中东的异教徒，什叶异端和类似的背叛者的强大堡垒。

original: It was once the way of our family to divide the spoils of our success among our kin. However this policy also weakened the sultanate in many ways, planting seeds of discord among our midst. This time we will instead take after other imperial administrations of this region, and create a strong central authority to oversee all land grants.
translation: 曾经我们的家族会将战利品均分给自己的后代，但是这种做法在多种方面削弱了我们的苏丹国，在我们之中埋下不和的种子。现在我们将在此地采用其他的帝国管理方法，同时建立强大的中央权威来监督分封的领地。

original: Our ancestors realized that for an empire to prosper its rulers must be able to keep the peace and guarantee its subjects protection. Some parts of the economy are then best left to the private citizens, while others could be beneficially controlled by our ministers. Trade, industry and commerce will allow our empire to blossom.
translation: 我们的祖先意识到，如果一个帝国要繁荣昌盛，帝国的统治者必须要保持和平，给予附庸保护。经济的一些方面是可以让国民自己经营的，但是还有一些方面最好还是掌控在我们大臣的手里。贸易，工业与商业会让我们的帝国进一步繁荣。

original: From the rich south to the densely populated and Urban north we have managed to extend our control over the entire province of Ise. This will allow us to use the full potential of the province’s resources for the further growth of our clan’s influence.
translation: 从肥沃的南方到人口稠密的北方，我们控制着整个伊势国。这使我们可以充分利用我们国度的资源来提升北畠家的影响力。

original: As the keepers of the holiest of Japan’s shrines at Ise we are blessed by goddess of the sun and the universe. We must rise to be worthy of the task of maintaining and caring for this national treasure. This will earn us the respect of the Japanese people.
translation: 作为日本的圣地，伊势神宫的守护者，我们受到天照大神的祝福。我们必须妥善维护这一全日本的瑰宝，从而赢得日本人民的尊敬。

original: While the Imperial Branch has lost political influence we are still known as ardent supporters of the Southern Court. This reputation of loyal service to the monarch himself will show the world that we are more honorable and trustworthy than many of the lesser houses that now dominate Japan.
translation: 虽然皇室失去了他们的政治影响力，但我们还是他们最坚定的支持者。这一忠诚举动向天皇证明了我们比日本其他的家族更加忠诚可信。

original: In Shima the Kuki have maintained a powerful navy, we would do well to integrate this force in our own and build upon their experiences. Empowering Kuki retainers will allow us to dominate the seas of Japan.
translation: 九鬼在志摩保持着一支强大的海军，我们将会继承这支军队，并妥善利用他们的经验发展我们的海军。通过发扬九鬼战法，我们可以主宰日本的海洋。

original: Few of the old aristocratic families will survive in this age of self-made Daimyo and strongmen. As one of the few strong families of old we must fight for the old ideals. It is time we show the world that quality is not only a matter of opportunism but also birth and traditions.
translation: 只有很少的古老贵胄能在这个强权林立的时代生存下来。作为少有的强大家族之一，我们必须为我们的古老原则而奋斗。是时候向世界证明所谓的名门除了机会主义之外也包括血缘和传统了。

original: The famous Iga-Ryu ninja school holds great influence in the lands under our control, we should make sure our interests align with theirs and make sure to integrate their services in our plans and political ambitions.
translation: 有名的伊贺流忍者道场在我们的领土上有着很大的影响力，我们应该探寻我们和他们的共同利益并让他们为我们的计划和野心服务。

original: Our honorable ancestor Kitabatake Akiie proved that through determination even the march from Tohoku to central Japan can be undertaken in quick time. We must learn from our ancestors and train our armies for swift maneuvers so that we can quickly move from one front to another if the situation calls for it.
translation: 我们荣耀的祖先北畠显家证明了只要有决心，从东北到日本中部的进军可以在很短的时间内实现。我们必须发扬我们先祖的传统，提升部队的机动性从而应对战况的需求做出快速转移。

original: Since time immemorial our people has kept the 29 000 verse-epic of Hinilawod alive. It tells the story of the great adventurers and gods of our people and teaches generation upon generation the value of family, honor, dignity and bravery. This way our legacy is carried onwards even as we integrate the customs and stories of foreign peoples into our own.
translation: 自从有记载以来，29000行的希尼拉沃史诗在我们的人民之间代代相传。它讲述了我们的伟大冒险家和申明的故事，并传递了家庭、荣誉、尊严和勇敢的理念。通过这种方式，即使我们接纳外来人的传统和历史，我们的传承依然可以得到保持。

original: In the age of Srivijaya our people ruled the constituent kingdom of Panai on faraway Sumatra. For centuries they fought to keep the Srivijayan waters free of hostile ships and pirates. Eventually, as the empire fell to foreign invaders, our ancestors refused to bend their heads to these new rulers and instead migrated to the islands we now occupy. The traditions of our people still make us excellent sailors and fiercely independent warriors.
translation: 在三佛齐国的时代，我们的人民统治着遥远的苏门答腊地区的帕奈王国。几个世纪以来，他们为保持三佛齐的水域不受敌国船只和海盗侵扰而奋战。最终，当帝国陷落于入侵者之手时，我们的先祖拒绝向他们低头，并迁徙到了我们现在占据的岛屿。我们的传统保证了我们仍然是优秀的水手和英勇独立的战士。

original: Our state, the Madyas, is a confederation of 3 sovereign territories ruled by the Datu Paiburong council with the role of commander in chief chosen through election among them. This way we always have a leader for our common defense and we can keep the political center relevant to the politics of our people.
translation: 我们的国家马迪亚斯是一个由三个主权实体所组成的联盟，由达图大议会成员于他们之间选出的总统领导。如此，我们可以拥有一个共同的领导者并使我们的政治中心尽可能靠近人民。

original: Our strong maritime legacy has made our state feared on the open seas. In order to keep our trade safe from those that would steal our wealth we must be put constant pressure on foreign fleets, be they Muslims, Chinese, or from one of the many Indianized kingdoms. Some would call this piracy, but it is their fault for not properly protecting their own.
translation: 我们强大的航海传统威名远扬。为了保护我们的贸易不被试图窃取我们财富的人，如穆斯林，中国人，或印度的那些王国骚扰，我们必须持续对外国船队施加压力。有些人可能会称此为海盗行为，但没有保护好他们自己的贸易就是他们的问题了。

original: Throughout the ages our society has maintained the divinely sanctioned Datu families in power. In their blood runs the mission and talent for righteous and successful rulership. In tradition lies much power. If we are to thrive we must preserve the rights of the Kinadatuan while adapting these social structures to the world and a developing empire.
translation: 许多年以来，尊贵而神圣的达图贵族保持着他们在我们社会当中的权利。他们的血管中流淌着正直而英明的统治所需的使命和天赋。这是传统带给我们的力量。为了国家的蓬勃发展，我们必须保证描笼涯的权利，并将这种社会结构带给全世界和我们发展中的帝国。

original: The Visayan islands are famously fertile. Even if not all of them are home to great cities, the rice and meat produced here feeds settlements as far away as Manila and Tondo. Such resources are a great strength for a growing empire such as ours. By providing support and protection from maritime raiders we can support the growth of all our domains.
translation: 米沙鄢群岛的富庶远近闻名。即使这些群岛不都拥有发达的城市，它们生产的大米和肉类也足够供应远至马尼拉和屯多这样的居住地。这种资源对于我们这样蓬勃发展的帝国至关重要。通过提供支持和驱逐海上的掠夺者，我们的领土得以发展。

original: For trade, fishing and warfare, ships have been an integral part of the Madja-as people for as long as these islands have been settled. The knowledge and experience we have in shipbuilding is unparalleled among our neighbors and as we modernize our navies we should build upon these traditions. Let us pick prominent shipbuilders to study the shipbuilding in the many ports we dock and integrate the best they have to offer in our own projects.
translation: 自这些群岛有人居住以来，船只就因其在贸易、渔业和军事等领域的重要性而成为了马迪亚斯群岛上的人民重要的一部分。在邻国之间，我们的造船技术无人能及。我们应当在这些传统的基础上建立现代化的海军，并让杰出的造船匠在我们的港口研究造船技术以为我们的计划服务。

original: All over Japan the old Za guilds have grown influential enough to smother many forms of enterprise. With private armies they are also an affront to our direct authority. Let us abolish their monopolies and do away with tolls and closed ports or cities. Free markets and guilds, rakuichi and rakuza, will put an end to Za influence and let our commerce flourish.
translation: 在整个日本，古老的“座”行会的影响力已经发展壮大，以至于垄断压制了许多行业的发展。他们维持私人军队，侵犯了我们的统治权威。让我们废除“座”商人们的垄断特权，取消通行费以及闭港闭市的政策。通过推行“乐市乐座”，即“自由的市场和自由的行会”，我们可以终止“座”的影响并且让工商业良好发展。

original: Stabilizing our own holdings has given us a strong base for future expansion in what can only be described as a chaotic realm. Let us make the unification and pacification of Japan our clan’s mission, unifying the world can only be done through force of arms.
translation: 在天下大乱的战国时代，我们稳固的领地为我们未来的扩张提供了强有力的基础。日本的统一与和平将由我们氏族完成，只有依靠武力才能一统天下。

original: Obsession with birth and privilege has made this country weak and the rise of self-made powerful Daimyo throughout the realm has clearly proven how useless such notions can be. Let us take this lesson to heart and let success and skill be the guiding principle for who should rise to command our armies. Strong leadership is a requirement for rapid expansion.
translation: 对出身和血统的痴迷使这个国家虚弱无比，而遍及全国范围内白手起家的豪强大名们，他们的崛起显而易见的证明这些观念是多么的无用。让我们把这个教训铭记于心，把成就和技巧作为提拔军队将领的指导标准。强有力的领导是迅速扩张的必要条件。

original: Japan is in many ways a land of castles and everywhere we can see the growth of Jokamachi, Castle cities. It is through the construction of strong castles that one can assert influence both over the political realm and the routes vital to military campaigns. This learning is one we must take to heart. From the imperial court to our own retainers it is through the castles that we make sure that they are constantly reminded of our presence and power. At all times we must prioritize the reduction of enemy castles and the erection of our own in strategic locations
translation: 日本是一个遍布城堡的国家，而城下町随处可见。正是由于坚固城堡的建设使得我们在政治上能够保持影响力，在战时能够确保对战略要地的控制。我们必须记住这个教训。从朝廷再到我们自己的家臣，是这些城堡时刻提醒着他们我们的存在和权威。在任何时候，我们都必须优先考虑减少敌人的城堡以及在战略要地筑起自己的城堡。

original: The advent of firearms has, and will continue to, revolutionize warfare in the Japanese archipelago and through mastering these new weapons we can dominate any battlefield. In order to increase the rate of their fire our musketmen will form ranks, allowing one to fire while two others reload.
translation: 火器的到来正在，并且将继续给日本列岛的战争带来革命性的影响。通过掌握这些先进武器，我们可以主宰任何战场。我们的铁炮队可以通过一排发射，其余两排装填的阵型来增加射速。

original: Western missionaries have brought many ideas and techniques to our land and unlike the old Buddhist associations they have no previous ties to corrupt land owners or rebellious cities. We should welcome the westerners into our cities and examine the benefits they can bring to our court.
translation: 西方传教士给我们带来了许多思想理念和科学技术。不像那些陈旧的佛教宗派，西方传教士与腐败的领主和叛乱的城市没有联系。我们应该欢迎这些“南蛮人”来到我们的城市，看看他们能给我们带来什么好处。

original: Our realm is in many ways a patchwork of small manors and fiefs. An overview of their true worth, and in many cases even who owns what piece of land, is almost impossible to achieve. Let us undertake a major cadastral survey to investigate these lands in detail and create a new system of taxation and obligations that can then be both efficient and fair.
translation: 我们的国家很大程度上就是由小庄园和采邑东拼西凑组成的。在许多情况下，对土地价值的概述乃至土地所有权的划分都无法实现。让我们对土地进行一次大规模丈量以便详细调查，除此以外我们还应当建立一个既有效率又兼具公平的税收体系。

original: The Bushi of Mikawa are famous throughout the region for their bravery and resilience. Even in the face of total defeat we can rely on our armies to never surrender.
translation: 三河地区的武士以其勇武和坚韧闻名于世。即便在完败的情况下，我们所信赖的这支部队也决不屈服。

original: A network of gated barriers, Sekisho, traditionally protects important points in the provinces, both from attack and from illicit import of forbidden goods. In this chaotic era some have chosen to start removing these barriers within their realms to further the flow of goods and strengthen commerce. This is a fine goal but it comes at a considerable risk. We must instead strengthen the Sekisho network, to hinder the smuggling of goods, firearms and people. Security is more important than any monetary gain.
translation: 由一系列护栏和屏障组成的关所，传统上保护了省份内的要道，它使我们免遭攻击的同时，也阻止了商品的非法走私。在这个天下大乱的时代，一些人选择在他们的领地内移除这些屏障以促进商品流通以鼓励贸易。这是个不错的想法，但伴随着相当大的风险。我们必须巩固关所，从而阻止商品和枪械的非法走私，防止人质逃离。安全要比任何金钱利益更为重要。

original: Thousands of Hatamoto, Bannermen, serve under our lord directly. With diminutive properties of their own their fate is tied to ours and their loyalty to our clan stronger than that of the any opportunistic retainers of other Japanese Daimyo.
translation: 数以千计的旗本武士与近侍直接侍奉着我们的主君。这些没有根基的武士的命运与我们紧密相连，他们对我们家族的忠诚远远超过那些投机取巧、见风使舵的大名家臣。

original: The breakdown of Imperial authority throughout Japan has led to the rise of local strongmen all over the realm. With old social structures no longer guaranteeing the rule of law however corruption has also grown rampant in many parts of society. In order to restore stability we must create a group of government officials, Metsuke, with a duty to keep an eye on all Daimyo of the Imperial court.
translation: 天皇权力的衰微导致了全国范围内地方豪强的崛起。随着古老的社会体制已无法确保律令制度的施行，腐败行为在社会的许多方面逐渐蔓延猖獗。为了重新恢复秩序，我们可以选任一批监察官员“目付”，其职责是监视朝廷内所有大名。

original: Our clan is but one branch on the Matsudaira trunk of our ancestors. As we expand we can rely on the other Matsudaira branches to garrison the fortresses and strategically important provinces directly.
translation: 我们家族是松平氏的支系。随着我们的扩张，我们可以任命其他松平氏的同族直接驻守在战略要地上。

original: Let us build a shrine to deify the founder of our clan. The Toshogu will be the most glorious shrine in Japanese history and its presence will be a reminder not only about our glorious ancestry but also our adherence to traditional shinto values.
translation: 让我们建立一个神社来供奉我们家族的开创者。东照宫将成为日本历史上最为光辉灿烂的神社，它的存在除了令我们回忆起祖先的荣光，还有我们对于传统神道价值的尊崇。

original: It must be the goal of any ruler to enrich the people and protect them from disaster and famine. By creating a system of food reserves, price controls and temporary tax reductions we can ensure that our realm can handle whichever problems future might have in store for us.
translation: 使人民富裕起来并且免受灾难和饥荒的影响是所有统治者的目标。通过储粮备荒、物价调整、免除杂税等一系列措施，我们可以确保我们的国家能够处理将来可能出现的任何问题。

original: Spread out in small port cities and over numerous islands our state is dependent on the sea for its very existence. Our society is built to support long range trade, and everything, from the organization of agriculture to the laws and traditions reflect this fact.
translation: 分布于小型港口城市和众多岛屿，我们的国家依赖海洋生存。我们的社会是为了支持远距离贸易而存在，从农业的组织生产到法律和传统，所有的一切都反映了这一事实。

original: Our archipelago is a paradise to some but it is not without its danger. Rainforests and tropical diseases can deter invaders and sometimes the best defense is our islands themselves. In the face of sure defeat we have traditionally employed scorched earth tactics and let the land fight the invaders for us
translation: 我们的群岛是我们赖以为生的天堂，但它对敌人来说就是险象迭生的地狱。潮湿的热带雨林以及伴随而来的热带疾病可以有效地阻止入侵者的进攻，这也是我们最强大的防线。为了确保胜利，我们会采取焦土政策来消耗敌人，让大自然与我们一起和敌人抗争。

original: Luzon and especially our position in the Pasig river delta, has allowed us to develop thriving ports for the import of Chinese goods into the entire archipelago. Chinese goods arrive regularly in Tondo where they can then be redistributed to the many ports and islands of the Philippines.
translation: 我们所在吕宋岛以及巴士河三角洲的相对位置使得我们成了中菲贸易商品流通的关口，所有中国的商品都将从我们这里流入整个群岛的市场。中国商品通先抵达汤都，再通过汤都分流到菲律宾内陆的其他港口。

original: While we have never stopped worshiping the gods of our ancestors we have also never seen a reason to reject foreign faiths. Among our people we honor the Gods of the Brahmanic faiths, side by side with the god of the Mohammedans and Buddhists.
translation: 我们从未停下过对我们先祖之神的崇拜，同时我们也不需要去限制一些外来信仰。在这里，你既可以看到印度教的信奉者，也可以看到伊斯兰教徒和佛教徒。

original: Not all sailors serve on our own ships, some seek employment among the many warring states of Southeast Asia. Luzon Sailors can be found on warships from Brunei to Aceh.The experience these men earn abroad is something we can than make good use of in our own maritime endeavours. Let us encourage all our young men to seek their fortunes abroad so that they may later return experienced and hardened.
translation: 不是所有的水手都站在我们自己的甲板上，还有一部分水手会去东南亚的其他一些有战时之需国家去做佣兵。从文莱到亚齐你都可以看到吕宋水手的身影。我们可以通过这些外出水手的作战经历丰富我们自己的海上阅历。让我们鼓励那些年轻水手们积极参加作战，这既让他们得到了丰富的报酬，又磨练了自己的意志，还为我们带回来宝贵的实战经验。

original: Our kingdom is close enough to enjoy a stream of Chinese, Japanese and Southeast Asian goods yet too far away to be within their reach. This makes us a desirable destination for many who for whichever reason wish to abandon their homeland. Let us invite these people to our land so that we can benefit from their skills and expertise.
translation: 我们的王国可以很轻松地得到来自中国，日本，以及其他东南亚国家的商品，但这些国家的的核心统治范围却与我们保持着很长一段距离。因此，对于那些出于任何原因想离开自己家乡的人来说，我们成了一个很理想的避风港。让我们欢迎那些前来的异乡人，他们的才能会为我们的国家带来经验与财富。

original: One of the most sought after crops in these lands is the sugar that our ancestors have grown for centuries. In a more interconnected world this cash crop could bring us even greater wealth. Expanding the production of Sugar, through land reclamation as well as at the expense of other crops will allow our economy to grow to new heights.
translation: 早在数世纪前，我们祖先生产的糖就成了这片土地最受欢迎的作物之一。现在，随着全球贸易的流通，这种经济作物为我们带来了大笔的财富。通过开拓新土地，增大分配给糖的土地比例来提高糖类生产可以让我们的经济达到一个新的高度。

original: It is now over a thousand years since our people came in contact with Hinduism and the Brahmanic traditions. Since then we have made the religion our own and we are a firmly entrenched part of a larger ‘Indosphere’ of countries and peoples. Some, like Srivijaya and Majapahit, have even formed great maritime empires in this region. Butuan remains a firm part of this community and a member of the wider indianized world.
translation: 早在一千年前我们的人民就已经信奉印度教并遵循婆罗门传统了。自那以后我们推行这些信仰和文化并成为“印文化圈”的一员。一些国家，如三佛齐和满者伯夷，在这片区域成立了强大的海上帝国。武端一直都是这个泛印度文化圈的一员。

original: It is an old truth that seas are a connect rather than a hindrance, and nowhere is this more true than in the wider Malay or Indonesian region. While the interior of most islands can be hostile and unsettled, the coastlines are covered in harbor settlements connected in a network of constant trade. We are at the northern edge of Nusantara, as this region is often called, and while this offers us some protection it also means that we must act more decisively to attract foreign trade guilds and merchant captains. Let us market the riches of our island to all who would listen, and make sure that the ivory, gold and pearls of Butuan are as famous as they deserve to be.
translation: 稍有常识的人都可以看出，海洋是一座桥而不是一堵墙，而这对我们这些在印度尼西亚和马来亚地区的人来说更是如此。尽管内陆地区荒芜且难以开拓，我们的沿海地区相互联结促进源源不断的贸易流通。我们生活马来群岛的北部，或者叫北马来群岛，在这里我们相对生活的比较安逸，但我们仍然要努力如果要吸引一些商人在这里交易或者投资，让我们的市场为他们打开，保证我们的象牙，黄金，珠宝能闻名于全球的每一个角落。

original: While it is true that foreign merchants have sought our ports for centuries, we also have a thriving merchant community of our own. Butuan traders are common throughout the Malay archipelago and some journey as far as Persia and Japan. Even as we promote ourselves as an entrepot for foreign traders we must also support our own entrepreneurs and captains so that we never have to live at the mercy of the wars and politics in faraway lands.
translation: 其实，直到几个世纪之前外国商人才得知我们的存在，而在这之前我们建立了一套健全的本土贸易体系来创造收入。武端商人主要在马来群岛活跃，有时也会跋涉去波斯和日本进行交易。尽管我们一直大力推行着对外贸易，我们仍然不能忘记资助我们本土的贸易公司，这样我们就不会过度依赖遥远的外国的商队，以免在那些国家开战时使我们蒙受损失。

original: The Goldwork of our artisans have attracted fame in many courts and the work of our artisans can be found even in the treasuries of imperial China. Many foreign rulers would be flattered to have such objects, and these fine works might prove an excellent tool for diplomacy. We must always have some of these treasured objects in store so as to impress and sooth any foreign emissary, sultan or king.
translation: 我们的工匠雕制的金器在宫廷内外都是十分有名的，你甚至可以在中华帝国的藏宝阁看到我们这里生产的精美金器。许多外国统治者都对这些艺术品宠爱有加，我们也发现这些金器在外交方面起着不小的作用。我们应该继续制作这些宝物，确保它们的库存，并赠予来访的使者，一些苏丹和国王来改善我们的关系。

original: The Balangay sailing vessels have served our people well through the ages. Allowing us to quickly move both up river into the inland and along the coastlines of the many islands in our region. This has established our people not only as excellent shipbuilders but their common use has also made most of our subjects accomplished sailors from an early age. As we expand our influence we should continue to encourage the construction and spread of the Balangay as a means to constant communication between our settlements.
translation: 巴朗盖帆船早在很久之前就一直陪伴我们了。这种轻便的帆船可以让我们在内陆的河流里畅通无阻，也可以在外部沿海地区乘风破浪。这些帆船的出现改善了我们的制船工艺，这些帆船的普及更是让每一个人在孩提时代都成了出色的水手。随着我们领土的扩张我们仍要继续支持巴朗盖船的制作与传承，它们是我们岛与岛之间的沟通桥梁。

original: Wealth attracts jealousy and competing maritime states have always tried to raid our coastlines and attack our ships. We must build a strong naval force to oppose the violent raids of the southern islands, to protect our people and to surpass their trade.
translation: 我们的海岸不仅吸引了贸易，也招致了一些不必要的麻烦，周边的一些沿海国家经常劫掠我们的海岸并袭击我们的船只。我们必须要建立一支强大的海军来驱逐那些南方的来犯者，保护我们的贸易并超过我们的对手。

original: The once safe trade routes of Southeast Asia have grown increasingly dangerous over the years. There are many who would rather plunder than trade, and now even faraway powers can project power in our immediate area. We must adapt to this changing world by finding friends and allies in distant places, or perish at the hands of the newer and older enemies of our people.
translation: 曾经和谐的东南亚商路最近变得充满危险，很多人分明就是来抢钱而不是来做生意的。而随着商路的拓宽，我们也结识了一些远方的强大势力。我们现在应该快速适应新的外交环境，比如寻求一些远方强大国家的庇护，否则我们会在敌人的包围之下节节败退的。

original: Once, the Chola Empire stretched from the Tamil country in India to the many islands of Nusantara. At the height of their power the Cholas sent Lumaya, a young prince of their dynasty, to establish a state in the northern islands. Instead of staying subservient to faraway lords the young prince decided to create a small princedom of his own. The independence of Cebu, the state he founded, hundreds of years later is a testament to his ambition.
translation: 很久以前，朱罗帝国的领土从印度的泰米尔一直延伸到马来群岛。在帝国的鼎盛时期，朱罗国王派遣一位年轻的王子，卢马亚，前来在这些北部群岛建立城市。然而，这位王子却没有选择臣服于那位相隔甚远的国王，正相反，他决定在这里建立他自己的公国。我们现在的祖国，宿务，正是传承着那位国王的野心而一路发展过来。

original: Our roots, as an offshoot of the powerful Tamil Chola dynasty, means that we have a tradition of kingship that goes beyond most realms in this region. We may no longer be in direct contact with the peoples of India but we are still building on the imperial traditions of the Cholas and their state.
translation: 追根溯源，我们是朱罗王朝的一个分支，这就表示相较于其他的一些周边国家，我们更应该遵循一些古老帝国的优秀传统。虽然我们不会与那些印度人再产生过多的来往，但我们仍然可以按照那些之前在朱罗帝国学习到的学识来帮助我们建设国家。

original: For many years now our islands have been plagued by foreign slavers who raid our settlements and steal the able bodied among our people. We must act firmly and aggressively against any sign of foreign raiders, and be ready to employ any means necessary, even burning our own land, to dissuade or defeat these raiders.
translation: 很多年来一些国外的奴隶贩子和海盗经常袭击我们的海岸，他们劫掠我们的村落，掳走我们的精壮劳动力。我们必须立即采取应对措施来想方设法阻止这些入侵者，哪怕不惜点燃我们自己的土地进行封锁，也不能让他们满载而归。

original: Some islands that are nominally under our control have become the base for ill-willed pirates and bandits. We must clear out such nests of pirates and pacify all lands under our control to be able to develop the lands under our control.
translation: 实际上，一些岛屿只在名义上属于我们，实际上却成了海盗和劫匪窝藏的天堂。所以，我们需要彻底将他们赶下我们的土地，并让所有的领土都能在我们的监管下更好地发展。

original: Our position in the middle of the Visayan archipelago allows us to act as a central center of commerce, while also giving us good naval bases to protect our trade and harass our competition. Let us build upon this advantage and expand our privateering operations, making our port the obvious choice for captains of the Visayan seas.
translation: 我们地处米沙鄢群岛中央，控制者这一代的贸易中心，这给了我们很好的制船条件，促进了我们的本土贸易，同时可以暗中削弱竞争对手的实力。让我们借此来扩大对外劫掠规模，并让经过这里的船长认识到，很明显，我们这里才是米沙鄢海最安全的地方。

original: European ships have begun to arrive in our archipelago and these Christian kingdoms seem to have a maritime and martial tradition equal to our own. We should seek to befriend these foreign rulers and cooperate with their warriors to put down our local rivals.
translation: 一些欧洲船只陆陆续续抵达了我们的群岛，这些基督徒们看起来也有着和我们平齐的航海经验。我们应该与这些欧洲国家统治者交好，并请他们协助我们抵御外敌。

original: As an island capital Cebu is ideally situated to rule a maritime realm and as our influence grows, the city itself has also grown. To further encourage the growth of Cebu we must combat tropical diseases and adopt a modern city plan. It is time we show the world just what an island Metropolis could be.
translation: 宿务非常适合作为一个海上王国的首都，而随着我们势力的扩张，这座都城也在源源不断地发展着。为了更好地建设宿务，我们应该去克服那些热带环境带来的疾病，并逐步进行城市化。是时候让大家看看什么是一个海岛之上的大都市了。

original: Muslim traders, sufis and seamens have grown ever more common in the waters of Nusantara over the course of the last hundred years. We should integrate these newcomers in our realm and join the society of maritime Muslim sultanates. By paying homage both to this new god and the old gods of our ancestors we can be sure to have the support of the heavens as well as our people at all times.
translation: 近百年来，穆斯林商人、苏菲派教士和海员们在马来群岛的海域上出现得越来越频繁。我们应该在王国内整合这些新来者，融入到海上穆斯林国家的社群。通过向真主和我们祖先的旧神表达尊崇，我们可以同时得到来自人民和上天的支持。

original: There are a great number of Datus, chiefs, of varying stature and influence within our borders. Many exert a much greater deal of autonomy than we would like. Let us rein in these small time chiefs and make them all come regularly to our capital to partake in the kingship ceremonies of our dynasty.
translation: 在我们的边界范围内，有大量的酋长和首领仍拥有着声望和影响力。许多人想得到更多自治权力。让我们控制这些小酋长，使他们定期来我们王朝的首都朝贡。

original: The island that is our home is also a great source of wealth. Gold, pearls, sugar and cinnamon are all exotic goods that attract merchants from faraway realms and even continents. We must not let access to these goods go too easily. Let us protect our artisans and spice merchants and given them what support they need to thrive and profit from the presence of foreign traders.
translation: 这座岛屿是我们的家园，也是我们财富的来源。黄金、珍珠、蔗糖和肉桂作为奇珍异品吸引了异域国度的商人。我们不能让他们太容易带走这些货物。让我们保护我们的工匠和香料商人，给予他们需要的支持，从外国商人手中夺回我们的利益。

original: The Moro people of Mindanao and Sulu are famous for being able sailors and adept at naval warfare. Yet there are many who would claim to dominate these waters. We should build a new and strong fleet for our state, crewed by the many Moro sailors under our control.
translation: 棉兰老岛和苏禄的摩洛人水手以善于海战而闻名，而且还有许多人声称要控制这片水域。我们应当为我们的国家建立一支崭新而强大的舰队，并让那些摩洛水手处于我们的支配之下。

original: We live in a dangerous world, where slavers and pirates are a constant threat to any coastal settlement. If that was not enough, the arrival of western ships signals the dawn of a new era, with new enemies. We must always be prepared for hostile attacks and fortify all important ports with stone and cannon.
translation: 我们处在一个危险的境地，奴隶贩子和海盗对我们的沿海区域构成了长远的威胁。不仅如此，西方船只的出现标志着一个新时代的来临，新的敌人也接踵而至。我们必须时刻准备好应对敌人的进攻，用石头和大炮巩固我们所有重要港口。

original: There are many who would try to seize our cities and villages against our will. These foreigners claim that they wish to convert us or 'settle' within our lands. We must resist all such attempts, and be ready to use the land itself against any invader.
translation: 许多人企图违背我们的意愿夺取我们的城市和村庄。这些外国人声称他们希望让我们皈依他们的宗教或“定居”于此。我们必须坚决反抗这些意图，并做好准备利用好这片土地抵御一切入侵者。

original: The increased hostile presence throughout the open seas has ruined many of our captains. We must resist those who would put tariffs and regulation on our shipping and instead wholeheartedly engage in smuggling and piracy when we need to. By giving safe harbor to those hunted for piracy we might also increase our activities to once again chase away those who would limit our access to the seas.
translation: 外海上越来越多出现的敌人杀害了我们许多船长。我们必须抵制那些对我们的航运征收关税和管制的人，在我们有需要的时候，他们却一心从事走私和海盗活动。通过给那些被海盗追捕的人提供安全的港口，我们也可以增加我们的活动来再次驱逐那些限制我们进入海洋的人。

original: For generations our people have relied on the use of hilltop fortifications to defend themselves in times of war or unrest. Over time many hundreds of these simple forts have been erected all over Ezo island, ensuring that we have strong points from which we can defend ourselves wherever invaders could strike.
translation: 在战争或动乱时期，我们祖祖辈辈都依托山顶的防御工事保卫自身。随着时间的推移，这些简易的要塞已经在整个虾夷岛建立起来，当有入侵者袭击我们，我们可以确保有足够的优势进行防守。

original: A people that can harvest the riches of the seas will never go hungry or lack for resources. The great whales of the Pacific are an enormous source of wealth and food and our people have hunted and captured such great beasts for centuries. It is said that as long as the God of the sea is on our side our society will prosper.
translation: 能够收获大海无尽恩赐的人们，永远不会受到饥饿与贫穷的灾祸。太平洋中巨大的鲸群是一笔庞大的财富，数个世纪以来，一直为人们提供大量的食物。据说，只要海神与我们同在，社会就会永远的繁荣下去。

original: In many ways the Japanese realm to our south is divided and self-absorbed, and yet they possess many goods and resources that we lack. While it remains necessary to watch these southerners carefully we should let their merchants trade with our communities so that we may profit from their wealth.
translation: 在很多方面，日本地区和我们这边是分离开，互不干涉的，但他们拥有许多我们所缺乏的商品和资源。尽管我们仍有必要密切关注这些南方人，但我们应该让他们的商人与我们的社区进行贸易，以从他们的财富中获利。

original: The Ainu have lived in this region for thousands of years. Long before the current inhabitants of northern Honshu set foot in that region our people lived and made their lives there. This ancestry is one we must proudly uphold and be sure to imprint on any southerners that might we come across.
translation: 阿伊努人在这片土地上生活了数千年了。早在北本州的居民在此定居之前，我们的人民就生活在了那里。我们必须骄傲地挺起阿奴伊祖先的脊梁，并要让所有南方人都熟知这一点。

original: As hunters and trackers we are well adept at using the land to our advantage. This background, as well as a widespread expertise in poisons and traps, is one we should take with us as we expand our domain. Enemies facing our warriors will have to endure not only open warfare but a slow and deadly guerrilla war.
translation: 作为传统的猎人我们，很擅长充分利用脚下的大地。这种背景，以及丰富的毒药和陷阱知识，是我们领土扩张时不能忘记的战争天赋。因此与我们的战士作战，敌人不仅要面对正面战争，还要面对一场缓慢而致命的游击战。

original: The Ainu people have always found strength and guidance in the oral Yukar sagas.
