Sacred tales that can be recited for hours, such as that of Kutune Shirka, connects our current generation with our past and acts as inspiration for all to follow. As our realm is modernized and adapted to the changing realities of the world we must preserve and cherish this heritage so that all may know of our gods and the heroes in our past.
translation: 阿伊努人从名为“尤拉加”的口口相传的长篇叙事诗中寻找力量和指引。其中如“虎杖丸”的神话诗可以吟诵长达数个小时。它把我们这一代和过去联系起来，是全体追随着它的人的共同鼓舞力量。随着我国的现代化并逐渐适应周围的现实环境，我们依然要保护和珍爱这一遗产，让所有人都了解我们的神灵和我们过去的英雄。

original: Many would dream themselves the masters of our people, sending their own men to build cities and fortifications in our lands. We must unite as one against such invaders and drive them back into the sea. We cannot stand idly by while outsiders attempt to extinguish our society, like happened with our ancestors in Honshu.
translation: 许多人梦想成为我们的统治我们的人民，派遣他们的人在我们的土地上建造城市和防御工事。我们必须团结起来，对抗这些侵略者，把他们送回大海。当外人试图让我们的文明之火熄灭时，我们自然不能袖手旁观，就像我们在本州岛的祖先一样。

original: Our clan name Hojo comes from the famous family who hereditarily occupied the position of the Shikken ('Regent') in the old Kamakura Shogunate. We may not be their direct descendants but the power of their name still gives us special influence among the Samurai of the Kanto region.
translation: 我们的家名“北条”来自于一个著名的家族，继承自镰仓幕府时的世袭官职“执权”（摄政）的老北条家。我们可能不是他们的直系后裔，但是光是这个名字就能让我们对在关东地区的武士们带来特别的影响。

original: Using clandestine tactics our armies have overwhelmingly defeated much larger forces. Our soldiers and generals are highly proficient at making use of espionage to plan attacks in darkness. As long as nobody can anticipate where we will strike, our troops will have an edge over any enemy army.
translation: 使用秘密战术，我们的军队以压倒性击败更庞大的武装力量。我们的士兵和将军们精通于间谍活动，并以此策划黑夜中的突击。只要突袭位置不被敌方预知，我们的军队就会占尽优势。

original: Let us build a new bureaucracy headed by talented bureaucrats and supported by an efficient postal system. With ample access to documentation our administrators will always be able to make informed decisions and properly integrate new lands.
translation: 让我们来构筑一个全新的官僚系统，由有才能的官员领导，由高效的信息系统支撑。有了海量档案资料，我们的行政人员将能够做出明智的决定，并正确地整合新的土地。

original: It is our duty as the lord of our people to never tax them beyond their means, and to be ready to reduce economic pressure on them in times of crisis or famine. Let none be able to question the 'Benevolent Reign' of the Hojo clan.
translation: 对人们征税不能超出他们所能负担的，在危机或饥荒时期为他们减轻经济压力。这样，自然谁也不会质疑北条家的德政。

original: Our clans establishment in the impregnable Odawara castle is what made us able to build our realm despite our simple origins. We must continue to utilize strong fortresses in our domain, erecting new ones and restoring conquered Castles at first opportunity. It is only through control of castles that any realm truly controls any land.
translation: 我们的氏族立足于固若金汤的小田原城。尽管我们出身平凡，但我们因此能够建立领地。我们必须继续利用领内的坚固要塞，尽快营建新城并修缮攻占的城郭。只有控制城郭才能真正地掌控土地。

original: Kanto is the homeland of samurai, and the region has a rich economic potential to feed more soldiers and horses. With our lands in Kanto truly united and consolidated we will be able to more freely make use of these resources.
translation: 关东是武士的故乡，这片土地具有供养更多士兵和马匹的潜力。随着我们真正的统一关东的土地，我们将能够更加自由地利用这些资源。

original: Sometimes it is more important to take the right decision than it is to make a quick one. Through the council in Odawara our clan leaders and retainers can join together to discuss important issues. Adhering to this method will let us avoid expensive mistakes and decisions taken with too little information.
translation: 做出决策，质量比速度重要的多。通过小田原议会，家督和家臣齐聚一堂，共商大事。秉承这种方法，就能避免代价高昂的决策错误，避免做出缺乏信息的决策。

original: We have created a system, 'Ichiryo Gusoku', whereby we let both samurai and peasant farm in peacetime and fight in wartime. This way we foster a feeling of unity as well as military experience in all men. The fact that the system also largely alleviates the need for paying upkeep is another advantage for our clan.
translation: 我们独创了“一领具足”的制度，这是一种半农半兵的制度，士兵在战士为士兵，在平时为农民。通过这种方式，我们培养了大家的团结意识，同时也培养了男人们的军事经验。事实上，这个系统很大程度的减轻了军费维护，这是我们家的另一个优势。

original: Our home province Tosa is divided between seven powerful clans. If we are to be able to expand any further we must all join together. They will help us rise up, and in return we will increase their power.
translation: 我们的家乡土佐有七个豪族。如果我们要进一步扩张，就必须联合起来。他们将帮助我们崛起，作为回报，我们将增强他们的力量。

original: Shikoku is seen as a poor, isolated land by the rest of Japan, where nothing of importance happens. Let them continue thinking that and overlook our unification of the island until it is too late.
translation: 在日本其他人们眼中，四国一直是一片贫穷的、与世隔绝的土地，没有要事发生。让他们继续自大去吧，忽视四国的统一，直到一切为时已晚

original: Reforming the laws of our lands and establishing strict parameters for our soldiers will ensure that our army, no matter how ill-equipped or small, will always be feared.
translation: 改革长宗我部家的法律，为我们的士兵建立严格的律令，以确保我们的军队无论装备好坏或规模大小，都是一支令人惧怕的力量。

original: Japan is an island nation and in order to prosper here a strong navy is required. Tosa is an ideal place to begin the construction of an armada of our own.
translation: 日本是一个岛国，强大的海军是国家繁荣昌盛的先决条件。土佐是我们建立起无敌舰队的绝佳位置。

original: The founder of our clan Hata no Kawakatsu was highly admired as the patron god of all art, from traditional dances to theatre. Our clan must live up to his legacy if it is to earn the respect of the Japanese people.
translation: 我们家族的祖先秦河胜被认为是所有艺术的守护神，包括传统舞蹈和戏剧。如果要赢得日本人民的尊重，长宗我部家必须继承他的遗产。

original: Our realm is home to many Buddhist sects, each with their own traditions and history. We must endeavour to respect all these movements equally and let them receive our patronage. This way we can ensure that we have their support in return instead of risking getting dragged into rivalries.
translation: 我们的土地是很多佛教教派的家乡，每个教派都拥有自己丰富的传统和历史。我们必须大力尊重他们的事物并赞助他们的事业。我们由此可以取得他们的支持，避免宗教势力反对我们。

original: Oe Hiromoto, a scholar and politician who contributed greatly to the establishment of the Kamakura Shogunate, was the founder of our clan. To this day his spirit lives on in our clan and we take proud in maintaining an effective administration.
translation: 大江广元是一位学者和政治家，他对镰仓幕府的建立做出了很大的贡献，同时，他也是毛利家的祖先。直到今天，他的精神依然在我们的家族中传承，我们为为政有效而感到自豪。

original: Our clan structure is based on traditional alliances of local samurai, so called Kokujin Ikki. Building on this solidarity we can quickly mobilize a large army.
translation: 毛利家的结构基于被称为国人一揆的当地武士传统联盟。在这种联盟的基础上，我们可以迅速动员一支庞大的军队

original: Our clan is not as influential and widespread as some other in Japan. If we are to succeed we most proactively build agreements and alliances with other Daimyo. There is no one so powerful that they don't have any enemies and with enough numbers we might achieve anything.
translation: 在日本，毛利家并不像其他家那样有影响力。若要取得成功，我们就必须主动与其他大名结盟。没有一个大名可以强大到没有敌人，只要有足够的数量，我们就能成功。

original: A clan only be strong as long as it is united. For this reason we must always remember the legend of the three arrows, as it was thought by Mori Takamoto to his sons. One arrow is easily broken but three at once can withstand even the power of the strongest men.
translation: 一家只要团结，就会强大。因此，我们必须永远记住毛利隆元对他的儿子们的训诫——三矢之训：一支箭容易折断，但三支箭能抵挡最强壮的人的力量。

original: As our clan grows we require a worthy capital, protected by a strong castle. Let us build the city of Hiroshima to be the greatest settlement in our domain, with a castle that is the envy of the Shogun himself.
translation: 随着毛利家的成长，我们需要一个强固城防下的繁荣都城。让我们建造广岛城，把它发展为领土上最繁盛的城市，并建造一座足以让幕府将军嫉恨的永固之要塞。

original: As the caretakers of the Shrine island Itsukushima we have a special duty to the Sea Goddess. By ensuring that these shrines have lack of nothing we can be sure to have the favor of Benzaiten in all maritime matters.
translation: 作为严岛神社的守护者，我们对大海之神有特殊的职责。确保神社香火繁盛，我们即可在海事中得到弁才天的护佑。

original: We have grown famous for the pottery that our artisans in Hagi produce. Hagi ware is widely preferred for tea ceremonies for its exquisite style and quality and its export is growing into a major business.
translation: 萩城生产陶器名满天下，被称为“萩烧”，其由于风格精致、品质可靠，被广泛的用于茶道。出口萩烧渐渐成为一门大生意。

original: Having risen from more humble origins than many other Daimyo our clan cannot count on old friends and contacts in the same way. If we are to succeed in the cutthroat reality of Sengoku era Japan we will have to take a flexible and cunning approach to diplomacy.
translation: 朝仓家的出身比其他许多大名要卑微，自然不能指望有什么熟人相助。如果我们要在战国时代的残酷现实中取得成功，那么我们不得不采取灵活而巧妙的外交手段。

original: Echizen is home to artisans of all kinds. No art is as highly regarded as that of papermaking, however. By encouraging and investing in the Echizen masters we can ensure that Echizen paper becomes the most highly sought type in the country.
translation: 越前有生产各类产品的工匠。然而，没有一种工艺能像造纸术那样被高度重视。通过鼓励和投资于越前纸匠大师，我们可以让越前纸成为全国最受欢迎的纸。

original: The protected location of our capital, Ichijodani, while also close to the ports and overland routes to other important Japanese cities gives it a unique ability to prosper in this time of upheaval and unrest. Let us build on our natural advantages and do what we can to attract the stream of refugees that leave life in Kyoto behind.
translation: 我们的都城，一乘谷城，是日本各大城市之间海陆交通的枢纽。这给了它在这个动荡年代繁荣发展得天独厚的机会。让我们凭借自然的优势，尽我们所能来吸引那些京都的难民。

original: Asakura Soteki, the greatest general in our clan history left one important lesson for all samurai. Victory must be pursued at all cost, it is the only thing that defines a warrior.
translation: 朝仓宗滴是朝仓家历史上最伟大的将军。他深深的教诲了全体武士：战士的价值，就在于对胜利的渴望！

original: Our clan code with seventeen articles defines the relationship between the lord and retainers. It stipulates the need to pay attention to the needs of the common people and to lead a simple life without excess.
translation: 朝仓孝景留下了著名的《朝仓孝景十七条》，规范了家主和家臣之间的关系。它提出了需要注意普通百姓的需求，并且倡导过简朴的生活。

original: Beside the popular Ikko sect, Echizen is home to many important temples of different sects such as the Eiheiji Temple of the Soto sect and the Heisenji Temple of the Tendai sect. If we could control all of them and establish a confessional peace in the province, we would have the foundation of an ideal religious policy for our entire territory.
translation: 除了比较流行的一向宗，越前是许多重要寺院和宗派的聚集地，如永平寺的曹洞宗、平泉寺的天台宗等。如果我们能控制它们，建立一个统一的教派，我们就能有在朝仓的土地上施行更好的宗教政策的基础。

original: Many centuries ago emperor Keitai used Echizen to launch his war to take the imperial throne. Like him we must not hesitate to project power beyond our borders and to launch invasions into neighboring realms when the situation calls for it.
translation: 许多世纪前，继体天皇以越前为主要营地夺取天下，终成九五之尊。像他一样，我们必须毫不犹豫地将影响力投射到边界之外，并在形式允许时向邻国发起侵略。

original: Through strategic marriages and alliances with both Gaelic and Anglo-Irish families, the rulers of Kildare maintain a degree of influence throughout the island of Ireland unmatched by any of their rivals. Such is their power that successive English monarchs appointed them as their Lords Deputy over the island.
translation: 通过与盖尔人和盎格鲁-爱尔兰家庭的战略婚姻和联盟，基尔代尔的统治者在整个爱尔兰岛上保持着一定程度的影响力，没有任何对手与之匹敌。这就是他们的权力，历任英国君主任命他们为他们在岛上的领主。

original: Despite repeatedly betraying the crown, the FitzGeralds of Kildare talk their way out of trouble, returning home with a pardon and a promotion.
translation: 尽管一再背叛国王，基尔代尔的菲茨杰拉德一家还是设法摆脱困境，带着赦免和晋升回国。

original: When Thomas FitzGerald renounced his allegiance to the English king, he did so accompanied by his retinue of armoured gallowglasses, who were bedecked with silken fringes on their helmets. When Thomas wavered in his course of action, an Irish bard recited to him a poem, calling upon the Silken Lord to avenge his father’s death.
translation: 当托马斯·菲茨杰拉德宣布放弃效忠英国国王的时候，跟从他的披甲卫士都穿戴着有丝质条纹头盔。当托马斯在他的行动中动摇的时候，一个爱尔兰诗人向他朗诵了一首诗，呼吁丝纹领主为他父亲的死报仇。

original: The forces sent by the King of England to subdue the Irish can easily be repurposed by the Peerage. By simply offering better pay the Earldom of Kildare could command a sizable force of English soldiers.
translation: 由英格兰国王派来制服爱尔兰人的部队很容易被贵族们利用。只要提供更好的报酬，基尔代尔伯爵就可以拥有一支强大的英国军队。

original: The 11th Earl of Kildare spent many years abroad, studying and learning much of the world. When he returned home, he brought with him a keen interest in alchemy. Such was his knowledge that his neighbors referred to him as the wizard earl, for he was thought to have magical powers.
translation: 第11代基尔代尔伯爵在世上游学多年，学到了诸多知识，并带着他对炼金术的浓厚兴趣返乡。因为他的知识，他的邻居们称他为巫师伯爵，人们认为他身具魔力。

original: The wide open plains of the Curragh have long been used as a gathering place for armed forces, but also make it a popular site for horse racing, and later, horse training.
translation: 库拉的开阔平原长期以来一直被用作武装部队的聚集地，但也使它成为赛马的热门地点，后来又成为了马匹训练的场所。

original: A New Seat for the FitzGeralds
translation: 菲茨杰拉德得到一个新的位置

original: The ancestral seat of the FitzGeralds at Carton House is grand, but our fortunes have improved of late. We have drawn up plans for an even grander residence, that could serve not only as a family seat but also as the Earl's court.
translation: 在卡尔顿宅邸菲茨杰拉德家族的祖籍地位很高，但我们的财富近来有所增加。我们已经制定了一个更宏伟的住宅的计划，这不仅可以作为一个家庭席位，也可以作为伯爵的法院。

original: The O’Neills established control over most of Ulster, becoming the most powerful of the Gaelic lords. One future monarch gave the head of the family a gift of livery, declaring him to be ‘the chief of the Irish kings.'
translation: 奥尼尔建立了对阿尔斯特大部分人的控制，成为盖尔人最强大的统治者。一个未来的君主给了家族首领一件制服，宣布他是爱尔兰国王的领袖。

original: The chosen leader of the O’Neill family receives the title of the O’Neill Mór. The title is not hereditary, but regardless of what branch of the family the O’Neill Mór came from, all owe him fealty.
translation: 奥尼尔家族被选中的领导人获得了奥尼尔的称号。这个头衔并不是世袭的，但无论奥尼尔是哪个家族的后裔，都应归功于他的忠诚。

original: While many Gaelic lords accepted the English practice of primogeniture, the people of Tyrone maintained the Brehon practice of tanistry. As a new ruler was elected by the free men of the clan, he could expect to be well supported in the face of any challengers.
translation: 当许多盖尔人的贵族们接受了英国的长子继承制习俗的时候，泰隆郡的人民维护了他们的家族内选举继承法习俗。作为一个新的统治者，他是由部族的自由人选出来的，在面对任何挑战者时，他都能得到很好的支持。

original: While most Irish lords rely upon the services of a small number of Scottish mercenaries or Irish professionals, the rulers of Tyrone arm and train all of the men under their rule.
translation: 当大多数爱尔兰领主依赖于一小群苏格兰雇佣军和爱尔兰职业军人的效力时，泰隆家族的统治者以他们的方式来武装和训练这些军人。

original: As the spread of the Reformation increases tensions in Ireland, the lords of Tyrone seek the aid of Catholic rulers abroad.
translation: 随着宗教改革的蔓延加剧爱尔兰的紧张局势，泰隆领主寻求海外天主教统治者的援助。

original: Their enemies outnumber them and have better weapons and training, but the men of Tyrone are masters of irregular warfare. They use the hills, forest and bogs of their homeland to their utmost advantage, harrying their enemies as they march and drawing them into traps. The English monarchs grow increasingly frustrated as their armies and treasure disappeared into the wilds of Ireland.
translation: 他们的敌人多过他们，并且还拥有更好的武器和训练，但泰隆人是游击战的大师。 他们利用家园的山丘，森林和沼泽发挥最大的优势，在他们行军时将敌人蹂躏并拉入陷阱。 随着他们的军队和财富消失在爱尔兰的荒野中，英国君主越来越沮丧。

original: The constant conflicts between Tyrone and the English have resulted in a population of young men well trained in the arts of war. Some leave for the continent, where they find employment as mercenaries. Known as the Wild Geese, these regiments often find themselves fighting against the English yet again, but under another flag.
translation: 泰隆与英格兰之间的长久纷争造就了一批受过良好战斗训练的年轻人。其中一些人选择离开前往大陆，在那里他们找到了雇佣兵的工作，这就是有名的“野鹅”军团。然而这个军团发现他们自己多数时候要对付的敌人竟然还是英国佬，只是这次是在为另一面旗帜而战。

original: The head of the O’Donnell clan came to be known on the continent as the Fisher King, due to the export of fish in exchange for wine in the markets of La Rochelle.
translation: 因为向拉罗谢尔市场出口鱼换取酒的贸易，奥唐纳氏族的首领在这片大陆上以渔人王之名闻名。

original: The O’Donnells built a castle on the ruins of a Viking fort and named it Donegal Castle. Described as the strongest fort in Ireland, it presented a formidable obstacle to any enemy threatening Tyrconnell.
translation: 奥唐纳家族在维京城堡的废墟上建造了一座城堡，将它命名为多尼哥城堡。它被描述为爱尔兰最强大的堡垒，并且给任何威胁蒂康奈尔的敌人都带来了巨大的障碍。

original: The rulers of Tyrconnell are great supporters of the church, paying many religious benefices and supporting a Franciscan abbey.
translation: 蒂尔康奈的统治者是教会的伟大支持者，支付了许多宗教福利并支持方济各会修道院。

original: It is said that when St Patrick came to Lough Derg, God revealed to him a cave upon an island in the middle of the lake. This cave was the entrance to purgatory, and St Patrick took non-believers to the cave so that they might witness heaven and hell for themselves. Patrick’s Purgatory has become an important site of pilgrimage, drawing the faithful from across Europe.
translation: 传说圣帕特里克来到德格湖的时候，上帝给予他天启，告诉他湖中心的岛上有一个洞穴，这个洞穴是炼狱的入口。圣帕特里克把非信徒带到这里，这样他们就能亲眼目睹天堂和地狱。帕特里克的炼狱已经成了著名的朝圣场所，吸引着全欧洲的信众。

original: The men of Tyrconnell are often heavily outnumbered by their rivals. To compensate, they master the element of surprise to defeat their enemies, attacking them as they make camp or even in night raids. Before their opponents have time to form ranks, the Tyrconnell host is be upon them.
translation: 泰勒康奈尔的人往往比对手大得多。为了补偿，他们掌握突击的元素来击败敌人，攻击他们，因为他们在营地，甚至在夜间突袭。在他们的对手有时间组成队伍之前，泰勒康奈尔的东道主就在他们身上。

original: The O’Donnells give sanctuary to many Gaelic nobles and priests who have lost their lands at the hands of foreign aggressors. Thus is the royal household of Tyrconnell well served by many notable physicians, clergymen and warriors of great skill and renown.
translation: 奥唐奈尔家族为许多盖尔人的贵族和祭司提供了避难所，他们在外国侵略者手中失去了土地。因此，许多著名的医生、神职人员和技艺精湛的战士们都为泰勒康奈尔的皇室服务。

original: When infighting threatened to tear Tyrconnell apart, Calvagh O’Donnell sought assistance in Scotland, where he met with the Campbells. He returned with a force of Highlanders and some artillery, giving him the strength to secure his hold over the province. The O’Donnells can turn to their Scottish allies again in future to give them an edge in their struggles.
translation: 当内讧威胁撕开泰勒康奈尔时，卡瓦赫-奥唐奈在苏格兰寻求援助，在那里他会见了坎贝尔。他带着一支高地部队和一些炮兵回来了，给了他力量来保卫他对该省的控制。奥多内尔未来可以再次转向他们的苏格兰盟友，让他们在斗争中取得优势。

original: Basque, Spanish and Portuguese fishermen come to take advantage of the extensive fishing grounds off our coasts. When they arrive in our ports they bring with them iron, wine and other commodities, and when the fishing is poor they fill their holds with hides and wool from our markets.
translation: 巴斯克、西班牙和葡萄牙渔夫们来到我们海岸外的巨大渔场捕捞。当他们进入我们的港口时，会带来铁、酒等产品。当他们渔获不佳时，会从我们的市场买来兽皮和羊毛填满装载。

original: To the brave and faithful nothing is difficult. The family motto of the McCarthys has inspired the people of Munster throughout the ages, helping them to keep the faith throughout the brutal wars that have ravaged their homeland.
translation: 对于勇敢和忠诚的人来说，没有什么是困难的。麦卡锡家族的箴言鼓舞了明斯特人民的整个时代，帮助他们在整个蹂躏家园的残酷战争中保持信念。

original: When faced with a superior enemy, the Gaels of Munster retreat into the hills. They then harry their enemy with a constant series of raids, targeting their supplies, burning down villages and destroying crops, until the enemy is forced to withdraw or starve.
translation: 当面对一个优越的敌人时，明斯特的盖尔人撤退到山里。然后他们不断地袭击他们的敌人，瞄准他们的补给，烧毁村庄和摧毁庄稼，直到敌人被迫撤退或饿死。

original: The southern Irish have long shared close ties, both economic and political, with the people of Spain. As their mutual struggles against the English increase, these ties grow stronger. Many young Munster men serve in Spanish armies, learning the arts of war.
translation: 爱尔兰南方人长期以来与西班牙人民有着紧密的经济和政治联系。随着他们与英国增长的相互斗争，这些关系越来越紧密。许多年轻的明斯特人在西班牙军队服役，学习战争艺术。

original: The lands of Munster are harsh, with poor soil and unpleasant winters. The chance to make a new life for themselves in the colonies appeals to many. There is never a shortage of volunteers happy to head across the Atlantic.
translation: 芒斯特这片土地土壤贫瘠且有着不太舒适的冬天。当人们发现去往殖民地能有机会获得新生活时便吸引了许多志愿者的响应。横跨大西洋的路程从没使志愿者们的兴致减退。

original: Based out of Crookhaven harbour, they prey on shipping from the New World heading to Dutch and English ports. The local authorities are happy to look the other way, as the pirates bring the wealth of the Americas to the southern Irish coast.
translation: 海盗基于克鲁克黑文港，他们劫掠从新大陆前往荷兰和英国港口的航运。当海盗把美洲的财富带到爱尔兰南海岸时，当地政府很高兴地朝另一个方向看。

original: The enemies of the MacCarthy clan scheme in every corner of the world, even within our own court. We must ensure the patriotism of our subjects through rigorous investigation.
translation: 在世界的每一个角落，甚至在我们自己的法庭上，都有麦卡锡家族的敌人。我们必须通过严格的调查来确保我们臣民的爱国精神。

original: Leinster was amongst first parts of Ireland to be Christianized. St Palladius arrived in Leinster in the early 5th century to serve as Ireland’s first bishop, preceding St Patrick. The province is dotted with monasteries and abbeys, some of which date back to ancient times.
translation: 伦斯特是爱尔兰基督教的第一部分。圣帕拉迪乌斯于五世纪初抵达伦斯特，担任爱尔兰第一位主教，在圣帕特里克之前。这里点缀着修道院，其中有些可以追溯到古代。

original: The Gaels of Leinster demand a tribute from the Anglo-Norman towns along the south coast and, occasionally, from the English settlers in the Pale. This tribute is known as the ‘cíos dubh,’ the black rent. Failure to pay simply means that the Gaels take the tribute by force, with the added burden of lives lost and houses and crops burnt.
translation: 伦斯特的盖尔人需要从南部海岸的盎格鲁-诺曼城镇得到贡品，偶尔也会从佩尔地区的英国移民手中获取。这种贡品被称为“黑色的租金”。不支付仅仅意味着盖尔人用武力夺取贡品，增加了生命损失，房屋和庄稼被烧毁。

original: With the Reformation spreading like wildfire in Europe, Leinster must rise to the challenge. We shall form a League of nations willing to defend the true faith from any heretics that try to impose their faith on Ireland.
translation: 随着改革在欧洲如火如荼地展开，伦斯特必须迎接挑战。我们将组成一个国际联盟，愿意捍卫来自任何企图对爱尔兰施加信心的异端邪说者的真实信仰。

original: The Subject of My Enemy is My Friend
translation: 敌人的附庸就是我的盟友

original: The rulers of Leinster have always sought to foster ties with the disaffected subjects of their neighbors, so as to better secure their own position. A rebel abroad will always find a sympathetic ear - and perhaps arms, shelter, training and coin - in Leinster
translation: 伦斯特统治者一直试图与邻国的不满者建立联系，以便更好地确保自己的地位。在国外，叛军总会在伦斯特找到同情的耳朵——也许是武器、庇护所、训练和硬币。

original: He Who Is Not Strong Must Be Cunning
translation: 不坚强的人一定很狡猾

original: Though their enemies are usually better equipped with guns and artillery, the warriors of Leinster are adept at using terrain to shield their advance and close to melee – or to cover their retreat as they run to fight another day.
translation: 尽管他们的敌人通常装备有更好的炮兵和炮兵，伦斯特的勇士们擅长利用地形来掩护他们的突击和战斗，或者利用地形掩护他们撤退，以便来日再战。

original: The people of Leinster remember the many injustices perpetrated upon them by their enemies. This strengthens their resolve to fight on, to avenge the fallen and punish the guilty.
translation: 伦斯特的人还记得他们的敌人对他们犯下的许多罪孽。这加强了他们继续战斗的决心，为倒下的人复仇，惩罚那些有罪的人。

original: The O’Byrnes of Ballinacore have taken to training the men of Wicklow in the continental arts of war. They seek to augment their forces of cavalry and kern with pikemen and gunners, so that they might face their foes in open battle.
translation: 巴里纳科尔的奥伯恩斯在大陆战争艺术中培养了威克罗人。他们试图用枪兵和枪手来扩充他们的骑兵和克恩的力量，这样他们就可以在公开的战斗中直面敌人。

original: Galway city is dominated by 14 wealthy merchant families, known as the 14 tribes. Their constant competition and rivalries drive them to seek ever greater profits, and as a result Galway has become a thriving market port.
translation: 戈尔韦市由14个富商家族控制，又称14个帮派。帮派间不断的竞争促使他们寻求更大的利润，从而使戈尔韦市成为了一个繁荣的商业港口。

original: The lands of Clanricarde are controlled by many different families and factions. The rulers of Clanricarde have learned that the best way to assert their authority is through force. Villages, towns and castles burn so that the ruling family can feel secure in their power.
translation: 克兰里卡德的土地由许多不同的家庭和派系控制。克兰里卡德的统治者们已经认识到维护权威的最好方式是通过武力。村庄、城镇和城堡燃烧，使得执政的家庭在他们的权力中感到安全。

original: The lands of Connemara, on the western coasts of Connacht, are particularly poor for livestock or agriculture, but the people there have learned to make a living from the sea. Taking to the ocean in their currachs and hookers, they provide Clanricarde with a ready source of able seamen.
translation: 在康纳特的西部海岸，康内马拉的土地对牲畜或农业特别贫穷，但那里的人们已经学会了从海里谋生。带着他们的帆船和妓女来到海洋里，他们提供了一个有能力的海员的源泉。

original: The harsh and hilly ground of Connemara make good breeding grounds for the Irish Hobby, a breed of horse well suited for the type of skirmish warfare employed by the Gaels.
translation: 在康内马拉的崎岖山地上，为爱尔兰人的爱马提供了良好的繁殖地，这是一种非常适合盖尔人使用的小规模战斗的马。

original: No matter the lies told by the heretics of the Reformation, the people of Clanricarde will always remain loyal to His Holiness.
translation: 不管改革宗的异端谎话说的再好，也动摇不了克兰里卡德人对教宗的忠心。

original: The warriors of Clanricarde come from some of the least hospitable lands in Ireland. To engage in a siege, long from home, holds little fear for them, for they are used to wringing sustenance from more hostile territory.
translation: 在爱尔兰的一些最不适宜居住的土地上，有一些部落的战士。在远离家乡的地方进行着围城战，对他们来说几乎没有什么是值得恐惧的，因为他们习惯于从更加敌对的领土上获取食物。

original: The establishment of the position of Lord President of Connacht helped to bring order to the lands of Clanricarde. Whereas previously disputes between prominent families resulted in raids and feuding, now the Lord President acted as a neutral arbiter
translation: 康诺特领袖的职位的建立有助于使克兰卡德的土地得到秩序。以前，显赫家族之间的争端导致了抢劫和争斗，而现在，领袖成了中立的仲裁者。

original: The Earls of Ormond are known to fight abroad, involving themselves in the dynastic squabbles of the English. The experience gained on the battlefield serves them well when resolving disputes closer to home.
translation: 众所周知，奥蒙德伯爵在国外作战，涉及到英国王朝的争吵。战场上的经验对解决离家更近的争端很有帮助。

original: Whereas most of the Anglo-Irish and Gaelic lords of Ireland do not stray far from their island, the lords of Ormond are well familiar with the courts of Europe, being friends to kings and serving as ambassadors on the continent.
translation: 爱尔兰的大部分爱尔兰人和盖尔人都不远离他们的岛屿，奥蒙德的领主们很熟悉欧洲的法庭，是国王的朋友，也是欧洲大陆的大使。

original: The rulers of Ormond have extensive estates in England. Such is their wealth that the Earl of Ormonde is sometimes known as the Wool Earl, for the riches gained from that trade.
translation: 奥蒙德的统治者在英国拥有大量的地产。因为从贸易中获得的财富,奥蒙德伯爵有时也被称为羊毛伯爵，这就是他们的财富。

original: The Gaels are an unruly lot, prone to rebellion against their betters. They require a strong hand to keep them in line.
translation: 盖尔人不守规矩，容易以下犯上。需要强力的手段让他们无法逾越。

original: Many are jealous of our success. We must be wary, as our enemies will take any opportunity to strike us down and are not limited to honourable means of doing so.
translation: 许多人嫉妒我们取得的胜利。我们必须保持警惕，因为我们的敌人将利用任何机会来打击我们，而且不限于只用体面的手段

original: The armies of Ormond have great experience bringing down the keeps and fortresses of their Gaelic and Anglo-Irish neighbors.
translation: 奥蒙德的军队拥有着丰富的经验，对付他们的盖尔人和盎格鲁-爱尔兰人邻居的城堡和要塞。

original: The Butler family is well established. Secure in our position, we can begin to build for the future, so that our descendants will look upon what we have built and remember us.
translation: 巴特勒家族诞生了，守护我们免受强敌入侵，现在我们可以开始建设我们的未来，我们的后代将会仰视我们的建设并铭记住我们。

original:
We reide of ane rycht famous of renowne,
Of worthi blude that ryngis in this regioune,
And hensfurth I will my proces hald,
Of Wilyham Wallas yhe haf hard beyne tald.
translation: （选自盲哈利的著作《华莱士》书一第二节前四句，原文数处词义不明）

original: The Highland clans are a contentious people. As much as they resent one another, they resent even more the prospect of foreign invaders ruling their ancestral lands. Of course, when the threat of foreign invasion is over, the clans will resume their infighting. There can only be one.
translation: 高地各氏族组成了一个有争议的民族。尽管他们互相憎恨，但他们更憎恨外国侵略者统治他们祖先土地的计划。当然，当外国入侵的威胁结束时，氏族将恢复他们的内讧。只能有一种情况。

original: Whatever problems arise in the Highlands, few can be resolved without at some point storming a castle. Our experience in these matters goes back generations and is a highly transferable skill.
translation: 无论在高地上出现了什么问题，没有什么能摧毁一座城堡。我们对这些问题的经验可以追溯到几代人以前，是一种高度可传承的技能。

original: There are many competing ideas about how the Church in the Highlands should be structured and what doctrines should be adopted following the advent of the Reformation. We have opted to retain the hierarchical Bishopric model, which allows for both a clear structure for Church proceedings and a degree of doctrinal independence for clergymen.
translation: 在改革后，对于高地上的教会应该如何组织，采用什么样的教义，有多种互相竞争的理念。我们选择保留等级主教模式，这既允许教会程序清晰的结构，又允许教士的教义独立程度。

original: Gunpowder weapons have revolutionized the battlefield, and the warriors of the Highlands must adapt. An aggressive new shock tactic has been developed by our generals. Our soldiers will run, preferably downhill, straight into the first enemy volley, firing as they go. After shooting, they will draw more traditional weapons and enter the melee. The speed required for this tactic necessitates that our warriors wear very little in the way of clothing however.
translation: 火药武器彻底改变了战场，高地的战士们必须适应它。 我们的将领已经发明了一种激进的新型冲击战术。我们的士兵会直奔入敌人的第一波齐射中，最好是下坡，随后射击。 射击后，他们将拿更多的传统武器进行白刃战， 尽管这种战术对速度的要求，需要我们的战士穿很少的衣服。

original: Our oppressors would confiscate our weapons to rob us of the ability to resist. The Arming Act requires all Highlanders to own and train with a firearm.
translation: 我们的压迫者会没收我们的武器以剥夺我们抵抗的能力。而武装法令需要所有的高地人拥有枪支并加以训练。

original: The Romantic revival of Gaelic culture is exemplified in a collection of poems written under the pseudonym 'Ossian'. They tell ancient folkloric tales that remind the Highlanders of their storied past.
translation: 盖尔文化的浪漫复兴在以莪相为笔名的诗集中得到了体现。他们讲述了古老的民间故事，让苏格兰高地人想起他们传奇的过去。

original: The mercenary Gallowglasses comprise a sizeable portion of the Irish fighting force. Whilst they are often Gaelic Scottish, many of them have settled in Ireland and found gainful employment as bodyguards and soldiers with the Clans.
translation: 加洛格拉斯雇佣军是爱尔兰武装力量的重要组成部分。同时当中的盖尔苏格兰人，大多数已定居于爱尔兰并组成盈利性雇佣军，充当部族的保镖和士兵。

original: Regardless of provenance, a stranger can always find shelter in Offaly. A long tradition of hospitality and tolerance breeds a culture of respect amongst travellers and kings alike.
translation: 不管出身如何，一个陌生人总能在这找到栖身之所。好客和宽容的悠久传统，从旅行者到国王之间形成了一种尊重的文化氛围。

original: Snaking from the Cuilcagh mountain down to the sea, the river Shannon fosters a small economy of downstream trade. The people of Offaly are well practiced at making the most of the natural lay of the land.
translation: 从库伊卡山发源而蜿蜒入海，香农河养育了一个顺流而下贸易形成的经济区。奥法利的人民充分利用了当地的自然资源。

original: Founded by Saint Ciarán, and situated directly in our heartland, the Monastery of Clonmacnoise has, for nigh a thousand years, spread the word of our Lord to the people of Offaly. By establishing it as a place of pilgrimage, we increase our standing in the eyes of the Lord.
translation: 由圣·恰兰建立的、坐落在我们正中心地带的克伦麦克诺谢修道院在将近一千年的时间里，将主的话语传播给了奥法利的人民。我们把它确立为朝拜处来使我们离主更近。

original: The Tower Houses of Offaly can be seen, silhouetted against the evening sky, throughout our realm. Hundreds, if not thousands of them are to be found throughout Ireland, often built by minor Lords to ward off raids from neighbors and to stand against foreign invasion. By subsidizing construction of more, the defense of our nation will never again be in question.
translation: 可以看到奥法利的塔式住宅遍布在我们的国土上，映衬着夜空的轮廓。这样的塔式住宅在整个爱尔兰成百上千，通常由小领主们建造，用以防卫邻居的突袭并抵抗外来入侵。通过投入更多的建设补贴，我们国家的国防将不再有问题。

original: The politics of succession in Offaly could often get quite violent indeed. Challenges to leadership were crushed in quick and bloody fashion, that a message might sent to any who dared consider themselves King.
translation: 政治上的继承权通常会变得相当暴力。对领导者的挑战被迅速而血腥地粉碎，任何胆敢自称为国王的人都会收到警告。

original: In support of the Gallowglasses, many Gaelic clans raise levies of Kern. Often poorly trained and ill-equipped, it has now become the custom to replace these outdated soldiers with the Buannacht; professional soldiers of high caliber and fearsome reputation.
translation: 为了支持加洛格拉斯雇佣兵，许多盖尔族人提高了对克恩战士的征税。由于低下的训练度和破烂的装备，现在，用高素质、令人敬畏的职业军人——布安纳赫特战士来替换这些过时的士兵已经成为了习惯。

original: The nobility of Ulster have ties of marriage and ancestry with Clan Donald in the Scottish Highlands. The Donalds can always be relied upon to lend their expertise to Ulster.
translation: 阿尔斯特的贵族与苏格兰高地的唐纳德氏族有着婚姻和血统上的联系。阿尔斯特可以依靠唐纳德氏族来获得他们的专业技术知识。

original: Most of the lords of Ulster are at least nominally part of the Irish Peerage system, by which Irish landholders swear allegiance to the English Crown. While this means little in practice, we wear the titles proudly.
translation: 阿尔斯特的大多数贵族至少名义上是爱尔兰贵族制度的一部分，爱尔兰的土地拥护者宣誓效忠英格兰皇冠。虽然这实际上没有什么意义，但我们为这些头衔而自豪。

original: The nobility of Ulster take great pains to appear respectable in the eyes of their English counterparts. This has won them a degree of respect in European courts.
translation: 乌尔斯特的贵族们煞费苦心地在英格兰贵族眼中显得体面。这使他们赢得了欧洲宫廷的高度尊重。

original: The Rapparees are a newly formed band of guerrilla fighters with their origins in the Irish kerns. As irregular soldiers they are able to harass enemy forces as they march through our land.
translation: 这是一个新成立的游击队，他们起源于爱尔兰的克恩部队。作为非正规军，他们在穿越我们的土地时能够骚扰敌人。

original: The Reformation cannot be allowed to gain a foothold in Ireland. Non-Catholics should be barred from public offices and disadvantaged in any way that the state can manage to discourage heresy.
translation: 宗教改革不能在爱尔兰站稳脚跟。非天主教徒应该被禁止从事公职，并以任何方式受限制，使得国家可以阻止异端邪说。

original: A secret society has formed in Ulster known as the Defenders. Their goal is to ensure the loyalty and solidarity of Catholics throughout Ireland, combatting persecution by Protestants.
translation: 乌尔斯特有一个秘密组织被称为捍卫者。他们的目标是确保天主教徒在爱尔兰各地的忠诚和团结，打击新教徒的迫害。

original: Much of Ireland lies at the mercy of the English armies. Ulster is one of the last bastions of Irish independence, and must be prepared to fight to the last man to preserve it.
translation: 爱尔兰的大部分地区都在英国军队的摆布下。乌尔斯特是爱尔兰独立的最后堡垒之一，必须准备战斗到最后一个人来保卫它。

original: The tin miners of Cornwall have long upheld their special legal rights. These include tax exemption and exclusive prospecting rights, but most importantly the right to be tried only before a Stannary Court with a jury composed of their fellow miners. A Stannary Parliament oversees and revises these rights, keeping the mining population productive and content.
translation: 康沃尔锡矿工人长期坚持其特殊的法律权利。这些包括免税和独家探矿权，但最重要的是只有在一个由他们的矿工组成的陪审团的锡矿法庭审理的权利。一个锡矿议会监督和修订这些权利，使矿业人口生产力和内容。

original: The Cornish people are quick to rise up against oppression and misrule. Hostile armies entering their lands receive an unfriendly welcome.
translation: 康沃尔人迅速起来反抗压迫和暴政。敌对的军队进入他们的土地不会受到欢迎。

original: Farmers, miners, and landlords alike are extremely reluctant to accept changes to religious prayer books. Many complain that prayer books written in English exclude a significant part of the population who speak only Cornish, though others point out they could not read the old Latin prayers either. Regardless, a traditionalist attitude to religion pervades Cornish society and binds it together.
translation: 农民、矿工和地主都极不愿意接受宗教祈祷书的修改。许多人抱怨说，用英语写的祈祷书排除了只说康沃尔语的人口的很大一部分，尽管也有人指出他们也读不懂古拉丁语的祈祷词。不管怎样，传统的宗教态度弥漫在康沃尔社会，并将其结合在一起。

original:
Oh, better far to live and die
Under the brave black flag I fly,
Than play a sanctimonious part,
With a pirate head and a pirate heart.
translation:
噢，我在这黑旗下自由飞翔，
既不装神弄鬼也不假模假样，
哪怕要出生入死也比那样要强，
海盗的心不停跳动在胸膛。
（音乐剧《班战斯的海盗》歌词）

original: Ever staunch monarchists, the Cornish people are quick to rally to the defense of the crown against republican revolutionaries. Despite Cornwall’s relatively low population, it can raise a surprisingly large levy of determined soldiers willing to fight for King and country.
translation: 曾经坚定的君主主义者，康沃尔人迅速团结起来捍卫皇冠反对共和党革命者。尽管康沃尔人口相对较低，但它却能大幅度增加愿意为国王和国家而战的士兵。

original: Even should we lose the war, enough of us will likely flee the field that they will live to fight again another day.
translation: 即使我们输掉了战争，我们也有足够的可能逃离他们再次生活的战场。

original: A recent revival of interest in Celtic culture has created an interest in Arthurian legend. Tintagel Castle is said to be the place of King Arthur's conception, and acts as a focal point of a renewed Celtic identity in Cornwall.
translation: 最近对凯尔特文化的研究兴趣的重燃催生了人们对亚瑟王传奇的浓厚兴趣。廷塔杰尔城堡被认为是亚瑟王的出生地，并在康沃尔地区成为了凯尔特文化复兴的焦点。

original: The Tynwald is the Manx high court. The House of Keys, led by the most powerful families of Mann, act as a national jury that give advice on legal matters. As the state expands however, its administrative needs multiply. The Tynwald must become a permanent institution, akin to a parliament with the power to write new laws.
translation: 廷瓦尔德是曼克斯高等法院。由曼氏家族中最强大的家族领导的下议院作为一个全国性的陪审团，在法律问题上提出建议。然而，随着国家的扩张，其行政需求倍增。廷瓦尔德必须成为一个永久性的机构，类似于一个有权制定新法律的议会。

original: The Stanley dynasty has ushered in an era of peace and prosperity for the Manx people. Their skill at diplomacy ensures the safety of the island from both political and military threats to our sovereignty.
translation: 斯坦利王朝为马恩岛人民开创了一个和平繁荣的时代。他们的外交技巧确保了岛上的安全，从政治和军事威胁到我们的主权。

original: Despite its size, Mann is recognized as a de jure Kingdom. But what is a Kingdom without land? We must acquire more.
translation: 虽然只是弹丸之地，马恩岛是法律意义上的一个王国。但是一个没有土地的王国有什么意义呢？我们必须获得更多。

original: It is time to finally settle the status of peasant landholding on Mann. The Act will guarantee the basic rights of citizens and become a basis for the future development of our constitution.
translation: 是时候解决农民土地所有权问题了。该法案将保障公民的基本权利，成为未来宪法发展的基础。

original: In centuries past Mann was the heart of a great realm that spanned across the Irish Sea. It is time to revive the tradition of shipbuilding so that we can restore this empire.
translation: 在过去的几个世纪里，马恩岛是横跨爱尔兰海的一个伟大王国的中心。现在是恢复造船传统的时候了，这样我们才能恢复这个帝国。

original: Witchcraft and heresy are ever-present dangers to the faithful. Suffer not the witch and the heretic to live.
translation: 巫术和异端对信徒而言是经常存在的危险，不能容忍让巫术和异端存活。

original: There are too many petty nobles holding minor titles and withholding rents from their land. The Act Of Revestment will revoke these titles so that the monarch can rule more directly.
translation: 这个国家有太多拥有微小头衔的小贵族扣留着土地的租金。清算行动将撤销这些头衔，以便君主能够更直接地统治。

original: When the English were expelled from Dublin, they left behind an institution called the Parliament of Ireland. Meant as an instrument to subjugate us, we will instead use it to organise our efforts to resist a return of English rule.
translation: 当英国人被驱逐出都柏林时，他们留下了一个叫做爱尔兰议会的机构。作为一种征服我们的工具，我们将用它来组织我们抵制英国统治的努力。

original: Once known as Irishtown and a ghetto for native Irish in Dublin, we have turned the tables. The district is now relegated to the Englishmen who remain, there being forced to integrate into the new order.
translation: 曾经一度被称为爱尔兰小镇和都柏林土著爱尔兰人的贫民区，已经被我们扭转局面。这个地区现在只有残留下来的英国人，他们被迫融入新秩序。

original: The Cess is a special tax for the purpose of maintaining the extraordinary garrisons required to keep our towns safe. The people resent the tax, but understand its necessity.
translation: 塞斯是一种特殊的税收，目的是为了维持我们城镇安全所需的必要的驻军。人们讨厌税收，但明白它是必要的。

original: Ireland lacks an institution of higher learning. A Catholic university in Dublin would put Ireland on the academic map.
translation: 爱尔兰缺乏一个高等学府。都柏林的一所天主教大学将把爱尔兰放在学术地图上。

original: The people of Dublin and Meath have had to endure many sieges through the years. We understand how to survive them and how to resist them.
translation: 多年来，都柏林和米斯的人民不得不忍受许多围攻。我们懂得如何生存，如何抵抗它们。

original: As trade begins to blossom in the North Sea, so too does our importance in the area. Our people's natural skill at sea-faring will prove most useful in the coming years.
translation: 随着北海贸易开始发展，我们在这一地区的重要性也越来越大。我国人民在海上航行的自然技能在未来几年将是最有用的。
阿普斯特拉斯布姆联盟

original: The Frisian dream of true Republicanism has had many setbacks. Since the 12th Century, we have striven against feudalism; perhaps now it is the time to constitutionalize our ideals.
translation: 弗里斯兰真正的共和主义梦想经历了许多挫折。自十二世纪以来，我们一直在反对封建主义，也许现在是我们的理想宪法化的时候了。

original: Horrific floods have plagued the coast of Frisia from time immemorial. Our engineers have done such a remarkable job on shoring up the vast embankments and dykes that hold back the sea, that we believe they may be among the finest in the world.
translation: 自古以来，可怕的洪水一直困扰着弗里西亚海岸。我们的工程师们在支撑广阔的堤岸和堤坝上做了一件非常出色的工作，我们认为它们可能是世界上最优秀的堤坝之一。

original: The landscape of Frisia has been dotted with artificially-irrigated enclosed fields called Polders, for centuries. It was only recently that we realised their superb potential for combating invasion. By opening the floodgates, we can render our territory all but impenetrable.
translation: 几个世纪以来，弗里西亚的风景一直被人工灌溉的被称为圩田的封闭场地所点缀。只是在最近，我们才意识到他们对抗入侵的卓越潜力。打开闸门，我们的领土就完全不可战胜了。

original: As debate in Europe becomes ever more heated regarding the Divine, we strive to promote our legacy of tolerance, understanding, and friendship.
translation: 随着欧洲对神圣的争论变得越来越激烈，我们努力促进我们宽容、理解和友谊的遗产。

original: The Low Countries have been besieged, set upon, and conquered time and again over the course of history. It is becoming fast apparent that we must reach out to our brethren and stand firm in our mutual resolve to keep our property, ours.
translation: 在历史的进程中，低地国家被攻击、被包围，并被一次次地征服。我们必须向我们的弟兄们伸出援助之手，坚定地维护我们的财产。

original: Foreign soldiers often remark on the bravery of our troops. Whether their bravery is caused by rations of gin as the foreigners believe, or by our superlative training regimen, it is not clear.
translation: 外国士兵常说我军英勇。他们的勇敢是由如同外国人认为的杜松子酒的口粮导致的，还是我们最高级的训练方案导致的，目前还不清楚。

original: Initially the work of Utrecht born Gerard Groote, the Modern Devotion movement calls for a simple and pious approach to living. These values should be promoted in this time of uncertainty, lest we forget our humble origins.
translation: 最初，由出生在乌德勒支的赫拉尔德·赫罗特创立的“现代奉献”运动要求人们用一种简单而虔诚的生活方式生活。这些价值观念应该在这个动荡的时期被提倡，以免我们忘记自己卑微的出身。

original: Utrecht has, for many centuries, been the highly influential seat of a Prince-Bishop. Latterly, the voice of Utrecht has been drowned out by the clamor of sycophantic lip-service from those who would ingratiate themselves in the eyes of God. By issuing a nationwide proclamation in support of our divine heritage, we reaffirm our status in God's kingdom.
translation: 几个世纪以来，乌得勒支一直是一位高度有影响力的主教的驻地。后来，乌得勒支的声音被那些谄媚的嘴唇和那些讨好上帝的人的呼声淹没了。通过发布一个全国性的公告来支持我们的神圣遗产，我们重申我们在上帝的王国中的地位。

original: The walls of Utrecht withstand anything our enemies can bring to bear. Our artisan engineers make sure our legacy stands, and will stand, well into the future.
translation: 乌得勒支的城墙能抵御敌人所能承受的一切。我们的工匠工程师确保我们的遗产屹立不倒，将屹立不倒，走向未来。

original: This canal links Utrecht to the Hollandse IJssel, and brings with it all manner of foreign trade. By expanding the network of tributary canals around Utrecht, and indeed, the rest of our country, we open up a thriving market to our populace.
translation: 在乌得勒支的荷兰艾瑟尔运河左，和它带来了他们所有的对外贸易。通过扩大在乌得勒支大学诸运河网络和其他事实，我们的乡村，我们开放我们的民众一蓬勃发展的市场。

original: The many churches of Utrecht are a testament to our favorable position in the church. Nonetheless, a new era of church-building is upon us - lay the foundation!
translation: 乌得勒支的许多教会都证明了我们在教会中的有利地位。然而，一个教堂建设的新时代的将由我们开辟！

original: No invasion or foreign occupation has blunted the desire of every citizen of Utrecht to be free. We notice that our brothers in the Low Countries hold many of the same beliefs and values as us - perhaps it is time we extended the hand of friendship?
translation: 没有侵略或外国占领削弱了乌得勒支每个公民的自由愿望。我们注意到，我们在低地国家的兄弟们拥有许多与我们相同的信仰和价值观，也许我们该伸出友谊之手了。

original: In this era of wonders, the education of our people is of paramount importance. Universities and schools are springing up from East to West. Let us embrace this knowledge for the betterment of Man.
translation: 在这个奇迹时代，我们的人民的教育是最重要的。大学和学校正在从东方向西方涌现。让我们拥抱这些知识来改善人类。

original: The Flemish cloth industry is the envy of the world. Merchants come from far away to sell their wool in Flanders, where we manufacture the best quality cloth.
translation: 佛兰德布业是世界羡慕的对象。商人们从遥远的地方来弗兰德斯卖羊毛，在这里我们生产最优质的布。

original: The Low Countries are highly susceptible to flooding, but we now have the technology to reclaim this land from the ocean.
translation: 地势较低的国家极易受到洪水的影响，但我们现在拥有了围海造田的技术。

original: New ideas inspire an iconoclastic fury among the people of Flanders. A 'statue storm' is underway, as reformers destroy heretical icons and imagery.
translation: 新观念激起了佛兰德人民的一种偶像般的愤怒。“圣像破坏运动”正在进行中，因为改革者破坏异端的圣像和雕像。

original: As Flanders has some of Europe's greatest port cities, it is only fitting that it should have some of Europe's greatest shipyards. Being able to use local craftsmen dramatically reduces the costs of acquiring new merchant fleets.
translation: 弗兰德斯有欧洲最伟大的港口城市，只有欧洲最好的造船厂才是合适的。由于能够使用当地工匠，大大降低了获取新的商业船队的成本。

original: We have suffered great humiliation under foreign overlords. Forced to publicly swear fealty with nooses around their necks, our brave patriots crossed their fingers and vowed never to allow Flanders to be humiliated again.
translation: 在外国霸主的统治下，我们蒙受了极大的屈辱。勇敢的爱国者们被迫用脖子上的绳索来公开宣誓效忠，发誓永不让弗兰德斯再次受辱。

original: In 1354 Duke John III of Brabant granted a Joyous Entry to the citizens of Brabant. The six specific freedoms detailed the exact powers that the church, the towns and nobles have.
translation: 公元1354年，布拉邦特公爵约翰三世起草了《欢乐入境宪章》（它被看作低地国家的《大宪章》）。宪章中六种具体的自由权详细解释了教会、城镇和贵族所拥有的确切权力。

original: The terrain in the Low Countries is dominated by marshes and other unfavorable terrain. By training our generals to better adapt to the hostile terrain we can have more success in the battlefield.
translation: 低地国家的地形主要是沼泽和其他不利地形。通过训练我们的将领更好地适应恶劣地形，我们可以在战场上取得更大的成功。

original: The old castle at Coudenberg has become obsolete. In its place we should construct a grand palace that will be the envy of the Low Countries. It will have vast wings, lavish decorations, and be fitted for even royal receptions.
translation: 戈登堡的旧城堡已经过时了。在它的位置，我们应当建造一个宏伟的宫殿，这将是低地诸国的骄傲。它将有巨大的两翼，奢华的装饰，甚至适用于皇家的接待。

original: Antwerp has become the sugar capital of Europe; importing most of the continent’s supply and containing one of the largest populations of able refiners to make and ship it.
translation: 安特卫普已成为欧洲的糖都，欧洲大部分糖都从这里输入，并拥有欧洲最多的制糖工匠，以制造和运输。

original: Antwerp is home to the richest and most influential banks outside of Italy. We lend not only to merchants and nobles but to the governments of great states.
translation: 安特卫普是意大利以外最富有和影响力最大的银行的集中地。我们不仅把钱借给商人和贵族，还借给大国政府。

original: Religious tolerance is a tradition in the Duchy of Brabant. Crypto-Jews are welcome here, as are the many emerging sects of the Reformation.
translation: 宗教宽容是布拉邦特公国的一项传统。在别处只能隐瞒信仰的犹太人在这里受到欢迎，正如那些新兴的改革教派一样。

original: If Brabant is to be part of something greater, it must be administered directly by the state as Generality lands rather than being ruled by local nobles or burghers.
translation: 如果布拉班特是更大国家的一部分，它必须由等级议会直接管理，而不是由当地贵族或市民统治。

original: The Guilds of Liège have banded together in this time of strife to bring order to the city. Each man who joins a guild has equal say in its meetings, and each guild has equal voice in the collective decision.
translation: 为了给这座城市带来秩序，列日的行会联合起来了。每个加入行会的人在其会议上都有平等的发言权，并且每个行会在集体决策中都有平等的发言权。

original: Liège finds itself embroiled in many conflicts. No matter how many defeats it suffers or how many times the city is burnt to the ground, the people of Liège will regroup and take up the fight once more.
translation: 列日卷入了许多冲突。但不管它遭受多少次失败，或者这座城市被夷为平地多少次，列日的人民都将重新组织起来，重新开始战斗。

original: The rule of the Prince-Bishops ensures the religious devotion of subjects, while the rule of the Pope ensures the piety of the Prince-Bishop himself.
translation: 主教的统治保证了臣民的宗教虔诚，而教宗的统治保证了主教本人的虔诚。

original: The noble house of Wittelsbach is both prestigious and vast. Those among their number who take the cloth should be invited to serve as Prince-Bishops in Liège. While this would entangle us in the dynastic politics of the German Princes, it would also improve our ability to conduct diplomacy in Imperial courts.
translation: 维特尔斯巴赫的贵族住宅既有声望又有广大。在这些人中，应该邀请他们担任列日主教。虽然这会使我们卷入德意志诸侯的朝政，但这也会提高我们在帝国法庭进行外交的能力。

original: The old Palace is a broken ruin, not fit for a modern ruler. Our Prince-Bishop must have a palace the equal of any other Prince of the Holy Roman Empire.
translation: 旧宫是一个破碎的废墟，不适合现代统治者。我们的主教必得有一个宫殿，与其他神圣罗马帝国的诸侯一样。

original: Literary societies are all the rage in Europe these days. Liège must have one of its own, for the promotion of literacy and culture in our nation.
translation: 宗教改革的许多神学派别将在东弗里西亚找到。也许这是一个注定要失败的努力，但我们应该尝试去发现在天主教和改革的理想之间是否存在一个和平的中间立场。

original: Declaration of the Rights of Man and Citizen
Closely modelled on French revolutionary documents, the Declaration of Rights sets out a radical list of inalienable rights for our citizens.
translation: 根据法国革命文件，《权利宣言》为我们的公民制定了一份不可剥夺的权利的激进清单。

original: Gelre has been elevated by the Emperor from a mere County to a magnificent Duchy. Gelre is thereby recognized as one of the most prominent states of the Low Countries.
translation: 海尔雷被皇帝从一个卑微的伯国晋升为一个堂堂公国，因此被公认为低地诸国中最显赫的国家之一。

original: The rivers that flow through Gelre bring with them an abundance of trade. No wonder that an extraordinary amount of towns in our land are members of the Hanseatic League. These Hanseatic towns make a vital contribution to the duchy's coffers.
translation: 流经海尔雷的河流带来了丰富的贸易。难怪我们的土地上有相当数量的城镇是汉萨同盟的成员。这些汉萨城镇对公爵的金库作出了重要贡献。

original: Whether they be Dukes of Burgundy or Kings of Spain, the people of Gelre use every means at their disposal to eject foreign rulers from their lands. Our staunch independence in the face of adversity cements our right to rule.
translation: 不管他们是勃艮第公爵还是西班牙国王，海尔雷人民都利用他们的手段，从他们的土地上驱逐外国统治者。面对逆境，我们坚定的独立性巩固了我们的统治权。

original: While other states in the Low Countries battle the advance of the ocean, Gelre contends with its rivers. The perennial risk of flooding has forced us to develop a tradition of river engineering that controls the flow of water throughout our land.
translation: 当低地的其他国家与海洋作战时，海尔雷与河流抗争。洪水泛滥的风险迫使我们发展一种河流工程的传统，通过它我们控制着整个土地的水流。

original: Gelre is no stranger to military conflict, and its armies once again stand ready to expand our borders by force. Our motivations of course are not purely expansionist - we also seek to defend the Low Countries from the encroachment of foreign kings.
translation: 海尔雷对军事冲突并不陌生，它的军队再次准备以武力扩张我们的边境。我们的动机当然不是纯粹的扩张主义——我们也寻求保护低地国家免受外国国王的入侵。

original: It is always difficult to muster the coin to pay soldiers. As an alternative to payment by the state, many soldiers and mercenaries are willing to accept instead the right to plunder the land of whatever valuables they come across on their campaigns.
translation: 集结钱财总是很困难的。作为军饷的替代品，许多士兵和雇佣军愿意接受在他们的战斗活动中掠夺土地上的任何贵重物品的权利。

original: Outright conquest is the simplest method of claiming new territories, but there is much to be said also for a diplomatic approach. Through strategic marriages and moneylending, our realm has expanded from minor holdings in Upper Guelders to its current size. Holland and Utrecht have loaned more from our plentiful treasury than they could pay back, and we have obtained Nijmegen and the Veluwe as collateral. We must obtain more lands following this example.
translation: 彻底征服是最简单的获取新领土的方法，但是外交手段也很重要。通过战略婚姻和货币借贷，我们的领地已经从上盖尔德斯的小规模扩大到目前的规模。荷兰和乌得勒支已经从我们大量的财政部借出了比他们能偿还的更多的钱，我们已经获得了奈梅亨和费吕沃作为抵押品。在这个例子中，我们必须获得更多的土地。

original: East Frisia has thus far survived without becoming a feudal society. The Cirksena family has recently gained power over the region, but much of the land is still ruled de facto by the old chiefs. By retaining aspects of the old tribal system the transition into a modern state will be made easier.
translation: 到目前为止，东弗里西亚还没有成为一个封建社会。Cirksena家族最近获得了该地区的权力，但大部分土地仍由老酋长统治。通过保留旧部落制度的各个方面，过渡到现代国家将变得更加容易。

original: Several feudal rulers claim our land as their own, among them the Dukes of Saxony and Counts of Oldenburg. Our struggles with our German neighbors leave a lasting impression on our military tradition.
translation: 几位封建统治者声称我们的土地是他们自己的，其中包括萨克森的公爵和奥尔登堡的伯爵。我们与德意志邻国的斗争给我们的军事传统有持久的影响。

original: The many theologies of the Reformation shall find a home in East Frisia. While perhaps a doomed effort, we should attempt to discover whether a peaceful middle ground might exist between Catholicism and the ideals of the Reformation.
translation: 宗教改革的许多神学派别将在东弗里西亚找到一个家。也许这是一个注定要失败的努力，但我们应该尝试去发现在天主教和改革的理想之间是否存在一个和平的中间立场。

original: By instituting, or maintaining, a wide array of religious and economic freedoms, we might attract a great number of Dutch migrants to our cities. Among them are wealthy merchants and wise philosophers who would surely be of use to the state.
translation: 通过建立或维持广泛的宗教和经济自由，我们可以吸引大量荷兰移民到我们的城市。其中有富有的商人和明智的哲学家，他们肯定会对国家有用。

original: Even the more radical Reformed sects should be welcome in our capital, Emden. Among these sects are an unusual Anabaptist group led by the preacher Menno Simmons. These 'Mennonites' preach peace and understanding, both qualities that the state would be wise to adopt itself.
translation: 即使是更激进的改革派也应该在我们的首都埃姆登受到欢迎。在这些教派中，有一个由传教士门诺·西蒙斯领导的不寻常的再洗礼派团体。这些“门诺派”宣扬和平与理解，由当局来亲自接受这两个品质是明智的。

original: The burghers of the city have been making demands for autonomy for many years now. We have been reluctant to grant their requests, but perhaps it is time to consider the benefits of more autonomous towns.
translation: 这座城市的居民多年来一直要求自治权。我们一直不愿批准他们的请求，但也许是时候考虑更多自治城镇的好处了。

original: At long last it has become viable to launch trade missions to distant China. East Frisia must be among the nations ready to exploit its riches by founding a trading company.
translation: 终于，启动去遥远中国的贸易任务变得可行。东弗里西亚必须建立一个贸易公司，来成为准备好获取遥远财富的国家之一。

original: Charlemagne himself held court at the Palace of Aachen, and ever since then the city has hosted the Imperial Coronation. Though the Palace is now derelict, in its place we have built an impressive Town Hall that continues to be the site of the coronation feast.
translation: 查理本人在亚琛宫举行宫廷，自那以后，该市就举行了皇家加冕典礼。虽然宫殿现在已经废弃，但在它的地方，我们建造了一个令人印象深刻的市政厅，它仍然是加冕盛宴的场所。

original: Ever since the Empire ceased to be ruled directly from Aachen, the city has held the status of Imperial immediacy. The city is self-governing, its leaders answer only to the Emperor himself.
translation: 自从帝国不再从亚琛直接统治以来，这个城市就一直保持着帝国主义的直接地位。这个城市是自治的，它的领导人只对皇帝自己负责。

original: Aachen is among Europe's most renowned spa towns. The supposed healing properties of the water make the city's bathhouses popular among both the citizenry and visitors from abroad.
translation: 亚琛是欧洲最著名的温泉城市之一。据传水有愈合特性，使得城市的浴室在市民和国外游客中都很受欢迎。

original: Like many cities in the Germany, the guilds have influence over governance. In Aachen their influence has grown so great that the ruling council has been forced to incorporate the guilds into the government itself, so that industrial interests are always at the forefront of policy decisions.
translation: 同德意志的许多城市一样，公会对治理也有影响。在亚琛，他们的影响力如此之大，以至于执政委员会被迫将公会纳入政府本身，使工业利益始终处于政策决策的最前沿。

original: As city officials flip to and from Catholicism and the various reformed sects, we must decide on a single faith for the city and expel any officials that do not conform.
translation: 当城市官员向天主教和各种改革的教派转变时，我们必须决定对城市的一个信念，驱逐任何改信的官员。

original: There are many grand buildings in Aachen that have fallen into disrepair through war and neglect. This presents an opportunity to rebuild in new architectural styles. The Baroque style has become particularly influential, and would make an excellent inspiration for the renovation of the Town Hall.
translation: 亚琛有许多宏伟的建筑因战争和被忽视而失修。这提供了重建新建筑风格的机会。巴洛克风格已成为特别有影响力的，并将成为市政厅改造的一个极好的灵感。

original: As the dust settles after a great war in Europe, leaders must come to the peace table to resolve conflicts. There is no better site than Charlemagne's capital to host these international conferences that will surely bring about a new era of peace in Europe.
translation: 随着欧洲大战争后尘埃落定，各国领导人必须到和平谈判桌上来解决冲突。没有比查理曼的首都更好的地点来举办这些国际会议，这必将为欧洲带来一个新的和平时代。

original: Our city walls have repelled invaders before. So long as they are well maintained they should continue to effectively defend our towns.
translation: 我们的城墙已经击退了曾经的侵略者。只要他们保持良好，他们就应该继续有效地保卫我们的城镇。

original: The Duchies of Cleves and Mark have become united through a personal union that has stood the test of time. Our right to rule both Duchies is firmly established.
translation: 克里维斯与马克公爵领通过联合统治的统一经受住了时间的检验。我们对两个公爵领的统治已经牢牢地建立起来。

original: Cleves is dedicated to advancing the true faith by reforming outdated and heretical doctrines and institutions.
translation: 克里维斯致力于通过改革陈旧过时的教义和制度来推进真正的信仰。

original: Marriage has traditionally been the surest way to secure an alliance with a foreign power. In these difficult times we must make sure that we wed our daughters wisely and to the most resolute potential allies.
translation: 传统上，婚姻是确保与外国势力结盟的最可靠方式。在这些困难时期，我们必须确保我们明智地使我们的女儿结婚，并与最坚决的潜在盟友结盟。

original: Consolidating feudal titles prevents the fragmentation of the realm through inheritance. Plans have been drafted for the formal union of the Duchies of Julich, Cleves, and Berg, which should set an example for our future expansion.
translation: 巩固封建统治，通过继承防止王国分裂。已经起草了关于克里维斯、尤利希和贝格公爵领的正式联盟的计划，这应该为我们未来的扩张树立一个榜样。

original: The city of Duisburg shall become renowned for its educated populace. We should invite promising cartographers such as Mercator and Corputius to map the world, and establish academies to further the advance of the sciences.
translation: 杜伊斯堡市将因其教育良好的民众而闻名。 我们应该邀请有前途的制图师，如墨卡托和科布提乌斯来绘制世界地图，并建立学院来推动科学的进步。

original: Schwanenburg has undergone a series of largely cosmetic renovations throughout the years. Its location however is strategic, and there is potential for the castle to become a true military fortification, garrisoned by the village that sits in its shadow.
translation: 施瓦嫩堡近年来经历了一系列的整修。这座城堡的位置是战略性的，它有潜力成为一个由其控制范围内的村庄拱卫着的真正的军事要塞。

original: You are not leading the siege and do not participate as an overlord, so you may not order an assault.
translation: 你并没有在指挥围城，也并未作为宗主国参与，因此不能发动强攻。

original: Flanders has historically been at the forefront of technological and cultural advancements. We must continue to patronize inventors, artists, and writers to maintain our edge over other nations.
translation: 弗兰德斯历史上一直处于技术和文化进步的前沿。我们必须继续资助发明家、艺术家和作家，以保持我们对其他国家的优势。

original: Flanders is home to many institutions of academic learning. Flemish scholars lead the way in the field of natural philosophy.
translation: 弗兰德斯是许多学术学习机构的家园。弗拉芒学者在自然哲学领域乃执牛耳者。

original: The dense jungles of South-East Asia are difficult for horses to traverse, and so we have traditionally trained elephants as mounts for our greatest commanders. We must expand the Royal Stables so that we can field hundreds of these mighty beasts in our armies.
translation: 东南亚的密林让马匹难以驰骋，所以传统上我们使用受训的大象作为伟大将领的坐骑。我们必须扩大皇家厩舍，这样军中就有成百只这强壮的猛兽。

original: To reach our enemies we must often travel great distances across harsh terrain. We must plan our campaigns far in advance, making sure that we are well supplied and that conditions in the camps do not ferment disease or desertion. With these preparations in place we will march our armies into Siam and beyond!
translation: 我们需要在严酷的地形中行军千里去接敌。我们需要在此之前来计划战事的推演，保证我们的供给无虞，军营中没有疫病或者阵前叛逃。准备好了这些我们就可以把部队开进暹罗甚至更远的地方！

original: We have taken the title Rajadhiraja; King of Kings, for many petty rulers pay homage to our dynasty. By winning the respect of all the Burmese people our armies will swell with recruits ready to serve the King.
translation: 我们已经采纳罗阇底罗阇的称号；万王之王，许多蕞尔小国之主向我们王朝屈膝。通过赢得所有缅甸人们的尊敬，我们的军队将与人们热切效忠君王的心一起飞速膨胀。

original: It has been traditional to patronize literary works in the Pali language, prestigious as it is in Buddhist circles. However, we must not neglect to patronize our native Burmese vernacular as well. A strong literary tradition will enrich our court culture and inspire our leaders.
translation: 巴利语在佛教圈的声望使得资助巴利语文学已成为传统。然而，我们不应当忽视我们的缅甸乡音。一个浓厚的文学传统将会丰富我们的朝堂，激励我们的将领。

original: The hills east of Ava are home to many disparate, warring tribes. Though they sometimes foolishly attempt to fight against us, we should convince the tribes with words or with coin that it would be better to fight under our banner.
translation: 阿瓦东部的山林里居住者许多迥然不同、相互敌对的部落。尽管他们偶尔会愚蠢地试图攻击我们，我们还是应当尝试去说服或买通他们，让他们乐于在我们的旗帜下战斗。

original: The many Shan Mongs are a constant thorn in our side. They seek to usurp our authority and withhold rightfully owed tribute at every opportunity. It is time to exercise greater control over the clans that pay us homage.
translation: 许多掸邦土司让我们芒背在刺。一有机会他们就挑战我们的权威，扣押属于我们的上贡。是时候施展更有效的控制，得到他们的尊敬。

original: We allow our provincial governors far too much leeway. Far too often they have conspired for the throne or failed to provide the soldiers we are due. We will institute a robust system by which we will reward only our most loyal servants with governorates, with each appointed directly by the King.
translation: 我们过于放任在地方的省份官员了。他们要么整日筹谋王位，要么拒绝提供征召兵员。我们将要建立一个强力的制度，使得我们只奖励各地忠实于王室的仆人，并且由国王直接指定。

original: Let us divide our lands in three equal parts. One will go to the state itself, to care for our rulers and the treasury, one will belong to the nobility and other powerholders and the last third should be entirely dedicated to funding the needs of the Diwan. This way we ensure that all infrastructure projects are paid for fully without taxing other state incomes.
translation: 让我们将土地分成三等份。第一份将归于国家自身，用以照顾我们的统治者以及国库；一份将属于贵族及其他掌权者；最后的三分之一应当致力于资助底万的需求。这样我们就能确保支付所有基础设施项目的费用，而不用对国家的其他收入进行征税。

original: The ports of Deccan attract traders from all over the world and it is from this trade that a great deal of our wealth derives. We must do what we can to safeguard the relationship between us and the foreign merchants who regularly invest in our state and come to redistribute our goods.
translation: 德干的港口吸引着世界各地的商人，而这些贸易正是我们的财富来源。对于那些定期在我国投资、分销商品的外国商人，我们应当竭力去保护。

original: Some families have been of greater service than others. We must reward our most ardent supporters and allow them great freedoms within our state. This way we will have entrenched faction of supporters that are always willing to contribute to our cause with men, officers and administrators.
translation: 有些家族比其他家族的贡献更大。我们必须奖励我们最热心的支持者，并允许他们在我们的国家内享有极大的自由。通过这种方式，我们将拥有一批坚定的支持者，而他们也将总是愿意为我们的事业做出贡献，这些人为我们的事业提供人才、军官和官员。

original: While our troops have a proud heritage in military matters going back all the way to the 14th century we must also be open to evolve with our times. Let us invite any foreigners who have ideas we can make use of to modernize our armies. Drill, discipline and quick maneuvers is where the future lie and will be the only way to beat the enemies we will face in the future.
translation: 尽管我们的军队在军事上有着令人自豪，其传统可以追溯到14世纪，但是现在我们也必须开放、与时俱进。让我们邀请任何有点子的外国人来助我们的军队现代化。操练、纪律和迅速的行动是未来所在，也是我们在未来打败将要面对的敌人的唯一途径。

original: Deccan is a land of great riches and for centuries the mines under our control have been the greatest, or indeed only, source of major diamonds in the entire world. Let us aspire to show these riches to the world, so that they are always aware of the splendour of our court. Emeralds, pearls, diamonds, rubies, and all other kind of stones will soon become synonymous with the mention of our name.
translation: 德干是一块富饶的土地，并且几个世纪以来，我们掌控的矿藏一直是全世界最伟大的、或着说是唯一真正的钻石资源。让我们立志向世界展示这些财富，以便人们始终见证我们宫廷的辉煌。翡翠、珍珠、钻石、红宝石和所有其他类型的宝石很快就会成为我们名字的代名词。

original: Our land is rich in raw materials but it does not have the same concentration of centers for manufacturing as in the north. Let us use the funds of the state to encourage the growth of private enterprise so that we will soon have a thriving sector of refined goods ourselves, that we can then export at the great trading ports we already control.
translation: 我们的土地有着丰富的原材料，但没有像北方那样集中的制造业中心。让我们利用国家的资金来鼓励私营企业的发展，这样很快就能拥有一个属于我们自己的蓬勃发展的精制商品业，之后就可以在我们已经控制的大型贸易港口进行出口。

original: Much of Delhi's nobility is drawn from the ranks of the Pashtun Afghans, a people with a long history of conquest and rule in northern India. Though at times a political hindrance, their martial skills are beyond question.
translation: 大部分德里贵族都是阿富汗普什图人，一个拥有长期征服和统治北印度历史的民族。虽然他们有时会成为政治上的阻碍，但他们的军事技能是不容置疑的。

original: There are many potential sources of rebellion; the Afghan nobility, the Hindu populace, and disgruntled Rajputs may all become threats to our nation. The best policy when dealing with such threats is to violently suppress them before they erupt into disaster.
translation: 潜在的叛乱源头有很多：阿富汗贵族，印度教民众以及心不满的拉杰普特人都有可能成为我国的威胁。处理此类威胁的最佳政策是在灾难爆发前把他们武力镇压下去。

original: The Delhi Sultanate once encompassed nearly all of India. It must rise again!
translation: 德里苏丹国曾经囊括了几乎整个印度。它必将重新崛起！
促进纺织品生产的创新

original: The thriving textile industry in Delhi makes our nation a center of technological innovation for the industry. As early adopters of the cotton gin and worm gear roller, we know the importance of staying ahead of the curve in these matters. We must now ensure that the spinning wheel is adopted as widely as possible.
translation: 德里蓬勃发展的纺织工业使得我国成为该行业的技术创新中心。作为轧棉机和蜗轮滚筒的早期采用者，我们知道在这些事务上保持领先地位的重要性。我们现在必须保证尽可能广泛地采用纺车。

original: The once vast Delhi Sultanate has lost most of its former possessions, but we have not forgotten the means of administering them. As we work towards restoring our past glory, we will remind local rulers of their duties to the Sultan.
translation: 曾经庞大的德里苏丹国已经失去了以前的大部分财产，但我们并没有忘记管理它们的方法。在我们努力恢复过去的辉煌时 我们将提醒当地统治者他们对苏丹的义务。

original: The Grand Trunk Road runs from Kabul in Afghanistan to the coast of Bengal. Many of the most important trading cities along its route are part of our Empire, and so it falls to us to ensure that the Road is well maintained and free of banditry.
translation: 南亚大干道从阿富汗的喀布尔一直延伸到孟加拉海岸。沿途的许多重要贸易城市都是我们帝国的一部分，因此我们要确保道路得到良好维护并且不受土匪侵袭。

original: For centuries every great Indian empire has been ruled from Delhi. It is the seat of conquerors, and our birthright. All must know that Delhi is once again home to the rightful ruler of all India!
translation: 几个世纪以来，每个伟大的印度帝国从德里进行统治。他是征服者的驻地，也是我们的生来就享有的权利。所有人都需要知道，德里再次成为了印度合法统治者的领地！

original: With the increasing prevalence of artillery on the battlefield, we have cause to re-evaluate our war elephant tactics. We must outfit both our elephants and their mahouts with sufficient armor, expand their use in military logistics, and consider their applications in the field of siegecraft.
translation: 随着战地火炮的普及，我们有必要重新规划我军的战象战术。我们必须为战象与象夫配备更好的盔甲，拓展他们使用的军事补给并考量他们作为攻城部队的运用方法。

original: The many people, cultures, languages, and nations that make up the Indian subcontinent shall be united; our diversity shall give us strength.
translation: 由许多人民、文化、语言与民族组成的印度次大陆必须要统一；我们的多元文化即是力量的根源。

original: Sanskrit literature has been on the decline since the Islamic conquests of centuries prior. It is time to revive our most ancient textual traditions, introducing them to new generations of scholars and promoting a literate society across our nation.
translation: 自数世纪前的伊斯兰征服后，梵文文学便处于衰落状态。是时候复兴我们自古以来的文学传统了，我们要为其注入新一代学者的活力并在全国范围推广文学社团。

original: A single army marching under one banner, a disciplined military force wearing a single uniform; this is our vision for the Indian army.
translation: 一支高举一面旗帜，穿着同一军服的军队——这是我们对印度军队未来的期望。

original: Many Hindus worship the river Ganges as a goddess, bringing purity and redemption to the faithful. We implore pilgrims to visit the river banks to bathe in the sacred waters. Through Ganga, our nation is made pure.
translation: 许多印度人奉恒河为给虔诚者带来场景与救赎的女神。我们呼吁朝圣者前往河床地以沐浴圣水。借恒河之手，我们全国上下都将洁净无垢。

original: Iron-cased rockets have yet to be widely adapted for military purposes, yet their explosive power surely has tactical applications. We should experiment with this technology and test it on the battlefield.
translation: 铁皮火箭还未能大规模应用于军事目的，但其爆炸威力确实能有用武之地。我们应该将这项科技投入实验并在战场上测试其效果。

original: Brahmins have long been involved in state administration throughout India. It is time to institutionalize their role in the bureaucracy. This will at once cement their power in the state and in society, while also ensuring that the Brahmins understand that their role is administrative rather than political.
translation: 婆罗门很久以前便参与了印度的行政管理。是时候将他们在体制中的角色制度化了。这将立刻巩固他们在国家与社会中的地位，同时也能确保婆罗门阶级认清自己的职责应是行政而非政治。

original: Neglecting the importance of infantry soldiers has been the downfall of many would-be conquerors in India. We must ensure that our Sipahi infantry are equipped with the most effective firearms and drilled in the most modern tactics.
translation: 忽视步兵的重要性是许多曾有可能征服印度之人的败因。我们必须确保我军的西帕希步兵配有最有效的火器且熟练掌握现代战术。

original: No ruler, be they Muslim, Hindu, Buddhist, or Jain, has ever succeeded in conquering the entirety of India. We shall be the first universal rulers of India!
translation: 没有任何一位统治者，不论他是穆斯林、印度教徒、佛教徒或耆那教徒，曾经成功征服整个印度。我们将是印度的第一个也是永世的统治者！

original: A great ruler must have a great throne. Adorned with every kind of precious jewel under the sun and inscribed with the names of our exalted monarchs, the Peacock Throne is truly splendorous.
translation: 一位伟大的统治者必须要有相应的王座。在太阳下有着各种珍贵珠宝点缀并雕刻着我们崇高君主的孔雀王座确实是惊为天人。

original: Conditions in the Indian economy are ideal for rapid industrial expansion. As new technology becomes available for production, particularly in the textile industry, our pan-Indian state can ensure that it is adopted rapidly.
translation: 印度的经济状况很适合进行迅速的工业拓展。随着新的生产科技进步，尤其是纺织业的生产工艺，印度诸邦可以确保迅速地采用这项科技。

original: Mastery of gunpowder warfare is the key to mastery over India. Our cannons and muskets must strike such fear into our enemies' hearts that they will not willingly meet us directly on the battlefield. When the battle is joined, our tactics should focus on causing the greatest possible numbers of casualties and chaos in enemy ranks.
translation: 掌握热兵器战争就是掌握印度的关键。我们的火炮与滑膛枪必须给敌人造成足够的恐惧，让他们没有胆量与我军正面交锋。位于战场上时，我们的战术应当专注于怎样对敌方部队造成最大的伤亡以及混乱。

original: Persian language and courtly customs have become the most politically and scholarly in the Muslim world. Our own nation has enthusiastically adopted these customs, and in doing so we have attracted many skilled and educated Persian-speaking advisors whose services to our administration cannot be understated.
translation: 波斯语和其宫廷习俗成为了穆斯林世界中最善于政治与学术的风格。我国也很热情地接纳了这些风俗，而且此举也吸引了许多精明能干的会说波斯语的顾问，他们对我国行政的贡献无法低估。

original: Muslim princes across the world compete to attract the wisest Sufi teachers. As our renown has grown, more of these Sufis have joined us. Towns are founded where they settle, often in previously inhospitable regions, and the local people are inspired to convert to Islam by the wisdom of the Sufis.
translation: 世界上的诸多穆斯林王侯都尽力试图吸引最聪慧的苏菲派导师。随着我国威望增长，越来越多的苏菲学者加入了我们。他们居住的地方兴起了许多城镇，大多是以往被视为荒芜之地的地区，而当地人民受各位苏菲学者的智慧启发而皈依了伊斯兰。

original: We have revived the imperial Ambitions of the Rajputs and reclaimed Kannauj and Avanti, once again forming the empire that once ruled all of northern India. Now Rajput warriors from all over the region are flocking to our banners, ready to die for the common cause.
translation: 再次建立这个曾经统治整个北印度的帝国之后，我们已经复兴了拉杰普特人的帝国雄心，并且还收回了曲女城和阿槃提。现在来自四面八方的拉杰普特勇士都聚集在我们的旗帜之下，时刻准备着为我们共同的事业献出生命。

original: For centuries the Rajput realms have been divided into a myriad of petty kingdoms, fighting each-other more than our common enemies. With the many princes of Rajputana now united under one banner, ready to serve one common ruler, we will be an unstoppable force.
translation: 数个世纪以来拉其普特人的领地就被分为一个个小型王国，这些王国互相攻击，而不是一心抵御外敌。可是现在拉杰普塔纳的诸侯已经团结在同一面旗帜之下，效忠的也只有一个共同的君主，我们一定会成为一股势不可挡的力量。

original: Rajput gunners have a reputation throughout India and have at times been incorporated in many of the armies of sultanates and kingdoms alike. Now that we have united the Rajput kingdoms the experience they have with firearms will allow us to build a new type of army centered around the use of muskets, rockets and cannons.
translation: 拉杰普塔火枪手在印度赫赫有名，他们中有许多都加入过各个苏丹国和王国的军队。既然我们已经统一了拉杰普特王国，他们的作战经验将会帮助我们建立起一支以步枪、火箭和大炮为主的新式部队。

original: Few resisted outside invasions of India as much as the Rajput kingdoms of old. We are now the new bulwark of our faith, ready to defend the subcontinent from those that would impose their rule and their faith upon our people.
translation: 很少有人能像拉杰普特王国的先辈们那样英勇地抵抗外来侵略。我们现在是新一代的信仰守护者，会时刻准备着保卫印度次大陆，把那些将外来统治和信仰强加于我们的人民身上的侵略者御之门外。

original: Sieges are what wins wars. We must experiment with ways of creating bigger and better cannon to bring down the many forts of our enemies within India and outside it.
translation: 围城是胜利的关键。我们必须试验各种方法，造出更大更好的大炮，从而能顺利的攻下遍布印度内外的敌军堡垒。

original: A new empire requires a new style. We must build upon the classical monumental architecture of Rajputana and Imperial Kannauj to create a new style worthy of our growing empire.
translation: 一个新的帝国需要一种新的建筑风格。我们必须在拉杰普塔纳的古典纪念性建筑和帝国的曲女城基础上创造出一种新式的、符合我们强盛新帝国的建筑风格。
统一冈德人和迦贾德人

original: The fractured tribes of Gonds and Garjats that inhabit Central India must be united under our rule. Old feuds and squabbles must be put to an end so that we can achieve our common goals.
translation: 居住在印度中部的冈德人和迦贾德人的细碎部落必须在我们的统治下团结起来。旧的争斗和争吵必须得终结，以便我们能够实现我们的共同目标。

original: Much of our land is difficult for armies to traverse, much less to do battle on. Our own warriors have known this region for centuries and know how to exploit it to their advantage.
translation: 我们领土的大部分地区很难让军队穿越，更不用说打仗了。而我们的战士们几个世纪以来就已经知晓这些地区，并且知道如何利用它来增加优势。

original: Nagpur is a new city, a new Kingdom. We must send for artisans and architects from all corners of India to develop our palaces, our infrastructure, and our temples to put Nagpur on the map.
translation: 那格浦尔是一个崭新的城市，一个全新的王国。我们必须从印度各地请来工匠和建筑师来建设我们的宫殿、基础设施和寺庙，让那格浦尔在地图上占有一席之地。

original: Heavy cavalry and cumbersome cannon make up a large portion of many Indian armies. By employing regiments of light cavalry, we can easily outflank and outrun our enemies, causing great damage where they least expect it.
translation: 重骑兵和笨重的大炮在印度军队中占有了很大的比重，而通过雇佣轻骑兵兵团，我们可以轻易地超过并包抄我们的敌人，在他们最意想不到的地方造成巨大破坏。

original: The dense forests of Central India are not exactly renowned for their fertile farmlands. We must nevertheless ensure that we are able to grow enough food and extract enough wealth from our lands. It is time to begin clearing the forest to make room for our expansion.
translation: 印度中部茂密的森林并不以其肥沃的农田而著称。我们必须确保我们能够种植足够多的粮食，从我们的土地上获得足够的财富。是时候开始清理森林，并为我们的扩张腾出空间了。

original: Maratha warriors have erupted out of their homelands in Maharashtra. Many of their generals offer their services and their armies to rulers they deem worthy. We should court these generals to attract a new military caste into our nation.
translation: 马拉塔战士们已经在他们的家园马哈拉施特拉邦整装待发。许多将军们向他们认为值得效忠的统治者提供服务和军队。我们应该邀请这些将军们，以吸纳一个新的军人阶级进入我们的国家。

original: Our enemies are weak and we are strong. They control rich lands that we desire for ourselves. What more reason should we need to take all that they have?
translation: 敌弱我强，他们掌握着我们梦寐以求的富庶土地，我们还需要什么别的理由才能夺走他们的一切？
巴赫曼尼苏丹国的遗产

original: The Bahmanis have fallen from their former glory, but their legacy lives on. From them we have inherited many of the institutions of the state, our courtly culture, and our martial traditions. We must demonstrate that we are their true successors by honoring these traditions.
translation: 巴赫曼尼已从昔日的荣耀中坠落, 但他们的遗产却继续存在。从他们那里我们继承了许多国家机构, 我们的宫廷文化和我们的武术传统。我们必须通过尊重这些传统来证明我们是他们的真正接班人。
促进德干地区身份认同

original: A cultural revolution is underway in our nation. Distancing ourselves from the Persianate empires of the north, we are enthusiastically embracing and promoting the local cultures of the Deccan. We have even gone so far as to adopt Deccani languages for use in official state accounts.
translation: 我们国家正在进行一场文化大革命。与北方的波斯帝国疏远, 我们热忱地拥抱和推广德干的本土文化。我们甚至已经采用了德干语言作为国家的官方用语。

original: To ignore the services that the Brahmins could offer us would be foolish. They would be most useful to us employed in the state bureaucracy, so long as we do not afford them too much influence.
translation: 忽视婆罗门可以为我们带来的助力无疑是愚蠢的。只要其影响力不致过大，他们在我们的国家官僚系统中能够发挥最大的作用。

original: Habshis, Ethiopian slave-soldiers, can be purchased in great numbers from the Arab traders that frequent our markets. Far from mere cannon-fodder, the Habshis shall make up the elite of our infantry soldiers. Habshis that demonstrate their loyalty and martial prowess should be rewarded with power and responsibilities, for who better to guard the Sultan than one who owes him everything?
translation: 阿拉伯商人们频繁来到我们的市场大量购买希狄人，即埃塞俄比亚的奴隶战士们。希狄人远不仅仅是炮灰，而是组成了我们步兵部队的精英。显示出忠诚和武力的希狄人应该得到权力和职位的奖励，因为谁能比欠下苏丹他们自己的一切的人更好地保护苏丹？

original: Highly mobile Marathi light cavalry will be of great use should we find ourselves at war with the cannon-heavy armies of northern India. These horsemen are able to plunder the land and escape before our enemies can muster a force to repel them, or even disable enemy cannons in daring flanking attacks.
translation: 我们发现当自己与北印度的重炮部队作战时，高度机动的马拉塔轻骑兵将会非常有用。这些骑兵能够劫掠敌人的土地，然后在我们的敌人集结力量击退他们之前就逃之夭夭，甚至他们可以通过大胆的侧翼进攻来瘫痪敌人的火炮。
与马拉塔耕农加强联系

original: As we have welcomed Marathi warriors into our fold, so too should we welcome those who work the land. The Marathas have strong ties with peasant communities which we must exploit to ensure that the land is productive.
translation: 将马拉塔战士收入麾下后，我们同样需要欢迎那些在土地上劳作的人民。马拉塔人与农民社群关系紧密，我们必须将其纳为己用，以保证土地产出。

original: The old political divide between Westerners and Deccanis is over, as both factions have exhausted themselves through infighting. The resulting power vacuum has been filled by our Habshi slave-soldiers and by the increasingly influential Marathas. Their joint power shall ensure the continued strength and survival of our nation.
translation: 西方人和德干人之间的旧政治分歧已经结束，两派都由于自身的内讧而精疲力竭。由此产生的权力真空被我们的哈布希奴隶士兵和越来越有影响力的马拉塔人所填补。他们联合起来的力量将确保我们国家继续强大和生存。

original: The merchants of Kashmir have extensive connections that span throughout India, Tibet, and Persia. We must convince some of them to visit our court so that we will be better informed about foreign markets and how they might be exploited.
translation: 克什米尔的商人们拥有遍布在印度、西藏、波斯的广泛关系，我们必须说服其中一些人来造访我们的宫廷，以便可以更好地了解外国市场，以及如何加以利用这些商人。

original: It is not enough to honor the gods by building temples; we must also celebrate them publicly by hosting regular festivals in their name. The deities most deserving of our affection are Indra, the King of Heaven, and Kumari, the living goddess who incarnates in the form of a young girl. As well as serving the gods, these festivals will also be popular among the common people.
translation: 仅仅通过建造寺庙来祭祀神明是不够的；我们还必须以祂们的名义，用定期举办节日的形式来公开愉悦众神。最值得我们敬爱的是神是天王因陀罗和现世童女神库玛里。除了服务众神外，这些节日还将在凡人中广泛流行。

original: Our ruler shall adopt the title of Kavindra, 'King of Poets'. All the people of Nepal will be moved by his works.
translation: 我们的统治者将会采用卡文德拉即“诗人之王”的头衔。所有尼泊尔人都将会被他的诗篇所感动。

original: Each successive ruler of our nation continues the legacy of his predecessor by continuing the tradition of temple construction. Whether expanding existing temples, funding the development of new ones, or introducing new architectural styles, our rulers must continue to honor the gods.
translation: 我们国家的每一位继任的统治者都通过延续建造寺庙的传统，以此继承前任的遗产。无论是扩建现存的寺庙、资助新寺庙的建设，还是引入新的建筑风格，我们的统治者都必须一直尊崇神明。

original: Nepal's mountainous terrain forces armies to march through certain passes if they wish to reach their destination safely and quickly. We must identify every likely route into our nation, seize the territory, and fortify the passes so that our enemies will not be able to enter without taking heavy casualties.
translation: 如果一支军队想安全快速地抵达目的地，那么尼泊尔的山岭地势将使其不得不行军通过某些关隘。我们必须确定每条可能进入我国的路线，把控这些地区并且强化关口，让敌人无法在不承受惨重损失的情况下就通过。

original: The laws of our nation have until now been disorganized, unevenly enforced, and arbitrary. It is time to implement a code of laws that is simple, just, and easily applied.
translation: 我们国家的司法到目前为止仍然处于混乱中，执行不均且判决武断。是时候推行一套简单、公正、易于执行的法律法规了。

original: The domains of Nepalese princes have been growing ever smaller as their lands are divided between his sons upon the death of the king. We must institute a clear and single line of succession to keep our realm unified.
translation: 尼泊尔王公们的领地越来越小，因为他们的土地会在统治者死后被其儿子们分走。我们必须设立一个关于继承人的明确单独继承法，以此保持我们的领土统一。

original: Mewar is both the geographical and political heart of Rajput culture. Rajputs throughout India look to us for guidance and grounding in our time-honored traditions.
translation: 梅瓦尔是拉杰普特文化在地理和政治上的中心。全印度的拉杰普特人盼望着我们的指导，彰显我们历史悠久的传统。

original: In our capital we shall construct an imposing tower that will dominate the landscape. Adorned with icons of the gods and inscriptions telling our noble deeds, the Tower of Victory will be a symbol of our endless quest for glory.
translation: 在我国首都当建造一座雄伟高塔，占据天际线中最显眼的位置。装饰着众神像与我们高贵行动的铭文，胜利之塔将成为我们追逐无尽光辉的标志。

original: Chittorgarh remains our largest and most vital fort, but we must not neglect the defenses of the rest of the realm. We must hire the most skilled architects to design impregnable forts throughout our kingdom, beginning with the strategic site of Kumbhalgarh.
