The immensely long walls that will be needed to protect the area make this an ambitious project, but our determination to defend our people shall ensure that it is done.
translation: 奇陶尔加尔依旧是我们最大最重要的堡垒，但是我们不能忽略国土其他部分的防御。从贡珀尔格尔开始，我们必须雇佣最熟练的工匠在全国设计坚不可摧的城堡。这项工程需求的城墙之长让它看上去过于有野心，但我们包围人民的坚定决心会保证它的完工。

original: Guided by the blessings of a wise hermit, our rulers have decided that it is time to build a magnificent new capital for our nation. Using dams to control the flow of the rivers, we shall create several artificial lakes from which we can draw fresh water for Udaipur, appropriately named the City of Lakes.
translation: 在一位睿智的隐士指引护佑下，我们的统治者决定是时候为国家建立壮丽的新都了。通过使用堤坝来控制河水的流向，我们可以制造出数个人工湖，从中可为乌代浦提供淡水，因此它很恰当的被称为诸湖之城。

original: The Rajputs have spread themselves throughout northern India in their pursuit of glory for their clan. It is time that we reminding them of their duty to their ancestral homeland; we shall send out word that all loyal Rajputs should come to serve at Mewar.
translation: 拉杰普特人散布到整个北印度去追寻他们家族的荣耀。现在是时候让他们记起先祖家园土地的责任了；让我们发出布告，所有忠诚的拉杰普特人必须来为梅瓦尔服务。

original: Many Rajput soldiers have become experts in the use of personal firearms. We must put these hardened veterans to work training the next generation of soldiers rather than risking the loss of their expertise in battle. All of our soldiers must be drilled in firearms tactics before they are expected meet our enemies on the front line.
translation: 许多拉杰普特士兵已经成为使用私人火枪的高手。与其冒着让他们损失在战场上的风险，我们必须让这些顽固的老兵训练成为新一代的军队。所有的士兵在前线面对敌军之前必须参加火器战术的训练。

original: Traditional clan structures are an excellent foundation for a modernized regimental system. Existing hierarchies based on kinship and unconditional loyalty can be easily translated into an organized and formal chain of command.
translation: 传统的家族结构可以作为现代化军团体系的良好基础。已有基于血缘的等级关系和无条件的忠诚可以轻易地转化为有组织且正式的指挥链条。

original: Pirates have infested the waters of the Bay of Bengal for too long. We must protect traders en route to our ports by discovering and eliminating pirate havens along the Arakan coast.
translation: 海盗们已经在孟加拉湾水域肆虐的太久了。我们必须通过发现和清除阿拉干海岸的海盗避风港，来保护前往我们港口的贸易商。

original: Abyssinian slave-soldiers purchased in Arab markets play a significant role as elite infantry soldiers. Those that excel as leaders shall be given greater levels of command, while those who demonstrate exceptional loyalty shall make up the palace guard.
translation: 在阿拉伯市场购买的阿比西尼亚奴隶士兵，他们是精锐步兵中的重要角色。那些出色的将领应该被赋予更高的指挥权，而那些展现出优秀忠诚的人应该组成宫廷守卫。

original: To our west are the fertile and populated lands of the Indo-Gangetic Plain. The Sultans of Bengal have long coveted its great cities and vast wealth, but only now as a new and ambitious crop of generals rise to power is our ambition likely to become a reality. We must do all we can to ready our forces for the coming conquest.
translation: 我们的西部的土地是肥沃和人口稠密的印度-恒河平原。孟加拉的苏丹们长期以来一直垂涎其伟大的城市和巨大的财富，但只有现在，一些新的、雄心勃勃的将星们冉冉升起，我们的野心很可能成为现实。我们必须竭尽全力为即将到来的征服做好准备。

original: The lack of a widely adopted standardized currency is stunting the development of Indian commerce. As one of the foremost economic powers in the subcontinent, we are well placed to begin the minting of a new silver coinage with standard weights, which we shall call the rupee.
translation: 缺乏被广泛接纳的标准货币正在阻碍印度商业的发展。作为次大陆最重要的经济大国之一，我们有条件开始用标准砝码铸造新的银币，我们称之为卢比。

original: The Bengal Delta contains an immense expanse of potentially very profitable land that goes unexploited due to thick forestation. We must subsidize efforts to clear the forests to make way for new farmlands, cities, and trading posts.
translation: 孟加拉三角洲拥有巨大广阔的潜在价值非常高的土地，它们因为茂密的森林而未被开发。我们必须补贴清除森林的工作，为新的农田、城市和贸易站铺路。

original: Bengal is uniquely situated in India to begin a revolution unlike any seen before. We stand poised to exploit new developments in our already world-class textile and shipbuilding industries. Let us begin an industrial revolution!
translation: 孟加拉位于印度的独特地区，独特的孟加拉将开启一场前所未见的革命。我们准备两手抓，开发我们早已是世界级的纺织业和造船业。让我们开始一场工业革命！

original: Sufis have long been innovators of Islamic thought as well as wise councilors. If we wish to be a leading voice in the future of the Islamic world, we must patronize Sufi lodges and convince the wisest among their order to settle in our domain.
translation: 苏菲派穆斯林长期以来一直是伊斯兰思想的创新者，也是明智的顾问。如果我们希望在未来执伊斯兰世界之牛耳，我们必须保护苏菲派的住所，并说服他们中最聪明的人在我们的王国里定居。

original: The proximity of the west Indian coast to Arabia opens up opportunities for trade. Merchants being as fickle as they are, we need not conquer existing trading hubs to attract their attention. If we establish our own trading posts and enact policies favorable to foreign merchants, they can be persuaded to do business with us instead of our rivals.
translation: 印度西海岸邻近阿拉伯半岛，这为贸易提供了良机。商人们虽然善变，但我们不需要征服现存的贸易中心来吸引他们的注意力。如果我们建立自己的贸易站点，制定有利于外国商人的政策，这就足以说服他们与我们做生意，而不是与我们的竞争对手往来。

original: The horses bred on the Kathiawar peninsula are particularly suited to desert warfare. They are able to endure scorching heat, require minimal feeding, and are able to endure journeys over great distances. We must ensure that there are always enough of these steeds for our cavalrymen to ride into battle.
translation: 生长于卡提阿瓦半岛上的马特别适合沙漠作战。它们能够忍受灼热，需要最少的饲料，并能够进行长途跋涉。我们必须确保我们的骑兵总是有足够的战马参加战斗。

original: The Jains continue to be persecuted throughout much of India, but they shall find a safe haven in the Gujarati kingdoms. Fair treatment of the Jain community has won us the respect of wealthy Jain banking families, who are prepared to offer favorable interest rates to our nation.
translation: 耆那教徒一直在印度的大部分地区遭受迫害，但他们将在古吉拉特王国找到一个安全的避风港。因为公平对待耆那教社区，我们赢得了富裕的耆那教银行家族的尊重，他们准备为我们的国家提供优惠的利率。

original: Rajput clans have entrenched themselves in Gujarati politics. Their ancient customs and feuds are often a source of tension, but they also lend us credence as a nation relevant to the wider political world.
translation: 拉杰普特部族已经在古吉拉特政治中确保了一席之地。他们古老的习俗与世仇往往是紧张局面的根源，但也使我们成为别人眼中的一个与更广阔政治世界息息相关的国家。

original: One of the most important pilgrimage sites in the Hindu faith, the Dwarkadhish Temple is dedicated to the god Krishna. Regardless of its present custodian, all the Gujarati kingdoms have a responsibility to ensure that it is not sacked or looted by foreign invaders. Fulfilling this duty ensures the continued faith and loyalty of our Hindu subjects.
translation: 德瓦卡迪什神庙是印度教信仰中最重要的圣地之一，侍奉着神明奎师那。无论现在的守护人如何，所有的古吉拉特王国都有责任确保它不被外国入侵者劫掠。履行这一职责确保了我们作为印度教徒的长久信仰和忠诚。

original: Worship of the goddess Ashapura Mata is almost exclusive to Gujarat. She is regarded as the guardian deity of the region, and so respect must be paid to her if we wish our rule to be seen as legitimate by the Gujarati people.
translation: 对阿夏普拉女神崇拜几乎是古吉拉特地区独有的。她被视为该地区的守护神，如果我们希望古吉拉特人认为我们的统治是合法的，那么就必须尊重女神。

original: Gujarati traders have established trading routes that extend to the far corners of Asia. Some have even found their way to East Africa, where they trade in ivory, gold, and slaves. We must ensure that the riches of Africa find their way into our coffers.
translation: 古吉拉特商人已经建立了延伸到亚洲各个角落的贸易路线。有些人甚至将自己的商路拓展到了东非，在那里他们交易象牙，黄金和奴隶。我们必须确保非洲的财富进入我们的国库。

original: For centuries the Garjat country has been divided into a number of Mandalas, and while their origin is now a distant mystery they remain the central points to which many of the smaller tribes and states in this region are loyal. Regardless who has conquered or expanded into Orissa or the Garjat country these structures makes rule both more efficient and less full of friction than it would otherwise be.
translation: 在过去的几个世纪中，迦贾德被划分为了数量庞大的曼荼罗，虽然现在这些坛场社区的起源是一个遥远的谜，但他们仍然是这个地区许多忠诚的小部落和小邦的中心。无论谁征服或扩张到奥里萨或迦贾德，这些体制都使统治比其他情况下更有效率，也将有更少的摩擦。

original: The political landscape of the Garjats can seem hard to understand to some. We are able to call in troops from a much wider area than our geographic extent would at first indicate, as there are feudatories loyal to us all over this country.
translation: 对一些人来说，迦贾德人的政治面貌似乎很难理解。我们能够从一个比我国最初地理范围所显示的要大得多的地区征召军队，因为这个国家到处都有忠于我们的封臣。

original: Not all lands under our control could be called fertile and suited for agriculture. Especially not if one compared them to the lowlands of the Mahanadi Delta or the Indo-Gangetic plain. For this reason kings and princes have for centuries spent whatever money they had on the construction of great tanks and reservoirs.\nWe must continue this tradition and invest what we can into such things, ensuring that we can have a productive agricultural sector even in lands such as these.
translation: 我们控制下的土地并非都能被认为肥沃且适合耕种，尤其是如果把它们与马哈纳迪三角洲或印度恒河平原相对比的话。由于这个原因，几个世纪以来，国王和王子们把他们所有的钱都花在建造巨大的水槽与水库上。\n我们必须遵循这一传统，尽我们所能投资于这类事业，确保即使在这样的土地上我国也能有一个多产的农业结构。

original: The Garjat country is dissimilar from many parts of the subcontinent in that it is wilder, and less settled. Jungles and hills cover the entire region and traditional cavalry is much less useful here. Instead we have come to devise our own mode of warfare, reliant on small scale raiding, elephants, and good knowledge of a land that is hard to scout. As we expand we must adapt these skills to new areas, never forgetting that through such tactics even a small army can defeat a much larger foe.
translation: 迦贾德与次大陆的许多其他国家所不同的是，她更具有野性和更少的定居者。丛林和山丘覆盖了整个地区，传统的骑兵在这里就不那么有用了。作为替代，通过依靠小规模的突袭、大象以及对难以侦察的土地的熟知，我们已经开始谋划自己的作战模式。当扩张的时候，我们必须把这些技能应用到新的领域，永远不要忘记通过这种战术，即使是一小支军队也能击败一个大得多的敌人

original: Our lands are in general more open to various religions and cults than many others but the cult of Jagannath, the ‘Lord of the Universe’, transcends faith and time. This deity has protected us and our ancestors for many generations and while some might find our worship a bit unorthodox it unifies the entire region as one.
translation: 总的来说在我们土地上，对各种宗教和崇拜的开放程度比其他许多宗教都要高，但对 “宇宙之主”，札格纳斯的崇拜超越了信仰与时间。这个神已经保护了我们和我们的祖先无数世代，虽然有些人可能会觉得我们的信仰有些异端，但它将整个地区统一为了一个整体。

original: Some would claim that the Garjat country is not rich but there are in fact a great number of natural resources under our control. There are few places as abundant in good timber as the hills of our people and for many years it has been the primary export of this region. We must encourage the growth and effectivization of the timber industry and further capitalize on one of our greatest assets.
translation: 有些人会说，迦贾德并不富裕，但实际上我们控制着大量的自然资源。没有什么地方比我们的山区木材更丰富，多年来它一直是该地区的主要出口物。我们必须鼓励木材工业的增长和有效利用，并进一步利用我们最伟大的资产之一。

original: Sindh's Samma dynasty has stood the test of time. Tracing their descent to legendary Rajput warriors, they have endured the rule of the Delhi Sultans for over a century. Now that Delhi has collapsed, the ambitions of the Samma dynasty can finally be realized.
translation: 信德的萨玛王朝历久弥坚。其血脉可以追溯到传奇的拉杰普特武士，他们已经忍受了德里苏丹一个世纪的统治。现在德里已然崩溃，萨玛王朝的雄心壮志终于可以变为现实了。

original: As one of the first in India to accept the word of the Prophet, the rulers of Sindh carry the duty of spreading the wisdom of the Quran to the people. Along the Indus river we have already been successful in this task, but now we must look beyond our borders for new kafirs to convert.
translation: 作为印度最先接受先知教诲的人之一，信德的统治者担负着将古兰经的智慧传播给人民的责任。纵览印度河岸，我们已经成功地完成了这项考验，但现在我们必须把目光放远，跨越国界寻找新的皈依者。

original: Our nations fortunes are tied both politically and economically to those of Gujarat. We must develop strong ties with Gujarat's most influential merchants to ensure that we are extracting maximum profit from trade in both the Arabian sea and along the Indus river.
translation: 我们的国家财富在政治与经济上都与古吉拉特人之间存在着纽带，我们必须与古吉拉特最有影响力的商人建立牢固的联系，以确保我们从阿拉伯海和印度河沿岸的贸易中获取最大的利润。

original: The Makli Necropolis is the site of the Tomb of Shaikh Jamali, a renowned Sufi saint. Since his death, the rulers of Thatta have begun a tradition of constructing new tombs for themselves on the Makli Hill in the hope that proximity to the venerated saint will improve their standing with Allah. We must continue to add new monuments to the Necropolis.
translation: 马克里陵墓是谢赫贾迈利之墓的遗址, 一位大名鼎鼎的苏菲派圣人。他死后，塔达Thatta的统治者都开始把在马克里山上为自己建造新墓地作为传统，希望通过毗邻倍受尊敬的圣人可以改善与真主的关系。我们必须继续为陵园树立新的纪念碑。

original: It has come to our attention that judicial authorities are taking payments from plaintiffs and defendants alike to secure favorable verdicts. They claim that they are forced to do this to augment their meager incomes. Upon review, it seems that we are indeed underpaying these authorities. A general rise in pay for public workers should reduce instances of corruption in our government.
translation: 我们注意到，司法当局正在从原告和被告那里收取钱财以给出对某方有利的判决。他们声称是被迫这样做的，以此弥补他们微薄的收入。经过核查，我们似乎确实给低了这些职员的工资。普遍的高薪养廉应该能减少我们政府的腐败现象。

original: The city of Thatta has the potential to be a great center of culture and trade. We must invent in its infrastructure, its economy, and its religious institutions.
translation: 塔达城有成为一个伟大的文化中心和贸易中心的潜力。我们必须投资其基础设施、经济和宗教机构。

original: The tribes of Baluchistan have been both enemies and allies of Sindh for generations, their allegiances shifting with the sands. We should approach some of the tribes with an offer; we will pay them well to fight for us, so long as the tribes remain on friendly terms with our nation.
translation: 俾路支人部落世代既是信德的敌人也是盟友，他们的忠诚往往转变得和沙子一样快。我们应该向一些部落提出协议，只要他们的部落能为我们而战，且与我国保持友好关系，我们就会给他们付钱。

original: For thousands of years this region has been one of the oldest trade centers in the world. Spices have been exported to ancient Egypt, and Persia, the Empires of China, Imperial Rome and many other places. As a result this region is also home to a wide variety of peoples, faiths and cultures. Christians, Jews, Zoroastrians, Buddhists, and many others have co-existed here for hundreds, if not thousands of years.
translation: 数千年以来，这一地区都是世界上最古老的贸易中心之一。此地的香料曾出口到古埃及、波斯、中华帝国、罗马帝国等地。因此，这一地区也被大批不同民族、不同信仰、不同文化的人们视为家园。基督徒、犹太人、祆教徒、佛教徒等都在此地共存，已有成百上千年。

original: We must ensure that the bright minds of our people are given the proper means and patronage to flourish. Over the last years a whole new generation of Mathematicians and Astronomers have begun to explore and describe the world. Their treatises will benefit future generations long after they are gone.
translation: 我们必须确保给与人民的聪明才智适当的财富和赞助来推动繁荣发展，在过去的几年里，新一代的数学家和天文学家已经开始探索和描述世界。他们的专著将在他们逝世后有益于子孙后代们。

original: Foreign merchants have been a constant part of our society but with the advent of an overseas route between India and Europe there are now a number of western trade companies are now looking to set up factories in our lands.\nLet us embrace these newcomers and encourage the direct trade between our ports and the great European market!
translation: 外国商人一直是我们社会的一部分，但是随着印度和欧洲之间的跨海航路的出现，现在有许多西方贸易公司正指望我们的土地上建立工厂。\n让我们拥抱这些新来者，鼓励我们的港口和欧洲大市场之间的直接贸易！

original: The Muslim community in our lands goes back many centuries and the arrival of traders and sailors from Arabia and Iran to our shores and while they are now an integral part of our society many remain very well versed sailors and fighters.\nWe must make good use of this community and employ them in our navy and our merchant marine alike. We may not have the numbers to match some of the great naval powers but through skillful maneuvering and good use of the coastal geography we can still inflict heavy losses on any adversary.
translation: 我们土地上的穆斯林群体可以追溯到许多世纪之前商人和水手从阿拉伯和伊朗来到我们的海岸，他们现在是我们社会不可分割的一部分，并且许多人仍然是非常有经验的水手和战士。\n我们得充分运用这群体，并在我们的海军以及商船队里雇佣他们。我们没法拥有足以和海军列强们匹敌的舰船数量，但是通过娴熟的机动和对海岸地理环境的充分运用，我们仍然可以给任何对手造成重大损失。

original: Our nation is one historically very dependent on overseas trade and so that is where our control is the greatest. The inland however is governed by a number of more or less loyal chiefs, often given great freedom in exchange for their service in times of need. We must tighten up this arrangement, formalize their obligations and assert direct control over the more important areas.
translation: 我们的国家在历史上非常依赖于海外贸易，因此我们对海外贸易的控制是最强力的。然而，我们的内陆由许多大多忠诚的酋长统治，在需要他们时，我们常常给予他们巨大的自由来换取他们的服务。我们必须加强这一约定，规范他们的义务，坚持对更重要的地区进行直接控制。

original: Kerala elephants have long been thought especially noble and here, more than in any other part of India, they have a special place in society, kingship and religion. We must care for these giant benefactors as we care for our human subjects. Let it not be said that we mistreat those that we depend on.
translation: 长期以来，喀拉拉大象一直被认为特别高贵，在这里，它们比在印度其他任何地方都拥有特殊的社会、王权和宗教地位。我们必须照顾这些巨大的恩主，就像我们关心人类的属臣一样。决不能让别人说我们虐待自己赖以生存的他们。

original: Amer Fort has fallen into disrepair. As both the seat of our government and the most important fortification in our nation, it must be renovated as a matter of urgency. As we do so, the Palace would benefit from a touch of grandeur as well.
translation: 琥珀堡已经长久失修。它既是我们政府的所在地，又是我国最重要的防御工事，必须紧急进行整修。如果我们进行整修，宫殿也会变得更加壮观。

original: Seek the Protection of Great Powers

Dhundar faces threats from many directions. Alone we are vulnerable, but through skillful diplomacy we can make powerful friends. We should seek to marry into the dynasties of great powers and secure a place as part of the new world they are building.
translation: 敦达尔面临来自多个方向的威胁。我们独自一国是脆弱的，但通过巧妙的外交，我们可以结交强有力的朋友。我们应该寻求通过联姻成为列强王朝中的一员，并确保在他们正在建造的新世界里有一部分立足之地。

original: Several Hindu ceremonies have been neglected throughout India for centuries. Why have we forgotten Ashvamedha, the horse sacrifice? Do we think ourselves so pure that we need not perform the Vajapeya fire rituals? These traditions must be renewed at once.
translation: 好几个印度教典礼在印度被忽视了几个世纪。为什么我们忘掉了马祭仪式Ashvamedha？我们是否认为自己如此纯洁以至于不需要履行火祭仪式Vajapeya？这些传统必须立即重新开始实行。

original: Rajasthan lacks any truly great city. Given the difficult conditions in the region, it is not hard to see why previous rulers have been unable to create a truly impressive capital. Our ambition however is greater, our architects more skilled, and our knowledge of commerce more complete. We shall found Jaipur within Dhundar province, and it shall be the jewel of all Rajasthan.
translation: 拉贾斯坦没有真正的大城市。鉴于该地区的困难条件，不难看出为什么以前的统治者无法建立一座真正令人印象深刻的首都。然而我们的雄心更大，我们的建筑师更熟练，我们的商业知识更加完善。我们将在敦达尔省建立斋浦尔，它将成为全拉贾斯坦的宝石。

original: Our service to mighty emperors takes our generals to the far corners of India. They return having fought in glorious and bloody battles, bringing with them wisdom and expertise.
translation: 我们为伟大的帝王服务，将我们的将领带到印度的遥远角落。他们带着智慧和专业知识从光荣和血腥的战斗中归来。

original: Our astronomers take an outrageous amount of time to determine matters as simple as when would be the most auspicious time for a man to begin a great journey. Clearly our nation is in dire need of education in matters astronomical. We must fund the construction of many new observatories and patronize the teaching of astronomy to as many of our people as possible.
translation: 我们的天文学家花费了惊人的时间来敲定事项，比如说一个人开始一次伟大旅程最吉利的时间。显然，我们国家正急需天文学教育。我们必须捐资建造许多新的天文台，并资助尽可能多的人来学习天文学。

original: Pindari horseman make curious mercenaries, as they prefer to be paid not in coin but in the right to plunder. Hiring these men will not make us popular with those whose lands we plunder, but their effectiveness cannot be denied. They have a particular skill for foraging the land, improving our ability to supply our armies.
translation: 平达里骑兵组建了奇特的佣兵，因为他们比起被支付硬币，更乐于获得劫掠的权利。雇佣他们不会使我们受那些被掠夺土地的人的欢迎，但是他们的效率性是不容否认的。他们尤其擅长搜刮食物，能够提高我们供应部队的能力。

original: The Mysore plateau, once known as Gangavadi after an ancient dynasty, have been home to strong kingdoms for as long as anyone can remember. Today it is home to both Uddiyars and Ummaturs as well as many other groups. We must unite all of these groups and aim to expand together into the Deccani upland.
translation: 迈索尔高原曾经在某个远古王朝之后以冈格阿瓦蒂知名于世，从人们能记起的时候，就已经是强大王国的故土。今天，它是乌狄亚人和乌马特人以及许多其他部族的家园。我们必须联合所有势力，共同努力扩张到德干高地。

original: As the major Kannada court we have come to attract many great poets and authors of the beautiful Kannada language. We must patronize and spread Kannada literature and plays, acting as the primary benefactor for the culture of the people of Karnataka.
translation: 作为卡纳达人的主要政权，我们吸引了许多使用卡纳达语的伟大诗人和作者。我们必须资助和传播卡纳塔语文学和戏剧，成为卡纳塔克民族文化的主要资助者。

original: We must not let ourselves be caught up in religious strife. Anyone who can serve the state of Mysore must have a place in our country. If we can win the loyalty of all our subjects, and not just those of the true faith, then we will have a solid base to stand on as an expansionist power. Let us donate lavishly to holy places of all religions within our borders and encourage giving out offices regardless of which faith the holder would have.
translation: 我们不能让自己陷入宗教纷争中。任何可以为迈索尔服务的人都必须在我们国家拥有一席之地。如果我们能够赢得所有仆从的忠诚，包括那些不信仰正道的子民，那么我们就有了成为扩张力量的坚实基础。让我们慷慨解囊，给境内所有宗教圣地捐款，也要不分信仰地给予人们官职。

original: While the Mysorean economy is strong in many ways we envy the silk industries of Bengal and Gujarat. The best way to improve and support our domestic production might be to send forth agents to study how others have fared and then implement reforms to mimic these things in our own way. Together with the excellent craftsmanship of our own artisans this should allow our economy to flourish.
translation: 虽然迈索尔的经济在许多方面都很强大，但我们羡慕孟加拉和古吉拉特的丝绸业。改进和支持我们国内产品的最佳方式可以是派遣间谍，去研究其他国家是如何经营的，然后实施改革以我们自己的方式模仿。再加上我国工匠精湛的工艺，我们的经济将蓬勃发展。

original: The use of Rockets is nothing new in India but recent advances in metallurgy and chemistry has allowed us to pioneer the use of rockets in close combat. By equipping our troops with this new weapon, and by making sure we regularly practice their use, we will have an edge on any battlefield, siege or ambush.
translation: 火箭的使用在印度并不是什么新鲜事，但最近冶金和化学的进步使我们能够在近距离作战中率先使用火箭。我们要为部队装备这种新武器，并确保经常练习使用，这样我们将在任何战场、围城或伏击中占据优势。

original: None can question the courage or weaponry of the Mysorean soldier, and yet there are areas we might improve for our armed forces. Let us send forth officers to study in foreign countries so that they might observe what innovations others are employing on the battlefield. Drill, discipline and coordination are all areas in which we might adopt the ways of foreign powers, while adapting them to the realities of an Indian battlefield.
translation: 没有人可以质疑迈索尔士兵的勇气或兵器，但是在某些领域我们仍然可以提升军队实力。让我们派出军官到国外学习，这样他们就可以观察到其他国家在战场上的创新。操练、训练和协调都是我们可以采用外国方式的领域，并在同时使之适应印度的战场。

original: No country can exist in isolation, and a kingdom such as ours can attract many greedy rivals. It is time we look for allies overseas, as it seems few of our neighbors would like to contribute further to our rise to power.
translation: 任何国家都不能在孤立中存活，一个像我们这样的王国会吸引许多贪婪的宿敌。现在是我们寻找海外盟友的时候了，因为我们的邻国似乎很少愿意为我们的崛起做出更多贡献。

original: Bishop Albert founded Riga in 1201, establishing many of its institutions. Establishing the city not only as a center of commerce and trade, Bishop Albert also ensured that Riga would be a city of faith.
translation: 阿尔伯特主教于1201年创立了里加，建立了这座城市许多关键机构。他不仅将里加建设成了商业与贸易中心，同时确保里加是一座信仰之城。

original: Treaties have long held that all trade in Livonia must pass through Riga. As borders change and old agreements are forgotten, we must ensure that our trade monopolies are protected.
translation: 各类条约长期以来保证了利沃尼亚的所有贸易都必须通过里加。但随着边界的变化和旧协议逐渐被遗忘，我们必须确保我们的贸易垄断得到保护。

original: Riga is recognized as a Hanseatic port, and many wealthy and influential merchants call it home. We should take advantage of the League's mercantile expertise as we craft our economic policies.
translation: 里加是汉萨同盟的港口，许多富有且有影响力的商人将其称之为家。在制定经济政策时，我们应当利用汉萨同盟的商业专长。

original: We must always be on the watch for witches that hide among us. Their malicious influence can be found almost everywhere in these troubled times; that seemingly-frail old woman, this sinister black cat, even the statue of the Virgin must not elude our watchful eyes. But wait, did that statue just look at me? Let's see if it floats!
translation: 我们必须始终关注隐匿在我们中间的女巫。在这个动荡的时代，他们的恶毒影响几乎蔓延到了所有地方：那个看似虚弱的老太太，这只阴险的黑猫，连圣母的雕像都不应被排除在视线内。但是等一下，那个雕像刚在看着我吗？让我们看看它是不是有毛病！

original: We cannot look only to the Hansa and the knightly orders to protect us. Emissaries should be sent to the German princes and even to the Emperor himself to guarantee Riga's freedoms.
translation: 我们不能仅仅依靠汉萨同盟和骑士团来保护我们。我们应该派遣使者到德意志的诸侯甚至是皇帝本人那里以保证里加的自由。

original: Riga is no stranger to having to endure a siege. But with the likelihood of more conflict to come, we should take measures to fortify the city against whatever enemies may be marching toward us.
translation: 里加并不是头一次遭遇围攻了。但是，考虑到未来即将发生更多冲突的可能性，我们应该采取措施加固防御，以抵挡任何可能向我们进军的敌人。

original: Restore the Brothers of the Sword
The Livonian Brothers of the Sword have fallen far since their inception. It is our duty to revive this Knightly Order and reform it into an army worthy of God's favor.
translation: 利沃尼亚宝剑骑士团成立以来已经在走下坡路。 我们有责任恢复这个骑士团并将其改造成一支值得上帝眷顾的军队。

original: Our forefathers rode with Genghis Khan as he ravaged the known world. We have kept our military traditions alive and continued to be ruled by Khans who claim descent from the Genghisid line.
translation: 我们的祖先随成吉思汗戎马倥偬，征服已知的世界。 我们保持了自身的武勋，并继续由黄金家族血统的可汗统治。

original: There is a fortune to be made from the slave trade; unwitting Christians who fall into our grasp fetch a high price in Turkish, Arabian, and Persian markets.
translation: 奴隶贸易是一种生财之道：通过我们俘虏的那些无知的基督徒，使得我们在土耳其，阿拉伯和波斯市场上获得了丰厚的回报。

original: We must continue to lead raids into the heart of Ruthenia. Though the region is more destitute than it was in the time of Genghis Khan, we are skilled at extracting plunder and tribute from the terrified villagers.
translation: 我们必须继续侵袭鲁塞尼亚中心地带。 虽然这个地区比成吉思汗的时期更加贫困，但我们擅长用劫掠向恐惧的村民索取贡品。

original: Our raiders strike rapidly and without warning. Utterly unable to anticipate our attacks, our enemies will surely cower before us.
translation: 我们的入侵出其不意。 敌人绝对无法预料到来袭，肯定会在我们面前畏缩。

original: We place no restrictions on pastoral farmers for the grazing of their great herds of horses and cattle. Herders are free to go about their business as they wish, able to traverse the steppe safely and trade freely.
translation: 我们对牧农放牧他们的牛群、马群没有任何限制。 牧民可以按照自己的意愿自由开展业务，能够安全地穿越草原并自由交易。

original: It is time that we established more permanent settlements. We should identify suitable locations to establish these settlements, making sure to take into account the flow of trade and the most defensible terrain.
translation: 现在是我们建立更多永久定居点的时候了。 我们应该确定合适选址来建立这些定居点，确保考虑到贸易流量和易守难攻。

original: Several of the Nogai tribes to the west seek our protection. We should take them under our wing, guaranteeing the safety of their people in exchange for their military service.
translation: 西部的几个诺盖部落寻求我们的保护。 应将其置于庇护之下，保证人民的安全，以换取他们的兵役。

original: Chernigov was once the largest principality in Kievan Rus, and second in political importance only to Kiev itself. We are no strangers to the administration of lands that stretch far beyond our capital.
translation: 切尔尼戈夫曾经是基辅罗斯最大的公国，政治重要性上仅次于基辅本身。我们在管理远超本国首都大小的土地上并不生疏。

original: We must adapt to the new reality of the steppes; the growing influence of the Cossacks. We must make agreements with them that guarantee their autonomy while ensuring their military service to the state.
translation: 我们必须适应大草原的现状：哥萨克人的影响力日益增长。我们必须与他们达成协议，保证他们自主权的同时确保他们为国家服役。

original: To house both our native soldiers and the Cossack regiments we employ, we must expand our regimental barracks and implement a formal system of recruitment.
translation: 为了容纳我们本国的士兵以及征召的哥萨克兵团，我们必须扩建我们的部队军营，并建立一个正式的招募制度。

original: We must construct a new fortress along the banks of the Konotopka river. It shall be a modern bastion, utilizing the latest engineering techniques and a model for our future fortification efforts.
translation: 我们必须在科诺托普河沿岸建造一座新堡垒。它将是一个现代化堡垒，应用最新的工程技术和我们未来工事发展成果的样式。

original: The needs of each locality in our realm can differ wildly, and it can be difficult to administer them with a common policy. We should encourage local councils to govern themselves to an extent so that they can attend to their own needs.
translation: 我国各地区的需求差别很大，以通用政策来管理它们将会是很困难的一件事。我们应该鼓励地方议会在一定程度上的自治，以便他们能够满足自己的需求。
翻修主显圣容主教座堂

original: As the oldest remaining structure in the city, the Transfiguration Cathedral is a reminder of past glories as well as a symbol of our enduring faith. The Cathedral should be renovated, symbolizing a renewal of our ambitions and spiritual dedication.
translation: 作为城市中最古老的建筑，主显圣容主教座堂提醒着人们过去的辉煌，同时也是我们长久信仰的象征。我们应当翻修大教堂，彰显着我们的野心与为信仰作出的奉献。

original: The left bank of the Dnieper could be the breadbasket of Europe, if only the wild grasslands could be tamed. We must invest in the region's cultivation so that its full potential can be realized.
translation: 若是第聂伯左面河岸的荒地如果经过妥善处理，必能成为欧洲的粮仓。我们必须投入发展该地区的种植业，以便发挥其全部潜力。

original: The Ilkhanate was originally established to secure Mongol rule over Persia in 1256. Many who have sought to rule Persia since have sought legitimacy by claiming descent from Genghis Khan, but our nation is a true revival of the first Ilkhanate. None can question our right to rule.
translation: 伊儿汗国在1256年的建立是为了维持蒙古对波斯的统治。很多企图通过法理征服波斯的统治者都声称自己是成吉思汗的后代，但我们才是血统最纯正的伊儿汗国的真正复兴者。没有人能质疑我们的正统性。

original: Promoting a single language for use at court and within the state bureaucracy has clear advantages. Many of our elites have already adopted Persian as a second language, recognizing it as a prestigious and generally understood tongue throughout the Muslim world.
translation: 推行单一语言在充斥官僚制的宫廷中有着明显的优势。我们的许多精英已经将波斯语立为第二语言，认为这是一种身份地位的象征，而且也会使他们与穆斯林的交流更加流畅。

original: Genghis Khan established a system of relay stations, supply networks, and intelligence gathering to be employed across the Mongol Empire to ease the burdens of governing an empire spanning thousands of miles across. We should restore the Yam so that our armies and envoys can travel efficiently through the realm.
translation: 成吉思汗为蒙古帝国建立了一个兼顾中转站、补给点与情报机关为一体的系统应用于整个蒙古帝国，以此来缓解控制一个横跨数千里的帝国带来的负担。我们应该重建站赤系统，这样我们的军队与使团便可在国境内穿行自如。

original: Those who submit willingly to the Ilkhan can be sure that they will enjoy his protection. As word spreads of our benevolent and tolerant rule, resistance to our conquests will surely subside.
translation: 那些愿意屈服于伊儿汗国的人可以放心享受我们的保护。随着我国博爱仁政的消息传向各方时，征服过程中遇到的抵抗一定会减轻不少。

original: The first incarnation of the Ilkhanate heavily patronized the study of the heavens, funding observatories and inviting renowned astronomers to court. We should emulate our forebears' love of the sciences by restoring the old observatories.
translation: 伊儿汗国第一位大汗旭烈兀着重于占星术以及天文学的发展，资助天文台建设并邀请了很多知名的天文学家。我们应该通过建设更多的观测台，来效仿先祖对科学的热爱。

original: When our ancestors converted to Islam, they preferred the mystical teachings of Sufi scholars to the sectarian politics of the conventional Ulema. We should invite such scholars to court and promote a tolerant policy towards all Muslims in our realm.
translation: 当我们的祖先皈依伊斯兰教时，相比于常规乌理玛的宗派主义，他们偏爱苏菲派学者的神秘主义。我们应该邀请这样的学者并以此推行全国性的穆斯林宽容政策。

original: It would be foolish to ignore the services offered by the Turkoman soldiers who have begun to settle in our realm. Handheld firearms are the future of warfare, and these Turkomans have mastered that art.
translation: 忽略开始定居于我国境内的土库曼士兵能做出的贡献是一件很愚蠢的事。手持火器将是未来战场的主角，而这些土库曼人正精通于此。

original: Many among the Cossacks were born into serfdom. Tired of feudal oppression, they fled their masters and sought lives of freedom on the steppes. We must continue to welcome escaped serfs into our society.
translation: 虽然许多哥萨克人生而为奴，但他们也会对封建压迫感到忍无可忍，从而选择逃离他们的主人，在大草原上寻求自由自在的生活。我们一定要对这些逃脱的农奴融入我们的社会保持欢迎态度。

original: There are no kings or khans among the Cossacks. Our Hetman may be our highest military commander, but in matters of state and society he is simply the first among equals. Political power lies in the Rada, our legislative and military assembly, in which all Cossacks can have their say.
translation: 哥萨克人从来没有国王或者可汗之类的存在。我们的酋长就是最高军事指挥官，不过当面对国务或是社会问题时，他也不过只是众人其中之一而已。掌握政治权力的是拉达，哥萨克的立法与军事机关，在此所有哥萨克人都有一席之地。

original: A biting insult is often more effective than a carefully-worded missive. We know who our enemies are, and we have no fear of their armies. Thus we should not hesitate to tell them to kiss our arse!
translation: 辛辣的侮辱通常比精心措辞的信函更加有效。我们很清楚敌人是谁，他们的军事力量也不足为惧。因此我们应该毫不犹豫地告诉他们，吃屎吧你！

original: There is almost no division between civil and military society among the Cossacks. Our nation is a Host, defined by its people rather than by the land we control, and its people are warriors. We must ensure that military divisions properly meet our administrative needs as the Host expands.
translation: 对哥萨克人来说，世俗生活与军事生活几乎没有界限。我们整个国家就是一个军团，它的存在以其人民而不是控制的土地所界定，而它的人民都是骁勇善战的战士。随着军团的扩张，我们必须确保部队能够满足行政管理需求。

original: No man should suffer tyranny in a Cossack realm. When we conquer new territories, the serfs, peasants, and slaves there must be liberated immediately and integrated into our great Host.
translation: 在哥萨克人的国度里，不该有人担心暴政的压迫。每当我们占领一片新的土地，我们都一定要立刻解放那里的农奴、农民和奴隶，并让他们融入到我们的伟大军团中。

original: As the ranks of our Host swell, we must keep account of the strength of each regiment, their numbers and how well they are supplied. A centralized registry will allow us to support the needs of all Cossacks.
translation: 随着军团的规模不断增长，我们必须要把各军团的兵力、数量以及补给程度记录在案。一份由中央管理的花名册可使得我们满足全体哥萨克人的需求。

original: May Raid Coasts, including coasts of countries with same religion.
translation: 可以劫掠海岸（包括相同宗教国家）

original: The Pirate Republic lives and dies by the amount of plunder we can haul back to our ports. Let's take everything that isn't nailed down! On second thought, let's take everything that is nailed down too. And the nails!
translation: 海盗共和国的生死存亡在于我们能拿回到自家港口的战利品数量有多少。让我们把没钉死的都拿走！不对再寻思一下，还是把被钉死的东西也都拿走！也别忘了那些钉子！

original: We take our recruits from the desperate and the outcast. Self-proclaimed 'civilized' nations routinely enslave those they consider their inferiors and forcibly press their own countrymen into military service. Those who escape the bonds of tyranny find a home in our Republic.
translation: 我们从绝望和被抛弃的人中招募我们的新船员.那些 自封的“文明”国家经常奴役那些他们认为是低等的人，并强迫他们自己的同胞服兵役。 那些逃避暴政的人找到了我们的共和国作为家园。

original: A single hunter is easily outmaneuvered or outgunned on the open ocean. When we sail in consort we can use our numbers to great tactical advantage.
translation: 单个猎人很容易在开阔的海洋中被击败或者被火力压制.当我们在配合中出海时，我们可以利用我方数量来获得极大的战术优势。

original: Quartermasters on a pirate ship are elected representatives of the crew. They advocate the crew's needs to the captain and act as counterweight to his often arbitrary authority.
translation: 海盗船上的军需官由船员推举产生。他们会维护船员对船长的要求，并时常作为船长权威的平衡者。

original: Our coastline is littered with hidden coves and defensible bays that we can use to lure would-be pirate hunters into a deadly ambush.
translation: 我们的海岸线上到处都是隐藏的海湾和可防御的海岬，我们可以利用这些海湾吸引潜在的所谓海盗猎人进入致命的伏击。

original: The liberties we enjoy as free men are the envy of the peasants, slaves, and conscripts who toil for the profit of their superiors. Our smugglers should begin to distribute propaganda to stoke their resentment in the hopes that they will rise up and join our cause.
translation: 农民、奴隶和为上级的利益而奔命的征夫们最羡慕我们享受的自由了，我们的走私者应该开始分发宣传品，以激起他们的怨念仇恨，希望他们能够站起来加入我们的事业。

original: What does it matter which god the pirates worship? Their souls are likely damned regardless.
translation: 海盗崇拜哪个神有什么关系？反正他们的灵魂横竖都是被诅咒的那种。

original: Factories were mostly fortified trading posts settled in offshore coastal areas. These provided safety for both the merchants and the local populace from hostile forces that would disturb our trade.
translation: 工厂主要是在近海沿岸地区设立的强化交易站，为商人和当地民众提供了安全保护，防止敌对势力破坏我们的贸易。

original: By adopting a law allowing free movement of foreign people to our colonies we'll be sure to lure a wider range of future settlers.
translation: 通过一项法律允许外国人自由迁移到我们殖民地，我们一定会在更广的范围吸引未来定居者。

original: With the search of knowledge also comes many false ideas. It is only with evidence and our experience of the world around us that we can prove or disprove that what is before us is in fact true.
translation: 随着知识的搜索也会产生许多错误的想法。只有凭借我们周围世界的证据和经验，我们才能证明或证伪摆在我们面前的什么是真实的。

original: It is by exchange of ideas that we advance as a society. The words of our generations greatest minds must be written down and shared with their peers.
translation: 思想交流促进社会进步。我们这一代最伟大的思想必须记录下来，分享与其同行者。

original: Our nation has a long history of trading at sea with a network of merchants which reach far beyond the horizon. The excellence of our merchant marine and it's daring to sail seas others rather wouldn't is well known.
translation: 我国拥有海上贸易的悠久历史，商人网络远及地平线。众所周知，我国杰出的商船敢于航行别人不愿去的航线。

original: To avoid wars between us and a mighty rival, establishing a buffer state between us is not only mutually beneficial but imperative for the stability of the region.
translation: 为了避免我们与强大竞争对手之间的战争，在两国之间建立缓冲国是互利的，且对于该地区的稳定至关重要。

original: Moving through the lands with a force like ours is a large task. Luckily as the army swells so does as well the train of Camp Followers that provide and service the army.
translation: 像我们这样的强大的军队穿越土地是一项艰巨的任务。幸运的是，随着军队的扩充，随营人员的列车也建立起来，为军队提供服务。

original: Foreign dignitaries love the opportunity to partake in high society and the festivities that come with it. The grandeur of our society is known far and wide.
translation: 外国政要喜欢有机会参与上流社会和随之而来的庆祝活动中。我们社会的宏伟是广为人知的。

original: We must extend the reach of the House of Trade of the Indies. Our colonial agents must have a presence in every part of the world to ensure the smooth functioning of our empire.
translation: 我们必须扩大印度事务院的范围。我们的殖民代理人必须在世界各地都有存在，以确保我们帝国的顺利运作。

original: Each constitutent Kingdom in the Spanish realm has its own corte, an assembly of the most powerful elements of society in the region. There is often tension between the Crown and the Cortes over such issues as taxation and regional autonomy. We must rein in these institutions so that they primarily serve the Crown rather than their own interests.
translation: 西班牙领土内的每一个构成王国的地区都有自己的议会，它在地区力量如此强大的社会因素。在税收和地区自治等问题上，王室与议会之间经常存在着紧张的关系。我们必须控制这些机构，使它们主要为王室服务而不是为各自的利益。

original: Representing the interests of the cities, the 'Cabildos' councils have a wide variety of functions and duties. They are responsible for both advocating the interests of the city to the Crown and for many aspects of local governance. We must continue to establish Cabildos in newly-founded or newly-conquered cities, particularly in the New World where the need for Castilian institutions is felt most severely.
translation: 代表城市利益的卡比多斯理事会有各种各样的职能和职责。他们肩负着维护城市利益和王权利益的责任，也承担着许多方面的地方治理的责任。我们必须继续在新建或新征服的城市建立卡比多斯，特别是在新大陆，那里对卡斯蒂利亚制度的需求最为强烈。

original: The Princes and Princesses of the Crown are among our most valuable assets. They can be sent as royal envoys, married off to secure alliances, or appointed as regents when the need arises. It is important that we ensure that our monarch's loins continue to bear fruit.
translation: 王室的公主和王子们是我们最宝贵的资产。他们可以作为皇家使节进行派遣，联姻以确保联盟的稳固，或在需要时被指定为摄政。让我们的君主持续不断地生育是很重要的。

original: Based in the University of Salamanca, the School's interests lie in fields as diverse as theology, economics, and political philosophy. As one of the leading schools of thought in the Catholic world, its entrenched presence in Castile ensures that our nation is always at the forefront of intellectual affairs.
translation: 扎根于萨拉曼卡大学，该学派的研究兴趣在神学，经济学和政治哲学等多个领域。 作为天主教世界领先的思想流派之一，其在卡斯蒂利亚的枝繁叶茂确保了我们的国家始终站在学术的最前沿。

original: It is time to assert true royal authority in the realm; under a single set of laws and a common language, a renewed and centralized Castile will directly appoint officials and enshrine the absolute rule of the monarch.
translation: 是时候在这个领域展现真正的皇家权威了，在规定统一法律和通用语言之下, 一个复兴的集权化卡斯蒂利亚将会直接领导官员们侍奉绝对的君主统治。

original: Morocco's Viziers wield exceptional power within the state. Though undoubtedly effective at administering our nation, we must take care that they do not cultivate ambitions for even greater power.
translation: 摩洛哥的维齐尔们在国家中握有不同寻常的权力。虽然他们管理国家的手段很有效，但也要注意他们不会产生追求更大权力的野心。

original: Several groups of Sufi teachers have made Morocco their home. We must make sure that we accommodate these holy men, and take their teachings to heart.
translation: 数个苏菲派导师的团体已经将摩洛哥视为他们的家，我们必须确保能容纳这些圣人，并将他们的教导铭记于心。

original: Made up of refugees and opportunists, a multitude of pirate settlements have sprung up on the Moroccan coast. We should take these pirates under our wing so that they may harass our enemies on the water.
translation: 由难民和机会主义者组成的海盗定居点正大批涌现在摩洛哥的海岸上。我们应该把这些海盗招安到我们的麾下，这样他们就可以在海上袭扰我们的敌人了。

original: Morocco has many enemies that could launch an invasion from across the sea. We must construct a fleet large and powerful enough to repel foreign invaders whether they be Christian conquerors or Muslim corsairs.
translation: 有很多摩洛哥的敌人拥有从海上入侵的能力。我们必须建立一支强大舰队，它足以击退外来入侵者——无论是基督徒征服者还是穆斯林海盗。

original: Unfortunately we cannot always trust our soldiers to serve us loyally. By creating an army of slaves, however, loyalty ceases to be a relevant concern.
translation: 不幸的是，我们无法完全依靠服役士兵们的忠诚。然而，通过建立一支奴隶军队，忠诚与否就不再是问题。

original: The nomadic tribes that travel across our lands are our nominal subjects, but also a regular source of discord and dissent. We must rein in their power and bring them firmly in line with the state's policies.
translation: 遍布我们国土的游牧部落是我们的主体民族，但也往往是不和与异议的来源。我们必须控制他们的权力，使其与国策保持一致。

original: We have hired a large contingent of Catalan mercenaries to protect the Sultan. As experienced soldiers with no stake in Tunisian politics, they can be relied upon to serve us loyally so long as we continue to pay them well.
translation: 我们雇用了一大批加泰罗尼亚雇佣兵来保护苏丹。这些经验丰富的士兵在突尼斯政治中没有利害关系，因此是值得依赖的，只要我们能付出工资，他们就会忠诚地为我们服务。

original: It is not only ghazi, refugees, and fishermen who are attracted to piracy; the allure of profit can attract even our Christian enemies to the profession.
translation: 会受诱惑去当海盗的不仅仅是劫掠者，难民以及渔民；利益的诱惑甚至会吸引我们的基督教敌人投身于此。

original: The corsairs must no longer conduct their business in an unorganized and decentralized fashion. It is time to establish a state-led Board of Captains to organize and regulate pirate activity on our coast.
translation: 海盗们必须停止以无组织和分散的方式开展他们的业务。是时候建立一个由国家领导的船长理事会来组织并管理我们在沿海的私掠活动了。

original: As the rural interior of our nation better integrates with the urban coast, more goods find their way into Tunisian ports. We must monopolize exports of these goods so that the profits benefit the state.
translation: 随着我国农村内陆更好地融入沿岸城区市，更多的商品设法找到了如何进入突尼斯港口的法子。 我们必须垄断这些商品的出口，这样利润就会让国家收益。

original: Though the Sultans of Tunis have long styled themselves as Caliphs of Islam, this title has rarely been taken seriously by other Muslims. We must demonstrate our piety so that our brothers of the faith see us as a true Caliphate.
translation: 虽然突尼斯的苏丹号称自己是伊斯兰的哈里发已经许久了，但这个头衔很少被其他穆斯林严肃对待。我们必须展示出我们的虔诚，这样我们的伊斯兰兄弟们就会把我们视作真正的哈里发。

original: Not all of the slaves we capture are sold in the East; many are fated to serve on the galleys, ensuring a ready supply of seamen to row our ships.
translation: 并非所有我们捕获的奴隶都在东方出售; 许多人都注定要在桨帆船上服务，以此确保时刻能供应海员来划浆。

original: As both Muslims and Moriscos are expelled by the Christians of Iberia, refugees flee to the Maghreb. These refugees are none too pleased about being displaced, and eagerly accept the opportunity to profit from their downfall.
translation: 由于穆斯林和摩里斯克人都被伊比利亚的基督徒驱赶了，难民们逃往了马格里布。这些难民对于被逼流离失所仍心怀怨念，并热切希望能趁着他们衰落的时机中获利。

original: Christian princes tell grim tales about our dungeons, the dreaded Mazmorras. Here we keep our most valuable captives, those with wealthy family members with the money to pay for their safe return. The conditions typical in the Mazmorras ensure that ransoms are paid swiftly.
translation: 基督徒王公们讲述了关于我们地下城的血腥故事—可怕的地牢。在这里我们保留有最有价值的俘虏，那些富裕的家庭的成员有钱支付他们的赎金，地牢的这些特点使得赎金可以被迅速交纳。

original: Raiding is an especially profitable occupation for the pirates of the Barbary Coast due to the high price that Christian slaves can fetch in Turkish and Arabian markets.
translation: 海岸袭击对巴巴里海岸的海盗来说是一个特别有利可图的职业，尤其是因为基督徒奴隶在土耳其和阿拉伯市场的高昂价格。

original: A pirate stronghold must be fortified against attack from both land and sea. We must constuct defenses for our cities to repel invaders.
translation: 一处海盗的据点必须可以同时击退海上和陆地的攻击. 我们必须为我们的城市修建防御工事来反击入侵者。

original: Among those fleeing the Reconquista in Spain are the former Princes and Princesses of Al-Andalus, the great Muslim empire that once spanned nearly the whole of Iberia. These nobles are eager to restore their lost realms by any means necessary.
translation: 逃离西班牙的失地收复运动的人中有一些是安达卢西亚的前王子和公主，这个伟大的穆斯林帝国曾经跨越了整个伊比利亚。 这些贵族渴望以任何必要的手段恢复他们失去的边境。

original: We must establish a council of our most skilled Captains to guide and regulate piracy and the slave trade in our nation.
translation: 我们必须建立一个由我们最熟练的船长组成的理事会，以指导和规范我国的海盗行为和奴隶贸易。

original: Texas stands as an independent nation, priding itself on self-sufficiency and individualism.
translation: 德克萨斯是一个独立的国家，她以她的自给自足自立为傲。

original: We have fought hard for our independence, and we are prepared to fight to the death against any who would threaten our liberty.
translation: 我们已经通过斗争取得了独立，现在为了防止我们的自由受到威胁，我们要随时做好浴血奋战的准备。

original: The fertile fields of Texas provide excellent land for cotton plantations; settlers, slaves, immigrants, and farmers come from far and wide to work the new lands. If we take advantage of this, we can export this valuable crop worldwide in no time.
translation: 德克萨斯肥沃的土地为棉花的种植提供了得天独厚的条件；殖民者，奴隶，移民，和农民都从全球各地涌入这里，在这片新土地上劳作。如果我们利用这一优势，我们可以将这些精致的作物出口到世界的每一个角落。

original: The Vaqueros are the mounted pastoral farmers of the Americas, and it is a lifestyle that has a special place in our culture. These 'cowboys' are hardy workmen, adapted to the lay of the land and skilled in horse riding. They take great pride in their skill in cattle and horse wrangling.
translation: 牛仔是美国那些骑在马上的田园牧民，而且这已经成为了我们文化中的一种独特且重要的生活方式。这些牛仔是勇敢的劳作者，他们精通这里的地形并精通骑马。他们对他们的放牧和马匹驯服的技术引以为傲。

original: As a state on the frontier, we are confronted with dangerous Native American adversaries. If we are to keep our people safe, it is important to maintain an effective and mobile fighting force.
translation: 作为一个处于边境的国家，我们时常需要面对不仅危险还敌视我们的北美原住民。如果我们想保证人民的安全，我们就要保证能拥有一个有效且高机动的作战部队。

original: As a former province of Mexico, Texas has never fully abandoned its roots; Texas-Mexicans, or Tejanos, are very much integral to our state's vibrant culture, contributing no shortage of foods, music, language, and traditions.
translation: 作为之前墨西哥的一个省份，德克萨斯从没有忘光他们的传统；德克萨斯-墨西哥人，或者叫德哈诺人，是我们充满活力的文化构成中很重要的一部分，他们为我们带来他们的食物，音乐，语言和风俗。

original: In the wake of unrest and revolutions in Europe, Germans flee to the new world en masse seeking stability and safety. The Mainzer Adelsverein will promote the establishment of German communities settling in Texas, as well as their integration into our nation.
translation: 随着欧洲接踵而来的骚乱和革命，德意志人逃到了新世界来寻求稳定和安全。德意志移民社团会推动前来德克萨斯定居的德意志人建立德意志社区，也可以促进他们来融入我们的社会。

original: The former Asturian lands have been divided between upstart Spanish kingdoms. They must all be brought back into the Asturian fold.
translation: 从前的阿斯图里亚斯人的领地已经被新兴的西班牙王国瓜分。必须促使他们回到阿斯图里亚斯人的怀抱。

original: We are the custodians of the holy pilgrimage route, the Way of Saint James. It is our duty to ensure that pious travellers can pass safely through our lands to reach the sacred site of Santiago.
translation: 我们是神圣的圣詹姆斯朝圣之路的管理者。我们有责任确保虔诚的拜访者能够安全通过我们的土地到达圣地圣地亚哥。

original: Asturian high society has ancient roots and deep pockets. We should ensure that they have an honored place in our nation.
translation: 阿斯图里亚斯上流社会有着古老的根基和雄厚的财力。我们应该确保他们在我们国家享有光荣的地位。

original: Asturian financiers are eager to begin investing in New World colonies. We should establish colonial ventures of our own to maximize the profit.
translation: 阿斯图里亚斯的出资人迫切地想要在新大陆的殖民地投资。我们应该建立我们自己的殖民企业以获取最大利润。

original: These are dark times, and omens of the apocalypse are clear to see. This is a sign that we must renew our faith daily and dedicate ourselves to spreading the word of the Lord to the far reaches of the Earth.
translation: 这是黑暗的时代，大灾难的预兆已清晰无比。这昭示着我们必须每天反省我们的信仰，并竭尽全力把主的话传达到世界的每一个角落。

original: Administrative divisions within Asturias and Cantabria are woefully inefficient. The provinces must be consolidated into more centralized districts so aid in the administration of justice and the raising of levies.
translation: 阿斯图里亚斯和坎塔布里亚的行政区划效率低得可怜。各省必须合并成更集中的地区，以便在司法和提高税收方面提供援助。

original: We have discovered ample sources of coal in the hills of Asturias. We should take advantage of new advances in machinery and use our natural resources to boost our manufacturing industries.
translation: 我们在阿斯图里亚斯山区发现了丰富的煤炭资源。我们应该借助机械方面的新进步，利用我们的自然资源来促进我们的制造业发展。

original: In the wake of the Almohad's collapse, the Christian kingdoms seized the opportunity to conquer most of Iberia for themselves. But they did not succeed entirely; we must stand against them!
translation: 在阿尔摩哈德王朝的崩溃之后，基督教王国抓住机会为自己征服了伊比利亚的大部分地区。但他们并没有完全成功，我们必须抵抗他们！

original: Iberia was once divided between several powerful Muslim taifas who administered their domains autonomously. We should restore these taifas to ease the burden of administering our expanding realm.
translation: 伊比利亚曾经被分成几个强大的穆斯林泰法，他们独立管理自己的领土。我们应该恢复这些泰法，以减轻我们不断扩大领土所带来的管理负担。

original: Though we have pushed back the Christian kings, many of their former subjects do not follow our faith. We will demonstrate our benevolence by extending to them the tolerance and respect that was denied to Muslims under Christian rule.
translation: 虽然我们击退了基督教国王，但他们许多以前的臣民并不遵循我们的信仰。我们将向他们表示我们的仁慈，给予他们在基督教统治下被剥夺的宽容和尊重。

original: The works of Ibn Arabi, a renowned scholar and mystic of the 13th Century, are enjoying renewed popularity in Al-Andalus. Our realm is once more becoming a center of Islamic learning, a trend we should take every measure to promote.
translation: 13世纪著名学者、神秘主义者伊本·阿拉比的作品在安达卢西亚重新受到欢迎。我们的领土再次成为伊斯兰教学习的中心，我们应该采取一切措施促进这一趋势。

original: Our expansion is driven by a form of military colonialism called the jund system, in which bands of warriors are granted newly conquered lands to rule and settle. The prospect of reward is a powerful motivator for recruitment, ensuring that there is never a shortage of manpower in our regiments.
translation: 我们的扩张是由一种叫做“军式制度”的军事殖民主义形式推动的，在这种形式中，成群的战士被授予新征服的土地来统治和定居权。这样奖励的好处是招募新兵的强大动力，它保证了我们的队伍永远不会缺少人手。

original: We have heard tales from captured Portuguese sailors about a New World to the west, abundant with gold and silver. We should organize our own expeditions across the ocean and see for ourselves whether these rumours are true.
translation: 我们从被俘的葡萄牙水手那里听说了一个关于西部新大陆的故事，那里盛产黄金和白银。我们应该组织自己的远洋探险，亲自看看这些传闻是否属实。

original: It is vitally important that our frontier with the Christian kingdoms is heavily fortified. A chain of strongholds shall be erected on the borders so that no enemy may pass into our territory without enduring a costly siege.
translation: 加强我们与基督教王国边界的防御能力是至关重要的。在边境上要筑建一连串的要塞工事，这样任何敌人想要进入我们领土那么围攻时就需要付出惨痛的代价。
